title: BEACHFRONT LUXURY VILLA LOVINA NORTH BALI
description: The Villa Senja is a unique beachfront house with a luxurious and still authentic atmosphere due to the unique, handcrafted Balinese style interior which features an open living room with a professional billiard, 4 bedrooms with ensuite bathroom and a huge swimming pool (18x6 meters with natural balinese stones) Lay down in the gazebo, watch the stunning sunset from the terrace, have a cocktail in the swimming pool & enjoy your time in Bali.The spaceThe villa provides :- Internet (High speed service)- All bedrooms equipped with aircon- Baby high chair and bed - Lunch and diner can be served at the villa (extra charge for dinner after 8pm - 150 000 RPS ~9‚Ç¨)- Fully equipped kitchen- Laundry- Massage table - Access to the beach directly from the garden- ParkingGuest accessGuests have access to the entire place.Other things to noteThe Villa Senja is guarded 24/7 and the staff is always here to take care of your every needs.

title: Reconnect in Nature ‚Äì private Lake View Loft
description: Escape to a serene 1-bedroom loft in Bedugul with breathtaking views of Lake Beratan. Surrounded by lush greenery, vegetable, and fruit fields, this peaceful retreat offers a vegetable garden and the perfect escape from Bali‚Äôs heat. Enjoy high-speed WiFi, a fully equipped kitchen with a espresso machine, cozy indoor and outdoor fireplaces, laundry Room and a bathtub. Wake up to the soothing sounds of nature in this tranquil haven, where fresh air and stunning scenery create an unforgettable stayThe space!!! PLEASE READ BEFORE BOOKING !!!This spacious 1-bedroom loft in Bedugul is just a 10-minute walk from the lake, offering stunning views and fresh mountain air. The property features a vegetable garden where guests can pick fresh produce and a garden area perfect for yoga or exercise. Inside, enjoy high-speed WiFi, a smart TV, Bluetooth speakers, and a fully equipped kitchen with an espresso machine and coffee grinder for freshly brewed coffee.Please note that our home is a simple countryside house, not a luxury villa or hotel. We offer a peaceful, private, and nature-filled stay but we kindly ask that you not expect 5-star hotel amenities.For chilly evenings, the loft has both an indoor and outdoor fireplace, creating a cozy atmosphere. The bathroom includes hot water for both the shower and bathtub, ensuring a relaxing experience. Located near a local market, guests have easy access to fresh produce, cafes, and nearby attractions. Dedicated staff are available to assist with any needs, making your stay comfortable and hassle-free. Plus, pets are welcome, making it an ideal getaway for all.Enjoy outdoor dining with the BBQ grill, and take advantage of the dedicated laundry room on the property for added convenience during longer stays.Important Notes Before Arrival:Access to our house is about 100 meters from the main road through a natural dirt path (not yet paved). It is accessible by both cars and scooters, but please be aware that this is part of the rural charm and natural surroundings of Bedugul.Free parking is available along the roadside, and if you‚Äôre bringing a private car, we‚Äôd be happy to assist you in parking it in a more convenient spot. Our front yard is spacious and open.Nearby, you may notice a few greenhouse structures that are still under repair due to wind damage. These are not part of the rental area, but they may be visible from the garden.We sincerely look forward to welcoming you and hope you enjoy the beauty and calm of this natural retreat The road leading to our house includes a section of dirt road. Our home is located in a lush garden area, so encounters with insects and small animals are a natural part of the environment. If you're sensitive to such things, please consider this before booking.Additionally, there are several places of worship nearby, and you may hear the call to prayer five times a day.This is not a luxury hotel, so please manage your expectations accordingly. However, the comfort, tranquility, and breathtaking views make this place truly special and unforgettable.This property is surrounded by nature, with trees and open landscapes all around. While we maintain cleanliness to a high standard, occasional encounters with wildlife such as mice can happen. If you are particularly uncomfortable with this, the house may not be the right fit for you.If you need transportation, scooters are available for rent for easy exploration of the area. Taxis are also available for a more comfortable ride to nearby attractions, markets, and cafes. Let us know if you need assistance arranging transportation.Other things to noteBedugul, Bali, is a beautiful highland retreat offering stunning nature, cultural sites, and adventure activities. Here are some things to do:Nature & Sightseeing:	1.	Ulun Danu Beratan Temple ‚Äì A breathtaking water temple on Lake Beratan, one of Bali‚Äôs most iconic landmarks.	2.	Lake Beratan ‚Äì Enjoy a scenic boat ride or simply take in the serene lake views.	3.	Bali Botanical Garden ‚Äì Explore diverse plant species, a canopy walk, and beautiful gardens.	4.	Wanagiri Hidden Hills ‚Äì A famous spot with swings and scenic viewpoints overlooking the twin lakes.	5.	Twin Lakes (Lake Buyan & Tamblingan) ‚Äì Peaceful lakes with stunning sunrise views and hiking trails.	6.	Jatiluwih Rice Terraces ‚Äì A UNESCO-listed site known for its vast, lush terraced rice fields.Adventure & Outdoor Activities:	7.	Handara Gate ‚Äì A popular Balinese-style gate perfect for photos.	8.	Munduk Waterfalls ‚Äì A series of waterfalls ideal for trekking and nature lovers.	9.	Bali Treetop Adventure Park ‚Äì A fun zip-lining and ropes course inside the Bali Botanical Garden.	10.	Strawberry Picking ‚Äì Visit local farms to pick fresh strawberries.Local Culture & Markets:	11.	Candi Kuning Market ‚Äì A traditional market selling fresh produce, souvenirs, and local snacks.	12.	Pura Taman Ayun ‚Äì A beautiful royal temple with lush gardens and historical significance.	13.	Bedugul Traditional Market ‚Äì A great place to try fresh fruits and Balinese delicacies.Relax & Enjoy:	14.	Hot Springs at Angseri ‚Äì Relax in natural hot springs surrounded by tropical forest.	15.	Local Caf√©s & Restaurants ‚Äì Enjoy delicious Balinese and international cuisine with mountain views.Bedugul is perfect for those seeking a peaceful nature escape, adventure, or cultural exploration.

title: Balian Beachfront Luxury Tiny House
description: Brand new beachfront one bedroom teak tiny house, breathtaking ocean and ricefield views. Nestled on a beachfront hillside amid lush tropical gardens, this luxury tiny house is a true oasis of Zen. The unique design is built entirely from recycled materials, offering all the comforts of home.The air-conditioned living area is furnished with luxurious furniture and opens up to a huge deck with a hot tub jacuzzi, perfect for relaxing and taking in the stunning views.The spaceWelcome to our stunning one-bedroom teak tiny house, located right on the beach with private access and breathtaking ocean and rice field views. Nestled on a hillside amid lush tropical gardens, this luxury tiny house is a true oasis of Zen.Featuring a unique design built entirely from recycled materials, this tiny house offers all the comforts of a traditional home in a compact and eco-friendly package.The tiny house comprises a spacious, air-conditioned living area with a lounge and workstation, a king-size bed with luxurious linens and furniture, and opens up to a huge deck with a hot tub jacuzzi and sitting area, perfect for relaxing and taking in the stunning views. There's also a private courtyard with a gas Webber BBQ, perfect for al fresco dining.As location-independent professionals ourselves, we've designed the villa with remote work in mind. With two optic fiber lines and battery backup and generator, you'll have lightning-fast internet for video conferences and focused work.The private kitchen boasts marble benchtops, a gas cooker, and a Nespresso coffee machine, as well as all the necessary utensils for your stay. There is also a well-appointed kitchen with a 100-liter fridge. The bathroom is small but modern. There's even an outdoor shower for a refreshing rinse after a day at the beach.Due to the small nature and style of the villa, it is set up to be a private oasis where you can chill, relax, soak, and reset. Therefore, we do not provide guests with breakfast, and encourage guests to use the Nespresso machine, cook, or try food from the village. We recommend you purchase food supplies before coming or shop from the local market or village as Balian is remote. For fancier Western food, there are some, but limited, delivery services we can help you with once you have made your booking. These would need to be arranged one day before your arrival.Situated on the northernmost section of the land, our villa has a westerly outlook that is perfect for sunsets. Watch local fisherman and farmers go about their days the same way they have for hundreds of years, or swim on the beach just footsteps from your villa. Experience the Bali of yesteryear from the comfort of our beautiful beachfront property. With its peaceful and calm atmosphere, you'll feel instantly relaxed and at home.The villa is located just outside Balian Village, which can be reached by car, scooter in 3 to 5 minutes, or a 20-minute walk along the black-sand beach. The surrounding area offers many activities and sights, including surfing, cafes, secluded black-sand beaches, old-growth forests, and coastal caves and waterfalls to explore.Guest accessGuests will have access to the villa they have booked. On the property, there are currently two villas: the main villa, which is our home base, and our tiny house. Guests will share the entrance to the villa and paths through the property. Upon their arrival, they will be greeted by our Villa Host at the main entrance. The Villa Host will give them a tour of the property and take them to the entrance of their private villa. We are building a gym which will be shared between guests. The main gate should be kept closed, but the Villa Host will provide guests with instructions on how to open the entrance gate so they can come and go freely. Each villa is secluded and private and is either screened by walls or garden walls. Each Villa has direct access to the beach via the rice field and coconut grove, with the path across the rice field and down to the beach being shared.Other things to noteWe recommend guests bring or purchase food to cook in our kitchen. Daily house keeping is included or alternatively if you would like full privacy we can also arrange at your request.We have massage service available at additional costs, and transport service available. Scooters can be provided at additional charge.We have 3 dogs on the property, Max, Blackie & Coal. They are lovely dogs and part of our family.

title: room view sunrice 9
description: When you need peacefulness, break from stress & routine life, this was heavenNo party allowed here just chill, relax & enjoy the ricefields around the villa & the bird song all dayThe sunrise also amazing with endless pool direct to the ricefieldPlease respect local bali people & tradition here because u live in the middle of themBy motorcycle:15m to luna beach25m to canggu/berawa45m to seminyak & ubud1hr to kuta/legian1.5hr to Airport ngurah raienjoy, relaxwe rent a motorbikeDuring your stayThis place has a natural concept and is for healing, so it is clear that this place requires everything to be quiet, peaceful and speak slowly, for our esteemed guests, please respect every guest, do not be noisy in every room and in shared areas such as the kitchen and pool, thanks

title: Luxury villa on the beach, pool + butler service
description: please check out our another property in north Bali:  airbnb.com/h/lespoirThis property Located right on a hidden white beach.  Crystal clear ocean is just a few meters away with rich marine life very suitable for snorkeling/diving.  1km from the beach has a sand bar in the ocean, an ideal place for people who want 100% unique experience.  Our super girl Tiara will cook for you everyday.  Massage, yoga, diving or other day tour can be arranged any time. you will be completely pampered here.The spaceThis spacious and luxury villa is located in North Bali, sits right on Pemuteran Romantic Beach.   Here are some general descriptions of the villa facilities and service for your convenience. 1. The villa is right on a tranquite beach in Pemuteran village.   the ocean is just stone throw distance.  you will see plenty of coral, fish, even turtles.  and the slow sloping into the sea is perfect for non-experience snorkelers too.  and about 1 km away from the beach there are sand bar above the water during low tide, you can hire a boat and within 5 minutes you can step onto the sand bar right in the middle of the ocean. 2. The Villa has 2 bedrooms with king size bed and en-suite bathroom;  plus a TV room with 1.1m depth sofa which can accommodate one more person; Full kitchen, an inside living room and spacious terrace and sunken sofa for guest to relax.      3. there is a patio with big  BBQ rack, wash basin and a set of smooth cement table and chairs.  You can enjoy nice seafood BBQ during sunset;  4. The villa is equipped with very stable high speed Wifi covering the whole property and the International satellite TV channels with  Soundbar.    And we also provide the portable speaker which you can use to enjoy the nice music wherever you like within the villa.    5. The villa is with full service.    We have our own manager Budi who will assist you in any aspect, greet our guest, and take care of the request or handle emergency during the stay of our guest;   Budi will connect with you a few days before check in to arrange all details; 6.  We have full time housekeeper working in our villa, 8 hours per day, usually the housekeeper come in the morning for 5 hours and around dinner time for 3 hours.    But we can be flexible to some extend upon guest's preference;   7. There is gardener and security work full time in our villa too.   Security will work from 18:00 - 6:00 everyday,   So even you arrive at mid night, we will have people to help you check in; 8.  Attention:     To some guest who feel bothered with service people around,  please let us know when you check in,  and we can then arrange with you for the suitable working time and area;   9.  Our housekeepers could cook for you upon your request.    The cooking service is included in the room charge already,   you only need to inform our housekeeper in advance and pay for the groceries that you request;       We encourage the guest to buy the groceries by themselves,  of course the staff can also buy the groceries for you upon your request and present the receipt on the same day;   it's appreciated if our guest pay some tips for the shopping service to our staffs.  However, to mark up or over charge for the groceries is not allowed,  in case you have any question on the receipt our staffs presented, please contact our villa manager Budi or to me immediately; 10. We can arrange airport pick up service:   one way from airport to the villa is about 1,000,000 IDR (approx. 60 US$) for 4 pax and below;    a half day or one day trip can be also arranged by our villa manager;11.  It will take about 4 hours from the airport to our villa, and from Ubud it will be about 3 hours, the exact time will depend on the traffic;   Fortunately, there is beautiful lakes and rice paddies on the road; 12. To go around, another alternative is to rent scooter, it's 100K-150K  a day, depending on the size; and the scooter can be delivered and pick up at our villa;   you need to request it to our villa manager one day in advance; 13.  in Pemuteran village, there are quite many restaurants you can choose, and some can provide food delivery too; 14. if you care for scuba diving, Pemuteran and  Menjangan are good place to go, our manager can arrange for you with short notice;  15. we can arrange in villa massage service, approx. 11-12 US$ per hour, need to inform our villa manager one day in advance; 15.  Attention: the villa is located in the nature;  Insects and geckos are inevitable, though we are trying to apply repellents and keep the house clean to minimize them.   and please close the door before sun set and not to turn on too much light is very helpful to minimize  insects. If there is any questions, please drop us a message, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.   Enjoy your stay!Guest accessthe whole property can be accessed by the guest, except the storage and facilities room away from the main building.

title: *New!* Kavana √âlan | 5 mins to Berawa beach
description: Enjoy a stylish stay at this centrally located villa. Kavana √âlan is a refined two-bedroom retreat where contemporary design meets tropical ease. Ideal for couples, families, or small groups. Overlooking the Bali Equestrian Center stables, it offers serene views and prime convenience behind Brunch Club, steps from Island Sports padel and minutes to caf√©s, beach clubs, and surf. Unwind by your private pool or watch horses from the balcony, your tranquil Berawa sanctuary awaits.The spaceDesigned for effortless relaxation, the villa flows from sun-drenched outdoor living to a chic, air‚Äëconditioned interior.Bedrooms: Two serene ensuite bedrooms on the upper level, each with calming finishes. Both enjoy pool and stable views, perfect for morning coffee or golden-hour sunsets.Living & Dining: A minimalist-chic, closed-plan layout with a cozy lounge and dining area. Ideal for movie nights, slow mornings, and long conversations.Kitchen: Fully equipped with modern essentials (stovetop, microwave, fridge, Nespresso coffee machine, cookware, and tableware) so you can prepare anything from quick snacks to leisurely breakfasts.Private Pool & Deck: The fully decked pool area features sun loungers, an inviting spot to share a bottle of wine, read, or bask in the Bali breeze.Powder Room: A convenient guest powder room is tucked next to the stairs.Guest accessEnjoy exclusive, private access to the entire villa and its amenities:Private swimming pool with sun loungers Light-filled living and dining area (closed plan for cool comfort)Fully equipped kitchenEnsuite bathrooms with spa-like touchesTranquil stable viewsSecure on-site scooter/car parkingOther things to noteWe believe a stay should feel effortless. Every detail has been considered to enhance your comfort and peace of mind:üå∫ Daily Housekeeping: Six days a week for a pristine, worry-free environmentüåø Pool & Garden Care: Twice-weekly maintenance to keep your surroundings fresh and sereneüßñ Luxury Towels & Linens: Freshly prepared for every guestüì∂ High-Speed WiFi: Stay connected with easeüîí Safety Box: For added peace of mindü•Ç Welcome Drink: A refreshing start to your time in BaliExclusive Concierge Services (Available on Request):üöñ Private Airport Transfers ‚Äì Skip the hassle and arrive stress-free.‚Ä®üöó Car & Bike Rentals ‚Äì With or without a driver, explore Bali on your terms.‚Ä®üß∫ Laundry Services ‚Äì Because vacation should be effortless.‚Ä®üçΩ Restaurant Reservations ‚Äì Let us book you the best dining spots in town.‚Ä®üèÑ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Exciting Activities ‚Äì Surf lessons, watersports, cooking classes, water parks‚Ä¶ whatever your heart desires!‚Ä®üèï Tailored Tours ‚Äì Visit Bali‚Äôs breathtaking temples, lush landscapes, charming villages, and hidden gems.‚Ä®‚Ä¶And so much more! Just ask, and we‚Äôll try to make it happen.üíå Your Bali Getaway, Made Effortless!Want to make the most of your stay? Our team is here to assist with activity bookings and recommendations to ensure you have an amazing experience in Bali!PS: Due to Bali‚Äôs tropical climate, insects, mosquitoes, and other bugs are unavoidable. To ensure your comfort, we provide insect repellents, Baygon spray, and other essentials so you can fully enjoy your stay.

title: One Bedroom Round Bamboo House in Bamboo Tropical
description: Located in the Bamboo Tropical Retreat in Lembeng Village, Ketewel, you are about 10 minutes scooter ride to Lembeng Beach-black sand beach and good for surfing, about 10 minutes to Sanur harbour, 20 minutes ride to central Sanur, the same time you need to go to Keramas Surf Beach, and about the same time to reach the beautiful Bali Safari & Marine Park. The city of Denpasar is about 30 minutes. If you would like to explore Ubud, it's around 30 minutes from where we are.The spaceOur round bamboo house is set up in a two-storey bamboo building. It has king bed with 200cmx200cm size, wardrobe, AC, & working table. It has access to the balcony with a hammock overlooking the pool area, a spacious bathroom with hot shower & bathtub, dinning area & private kitchen equipped with basic cooking utensils, crockery, cutleries, fridge & water dispenser. A lagoon pool is for sharing with other guests staying in other bamboo houses.The rate includes breakfast which is scheduled from 7:30-10:00 AM. We also have multifunction space set up in our garden for SPA / yoga/meditation/sound healing program. We also introduce some program related to tradition and spiritual activities like offering making and purification by our priest. All these activities  will need prior booking to us. We can also provide airport pick up and transfer as well as motorbike rental with prior booking.Free parking for motorbike and cars are available at our premises.Guest accessGuest will have this bamboo house along with its bathroom, kitchen, and dining area for themselves. The lagoon pool is for sharing with other guests staying in different bamboo houses. We also provide the SPA, offering making, purification with our priest, and yoga/meditation/sound healing program with prior booking.Other things to noteAs you are living in the village of Lembeng, sometimes you may hear some roosters, the Muslim prayers several time a day. Other than that, the property is very quiet especially during the evening/night. By talking a walk or having a ride around the area, you will see how the daily routine of the local Balinese people. It will be a bonus for your stay when there is temple ceremony or wedding and other traditional ceremony being conducted in the village.

title: Villa Cable 1
description: Unique brand new villas for couples, friends or family. Spacious and comfortable with all amenities you need, to be able to enjoy your stay. Delicious breakfast is included with a range of choice. Location is 10/10. Walking distance to the main road of Seminyak (Kayu Aya) where you can find restaurants, clubs, pubs, beach clubs, spa's, ATM..etc . Despite being so central, the villas are quiet and comfortable for you to enjoy and relax.Guest accessOur manager will be welcoming you at the villas. And you will be given instructions on how to get to us beforehand.

title: NEW! Green Earth Bali | Cinnamon Villa
description: Experience ultimate relaxation in the heart of Bali at exclusive luxury bamboo villa in Sidemen.Wake up to a breathtaking view of Mount Agung right from your bed, and unwind in your private Jacuzzi hot pool surrounded by lush nature.Enjoy a complimentary breakfast each morning, and savor delicious meals at our restaurant prepared with fresh, organic produce from our own farm.A dedicated butler is always on hand to make your stay seamless and truly indulgent.The spaceDiscover the remarkable world of unique bamboo architecture and luxurious amenities!You're going to absolutely love the harmony of eco-chic design in our unique bamboo concept villa! This architectural gem is a perfect blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern comfort.After a day of exploration, you'll be ready to unwind. Imagine yourself soaking in your very own private hot-water pool, set against this stunning natural backdrop. There's nothing better!The villa features expansive, lush garden and a spacious veranda‚Äîyour personal sanctuary for unwinding. You're going to absolutely love sleeping on this exceptionally comfortable bed, which is enveloped in a soft mosquito net. Prepare for the most peaceful slumber of your life! And for the ultimate relaxation by day, nothing beats swaying gently in a cozy net lounge with a picture-perfect view. No matter where you are, you'll be treated to spectacular panoramas that will take your breath away. Imagine gazing upon the entire valley and the majestic volcano before you, a vista so awe-inspiring that it will leave you speechless. Every moment here is pure magic. Whether you're waking up or lazily lounging, every moment becomes an unforgettable experience.Guest accessOur villa's location in Sidemen is simply perfect, with easy access to everything you could possibly need. Get ready for the adventure of a lifetime! At your doorstep, you'll find an incredible opportunity to immerse yourself in the rich culture of the region. Embark on an unforgettable journey along the renowned Sidemen trekking trails, feel the exhilaration of white-water rafting on the nearby rivers, and become part of the vibrant community on our organic farm ‚Äî a true slice of paradise. After a day filled with fun activities, you'll be delighted to know that you don't have to travel far to enjoy a delicious meal. Just return to our on-site restaurant, where we serve mouthwatering dishes crafted from the freshest, homegrown produce. For moments of mindfulness, you'll be delighted to know that there are several serene yoga studios and spiritual retreats located close by. These retreats allow you to find the perfect balance between seclusion and inspired exploration.

title: *2Bedroom*Central Canggu*1.5km Echo Beach*NEW*
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.*Modern brand NEW 2 bedroom villa with loft design, private pool and Chill Area*Heart of Canggu,1.5km to ECHO BEACH(LA BRISA),1.6km to BATU BOLONG BEACH*Wifi Superfast 150 Mb/s fiber optic, perfect for work & streaming*SmartTV(Netflix,Youtube)*Large living room and modern fully equipped kitchen with all you need*2x comfortable bedroom with ensuite bathroom & Aircon*Parking*Near Crate cafe and Copenhagen*Other things to noteDear Guest,Please kindly read carefully before booking:You are booking a stay in Bali, an island located in a tropical environment.Due to this natural setting and local surroundings, certain conditions are normal and cannot be grounds for refunds or cancellations.By booking, you agree and acknowledge the following:	‚Ä¢	Smells: Occasional smells from nature (plants, humidity, rain, agriculture, nearby activities, sea breeze) are possible. Smells are subjective and cannot be documented, thus cannot be a valid reason for refunds or cancellations.	‚Ä¢	Noise: Bali is a living island ‚Äî nearby construction, ceremonies, prayers, roosters, wildlife sounds (frogs, geckos, insects, birds, dogs) are common. We cannot control external noise.	‚Ä¢	Insects and Wildlife: Despite professional pest control, in a tropical climate occasional visits from insects (ants, geckos, mosquitoes) are unavoidable.	‚Ä¢	Weather and Environment: Heavy rain, humidity, strong winds, and changes in temperature are part of the tropical environment and may temporarily affect outdoor facilities.	‚Ä¢	Neighbor Behavior: We cannot control the behavior of neighbors or surrounding properties.	‚Ä¢	Utilities: Temporary interruptions to internet, electricity, or water may occur due to infrastructure issues outside of our control and are common across Bali.All the above factors are considered part of the normal experience in Bali. They are not defects or faults of the property, and therefore do not qualify for refunds or cancellations.By confirming your booking, you accept these conditions fully and voluntarily.We appreciate your understanding and are committed to making your stay as comfortable and memorable as possible!

title: Beachfront villa w/ private pool & tropical garden
description: Devi‚Äôs Place Beach House is a fabulous private, peaceful house for guests wanting to spend time in a quiet less developed part of Bali.  It is available for rental as a complete private house and can accommodate up 6 people.  It is a compact 2 storied beach home with living space, bathroom & kitchen on each floor.  It is ideal for 2 couples, 2 friends, a group of friends or a family.  Absolute beachfront with its own amazing private pool at the end of the garden path, looking over the Bali sea.The spaceOur Beachfront House in North Bali has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 complete kitchens, comfortable indoor lounge, plus 2 open terraces, a large daybed and outdoor dining area.  You can step off the terrace and walk straight through the garden to the beautiful salt water pool and ocean beyond. All the beds and the daybed on the terrace are queen size.  The bedrooms and living room have air-conditioning, and the day-bed on the terrace has a mosquito net to protect it and the property is cooled by the ocean breezes.Guest accessGuests will enjoy our beautiful lush tropical gardens, and gorgeous private pool located close to the beach at the end of the lawn.  Our Beach House has its own private access and is very quiet and peaceful.Other things to noteThere are several warungs in the local village, and within walking distance (10 minutes) is Warung Seni.There is a nightly buffet at Gaia Oasis,  just a short walk along the beach.  Our housekeeper Siki (part of our Ubud family) is always on hand for laundry and private cooking.  Siki can take you to the local market to buy fresh fish and produce, which she can cook for you in the traditional Balinese way.  There is a small but complete menu in the Beach House for dining at home, Siki will cook for you and bring the prepared meal to the house..

title: Bali Traditional House in ubud Tungeh Inn
description: A comfortable and quiet place with a Balinese home feel like a temple, with a beautiful and spacious garden, the inn is on the outskirts of ubud, 10 minutes to the center of ubud, also close to the monkey forest tourism object, campuhan bridge walk's, ubud palace , rice field, waterfall, and close to famous restaurant in ubud, and next to our accommodation there is a laundryThe spaceour place has the characteristics of an ancient Balinese house with lots of carvings in the wood and walls,and you'll feel like you're staying in your own home, and the atmosphere of the house is so nice like in a temple,only free parking is available for motorbikesGuest accessguests can access the Room, yard, bathroom, and guests also get coffee or tea every dayOther things to notemy accommodation name is TUNGEH INN

title: Bamboo house on hilltop with excellent views
description: We want to share our unique and serene bamboo family vacation house located on a large property - D'Oemah Bamboe. If you like an extraordinary nature experience this is the right place for you.From the house and property there are breathtaking views of the most beautifull natural landscape, the sea and the mountains. In the evening and at night, from the terraces and while lying in the beds, you can enjoy the view of hundrede of lights from the Singaraja area and from the boats on the sea.The spaceThe house has two floors, first floor consist of two bedrooms and a balcony. The ground floor has a large open living area including dining area and kitchen besides a terrace and bathroom. The house is located 400m above sea level and with an open house the temperature is absolutely perfect without aircondition. We have created the villa as our private vacation paradise which we also like to share.Stairs from the house lead you into a valley below where you can find a river on the edge of the property with cool and clear water from the mountains. Here you will be able to cool your body in total privacy, surrounded by nature and sounds of nature.On our farm we have many kinds of organic fruits and vegetables etc. which you will be able to enjoy, and we also have pet goats.Other things to noteWe very much recommend our villa to families with children as it has absolute privacy and a great feeling of staying in the middle of nature and with lots to explore on the large property including a river, lots of different trees including fruit trees, rice terraces and animals. Small children will though need to be under supervision as there are lots of places where they can fall as the property is in a natural environment.If you are traveling with children we allow up to 5 guests in the villa. You complete the booking by 4 guests and inform us that you are bringing an extra child. Depending on the age of your children there is an extra charge, which includes extra bed and breakfast etc.We have wired high speed internet connection in the house.

title: Cozy Countryside Hideaway with Private Pool
description: Welcome to iNYa! Our cozy, bright room offers privacy and tranquility, nestled at the back of a beautiful house compound  with a large garden and stunning views of rice fields and a serene valley.Enjoy your own private pool for a refreshing dip in peaceful surroundings. The comfortable, well-appointed room provides a restful stay, and the open-plan kitchen and living area are perfect for cooking, dining, and unwinding.The spaceThe room itself is comfortable and well-appointed, with an inviting atmosphere that ensures a restful stay.The open-plan kitchen and living area provide a nice space to cook, dine, and unwind, while the bathroom is modern and clean.Located in an authentic village, you‚Äôll get to experience the local culture while enjoying the serenity of the countryside.Whether you're here to relax or explore, this space offers the perfect combination of comfort, nature, and peace.- Private Kitchen - Bathroom - Private Pool - large garden facing rice field valleyGuest accessWe are located approximately 20-30 minutes from Ubud. Transportation options such as scooter rentals or private car hire with a driver can easily be arranged with us.Our location is also close to several popular attractions, including a 15-minute drive to white water rafting, ATV rides, Elephant Park, the famous Tegalalang rice terraces, as well as popular pool bars in Ubud and more.Keliki Kawan village is nestled in a lush, green area, surrounded by peaceful, non-touristy rice fields and jungle valleys. Guests can enjoy trekking or cycling through the scenic landscape.Our village community is warm and welcoming, and guests are invited to participate in local festivals during their stay.Other things to note-	There are several local dining options around the area where you can enjoy authentic Balinese cuisine.-	Please help us "SAVE OUR PLANET" by turning off lamps, AC, and any electrical appliances when not in use.-	Feel free to communicate with us if you'd like to join any of the village festivals during your stay.-	Treat our home as your second home ‚Äî we welcome you to relax and enjoy the space-	Feel free to reach out, should you need any assistance.

title: Luxury 4BR Oceanfront Villa w/ Pool, Chef & Bar
description: A sanctuary of silence and salt air, where every detail whispers ease.Villa Breeze 1 is a serene 4-bedroom oceanfront retreat with stunning sunset views, a private pool, and modern tropical design. Perfect for families or groups seeking tranquility and adventure in Tabanan.The spaceVilla Breeze 1  Tabanan accommodates up to 8 guests across four beautifully appointed bedrooms, each designed for comfort and tranquility. Every bedroom is en-suite and features a private bathroom with a rain shower, wardrobe, and elegant touches of Balinese craftsmanship. Large windows fill the rooms with soft natural light and frame views of lush tropical gardens or the Indian Ocean.The open-plan living and dining areas seamlessly blend with the outdoors, allowing ocean breezes and natural sunlight to flow through the space. A fully equipped modern kitchen awaits culinary enthusiasts, perfect for preparing meals or enjoying the creations of our private chef (available on request).Step outside to discover your private oceanfront sanctuary ‚Äî an infinity-edge pool overlooking the waves, surrounded by sunbeds, tropical greenery, and a shaded lounge area. The villa‚Äôs design encourages relaxation and connection, whether you‚Äôre floating in the pool at sunset or gathering for alfresco dining under the stars.Nestled in peaceful Tabanan, Villa Breeze 1 offers a perfect balance between coastal seclusion and easy access to Bali‚Äôs highlights ‚Äî just 25 minutes from Canggu and near the iconic Tanah Lot Temple. Here, oceanfront serenity meets modern tropical elegance, curated just for you.Guest accessAt Villas Breeze, time softens. The horizon stretches unbroken before you, and every breath carries the rhythm of the sea. This is a place designed for stillness ‚Äî a sanctuary of refined simplicity, where natural textures, gentle light, and quiet luxury frame each day.From the moment you arrive, you are received with ease.‚Ä®A private one-way airport pickup awaits ‚Äî complete with fresh flowers to welcome you to Bali. Upon arrival, cool coconuts and scented towels greet you as the sound of waves folds into silence.Each morning, a complimentary breakfast is served with warmth and discretion. As evening falls, the air fills with the soft glow of the firepit, and once a week, the villa comes alive with the graceful rhythm of Balinese dancers ‚Äî a gesture of cultural reverence for stays of minimum 7 nights.Every detail of your stay is cared for ‚Äî from daily cleaning to laundry on request, allowing you to simply arrive and exhale.Other things to noteGuests have full and private access to their villa, including:* Private swimming pool and gardens* Private cocktail & refreshments bar* Daily breakfast* Firepit and Balinese dance evenings (complimentary)* One-way airport pickup with floral welcome* Daily housekeeping and on-request laundry service* 24/7 SecurityEvery space is yours to enjoy in tranquility ‚Äî no shared areas, no interruptions, only the soft cadence of coastal life.Enhance Your StayBeyond the villa, our concierge team can curate bespoke experiences to match your rhythm. Each is handled seamlessly and charged separately:* Private in-villa dining with a personal chef* Balinese massages and wellness rituals by the pool* Private Driver for day trips through rice terraces, waterfalls, and hidden temples, itineraries of your choice* Horseback rides along the coast* ATV Rides inside Bali‚Äôs lush forests* Nusa Penida Tours for the curious island explorers* IV Drips - a health add-on for a complete retreat by designEvery experience can be custom-tailored into a personal package ‚Äî allowing you to shape your stay around moments that matter most.Other Things to Note* Rates are inclusive of taxes and villa amenities.* 20% New Listing discount currently active!* Daily cleaning is included.* Laundry available upon request (charged per item).* All activities beyond the inclusions are optional add-ons, arranged by our team with trusted partners.* Airport drop-off and extended transfers can be coordinated on request.* The property‚Äôs team is available throughout your stay ‚Äî discreet, attentive, and always nearby when needed.

title: Bamboo Suite 1BR - Private Pool + Rice Field View
description: Stay in a one-of-a-kind bamboo villa nestled in the heart of Ubud. Featuring a private pool, unique handcrafted bamboo design, and stunning views of rice fields & Mount Agung. Just 10 minutes from Ubud Center, this peaceful retreat blends natural beauty with comfort‚Äîideal for couples or nature lovers seeking a truly unforgettable Bali escape.The spaceFacilities:- Air conditioning- Shower - Bathtub- Toilet Amenities- Towel- Mini Fridge- Safe box- Coffee & Tea- Free high speed Wifi (up to 250 Mbps)- Private Pool- Room Cleaning (on request)(Breakfast / Meal Not Included)

title: Villa L'espoir IV - Lovina Hill, ocean view+butler
description: please check our another villa in North Bali:   airbnb.com/h/lespoirBreathtaking ocean and hill view. You will enjoy the entire property privately with free cooking and cleaning service. The whole property including kitchen and bathroom are all facing to the ocean.  The spacious outdoor lounging area is perfect to enjoy sun-rise and sunshine.   On site massage, yoga session or day tour can be arranged upon your request.The spaceThis spacious and luxury villa is located in North Bali.    Here are some general descriptions of the villa facilities and service for your convenience. 1. The Villa has 2 bedrooms with king size bed and en-suite bathroom;  Full kitchen, living room with TV and spacious terrace and sunken sofa for guest to relax.      2. there is big  BBQ rack that you can enjoy nice seafood BBQ during sunset; plus a roof top where you can enjoy nice sun rise;3. Sunken sofa is the best place to enjoy sunrise around 6-6:30 am. 4. The villa is equipped with very stable high speed Wifi covering the whole property and the International satellite TV channels with  Soundbar.    And we also provide the portable speaker which you can use to enjoy the nice music wherever you like within the villa.    5. The villa is with full service.    We have our own manager Budi who will assist you in any aspect, greet our guest, and take care of the request or handle emergency during the stay of our guest;   Budi will connect with you a few days before check in to arrange all details; 6.  We have full time housekeepers working in our villa, 8 hours per day, usually the housekeeper come in the morning for 5 hours and around dinner time for 3 hours.    But we can be flexible to some extend upon guest's preference;   7. There is gardener and security work full time in our villa.   Security will work from 18:00 - 6:00 everyday,   So even you arrive at mid night, we will have people to help you check in; 8.  Attention:     To some guest who feel bothered with service people around,  please let us know when you check in,  and we can then arrange with you for the suitable working time and area;   9.  Our housekeepers could cook for you upon your request.    The cooking service is included in the room charge already,   you only need to inform our housekeeper in advance and pay for the groceries that you request;       We encourage the guest to buy the groceries by themselves,  of course the staff can also buy the groceries for you upon your request and present the receipt on the same day;   it's appreciated if our guest pay some tips for the shopping service to our staffs.  However, to mark up or over charge for the groceries is not allowed,  in case you have any question on the receipt our staffs presented, please contact our villa manager Budi or to me immediately; 10. We can arrange airport pick up service:   one way from airport to the villa is about 800,000 IDR for 4 pax and below;    a half day or one day trip can be also arranged by our villa manager;11.  It will take about 2.5-3 hours from the airport to our villa, and from Ubud it will be about 1.5-2 hours, the exact time will depend on the traffic;   Fortunately, there is beautiful lakes and rice paddies on the road; 12. To go around, another alternative is to rent scooter, it's 100K-150K  a day, depending on the size; and the scooter can be delivered and pick up at our villa;   you need to request it to our villa manager one day in advance; 13.  the Villa is just 5 minutes driving from Lovina, there are plenty of restaurant and bars, and some also provide free pick up service;  details can be found in the service manual in the villa; 14. A good international supermarket in Lovina, Pepito, is only 5 minutes drive from the villa; it provides big variety of western style food, like cheese, sausage, bacon/ham, yogurt, beef stake, fresh seafood and so on.     If you are interested in local food,  it's recommended to visit the local food market in  early morning; 15.   Dolphin watch in Lovina area is famous in north Bali,  our villa manager can arrange for you with one day in advance notice; 16.  If you like to have half day or day trip, some good waterfall,   famous water temple Ulun Danu and twin lake are all within 1 hr drive;    You will find some detailed introduction in the service manual in our villa; 17. if you care for snorkling or scuba diving, north Bali is a good place as it's close to one of the best diving spot in Bali, Menjangan island or in Pemuteran area.     Our villa manager can arrange for you with one day in advance notice; 18. we can arrange in villa massage service, approx. 11-12 US$ per hour, need to inform our villa manager one day in advance; 19. Private Yoga session in the villa can be arranged too upon request; 20.  Attention: the villa is located in the nature;  Insects and geckos are inevitable, though we are trying to apply repellents and keep the house clean to minimize them.   and please close the door before sun set and not to turn on too much light is very helpful to minimize  insects. If there is any questions, please drop us a message, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.   Enjoy your stay!Guest accessYou can access the whole villa except the storage, laundry and facility room away from the main building.Other things to note1. if you will bring your pets, please inform us in advance, we will confirm whether this is possible or not; 2. if you will bring extra guest to stay over night during your stay, please inform us in advance as it may occur extra charge.3. party with people not booked in our villa is not allowed.

title: Vishala Bali | Panoramic Bamboo House in Sidemen
description: Vishala Retreat Bali nestled in Sidemen, Bali where our Bamboo House blends nature‚Äôs tranquility with luxurious comfort. Featuring an infinity private pool, hanging chair, and daybed, all perfectly positioned to face the breathtaking panoramic views of Mount Agung and cascading rice fields, this retreat is designed for ultimate relaxation.The spaceEnjoy seamless comfort with a cozy air-conditioned bedroom and a private bathroom with amenities, while secure private parking for cars and motorcycles ensures a hassle-free stay. Start your mornings with a delicious breakfast and let this hidden gem be your gateway to paradise. Ready to experience the magic?Other things to note1.	Semi-Open spaceOur villa offers an semi-open space experience, seamlessly blending with the surrounding nature. Situated close to local farmers, you may catch a glimpse of their daily activities, especially between 9 AM and 2 PM. While immersing yourself in this authentic rural atmosphere, rest assured that your safety and comfort remain our top priority throughout your stay.2.	Free private parkingOur villa offers private parking, giving you the freedom to drive or ride your own vehicle with ease. Whether you arrive by car or motorbike, you can enjoy the convenience of secure parking at any time3.	BugsSince our villa is immersed in nature, you may find yourself sharing the space with some of its natural inhabitants. While we take measures to keep bugs out, maintaining a clean room can help minimize their presence. For added comfort, we provide bug spray and mosquito nets, and our staff is always ready to assist if you have any concerns.4.	Semi-outdoor bathroomThe villa's bathroom features a semi-open design, allowing you to fully embrace the harmony between comfort and nature during your stay. 5.	LocationOur villa is situated in Sidemen, Bali, just a two-hour drive from the airport. Within a 15-minute drive, you'll find restaurants and spas for your convenience. If you're driving your own car, please note that navigating to and from the villa at night can be challenging. Should you need any assistance, our staff is always available to help6.	Room servicePlease note that our room service is available from 7 AM to 9 PM. For easy ordering, simply reach out to us via Whats4pp.

title: Silver Creek - 1BR Villa Kedungu, Pool & Horses
description: (Also check our other villas that are at the same location! Sunset Meadow, Rider's Nest & Wolf's Den) ‚ú® Silver Creek is a hidden gem in Kedungu ‚Äì just minutes from the beach, peacefully tucked away yet close to restaurants and activities. This sustainably built 1-bedroom boho-style villa offers privacy, natural comfort, and views of the Salty Cowboy Ranch paddocks. Your private pool and tropical garden are the perfect place to relax.           ‚ú® Book now and start your Bali experience!The spaceüè° Silver Creek by Salty Cowboy: Your Home ü§çSilver Creek is a hidden gem in the heart of Kedungu ‚Äì just minutes from the beach, peacefully tucked away yet close to restaurants, caf√©s and attractions. This lovingly designed 1-bedroom villa was built from sustainable reclaimed wood, combining traditional charm with modern comfort.From your private terrace and pool, you overlook the paddocks of the Salty Cowboy Ranch ‚Äì a unique Bali experience. Here you‚Äôll feel the peace, the closeness to nature, and the special atmosphere of village life.‚ú® Highlights of Silver Creeküåø Complete privacy ‚Äì private villa with pool, terrace & small gardenüê¥ Direct view of the ranch horses (rescued & lovingly cared for)‚ú® Natural boho design with wood, stone & linen ‚Äì stylish and healthyüõè Cozy bedroom with king-size bed in boho styleüöø Bathroom with natural stone & wood ‚Äì elegant, charming & close to natureü™û Open-plan living and dining area with kitchenetteJust 900 meters from Kedungu Beach, famous for sunsets and surfing. The iconic Tanah Lot temple is a short walk through rice fields, and Canggu is about 20 minutes away ‚Äì the perfect balance between tranquility and vibrant life.By staying here, you support Salty Cowboy ‚Äì a heartfelt project rescuing former workhorses and giving them a new life. You can also book unforgettable experiences: horseback rides along the beach, through rice fields, or horsemanship lessons at the ranch. If you‚Äôd like to ride, please note that horseback sessions are not included in the villa stay and must be booked separately with Salty Cowboy Stable in advance, as spots are limited. (The stable is closed on saturday afternoons and sunday's)Silver Creek is more than accommodation ‚Äì it‚Äôs a retreat for those seeking peace, nature, and an authentic Bali experience.Guest accessüîë You‚Äôll have exclusive use of the entire villa, including a private pool, tropical garden, two terraces, kitchen with essentials, and a naturally designed open-air bathroom. Relax in complete privacy, surrounded by nature and views of the horse paddocks ‚Äì perfect for peaceful moments and refreshing swims.Other things to noteüêé Riding ‚Äì and Doing GoodWith your booking, you support Salty Cowboy ‚Äì a project that rescues former working horses and gives them a dignified life.The stable next door offers guided horseback rides:üåæ through rice fieldsüåä along the beachüå¥ past temples & small villagesSuitable for beginners, children & experienced riders.üëâ Please make a reservation in advance, as our popular rides are often fully booked early.üìç Location & SurroundingsKedungu ‚Äì peaceful village, 5 minutes to the beach.Canggu ‚Äì 20 minutes away.A picturesque path through the rice fields takes about 35 minutes on foot to the Tanah Lot Temple.Nearby: warungs, restaurants, caf√©s, hidden paths, spectacular sunsets.Bali is growing, and like many places on the island, there is some construction nearby. We‚Äôve kindly asked the workers to start after 9 AM and finish by 5 PM, so your mornings and evenings remain peaceful. üíõ Why Silver Creek is specialBright, airy & surrounded by nature.Perfect balance of comfort & simplicity.Your booking makes a difference.‚úÖ Ready to slow down and enjoy peace, horses & sunsets?‚Ä¶ then Silver Creek is your place.Please note: When it rains or the paddock is wet, the horses cannot go inside for safety reasons, as they might slip and fall, and to protect the grass.

title: Lotus Guesthouse  - Room 3 Legong Zimmer
description: Villa Lotus room 1 offer a comfortable double bed with mosquito net and fan. The large modern bathroom has hot and cold water which is rare to find in this area.From the terrace in front of your room you can see the river, coconut palms and banana trees, picturesque rice fields and the mountains close by.This exotic view invites you to relax. It's only a 15 minute drive to Sekumpul waterfall.The spaceVilla Lotus room 1 offer a comfortable double bed with mosquito net and fan. The large modern bathroom has hot and cold water which is rare to find in this area.From the terrace in front of your room you can see the river, coconut palms and banana trees, picturesque rice fields and the mountains close by.This exotic view invites you to relax. It's only a 15 minute drive to Sekumpul waterfall.Guest accessOur guests have access to our pool terrace that offers stunning views of the surrounding rice fields and mountains.Enjoy the views and indulge in home-cooked balinese, European and vegetarian dishes.Other things to noteIf you want, you can do trekking with Balinese guides. We can provide transport to all important places in Bali.

title: Design Apartment - 50m to Pigstone Beach - Pool
description: Pigstone Atelier Apartments are two elegant design apartments in the garden of a modern artist‚Äôs villa ‚Äî just 50 meters from Pigstone Beach, Bali.Each apartment features a bedroom, a private rooftop terrace with ocean view, a fully equipped kitchen, a private garden, and access to the shared pool.You‚Äôll be living next door to a German artist couple who create and live here with their two huge dogs ‚Äî guests are invited to paint or silk-printing in the on-site atelier or have a beer together.The spaceConcrete meets light, plants, and sea breeze.The Pigstone Apartments form part of Pigstone Atelier by Grisbelle ‚Äî a home where architecture, art, and nature merge effortlessly.Each apartment is designed as a private retreat:King-size bedroom with floor-to-ceiling garden view windowsHand-poured concrete bathroom with rain shower and teak detailsOpen kitchen with gas stove, designer ceramics, and local tablewareRooftop terrace with ocean viewAccess to the shared pool with jacuzzi and the artist‚Äôs atelierOur superfast Starlink-Wifi will make your work easy.This isn‚Äôt a hotel ‚Äî it‚Äôs a lived-in creative space.You share the property with the artist hosts and their two lovely dogs. Some days you might smell fresh paint, hear music drifting from the studio, or see new works being printed.If you value authentic luxury with character, this is your place.Not a resort. Not a retreat. A home where life lives real.üí° What makes this home specialOnly 50 m from the beach ‚Äî ocean breeze, no trafficArchitecture between brutalist and sensualPart of a working artist‚Äôs homeOptional art sessions (silk-screen, painting, textile)Boutique interior curated by Grisbelle ‚Äì Canvas + ConcreteGuest accessGuests stay in their own self-contained apartment on the front side of our property, just steps from the ocean.Each apartment has:a private entrance from the shared garden,a private rooftop terrace with sea view,a private kitchen, living area, and bathroom,and direct access to the pool area of the main villa.The property layout is open but carefully designed: two apartments in front, our main villa at the back, all surrounded by palms, green walls, and open sky.You‚Äôll feel privacy and space ‚Äî but you‚Äôll also feel that this is a lived place, not a resort.We (your hosts) live and work here in the main villa, where our art studio and our two large, gentle dogs are also part of the daily rhythm.You may hear us printing in the atelier, walking through the garden with the dogs, or setting up a canvas outside.Guests are always welcome to visit the studio, talk about art, or join a screen-printing session if you wish. We‚Äôre nearby if you need anything ‚Äî but we‚Äôll always respect your privacy.Most guests describe the experience as ‚Äúhaving their own private home inside an artist‚Äôs compound by the sea"Other things to noteThis is not a resort ‚Äî it‚Äôs a living, breathing home.We share the property with our two large, gentle dogs who roam freely around the garden and pool.They are calm, affectionate, and part of the family ‚Äî but if you‚Äôre uncomfortable with dogs, this might not be the right stay for you.Because this is an artist‚Äôs compound, you may occasionally hear the sounds of life: the soft hum of a print dryer, music drifting from the atelier, the ocean just beyond the trees.It‚Äôs part of the rhythm here ‚Äî creative, organic, alive.Your apartment is completely private, with its own kitchen, garden, and rooftop terrace.The pool area is shared between the two guest apartments and our main villa.We keep the space clean, elegant, and relaxed ‚Äî barefoot luxury with texture and soul.It‚Äôs for guests who value design, authenticity, and a genuine sense of place more than perfection or predictability.If that sounds like you, you‚Äôll love it here.

title: 3 Bdr - The Dream Cliffside Bamboo Villa By Avana
description: Reconnect with nature at this unforgettable escape. The Avana Long Villa is a 3 bed & 3 bathroom masterpiece bamboo villa located near Sidemen. Sitting on a cliffside, The Long Villa boasts uninterrupted views of Bali's tropical, lush landscape from every room. Adding to that a sizeable private cliffside infinity swimming pool overlooking the entire valley.Mount Agung Volcano to your left, an expansive rice terrace and mountain range in front, and the Indian Ocean to the right.The spaceThe architecture: A truly unique one of a kind Luxury Bamboo Villa The Avana Dream Villa is a three-story bamboo masterpiece. Designed and built by a world-renowned Bamboo Architect a skilled team of Bamboo craftsmen. It features many design elements that are rare to find anywhere else. The Dream villa uses the natural sloped contour of the land to offer amazing views from every room. Every room has a full view due to the thoughtfulness of the villa design. Throughout the villa, you will notice the natural curvature and the lack of right angles to stay true to the natural concept of the structure. Almost all elements you see in the villa have been developed specifically by our bamboo architect for Avana Villas and are implemented by various handmade methods without machinery. Painstaking details and creativity have been put into every element of this structure to form a unique experience for our guests.  The space:The Dream villa is a 3 bedroom 3 bathroom villa, all the bedrooms are enclosed to offer maximum comfort, the rooms are air-conditioned and have a large balcony overlooking the view with a large bathtub on the balcony.You will also have access to three lounge areas, a sunken couch area on the top level, a sunbathing platform on the middle level, and a large living room with a kitchen and sunbathing area connected to the large infinity pool overlooking the volcano and the rice terraces.Our infinity pool is directly on the edge of the cliff offering uninterrupted views of the surrounding nature. It also has a circular bench for you to relax while in the pool.Guest accessYou have access to the entire villa and it's all yours, so make yourself comfortable.Other things to noteThe service:We have a full team of 15 staff members that will be there to ensure a great experience. Everything from chefs, drivers, butlers, night security, etc. to tend to your every need. Breakfast for up to 6 people is included and for lunch and dinner, you can feel free to order from our menu.Bugs and insects:The bamboo retreat is located in the middle of nature and you will have visits from "nature's residents" (insects, bugs, frogs, lizards, etc.) While we keep everything very clean, bugs and insects are normal and part of the experience and cannot be avoided as the house is designed very openly. If you are sensitive to this, this place is not suitable for you. We recommend you turn off all the lights at night to not attract them. Wifi: Although this is a place to escape and reconnect with nature, there is nothing wrong with watching a Netflix show before bed. So we will have free Wi-Fi in the villa to use whenever you need it. Experiences: There are a ton of activities within close proximity of Avana Villas. Whether you want to arrange your own or use our driver and tour guide we can help you design the perfect experience for you while staying with us. Experiences we can arrange for you:In Villa Experiences:- Family-style in Villa BBQ with our Chef- Floating Breakfast- Guided Yoga sessions on your private platform- In Villa Massage and spa treatments- Primitive Traditional Bamboo Cooking over a bonfire with our Chef Tours:Waterfall Chasing Tour Sideman Rice Terrace tourThe water Temple (Tirta Ganga)A coffee farm tour and tastingSilver Smith experience where you can make your own jewelryAdventure: Mt Batur Volcano Sunrise Hike Mt Batur Volcano Sunrise 4*4 Jeep experienceWhite Water Rafting in the Ayung River Waterfall chasing Tour ATV jungle riding experience Scuba Diving

title: Dreamy Cliffside Bamboo Villa with Pool and View
description: Experiencing Avana Curve Bamboo Villa is creating memories to last a lifetime. Overlooking Bali's best landscapes, The Curve Villa welcomes you with mesmerizing views. Perched along a high cliff, The Curve Villa boasts views of Mount Agung Volcano to the left and the Indian Ocean to the right. Situated below the villa is a gorgeous, expansive rice terrace valley with the Ayung river flowing through it. All of Bali‚Äôs landscapes are summarized in this one open view from the Curve Villa.The space(NOTE: want to stay with a group? Check out our 3 bedroom Bamboo Villa by clicking on our logo and navigating to our profile)This two-story bamboo masterpiece mimics the curvature of nature's evolution. The Avana Curve Villa is a unique bamboo villa that stays true to its name, standing without right angles.Every element of the Curve Villa has been creatively curated with attention to detail, bringing you your best Bali experience yet. Nearly every aspect of Avana's Curve Villa is handcrafted, harnessing the wilderness for your Bali stay. Our expert bamboo architect has created Bali's ultimate modern bamboo villa, and we are excited to share it with you!Guest accessYou are the only guests at The Curve Villa during your stay. The entire villa is accessible, as is our Avana Villas support team. Please make yourself at home. We are here and happy to help make your stay more enjoyable.Avana also has a common firepit area that is shared between three villas. We will have bonfires and BBQs in that area and traditional cooking experiences using bamboo for cooking the food in, the traditional way.Other things to noteWi-Fi:We encourage you to reconnect with nature during your stay. However, we can all appreciate watching an episode or two of the office before bed. Free Wi-Fi is available in the villa for your convenience.Our Services:Breakfast for two is complimentary during your stay at Curve Villa. The Avana Bamboo Villas boast an entire team to ensure you have the best experience. Drivers, butlers, night security, and tour guides are all available for you to live your dream Bali getaway. Our chef also offers a lunch and dinner menu, allowing you to relax all day, worry-free.We also offer special honeymoon and romantic arrangements, adventure and zen experiences as well as vacation planning for our guests. Additionally, we offer many in-house experiences such as guided yoga sessions, private in-villa massage, private photoshoots, and much more. We can communicate those services to you in more detail upon booking.Bugs and insects:The Curve Villa is surrounded by nature, with an open design. From time to time, nature's residents (insects, bugs, frogs, lizards, etc.) may visit you at the villa. We keep everything clean, however, avoiding nature's residents during your stay cannot be avoided. Not leaving any leftover food and turning all the lights off at night will help deter them. If you are sensitive to this normal part of the experience here, we recommend you find more suitable lodging during your time in Bali.Bali Experiences One Hour or Less from The Curve Villa:‚óè A Private Massage at The Curve Villa‚óè Bathtub Flower Arrangements‚óè Private Photoshoot Session‚óè Private Yoga Lesson at The Curve Villa‚óè Sideman Rice Terrace Tour‚óè The Water Temple (Tirta Ganga)‚óè Gates of Heaven (Pura Penataran Agung Lempuyang Temple)‚óè Primitive Traditional Bamboo Cooking Over a Bonfire with our Chef‚óè A Coffee Farm Tour and Tasting‚óè Jewelry Making with a Silver SmithBali Adventure Experiences Near The Curve Villa:‚óè ATV Jungle Ride Experience‚óè Mt Batur Volcano Sunrise Hike‚óè Mt Batur Volcano Sunrise 4*4 Jeep Tour‚óè White Water Rafting in the Ayung River‚óè Waterfall Chasing Tour‚óè Scuba DivingIf you are curious to try any of those experiences please let us know!

title: Sanding Bamboo Villa - An Idyllic Jungle Retreat
description: Escape to Sanding Bamboo Villa, a breathtaking bamboo hideaway surrounded by lush jungle and authentic Balinese village life. Just 20 minutes from the vibrant heart of Ubud, this tranquil hideaway lets you experience the real Bali‚Äîaway from mass tourism and traffic, yet close enough to explore the island‚Äôs cultural hub.The spaceThe LocationüåøWe are located near Desa Sanding, a small traditional Balinese village north of Ubud - my family and I live in the village. The house is a little off the beaten track, and the villa was designed to blend into nature, with the roof designed to look like a banana leaf! üè° The Space1 Private Double Room | King-size bed | Full bathroom üåøInfinity Pool | Small but scenic, perfect for a refreshing dip üåäHammock Overlooking the Jungle Canopy | Relax to the sounds of nature ü¶úüå¥  Fresh coconutü•• Cool off with a refreshing coconut straight from the tree!Open-Air Kitchen & Dining Area | Enjoy meals in a peaceful setting üçΩGood Wi-Fi | Stay connected & work remotely  üì∂üåü Balinese Hospitality ‚Äì Our Family Welcomes You!At Sanding Bamboo Villa, you‚Äôll be looked after by my whole family. We are here to make sure you have a truly unforgettable stay, whether that means:‚úî Arranging authentic Balinese experiences (temple visits, cooking classes, traditional ceremonies)‚úî Helping you discover hidden gems beyond the usual tourist spots‚úî Organizing transport, airport pickup/drop off, tours, massages, or yoga sessions‚úî Sharing local tips on the best places to eat, shop, and explore!üåè Location & Nearby AttractionsExperience authentic Balinese village life just outside your doorstep while still being a short drive from:Tegallalang Rice Terraces üåæ (25 min)Ubud Art Market & Caf√©s ‚òï (20 min)Ubud Monkey Forest üêí (25 min)Tirta Empul Water Temple üíß (30 min)Campuhan Ridge Walk üåÑ (25 min)‚ú® Guest Services‚úÖ Regular Housekeeping Included‚úÖ Airport Transfers & Private Driver Available üöó‚úÖ Scooter & Bike Rentals for Exploring üö≤‚úÖ Included Breakfast (and other meals on request and at additional cost)  üçΩüìå Important InfoCheck-in: 2 PM | Check-out: 11 AMMinimum Stay:  2 NightsNo Smoking üö≠ | No Pets üêæ | Eco-Friendly Retreat üåøThe villa is not directly accessible by car - the road is 50m away and we can assist with getting your luggage to the house. The space may not be suitable for small children - there are some steep drops by the pool and from the hammock. The house is immersed in nature - wildlife can visit, so if the occasional insect is not your thing, this may not be for you!  With our mosquito nets and team always on hand to support, you can relax and enjoy the views! We are in a rural area - food can be delivered, or ordered from the family, but if you would prefer to cook we recommend bringing what you need with you. üåø Book your stay at Sanding Bamboo Villa & let our family help you experience the best of Bali! ü••‚ú®Guest accessThe whole house and garden is for your private use. Enjoy exploring the the rice terraces on your doorstep for amazing photos, ask Wayan to show you the river in the valley below (ice cold for a swim), or explore local walks and hidden local food options.Other things to noteThe house is open to nature - this can mean that moths, geckos, and frogs can make an appearance from time to time. The noise of the wildlife can also sometimes be louder than what some guests are used to. Wayan and family are always on hand to help remove unwanted creatures, but please remember that this house is designed to bring you closer to nature, not to block it out, so please be aware of this when booking.

title: Art & Nature _ Ganesha Guesthouse - room 1.
description: Stay at Ganesha Guesthouse Bali  in peaceful Pakudui, just 25 minutes from Ubud. Each room has a private jungle view where you can relax to the soothing sounds of birds and the river. All rooms are uniquely decorated with art to create a calm, inspiring atmosphere. The guesthouse is located above our family-run wood carving gallery and museum, passed down through four generations. Enjoy breakfast with a view and explore Bali‚Äôs temples, rice fields, and nearby waterfalls.

title: The Beach House, and Balian Beach
description: Bali‚Äôs best kept secret is its secluded West coast where you will find Balian Beach. Nestled between volcanic cliffs, the beautiful black sand beach and crashing waves provide the perfect escape.The spaceThe Beach House offers a spacious master bedroom and open living area only steps away from the beach with views of the main surf break. The Beach House has a fully equipped kitchen, WiFi, and large sun deck all overlooking your own beach-side swimming pool. The nightly rate includes daily maid service, drinking water, and a fully catered breakfast. The breakfast menu consists of fresh farm eggs, homemade sourdough bread, granola, yogurt, and tropical fruit platter. Dinners can be arranged upon request for 300,000 IR per person. Alternatively, you can find a variety of western and Indonesian restaurants a short 5-minute walk down the beach. During the wet season (Dec-Mar) this can require a brief swim, so alternatively we have scooters, available for rent or a car and driver can be arranged, for the short trip to the restaurants.Private in-villa massages and spa treatments can also be arranged during your stay for 200,000 to 250,000 IR.Balian Beach is approximately a 2-3 hour drive from Bali's International Airport.  We highly recommend you let us arrange your airport pick-up/drop-off as we have reliable English-speaking drivers who know the location of the villa.  The cost is 700,000 IDR.We are happy to help you plan day trips to other local attractions and activities in Bali.  These include snorkeling in West Bali's marine park at Menjangan Island, sunset visit to Bali's famous Tanah Lot water temple, mountain drives through UNESCO-listed rice terraces and volcanic lakes or day trips to Ubud and Kuta for the shopaholics.The Beach House is the perfect location to just relax and unwind.  Let our friendly staff spoil you while you take in the amazing views.  You can be sure to enjoy the tropical holiday you deserve.Guest accessGuests will enjoy total privacy during their stay at The Beach House. They have exclusive use of all facilities including beach side pool, lounge, kitchen and surrounding garden area.Other things to noteThe Beach House is located in a more remote and rural setting way from most busy tourist attractions. It is most suited to travellers looking to relax away from the hustle and bustle of the busier tourist areas of Bali.

title: Oc√©a Amed - beachfront private villa
description: Stylish, comfortable and fully-equipped holiday home with spacious living room and three bedrooms and bathrooms, an infinity pool, uninterrupted sea view (with Lombok and the Gilis on the horizon), and direct beach access.It‚Äôs a quiet place surrounded by beautiful gardens, with mountains in the back, and sea / beach in the front.Several restaurants with local and international cuisine as well as a spa are just a few steps from the property.The spaceThe house consists of a spacious living room and a fully equipped kitchen with dining table for 6 people (50 m2), two bedrooms (20 m2 each), each with a super king size bed (200 x 200 cm), spacious built-in wardrobe (also to put suitcases), a desk, a smart TV, fan and aircon, and adjacent open air bathrooms (10 m2 each), and downstairs a bedroom with bathroom (around 25 m2 in total) with king size bed (180 x 200 cm), a wardrobe, fan and aircon. The infinity pool is 8 x 3.5 m and there is a terrace (3 x 5 m) with open air shower. The house is built sustainably using natural stone, carbon-negative concrete, reclaimed ironwood (ulin), rattan, and cogon grass (alang-alang). Together with its thoughtfully curated, custom-made furnishings, it offers a perfect blend of traditional Balinese and modern design.A slightly larger version of this house can be booked here (subject to availability): https://www.airbnb.com/l/nGGByYztGuest accessThe entire house is available for guests.Other things to noteBreakfast, lunch and dinner can be delivered from one of the nearby restaurants to the house (additional charge).A few hundred meters from the Japanese shipwreck, one of Amed‚Äôs main snorkeling / diving spots. Amazing corals can also be found right in front of the house, directly reachable from the property and beach in front. Indeed, the coral reef fauna of the Lombok Strait, being one of the main passages for the Indonesian Throughflow (ITF) that exchanges water between the Indian Ocean and the Pacific Ocean and part of the Wallace Line, is one of the most diverse and richest in the world.Waking up to see the sun rise from behind Mount Rinjani, Lombok, and traditional fishing boats (jukung) with their colorful sails leave the shore (and in between, 20 kilometers down, large "post Malaccamax" ships cross the Lombok Strait to benefit from the >250 meter deep sea) is one of the experiences that will make your stay at Oc√©a Amed unforgettable.Note: Depending on the season and tides, there is sometimes a limited beach in front. Please contact us for up-to-date information.Less suitable for young children (infinity pool) and the elderly (steep stairs).

title: SUKHA Container Cabin
description: Welcome to SUKHA Container Cabin, Sidemen‚Äôs first micro container stay, rooted in intentional living, permaculture, and intrinsic happiness. Thoughtfully designed from a preloved container, SUKHA offers all essentials: a spacious king-size bed, indoor bathroom, all-set kitchen, skylight windows, edible garden, balcony, firepit, and outdoor bathtub. A harmonious living masterpiece crafted to evoke peace, comfort, and tranquility.---------------------------------------------------------The spaceNestled on 600m¬≤ of private land, SUKHA is a micro container cabin (7.5 x 2.5m) surrounded by lush greenery and mountain views.Inside, simplicity meets comfort:‚Ä¢  A spacious king-size bed for deep rest‚Ä¢  A comfortable indoor bathroom‚Ä¢  A fully equipped all-set kitchen for nourishing meals‚Ä¢  Skylight windows for natural light and stargazingStep outside to:‚Ä¢  A private balcony overlooking the garden and mountains‚Ä¢  A firepit for slow evenings under the stars‚Ä¢  An outdoor bathtub where nature and comfort flow together‚Ä¢  The permaculture garden grows fresh herbs and vegetables for your meals and is surrounded by pathways to explore. ---------------------------------------------------------FREE Complimentary:‚Ä¢  Bread basket breakfast (multigrain bread, strawberry jam, gluten-free cookies, and Fitbar)‚Ä¢  Fresh fruit bowl‚Ä¢  Infused water or coconut water; for stays of 2+ nights (1 night stays include infused water only)‚Ä¢  With Love from the Cabin (birthday or anniversary)These are one-time welcome treats to make your arrival more special. For longer stays, the cabin‚Äôs fully equipped kitchen and edible garden are yours to enjoy ‚Äî perfect for preparing nourishing meals at your own pace.---------------------------------------------------------We also provide art supplies & games, mindfulness tools (yoga mat, guest diary), and inspirational books. A little gestures to spark joy, creativity, and comfort.P.S. SUKHA is pet-friendly üêæ because they deserve a getaway too :).---------------------------------------------------------NOTE:There is occasional construction nearby which may sometimes create noise. Based on guest experiences, it‚Äôs usually short and not continuous. Most find it doesn‚Äôt disturb their stay. To keep the atmosphere cozy, we provide a speaker and vinyl player so you can enjoy music or create your own relaxing soundscape if needed üôèüèΩüçÄ---------------------------------------------------------Guest accessGuests have exclusive access to the entire 600m¬≤ private property, including the 7.5x2.5m SUKHA Container Cabin, spacious indoor bathroom, fully equipped kitchen, and cozy king-size bed. Step outside to enjoy your private balcony, firepit, outdoor bathtub, and the edible garden designed with permaculture principles. Every corner of SUKHA is yours to experience, a space to rest, cook, gather, and reconnect with nature at your own pace.---------------------------------------------------------Other things to noteThoughtful Extras* (available by request): ‚Ä¢  In-house picnic: Enjoy a cozy in-house picnic experience at SUKHA Container Cabin, thoughtfully curated for slow, meaningful moments in nature. Your picnic set includes multigrain bread, healthy crackers, a cheese platter with cheese jam, fresh seasonal fruits, and a non-alcoholic grape bottle. 400K per pax (2 person). ‚Ä¢  Barbecue set: Grill on the balcony or gather by the firepit with a ready-to-enjoy set of quality ingredients and a simple round griller. Vegetarian (100K/pax) and non-vegetarian (125K/pax). Enjoy 20% off for stays of 2 nights or more. ‚Ä¢  Food supply by order: Elevate meals with Bali‚Äôs organic shops ‚Äî fruits, bread, jams, plant-based milk, meats, cheeses, sweets, and vegetables beyond our garden, delivered to your door. 100K delivery fee.*Please order at least 2 days before your stay.---------------------------------------------------------Activities:Sidemen is alive with experiences. You can: ‚Ä¢  Explore nearby waterfalls. ‚Ä¢  Take a morning or late afternoon trek. ‚Ä¢  Try silver jewelry making. ‚Ä¢  Discover local caf√©s and restaurants (all within 15 minutes).We‚Äôve also curated two special Google Maps lists with our favorite spots ‚Äî shared once your booking is confirmed.---------------------------------------------------------Transportation:‚Ä¢  Best option: Motorbike ‚Äî easiest for exploring the area.‚Ä¢  Parking available for 1 car. Park in front of the wooden signage. ‚Ä¢  Online food delivery services (Gojek/Grab) reach us with limited option, but ride-hailing apps (Gojek/Grab) don‚Äôt cover pickups here.‚Ä¢  We can connect you with drivers or car rentals with driver included with prior notice (at least 2 days before stay). We cannot accept last-minute requests.---------------------------------------------------------Essentials Nearby:‚Ä¢  ATM: 15 minutes away in Klungkung city center.‚Ä¢  Hospital: nearest hospital is 10 minutes away.---------------------------------------------------------Follow our journey on IG: thesukha(dot)id

title: Huge Canggu Lux Villa Walk 2 Beach & Entertainment
description: Expansive Luxury Oasis in the centre of Pererenan Canggu's restaurant, beach, fitness, shopping, lifestyle and entertainment scene. Huge 900sqm Villa with nice pool.
