We also have a cot on request.The garden is very large and surrounds the property. The pool is located in the relaxation zone between the two buildings. Our pool gets sun all day!We have 2 massage tables and some excellent recommendations for therapists to come in and pamper you. We also have optons for an Indonesian feast.The staff can organise dinner and lunches for you, many options from delivery from the fantastic selection of local cafes and restaurants OR have them cook an amazing meal for you. title: Panoramic Clifftop Luxury 6 Bedroom Villa, Uluwatu
description: PLEASE CHECK WITH US FOR AVAILABILITY BEFORE MAKING A BOOKING REQUESTThe villas don't have up-to-date calendars and we are required to check with the owner for last-minute availability.* subject to 21% tax, collected separately upon check in.> Please state in your inquiry if you'd require airport transfers.The spaceDesigned by a decorator who fell in love with Bali, It is like a living gallery with its statues, its works of art coming from all over Asia and its water features. Spread on 3000 square meters of land, it offers many places to relax on terraces overlooking the sea or under shady pavilions. And the magic goes on through the night when the villa lights up and the stars are reflected on the large ponds around the villa.THE BEDROOMSThe Villa offers five en suite bedrooms in the villa itself and an independent garden apartment suite. They exhibit a collection of Batik and Songkat panels on the wall and various antiques to give each of them a particular atmosphere. They are completed by a vast dressing and a double basin bathroom.TWO MASTER BEDROOMS ( on the top floor )Located on the front of the villa, they offer a scenic view on the ocean to any guest laying down on the four-poster king-size bed. They are completed by a bright inside bathroom. Adjoining is a terrace, to be lulled by the sound of the surf against the cliff.TWO PRINCIPAL BEDROOMS( on the top floor )Standing back in the villa, these bedrooms offer, one a king-size bed, the other one two single beds. Both have the view on the sea from their own terrace, where stands a built in terrazzo tub to enjoy a romantic bathing experience.ONE BEDROOM( on ground floor )This large and bright suite is surrounded by bay windows overlooking the garden and the pool, with a panoramic view on the sea. It offers a king-size bed and a fully inside bathroom.THE INSIDE LIVING SPACEThe central staircase, after crossing a pond ornamented with water flowers fountains, leads to a vast living and dining room overlooking the pool and the ocean. Under a timber roof of gigantic proportion, a comfortable lounge corner is facing a wooden diner table accommodating easily the 12 guests. The lights effects at the end of the day, notably the impressive chandelier hanging from the ceiling, gives the villa a permanent party atmosphere.Surrounding the living are on one side the media room, fully equipped with a flat screen TV, and on the other side, a floating glass bar to enjoy the cocktail menu served by the staff .THE OUTSIDE LIVING SPACEGuests can enjoy two different worlds. The breeze and the view of the ocean at the lower level. The quietness of the tropical garden at the upper level.Ocean ViewThe immense pool (21m X 10m) offers a large low deep pool on the front border to lay down and sunbath in the freshness of the water. All around stand pool lounges and a typical bale to gaze at the sea under the shadow. On the edge of the cliff stand a wooden deck to enjoy the most dramatic view on the ballet of waves against the coral reef. Probably the best place to savor a drink at dusk and admire the magic of a Balinese sunset.Set back from the cliff, This Villa offers the comfort of a shady terrace to lay on a rest bed or have casual meals around a table.Garden ViewEncrusted in a lush garden stand two pavilions, sheltered from the wind and the brightness of the sea. One pavilion is devoted to the BBQ meals served by the staff with the fresh seafood and vegetables just bought from the market. Adjacent stand a veranda lounge for a drink or a quiet reading.with two massage tables, a shower and a large lava stone tub for treatment bath. Opened on the garden, but well protected by tropical plants for privacy, the place provides a rare sense of well being.Inclusion :‚Ä¢ Chilled towel and welcome drink upon arrival‚Ä¢ Welcome package upon arrival‚Ä¢ Daily American Semi-Buffet Breakfast for 2 (two) persons per room‚Ä¢ Fixed price menu a la carte for lunch and dinner‚Ä¢ Daily car (8 hours) within the local area and with English speaking driver‚Ä¢ Laundry (non dry cleaning)‚Ä¢ Free use of Sinaran Surga facilities : Gym, Tennis Court, and Beach accessAll of our villas come with the services of our guest relations manager who will be able to assist with massages/spa treatments, tours and travel, car or scooter hire and all general advice and information needed to ensure your vacation is a memorable experience.Please state in your inquiry if you'd require airport transfers. There's a transfer fee of IDR 250K one way for one car, to fit 4 people and luggage (surcharge of IDR 50K if the transfer is between 10pm - 7am). Fee payable to driver directly.All our prices are in US Dollars.Payments can be made in any currency to the equivalent of US Dollars.* We are required by local regulations to charge occupancy tax. Villa rate is subject to 21% government taxes and services charge, not included in the price of the reservation and have to be paid directly upon check-in.

title: Unique Beachfront House *Serenity*Luxury*8BR*Chef*
description: Step into a world where the ocean meets a stretch of black sand, where the waves sing softly against a horizon that seems to reach forever. Konaditya House stands here, a sanctuary crafted for those seeking both luxury & solitude. Awake to the symphony of waves, unwind in sunlit rooms that open to the vast sea, and feel the gentle pull of nature from every corner. This is a place of boundless calm andrefined beauty, a beachfront haven that offers space, privacy, and an experience like no other.The spaceKONADITYA HOUSENestled on the southwest coast of Bali, and set amongst a hectare of award-winning landscaped grounds, this exclusive beachfront estate offers an unparalleled blend of luxury, privacy, and Balinese hospitality. Fall asleep to the sounds of rolling waves and wake to panoramic ocean view sunrises. Konaditya House offers six beautifully appointed sleeping areas and a 2 bedroom cottage . Two private suites flank the pool, commanding unobstructed views of the ocean and lawn, while four additional en suite bedrooms - each with private garden - encircle the 300sqm lotus pond and internal courtyard. All six bedrooms are immaculately appointed with marble finishing, deep luxurious baths, and 300 count thread bed linens. The cozy cottage with ensuite bathroom has its own private garden and entrance. CULINARY EXPERIENCE Our dedicated head chef leads a culinary team who craft bespoke gourmet meals throughout the day, from Japanese bento and Mediterranean classics to wood fired pizza direct from our custom built stone oven and local Balinese dishes. When in season fresh daily produce is handpicked by the team from our homegrown organic garden. OUR TEAMOur discreet hospitality team ensures your privacy and comfort. With meticulous attention to detail and a commitment to exceptional service, your stay promises to be a seamless and unforgettable experience. THE GARDENSOn the west side of the estate, our infinity pool merges seamlessly with the lush lawn, cantilevering out towards the ocean and offering breathtaking ocean views. On the east side, a tranquil courtyard adorned with lotus blossoms and frangipani trees provides a serene contrast. FACILITIES Konaditya House offers multiple spaces to suit every mood‚Äîfrom the sunset bale and pond-side bale to the cozy library and elegant pool house. The architecturally designed layout ensures every area retains an intimate and welcoming atmosphere, despite the abundance of space. Whether you‚Äôre enjoying a game of basketball, tennis, ping pong, billiard, a workout in the fully-equipped gym, or a lesson with one of Bali‚Äôs top surf instructors, the estate caters to every interest. For those seeking serenity, in-house yoga, pilates or meditation sessions, as well as alternative therapies, are available to soothe both body and mind. Full list of facilities:1 Hectare Beachfront Exclusive Property2,000 sqm Indoor living spacesInfinity swimming pool of 25x5.5m (child area: 2.5x5.5m)6 double bedrooms all with ensuite bathrooms, AC, Safety BoxWalkie Talkies provided for guests easy living around the estateWifi, Smart TV, Bluetooth Speakers in all main areasLarge kitchen with wood fire pizza ovenSunset BaleBasket ball hoop & ball Tennis court (rackets and tennis balls available)Gym & yoga with private changing room and showersPing pong tableBilliard tableCo working space Outdoor massage bale SeasideCulinary gardenPrivate parkingBEYOND THE ESTATEVenture beyond the estate, and you‚Äôll find yourself within easy reach of Bali‚Äôs cultural treasures, from the rice fields of Tabanan to the artistic heart of Ubud. Some of the island‚Äôs most fashionable beach clubs and restaurants are just a beach stroll away, while the vibrant energy of Canggu and Seminyak is only a short drive. Whether you seek adventure or tranquility, Konaditya House offers the perfect balance of luxury, privacy, and curated experiences.Guest accessComplimentary airport pick up.Other things to note*SERVICES*-Konaditya House is a fully serviced house:  Our villa manager will assist you with anything you may need. title: The River House
description: Your home in Perenenan. The Riverhouse is a sophisticated villa, 5 bedrooms and 7 bathrooms, 25m swimming pool and grand living areas that offer direct views of Bali's rice fields. Complete with all the essentials guests will enjoy exclusive use of the villa, daily breakfast and coffee prepared to order, personal chef for lunch and dinner service, and an on-site bartender. Your villa manager will be available to assist you to arrange airport transfers, car hire and in-villa massage services.The spacePLEASE NOTE:A construction project next door will continue throughout 2025, with work scheduled strictly between 8:00 a.m. and 6:00 p.m., Monday through Saturday. During this time, we are expecting a significant level of noise disruption. For this reason, we‚Äôve adjusted our rates with a 30% discount, allowing you to enjoy an incredible stay at an even better value. Feel free to reach out if you have any questions‚Äîwe‚Äôre happy to help!The owners built this remarkable villa as their personal Bali residence, completing the project in 2019. It was designed to be as comfortable as any residential home in the world, with thoughtful decorations throughout and now you are welcome to experience it for yourself. Conceptualised by renowned Bali based architect Alexis Dornier, the River House was built with locally sourced sandstone and reclaimed timber. In addition, the wooden latticework on the exterior, paired with multiple semi-outdoor spaces, provide different perspectives and viewpoints as you enjoy all the villa has to offer.The interior design by Somewhere Concepts works to bring you through the grand entrance into an inviting space that blends Bali‚Äôs topical outdoors with comfortable finishings. Expect to be flawed by the double-height ceilings, expansive alfresco dining area and poolside tropical gardens. Contemporary minimalism is effortlessly seen throughout the River House. Here you will see the vertical 25m swimming pool, perfectly surrounded by lush greenery to offer shade from the afternoon sun. Experience a new way of living with views of the generous landscaped gardens thoughtfully prepared by the Bali Landscape Company featuring coconut trees, rice fields and river access. YOUR VILLA Capacity: 10 guests in 5 bedrooms with the option to accommodate 12 guests with additional bedding (charges may apply)Master Bedroom (bedroom 1): features large ensuite, outdoor bathtub, balcony access, walk-in closet, 1 x king bed Junior Master Bedroom (bedroom 2): features large ensuite, balcony access, walk-in closet, 1 x king bedBedroom 3: features own ensuite, balcony access, walk-in closet, 1 x king bed (or 2 x single beds)Bedroom 4: features own ensuite, balcony access, walk-in closet, 1 x king bed (or 2 x single beds)Bedroom 5: features own ensuite, balcony access, walk-in closet, 1 x king bed (or 2 x single beds)Bathrooms: 7 bathrooms (5 ensuites and 2 additional powder rooms located on the entry level and the ground floor)Entertainment: Indoor and outdoor open plan dining areas, double height indoor living area, surround sound indoor and outdoor speakers, media room, massage roomCommunication: Your booking includes free access to our high-speed Internet; 200 mbps WiFi is available throughout the villaPool: 25m private outdoor swimming poolINCLUSIONSLinen (sheets, towels, blankets, pillows)Housekeeping service, daily cleaning and daily breakfast with barista style coffeePersonal villa manager from 0900 - 17:00 Full access to the villa, private pool, and private tropical gardensBOOKING CONDITIONSCheck in is not available on major public holidays. Arrival is from 2:00 pm daily and departure time is at 11:00 am daily. GUEST REVIEWSWe love the use of local materials alongside fine imported furnishings, from the sun-soaked pool deck and stone walls, to the custom-made furniture, Belgian tableware and fine French linen sheets. THE HONEYCOMBERS BALI ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖThere are very few times in a person‚Äôs life that you get to step inside a house that will become a testament to architecture, a celebrated building, and truly a work of art. I can‚Äôt predict the future, but I‚Äôve seen enough architecture in my lifetime to know that this house is no ordinary house. It is, in fact, history in the making. BALI INTERIORS ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖGuest accessOur villa manager and staff will be waiting to welcome you to the villa on arrival at the gate simply let our staff know you have arrived either by phone or by ringing the bell on the intercom. Guests are welcome to request an early arrival, otherwise, check in is from 2:00 pm daily. We offer secure parking for 2 cars and a few scooters inside the complex. The security guard is on-site each night from 6:00 pm to 6:00 am and we offer guests added peace of mind with 24 hour CCTV.Other things to noteCheck in time is from 2:00 pm and Check out time is 11:00 am. Please respect the arrival and departure times as outlined in your terms of stay. The River House Bali is not pet friendly or secure for pets so please do advise management if you have questions regarding pets before booking. We are not a party house, however, we can offer guests a chance to enjoy the entertainment and dining areas for small dinner parties of up to 12 people. If you require a chef or additional staff please let us know so we can arrange this for your stay. Thank you and we look forward to welcoming you soon.

title: 12BR Mia & Montana  Dual Villas for Group in Ubud
description: Discover the combined charm of Villa Mia & Villa Montana, a stunning 12-bedroom sanctuary in the tranquil village of Pejeng Kawan, Ubud. Ideal for large families, retreats, or groups of friends, this tropical haven offers two beautifully appointed villas side by side, surrounded by lush rice fields, open skies, and endless ways to unwind or explore..The spaceAt Villa Mia, every moment is designed for connection and relaxation. Guests can unwind in the private cinema‚Äînow upgraded with a karaoke system and two microphones for unforgettable movie nights or lively sing-along sessions. For those who love to stay active, the villa also offers a basketball and badminton court, a ping-pong table, and serene spots like a hammock or jacuzzi with breathtaking sunset views. For our youngest guests, the villa also features a fun inflatable slide, perfect for children under 10 years old to enjoy safely. Each of the six spacious bedrooms features Smart TVs, en-suite bathrooms, and flexible bed arrangements, ensuring maximum comfort for groups and families alike.Villa Montana invites you into its serene layout with a symmetrical infinity pool, sunken lounge, and an open living space that flows seamlessly into the dining area and fully equipped kitchen. Its six bedrooms echo the peaceful energy of Ubud, offering a comfortable escape amidst views of rolling rice fields and coconut trees.The outdoor spaces at Villa Mia & Villa Montana are thoughtfully designed for both gathering and quiet retreat. Spend mornings at Villa Mia‚Äôs courts or savor coffee in Villa Montana‚Äôs poolside lounge, surrounded by greenery. Together, the two villas offer spacious, versatile accommodation for up to 24 guests, ideal for wellness escapes, or memorable holidays with loved ones. Entrance to Villa Mia & Villa Montana is through the main parking area, giving guests clear, convenient and direct access to both villas. Located just minutes from the cultural heart of Ubud, Villa Mia & Villa Montana offer easy access to top attractions like the Sacred Monkey Forest, Ubud Palace, and countless art galleries, temples, and caf√©s. Whether you're planning group adventures or peaceful downtime, this combined property makes every moment easy and meaningful.Are you ready for your holiday in Bali? Book your stay at Villa Mia & Villa Montana today, and enjoy the best of Ubud in a setting designed to bring people together, surrounded by nature, comfort, and endless charm.(Please note that your Netflix and YouTube accounts will be used to log in. Ensure you log out before checking out to protect your account from unauthorized use.)STAFF AND SERVICES INCLUDED- Dedicated Villa Manager- Villa Host (Ubud) or Staff (Seminyak/Bukit)- Daily Housekeeping- Garden and Pool StaffEXTRA COSTS (advance notice may be required):- Villa pre-stocking: Groceries and beverages (subject to an additional service fee).- Breakfast by Villa Host (Ubud ONLY): IDR 120.000 per person per meal as a cover charge (minimum 4 guests)- Floating breakfast: IDR 150.000 per tray (for up to 4 guests).- In-villa Chef: Arranged through our trusted partner (see FAQs for details).- Airport transfers: Convenient pick-up and drop-off services.- Driving service: Reliable and professional drivers available on request.- Activities and excursions: Customized experiences to explore Bali.- In-villa massage services: Relax and rejuvenate in your villa's comfort.- Baby-sitting service: Experienced caretakers for your little ones.- Security guards: Additional safety and peace of mind.- Flowers arrangements: Custom designs to enhance your stay.Guest accessRoad Access: Many villas have narrow road access, often suitable for motorcycles only. We can assist with transportation arrangements if needed.Other things to noteIf Nearby Construction Occurs: We value your peaceful stay. In the rare event of construction in our area, our team is ready to assist with any comfort concerns. While neighborhood activities are beyond our control, your relaxation remains our priority. Please don't hesitate to contact us if you need anything to enhance your experience.Natural Ventilation: Experience the refreshing breeze of Bali with our open-air living spaces, designed to maximize natural airflow, providing an eco-friendly alternative to air conditioning or fans.Vendor Services: To ensure the villa's equipment and your safety, our dedicated team manages all vendor services within the villa, including spa, personal training, decorations, private chefs, yoga, photography, and villa equipment. Using external vendors is strictly prohibited and will result in a fine of IDR 2.000.000.Waste Management: Contribute to Bali's sustainable efforts by participating in our waste separation program. We provide three bins for organic, inorganic, and residual waste in your villa.Eco-Conscious Amenities: We provide Sensatia Botanicals, a locally founded skincare brand, as bathroom amenities (hand soap, body soap, shampoo, and conditioner). Made in Bali with 100% natural, cruelty-free ingredients, this partnership reflects our support for sustainability and local initiatives, including plastic recycling and beach cleanups.Natural Charm: Our villas embrace Bali's tropical beauty, where the sounds of nature‚Äîgeckos and insects‚Äîcreate a serene ambiance. The open design may occasionally welcome wildlife, despite regular pest control. Geckos, symbols of good luck in Balinese culture, and other creatures are vital to the ecosystem.  Cultural Respect: In Ubud and Bukit, monkeys may be present‚Äîplease refrain from feeding or interacting with them. Surrounding landscapes, like jungles, rice fields, and local farms (e.g., duck, chicken or pig), are not part of the villa property and may be accessed by residents, with changes beyond our control. We appreciate your respect for Bali‚Äôs natural and cultural heritage.FAQsQ: What time is the check-in policy?A: Our dedicated staff ensures a smooth check-in process. Check-in starts at 14:00 for 1-3 bedroom villas and at 15:00 for 4-6 bedroom villas. Luggage drop-off is welcome after 11:00 as we prepare your villa. Please note, a late check-in fee of IDR 200.000 applies for arrivals after 20:00 to cover staff overtime, as our staff does not stand by the villa all the time.Q: What time is the check-out policy?A: Our check-out time is at 11:00 by default. Late check-out is subject to availability and involves extra charge. Please note that for any late check-out between 11:00 ‚Äì 18:00, an additional charge of 50% of the Daily Villa Rate will apply. Any check-out after 18:00, will be charged at a full day's Daily Villa Rate. If you need to store your luggage after check-out time, you are welcome to do so.Q: Is breakfast included in the booking? How do we order the chef's service?A: Breakfast is not included in the room rate. However, you can easily arrange breakfast by contacting our reservation or concierge team. We offer a variety of menu options prepared by our dedicated private chef, right in your villa. The cost is IDR 160.000 per person, with a minimum order for 5 guests. You can indulge in a floating breakfast for an additional fee of IDR 150.000 per tray.For lunch and dinner, we offer enhanced services, including set menus, live BBQ cooking, ethnic cuisines, and even fine dining prepared by a Michelin-star chef, all cooked in the villa. Prices for lunch and dinner start at IDR 450.000 per person. Please note that terms and conditions apply for booking.Additionally, our villa features a fully equipped kitchen, allowing you the flexibility to prepare your own meals if you prefer. Whether you choose to dine in or savor a chef‚Äôs touch, our team is here to ensure a seamless and enjoyable experience.Q: Do we have a housekeeping service every day?A: Absolutely! Daily housekeeping is provided from 9:00 to 17:00. Linens are changed every third day for sustainability. To ensure privacy, please coordinate with your Villa Host or Staff for a convenient cleaning time. Your comfort is our priority.Q: Can we have extra clean towels?A: Certainly! We are happy to provide extra towels, subject to availability. Please feel free to reach out to your Villa Host or Staff, and we‚Äôll do our best to accommodate your request promptly.Q: What is the maximum occupancy for this 12-bedroom villa? Can I have extra beds?A: This villa comfortably accommodates up to 24 guests. However, it can host a maximum of 26 guests, with the 25th and 26th guests considered as extra. An additional fee of IDR 365.000/night/person, applies. Should you require extra beds, please feel free to let us know, and we‚Äôll be happy to assist in making arrangements for your group‚Äôs comfort.

title: Luxury 4 Bedroom Cliff Ocean Edge Villa Uluwatu
description: The Luxe Bali is an extremely high end 4 floor family friendly 4 bedroom luxury villa right above Padang Padang Beach Uluwatu in an exclusive 3 villa gated estate.Enjoy private cliff edge views of the surf break and beach below with a private  garden pathway to the oceans edge.4 floor lift, gym, spa, sauna, steam room, home theatre, butler, master chef, housekeeping, 3 pools, lush gardens and fine art are but a few of it's unique qualitiesThe spaceTo ensure you will have the best holiday possible regardless of where you book, please read our advice here.The Luxe Bali is not in anyway your average 'luxury villa', a term perhaps a little too generously used online.  If you are already reading this here then you are spending a considerable amount of money for a vacation,  please be as informed as possible of what you are getting and more to the point what you will be getting here and not be getting elsewhere for that money. If you have already experienced the quaint rustic or the all visual flash but not real quality , or located on the cliffs with an extremely long and steep walk  to reach the ocean way below villa experiences and would now like to experience a beyond first class residence in comfortable  location, facility and service that you would absolutely love to live in for the rest of your life then this is the villa for you. A true blend of the finest elements the west and east can put together. Most lean too much either way, The Luxe Bali has found that perfect harmonious middle point between fine finish natural materials and absolute high-end comfort.  Understated ZEN.  Unlike most villas on the island The Luxe Bali is unique in that it was built with an totally unlimited budget by a very high net worth individual as a second home, one the owner wanted to be as beautiful, comfortable, and facilitated as possible. Not spending as much time in Bali these days the owner has put the villa up for selected rental when they are not at the villa . So you will be experiencing the home of a high net worth individual with impeccable taste and eye for detail.  A nine-year build by the finest craftsmen from all over the world, this is the time it took to get everything to the meticulous quality standards the owner desired. The Architect of the world famous KuDeTa Restaurant in Seminyak was selected to design the villa.    There are  villas around with more bedrooms for larger groups  but more luxurious ?  we have yet to see any that have taken it to the level of our residence.  Most villas loudly promoted in the ‚Äòluxury' category would be lucky to qualify as low end  airline business class equivalents, whereas The Luxe Bali is without any doubt up there with the finest airlines first class offerings and at a fraction of what those flights cost.  The 1200 m2 (13,000 ft2) of living space boasts Four Master Suites with their own lounge area and en suite bathroom containing separate shower and bath space, with each having private terrace or direct access opening to the cliff edge pool. The fourth floor Penthouse Suite features a stunning 88 m2  (950 ft2) of open marble terrace, one of the premier spots in Bali from where you can see the cliffs running down the coast, the surf right out front of you, and the distant shores of Kuta, Seminyak and Canggu across the vast ocean bay and also to enjoy the spectacular light show every sunset brings.  Beside this in the evening there no black void looking into the dark ocean abyss when the sun goes down as the twinkling lights of the Kuta - Seminyak shoreline can be seen across the bay. The King-size Beds strategically placed to catch the views have the most comfortable absolute top end mattresses available; high thread count cotton sheets and a variety of hardness non-allergic microfiber pillows.    The third floor feature two grand bedroom suites with stunning ensuite bathrooms with separate showers and baths and outside terraces, these are the OceanView Suite and the Rainforest Suite.The second floor is the living dining upper ground level. It contains several lounge areas, family tv area, a grand dining area , a celebrity kitchen using absolute top shelf appliances with a master chef and butler included. This floor at one end leads to a beautiful rainforest grove complete with two large banyan trees, a multitude of ferns, palms, waterfalls and koi ponds, the other end of the second floor is an unrestricted view of the ocean with cliffs running down to Balangan Beach. Stand at the edge of the lawn and watch the surfers paddling by. The Cliff Edge Pool Suite is located on the lower ground floor and contains either two single beds or a king size double bed (as requested), and spacious private lounge space that opens out directly onto the large cliff edge pool, pergola and gardens. The fourth bedroom has a bathroom with a luxurious high flow shower (no bath) and when desired this suite can be locked from the rest of the villa  to be a self contained apartment with it's own private entrance. This space is perfect for  high end clients that travel with an assistant and desire them to be close by but not too close. The  lower ground level also holds the fun zone , with a gym, a dry redwood cedar sauna, a steam room, massage spa, and dedicated home theatre.  The Meals. The very talented Chef prepares meals of the highest standard of quality and flavour. Many guests come with the intention of eating out at the high end restaurants Bali is so well know for, but after experiencing the quality of the in-house chef prepared meals served by your own butler and waiter, they often forgo the visits to other restaurants. Guests are charged a 20% surcharge for groceries and produce and the chef prepares meals from that.  The cost saving for meals alone becomes quite significant. Please Read the guest reviews about the meals. The same with Drinks, the villa does not sell drinks, but rather authentic origin bottles of wines and spirits are purchased at a 20% surcharge and the butler with a significant saving for you mixes cocktails. The property was purchased well before most any other property on the southern peninsular at a time when they had the choice and means to buy anywhere and sat on for a decade while planning the grounds.  Being already well informed on building locations and sun orientation they noticed two significant features almost no other site on the coastline provided.  Firstly the property actually faces north across the ocean with Mt Agung and the other volcanoes of Bali in the distant background. What this aspect means is a significantly cooler space where you get ocean views all day long without the intense and often uncomfortable heat of the sun beaming into and heating up your villa, and secondly this site is one of less than a handful with terraced grounds all the way down to just above the waters edge.  Once again, this is not a villa built on a normal business budget as a as an upmarket hotel might; they often are the obvious ones all bundled together like cookie cutter suburbs.  This is a unique high net worth owners villa in a very private gated estate of only three properties all built and owned by three high net worth individuals. No look after 70 villa  management companies, no built by a developer or commercial operation  and the significantly lower quality build, fixtures and infrastructure one will undoubtedly get from such a set up, rather a truly unique villa of the highest order in a unique setting. Please read our guest comments, you will see by glowing reviews how much previous guests have appreciated what they experienced and how much they enjoyed their stay.  You really owe it to yourself. The Prices are for a rental of all Four (4) bedrooms.  with up to 8 Adults and 3 children A 3 Bedroom option for up to 6 Adults and 2 children  ,  a 2 Bedroom option for up to 4 Adults  (or 2 adults 2 children ) , and a 1 Bedroom option for  up to 2 Adults are available Any numbers outside of these please message me so we can work something out.  To find these offerings above please go to my Hanny the host page and select the villa with the number of bedrooms you need or message me and I will provide you with the right option.Warm Regards HannyGuest accessYou are overlooking with direct ocean frontage the Surf of Padang Padang Beach. Watch surfers on the waves right below you. The Indian Ocean is at the end of your private terraced garden path, and at low tide you can step straight onto the sand of Padang Padang Beach. Bordering us is 24 hectares of virgin forest running all the way to Uluwatu. We face north so you will not be getting oppressive solar heat from the baking afternoon sun inside your living area, but we still have plenty of all day sun tanning locations including the large cliff edge infinity pool and sunset views from the expansive top floor terrace.You are set a long way down from the road, and are set below and behind 2 solid stonewalls so you will rarely hear any traffic noise whatsoever. 10mm thick cyclone class sliding doors and windows block out all noise.Other things to note*** Important to read this before booking ***The Prices are for a rental of all  Four (4) bedrooms.  Up to 8 Adults and 4 childrenPlease Note: Children are under 12 years old, Anyone 12 years and over are considered an Adult in bookings. Four children may stay for free. It can be two children beds in one of the bedrooms or one children's bed in each of two bedrooms.  For only 1 to 4  children do not add any to the booking otherwise you will be charged by airbnb. (Limited variables allowed)Please Note Children staying alone in a bedroom are considered Adults and charged accordingly in number of rooms used. Enter them as Adults in the booking. No more than 8 adults in total can stay in the house.  No more that 12 people in total can stay in the house (Adults and Children combined).For 3, 2, and 1 Bedroom Offerings see here below. ---3 Bedroom information and booking link here for up to 6 Adults and 3 children2 Bedroom information and booking link here for up to 4 Adults1 Bedroom information and booking link here for up to Up to 2 AdultsRemember if you want your children to have their own bedroom they will be considered to be Adults.  And Children over 12 years old are Adults regardless of where they sleep.If this is confusing send me a message and tell me whom you wish to come in number and age of each and I will tell you how to enter the booking for your lowest price. Laundry :  There is a laundry service at very reasonable prices :  Items collected in the morning will be ready the next morning.  Please ask Wayan the House Manager for the Laundry Price List. Outside Guests:Outside guests are only permitted onsite up to 12 Midnight; they must leave by 12 Midnight.  The maximum number of outside guests you can invite to visit you in the villa can be no more than the number of guest‚Äôs renting/staying at the villa. Example if 6 Adults are renting-staying at the villa you can invite a maximum of 6 Adults to visit. Guests invited for Lunch or Dinner:  Please Note there can be No More people invited from outside for a Lunch or Dinner than the number of Adults staying at the villa.  Guests must leave by 12 Midnight. For outside guests invited for Lunch or Dinner where more than 4 outside guests are in attendance there is a US$100 surcharge to cover the need for staff attendance and extra workload.Late Departures: Checkout is 12 Midday.  If The Luxe Bali is booked for a new guests arrival the day of a departure and times of old guest departure and new guest arrival we can store departing guests baggage while guests visit a restaurant, have a short tour locally, or stay in the cliff edge pergola.  Late Check out surcharge: If there are no new guests arriving on the day of departure the guest may stay in the villa and use bedroom / bathroom for an extra charge of US$150 an hour for each full hour past 12 midday of day booked to depart as we still have staff wage times and power bills to pay. Late Checkouts past  6pm will be charged a half days rental.Late Checkouts Past 10pm will be charged an extra full nights stay.Fireworks Candles and Burning Lanterns are strictly forbidden.  Smoking inside the house is strictly forbidden and a significant cleaning charge of US$400 a room will be applied should there be tobacco smoke smell inside any room. You can smoke on outside terraces with the outside doors shut. Please ask for an ashtray.We choose waxed timber floors for your tactile pleasure. Shoes and outside use sandals are forbidden inside the house as we have waxed timber floors. We supply house sandals for inside the villa.  High heels inside the house forbidden. Feet, body, and swimwear must be relatively dry before entering the house so no water drips will get on the waxed wooden floors. Wet towels and wet swimwear must be hung above marble floors or in the bathtub if they need a wash, Do Not placed wet items on or over wooden floors. Do not use body oils anywhere near the waxed timber floors , please apply  in the bathroom on the marble floor or outside terraces. Butler Service. The Butler is in the villa at your service for most of the day. He is available for emergencies and important requests 24hrs a day. He stays above the upper garage and can be in the villa to assist you in minutes. Please call number 48 to reach him.Ala Carte Breakfast is provided complimentary.If you require a pre 8am Breakfast please arrange with the Butler to organize this with the Chef.  It can be arranged. A Very Qualified Chef is at your service free of charge from 8am until 10pm if you have ordered evening meals the day before as they need to shop in the morning for that day‚Äôs meal requests. If you have not ordered evening meals the Chef leaves at 5pm. Lunches and Dinners: The Chef can buy ingredients and prepare for you. All purchases are subject to 20% handling fee by the Chef.  Invoices will be provided and you can be assured it will be much cheaper and most often more delicious than eating at a restaurant.  Espresso - Cappuccino etc.  Coffees and Tea's are freely available all day. Drinking water free of charge. We are not a restaurant and have a single chef so please limit the variety of meals per lunch or dinner  to a reasonable amount.   Dinners are not available for serving after 10PM. The chef needs to be at the market early every morning to buy fresh produce.Massage:8am to 4pm Massage Service available in the in house Spa at reasonable rates by highly qualified massage staff. Out of these hours massage can be arranged at a surcharge.Car and Drivers are available to be booked at a special rate of USD 50 a day a car for 8 hours use (excluding petrol) 5 to 8 guest would need 2 cars or we can arrange larger / more luxurious cars if required , prices will be determined upon request. Airport Pickup and Drop-off is available at a cost of US$50 per 4-person car. More than 4 guests would require 2 cars. You will need to contact Hanny to arrange this before your arrival with full flight details.For your upmost safety and wellbeing we require All Guests who stay at The Luxe Bali must have full medical and medical evacuation travel insurance. There has been too many cases in Bali of over one hundred thousand dollars for medical evacuation costs over the years.

title: Ultimate Experience Chef, Butler and More
description: Experience unparalleled luxury at our exclusive 12-bedroom villa complex in Seminyak just 5 minutes from the beach. With a dedicated team including a private chef, butler, and drivers, we offer a fully serviced retreat perfect for group getaways, corporate retreats, or special celebrations. Enjoy privacy, elegance, and personalized services that make your stay unforgettable.The spaceWelcome to La Residence, a unique residence comprising three distinct villas‚ÄîVilla Concrete Serenity, Casa Diplomatico, and Villa Soluna‚Äîeach offering its own style and charm:- 12 Luxurious Bedrooms: Each bedroom features a private, comfortable bathroom, most equipped with both a shower and a bathtub for ultimate relaxation.- Unique Villa Styles: Each villa boasts a distinctive design, from minimalist elegance to Mediterranean allure and modern serenity.- Tailor-Made Pool Tables: Enjoy custom-designed pool tables in each villa for leisure and entertainment.- Private Pools and Gardens: Each villa includes its own private pool surrounded by lush tropical gardens, perfect for relaxation.- Spacious Living Areas: Open-concept spaces with high-end d√©cor provide comfort and sophistication.- Fully Equipped Kitchens: While our private chef is at your service, each villa includes a kitchen should you wish to use it.- Our villas are designed to provide a harmonious blend of luxury and comfort, ensuring a memorable stay for all guests.Guest access4. Guest Access (optional):Guests have exclusive access to the entire property, including:- All three private villas and their amenities- Private pools and outdoor lounges- Tailor-made pool tables and entertainment areas- Lush tropical gardens- Private entrances with night security- Our dedicated team ensures that all areas are maintained to the highest standards for your enjoyment.

title: Noku Beach House
description: Eclectic modernism on Seminyak BeachThe spaceA 30-foot infinity pool reaches toward the sea at this wood-clad villa on Seminyak Beach. A walled garden and attentive staff look onto the scene, with interiors by Alex Zabotto-Bentley adding potted plants, maritime sculptures, and designer furnishings. Order drinks at the wet bar, soak up views from the balcony, and splurge on a session in the private spa. Gado Gado Restaurant is steps away.Copyright ¬© Luxury Retreats. title: The Backyard Bingin - Cliff Top Views w/Chef
description: A cliff top majestic escape, with wide open spaces, and a crisp and modern interior. description: Shalimar Estate comprises of 3 separate independent beachfront villas: Villa Cantik, Villa Makanda, and Villa Kalima, offering 2, 4, and 6 bedrooms respectively.The estate is staffed with Villa Managers/Butlers, Chefs, Housekeepers, Gardeners, Pool Attendants, Maintenance Personnel, and Security Officers all committed to making your stay unforgettable.Shalimar Estate is perfect for large events like weddings, parties, or just to enjoy with large groups of family or friends.The spaceThe property is compound of 3 villas of 2, 4, and 6 bedrooms, making a total of 12 bedroom, capable of accmmodating up to 24 guests.2 Aditional guests can be accommodated in 2 extra beds by surcharge of 50 USD per night per bed + 15,5% Service and Tax4 Additional children (of 12 years old or below) can be accommodated in 4 daybeds. We can provide with lineen and pilow for 25 USD per night per daybed + 15,5% Service and Tax.2 infants can be accommodated in 2 baby cots free of charge.Guest accessWhen the entire estate is booked, guests have full privacy and will have exclusive access to all the property except for the reserved areas for the staff and the technical installation rooms of the property.Other things to noteOnce in the property, if the guests wish to order any meal, the Chefs will calculate the cost of the groceries depending on the guests¬¥ order and after receiving a Deposit and doing the shopping, the Butlers will hand the bills and the change from the supermarket with no extra charges except for a small fee of 100.000 IDR (around 6 USD) that should be handed directly to each chef, every day their services are needed, so they cover the transportation expenses to buy the groceries.Every meal should be ordered at least 4 hours ahead, so the chefs have time to do their estimation for the costs, buy the groceries, and prepare all the dishes.Normally, the butlers and the housekeepers will take care of breakfast, and the Chefs take care of lunch and dinner.In case the geusts plan to have both lunch and dinner at the villas, it is better to order the day before, or early in the morning, to the butlers, so the Chefs only have to go once to buy the groceries.Normally, there is a suggested maximum order per meal of 5 dishes plus dessert, but as some dishes are easy and other dishes are more complicated and take longer times to cook, it is better to talk directly with the Chefs once the guests are in the villas, so they can let them know if the maximum number of dishes can be exceeded or if there are dishes requiring a longer time to cook.For breakfast there is no menu, but guests can order between American and Continental breakfast, whatever they like. description: Welcome to our Group Villas Tango and El Gaucho. Villa Tango is not just a stay, it's an experience in rhythm and romance.The combination of the two Villas is the perfect selection when traveling with huge groups of friends or families. In Villa Tango you may elevate your relaxation with our intimate whirlpool. Set slightly away from the main pool, it offers a perfect spot to rest.Large Pools: Dive into the expansive pool that stretches across each of the two properties. Whether you wish to do leisurely laps or simply float and let the Balinese sun kiss your skin, this pool is the villa's heart, offering refreshing respite from the tropical warmth.Sun Loungers: Strategically placed around the two pools, our premium sun loungers, are inviting you to indulge in lazy afternoons with your favorite book or cocktail. They provide a vantage point for absorbing Bali's natural beauty and the villa's architecture.Spacious Living Room: Central to the villas, our living room exudes spaciousness and elegance. The communal hub - perfect for gathering, relaxing, or planning the day's adventures.Large Dining Table: Dine in grandeur at our dining table, overlooking the garden and pool, every meal becomes an occasion, with the ambiance of the villa turning even the simplest dishes into gourmet experiences.Private parking spaces, suitable for 2 medium-sized cars or several motorbikes for each VillaGuest accessBoth the villas are yours to enjoy. You will have full access to all the available facilities and services, with absolute and complete privacy. The interconnecting door in the garden is the perfect connection to have the whole group together yet in the comfort of your privacy. Feel free to make use of the pool, the garden, and the entirety of the house as you please. You can access the villa from a quiet alley. Each villa features a private parking space, suitable for two medium-sized cars or several motorbikes Each bedroom comes with its own key set that includes the entrance gate.Other things to noteThe Villas come with cleaning 6 days a week and staff eager to assist you throughout your stay. Let your stay here be a passionate embrace of luxury, comfort, and the exotic spirit of Bali.

title: Incredible 5BR Exclusive Designer Villa in Berawa
description: Welcome to the exceptional Villa Ithaki, a unique, 5BR designer masterpiece in the heart of Canggu. Set on a spacious 10-are plot, this unique retreat blends luxury, comfort, and style. It features a pool, sauna, ice bath, a massage room, TV area, workspace, a bar and a state-of-the-art sound system that rivals the best clubs in Bali. A personal golf cart makes getting around effortless.Perfectly located Villa Ithaki invites you to experience the best of Bali in unmatched style and comfortThe spaceWelcome to the exceptional Villa Ithaki, a unique 5-bedroom designer masterpiece nestled in the heart of Berawa, Canggu. Set on a spacious 10-are plot, this one-of-a-kind retreat invites you into a world where luxury, comfort, and contemporary elegance meet tropical serenity.As you arrive, a quiet sense of calm sets in. You step through a wide entrance framed by lush greenery, and instantly, you're greeted by the soft sounds of water. A serene stone pathway stretches ahead, flanked by tranquil ponds with koi fish gliding beneath the surface and smooth natural stones underfoot. The tropical air is warm, the energy is grounded, and Villa Ithaki begins to unfold before you.You enter the open-plan living pavilion‚Äîbright, expansive, and masterfully styled. Slanted ceilings, a beautiful tree, and curated design pieces reflect modern sophistication. On your right, the fully equipped kitchen gleams with clean lines and elegant finishes. Ahead, a large wooden dining table invites long dinners and lively conversation. To your left, a sleek private bar and a professional DJ booth hint at the nights to come, complete with a sound system so powerful and refined, it puts many clubs to shame.Step outside, and you're drawn immediately to the stunning pool at the heart of the villa, surrounded by sun loungers and swaying vegetations. For full-body rejuvenation, venture to a separate spa wing of the villa, where a private massage room, traditional sauna, and ice bath offer the ultimate wellness sanctuary‚Äîquietly tucked away from the main social areas.Villa Ithaki features five thoughtfully designed bedrooms:* The **Master Suite** is a luxurious haven with a king-sized bed, two walk-in closets (one available for guests), and a hidden TV that elegantly rises from the foot of the bed. The en suite bathroom boasts a large bathtub, rain shower, and dual vanities, creating a spa-like experience.* The **Second Bedroom** features a king-sized bed, generous space, and a private bathroom with a deep bathtub, rainfall shower, and designer mirrors.* The **Third Bedroom** offers a queen-sized bed and the same level of comfort and privacy, with an en suite that mirrors the villa‚Äôs elegant standards.* The **Fourth and Fifth Bedrooms** are ideal for families or children. One holds a small double bed (or large kids' bed), the other a single bed‚Äîperfectly cozy yet stylish. These two rooms are connected by a spacious shared bathroom featuring a bathtub and plenty of room for shared family routines.* A **dedicated children‚Äôs playroom** adds a thoughtful touch, providing a fun and safe space for younger guests to enjoy their own Bali adventure.The villa also includes a quiet workspace for those needing to stay productive, and a golf cart to make local exploring effortless. A separate staff area ensures full service with total privacy throughout your stay.Perfectly located just moments from Berawa‚Äôs top dining spots, boutique shopping, vibrant nightlife, and world-class surf, **Villa Ithaki** is more than a place to stay‚Äîit‚Äôs an experience of style, comfort, and barefoot luxury in Bali‚Äôs most sought-after neighborhood.Other things to noteIncluded in every stay:- Cleaning is provided everyday (except on Sunday). If you have a preferred time, please let your villa manager know in advance. Cleaning typically occurs between 10 AM and 5 PM, and exact times depend on the manager's schedule.- Pool & garden maintenance - Bath and Pool towels for each guests- Hi Speed Wi-Fi internet connection- Safety boxes- Concierge ServicesAvailable upon request:- Airport transfer- Breakfast- Private cook- Crib and pool fence- Laundry- Bike rental- Car rental with and without driver- Daily tours to various sights (temples, landscape, villages, etc.)- Surf lessons

title: Villa Atas Ombak
description:
Straight out of the pages of a fairy tale, romantic Villa Atas Ombak is an idyllic slice of paradise on a beautiful island. Immensely popular for weddings and often featured in leading lifestyle magazines, this villa has been described as 'the essence of Bali'.The spaceWith capacity for up to 200 guests in the beachfront grounds, there are five gorgeous bedrooms that sleep up to ten guests. Spread across lotus ponds, this graceful villa is comprised of a main house and an ocean-facing guesthouse. This villa channels open-air living among the elements and infuses Balinese spirit with decadent luxury. 

With a traditional thatched alang-alang roof above the airy living space, guests can gather on the heritage wooden and bamboo sofas with plush white soft furnishings. The living room is the social hub of the villa, where guests can gather and socialise together while admiring the breathtaking views. In the dining area, guests can feast on a banquet created by the in-house chef, who lovingly prepares Balinese, Asian or Western meals in a restaurant-standard kitchen.

The master suite has an enormous, comfortable bed and floor to ceiling windows where the guests can wake up to enchanting views of the greenery and the sounds of the ocean waves. The guests in this room can enjoy a refreshing dip in the exclusive plunge pool right outside. The ocean pavilion bedrooms in the main house are decked out in dramatic dark wood with quirky furniture and also have enormous windows and panoramic sea views.

All bedrooms have open air bathrooms, with the master bedroom also featuring a traditional shower reminiscent of Bali's many famous waterfalls. There's a stunning sunken bathtub where guests can try a relaxing Balinese petal bath. The ocean pavilion bathrooms are decorated in nature-inspired earth tones. 

If you need a break from the outdoors, retire to the air conditioned media room, where you'll find a satellite TV encased within an ornate wooden cabinet, complete with Bose surround sound system and comfortable sofas to unwind on.

Outside, guests can swim in the luxurious infinity pool, soaking up the dreamy atmosphere and looking out to the ocean mere steps away. From here, there is a 100m stretch of black sand beach just across a river where you can enjoy privacy and seclusion. There are three Hindu temples within the 1.5 acres of lush greenery, where you can experience a peaceful moment of spirituality.

The beautiful garden bal√© is one of the most photogenic parts of the villa - it's no wonder this villa is so popular for wedding parties! Curl up among the soft grey cushions, breathe in the salty air and relax.

Features:

The Villa
Villa Atas Ombak will charm you with its unique location, just steps away from a beautiful Balinese beach. There are 5 bedrooms and 5 bathrooms, accommodating up to 10 people. 5 extra beds can also be set up for an additional fee.

Ground Floor
- Open living pavilion with a large seating area, daybeds and a table for four
- Partially open dining area with a 12-seater dining table
- Fully-equipped kitchen
- Media room with TV & DVD
- Master bedroom with King-size bed, en-suite open air bathroom & private plunge pool
- Double bedroom with en-suite open air bathroom & private terrace

First Floor
- Double bedroom with en-suite open air bathroom & private terrace

Ocean Bedrooms
- Situated to one side of the property¬†
- Two double bedrooms with en-suite open air bathrooms and large windows offering magnificent views

Outside grounds
- Swimming pool (14x7m) facing directly onto beach
- Plunge pool
- Sun loungers & parasols
- Poolside pergola with sunbed
- Manicured lawn & lush garden
- Three ancient Hindu temples amidst the gardens
- BBQ
- Access to beach
- Parking

Facilities 
- TV
- DVD players in TV room and master bedroom
- Bose sound system
- Air-conditioning
- In-room safe
- Back-up generator
- Telephone

Location:

Tucked away in Batu Belig just a hop, skip and a jump from glitzy Seminyak, you really have the best of both worlds. The area is quieter and a little more under the radar, with new patisseries and yoga studios popping up all the time. 

The villa is just a few moments from Batu Belig beach. Enjoy 100m of uninterrupted bliss on the striking black sand - and the rest of the beach is particularly family friendly and peaceful. While the waves are too strong for any serious swimming, you can rent a body board to ride the waves. Soak up the relaxing vibe and watch the famous sunset - if you venture further down the beach you can grab a snack from a nearby cafe or local warung. You can watch kite flying here, a popular pastime in Bali. However, if you're here in July or August, you can watch Bali's annual traditional kite flying festival.

Be sure to take advantage of the villa's private driver to visit cosmopolitan Seminyak itself. As Bali's premiere upscale beach resort, Seminyak is a playground for jet-setters, fashionistas and yogis. It's full of fashionable boutiques where you can shop til you drop and fancy spas, where you can indulge in a quintessentially Balinese massage and spend the day getting pampered. Bali is the ideal place to try out yoga. There are stunning studios dotted all around Seminyak, so grab a mat and sign up for a taster course.

One of the best local attractions is Finn's Recreation Club. Boasting a water park with thrilling slides popular with kids and adults alike; a state of the art gym, blissful spa, vast tennis court and boxing arena, there's something for everyone here. A memorable day out for the whole family!

You'll find plenty of surf schools where you can get acquainted with the waves and learn from the professionals. After the sun softens, hang out at one of the many alluring beach clubs for a panoramic sunset view over the Indian ocean - famous Ku De Ta and Potato Head are both nearby.

Art lovers will adore the hip galleries around Seminyak, such as Biasa ArtSpace at the forefront of contemporary Indonesian art such as installations of brass head busts with red eyes. Hotel Tugu Bali is an interesting museum-hotel hybrid full of priceless Indonesian art and antiques. Here, there's also a fabulous award-winning spa offering traditional Eastern therapies, so it's an ideal place to spend a leisurely afternoon.

The villa is also a short drive from the sweeping rice terraces, ancient fishing villages and dramatic volcanoes of Tabanan. This area is great for a hike or a gentle walk. 

Magical Petitenget Beach embodies Balinese spirituality, and Pura Petitenget is a significant link in the series of temples along Bali's west coast between Pura Uluwatu and Pura Tanah Lot. Pura Petitenget is an ancient temple that has twelve shrines and an impressive dragon staircase that leads to an expansive courtyard. Every evening, there are temple ceremonies on the beach and traditional dance displays - a truly mesmerising way to experience the rich culture. 

Take a 30-minute drive to Pura Tanah Lot, a religious site perched high atop a wave-lashed rock formation. It's believed that the temple here protects Bali from evil sea spirits. Pura Tanah Lot is also a popular spot for sunset. Soak up the experience of locals praying and admire the ocean turn to gold in the evening light.

title: Adnaisak Estate
description:
Nestled in the heart of Berawa, Canggu‚Äôs most exclusive neighbourhood, Adnaisak Estate offers an unparalleled Bali retreat, perfect for large groups or multi-family getaways. Comprising two stunning, fully air-conditioned properties‚ÄîAdnaisak House with seven bedrooms and Adnaisak Villa with five bedrooms‚Äîthis private estate accommodates up to twenty-nine guests in complete comfort and style.The spaceDesigned with luxury in mind, both properties offer spacious living areas that blend modern conveniences with tropical charm, creating an ideal balance of privacy and togetherness. Each villa is fully equipped with top-tier amenities, including spacious kitchens, entertainment areas with surround sound and large TVs, and beautifully designed bedrooms with indulgent touches. The outdoor spaces feature child-safe swimming pools, sun decks, and ample seating for relaxation, making it perfect for families and groups.

With its prime location, just moments away from Bali‚Äôs best restaurants, boutiques, and beach clubs, Adnaisak Estate offers the perfect blend of serenity and convenience for those seeking a luxurious escape in one of Bali‚Äôs most sought-after destinations. Whether you are relaxing by the pool, savouring expertly crafted cocktails, or enjoying the vibrant local scene, the estate‚Äôs seamless combination of luxury, privacy, and access to the island‚Äôs best attractions ensures a truly memorable experience for all guests.

Adnaisak Estate offers a truly unparalleled experience in Bali, featuring an exclusive on-site commercial kitchen with a team of four expert chefs and four dedicated butlers. This unique service allows guests to indulge in a premium dining experience, with a menu of exquisite, five-star quality food and beverages available on demand, just like in a luxury hotel. Whether you're craving a gourmet meal or a casual snack, the team is ready to cater to your every culinary desire, ensuring your stay is both effortless and extraordinary. This bespoke service sets Adnaisak Estate apart from other luxury villas, offering the ultimate in comfort, convenience, and indulgence.

Location:

Adnaisak Estate is perfectly located in the heart of Berawa, one of the most desirable areas in Canggu, Bali. This prime location offers guests the convenience of being within walking distance of a variety of attractions, minimising the need for long drives or dealing with Bali's notorious traffic. Within just a seven-minute walk, you'll find over twenty spectacular bars, cafes, and restaurants, including popular spots like Indigo, Kong, and Milk & Madu, as well as Finns Recreation Club, offering world-class amenities such as a gym, tennis courts, Olympic-sized pool, and even a bowling alley and water slide park. The area also boasts an array of fashion boutiques, spas, and salons, along with a top-notch equestrian centre catering to all ages.

In addition, within a twenty-minute walk or a short five-minute drive, you‚Äôll have access to some of Bali‚Äôs best beaches, including Finns Beach Club and Batu Belig Beach, as well as renowned beach clubs like Caf√© Del Mar. For those looking to explore further, Seminyak‚Äôs fine dining and Echo Beach‚Äôs surf spots are just a fifteen-minute drive away, while Bali‚Äôs international airport is a thirty-minute drive. The estate is also well positioned for day trips to Ubud and Sanur, offering a perfect base for exploring Bali‚Äôs diverse landscapes and activities.

title: Arnalaya Beach House
description:
Two design visionaries have joined forces to create this mesmerising beach house - the architecture by Sonny Chan and the interiors by guru Albano Daminato. The result is a sprawling complex with two ocean suites and three courtyard suites, a stunning poolside entertainment bale, a private tennis court and a luxurious spa, all designed with flair and panache. Events for up to 150 guests can be held at this property, so it's perfect for a wedding or special party.The spaceSimple yet stylish bedrooms have sculptural terrazo walls, hardwood floors and timber walled closets. Minimal in style with clean lines and delicately canopied beds, these rooms have huge bay windows that boast awe-inspiring views of the Indian ocean. Ensuite bathrooms in the two master suites have freestanding tubs with ocean views and a luxurious rain shower. 

The courtyard suites also have enviable sea views and beds that can be configured as king size or twins. These rooms are kitted out with Bose ceiling speakers for the televisions that are encased in minimal cupboards. There are extra pull out beds in some rooms - this flexible bed arrangement means this villa can sleep up to 15.

The entertainment bale is where the party's at in this villa - it has its own kitchen and barbecue zone and seating for 12+ people. Relax and enjoy some dinner and drinks with breathtaking views of the ocean. Fully loaded with flat screen television, a Wii, art and craft equipment, books and games galore, there's plenty to keep everyone happy on rainy days. 

The incredible terraced gardens has layer upon layer of lush greenery in keeping with Canggu's sweeping vistas, while the luxurious saltwater infinity pool has plenty of space for everyone to swim - you'll feel like you can swim directly up to the ocean. 

The dedicated spa room has two massage tables - you can arrange for skilled therapists to come to the villa for a traditional Balinese massage in peace. 

There's plenty of activities to keep you moving in this villa! Serve up a storm on the full size private tennis court. It's kitted out with a ball machine and an array of rackets, while the gym has boxing equipment and a yoga platform alongside the usual high spec fitness equipment. Personal trainers, yoga and pilates instructors can be summoned to the villa for a dedicated exercise session (extra fee applies). The gym has pull-out beds to convert into a twin room, if required.¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†¬†

Location:

Arnalaya Beach House is perfectly placed on one of Canggu's most exclusive roads, Jalan Nelayan. The villa overlooks Nelayan beach, an striking ribbon of black volcanic sand lapping the Indian ocean, dotted with fishermen's huts and boats. Watch over Hindu ceremonies at the sacred temple and enjoy a refreshing cocktail on the beach. 

The villa has its very own 'Little Black Book' with all the information to help you find the best secret hotspots around Canggu. Additionally, the staff at this villa are very knowledgeable and many live nearby so can tell you where the locals hang out. 

Lively yet laid back, the Canggu area is popular with expats and holidaymakers. It's got an irresistible vibe and there's plenty to see and do. Canggu's beaches are superb for those who love surfing as there are some challenging waves to catch. You'll find plenty of surf schools where you can get acquainted with the waves and learn from the professionals.

Berawa and Batu Bolong beachs are both very close to the villa. Alternatively, take a 20 minute stroll across the golden sands all the way to Seminyak, stopping at lively cocktail huts along the way. Fabled Echo beach is just a 10 minute stroll away, where you can partake in their nightly seafood barbecues. Watch the sky light on fire from the comfort of a bean bag at the atmospheric beach bars.

Canggu is surrounded by vast evergreen rice fields that stretch as far as the eye can see. A great activity here is to ride a bicycle or scooter down the Shortcut, which is a delightfully scenic path through the rice plantations. Just be careful when you move to the side to let others pass, as the locals are busy making a book of all the falls into the rice fields! 

Bali is known as the 'Island of the Gods' and is home to countless enchanting temples. Take a 30 minute drive to Pura Tanah Lot, a religious site perched atop a rock formation. It's believed that the temple here protects Bali from evil sea spirits. Pura Tanah Lot is also a popular spot for sunset, soak up the experience of locals praying and admire the ocean turn to gold in the evening light.

There are plenty of fun activities around Canggu town, including having a traditional Balinese massage at a fancy spa, yoga and crossfit studios and some incredible cafes serving up delicious food. On Sundays, head to La Laguna gypsy market for organic and eco-friendly products and traditional handicrafts. There's live music and a great atmosphere here.

title: The Seed Bali - Private 8 bedroom Estate
description: Located on a secluded beach in East Bali, The Seed is a one of a kind private estate offering unmatched amenities. Features include an ocean and poolside cinema, an underground soundproof nightclub / karaoke / cinema / music room, a private Restaurant & Bar, games room, handcrafted eco gym, treetop nests, wellness spa with an ice bath and infrared sauna, a team of dedicated staff, and much more.The spaceWelcome to The Seed, where we redefine the concept of paradise by curating an unparalleled guest experience. Our ethos revolves around creating not just a stay but a tailor-made journey for each guest. It's essential to note that The Seed is exclusively available for private bookings, and the estate is only rented in its entirety. This means that when you choose The Seed, you are reserving not just rooms or villas, but the entire mega villa exclusively for your booking. Our commitment to exclusivity ensures that you have the undivided attention of our dedicated staff, a private restaurant and bar, along with all resort facilities, creating an intimate and entirely private sanctuary for your stay. At The Seed, we craft an exceptional experience that goes beyond a mere stay ‚Äì it's a journey designed exclusively for you and your nearest and dearest.EATIndulge in a culinary adventure at 'Bloom Kitchen,' our on-site private restaurant. Beyond tasting the flavors of the moment, you embark on a customized journey catering to your every craving. Championing local and sustainable products from the Karangasem region, we create a culinary experience that contributes to the vitality of the community.PLAYAt The Seed, vacations are a blend of adventure and delight. Our oversized poolside Videotron screen transforms movie nights into cinematic experiences. For the daring, located in our woven bamboo aerial nests awaits a 5-meter diving platform, perched above the pool, for those ready to embrace their inner daredevil!Venture into Villa Underground, our beachfront Rock & Roll themed villa, featuring a soundproof basement that serves as a cinema, music studio, and secret dance party headquarters. Villa Rabbithole offers a multifunctional Games Room that seamlessly transitions into a speakeasy bar for an ever-evolving entertainment experience.SLEEPVilla Underground- A Rock & Roll haven with an expansive open-plan living room, sunset view loft, fully equipped kitchen and a karaoke-friendly soundproof basement. Platinum room offers a large family friendly space sleeping up to six guests, with a King sized bed, a rooftop loft with a private balcony, and an adjoining kids room with bunk beds.Golden room features expansive ocean views, an oversized custom circular bed, gold leaf walls, and easy access to the pool and sauna.Villa Rabbithole- Two unique ensuite bedrooms adorned with local artists' murals and open air bathrooms. Both rooms are joined by a versatile games room, loaded with a stack of vintage games, darts, pool and ping pong.The Treehouse- A two-story masterpiece providing an enchanting retreat. Upstairs features a private wrap-around deck amongst the treetops, a queen size bed along with a rooftop loft, and downstairs you will find a fully equipped open air kitchen.Villa Eywa- Two large private ensuite bedrooms, joined by an open air living space suspended over pools with a glass floor and a cascading waterfall, epitomizing luxury and elegance.Gather all of your favorite people, as across all four villas we can accommodate 14 of your closest friends (up to 21 at our maximum), with plenty of shared or private spaces, each one becoming a chapter in the epic tale of your stay.GROWOur viral outdoor Jungle Gym, crafted by local artisans from wood and stone, offers a sanctuary where sweating meets serenity, blending peak performance with sustainable craftsmanship. Follow up your workout and rejuvenate at our state-of-the-art Biohacking space, featuring an ice bath and infrared sauna. Welcome to The Seed, where every day is a do-over, and the only thing better than today is tomorrow. We invite you to embrace the essence of The Seed and embark on a journey that transcends the ordinary.Guest accessThe extraordinary estate is exclusively available for those seeking a truly remarkable experience, as it can only be purchased in its entirety.Immerse yourself in the luxury of having the entire estate at your disposal, ensuring complete privacy and the freedom to explore every corner of this extraordinary oasis. Whether you're seeking a private getaway for a special occasion or a unique setting for unforgettable gatherings, the acquisition of the entire estate promises an unparalleled experience that will leave you with cherished memories for a lifetime.Other things to notePlease note that while breakfast is included, all other meals are available at an additional cost, ensuring a customized and unforgettable culinary adventure.For groups of 8 or less we offer all day ala carte dining. For larger groups we have a selection of set menu banquets to choose from, and we can tailor each menu to suit your preferences and dietary requirements.

title: Iconic 8BR Cliffside Luxury Retreat in Uluwatu
description: Welcome to Villa Anugrah, a one-of-a-kind 8-bedroom clifftop estate in Bali‚Äôs most iconic coastal destination‚ÄîUluwatu. Perched across two layers of dramatic limestone cliffs, this architectural masterpiece offers seamless indoor-outdoor living, unforgettable sunset views, and a perfect blend of luxury, soul, and privacy.Designed for elevated living and high-end entertaining, Villa Anugrah is ideal for family holidays, group retreats, intimate weddings, and private events.The space8 refined en-suite bedrooms, 25-meter ocean-facing infinity pool, private underground party room, 3 half bathroom, wedding deck and 3 with private plunge pools.
