title: 13Bed: 2 Pools 180 View Home Cinemas Yoga Gym Spas
description: This is an 13-bedroom listing consisting of an 8bedroom and a 5bedroom villa (170m apart).‚Ä¢ The 180-degree views‚Ä¢ The 2 large pools‚Ä¢ The villas‚Äô facilities including 2 home cinema rooms, 2 spas, gym, and outdoor yoga space‚Ä¢ The master bedroom with its plunge pool and bathtub‚Ä¢ The friendly 24/7 staff & the activities arranged‚Ä¢ The huge space of each villa*Weddings can also be held at the 6bed villa at extra cost*The spaceThis 13-bed listing can fit up to 26 people included in the price and an extra 9 people at extra cost (40 USD per extra bed), so a grand total of 32 people. Both villas are built on a cliff and have amazing views of Jimbaran Bay and the beach. They have various facilities including 2 home cinema rooms, 2 spas, a gym and an outdoor yoga shall.There are 13 bedrooms in total: 6 with king size beds, 2 with queen beds and 5 with twin beds. The master bedroom of the 8bed villa consists of two rooms: one private living room and one featuring the main bedroom. It also has a plunge pool. All bedrooms feature office space, private lounge area, safety deposit box, hair dryer, AC, en-suite bathroom. Most bedrooms also have private balconies, day beds, and walk-in closets ‚Äì while all bedrooms have closet space. Most en-suite bathrooms have 2 sinks and freestanding bathtubs (in addition to the shower).Price includes:‚Ä¢	Accommodation for up to 26 people included in price. Total villas‚Äô capacity is 32 people. For more than 26 people, we will place an extra bed per room at 40 USD per extra bed per night.‚Ä¢	Welcome drinks, snacks and fruits on arrival‚Ä¢	Free breakfast‚Ä¢	Nightly "cultural bedtime stories and pillow box"‚Ä¢	3 cars for pick up and drop off from/to airport‚Ä¢	Daily cleaning‚Ä¢	Daily staff available from 7am to 11pm ‚Ä¢	24 hours security‚Ä¢	Water dispenser‚Ä¢	Wifi‚Ä¢	Free pop up play for kids‚Ä¢	Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are NOT included in the price but can be arranged at extra cost, as we have an in-house chef. The grocery system includes a 20% service charge.Location:The villas are located in Jimbaran and get the best of both worlds: namely, both Jimbaran and Nusa Dua. 10 minutes from the villa, you will find Melasti and Pandawa white sand beaches. Jimbaran Beach, with its famous beach restaurants, is also in close proximity, and so is GWK Cultural Park, featuring the second tallest statue in the world. For more information about the location, refer to the neighbourhood section of this listing.DETAILED DESCRIPTION OF THE 8BED VILLA:This is a 8bed villa with an amazing 180-degree view of Jimbaran bay. The villa is spread over 6.070m2 of land, which gives access to lavish gardens. There are also various water elements throughout the villa including ponds and waterfalls. The villa itself is built on 1.230 m2 of land and features an elevator.Indonesian elements throughout the villa:Apart from its large size and the many facilities it offers ‚Äì yoga space, spa, home cinema room ‚Äì what makes this villa stand out is the distinct Indonesian decor. The owner has personally selected art pieces, sculptures and other ornaments from different places of Indonesia during his travels. Take a careful look at each room and each space in the villa, and you will get to know the distinct and colourful culture of Indonesia.Eco-friendly practices:The Long House follows eco-friendly practices, including solar panels, glass pitchers in each room, waste recycling, and the reduction of plastic bags. For detailed info please refer to the photo section (eco-friendly practices).The fancy details that cannot be left out:Outdoor yoga shala:Just as you walk outside through the grass area, you will find an outdoor yoga shala perched atop Jimbaran Hill, perfect for a sunrise or sunset yoga class. The space comfortably fits 10-12 people and has a jaw dropping view. We also provide 2 yoga mats per room, so in total, 12 yoga mats.Home cinema room:The home cinema room has an ultra-large corner sofa and a flat-screen smart TV. It is the perfect space to watch your favourite movie and relax in the air-conditioned space when outside is too hot, especially during noon time.Spa:Alternatively, you can also book a massage at the spa. There is a range of treatments here from Acupressure to Four Hand Massage to Hair Treatment and Mani Pedi.The spa features 2 massage beds, an outdoor bathtub, a guest toilet and the ‚Äòextension spa‚Äô as we call it that has private lounge space and yet another massage bed for reflexology.Gym:For the athletic ones, do not forget to visit the gym, which has a treadmill, bicycle, and freestanding weights.Chess table & library:And in case you run out of activities, there is always a chess table and a library to keep you occupied.Pool area:Once you take the elevator and reach the upper floor, you cannot help but gaze at this jaw-dropping view. This is where you will find the 16*5 m infinity pool.Dining areas, bar, living rooms and kitchen:One thing is sure: you will not run out of space to chill and mingle at the villa. In total, there are three different areas where one can sit and stare at the view while enjoying a glass of cold Chardonnay and some tasty Indonesian or Western food.Next to the pool, there is a bar‚Äîperfect for one too many cocktails‚Äîand two living room areas. Yes, both have the 180-degree view of Jimbaran we have been talking about. The bar is fully equipped with a mini fridge, sink, glasses, and three stools.In an enclosed air-conditioned space, you can enjoy a tasty meal at the 12pax dining area with glass doors overlooking the pool. Next door you will find the fully equipped kitchen (with coffee machine, oven, 2 fridges, toaster, rice cooker, stove, water dispenser even a washing machine ‚Äì not that common in Bali ‚Äì and the list goes on).The villa offers a chef at extra cost, as well as cooking classes. Feel free to experiment with Indonesian cuisine either on your own or with the help of the professionals.At the other end of the villa lies yet another lounge space with two corner sofas and a 6pax dining table.There is also a guest toilet.The huge garden and grass area:The villa is surrounded by a huge garden and grass area perfect for relaxing and enjoying the sunset. There is also a shaded sitting space.The bedrooms:There are 8 bedrooms in total: three with king-size beds, two with queen-size beds, and three with twin beds each.The master bedroom is a masterpiece of its own and consists of two rooms. Hurry to pick this gem once you arrive at the villa. It has a private office space and lounge area, but that‚Äôs not all. As you walk to your private bedroom, you will face yet another office space and a comfy sofa overlooking the Jimbaran area. Did we mention there is a plunge pool and a bathtub with the best view in the house?Each bedroom is named and themed after an area of Indonesia: Bali, Sumba, West Java, East Java, Lombok, and Sumatra. For more information about Indonesia's wonderful culture, you can look at the guest book on the office desk of each room, which has information on the different ornaments and materials and how they are linked to each part of Indonesia.Needless to say that every bedroom has office space, private lounge area, safety deposit box, hair dryer, AC, en-suite bathroom and private balcony. Most bedrooms also feature day beds and walk in closets ‚Äì while all bedrooms have closet space. Most en-suite bathrooms have 2 sinks and freestanding bathtubs (in addition to the shower).Interesting details:The villa is also eco-friendly and uses solar panels.The en-suite bathroom of the Sumba bedroom has Onyx decorated mirrors and Onyx sinks.DETAILED DESCRIPTION OF THE 5BED VILLA:Entrance:As you walk through the entrance by the cobblestone pond, you will find a spacious reception area with traditional Balinese decor.The Pool & Outdoor area:You cannot but be mesmerized by the pool area. Jimbaran Bay, stretching all the way to the beach, is literally at your feet. Choose one of the sun loungers or why not dine in style in the outside dining area and gaze at the splendid view.Next to the pool is a grass area perfect for the kids to run around before diving in.And of course, there is a bbq and bbq equipment waiting for you.The home cinema room:It is there for much-wanted movie marathons. An ultra-comfortable corner sofa, a smart flat-screen TV, and large picture windows overlooking the pool and Jimbaran Bay are all you need for a relaxing afternoon with your little ones.The spa room:The spa room comprises of two massage beds and calls for endless massages. As you know massages in Bali are value for money, so what are you waiting for? Book one!The living room/dining area:One thing is sure this villa is not short of space. And this becomes particularly obvious once you step into the dining and living room areas.You cannot help but stare through the glass doors by the pool area and the jaw-dropping view of Jimbaran Bay.The white ultra-large corner sofa in the living room calls for a chilled Chardonnay, while the 10-pax dining area is too tempting to miss. Order an in-house Indonesian dinner and enjoy the view.There is also a library and a guest toilet in this area.The Western style kitchen:The kitchen is definitely large and equipped with all the Western amenities you might need. The huge marble island in the middle might awaken your love for cooking‚Ä¶ or not! Whatever the case, expect to find here whatever you would need from Nespresso machine to toaster, fridge, oven, microwave, stove, cutlery and the list goes on.Bedrooms:There are 5 large bedrooms in total: 3 with king-size beds and 2 with twin beds.Do select the master bedroom. It is to die for! It is ultra-large, with a wooden floor and glass doors that lead to your private balcony with an oh-what-a-view of Jimbaran Bay. Needless to say, there is a luxury en-suite bathroom with a bathtub and shower.The bedrooms are named and themed after the five elements: iron, wood, water, fire, and earth. All bedrooms are ultra-spacious and feature AC, walk-in closets, desk space, private lounge space, deposit box, and en-suite luxury bathrooms with bathtubs and showers. The bedrooms on the first floor have private balconies with jaw-dropping views of Jimbaran and outside rain showers.Garage:Last but not least, the villa features a garage.Guest accessPrivate 8bed and 5bed villas 170metres awayOther things to noteThe staff is here to arrange a wide variety of activities ranging from Balinese cooking classes, to workshops for making Canang offerings, to Yoga and Meditation classes. Some other interesting activities include the Water Purification Ceremony, not at the touristic Tirta Empul temple but at the actualhome of a Balian elder just down in the village.

title: Tropical Oasis near Canggu - Villa Levante
description: Welcome to Villa Levante, part of the curated House of Winds villa collection in Umalas ‚Äî a contemporary tropical sanctuary designed by Biombo Architects.Completed in 2023, this three-bedroom villa is bathed in natural light and built around a 25-meter pool, blending elegant geometry, warmth and openness. Positioned in a quiet corner of Umalas, just minutes from Canggu and Seminyak, Villa Levante offers privacy, serenity and effortless flow for travelers who value design and calm.The spaceSpread across 400 square meters, Villa Levante is structured around its sunlit 25-meter swimming pool, which links two distinct wings:Living Wing ‚Äì Sunken lounge with custom seating & Bluetooth audio ‚Äì Dining space filled with daylight ‚Äì Modern kitchen with premium appliancesSleeping Wing ‚Äì Master bedroom with king bed, ensuite indoor-outdoor bath and circular soaking tub ‚Äì Two guest bedrooms with king beds, direct pool access and open-air en-suitesNatural textures, high ceilings and sliding glass panels keep the interiors breezy and bright. The villa is ideal for couples, small groups, or anyone seeking inspiration in simplicity.Guest accessYou‚Äôll have full private access to the entire villa, garden, pool and all indoor and outdoor facilities.No shared spaces. Total privacy.Other things to note‚Ä¢ The villa features 3 spacious bedrooms, comfortably hosting 6 guests‚Ä¢ With extra beds, the villa can accommodate up to 8 people‚Ä¢ 400 m¬≤ plot with 260 m¬≤ built space‚Ä¢ Fully equipped kitchen with premium appliances and coffee maker‚Ä¢ High-speed WiFi and 4G mobile coverage throughout the villa‚Ä¢ Smart TV with streaming services ‚Ä¢ Bluetooth HI-FI speakers in lounge‚Ä¢ Private outdoor parking‚Ä¢ Optional extras: in-villa breakfast, private chef, spa treatments, yoga sessions (on request)Part of the House of Winds Bali complex, the villa can be combined with others (Villa FEH, Can Maestro, Villa Xaloc) to form larger retreats of 6, 9, or 12 bedrooms ‚Äî perfect for family gatherings, wellness stays or group events.You can find and book them all in our profile, House Of Winds Bali.

title: Balian Prana : Luxury meets Majestic Indian Ocean
description: Balian Prana is an exquisite luxury villa nestled on the breathtaking coastline of the Indian Ocean. With its stunning location, this villa offers an unparalleled experience of tranquillity and natural beauty,  an idyllic escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Bask in our outdoors longer, take a swim in the 25m infinity pool and feel the ocean breeze on your balcony facing a 180  stunning  Indian Ocean view.  Enjoy the magnificent sunset.The spaceSpread across a vast area, Balian Prana boasts spacious and elegantly designed living spaces that seamlessly blend modern comforts with traditional Balinese architecture. The villa features multiple bedrooms with their own en-suite bathroom and large garden shower patios, each offering panoramic ocean views, ensuring a serene and peaceful stay.The villa's interior is adorned with tasteful furnishings and intricate Balinese artwork, creating an epitome of low-key luxury and sophistication. The open-plan living and dining areas seamlessly transition between indoor and outdoor spaces, allowing guests to enjoy the gentle ocean breeze and the mesmerizing sunset.Balian Prana's outdoor area is a true oasis, featuring its private 25-metre infinity pool that seems to merge with the ocean horizon. The meticulously landscaped gardens offer a serene setting for relaxation and rejuvenation. Guests can indulge in a variety of outdoor activities, including yoga sessions, massage, sunbathing or just  walking  at sunset on our almost private  10 Km Mejan Beach at 5 minutes  down the hill from the villa Dwi the Villa Manager and his dedicated staff ensure that every need is met, providing personalized service and attention to detail. From arranging your transfer,  massages and renting a car or scooter to organising excursions to nearby attractions, the staff goes above and beyond to create a memorable and luxurious stay.Our cook Risa can also organise your meals on demand.Guest accessGuests will have access to the whole Balian Prana Estate

title: 40% Off! Yoga Shala Steam Room Jacuzzi Car& Driver
description: 5bed luxury villa built in November 2022 in 980sqm of living space‚Ä¢	This is the House of Light for a good reason: staircase, ONYX wall & whole house lit by nighttime ‚Ä¢	Prime location: 50metres to Caf√© del Mar‚Ä¢	10m pool with rain curtain ‚Ä¢	Yoga Shala AI massage chair Steam room TV room ‚Ä¢	Master bedroom: private bar, walk-in closet&jacuzzi ‚Ä¢	8 UHD TVs+Netflix‚Ä¢	Huge double-glazed windows ‚Ä¢	Free Pajero Sport with driver ‚Ä¢	Reverse osmosis water treatment system‚Ä¢	300mbps fiber optic WIFIThe space*Please note that the villa is located in a residential area and music needs to be switched off at 10.30pm. DJs are not allowed at the premises of the villa*ENHANCED HYGIENE STANDARDS:‚Ä¢ All employees are fully vaccinated (have already received 2nd vaccine dose).‚Ä¢ All employees follow social distancing rules wherever possible and regularly sanitise and wash their hands.‚Ä¢ The villa is thoroughly disinfected after each check out.LOCATION:The villa is walking distance (50 metres) to Berawa beach and the famous Caf√© Del Mar. It is also in the heart of Berawa ‚Äì the place to be post COVID. It is a short walk away (270 metres) from Popular (Western supermarket) as well as in very close proximity to newly opened cafe and organic wholefoods store Nourish, restaurants, bars such as Behind The Green Door cocktail lounge and Glo Day Spa (highly recommended for a rejuvenating massage).THE VILLA ITSELF:The villa stands out thanks to its modern architecture with the huge, double-glazed windows giving the space an expansive feel. Entering the villa, you cannot help but notice the rain curtain water feature of the 10m lap pool, the artefact of a light fixture in the open-plan dining area and the perfectly lit Onyx wall by the barbecue/open air lounge next to the pool. The sun loungers in the grass area next to the pool are perfect for a morning suntan. Wait until night to see the rain curtain light up in different colours. Sunset time calls for a cold Chardonnay while preparing some T bone steaks at the barbecue. Sit back and enjoy the view of the Onyx wall that perfectly lights up the space, while the kids can run around at the grass area nearby or swim at the pool.The barbecue/open air lounge area is fully equipped with a large fridge to store drinks and food, a sink, a super deluxe stainless steel gas barbecue, a huge comfortable built-in corner sofa and ceiling fans by the glass roof. We should not forget to mention the JBL party box 1000 portable speaker! There are also 2 showers next to the pool.THE OPEN PLAN LIVING AREA:Dining area:As you enter the villa, the 10seater dining area with its impressive light fixture next to the dry kitchen that screams perfection will have you at hello. It is also the perfect setting for special occasions. The villa chef is ready to assist and prepare a dinner that your guests will remember. The pool view straight from the huge double-glazed windows adds to the scenery.Step-down living room:The step-down living room next door with a glass window on the same level as the pool, which gives the sensation you are floating on water. One cannot help but marvel at the two perfectly lit portraits of monks from renowned photographer and artist Ben Kustow. Both kitchens are fully equipped, while the wet kitchen also has a chilled wine cabinet (apart from the fridge/freezer). There is a laundry room next to the wet kitchen with both a washing machine and a dryer. THE UPSTAIRS OPEN SPACE LOUNGE AREA:As you walk up to the 3rd floor you are greeted by some immense windows with the best view followed by huge white corridors with paintings by renowned artist Neil Adams. Reach the 3rd floor and you will find an open-air lounge area with a jaw dropping view. Stand up and you can see the ocean. Drinks are served from the bar next door and placed at the Onyx table that perfectly lights up the space.We cannot help but mention the juice bar following the Onyx theme of the house with yet another impressive portrait by famous photographer Ben Kustow.THE FANCY DETAILS THAT CANNOT BE LEFT OUT:Yoga shala:Next to the juice bar, lies an open space yoga Shala with a wooden floor that can fit up to 10 people (yoga mats available for free). Bonsai trees and a statue of Buddha call for endless yoga sessions. (Please refer to the extra services at extra cost section to find information on the different types of yoga offered at the villa).Massage & steam room:Release any stress from the day in the steam room, indulge in a rejuvenating massage on the massage bed and sit back in the AI massage chair while watching your favourite movie on yet another ultra-high-definition smart TV with Netflix.The massage room upstairs features a steam room, an AI massage chair and a massage bed. For the AI massage chair, you do not need to press any buttons, just ask for what you want and the chair will obey your orders. The Spa also features a bathroom with a shower.Entertainment room:An entertainment room with a 70inch ultra-high-definition smart TV with Netflix for some much-needed movie marathons that can be found on the ground floor. The entertainment room has a comfortable 5-seater corner sofa, mini bar with fridge to store beverages and drinks, a piano and a separate desk. You can also find board games and books for kids. The best view at the 4th floor:The 4th floor of the villa boasts the best view. This is the place to go if you want some peace and quiet. Sit back on the rattan swing chair or bean bag and elevate your Shisha experience by placing real fruits inside.THE MASTER BEDROOM SUITE:The master bedroom is the epitome of luxury: a super king size bed, a 65inch ultra-high-definition smart TV with Netflix, a home cinema with JBL portable wireless speakers and your very own bar where you can prepare your morning coffee and have a sip on your private balcony facing the pool and garden.Take some sparkling wine and head over to the en-suite ultra luxury marble bathroom. Fill in the jacuzzi, put on your favourite Netflix movie (yes another smart TV here) and you are all set.The en-suite bathroom also features a closed glass cabinet with 2 showers, powder area with a marble glam desk, 2 sinks and a separated toilet room.We cannot help but mention the walk-in closet that is a room on its own. We are talking pure Hollywood style with a closet island, additional shelves, drawers for jewelry, watches and small items, sofa benches on both sides, dedicated shoe cabinets, elegant lighting and 2 full length mirrors by the sofa benches. THE BEDROOM SUITES:The villa has 5 bedrooms suites in total. Apart from the master bedroom suite, there are 2 other bedrooms in the 2nd floor and two guest bedroom suites next to the garden and pool area.There are 4 super king size double beds in 4 bedroom suites and 1 bedroom suite with 2 semi double beds.All bedroom suites feature ultra-high-definition smart Samsung TVs with Netflix, ACs, safety deposit boxes, walk-in closets, private lounge areas with sofa beds, ample desk spaces and of course en-suite luxury marble bathrooms with 2 sinks, a bathtub and closed shower cabinets.Last but not least all 3 bedroom suites at the second floor have private balconies.OTHER THINGS TO NOTE: ‚Ä¢	The villa features a private garage area that can fit up to 2 cars.‚Ä¢	There is also outside parking space for motorbikes.‚Ä¢	High speed fiber optic WIFI throughout the villa (300mbps guaranteed).‚Ä¢	The villa also has a generator in case of an electricity cut.‚Ä¢	It is fully air conditioned with central cooling units and AC in each and every room and corridor.‚Ä¢	The entrance has smart lock system.‚Ä¢	The villa has water treatment system (reverse osmosis system) which makes water drinkable from everywhere in the house (even the bathrooms - apart from the pool).PRICE INCLUDES:‚Ä¢	Accommodation for up to 11 people in the villa‚Äôs 5 luxury bedroom suites. For the 11th person, we will place an extra bed (please enter number of adults in booking request as the extra bed will come at extra cost that will be automatically calculated in price)‚Ä¢	Welcome drinks & chilled towels upon arrival‚Ä¢	Daily breakfast from 7am until 11am ‚Ä¢	Daily staff‚Ä¢	Villa manager‚Ä¢	Turndown service‚Ä¢	Daily cleaning‚Ä¢	Linen/towel change every 2 days‚Ä¢	Nightly security (8pm to 8am)‚Ä¢	7seater Mitsubishi Pajero Sport with driver available 8 hours per day Monday to Saturday (petrol comes at extra cost, for every extra hour after 5pm there is extra charge equal to 100.000 IDR/hour)‚Ä¢	High speed fiber optic WIFI throughout the villa (300mbps guaranteed).‚Ä¢	8 ultra-high-definition smart flat screen TVs with Netflix: a 70inch one in the entertainment room, a 65inch in the master bedroom suite, 55inch in all other bedroom suites and two 25inch TVs in the massage room and en-suite luxury bathroom of the master bedroom suite‚Ä¢	JBL partybox 1000 portable speaker ‚Ä¢	Water dispensers with hot and cold options‚Ä¢	Family friendly amenities: baby cot, high chair, board games, books‚Ä¢	Private garage‚Ä¢	Pool maintenance 3 times per week‚Ä¢	Gardener 6 times per week‚Ä¢	Pest control 1 time per week‚Ä¢	Yoga mats *For monthly bookings no breakfast is included in price*EXTRA SERVICES AT EXTRA COST:‚Ä¢	Yoga lessons at the upstairs yoga Shala. We offer Ashtanga, Hatha, Vinyasa and Yin yoga‚Ä¢	Spa treatments including massages and manicure/pedicure‚Ä¢	Shisha service (different flavours and real fruits placed within the Shisha)‚Ä¢	Floating breakfast‚Ä¢	Lunch & dinner options‚Ä¢	Motorbike rentals‚Ä¢	Laundry/dry cleaning‚Ä¢	Surf lessonsGuest accessPrivate villa - full guest access

title: Jeeva Saba - Luxury 8-BR Estate
description: Find it all here at Jeeva Saba. With sweeping breathtaking views of the Indian Ocean of Bali's Islands, the private Jeeva Saba Estate captures the dramatic beauty and spirit of Bali within a beachfront hideaway of exceptional design and luxury.With the ancient Banyan tree and blissful Anyar temple at the estate‚Äôs entrance, and the nearly one hectare of landscaped oceanfront grounds, the Jeeva Saba Bali Estate provides a spacious and peaceful environment for a truly unique Bali experience.The spaceThe eight ensuite bedrooms at Jeeva Saba Bali Estate are located in the Tree House, the Beach House, or the Coast House. All bedrooms have luxurious king-size four poster beds hand carved by Indonesian artisans and are fully air-conditioned. Bedding and amenities are of the same fine quality that marks Jeeva Resorts.The Tree HouseThe Tree House is the smallest of the pavilions and consists of a large master bedroom suite and a separate studio bedroom suite with high wood and bamboo ceilings. Both suites have separate terraces with long relaxing sofas that face the ocean. Both the master and studio suites have a seating area that can be converted to comfortably sleep two children. The master suite has a large private enclosed courtyard, a semi-outdoor shower and bath, and contains an antique Madura four-poster carved bed. Both the master and studio suites have flat screen televisions.The Beach HouseThe two-story Beach House is at the center of Jeeva Saba and is the largest pavilion in the estate. The two master suite bedrooms are on the upstairs floor of the Beach House with large terraces and daybeds that offer unparalleled views of the ocean, islands and mountains. The views from the master suites in the Beach House may be amongst the most dramatic views in Bali.The two master suites in the Beach House are identical and flank the interior courtyard. Both suites have high pitched ceilings in the traditional Balinese style with a wall of windows that offer views of either the beach or rice paddies. The wood and marble double sink bathrooms have both indoor and outdoor showers and large outdoor bath tubs set on a private terrace. The Beach House suites are furnished in a luxurious, yet simple style, that exudes an air of elegance and romance.The Coast HouseThe Coast House overlooks the beach, the seaside lawn and infinity pool, and up the coast to Mount Agung and the mountains of East Bali. The rear of the Coast House looks out over rice paddies. The Coast House features four ensuite master bedrooms: two upstairs and two downstairs.The two upstairs suite rooms have two full glass walls with direct views of the ocean and the mountains of eastern Bali. The upstairs suites have large private terraces and extra large bath and dressing rooms with double sinks, high pitched ceilings and open air bath tubs and showers. The downstairs bedrooms consist of one suite room and a junior suite room. The suite bedroom has direct ocean views, a private terrace, a flat screen television and a double sink bathroom with a semi-outdoor shower and bathtub. The junior suite bedroom has views of the ocean and pool, and a flat screen television. This bedroom can be converted to a children‚Äôs bunk room.LayoutUpon entering the front reception bale through the original Madura ‚ÄòGood Fortune‚Äô gate, guarded by two traditional antique carved stone Prambanan lions, a broad pebble pathway leads between two large rectangular ‚Äòelephant‚Äô pools to the imposing front entrance with recycled four-meter high doors salvaged from a demolished old Dutch school in Java. The front entrance opens onto an internal courtyard that links the main common rooms with the three main living pavilions. The pavilions, the Tree House, the Beach House, and the Coast House, are designed in an L shape with all pavilions having direct sea, mountain and island views. The infinity pool and two bales are across the main lawn from the Beach House and directly on the beachfront.Grounds & Floor PlanThe Jeeva Saba Bali Estate is designed for relaxation and to highlight the natural beauty of Bali‚Äôs east coast. The 25-meter infinity pool and dining bale face the beach and mirror the Beach House and the Temple House. A pool deck runs along the entire length of the infinity pool and provides access to the side garden area and the beachfront. The Estate has a total of eight full baths and three half baths.A fourth pavilion houses the gym and Jeeva Saba‚Äôs large, restaurant standard kitchen with staff and service areas. As the Jeeva Saba Estate is made for entertaining, the dining bale includes a wet bar and drinks station to service the pool area.Guest accessLocated at Saba Beach, Jeeva Saba Bali offers a beachfront retreat amidst large landscaped gardens. It boasts an outdoor pool, gym and a shared lounging area with stunning views of the sea and greenery. Free Wi-Fi is accessible in all areas.Jeeva Saba Bali is a 10-minute drive from Bali Marine & Safari Park, while Padang Bai Harbour and Ngurah Rai International Airport are both a 35-minute drive away.Tastefully fitted with elegant interiors, spacious air-conditioned rooms feature mosquito nets and a seating area with plush sofas. Guests can enjoy garden or sea views from the private terrace or balcony. En suite bathrooms offer free bath amenities.For guests' recreational enjoyment, Jeeva Saba provides massage service, billiards facilities and a shared media room with a flat-screen TV and DVD player. Laundry and daily maid services are also among the on-site conveniences.Room service and shared kitchen facilities as well as dining area are available upon advance reservation.Other things to noteDiningA full European/American style breakfast is included as part of a stay at Jeeva Saba. An Asian style breakfast can be arranged upon request.Lunch and dinner at Jeeva Saba are prepared by guests‚Äô request. Jeeva Saba offers an a la carte menu at set prices for a variety of Western or Asian lunch and dinner dishes. There is also a list of select bottles of wine that Jeeva Saba maintains in stock. Jeeva Saba staff are also happy to make suggestions for local Indonesian and Balinese dishes to to add some local flavor to a meal.WellnessJeeva Saba can easily accommodate business meetings in either the air-conditioned formal or informal dining rooms for up to 20 people. The seaside location on Saba beach guarantees full privacy with ample parking in front of the villa. Our luxurious oceanfront property is a popular destination for small corporate events and retreats. Take advantage of amenities like full Wi-Fi access, multiple air conditioned venues, eight private on-site bedrooms, a private chef, event security and more.Our Bali resort is also a popular destination for retreats, both intimate and on a larger scale.The seaside lawn, the pool deck, the Beach House upstairs terrace and the beach have been the preferred venues for yoga activities. At Jeeva Saba you don‚Äôt even need to bring your yoga mat!Our experienced staff works with two well-known Balinese yoga gurus who have extensive experience practicing and teaching yoga both in Indonesia and abroad. We are happy to arrange individual classes or a multi-day program at your request.Jeevaniya SpaRefresh, relax and renew. That is the ultimate goal of your time at Jeeva Saba. Private massages may be arranged in the on-site massage room or on one of the resort‚Äôs many private terraces. We are happy to arrange one or multiple massage therapists to serve the needs of your guests throughout your stay. Our talented local therapists are well-trained in the art of both Western and Eastern massage modalities as well as traditional Indonesian and Balinese therapies. Additional spa services can be accommodated upon request.Open daily 09am - 10pmSunrise YogaIndonesia has long been a pilgrimage for avid yogis. Our scenic Jeeva Saba on Bali‚Äôs east coast is no exception. Choose your favorite location on the property, whether it be on the beach, lawn or on one of the many terraces.Our luxury estate staff will assist in arranging a private yoga instructor in your preferred discipline.Fitness CenterThe Beach House at Jeeva Saba offers a small yet well-equipped gym with cardio and weight equipment for our guest‚Äôs personal use during their visit to Bali.Should you require the services of a personal trainer, please let our estate staff know, and we will be happy to arrange for a session in the gym or anywhere on our oceanfront property.Capacity16 Adults (eight ensuite bedrooms with king-size beds). Extra beds available on request and charged at USD 55++ per night for adults and USD 40++ per night for children. Extra beds fit comfortably in the bedrooms. (++ all prices subject to government tax & government service charge)Living AreaPool bale, dining bale, living room, formal dining room, informal ‚Äògreat‚Äô room, media room, game room, massage room, gym, catering kitchen, library, terraces.Infinity Pool25 x 7 meters with large deckStaffDedicated Villa manager, private chef, butler service, housekeeping, security, gardeners and driver. Additional staff (babysitters, masseuses, yoga) available on request and at an extra charge.EntertainmentComplimentary wifi, satellite TV, DVD player, surround-sound system, play station, sound dock, Sonos player with iPod connectivity.FamiliesJeeva Saba is well-equipped for families. Amenities include: baby cot, high chair, car seat (on request), DVDs, play station, board games, croquet set, badminton, volleyball, bicycles and access to horseback riding and surfing within one km of the Estate.TransportA seven-seater car and driver are available on a complimentary basis for up to eight hours a day excluding gasoline.Weddings & EventsEvents for up to 400 people sitting down or more with buffet style dining on the large beachfront lawns. Smaller groups can also be accommodated on the upstairs covered terrace. Jeeva Saba Bali Estate offers wedding and honeymoon packages as well. For event or function, we can arrange for food & beverages, and depend on menu request. The price is vary starting from IDR390K++ per person, generator for sound and lighting at IDR3,000K per event, and also a cash security deposit at IDR10,000K.Passionate Stewards of the EnvironmentOur dedication to environmental stewardship and support of local communities and culture through responsible tourism is reflected in every aspect of Jeeva Saba.Barefoot Luxury in Every RoomRooms and grounds are thoughtfully and spaciously designed for intimate luxury ensconced in stunning natural settings. Expect bedrooms with direct ocean views, and nearly one hectare of landscaped oceanfront grounds.High Touch Service with Authentic CharmWe are committed to ensuring the finest guest experience with our exceptional dining and exemplary service marked by Jeeva‚Äôs gracious hospitality.Fill Your Days With Endless Activities, Or Nothing At AllFrom the moment you arrive, you‚Äôll be immersed in the warmth of the Jeeva Resorts where every aspect is focused on your comfort and well-being.

title: Contemporary Luxury 7BR Villa In Canggu
description: Experience the epitome of luxury at our stunning sustainable villa in Canggu. Immerse yourself in the serenity of our pool with a view, surrounded by lush gardens. Embrace the perfect blend of comfort and elegance at our sustainable villa in Canggu.

title: 5-bedroom luxury near restaurants & beach
description: Villa Bengawan is a stylish, 5-bedroom luxury private villa situated in the heart of Pererenan, the most exclusive area of Canggu, Bali. Perfect for a family or group of friends with a desire to experience Bali in style while being at the heart of the area's upmarket restaurants, bars and cafes and within walking distance to the beach. Our professional staff will cater to your every need while you enjoy the large swimming pool, extensive lawns, outdoor gym and exotic gardens.The spaceVilla Bengawan's open-plan living and dining areas open onto a wide lawn and the swimming pool.The villa has 5 separate bedroom suites, each with their own large bathroom. All suites feature a work desk, while one suite is ideal for children with 2 single beds, which can be reconfigured to a King Size bed. The entire property offers privacy and serenity despite being in the centre of Pererenan's fashionable restaurant district.Guest accessThe villa has off-street parking for up to 4 cars and is within easy walking distance of some of Bali's newest and most interesting restaurants and cafes, including Mostly, Brunch Club, Touch√©, OpenHouse, Woods, the Shady Fox, Red Gunpowder, Brekky, RiZe, Shelter, Baked, honey, and 7AM Bakers.Other things to noteSheets are changed every 3 days and towels are provided for both the pool and the bathrooms. Please hang any towels you may wish to re-use on the towel racks and those for the wash, please leave in the laundry basket.If you have any personal items to wash please alert the staff. Please kindly make sure the air conditioning is switched off when you leave the rooms as we like to be as eco-friendly as possible.#Free airport pick-up included, one car only.##Early check-in and late check-out subject to availability, please contact in advance. 10 am to 2 pm (check-in) or 12 pm to 4 pm (check-out) at 50% of nightly rate. Check-in before 10 am or check-out after 4 pm full nightly charge applies.#

title: 12BR Ubud Family Villas| Home Gym,Spa & Yoga Shala
description: Imagine arriving at Villa Slow Paradise and Villa Wellness Paradise, a beautifully landscaped estate with two connecting villas and a yoga shala that can accommodate up to 24 guests. As you drive down the smoothly paved driveway, you can already feel that these are the sanctuary to create lasting memories with your loved ones in Bali.The spaceThe first villa, Villa Slow Paradise, is a six-bedroom oasis of casual elegance offering a truly unforgettable experience for our guests. This villa has a spacious outdoor area made for you to relax in, and an open floor plan where the living room, kitchen, dining room, storage room, and guest toilet are within easy reach.Next door, Villa Wellness Paradise is another six-bedroom retreat that is as inviting and blends casual elegance with modern convenience. The spacious outdoor area is the perfect setting for creating cherished memories, and the well-equipped open floor plan is decorated with comfortable furnishings for our guests to enjoy.Both villas have versatile double beds in each bedroom, designed to cater to your unique needs and preferences. These beds offer the perfect balance of comfort and flexibility, allowing you to transform them into single beds whenever necessary. All bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms for your ultimate privacy and convenience.Villa Slow Paradise and Villa Wellness Paradise are located less than 1 km from the renowned Monkey Forest, the vibrant heart of Ubud. This prime location offers a gateway to the rich traditions, captivating sights, and enchanting atmosphere that define this cultural hub. Spend the day visiting Bali's many temples, art galleries, and shops.After a long day of exploring Bali, come back to Villa Wellness Paradise and Villa Slow Paradise to relax. Take a dip in the infinity pools, maintain your fitness routine in the well-equipped gyms, or indulge in the spa facility with two comfortable massage beds available in each villa. End your day with a stargazing session on the rooftop terrace.A shared yoga shala is accessible from the parking area of both villas. There is a changing room with a shower provided to freshen up before or after your practice. This spacious yoga shala is well-ventilated with plenty of natural light; making it perfect for a yoga or meditation session. Yoga mats are provided for guests to use during their stay.We understand the importance of convenience, which is why we offer a washing machine in our storage area. You can easily take care of your laundry needs, ensuring a hassle-free and comfortable stay throughout your time at Villa Slow Paradise and Villa Wellness Paradise.Whether you seek a peaceful retreat or a fun-filled family vacation, these two-story buildings ensure ample space for large groups or families surrounded by lush gardens and stunning views of the rice fields. Book Villa Slow Paradise & Villa Wellness Paradise now for the ultimate tropical getaway at Nyuh Kuning, Ubud.(Please make note that your Netflix and Youtube accounts will be used to login, please ensure that you are to log out before you check out of the villa, this is to ensure that your account will not be used by anybody else in the future)Enjoy a lovely, private and unique experience with us!External Vendor Policy: To ensure the villa's equipment and your safety, our dedicated team manages all vendor services within the villa to provide you with complete peace of mind. Using external vendors is strictly prohibited and will result in a fine of IDR 2.000.000.At your service: The villa is fully staffed with villa attendance, gardener, pool caretaker and an onsite manager, available to take care of you. The staffs do not live on the property, but are available when needed.Guests can use the following things:-Drinking water is provided-TVs- Microwave, refrigerator, stove and other kitchen utensils-Basically, everything that is on the propertySTAFF AND SERVICES INCLUDEDA dedicated Villa ManagerA villa hostDaily housekeepingGarden/ pool staffEXTRA COSTS (advance notice may be required):- Villa pre-stocking: Groceries and beverages (subject to an additional service fee).- Breakfast by Villa Host (Ubud ONLY): IDR 120.000 per person per meal as a cover charge (minimum 4 guests).- Floating breakfast: IDR 150.000 per tray (for up to 4 guests).- In-villa Chef: Arranged through our trusted partner (see FAQs for details).- Airport transfers: Convenient pick-up and drop-off services.- Driving service: Reliable and professional drivers available on request.- Activities and excursions: Customized experiences to explore Bali.- In-villa massage services: Relax and rejuvenate in your villa's comfort.- Baby-sitting service: Experienced caretakers for your little ones.- Security guards: Additional safety and peace of mind.- Flowers arrangements: Custom designs to enhance your stay.Guest accessOTHER POINTS TO NOTEVilla Slow Paradise and Villa Wellness Paradise have a shared yoga room, accessible from the parking lot of both villas. This room is equipped with a speaker to add a musical ambience to your practice. There's also a changing room with a shower, so you can freshen up before or after your session. What's more, this spacious yoga room is well ventilated and benefits from abundant natural light, making it ideal for a yoga or meditation session. By linking the two villas, each with 6 bedrooms, you can easily accommodate up to 24 guests for a memorable experience in Nyuh Kuning, Ubud.Road accessPlease note that road access to many villas in Bali, including this one, is often narrow and best suited for motorcycles or small cars. For larger vehicles, such as a Hiace with 14 seats, access is possible but may require careful navigation. Should you need assistance with transportation arrangements, our team will be happy to help ensure a smooth arrival and departure.ROAD ACCESS CONDITIONVilla Wellness Paradise owner has made a superbly paved access road in providing a smooth and seamless arrival. Designed with utmost precision and care, this road allows vehicles to navigate effortlessly, eliminating any concerns or challenges related to accessibility.Other things to note**Please note that currently a construction project is currently underway next to the villa. There is a possibility that the noise from construction equipment will be heard up to the villa. Additionally, with the workers scheduled to operate from 8 AM to 6 PM, we anticipate minimal disturbances during the night and early morning hours, ensuring a tranquil experience for our guests. We apologize for the inconvenience that may occur during your stay.**Natural Ventilation: Experience the refreshing breeze of Bali with our open-air living spaces, designed to maximize natural airflow, providing an eco-friendly alternative to air conditioning or fans.Vendor Services: To ensure the villa's equipment and your safety, our dedicated team manages all vendor services within the villa, including spa, personal training, decorations, private chefs, yoga, photography, and villa equipment. Using external vendors is strictly prohibited and will result in a fine of IDR 2.000.000.Waste Management: Contribute to Bali's sustainable efforts by participating in our waste separation program. We provide three bins for organic, inorganic, and residual waste in your villa.Sustainable Amenities: We provide Sensatia Botanicals, a locally founded skincare brand, as bathroom amenities (hand soap, body soap, shampoo, and conditioner). Made in Bali with 100% natural, cruelty-free ingredients, this partnership reflects our support for sustainability and local initiatives, including plastic recycling and beach cleanups.Natural Charm: Our villas embrace Bali's tropical beauty, where the sounds of nature‚Äîgeckos and insects‚Äîcreate a serene ambiance. The open design may occasionally welcome wildlife, despite regular pest control. Geckos, symbols of good luck in Balinese culture, and other creatures are vital to the ecosystem.  Cultural Respect: In Ubud and Bukit, monkeys may be present‚Äîplease refrain from feeding or interacting with them. Surrounding landscapes, like jungles, rice fields, and local farms (e.g., duck, chicken or pig), are not part of the villa property and may be accessed by residents, with changes beyond our control. We appreciate your respect for Bali‚Äôs natural and cultural heritage.FAQsQ: What time is the check-in policy?A: Our dedicated staff ensures a smooth check-in process. Check-in starts at 14:00 for 1-3 bedroom villas and at 15:00 for 4-6 bedroom villas. Luggage drop-off is welcome after 11:00 as we prepare your villa. Please note, a late check-in fee of IDR 200.000 applies for arrivals after 20:00 to cover staff overtime, as our staff does not stand by the villa all the time.Q: What time is the check-out policy?A: Our check-out time is at 11:00 by default. Late check-out is subject to availability and involves extra charge. Please note that for any late check-out between 11:00 ‚Äì 18:00, an additional charge of 50% of the Daily Villa Rate will apply. Any check-out after 18:00, will be charged at a full day's Daily Villa Rate. If you need to store your luggage after check-out time, you are welcome to do so.Q: Is breakfast included in the booking? How do we order the chef's service?A: Breakfast is not included in the room rate. However, you can easily arrange breakfast by contacting our reservation or concierge team. We offer a variety of menu options prepared by our dedicated private chef, right in your villa. The cost is IDR 160.000 per person, with a minimum order for 5 guests. You can indulge in a floating breakfast for an additional fee of IDR 150.000 per tray.For lunch and dinner, we offer enhanced services, including set menus, live BBQ cooking, ethnic cuisines, and even fine dining prepared by a Michelin-star chef, all cooked in the villa. Prices for lunch and dinner start at IDR 450.000 per person. Please note that terms and conditions apply for booking.Additionally, our villa features a fully equipped kitchen, allowing you the flexibility to prepare your own meals if you prefer. Whether you choose to dine in or savor a chef‚Äôs touch, our team is here to ensure a seamless and enjoyable experience.Q: Do we have a housekeeping service every day?A: Absolutely! Daily housekeeping is provided from 9:00 to 17:00. Linens are changed every third day for sustainability. To ensure privacy, please coordinate with your Villa Host or Staff for a convenient cleaning time. Your comfort is our priority.Q: Can we have extra clean towels?A: Certainly! We are happy to provide extra towels, subject to availability. Please feel free to reach out to your Villa Host or Staff, and we‚Äôll do our best to accommodate your request promptly.Q: What is the maximum occupancy for this 12-bedroom villa? Can I have extra beds?A: This villa comfortably accommodates up to 24 guests. However, it can host a maximum of 26th guests, with the 25th and 26th guests considered as extra. An additional fee of IDR 365.000/night/person, applies. Should you require extra beds, please feel free to let us know, and we‚Äôll be happy to assist in making arrangements for your group‚Äôs comfort.

title: 4br Ubud Jungle with Stunning Views
description: Villa Serenity ‚Äî 4-Bedroom Luxury Jungle Retreat with Dual Infinity Pools in Ubud, BaliWelcome to Villa Serenity, a breathtaking four-bedroom luxury villa set in the heart of Bali‚Äôs jungle, just 3 kilometers from Ubud Center. Designed for travelers seeking authentic Balinese charm and modern comfort, this tropical sanctuary offers the ultimate escape into nature and tranquility.The VillaThe spaceVilla Serenity ‚Äî 4-Bedroom Luxury Jungle Retreat with Dual Infinity Pools in Ubud, BaliWelcome to Villa Serenity, a breathtaking four-bedroom luxury villa set in the heart of Bali‚Äôs jungle, just 3 kilometers from Ubud Center. Designed for travelers seeking authentic Balinese charm and modern comfort, this tropical sanctuary offers the ultimate escape into nature and tranquility.The Villa ‚Ä¢ Location: Ubud, Bali ‚Äî nestled between the jungle and a traditional Balinese village ‚Ä¢ Bedrooms: 4 spacious bedrooms (3 king-size beds, 2 single beds) with ensuite bathrooms ‚Ä¢ Capacity: Up to 11 guests ‚Ä¢ Design: A harmonious blend of traditional Balinese architecture and contemporary designEach beautifully appointed bedroom offers luxury, privacy, and a serene atmosphere. The villa‚Äôs two stunning infinity pools overlook the lush jungle, creating an unforgettable backdrop for relaxation.The open-air living and dining areas face the pools and jungle, offering the perfect setting to gather, dine, or unwind with your loved ones in a peaceful, natural setting.Features & Amenities ‚Ä¢ Two private infinity swimming pools with breathtaking jungle views ‚Ä¢ Open-air dining and living spaces ‚Ä¢ Fully equipped modern kitchen ‚Ä¢ Air-conditioned bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms ‚Ä¢ Traditional bale (Balinese gazebo) for lounging ‚Ä¢ WiFi and daily cleaning serviceOptional Services (upon Request) ‚Ä¢ Private chef (lunch or dinner) ‚Ä¢ In-villa massage and yoga sessions ‚Ä¢ Private driver for tours and excursions ‚Ä¢ Scooter rental(Please book 24 hours in advance)Location Highlights ‚Ä¢ Only 3 km from Ubud Center ‚Äî Bali‚Äôs cultural heart ‚Ä¢ Close to temples, yoga studios, art galleries, and rice terraces ‚Ä¢ Surrounded by jungle and local Balinese lifeImportant Notes ‚Ä¢ Maximum capacity: 11 guests ‚Ä¢ Parties, loud music, and disturbances are strictly prohibited ‚Ä¢ Date alterations are not allowed ‚Ä¢ Please note that staff and management may access the villa at any time for daily maintenance and service purposesAbout BaliBali‚Äôs tropical environment is home to small creatures such as lizards, geckos, ants, and mosquitoes. While we perform monthly fogging and daily cleaning, we cannot guarantee a mosquito-free stay. Mosquito spray and electric repellents are provided for your comfort.Other things to noteIncluded services- Swimming pool- Parking- Final Cleaning- Towels: Change each 3 days- Air conditioning- Internet Access- Bed linen: Change each 3 days

title: Peaceful river and jungle views, close to beaches.
description: Welcome to Chameleon Villa, our contemporary luxury jungle residence set between the hype of Canggu, Pererernan & Seseh beaches and Bali's most popular cafes & the peace of Tanah Lot. The 6 bedroom house features stunning river views, private verandahs a 20m infinite pool overlooking a slow running river & jungle, media room, front and back kitchen, various gardens. The house is fully serviced with Housekeeping/Concierge/manager/Driver Eddie. Eddie speaks both English and Indonesian.The spaceChameleon Villa has  six bedrooms each bedroom has a  verandah overlooking  the 20 metre pool, river or jungle. Four bedrooms have ensuites and two bedrooms share a bathroom. There is a sixth full bathroom on the pool level and another half bathroom on the lounge room/living area, kitchen & TV room level. The sound off the slow running river can be heard from every level. There are multiple areas for entertaining..... a seated dining area with wood fire pizza oven opening to the pool area looking out across the river to spectacular private jungle views upstairs from the pool room is a  lounge/ seated dining & kitchen area with the same incredible views, on this level there is also a large air-conditioned TV room looking over the jungle, pool & river. The architectural design of Chameleon Villa was to enable very bedroom and living area to have these beautifully views. There are multiple grass areas one being directly on the river this area has become a perfect spot fro wedding ceremonies. The pool area has sun from 9.30am every morning for the entire day the sunsets over the pool in the evening.

title: Grand Cliff Ungasan by Elite Havens, 5BR The Bukit
description: Splendid, fully staffed, five-bedroom Bali villa with fabulous views, pool, jacuzzi and cinema room. Set in the grounds of a clifftop resort with five-star facilities. title: Ultra Luxury Villa +Pool+Chef+Staff+Gardens+Beach
description: Located at an enviable address a stone‚Äôs throw from the bustling heart of Seminyak, only 1.5 km to the beach and 30 minutes from the airport, this spectacular five bedroom villa provides a fusion of the inevitable charm of Indonesian tradition with the urban chic of an intimately designed show-home complete with full-service staff for a true five-star experience.The spaceWhile the architecture is unashamedly contemporary, the breezy and open plan is an invitation for gathering friends and family. Natural local materials are used throughout to integrate the elements of Indonesian culture. The Asian antiques collected over several years by the owner amplify the home‚Äôs Eastern style. Most of the shared living areas are in the center of the villa, while the bedrooms with en suite bathrooms occupy the perimeter and face the gardens. Across the gathering area is the dining room with ample seating.The grounds include a loggia, fire pit, koi pond, and Japanese garden. The walkways are covered with bamboo, a motif that appears throughout the property.Located outside on the right side of the 18x4 meter pool, a separate guest house covered in plants serves as the fifth bedroom. Beneath the structure is the garden-level bathroom, where a bathtub carved from a granite geode is the focal point. As a guest, you will enjoy in-villa services including daily housekeeping and butler from 8 AM to 4 PM. In addition our on-site chef will prepare a daily breakfast (complimentary before 10 AM). Additional meals may be requested for a fee of 50,000 rupiah per person or a flat rate of 500,000 rupiah for up to 12 guests, plus the cost of groceries. Please note that all staff departs at 4 PM with the exception of security unless arrangements are made for the chef and staff to prepare and serve dinner.Guest accessOnly registered guests are permitted in the villa. Please note that we charge per person after 10 guests in order to allow smaller groups to make use of this stunning and huge property. Please make sure to register the correct number of guests when booking.Other things to notePlease consider these additional details before booking as there will be no exceptions.THE MAXIMUM NUMBER OF GUESTS IS 12.NO OUTSIDE GUESTS.NO SMOKING. NO PARTIES OR EVENTS.We do not allow professional photography or vendors of any kind at Dharma Gumi without pre-approval and written consent from the owner via Airbnb messaging. If a hired photographer or other vendor arrives to the villa without this consent they will be turned away by security. VILLA AMENITIESHousekeeping: Cleaning is provided daily until 4 PM. Linens are changed every 3-4 days as needed, and towels every 2 days.Filtered Water: A water dispenser is available for unlimited use. Please notify the staff when it needs refilling.Wi-Fi & Entertainment: High-speed internet is available throughout the villa. Smart TV with access to streaming networks.AIR CONDITIONINGPlease kindly note that the living-area is wide open, fitted with ceiling fans, so expect to get the same temperature as outside. All bedrooms, guest house, and media room are air conditioned.CHECK-IN & CHECK-OUTCheck-out is at 11:00 AM on the day of departure, no exceptions. Check-in is from 3:00 PM unless there are no prior guests, in which case an earlier check-in may be confirmed one day in advance.GUEST RESPONSIBILITIESWe are not liable for any injury, death, theft, or damage to personal belongings during your stay or while participating in any sports or tourist activities. Please supervise young children at all times. If needed, a pool fence can be arranged at an additional charge.DISCLAIMERWe are not responsible for unexpected events or circumstances beyond our control, such as nearby construction, neighborhood noise, power, water and Wi-Fi outages, sounds from animals, or music from traditional ceremonies.PET POLICYWhile we love pets, they are not permitted in the villa.WILDLIFE IN BALIPlease kindly remember that Bali is a tropical island and this villa in particular is authentic to its nature with open living areas. Depending on the season and time of day you may encounter mosquitoes, geckos, snails, etc. The villa is equipped with electronic mosquito repellent in each bedroom, however those particularly sensitive to tropical wildlife might want to consider a different destination.

title: Akashi Residence: Pool Slide, Ice Bath, Gym, Chef
description: Akashi Residence, Pererenan, Bali | By The Luxe Nomad ‚Ä¢ Style cred: the villa venue for BOSS House Bali‚Ä¢ Featured by Australian Traveller, Lifestyle Asia and Tatler Asia‚Ä¢ Stylish interiors designed by renowned architect Alexis Dornier‚Ä¢ Easy access from Canggu‚Äôs hotspots‚Ä¢ Make a splash with the iconic silver spiral slide‚Ä¢ A wellness haven with a private gym, ice bath and yoga deckThe spaceRaising the bar on the Bali villa experience, Akashi Residence is an architectural masterpiece that brilliantly strikes the balance between style and function. Located in quiet Pererenan, enjoy an authentic slice of Bali without the big crowds‚Äîit‚Äôs also conveniently close to lively Canggu and the surf beaches of the island‚Äôs west coast. So sit back, relax and say yes to the ultimate villa vacation.Also formerly known as the BOSS House Bali, this stunning property was handpicked to embody the BOSS lifestyle. Book your stay and see the hype behind this beautiful villa, which has been featured by luxury lifestyle and travel titles including Australian Traveller, Lifestyle Asia and Tatler Asia.Designed by renowned architect Alexis Dornier, this spectacular six-bedroom villa is perfect for groups of friends and extended families with kids of all ages. The unique tropical design represents open-air living at its finest, while enjoying air-conditioned comfort whenever you need it. The central atrium is the social hub of the villa. A silver sculptural water slide is its centrepiece, splashing into the swimming pool below. An abundance of living and entertainment spaces are spread over three levels.Each air-conditioned ensuite bedroom is furnished with either a king bed or two queen beds; two bedrooms are fitted with Smart TVs. Other facilities provide fun and relaxation for all ages, including a TV room, pool table, gym, yoga deck, ice bath, a roofed poolside lounge and two dining rooms with adjoining kitchens.Guest accessEnjoy full access to the three-storey villa‚Äôs rooms and amenities: this includes the six ensuite bedrooms, a private pool with a sculptural slide, as well as all indoor and outdoor areas within the 2,000 sqm property.Other things to note BUILDING DETAILS: Akashi Residence, built in 2024, spans a total of 2,000 sqm across three floors:‚Ä¢ Lower Ground: Secondary kitchen, secondary dining area, pool table, ice bath, garden‚Ä¢ Ground Floor: Main entrance, main kitchen, main dining area, two bedrooms, guest bathroom, air conditioned living room, swimming pool‚Ä¢ Second Floor: Four bedrooms including master bedroom, terrace, gym, slide to swimming pool POOL AREA: ‚Ä¢ A silver sculptural water slide is its centrepiece, splashing into the swimming pool below measuring 17m x 4m x 1.3m ‚Ä¢ The swimming pool has no shallow end ‚Ä¢ The pool is set to normal temperature‚Ä¢ There are six lounge chairs and three pool umbrellas‚Ä¢ Pool towels are provided COMMON AREAS: ‚Ä¢ The dining and kitchen areas are conveniently located next to each other, offering an open and inviting space. ‚Ä¢ The living area, on the other hand, provides a separate, air-conditioned room for relaxation on the ground floor. ‚Ä¢ There‚Äôs also a balcony, rattan chairs and ceiling fans, as well as a roofed al-fresco sitting area by the pool. KITCHEN & DINING: ‚Ä¢ The kitchen is equipped with oven, refrigerator, Nespresso coffee machine, juicer, blender, toaster, rice cooker, electric kettle, electric stove, water dispenser as well as essential cooking tools, cutlery and wine glasses.‚Ä¢ The villa has two indoor dining areas and each can seat up to 12 guests. There is also additional seating at the kitchen counter that can seat 4 guests.‚Ä¢ The in-house cook is experienced in cooking Western, Indonesian and Asian cuisine, as well as vegetarian and children‚Äôs dishes. ‚Ä¢ Special requests can be accommodated, including strict diets. ‚Ä¢ All meals (breakfast, lunch, dinner, floating breakfast) can be arranged in advance. ‚Ä¢ Chef shopping service and a pre-arrival shopping service charged at grocery bill + 15% handling fee. WELLNESS: ‚Ä¢ The villa has an open gym, ice bath and private yoga deck, with additional yoga lessons provided upon request (extra charge). ENTERTAINMENT: ‚Ä¢ High-speed WiFi throughout and a dedicated media room equipped with an 85-inch Smart TV with Netflix.‚Ä¢ There‚Äôs also a pool table on the first floor. CAPACITY & EXTRA BEDDING: ‚Ä¢ Extra beds are not available at this property.‚Ä¢ This property is designed to comfortably sleep 12 people. Additional guests are not allowed. FOR FAMILIES: ‚Ä¢ Baby cot is charged at USD 10 per unit per day and high chair is charged at USD 5 per unit per day.‚Ä¢ Babysitting service available upon request (extra charge).‚Ä¢ Children under 4 years old can stay for free when sharing existing bedding with parents.‚Ä¢ Rates quoted refer to the maximum occupancy of the villa, as shown in the provided publication and invoice. ‚Ä¢ The number of persons (adults and children) staying at the property must not exceed the maximum number of sleeping places indicated in the booking confirmation and reservation voucher, unless specifically authorised in writing. ‚Ä¢ Exceeding the number may invalidate any insurance policy on the property. ‚Ä¢ Entry or access to the property may be refused or limited where the number of guests exceeds the stated requirement. FACILITIES: ‚Ä¢ For your safety and convenience, the villa is equipped with a fire extinguisher and first aid kit. ‚Ä¢ Wake-up calls are available upon request. PARKING: ‚Ä¢ Sufficient parking space available for three cars and seven bikes. RATE INCLUSIONS: ‚Ä¢ Welcome drink‚Ä¢ Daily continental breakfast‚Ä¢ Complimentary WiFi‚Ä¢ Daily housekeeping‚Ä¢ Services by Villa Manager, chef, butlers, maintenance/engineering, and security.‚Ä¢ Private chef is included in the rates.PROMOTIONS: ‚Ä¢ Take advantage of our Last Minute, Early Bird, and Long Stay promotions, offering up to 15% savings for qualified bookings made within the specified periods and stay durations. ‚Ä¢ Please contact us for more details about these offers. SERVICES AT EXTRA CHARGE: ‚Ä¢ A driver and car rental service is available upon request at approximately USD 60 nett (excluding petrol) for 8 hours a day.‚Ä¢ Spa treatments, massage services and additional yoga sessions are available upon request (extra charge).‚Ä¢ Tours and activities such as art and cultural excursions, cooking class are available upon request (extra charge).‚Ä¢ Babysitting service available upon request (extra charge).‚Ä¢ Baby cot is charged at USD 10 per unit per day and high chair is charged at USD 5 per unit per day.‚Ä¢ Early check-in and late check-out may be organised and is subject to availability (extra charge may apply). ANNOUNCEMENT: ‚Ä¢ Nyepi Religious Day‚Ä¢ Please be informed that Bali island celebrates Nyepi (Silent) Day each year on the dates below.‚Ä¢ Nyepi Day is a day of absolute silence throughout the island and it is observed from 6:00 AM until 6:00 AM the next morning.‚Ä¢ No outdoor activities are allowed and there will be no check-in and check-out from properties on 19 Mar 2026, 08 Mar 2027 and 26 Mar 2028.

title: Villa Vienna - New 8BDR, Jacuzzi, Sauna and Cinema
description: Welcome to Villa Vienna. Just steps away from the heart of Seminyak, a newly renovated tropical retreat awaits. Enjoy the modern villa‚Äôs refreshed bohemian interiors, with unique amenities including private steam sauna, hot-tub and cinema. Celebrate a well-deserved Bali holiday in style, enjoy entertaining with family and friends or relax the day away by the beach-entry pool and swim- up bar.The spaceThis newly renovated, spacious villa offers eight comfortable bedrooms, perfect for large groups and families. The Villa's exceptional design and modern style offer unparalleled appeal for all groups, with plenty of activities to entertain day and night. Enjoy the property's fantastic amenities from the private steam sauna and spa-sized whirlpool to the stunning glass pool with a swim-up bar in the living room. For relaxing nights in,  cozy-up from the rooftop cinema while catching your favorite shows.Our large open-concept living creates a spacious and airy atmosphere, taking advantage of Bali‚Äôs sunshine. Enjoy drinks from the pool bar or relax in the lounge, perfect for luxury entertaining. Whether you‚Äôre hosting a family dinner or enjoying cocktails with friends, the kitchen is well-equipped for any event. The property‚Äôs immersive tranquil spaces provide the perfect opportunity to unwind and enjoy everything a tropical villa has to offer.Guest accessThe whole villa is yours to enjoy. You will have full access to all the available facilities and services, with absolute and complete privacy. Feel free to make use of the pool, the garden, and the entirety of the house as you please. You can access the villa from a quiet alley. The villa features a private parking space, suitable for 2 medium-sized cars or several motorbikes. Each bedroom comes with its own key set that includes the entrance gate.Other things to noteWe are pleased to offer the service of our Villa's own massage therapist during the stay, subject to the availability. Enjoy a serene escape in our tranquil environment, where your comfort is our utmost priority.

title: Sea View Estate - Your Luxury Beachfront Retreat
description: Enjoy a stylish and relaxing experience at Sea View Estate, just a few steps from the beach! This resort-style with all the amenities of luxury and all the comforts of a private villa for the best of both worlds includes beach access, a manicured garden, and a pool view.The spaceUnwind at this breathtaking beachfront retreat nestled in central Lovina, the heart of tourism in North Bali. The combination of Sea View Beach Estate and Sea View Pool Villa is a perfect retreat for you who want to have a family or corporate gathering that will exceed all your vacation requirements.  Comfortable for a maximum of 18 people, mindfully designed and built, the 9 bedrooms are decorated with aesthetic touches and, a calming color palette and are fully fitted with modern appliances and furnishings.Imagine waking up to a tropical dawn chorus and witnessing the sun rising from your seafront corner. This breathtaking, brand new space is right on the beach meaning your morning commute to the shoreline is just a few steps! You can snorkel, swim, float in the pool or sit on the pier minutes to your heart‚Äôs content. No shoes, no news, just tropical heat and nature! How you spend your precious time in Bali is your choice‚Ä¶whichever combination you choose ‚ÄòSea View Estate‚Äô is the ultimate base.Spacious villa with beautiful garden, luxury layout in the building with ocean view. King bed in each bedroom, en-suite bathroom, and a sectional couch that can be converted into a cozy sleeping area in that can easily sleep two adults and 1 kid.The bedrooms have wide entrances with sliding doors that can be closed for privacy. Flat-screen TVs in each living room, a dining table, and complimentary in-room high-speed Wi-fi are available.5-star retreat amenities include access to two infinity pools, a jacuzzi, an outdoor lounge area, sunbathing areas with lounge chairs, and many others in the immediate estate. Explore the many Bali's art exhibits, restaurants, coffee shops, supermarkets, etc just by walking distance. Stroll down the jogging track in the morning, enjoy a boat ride down the sea for the dolphin trip, or rest and relax by the refreshing pool and barbeque grillThis is the beginning of your memorable escape!Guest accessThe villa is totally private and not shared with other guests. The guests can access the whole property and all amenities as well.Other things to note- For bookings from 7 nights and more, we offer a welcome package so you can enjoy a complimentary Lunch or Dinner (depending on arrival time) on the day of arrival and breakfast on the next day. - The beach in front of the villa is a public beach and some people may walk to the beach on the jogging track. - Extra charge for extra guest after 16 people is EUR 30 per person per night

description: The private villa located in one of Bali‚Äôs stylish and beautiful area Canggu.Luxury designer villa that seamlessly blends modern contemporary architecture with the laid-back tropical charm of Bali's coastline. description: Welcome to Suaka Baliaga, your private sanctuary of comfort and elegance in Seminyak, Bali‚Äôs most vibrant beachside destination. title: Zeno Arete | Epic 6BR Villa | Gym, Sauna, Icebath
description: Welcome to Villa Zeno Arete ‚Äî a 1,400 sqm luxury sanctuary in Pererenan, Bali. With 6 epic suites, 2 glass-bottom pools, a slide from the master bedroom, Sonos in every room, ice bath, sauna, jacuzzi, gym, and full-time staff + chef (additional charge), this villa is made for both recovery and celebration. Train hard, party harder, or just relax in total sensory bliss. Follow on IG: @villazenoareteThe spaceVilla Zeno Arete is not just a villa ‚Äî it‚Äôs a temple of transformation. Located in the heart of Pererenan, Bali‚Äôs most desirable neighborhood, just 5 minutes from WRONG GYM, this 1,400 sqm private residence was designed for those who demand both luxury and intensity.The Bedrooms- Zues - Master Suite with private living room, Red Room lighting, private plunge pool, huge balcony- Athena - Second Master with expansive luxury and balcony views- 4 Additional Suites styled like high-end hotel rooms, each with king-sized beds, rainfall showers, wardrobes, and private lounge areasTechnology & Entertainment- Sonos system in every room- Sonos Arc Ultra + Era300 surround system in the master suite- Cinema-style TV room with full surround setup- BBQ Den with mystic vibes and outdoor Sonos- Lightning-fast WiFi throughoutWellness & Recovery- Full private gym area for functional training- Ice bath, sauna, and jacuzzi- Swim-up bar, glass-bottom pool visuals, and the most photogenic corners for content loversLiving & Dining- Huge open-plan kitchen with island seating- Indoor & outdoor dining areas- BBQs on request ‚Äî our chef prepares everything fresh- Full-time chef and staff included (guests must pay for groceries)Aesthetic Highlights- Crystal-clear glass-bottom pools- Architecture and lighting designed for next-level content creation- Ideal for photo shoots, celebrations, training retreats, or deep recoveryLocationIn the heart of Pererenan, moments from the beach, caf√©s, and culture ‚Äî yet secluded enough for complete privacy.Guest accessGuests have exclusive access to the entire villa, including all six bedrooms, pools, gym, spa facilities, and living areas. The full-time staff and private chef are available throughout your stay to prepare meals, manage cleaning, and help you enjoy the experience without lifting a finger.
