title: Luxurious & Spacious Designer 6-Bedroom Villa Nila
description: Carpediem Villa Bali is a luxurious 6-bedroom retreat for up to 12 guests, with a 20-meter private pool, tropical gardens, and refined European design. Enjoy premium amenities, full-service Balinese staff, and personalised concierge experiences‚ÄîFrom nannies to curated tours. Located in a secure gated complex for total peace of mind. Check-in is from 3PM‚Äì7PM. For arrivals after 7PM, kindly inform us at least 24 hours in advance.The spaceUnveiling a world of unparalleled luxury, Carpediem Villa Bali awaits. This sprawling sanctuary boasts 6 luxurious bedrooms, offering a generous 825 sqm of living space, perfect for relaxation and entertainment. Featuring 4 inviting double bedrooms and 2 spacious super twin bedrooms, the villa comfortably accommodates up to 12 guests, making it ideal for families or larger groups. Modern design with high-quality amenities complements the expansive layout, offering indoor and outdoor dining areas, and a sunken lounge for relaxation. Unwind in our game room, offering intimate experiences, the space features both a home cinema and pool. Find focus and productivity in our study/office room. Nestled within a secure villa complex with reception and security at the main gate, your peace of mind is guaranteed.Embrace world-class hospitality redefined by our exceptional team of Balinese staff. From dedicated housekeepers to meticulous gardeners, skilled pool cleaners, talented private chefs, reliable drivers, and attentive house managers, every aspect of your stay is thoughtfully taken care of. Beyond the luxurious accommodations, Carpediem Villa Bali offers a haven for relaxation and connection where you can request an in-house masseur and create a personalized wellness experience tailored to your needs. Relax and immerse yourself in a seamless experience where every detail is attended to, allowing you to savor unforgettable moments in paradise.Seizing the day and creating lasting memories in our Villa. Consider us your personalized concierge, ready to assist you in crafting an extraordinary vacation. Whether you're seeking a qualified nanny for your children, a personalized tour of Bali's hidden gems, or recommendations for the best restaurants, beaches, yoga teachers, or surf coaches, our dedicated team is committed to exceeding your expectations.Guest enjoy complimentary access  upto 10 pax to wellness center at Saya Club located in Secana Beachtown, a state of the art fitness center designed to elevate your wellness experience during your stay.

title: Private Eco Friendly Retreat Center in Canggu
description: Discover one of the best Eco-Friendly Retreat Centers in Bali, offering a range of amenities that cater to all your needs for a memorable retreat or event. With stunning rice field views, lush landscapes, and the serene presence of Balinese Temples, Oasis is a hidden gem just 3 minutes from the beach in central Canggu. Nestled away from the hustle and bustle, you'll find yourself in a tranquil Oasis. Unite your community and craft an unforgettable experience at Oasis by Where NeXt?The spaceWhen renting Oasis by Where NeXt?, you and your guests will have the entire retreat center private for your booking! We do not offer bookings per room. Every reservation guarantees the entirety of our resort exclusively for you.STAFFOur staff is on-site 24/7 (Daily staff from 7am to 10pm and Security from 9pm to 7am) to assist you with anything you need. If you need any additional packages, we will be happy to assist, such as airport pickup/drop off, day excursions, private chef/catering options, massages, and much more.OASIS APPAll our guests will have access to our Oasis App. From live chatting (in multiple languages) to ordering drinks or food, booking a massage, ordering more water or fresh towels for the room, or scheduling room cleanings, our guests can access our services with a simple tap on their devices.ROOMSOasis consists of 14 rooms that can accommodate up to 30 guests. We offer a wide range of places to stay: 4 Bungalows (1 King Bed), 1 Premium King Suite (1 King Bed), 5 King Suites (1 King Bed), 3 Shared Suites (2 Single beds), and 1 Quad Suite (4 Single beds). All rooms have en-suite bathrooms.FITNESSIf you need a workout, we have you covered in our own fitness center steps away from the rooms. Enjoy our indoor, air-conditioned Gym with Power racks, DBs, Kettlebells, Wall Balls, an all-in-one Cable Machine, Rowers, Assault Bikes, and more. There is also an Outdoor Turf Track with three sleds.You will truly be living your healthiest life while at Oasis.YOGA SHALAOur custom bamboo yoga shala is set on the 2nd floor with lush rice field views. We can accommodate up to 30 guests for yoga, breath work, meditation, or any workshop you wish to present. Our shala is a sacred space for self-improvement and reflection, where you will find the awareness of your practice, yourself, and those around you.Our Yogs Shala is equipped with:30 Yoga Mats, 30 Yoga Blocks, 30 Pillows, 30 Yoga Straps. With a built-in Sound System via Bluetooth with Spotify.RECOVERY AREAIt's essential to give your body enough time spent not training to replenish your energy (glycogen) stores and allow your damaged muscles to recover. Our sauna is set at 71C/160F, and our cold plunge is set at 8C/46F.COMMON ROOMWe provide a full kitchen with a barista and a chef. We have many options of beverages and cuisines to make sure that your intake is always fresh and healthy. Our menu consists of healthy smoothies, smoothie bowls, juices, coffee, soft drinks, fresh fruit, and more.WIFIOur whole complex has up to 300Mbps Wi-Fi connection so you can still fulfill your responsibilities without any network interruptions.CINEMAOur state-of-the-art air-conditioned cinema is built for movie nights and hosting workshops. We can accommodate 20 people comfortably. Enjoy our 7.1 surround sound for movies or connect your laptop and teach a workshop.POOLDowntime during a hectic week is just what people will need. Our pool has it all for you! Lounge chairs, day beds, and even a sunken fire pit lounge. You will enjoy a great relaxing day while catching some Bali sun. Don't forget to use sunscreen!GAMESWe want to ensure you are always having fun. We have brought in a Brunswick billiard table, shuffleboard table, and ping-pong table. Outside, we have a turf Badminton court. There is never a dull moment at Oasis.FOODOur Cafe is built for fitness addicts and healthy eaters. We want to ensure that you nourish your body from the inside out. Clean eating with optimal nutrition! Vegan options are available.Our chef has spent years working on some of the best river cruises in Europe. He will prepare you with incredible cuisines from Indonesian, Western style, BBQ, and more.*Pricing is for 20 guests; after that, it is an additional $30 per guest per night.*6 Night Minimum BookingDiscounts Available:28 nights or more- 27% DiscountGuest accessThis will be a private complex just for you and your guests. In addition to your room, guests can access all outdoor spaces, the co-working/dining area, the gym, the yoga shala, the recovery (sauna and ice bath) area, and the game area from 7 AM until 10 PM.The kitchen is a staff-only area.Other things to noteWe are located just 500m to the Beach which is only a 2min scooter ride or 10min walk. Feel free to rent a scooter locally or through Oasis, we have plenty of scooter parking. We also have a 6-person golf cart available for rental with our personal driver which can take you around Canggu area.Our staff is on-site 24/7 (Daily staff from 7am to 10pm and Security from 9pm to 7am) to assist you with anything you will need. If you are in need of any additional packages we will be happy to assist like airport pickup/drop off, day excursions, private chef/catering options, massages, and much more.

title: Summer Ulu : New Luxury 4/5 BR Villa, Uluwatu
description: Welcome to our 4 (+1) bedroom Uluwatu villa, perfect for a tropical vacation. From the Master bedroom and sunset deck, you can enjoy views of the ocean in the distance. We are 100% not cliff front, but we can see the ocean - see pictures for reference. With a beautiful open plan design, modern amenities, our villa provides ample natural light and fresh air.  Most bedrooms have an en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, and Wi-Fi. If you need a 6th nice bedroom, there is a studio that can be rented.The spaceThe villa was completed in September 2023 and is by far one of the best in the area ...! if you‚Äôre looking for  luxury then this is it.We are basically on 3 levels- the lower ground/basement (which is actually at street level- it's not underground as it were), the middle floor- and the top floor. We have a super nice 15 metre salt water pool with a shallow end for the kids.The villa has a private staircase within the complex that leads to Uluwatu beach- roughly 3 minutes door to sand :) We have an ice bath, this can fit up to 6 people and cools to around 10 degrees celsius. Perfect for post surf recovery.We also have a private car and driver that can be hired as well as scooters on site. This requires some notice though. The house comes with daily housekeeping and a breakfast, the team are generally available from 8 am to 7pm for queries and requests. Please treat the staff with respect as you would your friends.ACCOMODATIONWe have 4 spacious bedrooms- each around 30+ square metres- apart from the Master, which is HUGE- 45 sq m. The Master bathroom is also ridiculously big- 36 sq m! Each bedroom (apart from Bedroom 4 and the TV room which share one)  has a large en suite bathroom. There is a 5th room can be set up either as a bedroom or a TV room depending on your preference. Unless pre advised, this room will be come as a TV room. (We are aware the title of the listing says 6 bedrooms- this is not our preference- this is a quirk with Airbnb where they take that number from the picture gallery where we do indeed have 6 bedrooms- but as you will read from below, not all are equal!)The TV/Cinema room and 4th Bedroom - are both separated from each other by sliding glass doors with a corridor in between. Both rooms have curtains- so they are separated, but also all the doors can be opened and it becomes one large 55 sq metre suite. Everything has been finished with high end luxury materials, marble bathrooms etc. Each bedroom in the villa has its own minifridge and safe deposit box. Basically the rooms are like hotel rooms....fully equipped. We even offer slippers and kimonos for use during your stay.If you would like to just have for example two bedrooms instead of 4/5 do please let us know and we can consider to lower the rate a little . We cannot guarantee this especially during peak seasons like December July and August but we can do our best to at least try and help...no guarantees:)If you would like a 6th bedroom, we have a super nice private studio- including its own pool and kitchen- this can be rented separately via another Airbnb link- this is called the Summer Ulu Studio and is attached to the main villa but is also very private. https://www.airbnb.com/h/summerulustudioFinally, just to confuse you more,, we actually also have ready a dedicated extra 6th bedroom and bathroom in the main villa that if required, you could use for example for your nanny/chef/teenage rascals etc- this can be arranged for a small fee as it doesn't actually come with the villa. This fee is 160 USD per night. (This final bedroom and bathroom are in no way as nice as the others but they can definitely provide a function if you need an extra Bunk Bed. Under the pictures it is called the bedroom 6 and bathroom 5)With this extra room, and the Studio, the whole property has 7 bedrooms- ) 5 of them ensuite. Summer Ulu Bedroom Set UpBEDROOM BED SET UP TOP FLOOR - all bed sizes are in cm 1. Master Suite - Super King Size   (180 x 200)GROUND FLOOR2. Guest 1 - Extra King (240 x 200) or 2 singles (120 x 200) 3. Guest 2 - Super King Size 180 x 200)  LOWER GROUND FLOOR (this is actually at road level)4. LG/Basement Suite (no windows) -  Extra King (240 x 200) or 2 singles (120 x 200) 5. Cinema Room - Sofa bed- 220 x 200  6th Extra room  - Bunk beds 95 x 200Below is detailed breakdown of the size of every bathroom and bedroom in a square metres:Lower Ground Floor - Guest Bedroom               24.20 m2- Guest Bathroom              8.57 m2- TV Room                          20.11 m2- Spare Bedroom                 10.1 m2- Spare Bathroom                4.42 m2GROUND- Kitchen & Living Room   85.45 m2- Bathroom Living              6.68 m2- Guest Bedroom  1 & 2    25.0 m2 each- Guest Bathroom 1 & 2    17.2 m2 eachFIRST  FLOOR- Master Bedroom             45.04 m2- Master Bathroom            36.54 m2We look forward to welcoming you!Guest accessAll parts, apart from the staff kitchen and the store room.Other things to noteA Friendly Request to Our Future GuestsUnfortunately the island is going through a bit of a property boom right now so there are quite a few new developments in the area- (construction noise). Currently there are a couple of projects nearby which can be noisy - so please be careful booking. We‚Äôre delighted to host wonderful travelers who come to Bali to enjoy the island‚Äôs beauty and relax in our family villa. We put our heart into making this place welcoming and comfortable, and we‚Äôre proud that 99% of our guests have amazing experiences and leave us glowing reviews.However, if you‚Äôre someone who tends to be overly critical, extremely picky, or expects perfection down to the tiniest detail, this might not be the right fit for you. We‚Äôre a laid-back family villa, not a five-star hotel, and while we strive to provide a great experience, we understand that our homey atmosphere may not meet the high expectations of every guest.So, if you‚Äôre the kind of traveler who might be upset about a small crumb left in the fridge, a slight imperfection in the sheets, or a candle that isn‚Äôt replaced immediately, we kindly ask you to reconsider booking. (A 5 star hotel might be better for you :)In those rare cases where guests are persistently unhappy from the start, we prefer to offer a refund and part ways early to save everyone the stress. So please take this into account - we would actually prefer to not deal with complaining guests and not take their money so have a think if you are a very picky person or not. This is our private family home which we also rent out please understand this.We truly care about our guests and work hard to ensure you have a wonderful stay, but we‚Äôve learned that it‚Äôs best for all parties if we‚Äôre on the same page from the beginning. Thank you for understanding, and we look forward to welcoming guests who appreciate the charm and comfort of a family-owned villa!In other news‚Ä¶The villa has an amazing sunset deck, with a fire pit. From this deck you can see the ocean in the distance - we do not call ourselves ‚Äú amazing ocean view" because that would be misleading - however you can see the ocean in the distance and it is quite pretty.  We also have a private staircase that leads from our garage down to the beach which is about a three minute walk. We have purposely not put railings around the sunset deck to keep the aesthetic of the deck so kids should be careful but we have put plant pots around to maintain some level of safety . Enjoy it all but my suggestion is to keep an eye on the kids if they are on the deck.As part of our ongoing efforts to reduce our environmental impact and enhance guest comfort, we‚Äôve recently upgraded our pool to a refreshing saltwater system ‚Äî kinder to your skin and better for the planet. We‚Äôve also installed a state-of-the-art multimedia water filtration system throughout the property, which helps remove common contaminants like chlorine, heavy metals, and odors ‚Äî making showers and swims feel cleaner, softer, and more skin-friendly. While the water isn't drinkable, guests often notice benefits like smoother skin and softer hair. On top of that, we‚Äôve swapped in eco-friendly tissue paper in all bathrooms and are gradually integrating more thoughtful, low-impact touches throughout the villa. üåøWe also provide Keren Water for drinking ‚Äî a premium, locally trusted brand known for its clean, pure taste and high filtration standards. The bottles are BPA-free and made from PET, a safe and recyclable plastic often used for food-grade containers. It‚Äôs a small touch that many guests appreciate, especially in Bali‚Äôs climate, and reflects our commitment to offering healthier, more sustainable choices throughout your stay.Please note that the owners cannot take responsibility for any accidents that may occur during your stay ‚Äî so we kindly ask that you take care, just as you would anywhere else.WA is required for all communication after the booking is confirmed- we have a well oiled system that uses WA groups. This is a requirement to ensure a smooth stay for you. On the WA group will be the Villa manager and the staff. Finally, occasionally venues near us host weddings and there can be music until midnight on these special nights -  but it‚Äôs reasonably rare that it‚Äôs loud and we do have acoustic doors and windows but just a little heads up:)The property comes with daily housekeeping and daily breakfast included. Our staff are available for you generally between 8am to 7pm. Please only contact the staff outside of these hours if it‚Äôs an emergency.We also have a sixth extra bedroom and bathroom which can be hired for an additional fee if you wish to bring your nanny/chef/trainer etc or even use it for kids. It‚Äôs not in any way like the other bedrooms but it can definitely sleep two people comfortably in a bunkbed. Fee is 2.5 mio IDR per night (around 160 USD)We also accept card payments at the villa for any additional expenses during your stay ‚Äî such as meals, transport, or extra services. All major cards are welcome, except American Express.We look forward to hosting you and ensuring your stay is as enjoyable as possible. Feel free to reach out with any questions.If you have read this far I‚Äôm very impressed thank you !(Below are more details about the bed room set up)ROOM SET UP (4/5 rooms)Summer Ulu Main HouseTOP FLOOR - (all size in cm)1. Master Suite - King Size  (180 x 200)GROUND FLOOR2. Guest 1 - Extra King (240 x 200) or 2 singles (120 x 200) 3. Guest 2 - King Size 180 x 200)  LOWER GROUND FLOOR4. Basement Suite (no windows)-  Extra King (240 x 200) or 2 singles (120 x 200) 5. Cinema Room - can be converted to a bedroom - Sofa bed size - 220 x 200  6th Extra room on LG level  (extra 2.5 mio IDR per night) - Bunk beds 95 x 200  ======================And finally, as with much of the island  there could be some construction nearby, this is something we can address on a case-by-case basis during your stay, as it's difficult to predict (construction sites in Bali rarely provide advance schedules).That said, at the moment there are active construction projects directly in front and behind our villa for the next 3 months, so we want to be extra transparent about this. Work typically happens Monday‚ÄìSaturday, between 9:00‚Äì12:00 and 13:00‚Äì17:00 (with a break from 12:00-13:00). Sundays are completely quiet.Noise levels can vary, some days may be surprisingly peaceful and others might be louder due to heavy machinery like excavators. Because of this, we've already applied a 50% discount to your stay to reflect the potential disruption.Please book at your own risk, especially if you‚Äôre highly sensitive to noise or are looking for a totally serene daytime experience. We want to make sure your expectations are aligned before arrival.One thing we want to avoid is anyone having a bad holiday due to unexpected construction, so please keep this in mind when booking. We're also happy to discuss further discounts if needed.We look forward to hosting you :)Many thanks,Summer Uluüå¥

title: Rumah Purnama - Enchanting 3 bedroom villa in Ubud
description: Rumah Purnama is a heritage Balinese wantilan home that was fully restored and renovated by Studio Jencquel, to encompass the luxuries of modernity while retaining the charm of Bali‚Äôs bohemian heyday. In the shade of the centennial coconut trees and under a wood shingled roof, this charming 3-bedroom home boasts spectacular jungle and moonrise views across the sacred Campuhan Ridge.The spaceEntering the hillside home on the main floor of the pagoda-like wantilan through a tamarind-wood front door of bleached chocolate hues, one is greeted by the friendly smiles of elongated, Giacometti-esque, ironwood statuettes sourced from the island of Kalimantan in Borneo. This welcoming entrance hall is a transitional space acting as a mediator between the main living room, the dining room, the kitchen, the guest room, the powder room, and the staircase that leads to the first floor. The color palette is natural, earthen, and simple; leaving plenty of room for the creativity and color of the mind. The natural hardwoods, alang-alang grass, earthen wall coloring, and off-white linens and marbles create a calm, grounded feeling ‚Äî as if one is finally home, even if they have never been there before until now. All functions of the house are laid out under one roof, allowing for comfortable access to all rooms and spaces on both floors, even in the most tropical of rains. Entrance HallCozy and welcoming, this all-access point for the rest of the home is tastefully decorated with a soft area rug and a unique Buddha sculpture, sitting lotus in meditation. Behind a small Balinese door sits a conveniently located powder room. Through wood-framed glass doors ahead, a view of the pool and the jungle beyond can be seen past the living and dining areas. Living & Dining RoomThe spacious open-air living and dining room share a 35m2 area with a terrazzo floor, just steps from the pool, and surrounded by stunning vistas.The living area hosts a plush three-seater sofa covered in imported Italian linen, next to a large, stylish coffee table constructed from teak and local marble. Nearby, a Venezuelan hammock beckons for lazy hours spent reading a good book or perhaps generating inspiration.The dining table and comfortable chairs, designed by Studio Jencquel, beckon up to 10 to sit for a feast of the senses and the appetite. Over the elongated bench-style seating on one side of the table, and above the sofa nearby, hang Maximilian Jencquel‚Äôs ‚ÄãForest-Storm‚Äã paintings and carefully selected artworks. Three rattan chandeliers over the table‚Äôs center provide soft, delectable illumination by night.Pool & DeckSteps away are the infinity pool and deck, waiting to be enjoyed day or night for a cooling plunge; or for taking in the breathtaking scenery that abounds. The shimmering pool, a compact 3m x 8m, is a study in pleasurable contrasts ‚Äî infinite yet snug, and grounded to the earth yet with a feeling of floating above the jungle below.The ironwood deck and outdoor lounging area are perfect for a sunbath, and to enjoy an early cup of heart-warming Balinese ginger tea while admiring the majestic views of Gunung Agung further to the Northeast. Perhaps the ideal use of this lovely space is to watch magnificent full moon rises over the horizon to the East ‚Äî a magical moment that captures the strong energies of Campuhan Ridge that captivated Walter Spies so long ago.The deck is bookended by ancient Balinese family temple structures, kept here with respect for the land and its heritage; with gratitude for its beauty and abundance ‚Äî and still blessed with daily ceremonies to this day.KitchenThe fully equipped modern kitchen is adjacent to the entrance hall, in the perfect location to create a ‚Äúhomey‚Äù environment with delectable cooking scents. Ready for you to prepare everything from an Indonesian ‚Äãnasi campur‚Äã to a New York pizza, this cozy 9m2 space feels much more spacious than its actual size.The kitchen is supplied with a high-quality induction cooktop and oven from Germany. It includes all the appliances and conveniences needed to cook a meal for ten or a late-night nosh for one to an abundant meal for a family.Bedroom - MeierOn the opposite side of the entrance hall from the kitchen is the well-appointed ground floor guest bedroom, with floors of local beige-colored terrazzo. Measuring 17m2, it hosts window bays facing East and South, boasting scenic views towards the swimming pool and beyond, as well as onto the nearby Balinese family temple. The room comfortably fits a plush king-sized bed with a high-quality King Koil mattress and pure cotton sheets, and a good night‚Äôs rest is ensured with air-conditioning and fitted mosquito netting. An open wardrobe with plenty of storage provides a home for clothes, suitcases, and other items needing safe harbor.The en suite bath is 14m2 and comes with a bathtub for soothing soaks, and also has an indoor shower with built-in skylight. Overall, this bedroom is a perfect blend of comfort and luxury that also suits it for use as a master boudoir, or perhaps as a cozy nest for the visiting in-laws.The Rooms - UpstairsFamily RoomFrom the entrance hall, stairs going up lead directly into the family room, where the ‚ÄãBangkirai timber-clad walls and floors create a cozy cabin feel. Hanging art of wooden paddles accentuate the almost maritime sense of the proceedings. A soft three-seater sofa of imported Italian linen rests opposite to a 55‚Äù television. Even with its size of 20m2, the family room embodies a mood of cocooning with loved ones for an evening enjoying fine cinema or bingeing favorite shows. For comfort and cooling, a ceiling fan and air conditioning are thoughtfully provided.Bedroom - MeadThis finely furnished guest bedroom comes with something unique for this locale ‚Äî a partial ocean view. The window bays face East and South, and on clear days the Indian Ocean can be perceived on the far horizon. Low panoramic windows allow unobstructed views directly from the bed, and ships may sometimes be observed passing in the distance.The bedroom hosts timber-clad walls, and a 22m2 ‚ÄãBangkirai ‚Äãtimber floor surface, partially covered with a natural carpet from Sumatra. It is comfortably appointed with a king-sized bed and luxury King Koil mattress, pure cotton sheets, and a fitted mosquito net. There‚Äôs also air-conditioning and a ceiling fan for cooling ‚Äî but you may need neither, as true sea breezes are known to blow through. A fine working desk and chair facing towards the beautiful scenery gives one a place to sort their inspirations into artistic statements like a modern-day Walter Spies.The 14m2 full en suite bathroom is partially outdoors, and features an open-air shower that enjoys amazing 360¬∞ views of the surrounding nature ‚Äî while continuing to preserve one‚Äôs privacy.Main Bedroom - ChaplinThe main bedroom has timber-clad walls, a generous surface of 32m2. The room‚Äôs ‚ÄãBangkirai ‚Äãtimber floors are partially covered with soft natural carpeting from Sumatra. Window bays facing East and North offer a partial view of Gunung Agung, perceived behind the rolling hills on clear days. Low panoramic windows allow unobstructed views of Campuhan Ridge directly from the plush super-sized bed.Fitted mosquito netting, air conditioning, and a ceiling fan ensure comfort and sound sleep, and sea breezes are known to waft through the windows when the winds are just right. A lounging chair makes an ideal spot for reading, sketching, or other pursuits of the mind. The full height mirror will keep you looking sharp before heading out on the town.The 19m2 en suite bathroom is partially outdoors, and includes high-end Japanese washlet toilet and plenty of storage in the marble vanity. An amazing open-air shower has 360¬∞ views of the green hills and jungle around you, while retaining privacy. Adjacent to the shower, an unusual treat ‚Äî a sweet guava tree with wonderfully scented and delicious fruit. In keeping with the heritage of the area, there are cheerful sculptures made from Wos River stones by a local artisan that represent his childhood ‚Äî a time when we all naturally embrace our inner artist without reservation.Guest accessEntire houseOther things to noteNeighborhood Please be aware that the neighboring property is currently undergoing renovation work, which may result in occasional noise disturbances. You may hear sounds of hammering and sawing at varying levels of intensity.To account for any potential disruptions, we have already adjusted our rates accordingly. Thank you for your understanding.‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚ÄîPrivate cookOur private cook is available for Rumah Purnama, for lunch and dinner (on most days with prior notice), at the cost of the groceries + 20%. Please leave some notice of what you wish to eat, since we always try to source local and conscious products - our meals are prepared with fresh ingredients following the seasons and rhythm of the local markets. We do not offer a la carte. Please ask for our menu for choices and inspiration.

title: *NEW* Bali's Masterpiece - The Dreamtime House -
description: Looking for a unique and unforgettable experience for your stay in Bali?‚ú® Welcome to The Dreamtime House ‚Äì where timeless Art Deco elegance meets the soul of Bali. This stunning 7-bedroom villa with Rice Field Views | Private Cinema, Home Gym & Spa is a masterpiece of contemporary architecture, where bold design meets natural elegance ‚Äî all set against the calming backdrop of lush rice fields.The spaceTucked away in the tranquil heart of ricefields, yet only minutes from the vibrant energy of Seminyak and Canggu, this architectural masterpiece is unlike anything else on the island. Inspired by the sleek lines of a luxury ocean liner, the villa was designed as a space to dream, connect, and create lasting memories.Spread across a lush 1,600 m¬≤ tropical estate with uninterrupted rice field views, The Dreamtime House offers 7 beautifully appointed bedrooms, each with its own unique character. Step into an atmosphere where art and design embrace comfort:25m infinity pool with a swim-up bar for golden sunsetsPrivate cinema room for movie nights under the starsFull spa & wellness facilities including sauna, jacuzzi, Gym, and massage areawith rice field views for an energizing start to your day.Two fully equipped kitchens (one professional) perfect for private chefs and special dinnersThe villa‚Äôs open living spaces ‚Äì five distinct lounges indoors and outdoors ‚Äì invite you to gather with friends, celebrate with family, or simply sink into the rhythm of Bali life. Every corner tells a story: a blend of Art Deco sophistication and Balinese warmth, designed for those who seek more than just a place to stay ‚Äì but a place to feel.At your doorstep: Bali‚Äôs most sought-after delights, from sunset beach clubs to designer shops and world-class cuisine.Whether you‚Äôre hosting an intimate event, a wellness retreat, or a luxurious holiday, The Dreamtime House promises a setting that is as unforgettable as the moments you‚Äôll create here.Other things to noteBorn from a dream where timeless elegance meets tropical serenity, The Dreamtime House is a love letter to beauty ‚Äî weaving the ocean liner grace of the 1930s Art Deco era with the architectural genius of Le Corbusier, the serene sophistication of Giorgio Armani, and the lush blues of Majorelle Gardens and Yves Klein. Its soul is enriched by the artistry of Titouan Lamazou, Pierre Peron, Paul Doig, Tracy Porter, Shane Swanee, Andy Warhol, Andrew Wellman, and I Gusti Agung Wisarata, while whispers of The Legian‚Äôs colonial charm by Hendra Hadiprana and the cinematic allure of James Bond echo through its walls. A sanctuary where every curve, color, and detail tells a story, inviting you to live yours.

title: Luxury 5BR Family Friendly Villa in Canggu, Bali
description: Luxury 2,000 m¬≤ villa in Bali with 5 luxury bedrooms, large 40m private pool, tropical garden, open-air living spaces, private cinema, bonfires, pool table, ping pong table & full privacy. Daily cleaning, WiFi & premium amenities included.The spaceWelcome to your own private paradise in Bali. This villa is designed for guests who value privacy, comfort and luxury.Relax by the pool, enjoy outdoor dining under the stars, or simply unwind in one of the villa‚Äôs many peaceful corners. title: OB10001 - 10 Bedroom Villa Complex in Seminyak
description: Offering a 10 Bedrooms option consist of a Complex of 3 Villas; Two 4 Bedroom Villa and One 1 Bedroom Villa"Before sending a booking request, please contact us to inquire about any promotional rates that may be available. Please note that the calendar for the villa may not always be up-to-date, so we recommend checking with us for last-minute availability."The space=============================================================From the centre of Seminyak, a residential road bordered by palm trees leads out towards the residential district from the famous Oberoi Hotel. And especially, all rooms have Wifi connexion to offer you all the comfort you deserve.Fans & air-conditioningLarge open-air bathroom with bath & showerTV with a DVD libraryPrivate swimming poolsPrivate Bar & kitchenOpen living room with lounges, dining table & individual tables for breakfast=============================================================Our villas include the dedicated services of a Guest Relations Manager, available to assist with tours, transportation, massages, activities, reservations, and any other needs to ensure your vacation is memorable and hassle-free. Please inform us if you require this service, and we will be happy to assist you.

title: Baliwood Bingin

Our property is available for exclusive rental, offering privacy, luxury, and personalized service tailored to your needs.

title: Luxury 16 Bed  Large Pool Villa, Petitenget
description: *SUBJECT TO 16,5% GOVERNMENT AND SERVICE TAX, COLLECTED SEPARATELY UPON CHECK IN.Offering a Sixteen Bedrooms option with luxurious and fantastic views on a perfect location for culinary experience.> Daily Breakfast Included. > Please state in your inquiry if you'd require airport transfers.The spaceThe  Villas are located in Jalan Petitenget Seminyak, the strategic and lively center of Bali.With all urban facilities, ATM and souvenirs shops around,- you are only 10 minutes away from the beach with Bali‚Äôs famous beach clubs, such as Potato Head, KuDeTa, Merah Putih, W, etc.Situated on Petitenget Street, you are just nearby the best fine dining places with M√©tis and Sardine gastronomic restaurants a few steps away, and all culinary choices around like Urchin, The Legian RestoSome night clubs such as La Favela, Hu‚Äôu Bar, Petitenget Rest & Bar, Mirror Lounge & Club, Mint, La Plancha and many moreYou will also enjoy the best shopping experience in Petitenget and Oberoi streets.We highly recommend that you tour around Bali and we are lucky enough to be situated 5 minutes only from the Petitenget Temple which is one of the most important temple. A must see.If you‚Äôre looking for something more adventurous, our manager can suggest and organize a range of activities to enjoy the pleasures of Bali.Each Villa amenities- Spacious private swimming pool in each villa with sun loungers- Each room is air-conditioned with en suite bathroom, walk-in wardrobe, safe deposit box and hair dryer- Each room overlooking swimming pool- Spacious open living and dining room- Fully equipped kitchen- Flat screen TV and Sound System at living area- Wi-Fi Internet (Fiber-optic connection)- For children: Baby cot, baby high chair- Parking and drop off zone at receptionAll of our villas come with the services of our guest relations manager, who will be pleased to assist with tours/transport, massages and spas, babysitting and all general advice and information needed to ensure your vacation is a memorable experience.Please state in your inquiry if you'd require airport transfers. There's a transfer fee of IDR 250K one way for one car, to fit 4 people and luggage (surcharge of IDR 50K if the transfer is between 9pm - 7am). Fee payable to driver directly.All our prices are in US Dollars. Payments can be made in any currency to the equivalent of US Dollars.* We are required by local regulations to charge occupancy tax. Villa rate is subject to 16.5% government taxes and services charge, not included in the price of the reservation and have to be paid directly upon check-in.

title: Ricefield House | Private Pool | Pet Lovers
description: Enjoy a cozy, home-away-from-home experience, perfect for nature lovers.Relax with lush tropical garden views from your room and enjoy private access to a pool, hot tub, and bathroom.Nestled among rice fields, our peaceful neighborhood offers tranquility, with cafes, shops, and restaurants just a short walk away. The town center is 10 min by scooter, and Sanur Beach is 30 min away.Daily cleaning included. Our 2 dogs and 5 cats add charm for animal lovers.We can't wait to host you!The spaceDuring your stay here, the bottom floor room area will be available to you. It includes a private  bedroom, an en-suite bathroom, and a private swimming pool.Our home is situated on a road between rice fields which provides a feeling of spaciousness and serenity.Downstairs is the kitchen which is shared between me, my partner and you. The kitchen is complete and fully equipped with a blender, large fridge & freezer, water dispenser, rice cooker, oven and a full range of kitchenware. Other amenities include AC in the bedroom. Cleaning everyday or when needed and all utility costs are included in the price.Just a 7 minute drive from the city, you have the best of both worlds being in a quiet place but not too far from the action.Please note that on Saturdays there may be some noise until 11pm from Soulshine, a night club about 800 metres from our house.Other things to noteWe have 5 cats living in the house and 2 dogs living in & outside of the house. The helper cleans the house every day but furr here and there will be inevitable. I hope you understand üôèIf there's anything that makes you feel uncomfortable, please let me know so I can find a solution as soon as possible.Latest check in time is 8 pm. Checking in after 8 pm will be charged an additional cost of IDR 200.000. Door is closed at 9.45 pm, unless we have agreed for a late check-in time with the additional fee.

title: The Turiya - Redefining luxury in Canggu
description: The Turiya is a six-bedroom private oasis and luxury abode, strategically nestled between the vibrant neighbourhoods of Berawa Canggu and Seminyak. Within walking distance to the beach, The Turiya is a tranquil sanctuary to rest, revive and reset the mind, body, and soul. Redefining the villa experience in Canggu with its unique and bespoke level of luxury and comfort, come discover and be captivated by the soul that is The Turiya.The spaceImbued with the Hindu philosophy of Turiya‚ÄîSanskrit: ‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ä‡§Ø, meaning "the fourth‚Äù‚Äîat its heart and centre, The Turiya is a private oasis to wake, dream, sleep and go beyond. During the waking state of the Turiya, the house is an oasis refuge from the hustle and bustle of Bali‚Äôs social energy and tropical climate. Attention has been placed on the house manifesting its own spiritual energy in sympathy with Bali, an island which also glows with its own unique energy, clear to anyone who sets foot on this island paradise.The unique design focuses on a high-end luxury experience with sophisticated and functional design. Mirroring Bali‚Äôs nature and landscape, the colour palette of The Turiya‚Äôs interiors blend together warm earthy tones, olive and royal greens, that breathe into life through textural materials such as wood, terrazzo, brushed brass, velvet, polished cement floors and lime-washed walls.During the waking state of Turiya, guests are able to explore and flow through the different communal living spaces and social alcoves. From the 18.5-metre lap pool that features a pool bar, to the plush indoor and outdoor sunken lounge seating areas, 12-seater dining table and cinema room. The extensive roof top level also features an outdoor kitchen and bar, pool table, yoga shala, additional lounge seating areas and a glimpse of the Indian Ocean and Vishnu Statue in Uluwatu. The bedroom suites are designed for luxurious deep sleep, stillness and relaxation, as one enters the dream and deep sleep state of Turiya. With moody ambient lighting, 500 thread-count bed linen, high quality mattresses, black-out drapes and brass-inlaid polished cement floors, guests can fully immerse and indulge in quality downtime. Ensuite bathrooms feature custom marble double sinks, rain showers and standalone bathtubs, equipped with brushed brass Hansgrohe faucet and shower sets.**Discounted rate due to construction nearby. The house features double thickness wall, 10mm glass throughout and high standard alumunium window which enhanced and maximise sound-proofness for indoor living.Other things to noteCHECK IN TIME 14:00CHECK OUT TIME 11:00PRE CHECK IN REQUIREMENTUpon confirmation of your booking, please submit the complete names of all guests checking in. Only endorsed guests will be allowed access to the property. All guests are required to submit valid IDs (passport for foreign visitors or any government-issued identification for locals). All guests will be required to sign our terms and conditions form.SECURITY DEPOSITA security deposit is required prior to check-in. This is fully refundable upon check-out, given that no damages within the property were incurred during the stay and if the check-out schedule is followed accordingly.EVENT POLICYIf you wish to celebrate a special occasion, please contact us in advance so that we can make the necessary arrangements. Intimate celebrations are only upon request and are subject to management approval. Additional visitors on top of the maximum number of 12 guests must be notified to the general manager.PET POLICY Pets are not allowed within the property. COMMERCIAL SHOOTPlease note that The Turiya is not to be used for commercial shoots, unless pre-approved by the management. If you would like to book our property for commercial shoots, please contact us.** Reduced rate due to construction nearby. The house features double thickness wall, 10mm tempered glass throughout and European standard alumunium window which enhanced and maximise sound-proofness.

title: Breathtaking Ocean Edge Views From Exceptional Luxury Villa
description: The Luxe Bali is the benchmark for ultra high end villas in Bali.Location, Facility, Comfort and Service have never been matched as completely and seamlessly as in this villa which functions more along the lines of a super yacht than the often touted  luxury residence.The spaceTo ensure you will have the best holiday possible regardless of where you book, please read our advice here.The Luxe Bali is not in anyway your average 'luxury villa', a term perhaps a little to generously used online.  If you are here then you are spending a reasonable amount of money for a vacation,  please be as informed as possible of what you are getting here and more to the point what you will be and not be getting elsewhere for that money. If you have already experienced the quaint rustic or the all visual flash but not real quality , or located on the cliffs with an extremely long and steep walk  to reach the ocean way below villa experiences and would now like to experience a beyond first class residence in comfortable  location, facility and service that you would absolutely love to live in for the rest of your life then this is the villa for you. A true blend of the finest elements the west and east can put together. Most lean too much either way, The Luxe Bali has found that perfect harmonious middle point between fine finish natural materials and absolute high-end comfort.  Understated ZEN.  Unlike most villas on the island The Luxe Bali is unique in that it was built with an totally unlimited budget by a very high net worth individual as a second home, one the owner wanted to be as beautiful, comfortable, and facilitated as possible. Not spending as much time in Bali these days the owner has put the villa up for selected rental when they are not there. A nine-year build by the finest craftsmen from all over the world, this is the time it took to get everything to the meticulous quality standards the owner desired. The Architect of the world famous KuDeTa Restaurant in Seminyak was selected to design the villa.    There are some villas around with more bedrooms for larger groups  but more luxurious ?  we have yet to see any that have taken it to the level of our residence.  Most villas loudly promoted in the ‚Äòluxury' category would be lucky to qualify as low end  airline business class equivalents, whereas The Luxe Bali is without any doubt up there with the finest airlines first class offerings and at a fraction of what those flights cost.  The 1200 m2 (13,000 ft2) of living space boasts Four Master Suites with their own lounge area and en suite bathroom containing separate shower and bath space, with each having private terrace or direct access opening to the cliff edge pool. The fourth floor Penthouse Suite features a stunning 88 m2  (950 ft2) of open marble terrace, one of the premier spots in Bali from where you can see the cliffs running down the coast, the surf right out front of you, and the distant shores of Kuta, Seminyak and Canggu across the vast ocean bay and also to enjoy the spectacular light show every sunset brings.  Beside this in the evening there no black void looking into the dark ocean abyss when the sun goes down as the twinkling lights of the Kuta - Seminyak shoreline can be seen across the bay. The King-size Beds strategically placed to catch the views have the most comfortable absolute top end mattresses available; high thread count cotton sheets and a variety of hardness non-allergic microfiber pillows.    The third floor feature two grand bedroom suites with stunning ensuite bathrooms with separate showers and baths and outside terraces, these are the OceanView Suite and the Rainforest Suite.The second floor is the living dining upper ground level. It contains several lounge areas, family tv area, a grand dining area , a celebrity kitchen using absolute top shelf appliances with a master chef and butler included. This floor at one end leads to a beautiful rainforest grove complete with two large banyan trees, a multitude of ferns, palms, waterfalls and koi ponds, the other end of the second floor is an unrestricted view of the ocean with cliffs running down to Balangan Beach. Stand at the edge of the lawn and watch the surfers paddling by. The Cliff Edge Pool Suite is located on the lower ground floor and contains either two single beds or a king size double bed (as requested), and spacious private lounge space that opens out directly onto the large cliff edge pool, pergola and gardens. The fourth bedroom has a bathroom with a luxurious high flow shower (no bath) and when desired this suite can be locked from the rest of the villa  to be a self contained apartment with it's own private entrance. This space is perfect for  high end clients that travel with an assistant and desire them to be close by but not too close. The  lower ground level also holds the fun zone , with a gym, a dry redwood cedar sauna, a steam room, massage spa, and dedicated home theatre.  The Meals. The very talented Chef prepares meals of the highest standard of quality and flavour. Many guests come with the intention of eating out at the high end restaurants Bali is so well know for, but after experiencing the quality of the in-house chef prepared meals served by your own butler and waiter, they often forgo the visits to other restaurants. Guests are charged a 20% surcharge for groceries and produce and the chef prepares meals from that.  The cost saving for meals alone becomes quite significant. Please Read the guest reviews about the meals. The same with Drinks, the villa does not sell drinks, but rather authentic origin bottles of wines and spirits are purchased at a 20% surcharge and the butler with a significant saving for you mixes cocktails. The property was purchased well before most any other property on the southern peninsular at a time when they had the choice and means to buy anywhere and sat on for a decade while planning the grounds.  Being already well informed on building locations and sun orientation they noticed two significant features almost no other site on the coastline provided.  Firstly the property actually faces north across the ocean with Mt Agung and the other volcanoes of Bali in the distant background. What this aspect means is a significantly cooler space where you get ocean views all day long without the intense and often uncomfortable heat of the sun beaming into and heating up your villa, and secondly this site is one of less than a handful with terraced grounds all the way down to just above the waters edge.  Once again, this is not a villa built on a normal business budget as a as an upmarket hotel might; they often are the obvious ones all bundled together like cookie cutter suburbs.  This is a unique high net worth owners villa in a very private gated estate of only three properties all built and owned by three high net worth individuals. No look after 70 villa  management companies, no built by a developer or commercial operation  and the significantly lower quality build, fixtures and infrastructure one will undoubtedly get from such a set up, rather a truly unique villa of the highest order in a unique setting. Please read our guest comments, you will see by glowing reviews how much previous guests have appreciated what they experienced and how much they enjoyed their stay.  You really owe it to yourself. The Prices are for a rental of all Four (4) bedrooms.  with up to 8 Adults and 3 children A 3 Bedroom option for up to 6 Adults and 2 children  ,  a 2 Bedroom option for up to 4 Adults  (or 2 adults 2 children ), and a 1 Bedroom option for  up to 2 Adults are available Any numbers outside of these please message me so we can work something out.  To find these offerings above please go to my Hanny the host page and select the villa with the number of bedrooms you need or message me and I will provide you with the right option.Warm Regards HannyGuest accessYou are overlooking with direct ocean frontage the Surf of Padang Padang Beach. Watch surfers on the waves right below you. The Indian Ocean is at the end of your private terraced garden path, and at low tide you can step straight onto the sand of Padang Padang Beach. Bordering us is 24 hectares of virgin forest running all the way to Uluwatu. We face north so you will not be getting oppressive solar heat from the baking afternoon sun inside your living area, but we still have plenty of all day sun tanning locations including the large cliff edge infinity pool and sunset views from the expansive top floor terrace.You are set a long way down from the road, and are set below and behind 2 solid stonewalls so you will rarely hear any traffic noise whatsoever. 10mm thick cyclone class sliding doors and windows block out all noise.Other things to note*** Important to read this before booking ***The Prices shown are for a rental of all Four (4)  bedrooms.  Up to 8 Adults and 2 childrenPlease Note: Children are under 12 years old, Anyone 12 years and over are considered an Adult in bookings. Two children may stay for free. It can be two children beds in one of the bedrooms or one children's bed in each of two bedrooms.  For only 1 or 2 children do not add any to the  booking otherwise you will be charged by airbnb. Please Note Children staying alone in a bedroom are considered Adults and charged accordingly in number of rooms used. Enter them as Adults in the booking. No more than 10 adults in total can stay in the house.  No more that 10 people in total can stay in the house (Adults and Children combined).Remember if you want your children to have their own bedroom they will be considered to be Adults.  And Children over 12 years old are Adults regardless of where they sleep.If this is confusing send me a message and tell me whom you wish to come in number and age of each and I will tell you how to enter the booking for your lowest price. Laundry :  There is a laundry service at very reasonable prices :  Items collected in the morning will be ready the next morning.  Please ask Wayan the House Manager for the Laundry Price List. Outside Guests:Outside guests are only permitted onsite up to 12 Midnight; they must leave by 12 Midnight.  The maximum number of outside guests you can invite to visit you in the villa can be no more than the number of guest‚Äôs renting/staying at the villa. Example if 8 Adults are renting-staying at the villa you can invite a maximum of 8 Adults to visit. Guests invited for Lunch or Dinner:  Please Note there can be No More people invited from outside for a Lunch or Dinner than the number of Adults staying at the villa.  Guests must leave by 12 Midnight. For outside guests invited for Lunch or Dinner where more than 4 outside guests are in attendance there is a US$100 surcharge to cover the need for staff attendance and extra workload.Late Departures: Checkout is 12 Midday.  If The Luxe Bali is booked for a new guests arrival the day of a departure and times of old guest departure and new guest arrival we can store departing guests baggage while guests visit a restaurant, have a short tour locally, or stay in the cliff edge pergola.  Late Check out surcharge: If there are no new guests arriving on the day of departure the guest may stay in the villa and use bedroom / bathroom for an extra charge of US$50 an hour for each full hour past 12 midday of day booked to depart as we still have staff wage times and power bills to pay. Late Checkouts Past 11pm will be charged an extra full nights stay. Fireworks Candles and Burning Lanterns are strictly forbidden.  NO SMOKING : Smoking inside the house is strictly forbidden and a significant cleaning charge of US$400 a room will be applied should there be tobacco smoke smell inside any room. You can smoke on outside terraces with the outside doors shut. Please ask for an ashtray.Shoes and outside use sandals are forbidden inside the house as we have waxed timber floors. We supply house sandals for inside the villa.  High heels inside the house forbidden. Feet, body, and swimwear must be relatively dry before entering the house so no water drips will get on the waxed wooden floors. Wet towels and wet swimwear must be hung above marble floors or in the bathtub if they need a wash, Do Not placed wet items on or over wooden floors. Ala Carte Breakfast is provided complimentary.A Very Qualified Chef is at your service free of charge from 8am until 9pm. Lunches and Dinners: The Chef can buy ingredients and prepare for you. All purchases are subject to 20% handling fee by the Chef.  Invoices will be provided and you can be assured it will be much cheaper and most often more delicious than eating at a restaurant.  Espresso - Cappuccino etc.  Coffees and Tea's are freely available all day.Complimentary Afternoon Tea with Cookies and Cake. Drinking water free of charge. Massage:8am to 4pm Massage Service available in the in house Spa at reasonable rates by highly qualified massage staff. Out of these hours massage can be arranged at a surcharge.Car and Drivers are available to be booked at a special rate of USD 40 a day a car for 8 hours use (excluding petrol) 5 to 8 guest would need 2 cars Short car trips at US$15 to $20 a car can be arranged within 1 hour if you do not wish to book an all day stand car and driver. Airport Pickup and Drop-off is available at a cost of US$20 per 4-person car. More than 4 guests would require 2 cars. You will need to contact Hanny to arrange this before your arrival with full flight details. For your upmost safety and wellbeing we require All Guests who stay at The Luxe Bali must have full medical and medical evacuation travel insurance. There have been too many cases in Bali of over one hundred thousand dollars for medical evacuation costs over the years.

title: 25BR Unique villas with pool & stunning view

Some rooms will have the luxury sound of nature from the river down there. Very close from the glamorous Ubud but very peaceful, since we're located about 300m from the main road.Some CELEBRITIES have already stayed here, they loved it.The space- free parking space- 24/7 concierge assistance- restaurant, bar and communal pool in the same compound- 5 deluxe rooms, 4 suites, and the rests are villas- 7 villas with plunge pool; 3 villas with real pool and 4 rooms with twin single beds- the resort is accessible by 15-seat minibus, nothing biggerGuest access- you can take the advantage of the nature the resort could offer- party is allowed with advance notice, certain things might be chargeableOther things to noteOur associates are aware of (and is trained) CHSE protocols
