title: 3 connecting luxe villas, 10BR in central Seminyak
description: Beautiful complex featuring adjoining villas that can be rented in a variety of configurations. This listing refers to the booking of two 4-bedroom villa and one 2-bedroom villa.The space4-bedroom villa The villa occupies a sprawling 570 m¬≤ of tropical paradise, surrounded by lush exotic gardens and well-manicured lawns. Guests are invited to immerse themselves in the lush beauty of their surroundings while enjoying the perfect mix of relaxation and luxury. The highlight of the outdoor living areas is the stunning T-shaped swimming pool, a perfect place to cool off and soak up the sun. For those seeking ultimate relaxation, there is a beautiful extralarge day bed, where guests can lounge in total comfort and soak in the beauty of the surroundings.Nestled within the lush tropical gardens of the property, the indoor living area presents a stunning open-air pavilion that seamlessly blends indoor and outdoor living. This spacious and tastefully designed living area boasts a grand high roof that enhances the already luxurious atmosphere.Furnished with designer sofas and a beautifully crafted wooden dining table, this living space is perfect for lounging and entertaining. The well-equipped kitchen will allow you to whip up delicious meals with ease. The attention to detail in the interior design adds a touch of sophistication to your stay, creating a truly unforgettable experience.The four bedrooms of the villa are a perfect blend of comfort and luxury. One is conveniently located adjacent to the living pavilion, while the other three are found in the two-story building. The ground floor houses two bedrooms, each equipped with a cozy double bed, TV with DVD player, spacious dressing room, and an opulent tropical bathroom with either a bathtub or shower. The grand master suite is located on the upper level and features an indulgent outdoor bathtub, as well as access to a beautifully furnished terrace. Each of the bedrooms is a haven of comfort and style.2-bedroom VillaThe villa is set on a sprawling 500 m¬≤ of land, surrounded by lush exotic gardens and well-kept lawns, and featuring a beautiful T-shaped swimming pool. Guests can relax in the Balinese gazebo, sun loungers, and soak up the tropical sun in the comfort of their own private garden.The 75 m¬≤ open living room boasts a traditional high ceiling, lounge area, and dining table. The American-style fitted kitchen is fully equipped and is perfect for those who love to cook. The interior design is tasteful and adds a touch of luxury to your stay.The two bedrooms are positioned on either side of the living room and have large glass sliding doors that access the garden. Both bedrooms feature comfortable double beds, TVs with DVD players, and semi-open tropical bathrooms with bathtubs and large dressing rooms.StaffAt the complex, guests are treated to top-notch luxury services, thanks to the attentive and gracious butlers and attendants. Wake up to a delicious daily breakfast, prepared in the privacy of your own kitchen, and enjoy butler service from 7 AM to 11 PM. The daily housekeeping, front office, and security teams ensure a seamless and stress-free stay. And, for families traveling with little ones, baby cots, trolleys, and car seats are available upon request.With the help of the friendly staff, arrange for an array of extra services, including in-villa dining, rejuvenating spa treatments, exciting day trips, and convenient transportation.Location The estate is situated in the heart of Seminyak, just a stone's throw away from the bustling Jalan Kayu Api, also known as Eat Street. This prime location is a foodie's paradise, with an abundance of world-renowned restaurants and dining destinations at your fingertips.Only a 10-minute walk away from the iconic Seminyak Beach, this area is a haven for those seeking sun, sea and relaxation. Surrounded by world-class spas and boutique shops, guests will never be short of things to do. With popular hotspots such as Ku De Ta beach club and dining destinations like Chandi and Sisterfields in the vicinity, this area is the epitome of tropical luxury.

title: Spectacular Clifftop Luxury 7 Bed Villa,Uluwatu;
description: PLEASE CHECK WITH US FOR AVAILABILITY BEFORE MAKING A BOOKING REQUESTThe villas don't have up-to-date calendars and we are required to check with the owner for last-minute availability.> Please state in your inquiry if you'd require airport transfers.The spacePlease Check With Us For Availability !!Has recently finished undergo a series of luxurious upgrades. The villa is being crafted to offer 7 master bedrooms, three gorgeous living areas and an entertainment center that will knock your socks off. The second villa is now ready for business.This Villa consists of three-level of living area; Lower Floor, Ground Floor and Upper Floor. This villa have a private car porch and garage area on the lower floor. The ground floor is where all of the communal areas are, such as the dining area, pool, terrace and the clifftop view. On the top floor of this Villa are where suites located, in this area guest will be able to enjoy the stunning scenery of a breezy Uluwatu clifftop ocean view.Enjoy the cascading porch and a clifftop ocean view from this villa infinity pool area. Where guests able to squander their relaxing time with our daybed overlooking the Indian Ocean.Clifftop AreaIndulge yourself with a Uluwatu finest panoramic view from our estate. Overlooking to the south of Bali Island into the Indian ocean where the view split with a beautiful horizon of the ocean and the sky. Enjoy a relaxing view towards Melasti beach, that can be within reach with stairs or a 2-minute drive using our complimentary driver (included in for your stay).LivingSit back and relax in our spacious living areas. This villa strikes the balance of outdoor and indoor living, where guests can luxuriate in the indoor living areas equipped with a comfy 8-seater sofa overlooking to the cliff or enjoy the clifftop breeze on our daybeds by the pool. You will feel the relaxing energy surrounds you.DiningWe ensure our kitchen is equipped with state-of-the-art equipment for the chef to serve our guests with the best possible culinary experience.Our indoor dining area will satisfy 10 guests but can be extended for a larger quantity if needed. We provide our own Villa menu for all guests, though we will also cater to dishes off-menu if the ingredients and circumstances allow it.We also offer special cultural food events including Babi Guling (baby pig) and fresh seafood banquets.The Suites7 bedrooms spread over in 3 levels. The prime Suites are located on the top floor, the two rooms are interconnected with a luxuriously designed balcony overlooking to the clifftop view. Each room in this floor will also have their own private balcony.On the ground floor, there are 3 bedroom suites, strategically placed within the Villa for privacy purpose. The last 2 suites are located on the lower ground level, located near the car porch for a convenient of going in and out of the villa.EntertainmentEntertainment is in abundance at This Villa Estate. A mixture of Apple and Satellite television options is dotted throughout the villa; including gaming set up and a boutique library. And it‚Äôs easy for us to organise activities.All of our villas come with the services of our guest relations manager who will be able to assist with massages/spa treatments, tours and travel, car or scooter hire and all general advice and information needed to ensure your vacation is a memorable experience.Please state in your inquiry if you'd require airport transfers. There's a transfer fee of IDR 350K one way for one car, to fit 4 people and luggage (surcharge of IDR 50K if the transfer is between 9pm - 7am). Fee payable to driver directly.All our prices are in US Dollars.Payments can be made in any currency to the equivalent of US Dollars.* We are required by local regulations to charge occupancy tax. Villa rate is subject to 21% government taxes and services charge, not included in the price of the reservation.

title: Private Villa 2 BR swimming pool,best diving area.
description: RUMAH IMPIAN BALI>The private villa with 2 bed room, swimming pool ,good for snorkeling and diving area.The spaceSet in Amed in the Bali region, Rumah Impian has a terrace and sea views. It features mountain views and free WiFi.The villa includes 2 bedrooms, a bathroom with free toiletries, a living room, and a kitchen. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is available.Private swimming pool not share with otherGuests can make use of the hot tub. Barbecue facilities are at guests' disposal and guests can also relax in the garden or on the sun terrace.Ubud is 44 km from Rumah Impian. Ngurah Rai International Airport is 68 km from the property.Guest accessYou can use all parts of the villa area, 2 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, private pool and fully fenced for even more privacy.Other things to noteOpen up all the window and let the ocean breeze,filled the house with healthy air in a complete  safe area.

title: OHANA HOMESTAY ROOM 1 BY SILA DHARMA
Coconutree 4BR Private Pool Vila
description: Breathe life into your vacation by staying in the villa. This 5 Bedroom Villa fully facilitates largergroups withample space within the living room. have a wonderfully placed breakfastin the outdoor sunken seating area just by your veryown infinity swimming pool. You will find naturallycold breezes that drift and flow through the entiretyof the villa with no effort. Take a stroll along the lushrice fields that accompany the villa or sit back on thesunbeds under the straw umbrellas.

title: 32 bright, spacious bedrooms near Jimbaran Beach
description: This stylish place to stay is perfect for group trips. Yes, this could work for  outing; corporate meeting; family gathering; birthday or other special occasion purposes. We are within walking distance to nearest supermarket or convenient store, including local food stall (warung), laundry and gym. Muaya beach (Jimbaran) is about 10 minutes walk.The spaceThe space look like this:- front area consists of parking lot, reception, lobby, bar & restaurant- a meeting room over the restaurant that could fit up to 60 people- spa and gymnasium on the basement- room types: 17x Deluxe, 3 Junior Suites, 4x 1BR villas and 4x 2BR villas

title: Bamboo Resort for Weddings etc
description: Welcome to Noon Villas, your unique eco-luxury retreat in Seseh, Bali (10 min from Canggu). Each villa, ranging from 1 to 4 bedrooms, features serene garden views, private pools, and modern amenities and space for up to 46 People in total. Ideal for Events, weddings or retreats. Crafted entirely from sustainable bamboo, our villas blend seamlessly with the lush tropical surroundings, offering a one-of-a-kind experience just minutes from the beach.The spaceAll Villas have been finished in August 2024 and are brand new.Each of our villas it thoughtfully designed to provide a cozy and comfortable stay. We try to reduce the impact to nature by using sustainable building materials. All detergents, shampoo and shower gel are from Sensatia (High Quality natural products).In an unlikely event of a power outage in Bali, we can provide bottled water and flashlights. It rarely happens any more and normally only last up to 30 minutes. Please note that Bali has a lot of Geckos and insects and it¬¥s unavoidable that one may enter the villa at some point. They are not harmful in any way and are probably running away if they spot you.Guest accessYou will have a private Bamboo Resort with up to 10 Villas, 10 Pools and gardens. We do also have a big reception building for welcome drinks, coffee, workspace or Yoga.

title: Affordable Cozy Inn at Bantan Guest House Canggu
description: Featuring a terrace, Bantan Guest House is located in the Padonan district of Canggu, only 5 km from La Laguna Bali. The air-conditioned accommodation is 4.3 km from Vue Beach Club, and guests benefit from private parking available on site and free WiFi.

title: Luxury 5 Bedroom Cliff Ocean Edge Villa Uluwatu
description: The Luxe Bali is an ultra high end 4 floor  5 bedroom luxury villa above Padang Padang Beach - Uluwatu in a small gated estate. Enjoy cliff edge views of the surf break and beach below with a pathway to the oceans edge.  It features a 4 floor lift, gym, spa, sauna, steam room, home theatre, butler, master chef, housekeeping, 4 pools, & lush gardens. The separate 'Honeymoon' 5th Bedroom is a cosy villa  located just above the waters edge against the cliff face with it's own private plunge pool.The spaceThe Luxe Bali is not your average 'luxury villa'.  If you are here then you are spending a lot of money for a vacation,  please be as informed as possible of what you are getting. If you have already experienced the quaint rustic or the all flash not real quality located on the cliffs/  pool with the long walk getting to the ocean way below villa experiences and would now like to experience a beyond first class residence in location, facility and service that you would absolutely love to live in for the rest of your life then this is the villa for you. A true blend of the finest elements the west and east can put together. Most lean to much either way, The Luxe Bali has found that perfect harmonious middle point between rustic natural materials and absolute high-end comfort.  Understated ZEN. Unlike most villas on the island The Luxe Bali is unique in that it was built with an totally unlimited budget by a very high net worth individual as a second home, one the owner wanted to be as beautiful, comfortable, and facilitated as possible. Not spending as much time in Bali these days the owner has put the villa up for selected rental when they are not there. A nine-year build by the finest craftsmen from all over the world, this is the time it took to get everything to the meticulous quality standards the owner desired. The Architect of the world famous KuDeTa Restaurant in Seminyak was selected to design the villa. There are villas around with more bedrooms for larger groups with some housing an entire football team, but more luxurious? we have yet to see any that have taken it to the level of this residence. Most villas loudly promoted in the ‚Äòluxury' category would be lucky to qualify as bargain basement business class airline equivalents on cheaper airlines, whereas The Luxe Bali is without any doubt up there with the finest airlines first class offerings and at a fraction of what those flights cost. The (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ) of living space boasts Four Master Suites with their own lounge area and en suite bathroom, with each having private terrace or direct access opening to the cliff edge pool. The fourth floor Penthouse Suite features a stunning (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ) of open marble terrace, one of the premier spots in Bali from where you can see the cliffs running down the coast, the surf right out front of you, and the distant shores of Kuta, Seminyak and Canggu across the vast ocean bay and also to enjoy the spectacular light show every sunset brings. The King-size Beds strategically placed to catch the views have the most comfortable absolute top end mattresses available; high thread count cotton sheets and a variety of hardness non-allergic microfiber pillows. For the ultimate experience the world‚Äôs finest Frette Italian Bed sheets are available at extra surcharge.The fourth floor Penthouse Suite features a stunning (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ) of open marble terrace, definitely one of the premier spots in Bali from where you can see the cliffs running down the coast, the surf and surfers right out front of you, the distant shores of Kuta, Seminyak and Canggu across the vast ocean bay and the spectacular light show every sunset brings. Beside this in the evening there no black void into the abyss when the sun goes down and the twinkling lights of the Kuta - Seminyak shoreline along with local fishing boats creates an enchanted view.The third floor feature two spacious bedroom suites with stunning ensuite bathrooms and expansive outside terraces, these are the OceanView Suite and the Rainforest Suite.The second floor is the living dining upper ground level. It contains several lounge areas, a celebrity kitchen with a master chef and butler included. This floor at one end leads to a beautiful rainforest grove complete with two large banyan trees, a multitude of ferns, palms, waterfalls and koi ponds, the other end of the second floor is an unrestricted view of the ocean with cliffs running down to Balangan Beach. Stand at the edge of the lawn and talk to the surfers paddling by.The Cliff Edge Pool Suite is located on the lower ground floor and contains either two single beds or a king size double bed (as requested), and spacious private lounge space that opens out directly onto the large cliff edge pool, pergola and gardens. The fourth bedroom has a bathroom with a luxurious high flow shower (no bath).The lower ground level also holds the fun zone , with a gym, a dry redwood cedar sauna, a steam room, massage spa, and dedicated home theatre. The Meals. Our very talented Chef prepares meals of the highest standard of quality and flavour. Many guests come with the intention of eating out at the high end restaurants Bali is so well know for, but after experiencing the quality of the in-house chef prepared meals served by your own butler and waiter, they often forgo the visits to other restaurants. Guests are charged a 20% surcharge for groceries and produce and the chef prepares meals from that. The cost saving for meals alone becomes quite significant. Please Read the guest reviews about the meals. The same with Drinks, the villa does not sell drinks, but rather authentic origin bottles of wines and spirits are purchased at a 20% surcharge and the butler with a significant saving for you mixes cocktails.The property was purchased well before most any other property on the southern peninsular at a time when they had the choice and means to buy anywhere. This unique location was first noted back in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) after the owners of the estate was surfing an unknown Padang Padang perfect shape left hand tube. Being already well informed on building locations and sun orientation they noticed two significant features almost no other site on the coastline provided. Firstly the property faces north across the ocean with Mt Agung in the background, what this means is a significantly cooler space where you get ocean views all day long without the intense and often uncomfortable heat of the sun beaming into and heating up your villa, and secondly this site is one of less than a handful with terraced grounds all the way down to just above the waters edge.The property was purchased well before most any other property on the southern peninsular at a time when they had the choice and means to buy anywhere. Once again, this is not a villa built on a the normal budget as a business; they are the obvious ones all bundled together . This is a unique high net worth owners villa in a private gated estate of only three properties all built and owned by three high net worth individuals. No management companies, no built then sold by a developer or middleman and the lower quality fixtures and infrastructure they would undoubtedly get from such a set up.Please read our guest comments, you will see by glowing reviews how much previous guests have appreciated what they experienced and how much they enjoyed their stay. You really owe it to yourself.The Prices are for a rental of all Five (5) bedrooms. Up to 10 Adults and 2 childrenRemember if you want your children to have their own bedroom they will be considered to be Adults. And Children over 12 years old are Adults regardless of where they sleep.If this is confusing send me a message and tell me whom you wish to come in number and age of each and I will tell you how to enter the booking for your lowest price.Laundry : There is a laundry service at very reasonable prices : Items collected in the morning will be ready the next morning. Please ask Wayan the House Manager for the Laundry Price List.Outside Guests:Outside guests are only permitted onsite up to 12 Midnight; they must leave by 12 Midnight. The maximum number of outside guests you can invite to visit you in the villa can be no more than the number of guest‚Äôs renting/staying at the villa. Example if 6 Adults are renting-staying at the villa you can invite a maximum of 6 Adults to visit.Guests invited for Lunch or Dinner: Please Note there can be No More people invited from outside for a Lunch or Dinner than the number of Adults staying at the villa. Guests must leave by 12 Midnight.For outside guests invited for Lunch or Dinner where more than 4 outside guests are in attendance there is a US$100 surcharge to cover the need for staff attendance and extra workload.Late Departures: Checkout is 12 Midday. If The Luxe Bali is booked for a new guests arrival the day of a departure and times of old guest departure and new guest arrival we can store departing guests baggage while guests visit a restaurant, have a short tour locally, or stay in the cliff edge pergola.Late Check out surcharge: If there are no new guests arriving on the day of departure the guest may stay in the villa and use bedroom / bathroom for an extra charge of US$150 an hour for each full hour past 12 midday of day booked to depart as we still have staff wage times and power bills to pay. Late Checkouts past  6pm will be charged a half days rental.Late Checkouts Past 10pm will be charged an extra full nights stay.Fireworks Candles and Burning Lanterns are strictly forbidden.Smoking inside the house is strictly forbidden and a significant cleaning charge of US$400 a room will be applied should there be tobacco smoke smell inside any room. You can smoke on outside terraces with the outside doors shut. Please ask for an ashtray.Shoes and outside use sandals are forbidden inside the house as we have waxed timber floors. We supply house sandals for inside the villa. High heels inside the house forbidden.Feet, body, and swimwear must be relatively dry before entering the house so no water drips will get on the waxed wooden floors. Wet towels and wet swimwear must be hung above marble floors or in the bathtub if they need a wash, Do Not placed wet items on or over wooden floors.Ala Carte Breakfast is provided complimentary.A Very Qualified Chef is at your service free of charge from 8am until 9pm. Lunches and Dinners: The Chef can buy ingredients and prepare for you. All purchases are subject to 20% handling fee by the Chef. Invoices will be provided and you can be assured it will be much cheaper and most often more delicious than eating at a restaurant. Espresso - Cappuccino etc. Coffees and Tea's are freely available all day.Complimentary Afternoon Tea with Cookies and Cake. Drinking water free of charge. We are not a restaurant and have a single chef so please limit the variety of meals per lunch or dinner to a reasonable amount. Dinners are not available for serving after 10PM. The chef needs to be at the market early every morning to buy fresh produce.Massage:8am to 4pm Massage Service available in the in house Spa at reasonable rates by highly qualified massage staff. Out of these hours massage can be arranged at a surcharge.Car and Drivers are available to be booked at a special rate of USD 40 a day a car for 8 hours use (excluding petrol) 5 to 8 guest would need 2 cars Short car trips at US$15 to $20 a car can be arranged within 1 hour if you do not wish to book an all day stand car and driver.Airport Pickup and Drop-off is available at a cost of US$20 per 4-person car. More than 4 guests would require 2 cars. You will need to contact Hanny to arrange this before your arrival with full flight details.For your upmost safety and wellbeing we require All Guests who stay at The Luxe Bali must have full medical and medical evacuation travel insurance. There has been too many cases in Bali of over one hundred thousand dollars for medical evacuation costs over the years.Guest accessWhen Booking the Luxe Bali 5 Bedroom villa you not only have private access to the  villas front rainforest garden and the large grassed to the cliff edge from yard.  A private drive down into Garage with stairs and seperate elevator that take you to main entrance of the villa , a white marble infinity pool with ocean view and the plunge pool of the honeymoon suite right above the water on the cliff face.  Besides all this you also have access to the estate shared ( only 2 Villas ) large cliff edge grey granite infinity pool and the two large pergolas , one next to the grey granite infinity pool and one very close to the waters edge ,  80% of the time you will be the only one there as the stairs also lead to the beach at low time and directly into the ocean at high tide.Other things to note*** Important to read this before booking ***The Prices are for a rental of all Five  (5) bedrooms.  Up to 10 Adults and 4 childrenPlease Note: Children are under 12 years old, Anyone 12 years and over are considered an Adult in bookings. Two children may stay for free. It can be two children beds in one of the bedrooms or one children's bed in each of two bedrooms.  For only 1 or 2 children do not add any to the booking otherwise you will be charged by airbnb. (Limited variables allowed)Besides the 24children that can stay for free Another 1 or 2 children can stay at a charge of US$100 a day total for 1 or for 2. For example If you have 3 or 4 children staying altogether put 1 Child in the booking and you will be charged $100Please Note Children staying alone in a bedroom are considered Adults and charged accordingly in number of rooms used. Enter them as Adults in the booking. No more than 8 adults in total can stay in the house.  No more that ten people in total can stay in the house (Adults and Children combined).For 4, 2, and 1 Bedroom Offerings see here below. ---4 Bedroom information and booking link here for up to 8 Adults and 4 children2 Bedroom information and booking link here for up to 4 Adults 1 Bedroom information and booking link here for up to Up to 2 Adults and 2 childrenTo find these offerings please go to my Hanny the host page and select the villa with the number of bedrooms you need. title: Family and Friends - All-In-Villa Perfect Getaway!
description: Situated just 10 minutes walking from Seminyak‚Äôs beach, shops, restaurants and nightlife, the fully staffed Anam Villa is like no other vacation home in Seminyak.You will likely be amazed by the calm and peaceful serenity of the place which can accommodate up to 26 people in its 10 luxurious bedrooms. The perfect place to party, business seminar, yoga retreat or for family reunionsThe spaceApproximately 30 minutes from Ngurah Rai Airport, this villa is located in a perfectly private area ideally situated within walking distance of the famous Eat Street, Laksmana. This prime location offers access to the finest restaurants such as La Luciola and KuDeTa, along with a variety of shops, spas, and high-standard caf√©s. Seminyak Beach is also less than a 10-minute walk away.Accommodating up to 20 guests‚Äîor 26 with additional extra beds‚Äîthe villa features 10 spacious bedrooms, each with its own bathroom:5 ensuite bedrooms with king-size beds1 ensuite bedroom with 2 single beds3 ensuite bedrooms with king-size beds1 ensuite bedroom with 2 single beds (configurable as a twin-bedded room on request)Upon entering through the front wooden gate, you will be greeted by an open living area adorned with collections of Indonesian art, overlooking a tropical garden. The villa boasts two swimming pools: a 17-meter mirror pool equipped with 10 sun loungers and ending in a traditional gazebo with a mattress, and a second 12-meter overflowing pool with additional sun loungers shaded by umbrellas.The staff team includes an on-site villa manager, butlers, and a gardener. Night guards, a chef, a babysitter, a driver, and a yoga teacher are available on request. The dining area features tables that can seat up to 20 guests, adjoining a fully equipped kitchen with granite countertops, a wine cooler, cold water dispenser, five-point gas stove, large gas oven, and a barbecue grill.The villa boasts several luxurious amenities, including:An extraordinary lounge area with a comfortable sofa surrounded by lush gardensA private gym fitted with top-of-the-line equipment such as a treadmill, elliptical trainer, spin bike, and multi-station home gym. A personal coach can be arranged on request.A private spa equipped with a massage room featuring two beds, a single massage room with a bathtub, three pedicure stations, and two manicure stations.WiFi broadband internet accessManager's office with telephone for charged local calls, computer, printer, and faxLocal mobile phones provided on demandTV and DVD players in each bedroomStereo CD sound system in the living room and master bedroomComprehensive DVD and book libraryChildren‚Äôs amenities, including 2 baby cots available on request and board gamesBabysitting services arranged on requestThis villa offers a perfect blend of luxury, privacy, and convenience, ensuring a memorable stay in the heart of Seminyak.Other things to notePLEASE NOTE: 15.5% TAX IS COLLECTED SEPARATELY UPON CHECK-INWe‚Äôre happy to arrange airport transfers for your convenience (additional fee applies). Please let us know in advance if you‚Äôd like this service.

title: 12 Bedroom Majestic Villas Seminyak
description: Located in the heart of Seminyak, these luxurious villas offer a blend of contemporary design and spacious comfort, all within walking distance to the beach. As the only villas in Seminyak with 12 bedrooms in one compound, they provide top amenities and convenience, all within walking distance to boutiques and restaurants. Featuring an open-air lobby, illuminated pathways, and large doors of carved wood, the villas can interconnect to create 10, 14, 16, 18, or 20-bedroom accommodations.The spaceNestled in the heart of Seminyak, our luxurious 12-bedroom villa compound offers the perfect blend of modern elegance and spacious comfort. Designed to accommodate large groups, this exclusive retreat is ideal for family gatherings, celebrations, retreats, and group getaways.As the only villa in Seminyak with 12 bedrooms in one compound, we provide an unparalleled stay experience. The villas feature interconnecting options, allowing flexibility to expand into 10, 14, 16, 18, or even 20-bedroom accommodations, making it the ultimate private sanctuary for any occasion.Rooms & Spaces- Bedrooms: Each bedroom is thoughtfully designed with plush bedding, air conditioning, and en-suite bathrooms, ensuring a restful and private retreat.- Living Areas: The expansive open-air lobby and communal lounges create a welcoming space for relaxation and socializing.- Dining & Kitchen: A spacious dining area and fully equipped kitchen allow for seamless in-villa dining, whether self-catered or with a private chef.- Outdoor Spaces: Enjoy the tranquility of illuminated pathways, lush tropical gardens, and private swimming pools, perfect for unwinding after a day exploring Bali.- Unique Features: Large hand-carved wooden doors and contemporary Balinese-inspired d√©cor add a touch of elegance and cultural charm.Prime LocationSituated just moments away from Seminyak Beach, vibrant boutiques, and world-class restaurants, our villa offers both serenity and convenience, allowing you to experience the best of Bali effortlessly.Whether you seek a luxurious escape or a dynamic group stay, our versatile and spacious villa compound ensures a memorable and comfortable experience for every guest.Guest accessGuests will have exclusive access to the entire villa during their stay, ensuring privacy and a personalized experience. Depending on the number of bedrooms booked (10, 12, 14, 16, 18, or 20), guests will have access to:- All Bedrooms & En-Suite Bathrooms ‚Äì Spacious, fully air-conditioned rooms with private en-suite bathrooms.- Private Swimming Pool(s) ‚Äì A serene pool area, perfect for relaxation and social gatherings.- Living & Lounge Areas ‚Äì Open-air and enclosed living spaces for socializing, unwinding, or enjoying entertainment.- Dining Area & Fully Equipped Kitchen ‚Äì Ideal for private dining experiences, whether self-catered or with a private chef.- Lush Tropical Gardens & Illuminated Pathways ‚Äì Tranquil outdoor areas to immerse in Bali‚Äôs beauty.Private Entrance & Parking Area ‚Äì Secure and convenient access for guests.Throughout their stay, guests can enjoy the entire villa without any shared spaces, ensuring a luxurious and intimate retreat.Other things to noteFlexible Bedroom Configurations: Our villa can be arranged as 10, 12, 14, 16, 18, or 20-bedroom accommodations, making it ideal for various group sizes and events. Please confirm your preferred setup before arrival.- Daily Housekeeping & Butler Services: Our dedicated team ensures a seamless stay, offering daily housekeeping and butler service to cater to your needs throughout your stay.- Breakfast & Dining Options: A daily breakfast can be arranged, and in-villa dining services are available upon request.- Pool Safety: Please note that the pools do not have lifeguards. Guests are responsible for their own safety, especially with children.- Respect for the Neighborhood: To ensure a peaceful environment for all, any kind of music played on Bluetooth speakers must be turned off by 11:00 PM.We look forward to welcoming you and ensuring a truly memorable stay!

title: Exclusive Super Yacth 56Ft - Sail in Style...
description: Welcome aboard your private Italian Super Yacht: Burjuman. We propose you an exceptional custom escape away from the mainland. The crew and the chef are here to answer all your desire whatsoever starting from a cocktail to any custom destination.Cruise the glistening waters with a chilled drink in hand and drop the anchor in crystal clear blue water. Available for day Cruise, 1/2 day cruise or over-night charter. Contact us for special offer and enjoy a unique experience on your gorgeous yachtThe spaceBurjuman is a glamorous 56ft fly bridge triple-deck super yacht imported from Italy. Being aboard Burjuman is like having your own luxury apartment on the water. The spacious air-conditioned living room and dining area will be perfect to enjoy seafood cooked on the BBQ grill on the fly bridge or on your fully equipped galley. Burjuman provide ample room to relax: 2 luxurious double staterooms with en-suite and a twin cabin with separate bathroom. A freshwater outdoor shower on the deck is also here to rince after lovely swim in crystal clear waters.Guest accessThe yacht is yours. You have acces to the entire Burjuman and his equipment.Other things to noteFor your comfort champagne, wine, beer, and a variety of snacks, tropical fruits, and soft drinks are provided as diner cooked by the chef. Towels, WIFI, cruising permits, boat fuel, life jacket, insurance, snorkel equipment, large inflatable mattress and stand up paddle board are included. Transfers from and to your hotel / villa are also includedYou will also have a certified skipper with his crew, an engineer and a chef.

title: Take a brake from the routine in our exotic cocoon
description: Located on a private residential street, the villa invites you to take a break from daily routine in its safe and exotic cocoon. Walk on the villa‚Äôs Indonesian pound and enter the open-plan living room to enjoy a lively breakfast around the large dining room table, a dip in the refreshing pool, and a wonderful massage in the gladak.The spaceWELCOME to this luxury haven located in the exclusive area of Seminyak, just minutes away from the beach, renowned bars, and delightful restaurants. Within a secluded exotic garden, the villa offers 7 spacious bedrooms in individual bungalows set around a splendid swimming pool, each featuring an en-suite dressing area and semi-open private bathroom. The design exudes a sophisticated blend of traditional Indonesian elements and modern European aesthetics. The overall atmosphere finds the perfect balance between relaxing Balinese culture and Western standards of luxury and comfort.During your stay, the attentive staff will cater to your every need, delivering a service of the highest quality, allowing you to fully appreciate every second of your blissful getaway. Located on a private residential street, the villa invites you to take a break from daily routine in its safe and exotic cocoon. Walk on the Indonesian pound and enter the open-plan living room to enjoy a lively breakfast around the large dining table, take a dip in the refreshing pool, or indulge in a wonderful massage in the gladak (additional cost). Relax on the sunbeds, sip exotic fresh juices at the bar, enjoy the peacefulness, gather around on the spacious couches for warm discussions accompanied by a few Mojitos, savor a sparkling dinner cooked by our personal chef, stargaze, and finish your day by watching your favorite movie in the TV room with your close ones.The facility includes:Approximately 500 sqm of living area7 bedroomsSpacious living room with stereo equipmentExpansive dining area (16 seats)Well-furnished air-conditioned TV room with books, board games, DVDsFully-equipped kitchenBar areaTraditional gladakExotic gardenLarge swimming pool (20 meters long)Protective pool fences (on request)Wooden deck with sunbedsBalinese entrance with ornamental pondPrinter & Fax machineGuest bathroomGuarded parking areaCeiling fansBBQUnlimited free WiFiOUR ROOMSSet around the dazzling swimming pool, each bedroom takes the shape of a private bungalow, providing the perfect balance between group moments and intimate, personal space. Elegantly decorated, the rooms are designed to make you feel at home, with all the comforts required to shelter your dreams. Each room is uniquely styled and offers an en-suite dressing area and a semi-open private bathroom. The villa can accommodate up to 16 guests.Choose where you want to smile with the rising sun‚Ä¶1 Master Suite with en-suite dressing and private bathroom with showers and bathtub.2 Deluxe Suites with en-suite dressings and semi-open private bathrooms with shower and bathtub.4 Suites with en-suite dressing and semi-open private bathrooms with outdoor shower.At your convenience,One of the Deluxe Suites can be connected to a Suite to form a Family Suite.One of the Suites can be set up with twin beds.Two additional in-house beds can be arranged (35$/night per bed, including breakfast). For larger groups, please contact us.Each bedroom includes:King or Queen size bedsBaby beds (on request)Desk and chairsBathroom amenitiesSatellite TVDVD playerMini barsSafety deposit boxesWiFi Internet connectionAir conditioningCeiling fanOur villa manager, along with the 12 other members of the team, will guarantee an enchanted experience by attending to your every need with utmost discretion and efficiency. During your stay, your only concern should be embracing your Balinese adventure to the fullest.Villa services include:Private security from 5 pm to 7 amGrocery shopping assistanceHousekeeping service (daily cleaning & turn-down)Bar servicePool serviceBreakfast serviceIn-house ChefVilla manager7 butlersPersonalized welcomeConcierge (on-demand services)Mineral water in roomsOther things to notePLEASE NOTE: 15.5% TAX IS COLLECTED SEPARATELY UPON CHECK-INWe‚Äôre happy to arrange airport transfers for your convenience (additional fee applies). Please let us know in advance if you‚Äôd like this service.

title: Amani Beach Front 6 BR Private Pool Villa
description: Amani 6BR Beachfront villa is a stunning beachfront vacation residence that epitomizes the luxury holiday life. The location is really quiet with a charming sea view. Completely away from the noise and bustle of the city, guests will be spoiled with the sound of the waves and unobstructed views of the ocean. Amani Beach is an exquisite getaway for family and friends to enjoy a unique seaside experience. Amani Beachfront truly accords your coastal living with an air that‚Äôs both luxurious and fun.The spaceFeaturing 6 bedrooms, beachfront Villa Amani has 2 master suites, 2 king-size bedrooms and 2 twin bedrooms each with ensuite bathrooms, boasting opulent living and dining surrounded by magnificent gardens. Between the Main House and Guest House, there is a long bar, behind-which is an event kitchen making Villa Amani an ideal Bali wedding villa.Guest accessAmani Beachfront is located on Ketewel Beach, between Sanur and Bali Safari and Marine Park. You can visit the nearby restaurants or cafes or head over to Ubud for some cultural & nature sightseeing. The surroundings are totally unspoiled, quiet, and tranquil, far away from crowds and noises. Amani Beachfront is a great place to unwind completely.Other things to noteNo Party allowed till late night.No Drugs allowed.No Pets allowed.No Smoking.Don't flush any tissue or woman's pad into toilet.We will charge for any damages caused.Please bring valid Identity Card or Passport upon check-in time.Please take online transportation or Taxi to address of property.

title: Kaba Kaba Estate, 8BR, Tabanan w/ chef
description: Kaba Kaba Estate is a no-expense-spared eight-bedroom destination villa set in over three acres of garden with excellent facilities, five-star service and spectacular rice-terrace views. Contact us for reduced occupancy rates for smaller group size.The spaceKaba Kaba Estate is a regal, no-expense-spared property in Bali`s Tabanan regency, arranged among three acres of gardens with spectacular views over rice terraces stretching to the distant, volcano-strewn horizon. Its series of individual pavilions house eight bedrooms, a home theatre, games room, library, gym, spa, and multiple living areas showcasing antiques, artefacts and contemporary art. Within the gardens is a choice of pools - including a children`s wading pool - as well as a tennis court and croquet lawn. Fully staffed by a highly professional team, Kaba Kaba Estate offers five-star service and is the ideal location for luxurious holidays, parties, celebrations and romantic weddings.Guest accessThis villa comes with every conceivable luxury -  Daily continental breakfast WiFi Internet access  Car and driver at a special rate of USD45++/day for 8 hours (excluding petrol)  Welcome drink and fruit basket   Turndown service   Personal service by the villa staff including full time villa manager, housekeeper, chef/cook, security and attendants   Exclusive use of the whole villa and listed facilities.CAPACITY14 adults + 4 children (8 bedrooms: 5 with king-size beds; 2 with twins convertible to king-size beds; 1 with bunk beds x4); 2 extra beds available at additional charge.LIVING AREASFormal living room; dining pavilion with table for 18; kitchen with drinks bar; three sitting areas; library; media room; games room; rooftop entertainment area with bar.POOLSMain pool: 25m x 5m. 0.38m-1.5m depth; Master suite plunge pool: 6m x 3m x 1.2m; Pilisan suite plunge pool: 5m x 3m x 1.1m; Pande kid's pool: 11m x 0.19m x 0.5m.ENTERTAINMENT60-inch satellite channel TV, 106-inch projector screen, Blu-ray disc player, Wii?entertainment system?and Bose surround-sound system in media room; 32-inch satellite TVs and Blu-ray disc players in all bedrooms (apart from bunk room) plus guest kitchen and Pande living room; 3 iPods; iPod dock in every room.ADDITIONAL FACILITIESBarbecue; in-room safes; generator back-up; air-conditioning and dehumidifiers in all bedrooms and dressing rooms.PROPERTY AREA2,600sqm (villa). 13,000sqm (land). Other things to noteBy booking this property, all guests agree that they have read the house rules And complete listing content. Our complete booking terms And conditions are available for viewing under the Elite Havens website.

title: Elegant 12 Bedroom Beachfront Villa Near Canggu;
description: The three villas sit in a row facing out over the Indian Ocean on a stretch of beach which is perfect for surfing. They are approached through a grand entrance overlooked by the protection of a large stone Buddha. To one side is a commercial kitchen where food is prepared before it is served to you in the luxury of your beachside paradise.> Please state in your inquiry if you'd require airport transfers.The spaceComprises of 3 separate beachfront villas offers 2, 4 and 6 bedrooms respectively. 12 Bedroom Estate‚Äôs tranquil beachfront location is approached through a quintessential Balinese landscape of coconut palms and rice fields, peppered with the peaks of mountains on the horizon. This untouched spot is situated on the south west coast right beside the traditional village of Seseh where life has remained largely unchanged by the progress of the modern world.The luxurious 12 bedroom estate comfortable sleeps 24 guests and features unbeatable views of the surrounding natural beauty and with each villa being restored back to their former glory at the end of 2016. Contemporary tropical architecture, vast open air living spaces and an abundance of light intermingles with the soft sound of the waves, a myriad of exotic green and sweet scented frangipani trees to bring you a holiday retreat that you will simply never want to leave.All the villas are approached through a stunning walkway which provides tantalising vista‚Äôs across the endless rice fields. Each property is private and fully detached from the others and the innovative landscaping of the gardens at the front means that each swimming pool area is separated by a riot of tropical greenery. However, the lawn, a brilliant space for parties and special events, opens up across the full length of the estate as it reaches down to the beach.Location: The villa is located on Seseh Beach, surrounded by beautiful paddy fields and just minutes from the picturesque Seseh village. This stretch of beach is excellent for surfingAll of our villas come with the services of our guest relations manager who will be able to assist with massages/spa treatments, tours and travel, car or scooter hire and all general advice and information needed to ensure your vacation is a memorable experience.Please state in your inquiry if you'd require airport transfers. There's a transfer fee of IDR 350K one way for one car, to fit 4 people and luggage (surcharge of IDR 50K if the transfer is between 9pm - 7am). Fee payable to driver directly.All our prices are in US Dollars. Payments can be made in any currency to the equivalent of US Dollars.

title: Zenn, 4 Bedroom Villa, Candidasa;
description: This uniquEtched into the hillside in Candidasa, The villa is a modern 4 bedroom villa overlooking an unmatched view of the treetops, hills and ocean. Ideal for spending quality time with your loved ones, the newly built villa boasts a private saltwater swimming pool, multiple terraces and open plan living areas. Bask in the luxurious setting for a peaceful tropical getaway.e place has a style all its own.

title: Seminyak 10 BR Unique Design Villa
description: "Before sending a booking request, please contact us to inquire about any promotional rates that may be available.The pricing for the villa is dynamic and subject to change, with some dates potentially having discounted rates.Please note that the calendar for the villa may not always be up-to-date, so we recommend checking with us for last-minute availability.The spaceLocated in the heart of Seminyak, minutes away from nearby Double Six beach, This villa prides itself as the ultimate accommodation for large groups, weddings, birthdays and other get-togethers. Combining two villas, this villa features ten bedrooms sprawled out across the gorgeous property. With two swimming pools, two living pavilions and a home movie theatre, it‚Äôs hard to surpass this villa for your next big group holiday.This Seminyak Luxury Villa features a Jacuzzi, roof-top lounge area, poolside gazebo and tropical gardens.With a dedicated team of staff, this villa offers guests a level of service that ensures comfort throughout your entire stay, from a personalised butler service to an incredible on-site chef, daily housekeeping and security. It‚Äôs hard not to relax and enjoy all this villa has to offer.This villa allows you to easily experience the popular area of Jalan Oberoi, a place commonly known as ‚Äúeat street‚Äù due to its array of great restaurants and local shops, while still being within walking distance of Double Six beach.All our prices are in US Dollars.Payments can be made in any currency to the equivalent of US Dollars.Other things to notePlease contact us before INSTANT BOOKING for a final availability check, to ensure that your selected dates are available.

title: 27BR river resort with lush tropical landscape
description: You won‚Äôt want to leave this charming, one-of-a-kind place.  We own the river since it's located between our compounds. Anywhere in our place, from the rooms/villas, public areas and outdoors are picturesque. Indeed, our place is great for any type of retreat, gathering, outing, wedding etc. Apart from that, our location is perfect: about 400m off the main road; we can go anywhere without traffic and is close to the infamous Sukawati traditional market.The spaceThe space look like this:- huge parking lot - the resort is located across the river, got to walk to the main area- front formation: lobby, shala, stage, two-sides restaurant, store room- some villas including private pool villas are located behind the front formations- the second compound is located across the river- 2nd compound got: a communal pool, some 13 garden villas, pavilions, spa and outdoor venuesOther things to noteOur associates are aware of the CHSE standard and well trained to work on health protocols.

title: 8BR Private Guest House & SwimmingPool @Ubud

title: Ultimate Group Getaway 17BR Private Villas & Lofts
description: Welcome to this exclusive villa complex in Canggu, featuring a total of 17 bedrooms, thoughtfully spread across five 2-bedroom villas, one 3-bedroom villa, and one spacious 4-bedroom villa. Ideal for large groups or families traveling together, this unique setup offers both privacy and togetherness in a tropical paradise.The spaceEach villa is fully self-contained with its own private pool, fully equipped kitchen, dining area, and open-plan living space, offering the perfect blend of comfort and style. Whether you're lounging poolside or preparing a meal with loved ones, every moment here feels like home.All bedrooms are air-conditioned and feature private en-suite bathrooms, ensuring personal comfort for every guest. Thoughtful touches like smart TVs, desks, and plush bedding elevate your stay, while one of the rooms also offers a private balcony to unwind in peace.Nestled in serene Canggu, you're just minutes away from trendy cafes, local beaches, and vibrant nightlife. Our dedicated manager is on hand to assist with anything you need‚Äîfrom airport transfers, scooter or car rental, in-villa massage bookings, to tour arrangements.Whether you're planning a getaway with friends, a wellness retreat, or a family holiday, this villa complex provides the space and service to make your Bali experience unforgettable.Guest accessThe guest can access the entire complex of villasOther things to notePlease note as we don't own the rice fields in front of the villa, you may experience some farmers passing in front. As they are working on their land, this is just natural and we can't do anything against it. Take it as an opportunity to see more of the locals life!VILLA WITH RICE FIELD VIEWAs nature is integral to the villa, you may hear noises which come from insects and animals who inhabit the rice field and surroundings (frogs, chickens etc.). This is the charm of living close to nature in Bali.Kindly note that rice fields surrounding the property are the main food resources for locals living in the area. This means they may be harvested at different times of the year. Host is not responsible for any surrounding landscape modification/intervention out of their scope.Bali is a humid and tropical natural environment with lots of greenery. Geckos, insects and other exotic animals from time to time (bats, lizards, bugs‚Ä¶) are endemic to the Island. Even though gentle pest controls are regularly operated at the property, some encounters may occur. Please note that all of them are completely harmless and important for a balanced ecosystem. Since the property is located in a newly developed area, the electricity supply may not be as reliable as in more developed cities. Occasional power cuts from the island‚Äôs unique provider are to be expected. Please note that these situations are entirely beyond the host's control. There is no generator on-site, and refunds will not be provided for this reason.===FAQs- Q: What time is the Check-in policy?-A: Please be informed that check-in time is at 15:00 by default. Arriving earlier? No problem, we will manage for you to drop your luggage first and start exploring the area while waiting for the villa to be ready. If you need an early check in we will try to accommodate you but we can‚Äôt promise, it is subject to the villa availability.- Q: What time is the Check-out policy?- A: Our check-out time is at 11:00am by default. Late check-out is subject to availability and may involve extra charge. Please note that for any late check-out between 11:00 ‚Äì 15:00; an additional charge of 50% of the Daily Villa Rate will apply. Any check-out after 15:00, will be charged at a full day's Daily Villa Rate. If you need to store your luggage after check-out time, please get in touch with us. Should the villa be empty, we'll be happy to store them.- Q: Could I have a butler or a personal Chef to cook, so I can dine in the villa?- A: Breakfast is not included in the nightly rate, however our team can provide it with additional cost starting from IDR 95k/person. Kindly note that your butler is reachable through What's app from 9 am to 5 Pm and for emergencies. He/She is pleased to assist with your requests, however, he/she does not reside on site at all times.- Q : Do we have a housekeeping service every day?- A : Yes, there will be a housekeeping service every day at your convenience. For the sake of respecting every guest's privacy, please kindly arrange with your butler should you wish your villa to be cleaned and at what time. Service occurs once a day.Kindly note that your villa host is reachable through What's app from 9 am to 5 Pm and for emergencies. He/She is pleased to assist with your requests, however, he/she does not reside on site at all times.- Q : Can we have extra clean towels?- A : For eco-friendly reasons towels are changed every three days. Please leave them on the floor for our staff to pick-it up. Towels left hanging on racks will be considered clean if not on the floor.- Q : What is the maximum occupancy for this villa?- A : This villa is for 34 people including children.

He will make you live a deep rebirth program.Other things to noteTHE SERVICESVilla managerIn-house staff and butlerNight securityWelcome service (welcome drink, pick up at the airport)Daily cleaning and villa maintenanceConcierge serviceBreakfast includedPersonal chief on demandMassages on demand2 private Swimming Pools and garden maintenanceGazeboParkingGaz barbecueContact us for event detail and fee.We are required by local regulations to charge occupancy tax. title: 18 Bedrooms Haven Villas Seminyak
description: Located in the heart of Seminyak, these luxurious villas offer a blend of contemporary design and spacious comfort, all within walking distance to the beach. As the only villas in Seminyak with 18 bedrooms in one compound, they provide top amenities and convenience, all within walking distance to boutiques and restaurants. Featuring an open-air lobby, illuminated pathways, and large doors of carved wood, the villas can interconnect to create 10, 12, 14, 16, or 20-bedroom accommodations.The spaceNestled in the heart of Seminyak, our luxurious 18-bedroom villa compound offers the perfect blend of modern elegance and spacious comfort. Designed to accommodate large groups, this exclusive retreat is ideal for family gatherings, celebrations, retreats, and group getaways.As the only villa in Seminyak with 18 bedrooms in one compound, we provide an unparalleled stay experience. The villas feature interconnecting options, allowing flexibility to expand into 12, 14, 16, 10, or even 20-bedroom accommodations, making it the ultimate private sanctuary for any occasion.Rooms & SpacesBedrooms: Each bedroom is thoughtfully designed with plush bedding, air conditioning, and en-suite bathrooms, ensuring a restful and private retreat.Living Areas: The expansive open-air lobby and communal lounges create a welcoming space for relaxation and socializing.Dining & Kitchen: A spacious dining area and fully equipped kitchen allow for seamless in-villa dining, whether self-catered or with a private chef.Outdoor Spaces: Enjoy the tranquility of illuminated pathways, lush tropical gardens, and private swimming pools, perfect for unwinding after a day exploring Bali.Unique Features: Large hand-carved wooden doors and contemporary Balinese-inspired d√©cor add a touch of elegance and cultural charm.Prime LocationSituated just moments away from Seminyak Beach, vibrant boutiques, and world-class restaurants, our villa offers both serenity and convenience, allowing you to experience the best of Bali effortlessly.Whether you seek a luxurious escape or a dynamic group stay, our versatile and spacious villa compound ensures a memorable and comfortable experience for every guest.Guest accessGuests will have exclusive access to the entire villa during their stay, ensuring privacy and a personalized experience. Depending on the number of bedrooms booked (10, 12, 14, 16, 18, or 20), guests will have access to:All Bedrooms & En-Suite Bathrooms ‚Äì Spacious, fully air-conditioned rooms with private en-suite bathrooms.Private Swimming Pool(s) ‚Äì A serene pool area, perfect for relaxation and social gatherings.Living & Lounge Areas ‚Äì Open-air and enclosed living spaces for socializing, unwinding, or enjoying entertainment.Dining Area & Fully Equipped Kitchen ‚Äì Ideal for private dining experiences, whether self-catered or with a private chef (additional charge).Lush Tropical Gardens & Illuminated Pathways ‚Äì Tranquil outdoor areas to immerse in Bali‚Äôs beauty.Private Entrance & Parking Area ‚Äì Secure and convenient access for guests.Throughout their stay, guests can enjoy the entire villa without any shared spaces, ensuring a luxurious and intimate retreat.Other things to noteFlexible Bedroom Configurations: Our villa can be arranged as 10, 12, 14, 16, 18, or 20-bedroom accommodations, making it ideal for various group sizes and events. Please confirm your preferred setup before arrival.Daily Housekeeping & Butler Services: Our dedicated team ensures a seamless stay, offering daily housekeeping and butler service to cater to your needs throughout your stay.Inclusive Breakfast & Private Chef Services: Daily breakfast is included in your stay. For lunch and dinner, a private chef service is available at an additional charge and must be booked in advance.Pool Safety: Please note that the pools do not have lifeguards. Guests are responsible for their own safety, especially with children.Respect for the Neighborhood: To ensure a peaceful environment for all, any kind of music played on Bluetooth speakers must be turned off by 11:00 PM.We look forward to welcoming you and ensuring a truly memorable stay!

title: The Riverhouse
description: Your home in Pererenan. The Riverhouse is a sophisticated villa, featuring five bedrooms and seven bathrooms, a 25m swimming pool, and expansive living areas that offer direct views of Bali's lush rice fields. Complete with all the essentials, guests will enjoy exclusive use of the villa, daily breakfast and coffee prepared to order, personal chef for lunch and dinner service, and an on-site bartender. Your villa manager will be available to assist you in arranging airport transfers, car hirThe spacePLEASE NOTE:  A construction project next door will continue throughout 2025, with work scheduled strictly between 8:00 a.m. and 6:00 p.m., Monday through Saturday. During this time, we are expecting a significant level of noise disruption. For this reason, we‚Äôve adjusted our rates with a 30% discount, allowing you to enjoy an incredible stay at an even better value. Feel free to reach out if you have any questions‚Äîwe‚Äôre happy to help!The owners built this remarkable villa as their residence in Bali, completing the project in 2019. It was designed to be as comfortable as any residential home in the world, with thoughtful decorations throughout. Now, you are welcome to experience it for yourself. Conceptualised by renowned Bali-based architect Alexis Dornier, the River House was built with locally sourced sandstone and reclaimed timber. In addition, the wooden latticework on the exterior, paired with multiple semi-outdoor spaces, provides different perspectives and viewpoints as you enjoy all the villa has to offer. The interior design by Somewhere Concepts guides you through the grand entrance into an inviting space that seamlessly blends Bali‚Äôs tropical outdoors with comfortable finishes. Expect to be impressed by the double-height ceilings, expansive alfresco dining area, and poolside tropical gardens. Contemporary minimalism is effortlessly seen throughout the River House. Here, you will see the 25m vertical swimming pool, ideally surrounded by lush greenery to offer shade from the afternoon sun. Experience a new way of living with views of the generously landscaped gardens thoughtfully prepared by the Bali Landscape Company, featuring coconut trees, rice fields, and river access. YOUR VILLA Capacity: 10 guests in 5 bedrooms with the option to accommodate 12 guests with additional bedding (charges may apply)Master Bedroom (bedroom 1): features large ensuite, outdoor bathtub, balcony access, walk-in closet, 1 x king bed Junior Master Bedroom (bedroom 2): features large ensuite, balcony access, walk-in closet, 1 x king bedBedroom 3: features own ensuite, balcony access, walk-in closet, 1 x king bed (or 2 x single beds)Bedroom 4: features own ensuite, balcony access, walk-in closet, 1 x king bed (or 2 x single beds)Bedroom 5: features own ensuite, balcony access, walk-in closet, 1 x king bed (or 2 x single beds)Bathrooms: 7 bathrooms (5 en-suite and two additional powder rooms located on the entry level and the ground floor)Entertainment: Indoor and outdoor open plan dining areas, double height indoor living area, surround sound indoor and outdoor speakers, media room, massage roomCommunication: Your booking includes free access to our high-speed Internet; 200 Mbps WiFi is available throughout the villaPool: 25m private outdoor swimming poolINCLUSIONSLinen (sheets, towels, blankets, pillows)Housekeeping service, daily cleaning, and daily breakfast with barista-style coffeePersonal villa manager from 0900 - 17:00 Full access to the villa, private pool, and private tropical gardensBOOKING CONDITIONSCheck-in is not available on major public holidays. Arrival is from 2:00 pm daily, and departure time is at 11:00 am daily. GUEST REVIEWSWe love the use of local materials alongside fine imported furnishings, from the sun-soaked pool deck and stone walls to the custom-made furniture, Belgian tableware, and fine French linen sheets. THE HONEYCOMBERS BALI ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖThere are very few times in a person‚Äôs life that you get to step inside a house that will become a testament to architecture, a celebrated building, and truly a work of art. I can‚Äôt predict the future, but I‚Äôve seen enough architecture in my lifetime to know that this house is no ordinary house. It is, in fact, history in the making. BALI INTERIORS ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖGuest accessOur villa manager and staff will be waiting to welcome you to the villa on arrival at the gate simply let our staff know you have arrived either by phone or by ringing the bell on the intercom. Guests are welcome to request an early arrival, otherwise, check in is from 2:00 pm daily. We offer secure parking for 2 cars and a few scooters inside the complex. The security guard is on-site each night from 6:00 pm to 6:00 am and we offer guests added peace of mind with 24 hour CCTV.Other things to noteCheck in time is from 2:00 pm and Check out time is 11:00 am. Please respect the arrival and departure times as outlined in your terms of stay. The River House Bali is not pet friendly or secure for pets so please do advise management if you have questions regarding pets before booking. We are not a party house, however, we can offer guests a chance to enjoy the entertainment and dining areas for small dinner parties of up to 12 people. If you require a chef or additional staff please let us know so we can arrange this for your stay. Thank you and we look forward to welcoming you soon.

title: North Ubud 10BR Sanctuary Boutique Villas
description: Our place is a brand new beauty that comes with 10 bedrooms. It sits on the hill down to the river so each spots got an equal stunning jungle/valley view. Being so quiet and rich of oxygen, including the healing sounds of nature, are what we're widely known. 10 minutes to surrounding attractions e.g. swings, rice paddy walk, tubing, restaurants, shops etc. and, it takes about 30 minutes to Ubud center.The spaceOur place is located on the backbone of the jungle valley. Your vehicle will reach till the parking lot and then you will go down on foot to the lobby, crossing the river (bridge) and go up to the lobby. 6 villas are located a bit higher than the lobby, the other 2x 2BR villas are on the lower level, in-line with the communal pool, restaurant and the wedding chapel. We are indeed luxurious and all rooms are bright and spacious.Other things to noteCHSE certified and the staff is well trained to address the health protocols.

title: Spacious, 9 Bedroom Villa in Seminyak
description: "Before sending a booking request, please contact us to inquire about any promotional rates that may be available. The pricing for the villa is dynamic and subject to change, with some dates potentially having discounted rates. Please note that the calendar for the villa may not always be up-to-date, so we recommend checking with us for last-minute availability."=============================================================The spaceThis spacious and luxurious villa is situated in the heart of Seminyak, one of Bali's most sought-after destinations, offering the perfect blend of comfort, style, and convenience. The villa boasts an expansive design with open, airy spaces that create a relaxed, yet sophisticated ambiance. Guests will enjoy the seamless indoor-outdoor living experience, with a shared swimming pool as the centerpiece, surrounded by lush greenery and tropical gardens.The villa features a beautifully designed, communal lounge area that is perfect for unwinding or socializing with friends and family. The stylish lounge is furnished with comfortable seating, creating a welcoming atmosphere for both relaxation and entertainment. Adjacent to the lounge is a shared dining area, designed with elegant, contemporary furnishings, offering the ideal space for meals or casual gatherings. This area is perfect for enjoying delicious local cuisine or a meal prepared by a private chef, all while enjoying the serene surroundings of the villa.Each room in the villa is thoughtfully designed with modern fixtures and ample space, creating a perfect retreat after a day of exploration. The spacious bedrooms are equipped with high-end amenities, offering guests a peaceful sanctuary. The villa's design prioritizes privacy and comfort, while maintaining a sense of openness that enhances the overall experience.The shared pool area is beautifully designed with comfortable lounge chairs, offering a tranquil space for sunbathing, relaxing, or enjoying a refreshing swim in the tropical climate. With its prime location, the villa provides easy access to Seminyak's vibrant beach clubs, trendy cafes, fine dining restaurants, and designer boutiques.Ideal for those seeking both privacy and community, this villa offers a harmonious balance of modern luxury and Balinese charm, creating a memorable stay for all guests. Whether you're lounging by the pool, socializing in the lounge, or dining in the shared space, this villa provides an unforgettable experience in one of Bali‚Äôs most iconic neighborhoods.=============================================================Our villas include the dedicated services of a Guest Relations Manager, available to assist with tours, transportation, massages, activities, reservations, and any other needs to ensure your vacation is memorable and hassle-free. From the moment you arrive, our team is committed to providing an unforgettable experience.We can arrange daily breakfast, lunch, dinner, or a BBQ at your villa, tailored to your preferences.To make your arrival and departure as seamless as possible, we offer airport transfer services at a reasonable cost. Please inform us if you require this service, and we will be happy to assist you.

description: Located in the Taman district of Ubud, it provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi. Among the various facilities are a garden and a terrace. The accommodation offers free shuttle service, and buying tickets for guests.The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at River Sakti Ubud.Staff at reception can assist around the clock with guidance on the area.The spaceLocated in the Taman district of Ubud, River Sakti Ubud provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi. Among the various facilities are a garden and a terrace. The accommodation offers free shuttle service, and buying tickets for guests.The units at the resort come with a seating area and a flat-screen TV. Every room comes with a private bathroom with a hot tub, free toiletries and a hair dryer. All units will provide guests with a desk and a kettle.An American breakfast is served daily at the property. Guests can dine in the in-house restaurant, which serves Sushi cuisine and also offers gluten-free and halal options.The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at River Sakti Ubud.Staff at reception can assist around the clock with guidance on the area.Ubud Market is 3.3 km from the accommodation, while Ubud Palace is 3.3 km from the property. Ngurah Rai International Airport is 40 km away.

title: Exceptional 8 Bedroom Villa, Central Seminyak
description: A palatial modern 8 bedroom villa right in the  heart of Seminyak, combining two  stunning villas to create an expansive unique property.With 8 master suites, two generous sized swimming pools,  kitchens, , living, dining, many entertaining spaces and a private bar, this is the perfect villa for large groups or families. The villa is conveniently located only a few minutes  walk to the main "Eat Street" in Oberoi for you to enjoy all the best entertainment and the beach also very close by.The spaceThe villa is located down a very secure private lane in Oberoi, Seminyak , with 24/7 Security, Guests Services, Butler, Housekeeping, Chef, a Driver on standby to take you anywhere you choose to adventure around in Bali (driver is at an extra costs for daily rates)The villa offers  8 spacious modern bedrooms all with en-suite bathrooms and amenities, 8 master suites and two family master suites, with king bed and two king singles, great for family rooms.The property consists of two adjoining villa, one 5 bedroom and one 3 bedroom so this gives complete privacy of the estate and  the choice of two separate living spaces, dinning ares, kitchens and swimming pools. This is perfect for groups that like to have many separate private areas to enjoy.The open plan alfresco style living and dining spaces overlook the luscious gardens and pool areas with  a very generous sized swimming pools,  perfect for sun lounging or to just enjoy the afternoon breeze or delicious meals prepared by your in-house chef.Adjoining the living space there is a well equipped kitchen's for staff to arrange meals for you and your own personal bar for entertaining.  There is also the added addition of your own private gym if you like to stay fit during your holiday. Daily breakfast is included in the night rate.The villa sleeps up to 20 people, extra guests after 16 guests are an additional USD 50 per person, per night and must be notified in advance so villa can accommodate bedding configurations. With spacious grounds and numerous entertaining areas, this is the perfect getaway for large groups or families who want to be in the heart of the Seminyak and enjoy all the entertainment,  but with their own private oasis to relax and unwind.Guest accessGuests have private use and access of the both villas and all facilitiesOther things to noteGuests have complete privacy and use of the villas staff for their comfort at requested hours.Villa sleep 20 people, any guests over 16 people are at an extra cost of USD 50 per night per person based on request only. Security Deposit required IDR 10,000,000 that will be returned upon check-out if no damage. Villa is subject to 15.5% tax and services.

title: Close to nature 24BR with pool in northern Ubud
description: Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space. Being secluded is our selling point. We are located about 35 minutes ride up north from Ubud center, 500m off the main road. Once you checked-in you will want to just stay in the resort. The property is brand new that offer bright, clean rooms. We can provide Balinese dances, cook, transport, just to name a few.

title: Spacious, 9 Bedroom Villa in Seminyak
description: "Before sending a booking request, please contact us to inquire about any promotional rates that may be available. The pricing for the villa is dynamic and subject to change, with some dates potentially having discounted rates. Please note that the calendar for the villa may not always be up-to-date, so we recommend checking with us for last-minute availability."=============================================================The spaceThis spacious and luxurious villa is situated in the heart of Seminyak, one of Bali's most sought-after destinations, offering the perfect blend of comfort, style, and convenience. The villa boasts an expansive design with open, airy spaces that create a relaxed, yet sophisticated ambiance. Guests will enjoy the seamless indoor-outdoor living experience, with a shared swimming pool as the centerpiece, surrounded by lush greenery and tropical gardens.The villa features a beautifully designed, communal lounge area that is perfect for unwinding or socializing with friends and family. The stylish lounge is furnished with comfortable seating, creating a welcoming atmosphere for both relaxation and entertainment. Adjacent to the lounge is a shared dining area, designed with elegant, contemporary furnishings, offering the ideal space for meals or casual gatherings. This area is perfect for enjoying delicious local cuisine or a meal prepared by a private chef, all while enjoying the serene surroundings of the villa.Each room in the villa is thoughtfully designed with modern fixtures and ample space, creating a perfect retreat after a day of exploration. The spacious bedrooms are equipped with high-end amenities, offering guests a peaceful sanctuary. The villa's design prioritizes privacy and comfort, while maintaining a sense of openness that enhances the overall experience.The shared pool area is beautifully designed with comfortable lounge chairs, offering a tranquil space for sunbathing, relaxing, or enjoying a refreshing swim in the tropical climate. With its prime location, the villa provides easy access to Seminyak's vibrant beach clubs, trendy cafes, fine dining restaurants, and designer boutiques.Ideal for those seeking both privacy and community, this villa offers a harmonious balance of modern luxury and Balinese charm, creating a memorable stay for all guests. Whether you're lounging by the pool, socializing in the lounge, or dining in the shared space, this villa provides an unforgettable experience in one of Bali‚Äôs most iconic neighborhoods.=============================================================Our villas include the dedicated services of a Guest Relations Manager, available to assist with tours, transportation, massages, activities, reservations, and any other needs to ensure your vacation is memorable and hassle-free. From the moment you arrive, our team is committed to providing an unforgettable experience.We can arrange daily breakfast, lunch, dinner, or a BBQ at your villa, tailored to your preferences.To make your arrival and departure as seamless as possible, we offer airport transfer services at a reasonable cost. Please inform us if you require this service, and we will be happy to assist you.
