title: Sensational Prestigious 10 Bedroom Villa,Seminyak;
description: *SUBJECT TO 15% GOVERNMENT AND SERVICE TAX, COLLECTED SEPARATELY UPON CHECK IN.Combine of 3 Villas Complex offering a total 10 air-conditioned bedrooms.> Please state in your inquiry if you'd require airport transfers.The spaceThe spacious Villa 1 is the largest villa in the complex. Offering 4 air-conditioned bedrooms, this villa is set within a lush tropical landscaped garden featured with a relaxing bale (Javanese gazebo) and a large swimming pool surrounded by unique wooden sunbeds.The main thatched roof pavilion is housing a spacious living room which have a comfy sofas, fully equipped gourmet kitchen with bar and stools and 10 seating dining table. This living pavilion is filled with high-end pieces of artistry and it is designed with semi-open style to maximize the air circulation and to capture the natural daylight.Villa 2 is designed to capture the feel of colonial era and filled with refined pieces of artworks from the remote jungles of Africa and the imperial dynasty of China. Offering three air-conditioned bedrooms, this villa is set within the neat tropical garden featuring a private swimming pool with sun loungers and a relaxing Balinese lounging pavilion.The thatched roof main pavilion is housing the 2 bedrooms, spacious living and dining area whilst in the back side of the pavilion is the gourmet kitchen facility showcases an over-sized Buddha statue.Villa 1 and  2 have a unique sliding wall to connect both villas, however, it can be locked for individual villa privacy.Villa 3 is an elegant three bedroom villa was designed with an open-living style creates a charming ambiance. The special point of this villa is that the garden have an extra large thatched roof relaxing bale to allow you to relax and enjoy the atmosphere.This unique-shaped pavilion is housing the two bedrooms overlooking the swimming pool, spacious living area, dining area and gourmet kitchen including the master bedroom.BEDROOMThere are four luxurious air-conditioned bedrooms at Villa 1. A unique decor double-sized bedroom is located on either side of the main pavilion, each have its own en-suite bathroom completed with bathtub, rain shower and wash basin with a dressing mirror.The other two air-conditioned bedrooms are located side by side in a separate thatched roof pavilion overlooking the swimming pool. Each bedroom have its own unique interior that showcases antique artifacts and an en-suite bathroom furnished with rain shower, wash basin and a dressing mirror.Villa 2 is consists of three air-conditioned bedrooms. Two well-appointed bedrooms are located on either side of the main pavilion featuring king-sized beds, unique interior with pieces of refined artworks, private seating area on the front veranda and en-suite bathrooms with rain shower, wash basin and dressing mirror.The third bedroom is located on a stand-alone pavilion overlooking the swimming pool. It furnished with air-conditioning, unique interior with pieces of refined artworks and en-suite bathroom with rain shower, wash basin and dressing mirror.Villa 3 have three air-conditioned bedrooms which can accommodate up to 6 adults and 2 children. The master bedroom is a serene haven, furnished with king-sized bed, en-suite bathroom with outdoor rain shower and egg-shaped bathtub. The wash basin is unique, made of a single piece of rock with a large dressing mirror. This bedroom have three direct access into the living pavilion and the garden.The other two bedrooms are peacefully located on the other side of the main pavilion. Both bedrooms have sliding glass door for direct access into the swimming pool and furnished with king-sized beds, en-suite bathrooms with rain shower facility.FACILITIES & SERVICESTotal 10 air-conditioned bedrooms with double and king-sized beds.En-suite bathrooms with bathtub, rain shower, wash basin and dressing mirror.Sleeps up to 20 adults and 6 children.Living room featured comfortable sofa, flat screen TV with satellite channels and DVD player.iPod dock available.Professional service kitchen with modern facility.Dining area, each with 10 and 8 seating wooden dining table.Private swimming pool with pool deck and sun loungers.Well maintained tropical garden.Wi-Fi internet access through out the villa.Safe deposit box.1 villa manager and 8 house maids.Butler ServiceChefFull time security.Optional services with extra charge:Extra beds.Laundry service.Spa and wellness.Baby sitter, baby cot, toddler and high chair.Pool fence.Car rental with English speaking driver.Late Check-out is possible at extra cost, based on availability.All of our villas come with the services of our guest relations manager who will be able to assist with massages/spa treatments, tours and travel, car or scooter hire and all general advice and information needed to ensure your vacation is a memorable experience.Please state in your inquiry if you'd require airport transfers. There's a transfer fee of IDR 250K one way for one car, to fit 4 people and luggage (surcharge of IDR 50K if the transfer is between 10pm - 7am). Fee payable to driver directly.All our prices are in US Dollars.Payments can be made in any currency to the equivalent of US Dollars.* We are required by local regulations to charge occupancy tax. Villa rate is subject to 15% government taxes and services charge, not included in the price of the reservation and have to be paid directly upon check-in.

title: Amazing 9 Bedroom Heart of Seminyak-Oberoi
description: The Villa sits on 1800sqm of landscaped gardens just 300m from Seminyak‚Äôs best beach, featuring 9 bedroom Villa. The Villa, right in the heart of prestigious Oberoi district, is only 300 meters from Ku De Ta and can comfortably accommodate up to 18 guests.The spaceThe villa consist of a 6 bedroom and 4 bedroom connected villa, both feature L shaped, signature swimming pools, huge living rooms, indoor and outdoor lounging and dining, pool tables, vast individual bedroom suites, world-class interior design with a distinct Balinese theme, and every conceivable luxury for the sophisticated holidaymaker. We will lock one of the bedroom during your stay.The villa has unrivalled facilities with 15 full-time staff, including a private butler for each villa, chefs, housekeeping, gardener and trained security, plus on-demand chauffeurs, spa therapists and concierge, all of whom are dedicated to ensuring guests are pampered during every moment of their stay, except of course when they hang out the red ‚Äòdo not disturb‚Äô flag to ensure total privacy.Guest accessIndoor livingThe vast open-sided and open-plan living areas that spread across the garden levels of the two pavilions form the social hubs of the villa. These are spectacular spaces for relaxing and entertaining, defined by soaring teakwood columns and skillfully divided into separate activity areas, with the swimming pools edging almost into the rooms. On one side, conversation is sure to flow with the configuration of oversized sofas arranged around huge coffee tables, set before bars with stools, drinks fridges and glass jars full of snacks. With an equally social focus, full-size billiard tables are centrally located. Opposite, comfortable sofas and armchairs are grouped around 52, 46 and 40 inch flat-screen satellite TVs and home entertainment systems.The dining areas are equally generous. The 6 bedroom side of the estate offers an enormous slab of teakwood fashioned into a statement dining table seating 20 people, with room to spare. A smaller, but equally attractive table is provided on the 4 bedroom side. Behind an island buffet of black granite, are guest kitchens, which are well equipped with American-style fridges, hobs, ovens, microwaves and an extensive collection of plates and utensils housed in handsome wooden cupboards. Doors from these areas lead to the 'back of house' section, with separate staff kitchen allowing for extra guest privacy whilst the resident chefs are preparing meals.Outdoor livingThe villa offers a wide range of outdoor living areas in keeping with the same highly social space planning that define its interiors. The 12m and 14m swimming pools, with water-feature on the boundary walls and wide shallow steps leading towards the living areas, are the perfect spots to cool off, while ironwood decks with stylish sun loungers shaded by beautiful parasols provide ideal settings for alfresco siestas or refreshing sundowners.The many terraces and decks at both levels of all three pavilions provide opportunities for private relaxation while enjoying views of the beautifully landscaped gardens, with an old Cambodia frangipani, a sacred Pohon Pile tree and Sawit date palms that have been specially imported from Java.Other things to noteGuests who wish to enjoy home cooking in the privacy of the Villa will appreciate the resident full time chef who will happily prepare a wide range of Balinese, Asian and international dishes.Food and beverage chargesAll provisions can be purchased by our housekeepers and charged to guests at cost price. Shopping receipts will be provided either daily or at the end of the stay ‚Äì at your option.  It is requested that our staff be given a ‚Äòfloat‚Äô to cover the grocery shopping.Wine, beer, spirits and soft drinks are also available upon request and an account will be presented for settlement at the end of your stay.StaffGuests of the villa are looked after, with great attention to detail, by a dedicated team of professionals drawn from the local community, under the direction of our villa manager. Our staff are trained to anticipate their guests‚Äô every whim with typical Balinese charm and a ready smile. They are very much part of the villa experience.Villa manager	Our villa manager is responsible for the overall operation of the villa, including staffing and guest satisfaction. Fluent in English, she warmly familiarizes guests with the villa on arrival and is only a phone call away should you have any special requests.Chef	The resident full time chef is skilled at cooking a wide array of international and Indonesian cuisine.Housekeepers	A team of seven housekeepers takes care of cleaning and tidying the villa in shifts from 7am to 11pm. They also prepare breakfast and can shop for groceries if required.Gardener/pool attendant	A gardener discreetly tends to the pools and gardens every day.Spa therapists	Fully trained spa therapists will visit the villa upon request to provide massages and other spa treatments on guest account.Security	Night-time security is provided by trained staff.SpaFeel like a body scrub or massage? Just ask our staff to bring the spa to you! We can recommend deluxe treatments carried out in the privacy of the villa ‚Äì be it by the pool, on the terrace or in the cool of the bedroom ‚Äì by fully trained therapists from a reputable local spa (extra charges will apply). Here‚Äôs a sample of what‚Äôs on the menu:Balinese massageRelease built up tension with a traditional Balinese massage. Using a combination of gentle stretches, acupressure and aromatherapy oils to stimulate the flow of blood, oxygen and energy around your body, you will feel totally relaxed in no time.Foot reflexologyFoot reflexology is a natural healing art based on the principle that there are reflexes in the feet which correspond to every part of the body. Through application of pressure on these reflexes tension is relieved and circulation improved leaving you feeling balanced.Body scrubA full body scrub will exfoliate and hydrate your skin leaving it soft and smooth. A rejuvenating scrub combines an abrasive material such as salt, coffee, rice bran or pecan hulls with essential oils to remove any impurities and make your skin glow.Manicure/pedicureOur hands and feet work hard for us every day but rarely get the attention they deserve. Treat them to a manicure or pedicure, which usually comes with the added bonus of a quick hand or foot massage.FamiliesThe family-friendly advantages of a villa holiday are many and varied, including access to your own private facilities and the freedom to use them whenever you want. Knowing that the kids can run around happily, independently and safely, without you having to worry about other guests, is real plus ‚Äì and ensures that parents are certain to have a more relaxed holiday.The villa is ideal for families. Younger children can be easily supervised in the pools, as they are visible from all areas of the open-plan living room, and will enjoy watching TV in the living areas or the second floor media room. Older kids will gravitate to the billiard tables, appreciate the size and privacy of the bedrooms, and revel in the chance to wander out safely to the beach, shops and nightlife of Seminyak.Our friendly staff will make children feel as welcome as adults, and having these willing helpers on hand gives guests plenty of flexibility and freedom to do their own exploring beyond the villa grounds (full-time babysitting incurs a small extra cost). Although well equipped kitchens allow you to prepare meals for fussy eaters or babies with ease, staff will happily do this for you ‚Äì just talk through your requirements and meal schedules with the villa manager or chef and they will take care of the rest.Nor do you have to worry about packing all that cumbersome extra equipment. When you stay at the villa, we can provide you with all the essentials. We have a cot and high chair, and anything we don‚Äôt have in-house, we can generally hire for a small fee. Just talk through your requirements with us when you make your reservation and we‚Äôll make sure it‚Äôs all ready and waiting for your arrival.We are required by local regulations to charge occupancy tax. Villa rate is subject to 15,5% government taxes and services charge, not included in the price of the reservation and have to be paid directly upon check-in. See more here: airbnb/help/article/318/how-do-taxes-work-for-guests

Close to world-class shopping, eating and nightlife with some of Asia‚Äôs best restaurants, bars and nightclubs offering great value for your money.30 minutes walk to Seminyak Beach, shopping areas, and restaurants. 10 minutes drive by scooter or car.The spaceThe 21-bedroom private pool villas consist of 12-unit villas located side by side at one complex block as the following configuration: * Honeymoon Villa :  3 Units 1-BR Private Pool Villa (1-King Bed)* Honeymoon Deluxe Villa:  4 Units 1-BR Private Pool Villa (1-King Bed)* Villa 1:  3 BR Private Pool Villa (2 Queen Beds + 2 Single Beds)* Villa 2: 2 BR Private Pool Villa (2 Queen Beds)* Villa 3: 3 BR Private Pool Villa (2 Queen Beds + 2 Single Beds)* Villa 4: 2 BR Private Pool Villa (2 Queen Beds)* Villa 5: 4 BR Private Pool Villa (3 Queen Beds + 2 Single Beds)All with private bathrooms in each room.With Facilities :- Complimentary daily breakfast for each person- 24/7 receptionist- Private swimming pool.- An air conditioning in all rooms.- Living rooms.- TVs with international channels.- WiFi.- Kitchen.- Security service.- Daily cleaning service.Open space living room with a fully equipped kitchen, a seating area is a perfect place for relaxing. title: 13 Bedroom Villa with Ocean View in Uluwatu
description: PLEASE CHECK WITH US FOR AVAILABILITY BEFORE MAKING A BOOKING REQUESTThe villas don't have up-to-date calendars and we are required to check with the owner for last-minute availability.Villa Surga is an enthralling holiday estate nestled on the cliff tops above a white sandy beach in Bali‚Äôs Bukit Peninsula area. 13 master suites sprawl across two separate villas adjoined by a courtyard on one side.The spaceThe estate has beach access down cliff side stairs, a stunning ocean view observation deck and an infinity pool that lends an unmistakable touch of paradise. There‚Äôs also an outdoor cinema, a children‚Äôs playground and even a BBQ area.You can access The Surga Villa Estate by air at one of the local helipads or spend just 35 minutes in a chauffeured car from Denpasar airport.Upon arrival, you‚Äôll be greeted at reception with cool bottles of water and offered a chance to view the property with its tennis courts and gym before you head down towards the ocean and the villas.World-Class Luxury on the Bukit PeninsulaA 13-bedroom clifftop villa complex with beach access, the Surga Villa Estate sits on Bali‚Äôs Bukit Peninsula with multiple dimensions of opulence in two main villas that are connected by a shared courtyard.This is a luxurious beach escape that will satisfy even the most discerning travelers with all the added extras you could imagine like tennis courts, an onsite spa and even an outdoor cinema.You can stand on the clifftop looking at the ocean as the staff bring you drinks and prepare your carefully curated private menu.The iridescent Bali sunset will leave you wondering how you could possibly deserve this life and the service will leave you humbled.Did we mention the infinity-edged pool that lies across the whole length of the property? Or the multiple living areas where your group can hang out together or split up and chill while enjoying the view?This is a very special place enjoyed by a very lucky few.Facilities Include‚Ä¶    Media room    Gym    BBQ area    Tennis court    Basketball area    Kids Playground    Beach Access    Private Chefs    Fully staffed team    Boutique Library    Onsite Spa    Outdoor CinemaAll of our villas come with the services of our guest relations manager who will be able to assist with massages/spa treatments, tours and travel, car or scooter hire and all general advice and information needed to ensure your vacation is a memorable experience.Please state in your inquiry if you'd require airport transfers. There's a transfer fee of IDR 350K one way for one car, to fit 4 people and luggage (surcharge of IDR 50K if the transfer is between 9pm - 7am). Fee payable to driver directly.All our prices are in US Dollars.Payments can be made in any currency to the equivalent of US Dollars.

title: OB16001 - 16 Bedroom Villa Complex in Seminyak
description: Offering a 16 Bedrooms option consist of a Complex of 4 Villas; Four 4 Bedroom Villas"Before sending a booking request, please contact us to inquire about any promotional rates that may be available. The pricing for the villa is dynamic and subject to change, with some dates potentially having discounted rates. Please note that the calendar for the villa may not always be up-to-date, so we recommend checking with us for last-minute availability."The spaceFrom the centre of Seminyak, a residential road bordered by palm trees leads out towards the residential district from the famous Oberoi Hotel. In this privileged setting one passes a guardhouse and then enter into a wooded driveway leading to these gorgeous Bali villas for rent. The central feature of these Bali villas for rent is an open-air lobby, and on the right side of the lobby a wide pathway, elegantly lit at night, takes the guest to the villas. These Bali Villas are located within 200 m from well known restaurants and fashion boutiques of Bali, only 400 m from the sea and about 300 m from the well known KuDeTa.For supporting the warm climate of Bali, every room of the villas owns electric fans and air-conditioning. As you wish, you can also refresh up in the large private swimming pools during a long sunny day and lay in the comfortable sunbeds. The villas are composed of spacious open-air bathrooms, large kitchen with a bar, and a wide living room where you can enjoy your family summer holidays. And especially, all rooms have Wifi connexion to offer you all the comfort you deserve.Fans & air-conditioningLarge open-air bathroom with bath & showerTV with a DVD libraryPrivate swimming poolsPrivate Bar & kitchenOpen living room with lounges, dining table & individual tables for breakfastOther things to noteOur villas come with the services of a Guest Relations Manager who will be happy to assist with tours, transportation, massages, activities, reservations and any other information you may need to make your vacation a memorable and hassle-free experience. From the moment you arrive, our team is dedicated to ensuring that you have an unforgettable stay with us.We offer airport transfer services to make your arrival and departure as convenient as possible. Our team can arrange transportation for you to and from the airport at a reasonable cost. Please let us know if you require this service and we will be happy to assist youWe are happy to arrange fast-track immigration service for our guests. This service allows you to bypass queues and have a more efficient and convenient arrival or departure at the airport. Please let us know if you are interested in this service and we will do our best to accommodate your request.

title: Wellness Group Resort in Ubud, 16 rooms, 32 Pax
description: DEDICATED TO YOUR COMPLETE WELLBEINGAt our place, we have created an integrated retreat that focuses on just one thing ‚Äì you.An exclusive setting of sixteen rooms (suites & villas) where you can reconnect with yourself, nature, or a group of intimate friendsA refreshing healing routine of sunrise, yoga, meditation, spa, nature walks, swims and treks to hidden canyons, rivers, valleys, waterfalls, villages and temples. it certainly won't feel like routineCome experience our place.The spaceDEDICATED TO YOUR COMPLETE WELLBEINGAt our resort, we‚Äôve created a sanctuary where your wellbeing takes center stage. Nestled in an exclusive retreat of thirteen Balinese suites and villas, this is a place to reconnect‚Äîwith yourself, with nature, or with a close circle of friends.From sunrise yoga, meditation, spa treatments, and nature walks, to invigorating treks through hidden canyons, rivers, valleys, waterfalls, villages, and temples‚Äîour wellness routines feel anything but routine.Nourish your body with our thoughtfully curated vegetarian and vegan menus, featuring balanced Asian and Western dishes delicately flavored with fresh ingredients harvested from our own garden.Come experience the true essence of retreat, relaxation, and rejuvenation.THE ROOMSYou will enjoy exclusive access to all 16 rooms at Beingsattvaa Luxury Ubud.Room Breakdown:3 Queen-bed Suites (with bathtub and shower)3 Twin-bed Suites (with shower only)2 Dedari Pool Suites (Each with a private pool, bathtub, and shower)1 Four-Bedroom Pavilion (pool access)2 Sunrise Suites (pool access)1 Two-Bedroom Jungle Suite (Shower only)Room Features:All rooms include air conditioning, minibar, and toiletriesSome rooms include TVs; others are TV-free for a more mindful stayBed Configuration:11 Queen-size beds5 room with Twin bedsExtra Beds:Extra beds are available upon request (additional charges apply). Please inform us of your needs in advance.ROOM RATE INCLUDES:Healthy welcome drink upon arrivalIn-room tea and coffee-making facilitiesFree scheduled shuttle service to Ubud CenterRoom taxes and service chargeIDEAL FOR:Guests seeking a peaceful escape focused on yoga, meditation, wellness, and relaxation.MEAL POLICYAll food served at our resort is vegetarian or vegan. Kindly refrain from bringing non-vegetarian items onto the property.Meals (not included in room rate):Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are available at additional costMeal plans can be arranged upon requestTHE RESTAURANT ‚Äì ANAMAnam Restaurant specializes in plant-based, raw, vegetarian, and vegan cuisine, using fresh, organic ingredients. title: 8 BR Villa Seminyak near Eat Street, Beach
description: 8 Bedroom Villa Seminyak Near Eat Street, located in the prime location of Seminyak. This tropical contemporary complex villa within walking distance to Seminyak Beach and offers 5 star luxury servicesThe villa is a complex of 2 unit 2 bedroom and 1 unit 4 bedroom villa side by side with its own private pool. All bedroom villas with ensuite bathroom, extensive living & separate dinning area for private entertaining, fully equipped modern kitchen, lush and tropical garden.The spaceVilla Satu - 2 Bedroom VillaThis 2 bedrooms Semiyak Villas is completely open onto the private garden that has 2 bedrooms on either side of the large living room with its open air or full air conditioned and American style fitted kitchen. The living room is fully equipped with a home entertainment system including DVD player, sound system and cable television.The private 12m x 5m swimming pool surrounded by lush tropical garden landscape and feature pool rain shower outside.Villa Dua - 2 Bedroom Villa2 bedrooms Seminyak Villas. Private swimming pool 10m x 5m . The two bedrooms are located side by side to the right of the dining/living room. Both bedrooms have indoor showers, cable television and air conditioning.It offers private two bedrooms located side by side of the dining or living room that completely open onto private garden. Both bedrooms offers indoor shower, cable television and air conditioning room, each bedroom has a private en-suite bathroom.The large living room with its open air or full air conditioned and an American style fitted kitchen. Opposite the kitchen is the laundry area. Both kitchen and laundry are accessible via a separate service entrance. . These villas are bathed in luminosity thanks to large bay windows.Villa Tiga - 4 BedroomPrivate swimming pool 18m x 4m. A spacious open living and dining area, separate TV room and large modern kitchen, featuring the modern western kitchen. The entrance to the four bedrooms villa through massive wooden door leading to a covered gangway. A spacious open living and dining area situated on the left side. Separate TV room and large, a fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances such as full sized fridge. The spacious 4 bedrooms come with King-size bed and air conditioning, rain shower and a deep soak bathtub. If you travelling with a smaller group, this luxury Seminyak villas can be booked as a three bedrooms option. All villas have unlimited WiFi internet connection

title: Georgeous Catamaran Haruku 72ft - Private Charter
description: Come to experience an unforgettable moment aboard the magnificent Haruku. Sail with your loved ones to finally drop the anchor in crystal blue water where you will stay for the night or simply enjoy for a day cruise or even a lovely sunset cruise. Our professional crew and on board chef will be there to realize all your desires. Drink some champagne in front of the most beautiful view of Indonesia and surrender to this delightful experience.Contact us for tailor made quotes.The spaceHaruku is a 72 ft/22 meters long-range expedition Yacht where you will find everything you expect for your comfort.This luxurious catamaran can accommodate up to 11 guests overnight with his 3 spacious cabins: one double master room with sofa and private en-suite, one cabin with 4 single beds and another one to sleep comfortably up to 5 people.Air conditioned and wifi is available on board but signal may vary depending on ship location.This magnificent yacht offers very generous volumes either it be inside or on one of the large outsides areas.A center stairway leads to an open salon with modern fully equipped galley and plenty dining and lounging space. There is also dining space outside with comfortable space to relax, sunbath and appreciate gourmet dishes grilled in BBQ.You will feel as in your own luxury apartment aboard Haruku. With however a privileged access to swim and enjoy fishing, paddling, snorkeling, kayaking, wakeboarding, diving, playing on this large inflatable mattress or even sunbathing and relaxing in this peaceful environment.We are waiting to welcome you and make your holidays an unforgettable moment.Guest accessThe boat is yours. You have access to all Haruku boat and equipments.Other things to noteFor your comfort champagne, wine, beer, and a variety of snacks, tropical fruits, and soft drinks are provided as lunch cooked by the chef. Towels, WIFI, cruising permits, boat fuel, life jacket, insurance, snorkel, fishing, wakeboarding, kayaking equipment, large inflatable mattress and stand up paddle board are included. You will also have a certified skipper with his crew and a chef during all your stay.

title: NEW 9BR, Pool & Rice Field View
description: Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway. Look, our BRAND NEW place is located about 150m off the main road, across the small river, and is overlooking to the rice filed. description: ‚ú® We have 6 beachfront villas at the resort ‚Äî if your dates aren‚Äôt available, please check my profile for our other listings.Escape to our luxury dome villa, a secluded beachfront retreat where tropical charm meets modern comfort.Dive into breathtaking snorkeling with provided gear, unwind in the beachfront hot tub, and refresh in your Bali-style jungle bathroom.With a high chance of spotting sea turtles, every moment is unforgettable. The wedding organiser Palani was so attentive and responsive to my friend and the wedding party and all the associated family and friends. We had the most incredible time and we will be back for sure!! The scenery is trye Balinese jungle and the pools are all glorious! description: Welcome to Rumah Harumi, a soulful sanctuary in the heart of Ubud where nature, craftsmanship, and comfort meet in perfect harmony. There is also DJ equipment available at 1.500.000 IDR extra cost.‚Ä¢ Max capacity per entertainment room: 20 people‚Ä¢ A fully equipped kitchen for guests‚Äô use only‚Ä¢ A second kitchen only for staff‚Äôs use‚Ä¢ An open space 12pax dining area facing the pool‚Ä¢ An outdoor living room next to the poolBEDROOM SUITES PER VILLA MULTIPLY BY 2:‚Ä¢	There are 12bedrooms in total with 4 super king size (200cm*200cm) master bedrooms, 4 king size (180cm*200cm) bedroom suites and 4 twin bedrooms. 2 twin bedrooms can  be converted into king size bedrooms, while the other two can become hollywood twins.‚Ä¢	Each villa has 6bedrooms in total. title: Contemporary & Spacious 8 Bed Villa, Seminyak
description: Contemporary, spacious, functional, design, the villa has been conceived to offer the highest comfort and the best facilities for a luxury villa stay. *Subject to 21% local tax, collected separately.The spaceDecorated with style, surrounded by luxuriant gardens with private swimming pools, this association of two luxury 4 bedroom villas with an adjoining wall offers 8 luxurious en-suite bedrooms, 2 spacious living/dining areas, 2 fully equipped kitchens, and 2 huge private swimming pools in tropical gardens.South of Bali, in the heart of Seminyak, the villa has been designed and built by the well-established architect Stephan Remini. Contemporary, spacious, functional, designed and decorated with style, surrounded by luxuriant gardens with a private swimming pool, the Nyaman villas are located near the beach. Boutiques and restaurants are within a walkable distance, and shops and restaurants are just a short walk away.From the center of Seminyak, a road bordered by splendid palm trees escorts you towards the residential district not far from the well-known Oberoi Hotel. In this private setting, one passes a guardhouse and then takes you into a wooded driveway leading to the luxury villa. The central feature is an open-air lobby, just like a hotel, from which a pathway leads to a variety of villas. On the right of the lobby a wide pathway bordered by palm trees, elegantly illuminated at night, guides the guest to the villas. Walking on stepping stones over a water feature, the guest has access to the lobby. The impressively large front doors of each villa are made of locally carved noble wood. Located in the center of Seminyak, a safe and quiet feeling from all nocturnal nuisances. The Villas 2 bedrooms provide the same standards and services as found in resorts in Bali and international luxury villas, with a dedicated staff, available to provide all the services you expect of a private villa. This luxurious villa has been designed to ensure memorable tropical holidays in an urban setting while maintaining the peaceful and quiet retreat-like vibe sought after by travelers who come to Bali.Other things to note* We are required by local regulations to charge occupancy tax. The villa rate is subject to a 21% government local tax not included in the price of the reservation, and has to be paid separately through Airbnb after the reservation is confirmed. *Please state in your inquiry if you'd require airport transfers.* Please treat the villa and furniture as if you would need your own. The Villa is to be left in a condition equal to when the guests arrive. The guests will be held responsible for any loss or damage to the property caused by themselves, or their guests. Any breakages will be charged on a replacement value.*Help us remain green by conserving/saving energy. Please turn off the air conditioner, lights, and all other electrical appliances when you leave the villa.* If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me. will be glad to help you.

title: 14 Bedroom Bali Royal Villas Seminyak
description: Located in the heart of Seminyak, these luxurious villas offer a blend of contemporary design and spacious comfort, all within walking distance to the beach. As the only villas in Seminyak with 14 bedrooms in one compound, they provide top amenities and convenience, all within walking distance to boutiques and restaurants. Featuring an open-air lobby, illuminated pathways, and large doors of carved wood, the villas can interconnect to create 10, 12, 16, 18, or 20-bedroom accommodations.The spaceNestled in the heart of Seminyak, our luxurious 14-bedroom villa compound offers the perfect blend of modern elegance and spacious comfort. Designed to accommodate large groups, this exclusive retreat is ideal for family gatherings, celebrations, retreats, and group getaways.As the only villa in Seminyak with 14 bedrooms in one compound, we provide an unparalleled stay experience. The villas feature interconnecting options, allowing flexibility to expand into 12, 10, 16, 18, or even 20-bedroom accommodations, making it the ultimate private sanctuary for any occasion.Rooms & SpacesBedrooms: Each bedroom is thoughtfully designed with plush bedding, air conditioning, and en-suite bathrooms, ensuring a restful and private retreat.Living Areas: The expansive open-air lobby and communal lounges create a welcoming space for relaxation and socializing.Dining & Kitchen: A spacious dining area and fully equipped kitchen allow for seamless in-villa dining, whether self-catered or with a private chef.Outdoor Spaces: Enjoy the tranquility of illuminated pathways, lush tropical gardens, and private swimming pools, perfect for unwinding after a day exploring Bali.Unique Features: Large hand-carved wooden doors and contemporary Balinese-inspired d√©cor add a touch of elegance and cultural charm.Prime LocationSituated just moments away from Seminyak Beach, vibrant boutiques, and world-class restaurants, our villa offers both serenity and convenience, allowing you to experience the best of Bali effortlessly.Whether you seek a luxurious escape or a dynamic group stay, our versatile and spacious villa compound ensures a memorable and comfortable experience for every guest.Guest accessGuests will have exclusive access to the entire villa during their stay, ensuring privacy and a personalized experience. Depending on the number of bedrooms booked (10, 12, 14, 16, 18, or 20), guests will have access to:All Bedrooms & En-Suite Bathrooms ‚Äì Spacious, fully air-conditioned rooms with private en-suite bathrooms.Private Swimming Pool(s) ‚Äì A serene pool area, perfect for relaxation and social gatherings.Living & Lounge Areas ‚Äì Open-air and enclosed living spaces for socializing, unwinding, or enjoying entertainment.Dining Area & Fully Equipped Kitchen ‚Äì Ideal for private dining experiences, whether self-catered or with a private chef (additional charge).Lush Tropical Gardens & Illuminated Pathways ‚Äì Tranquil outdoor areas to immerse in Bali‚Äôs beauty.Private Entrance & Parking Area ‚Äì Secure and convenient access for guests.Throughout their stay, guests can enjoy the entire villa without any shared spaces, ensuring a luxurious and intimate retreat.Other things to noteFlexible Bedroom Configurations: Our villa can be arranged as 10, 12, 14, 16, 18, or 20-bedroom accommodations, making it ideal for various group sizes and events. Please confirm your preferred setup before arrival.Daily Housekeeping & Butler Services: Our dedicated team ensures a seamless stay, offering daily housekeeping and butler service to cater to your needs throughout your stay.Inclusive Breakfast & Private Chef Services: Daily breakfast is included in your stay. For lunch and dinner, a private chef service is available at an additional charge and must be booked in advance.Pool Safety: Please note that the pools do not have lifeguards. Guests are responsible for their own safety, especially with children.Respect for the Neighborhood: To ensure a peaceful environment for all, any kind of music played on Bluetooth speakers must be turned off by 11:00 PM.We look forward to welcoming you and ensuring a truly memorable stay!

title: Cala Blanca - Luxury Tropical Escape in Pererenan
description: Escape to our exquisite four-bedroom masterpiece meticulously designed by the renowned Biombo Architects. Ideally nestled in the vibrant Pererenan area, next to trendy cafes, restaurants, and less than 1 kilometer from the beach.Cala Blanca showcases a contemporary tropical design aesthetic, dominated by the use of natural elements like stone, timber ceilings, and lush greenery. It offers an unmatched blend of luxury, design, and comfort, creating an exceptional living experience.The spaceStep into Cala Blanca, a contemporary villa exuding pure luxury in a tropical setting.At its core, the villa boasts a spacious living area with soaring ceilings, seamlessly transitioning between fully opening to the outdoors or being completely enclosed. Decorated with modern and elegant furniture, this area is surrounded by lush tropical plants, creating a peaceful oasis. The indoor sunken lounge features a U-shaped couch with a coffee table, ideal for gatherings with loved ones, all enveloped by the immersive tropical backdrop. The kitchen is fully equipped with modern amenities and includes a bar with stools, as well as a dining table accommodating up to eight. Its floor-to-ceiling windows welcome ample natural light and offer views of the lush garden and swimming pool. Do not hesitate to contact us to organize a personalized culinary experience with a chef, directly at the villa!Outdoors, the villa boasts a pristine lagoon pool, perfect to unwind after a day of exploring the surrounding area. It also features bar seats, to sip your favorite drink directly in the swimming pool. The area is surrounded by a furnished backyard with an outdoor dining area and a comfortable sofa bench. This creates the perfect setting for relaxation while guests enjoy the refreshing waters of the pool.The villa boasts four en-suite bedrooms with king-size beds, exuding tropical charm. Each bedroom is equipped with large closets and safety boxes to store your valuables. The master bedroom even features a rooftop balcony with bean bags and coffee table, making it the perfect setting for a Bali sunset experience while sipping a drink or watching the Bali's wonderful blue sky.With 24/7 security, a dedicated staff, and the assurance of a gated complex, this villa offers a secure and indulgent tropical escape.Nestled in the heart of the coveted Pererenan region, this villa enjoys a privileged location, granting you swift access to the renowned local beaches of Perenan and Pantai Lima, merely a short 10-minute drive away.Rest assured, your stay in this opulent villa is an all-encompassing experience, as it comes fully equipped and is graced by our dedicated staff, ensuring that your every need is effortlessly catered to. Your tropical escape awaits!Guest accessGuests enjoy exclusive use of the entire villa, ensuring total privacy throughout their stay.Other things to noteIncluded in every stay:- Free welcome drink- Villa staff with daily cleaning- Bath towels for each guests- Hi Speed Wi-Fi internet connection- Safety boxes- Concierge ServicesAvailable upon request through our exclusive Concierge services:- Airport transfer- Car rental (with/without driver)- Bike rental- Breakfast upon request- Massages at the villa- Pool Fence - Laundry- Restaurant bookings- Activities such as watersports, surf classes, cooking classes, water parks‚Ä¶- Daily tours to visit temples, landscapes, villages‚Ä¶- And much more! Don‚Äôt hesitate to ask us if you want to do some activities or visits while enjoying your stay at our villa!

title: Splendid sailing catamaran Jemme 42ft
description: The captain and his crew welcome you aboard Jemme to enjoy a memorable and unique experience with your friends or family.Navigate the course of the wind to finally cast the anchor in paradisiac clear blue water and enjoy all aquatic activities you may wish.Appreciate this peaceful place to relax and admire the sunset by drinking a glass of champagne while the chef is cooking you a lovely dinner.Available for day cruises, over night charters or simply sunset cruises - Sail with style...The spaceThis 43 foot twin-hulled sailing beauty offers 4 cabins with ensuite facilities ideal for sleeping up to 6 guests overnight (1 cabin for the crew). All rooms are complete with air-conditioning, fans, & TV‚Äôs (2 cabins have DVD players), private bathrooms & pressurized hot water showers. A freshwater outdoor shower on the deck is also refreshing extra.Enjoy the TV in the main air-conditioned saloon, surround sound system for boat party entertainment and vessel wide WIFI.Guest accessThe boat is yours.Other things to noteFor your comfort champagne, wine, beer, and a variety of snacks, tropical fruits, and soft drinks are provided as lunch cooked by the chef. Towels, WIFI, cruising permits, boat fuel, life jacket, insurance, snorkel equipment, large inflatable mattress and stand up paddle board are included. You will also have a certified skipper with his crew and a chef.

title: Luxurious 6 BR villa in Canggu, A+ LOCATION 12 pax
description: This mega luxe villa is located in the heart of Berawa, Canggu. Villa Yoop comes with 24/7 staff for cleaning, cooking and security. We can accommodate 12 guests, but can expand to a maximum of 14 people. The villa is within walking distance to the beach. Well suitable for all level surfing, kitesurfing, bodyboarding and has the best sunsets in Bali. Berawa area is known for the cozy restaurants, bars, beach clubs, great nightlife, spa salons and yoga studios. All this within walking distance!The spaceVilla Yoop is designed and built as a holiday villa with a homy feeling. A cozy living, a spacious kitchen, a big pool with a poolbar and a nice outdoor sitting area, makes you feel at home! This villa comes with 24/7 staff for cleaning and cooking (on request). Breakfast, lunch or diner, whatever you like. During nighttime our security will look after you and the property.This villa comes with:- Cinema- Gym- Spa (2 massage tables)- Office space- Extra kitchen for staff to cook for you(Only ingredients need to be paid for and a small fee will be added for the grocery pick-up)The villa has a Sonos surround system indoor and outdoor.High speed internet 90 mbps.TV: Netflix, PlayStation 4 and over 250 channelsRoom 1 downstairs:- 1 king bed 200cm x 200cm- En-suite bathroom; 2 showers, double sink, toiletRoom 2 downstairs:- 1 king bed 200cm x 200cm- En-suite bathroom; 1 big shower, double sink, toiletRoom 3 downstairs:- 1 king bed 200cm x 200cm- En-suite bathroom; 1 shower, sink, toilet and bathtub Room 4 upstairs (masterbedroom):- 1 king bed 200cm x 200cm- En-suite bathroom; 2 showers, double sink, toilet, big bathtub- Balcony with rooftop gardenRoom 5 upstairs:- 2 single beds 100cm x 200cm- shared bathroom with room 6; 1 big shower, 2 single sinks, toilet, big bathtub- BalconyRoom 6 upstairs:- 1 king bed 200cm x 200cm- shared bathroom with room 5; 1 big shower, 2 single sinks, toilet, big bathtub- Big balcony with lounge set and dining table plus 4 chairsExtra downstairs:- 1 guest toilet- 1 toilet next to pool area- 1 outdoor shower (no use of shampoo allowed)Our villa can accommodate max 12 people. We have 6 bedrooms with sleeps for 12 people. We can add 2 single mattresses on request (extra charges apply)Check in 3pmCheck out 10amWe do NOT allow parties or fireworks.Guest accessThe entire house is available for you during your stay, except a couple of storages that will be locked.Other things to noteAll staff comes with the villa. Bottled Aqua water (gallon) is included in the price during your stay. However we ask you to pay for the groceries you need, when you would like our chefs to prepare you breakfast, lunch, snacks and diner. Briquettes and charcoal is not included when asking for a BBQ.

title: 57BR manicured resort with pool & sunset in Lovina
description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place. You can walk to the Lovina center on the beach, saving the taxi fare and at the same time to enjoy the wide open beach view. Time travels very slowly in this area that not much changes since a few decades ago. Apart from the well known Dolphin sightseeing tour on a boat, North Bali is also home to numbers of wish-listed-waterfalls, coffee/clove plantation, rice paddy and some ancient memories.The spaceOur place got:- huge parking lot- well manicured garden within the resort- huge meeting room- huge field with stage where we normally held events- huge restaurant- huge swimming pool - beach front access- Dolphine sightseeing spotOur place is quite old but is well maintained, from the outdoor to the guests' rooms.Guest accessOur place is accessible conveniently by any type of vehicles, even big bus.

title: Villa 10 Uluwatu
description: Villa 104 Bedroom Cliff Top Ocean Front Pool VillaThis stunning, 4 bedroom villa provides a luxurious home away from home, featuring a spacious open plan living room, dining, and fully equipped kitchen and wine cellar. Guests can cool off in the private cliff top ocean view infinity pool or relax in the jacuzzi and sauna. Take in the expansive views from the al fresco dining areas as you enjoy freshly baked pizza from the outdoor pizza oven prepared by your personal chef.The spaceStunning 4 Bedroom (3 with ensuite) clifftop villa with private chef, daily housekeeping and villa manager all included. Open plan living area, dining, fully equipped kitchen and wine cellar. all rooms air conditioned. Guests can cool off in the private clifftop ocean view infinity pool or relax in the cold plunge and sauna. Minimum of 3 nights stay.Other things to noteMinimum 3 nights stayUse of car and driver at a daily rate available upon request Airport transfers also available upon request at a fixed price

title: The Cove Bali - Beachfront Villa w/ Private Chef
description: A quintessential beach holiday with the extras of tennis onsite, fine dining, world-class surfing, and great excursions off Bali's beaten tourist path. Each of the 5 bedrooms has a view of the ocean plus a terrace or outdoor patio. Enjoy the direct beach access, the pool overlooking the waves, and the unique walk-through grotto. The secluded location, by the surfing village of Balian, ensures total privacy.  Our staff of 10 will make sure a holiday at The Cove will be one of pure relaxation.The spaceThe Cove Bali is an absolute beachfront, fully serviced 5-bedroom villa in the surfing village of Balian (West Bali). It has amazing views over the Indian Ocean and is built mainly in reclaimed teak wood and local stone. The property has private access to the beach, which has a walk-through grotto, something unique in Bali. Overlooking the beach, a beautiful 13 meter swimming pool is the perfect place to cool off and take in the view. There is also a regulation size grass tennis court, nestled among coconut trees. The house is spacious yet cozy, and the property is so big (7,000 square meters) that at any time guests can feel they have all the privacy and space they wish for.Guest accessGuests will enjoy the beach, a wonderful sunset cabana, a 13-meter infinity pool overlooking the waves, 5 spacious bedrooms (each with balconies or terraces overlooking the ocean,) beautiful bathrooms in stone and wood, a private tennis court, a private chef who can cook fantastic Indonesian and European food, as well as vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free; friendly and professional housekeepers and lots of private space.Other things to noteThe Cove is an idyllic place: the food is amazing, the views are incredible, the pool is spectacular. However, there are not many places to go out at night. The village of Balian is still pretty quiet, and aside from a few restaurants/beach shacks there is not much of a night life. Of course, you can have your own party at the Cove! Or, if you feel like you just want to relax and be cozy, we have a projector with a big screen and quite a few movie you can watch.

title: NANUKU House
description: Luxury villa in Canggu, Bali, Indonesia. Featuring four ensuite bedrooms, rooftop sauna, rooftop plunge pool,  garden BBQ / bar, and semi salt water swimming pool.Guest accessPrivate driveway with electric gate which has parking space big enough for 2 cars and multiple motorbikes.Other things to noteAny guests guests outside of the 8 staying must notify management.

title: Villa Sumika Luxury between jungle & rice fields 5 suites
description: New villa: Villa Sumika is a luxurious and serene retreat, designed to offer calm and serenity.Located in Kedewatan, minutes from the vibrant heart of Ubud, it offers 5 suites opening onto a tropical garden, bordered by a spectacular 22-meter swimming pool.Throughout your stay, an attentive house team and a dedicated manager are there to ensure your well-being and make every moment more enjoyable.The spaceIn the heart of Kedewatan, one of Ubud's most unspoiled villages, Villa Sumika opens like a luxurious break, between jungle and rice fields.Less than 10 minutes from the center, the villa puts you close to Sebatu temples, Tegalalang rice fields, Campuhan Ridge Walk trails, Mount Batur, and Handara Golf Club.A private path leads to a discreet door, behind which extends
