title: Private Resort‚ÄîRestaurant, Bar, Events & Childcare
description: Kasianda House is Bali's premier private resort. With 4 chefs delivering world-class dining and 4 butler/mixologists crafting exceptional cocktails and 0% drinks, you will experience service that goes beyond a 5-star resort.For larger groups, book the 5-bedroom villa next door too for 29+ people: www.airbnb.com/rooms/40498724Services include spa treatments, childcare and event planning. Weddings and milestone birthdays are our speciality.There‚Äôs AC throughout and a child-safe pool.The spaceA stay at Kasianda House is unlike anything you have experienced before. Our culinary and service teams were trained at the islands best restaurants, hotels and beach clubs, so you will enjoy next level service and world class cocktails and dining in this extremely spacious, and very private residence.Just like in a hotel, you order drinks, food and room service from an extensive menu (at prices that are lower than nearby restaurants). There are a range of spa services available, so you can wind down with a massage in your room, or enjoy a glass of wine while our aestheticians pamper you on the terrace. In-villa yoga classes, a personal trainer, or swimming lessons for all ages can also be arranged.Many of our guests celebrate a special occasion during their stay at Kasianda House. Our team can cater any type of event, be it a formal dinner, or cocktails and canap√©s for 50 people. We work with a variety of musicians, performers and entertainment suppliers, and the villa can be decorated to match any theme. Whether you're up for an Ibiza style foam party, or a birthday bash for your little one (complete with magician and mermaid encounter) we've got you covered. Please enquire for more details.Completed in 2021, the property has been designed and engineered to the highest standard. It is in a very private and secure gated compound, with tall boundary walls, CCTV and a security guard. It is moments away from the island‚Äôs best restaurants, boutiques and kids activities.Inside, the villa is furnished with custom pieces and antiques. You will find original art from local artists and around the world throughout the house.Whisper quiet, concealed air conditioners provide powerful cooling in all bedrooms and living spaces. Unlike almost anywhere else in Bali, you can drink the tap water, due to our on-site water filtration and sterilization system. The beds have high-end orthopaedic, pillow top mattresses and 300 thread count linens, and all the bathrooms have high pressure rainfall showers. Hotel style technology distributes 150 Mbs WiFi throughout the property.The media room is equipped with a 85" 4K TV and a 10 speaker Dolby Atmos surround sound system. Streaming services include US Netflix, Disney+ and Amazon Prime. There are ceiling mounted speakers throughout the villa. You can stream music from your devices, or ask your Butler to choose from a library of specially selected playlists. Outside, the infinity pool looks over the lush tropical garden and is lit by a fibre optic star-scape at night. There is a 4 person swim up bar at one end and a shallow kids area at the other. With sun loungers to soak up some rays, several balconies, patios and terraces, and a variety of elegant indoor and outdoor living and dining spaces, this villa has plenty of social spaces for large groups to spend time together, and lots of other places to relax individually or in smaller groups.Kasianda House has been designed to be completely child safe. Unlike most large villas in Bali, all the bedrooms and living spaces are under one roof, so there‚Äôs no need to go outside to move between bedrooms. A rarity in Bali, the pool has tempered glass railings that conform to Australian safety standards. There is a high chair, a cot, lots of toys, a teepee, and craft materials. Anything else you might need is available to rent, including a bouncy castle and an inflatable water slide. With available high quality child care, you‚Äôll have everything you need to keep your little ones entertained.Prior to your arrival, you will be added to the villa WA messaging group, so that our team can help you plan your stay. Once you‚Äôve arrived, you and your guests can use the same WA group to order food, drinks or any other service you may require.Guest accessThis is a private boutique resort and guests have access to the entire space.

title: Lush Sanctuary near Canggu - Can Maestro
description: Welcome to Can Maestro, part of the curated House of Winds villa collection in Umalas and signature creation by Biombo Architects, one of Bali‚Äôs most celebrated contemporary studios.Completed in August 2023, this refined three-bedroom villa offers a seamless balance of tropical minimalism, natural textures, and thoughtful proportions. Positioned between the buzz of Canggu and the elegance of Seminyak, Can Maestro is a peaceful design-led retreat for travelers who value beauty, privacy and calm.The spaceA home defined by balance and clarity, Can Maestro spans 400 square meters with 260 square meters of built space. At its center, a 25-meter swimming pool connects two distinct wings through a wooden bridge:Living Wing ‚Äì Sunken lounge with custom-built sofas and Bluetooth sound ‚Äì Elegant indoor dining area ‚Äì Fully equipped kitchen with premium appliancesSleeping Wing ‚Äì Master bedroom with king bed, ensuite indoor-outdoor bathroom, and circular stone bathtub ‚Äì Two symmetrical guest rooms with king beds, en-suite open-air bathrooms and direct pool accessBalinese hardwood, soaring ceilings and expansive glass panels bring in natural light and invite the lush surroundings into the space ‚Äî creating a serene, breathable atmosphere.Guest accessYou‚Äôll have exclusive access to the entire villa, including the private pool, garden, living spaces and all on-site amenities.Your stay guarantees complete privacy, comfort and tranquility throughout.Other things to note‚Ä¢ The villa features 3 spacious bedrooms, comfortably hosting 6 guests‚Ä¢ With extra beds, the villa can accommodate up to 8 people‚Ä¢ 400 m¬≤ plot with 260 m¬≤ built space‚Ä¢ Fully equipped kitchen with premium appliances and coffee maker‚Ä¢ High-speed WiFi and 4G mobile coverage throughout the villa‚Ä¢ Smart TV with streaming services ‚Ä¢ Bluetooth HI-FI speakers in lounge‚Ä¢ Private outdoor parking‚Ä¢ Optional extras: in-villa breakfast, private chef, spa treatments, yoga sessions (on request)Part of the House of Winds Bali complex, the villa can be combined with others (Villa Levante, Villa FEH, Villa Xaloc) to form larger retreats of 6, 9, or 12 bedrooms ‚Äî perfect for family gatherings, wellness stays or group events.You can find and book them all in our profile, House Of Winds Bali.

title: 8,000 m¬≤ Luxurious Private Villa In Ubud!
description: Discover an exquisite 4-bedroom haven just moments from Ubud, Bali's cultural gem. Nestled amidst lush rice paddies, this architectural masterpiece offers awe-inspiring views of the sacred Mount Agung.Designed by the esteemed architect, Popo Danes, the villa seamlessly blends tradition with expansive spaces, offering an authentic retreat enveloped by untouched nature.Immerse in Bali's essence as the villa unveils the island's traditions.The spaceThe estate sits over a huge 8000 m¬≤ of landscaped land bordered by gorgeous rice terraced fields and a small river. Guests can find themselves spending hours wandering through the beautiful and lush garden of the property.The huge and curvy 18 meters infinity swimming pool, fitted with a salt chlorinator system, will also be one of the guests‚Äô favorite spots. Here you‚Äôll be able to unwind in total relax while admiring the breathtaking scenery from one of the sun loungers or from the ‚Äúfloating‚Äù traditional bal√®. The property boasts also a second plunge pool, which is connected to two of the self-contained bedrooms, and the so-called Sunrise Bridge, a fully equipped yoga pavilion that will also offer you a beautiful breezy spot for dining or relaxing.Indoor living areasThe spacious main living room opens up to a huge veranda surrounded by ornamental multi-level fishponds and flanked by two traditional bale, the perfect spot to enjoy the amazing view.The gorgeous interiors are characterised by beautiful traditional art works and feature a comfortable lounge area with rattan furniture, a thick wooden dining table and a spacious open kitchen, equipped with everything you might need. The main house also hosts an air-conditioned media room/library fitted with a large sofa and an home cinema set and there is a closet full of books, magazines and board games. A second living area with dining table and open kitchen is found within two of the suites.The villa also offers an air-conditioned gym, equipped with all you need to stay fit, and a beautiful spa area, which connects two of the suites. Simply ask the staff to arrange for massages and wellness treatments!BedroomsThe villa counts four gorgeous and private bedrooms, all set within self-contained houses and featuring four-poster queen-size beds and TV with DVD players.The suites are named after different locations of the island. The spacious master bedroom is in the Tenganan pavilion and features beautiful furnishings, traditional art works, a private terrace with view and a walk-in wardrobe. The gorgeous ensuite bathroom with shower is connected to the spa room with stone bathtub. Adjoining this space is the the beautiful Klung Kung bedroom, which also boasts an amazing view over the rice fields.The remaining two bedrooms are located on the other side of the garden and are called Ubud and Singaraja. They both share the spring water fed plunge pool and the second open-air living area. The rooms have private verandas and turquoise-tiled bathrooms with rain showers.

title: 4-BR Villa Ocean& Volcano View and Infinity Pool
description: Located in Jimbaran Hills Villa Moso is set upon the largest viewpoint in the southern peninsula of Bali. Enjoy the warm sea breezes, breathtaking sunsets and, quite simply, one of Bali‚Äôs most spectacular panoramic ocean views. The beautifully furnished atmosphere of luxury and delicate and tasteful interior design make Villa Moso ideal for the most relaxed holiday or romantic honeymoon.The spaceVilla Moso is the perfect location for family accommodation and anyone looking for a luxurious private sanctuary but still wanting to enjoy Bali‚Äôs many attractions, entertainment and dining options. This elegant two-floor, three-bedroom villa has been created to maximize the stunning sea view. The architectural and interior design of the villa is a modern tropical style. It is decorated with high-quality furnishings, art, and artefacts made by local Balinese artists and craftsmen. As you enter, Villa Moso welcomes you with a spacious open living and dining area featuring big and comfortable couches, a fully equipped, contemporary kitchen, supported by state-of-the-art fixtures, fittings and appliances, a large dining table for 10 people and not to forget the breathtaking view of the Indian Ocean from everywhere.The 1st Floor-Bedroom is on the side of the infinity-edge swimming pool. The entire room has panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows that can be fully opened allowing you to embrace the sunrise and ocean breezes from the moment you awake and dip into the pool straight from the bed. The room features a spacious en-suite bathroom with an indoor shower, two basins, a separate toilet and a walk-in closet. It also includes a working space with a desk overlooking the pool and a balcony offering an outstanding view of the Indian Ocean. The infinity-edge swimming pool is paired with a day gazebo and sunbeds - the perfect place to relax and unwind.Natural stone stairs guide you to the upper floor, where the Master Bedroom is located. The perfect space for couples. Extra-large floor-to-ceiling windows surround the room, inviting endless sunlight and scenic views creating so much warmth and space and offering an amazing view of the Indian Ocean from the extra-large king-size bed. On rainy Sundays or for cozy movie nights, a projector and a retractable screen have your back. As with all the bedrooms, the contemporary interior design is complemented by elegant furniture, furnishings and art that result in a warm, enticing and extremely stylish feel to the room. The room features a large en-suite bathroom with a bathtub, overhead shower and two sinks, a walk-in closet and a balcony that offers an outstanding view of the Indian Ocean. But the Master Bedroom awaits you with one more highlight: a private jacuzzi on the roof with ocean view.Two more bedrooms are located on the ground floor of Villa Moso with access to a spacious wooden patio that offers amazing views of the villa‚Äôs lush tropical garden. Bedroom 1 has a king-size bed, and a big couch and features an oversized stone-soaking freestanding bathtub with wonderful views of the villa's lush tropical gardens. Additionally, the en-suite bathroom with a toilet provides you with an overhead rain shower. Also, the second bedroom provides a king-size bed and features an en-suite bathroom with a floor-to-ceiling mirror, a freestanding bathtub, an overhead rain shower and a toilet. Both bedrooms are equipped with Balinese minimalist-elegance-themed furniture and offer a lot of storage thanks to built-in shelves and a walk-in closet. Large doors and windows flood the rooms with endless natural light, making them large and bright. Both rooms offer direct access to the patio that invites you to linger around and enjoy the Bali sun. From the patio, you also have access to another fully-equipped kitchen and dining table that invite for cooking or BBQ nights. Your accommodation leaves nothing to be desired: you will be able to enjoy the big living room with a comfortable couch, your private gym and the sauna. However, the villa also features state-of-the-art technology including a Yamaha Hi-Fi system, with more than 100 satellite TV channels and wireless broadband connectivity throughout the property.Villa Moso is the perfect location for family accommodation and anyone looking for a luxurious private sanctuary but still wanting to enjoy Bali‚Äôs many attractions, entertainment and dining options. Our villa is the perfect setting to enjoy quality time with your family and friends.Services & Facilities:‚Å†- The Villa staff are welcoming and friendly, they are English speaking and are trained in providing personalised service to our guests. The Villa Manager and the team are available as needed, if you cannot find what you are looking for in Bali, you can be sure that they can.- Welcome drink and cold towel upon arrival‚Å†- Daily breakfast- Security cameras‚Å†- One-time airport return transfers  (only for a minimum stay of 5 nights)‚Å†- Free usage of motorbike (Scoopy)‚Å†- Chef service (by request with additional fee) ‚Å†- In-house laundry (dry-clean can be arranged)- Babysitting service (by request with additional fee)- Daily housekeeping (except Sundays)- ‚Å†In-villa spa treatments (by request with an additional fee)‚Å†- Infinity pool and sun deck- Day gazebo on the side of the pool with a view of the Indian Ocean- Private Gym and equipment‚Å†- Sauna - WI-FI internet connection at high-speed power by fiber line and Starlink‚Å†- Fully air-conditioned bedrooms with individual temperature control- Extensive open living rooms and dining areas- Yamaha Hi-Fi system- Safe deposit box in each room- LCD smart TV‚Å†- Fully equipped kitchen (gas stove, refrigerator, ovens, coffee maker, coffee grinder, juicer, toaster, blender, water dispenser, waffle iron, rice cooker, etc.)- Barbeque facilities- Surf Racks in the garage‚Å†- Possibility to organize surf lessons for you (by request with an additional fee)‚Å†- Tax and service feesGuest accessThe English-speaking Villa staff will welcome and advise you for Check-in and Check-out.Our standard check-in hours are from 14:00 to 17:00, and check-out time is at 12:00 noon. If you require a different check-in time, please let us know in advance and we'll do our best to accommodate your request. Early check-in may be possible, subject to availability, and will incur an additional charge.Other things to noteSmoking is permitted in the living areas of the villa only. For more information please kindly read our house rules.Please note: There will be ongoing construction on nearby land, which may occasionally cause daytime noise between 08:00 and 17:00.Our dedicated staff will visit the villa daily to care for the pets and ensure the property is always well-maintained.

title: Luxury Huge Villa in Ubud with spa!
description: Discover The Nest of Happiness, a luxurious retreat nestled in Ubud‚Äôs serene rice paddies. This exquisite villa features eight opulent bedrooms with private dressing rooms, an elegant living area with plush sofas, a grand piano, and a dining table for twelve. Relax by the infinity pool with breathtaking views, or explore nearby PARQ for world-class co-working, fitness, and art spaces. Indulge in Ubud‚Äôs finest dining, yoga, and markets for an unforgettable, refined escape. Book your stay now!The spaceEscape the ordinary and step into a world of unparalleled luxury and tranquility at The Nest of Happiness. Nestled amidst Ubud‚Äôs lush emerald rice paddies, this brand-new 8-bedroom private villa offers a sanctuary meticulously crafted for serenity and exclusivity. Just 3.9 km from Ubud Palace, this extraordinary retreat features a private beach, free WiFi, and complimentary private parking, providing the ultimate escape for discerning travelers.With sweeping lake views and rice field, the villa boasts an infinity pool complete with a pool bar, a luxurious sauna, and a 24-hour concierge service to cater to your every need. Indulge in the lavish living spaces, featuring a fully equipped gourmet kitchen with premium appliances, including a dishwasher, oven, and microwave. The spacious living room is designed for relaxation, with elegant seating and dining areas, 8 opulent bedrooms, and 6 stunning bathrooms complete with walk-in showers and a hot tub. Modern touches like air conditioning, a terrace with outdoor furnishings, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a game console elevate your experience to the highest level of comfort and sophistication.For the ultimate dining experience, enjoy a private barbecue on the patio during the warmer months, or unwind in the sauna after a long day of exploring. The villa is perfect for families, with an indoor play area for children and both bicycle and car rental services available at your convenience.Located just steps from PARQ, a world-renowned co-living and co-working space, you can access a wide range of activities, from children's play areas to cutting-edge fitness centers and art studios. Savor culinary delights at nearby restaurants and cafes, including a German bakery with freshly baked treats, or take in the vibrant energy of Ubud‚Äôs hidden gems, from peaceful yoga classes to bustling local markets.The Nest of Happiness promises an unforgettable experience filled with luxury, privacy, and the natural beauty of Bali. Whether relaxing by the infinity pool with breathtaking views or exploring Ubud‚Äôs rich cultural tapestry, every moment is designed to inspire and rejuvenate.Located just 4 km from Saraswati Temple and 4.4 km from Monkey Forest Ubud, this exclusive villa offers seamless access to Ubud‚Äôs top attractions. For added convenience, a paid airport shuttle service is available from Ngurah Rai International Airport, 37 km away.Indulge in the ultimate Bali escape. Book your stay today and discover an extraordinary world of serenity, opulence, and elegance awaiting you at The Nest of Happiness.Guest accessOnce you book this villa, it becomes your private sanctuary, where you‚Äôll have exclusive access to all rooms, and we guarantee absolute privacy. Your requests will be our top priority, ensuring that every detail meets the high expectations of your luxury holiday in our VIP Premium Villa.Immerse yourself in nature as this villa offers a seamless blend of indoor comfort and outdoor serenity. Reconnect with the natural world, enjoying panoramic views of a tranquil lake and lush rice fields. You'll also have easy access to PARQ, one of Ubud's most renowned destinations, known worldwide for its exceptional experiences.From start to finish, your satisfaction is our utmost responsibility, allowing you to fully indulge in the beauty, peace, and luxury this villa offers.Other things to noteConserve Energy & Respect the EnvironmentWe're committed to eco-friendly practices and appreciate your cooperation in helping us conserve energy. When you leave the villa for extended periods, kindly consider switching off lights and electronics to minimize electricity usage. This small step contributes significantly to a greener environment.

title: Luxe Retreat 4BR Oceanview Villa in Uluwatu
description: Step into the beauty of this private villa in Bingin where chic luxury meets minimalistic elegance. This distinctive 4-bedroom villa features an expansive pool, and a terrace with beautiful ocean views. Get lost in the architectural marvel, balancing static elegance and dynamic sophistication.The spaceInside, find a spacious living area, tastefully furnished with sleek, minimalist aesthetics, creating an ambiance of contemporary sophistication. Gather around the dining table with breathtaking sea views, creating unforgettable moments against the horizon.With high ceilings and natural light streaming in, this modern villa offers a luxurious atmosphere. Relax in one of the four bedrooms, each a perfect spot for rest. Families will appreciate the unique bunk bed setup in one of the bedrooms, accommodating up to four guests. Each bedroom features an ensuite bathroom, providing privacy, convenience, and comfort.Located just a short drive away from dreamy Bingin Beach, this villa offers tranquility and accessibility. Our manager will assist you with any questions or requests that may come up during your stay. She can also assist with the following: scooter/car rental, transportation, massage, and local knowledge and tours. Please do not hesitate to contact her during your stay.Guest accessFull access to the entire homeOther things to note¬´¬†Please note: There is ongoing construction in the surrounding area, which may result in some noise. We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your understanding that this is beyond our control. The current rates have been adjusted to reflect this situation and therefore noise concerns won‚Äôt be eligible for any form of refund/discount¬†¬ªSince the property is located in a newly developed area, the electricity supply may not be as reliable as in more developed cities. Occasional power cuts from the island‚Äôs unique provider are to be expected. Please note that these situations are entirely beyond the host's control. There is no generator on-site, and refunds will not be provided for this reason.Kindly note that nature sounds are an integral part of Balinese life and holidays. Indeed, being on a tropical Island, it is not uncommon to hear or spot animals in the surroundings (bats, lizards, bugs, ants‚Ä¶). All of them are completely harmless and part of local everyday life.**We are taking extra steps to ensure the safety of our guest during your stay, the villa is thoroughly cleaned following the AirBnb cleaning procedure**===FAQs- Q: What time is the Check-in policy?-A: Please be informed that check-in time is at 14:00 by default. Arriving earlier? No problem, we will manage for you to drop your luggage first and start exploring the area while waiting for the villa to be ready. If you need an early check in we will try to accommodate you but we can‚Äôt promise, it is subject to the villa availability. Please note that our staff is available until 5pm, self check in is available after 5pm using the key box.- Q: What time is the Check-out policy?- A: Our check-out time is at 11:00am by default. Late check-out is subject to availability and may involve extra charge. Please note that for any late check-out between 11:00 ‚Äì 15:00; an additional charge of 50% of the Daily Villa Rate will apply. Any check-out after 15:00, will be charged at a full day's Daily Villa Rate. If you need to store your luggage after check-out time, please get in touch with us. Should the villa be empty, we'll be happy to store them.- Q: Could I have a butler or a personal Chef to cook, so I can dine in the villa?- A: To further personalize your stay, we offer the option of hiring a private chef or butler, available upon request and at an extra charge. Enjoy the convenience of dining in the villa, prepared to your exact preferences.- Q : Do we have a housekeeping service every day?- A : Yes, there will be a housekeeping service every day at your convenience. For the sake of respecting every guest's privacy, please kindly arrange with your butler should you wish your villa to be cleaned and at what time. Service occurs once a day.- Q : Can we have extra clean towels?- A : For eco-friendly reasons towels are changed every three days. Please leave them on the floor for our staff to pick-it up. Towels left hanging on racks will be considered clean if not on the floor.- Q : What is the maximum occupancy for this villa?- A : This villa is for 8 people, but the maximum capacity is for 10 people with existing bed, which means that the 9th and 10th person are counted as extra guests. The extra guest fee would be USD50/night/person from 2 years old.

title: Tropical Glamping ‚Ä¢ Honeymoon Villa + Sea View
description: Our Honeymoon Villa in Nusa Penida at Tropical Glamping sits high above crystal-clear blue waters, offering a serene luxury experience surrounded by nature. It‚Äôs a favorite for content creators ad couples due to the sea views and added amenities.Fully booked? Check our Airbnb profile (click our picture) for 2 more beautiful homes nearby.What we offer:180¬∞ Ocean ViewsLovers BathtubsSmall soak pool Big Pool5 minutes from Diamond BeachComplimentary BreakfastAir conditioner in the roomGuest accessNusa Penida can be explored by either scooter or vehicle, and we‚Äôre happy to arrange either for you.The island‚Äôs roads can be tricky and challenging to navigate, so please drive slowly and with caution. There is 700m path from the main road to our bungalow which will be assisted by our staff for your ease.We‚Äôve left the land in its natural state to preserve its beauty, which is why the road remains unpaved.You‚Äôll have secure, covered parking right at your doorstep for easy access. If you're not comfortable driving a scooter, we also can organise a private driver and vehicle to ensure your comfort and safety.IMPORTANT NOTICE *The guest will be held responsible for any loss or damage to the property caused by themselves, their guests or any person for whom they are responsible. This will be charged through airbnb.*It is agreed that the guest will conduct him/ herself in a respectable manner and will not cause any nuisance or annoyance within the hotel premise. The Management has the right to request any guest to vacate his/her room or other areas of the property forth with, or without previous notice and without assigning any reason whatsoever, and the guest shall be bound to vacate when requested to do so. In case of the default, the Management has the right to remove the Guest luggage and belongings from the room occupied by him/her.*We are located on private property and Management has the right to remove the Guest from the land and property where Tropical Glamping is located.Other things to noteOur Cliffside Location is immersed in nature, surrounded by farms and wildlife. At Tropical Glamping, we embrace nature, not separate ourselves from it.You may encounter insects, spiders, mosquitoes, monkeys, cats, chickens, snakes, birds, flies, and more. If this may cause discomfort, please reconsider staying with us. We kindly ask that all animals be treated with respect, as this is their home. These animals are not harmful if left alone, and our staff will happily assist in removing them if needed.Please note: We do not accept complaints or refund requests based on natural occurrences.This is a glamping experience, and if you're not a nature lover, we don‚Äôt recommend our bungalow. However, we are available 24/7 for any assistance.The room has secure, closing doors. We also provide bug spray and insecticide.Our cliffside location can be windy, and palm trees may rustle noisily during those times. We strongly advise against excessive alcohol consumption due to the proximity of high cliffs, which may pose a danger.

title: Munduk Mountain Estate - Serene Mountain Retreat
description: 20% discount for October!!Munduk Mountain Estate is a full-staff private family-friendly estate spread over 6000m2 in the remote highlands of Bali, Munduk village. It offers sweeping views of the colorful blooming surrounding landscape with 4 noteworthy pyramid mountains close by, the majestic volcanos of Java, and the ocean on the horizon.Property features:- 4 bedrooms- Media room- Living room- Dining table- Full kitchen- Private pool with an outdoor hot plunge- Fire pitThe spaceWe are pleased to inform you that Munduk Mountain Estate has undergone a transition in management, and we have regained full control of our property. Unfortunately, our previous Airbnb listing was associated with the former management's account. As a result, we have created a new listing to accurately represent our property. While this new listing currently lacks reviews, we have included screenshots of past reviews from our previous account in our photo gallery for your reference. We appreciate your understanding during this transition and look forward to providing you with exceptional hospitalityUNIQUE FEATURES*In-House cook / Full menu available on booking* Over 6000m2 all to yourself, as you rent the entire private Estate*Rate includes breakfast, choice of Asian or Western options.*Situated on one of the highest points above Munduk village*All bedrooms, living spaces, and decking positioned to take in the breathtaking, uninterrupted view.*Fire Pit*Out door Hot Plunge*Open plan living space with 9 metre high ceilings with huge glass doors and windows to maximize the views (can be opened to the fresh air and decking)*Open fireplace in the living space, for cosy evenings *Media room, with giant 4m x 2m sofas for laid back nights, perfect to relax with family and friends (can be converted to a fifth bedroom)*Child safety features - gated decking to keep all the family safe, and enclosed rooms and areas*Space for additional beds can sleep up to 14 guests!*4th bedroom offers seclusion and privacy under the main house and can be Kingsize or twin beds*Indoor and outdoor dining areasWhilst vast in space this 4 bedroom estate, with full kitchen, private pool, fire pit and outdoor hot plunge, overflows with warmth.Throughout the villa the intimate spaces, and design instantly welcome's you and makes you feel at home.Munduk Mountain Estate is fully staffed and serviced, with daily housekeeping, an in-villa cook, and our wonderful manager who knows the local area intimately, and is there to help you with anything you need for your stay.This hidden gem has only just become open to guests in 2023, and for limited periods only. Don't miss out on the opportunity to immerse yourself nature at the unique and tranquil Munduk Mountain Estate.THE ACCOMMODATIONFrom the large multiple sofas that you sink luxuriously into too, to the intimate dining area. The fine touches throughout Munduk Mountain Estate, put this stunning home in a league of it's own for comfort and style.  Designed by a French architect who has made his home in Bali for the past 25 years, the home features modern European design in a cosy mountain chalet feel. A modern villa in a rustic style, with Balinese and Indonesian touches throughout.  The design seemlessly blends in with the natural beauty of Munduk.All the bedrooms, all have solid wooden furniture and carefully selected soft furnishings to give the ultimate comfort and a relaxing night sleep.THE BEDROOMSThe Master Suite - is situated on the far side of the estate, wrapped by forest and mountains, with windows on one side, and large double doors at the front of the room (kingsize double bed & ensuite full bathroom with bathtub).Stretch out on the cushioned window bench or curl up on the armchair to admire the view. Sip your morning coffee as you step out onto the deck in front of your room, Overlooking our private coffee plantation where it grows. The huge ensuite bathroom takes every opportunity to showcase the view and take advantage of the natural light. With a free standing large granite bathtub located next to a large arched window with custom carved shutters & oversized shower.The Suite ‚Äì Situated next to the master suite, with a king size bed, armchair and bench. The large double doors opening to the epic view in front. With an ensuite bathroom complete with shower.The Bunkbed room ‚Äì Specially designed and created for the estate, the unique four adult sized bunk beds line one side of the large 3rd bedroom. There are an additional 2 slide out beds under the bottom bunks allowing 6 people to sleep comfortably. This bedroom uses the main bathroom in the living space. Perfect for large groups of families.The Downstairs Bedroom - Newly renovated, the 4th bedroom sits alone underneath the main estate, allowing for seclusion and privacy with it's own terrace looking over the incredible valley in front. The room can be set up as kingsize bed or twins depending on your preference. With its own ensuite bathroom.Additional bed options: The standard rental rate for the Estate is based on 4 bedrooms and 8 guests, however the villa can accommodate up to 14 guests. You can have 6 guests in the bunkbed room plus the media room can be converted into a double bedroom if needed accommodating an additional 2 guests. Charges apply for more than 8 guests or if additional beds / bedrooms are required.DININGMunduk Mountain Estate is a fully catered villa, with our in house cook ready to prepare amazing meals for you throughout your stay. Allowing you to enjoy restaurant quality food without having to leave the comfort of the Estate.Enjoy the fresh crisp mountain air from the surrounding deck, sip local sourced coffee as you overlook the organic plantations where it grows. Enjoy a chilled glass of champagne whilst luxuriating in the open air hot plunge as you look across the expansive valley towards the ocean and Java, roast marshmellows on the fire pit, or swap stories of the day as the spectrum of orange and reds fill the sky as the sun sets over Batu Karu and the neighbouring mountains.  With a private pool in addition to a large fully equipped kitchen with indoor and outdoor dining areas, Munduk Mountain Estate is a stunning home you will never want to leave!SURROUNDING AREAMagnificient ancient forest, organic coffee plantations, volcanos, sacred lakes and authentic local life. Munduk is a mountain village that is full of charm and natural beauty. Due to the elevation the air is crisp and fresh. For the adventurous in spirit, there are incredible hikes through jungle trails, or even to the summit of one of the many mountains, where you will be rewarded for your efforts with an abundance of colourful flora and fauna, and picture perfect landscapes, isolated waterfalls and sweaping views.  Our villa manager and dedicated staff are happy to help you arrange any activities you would like to take part of in your stay.Guest accessThe entire 6000m2 Munduk Mountain Estate is just for guests staying at the villa.Our wonderful team of staff live nearby and are there to help guests with whatever they need during their stay.Other things to noteAs Munduk is in the mountains the climate is a lot cooler than most of Bali. Warm clothing and layers are recommended.  Munduk Mountain Estate has an open fire, fire pit and hot plunge for the relaxing and cosy evenings in the mountains.Munduk Mountain Estate is also a fully staffed villa with English Speaking Villa manager, in-villa cook and daily housekeeping. Catering is available during your stay if you would prefer not to cook for yourselves, a full menu is available upon request, as well as a selection of wines, beer and soft drinks.This is a remote area, so there are limitations on what you can buy, near to Munduk Mountain Estate and it is recommended to have cash available as the nearest ATM and cash machines are around 45 minutes drive away.Our Villa Manager is happy to arrange for specific groceries and supplies to be purchased and waiting for you on arrival, please just ensure that you give us adequate notice for this. We charge the receipt amount for groceries plus 20% (to allow for delivery, fuel and any staff costs involved in purchasing these).Extra person cost IDR 800,000 per pax (after 8 pax)

title: Rusters Ubud Estate
description: Rusters Estate Ubud, a new high-end luxury 4-bedroom .Villa build with a fusion of Danish and Tropical Balinese Design. Fantastic Rice Field and Sunset views, this private and peaceful gem is next to the popular Rusters Creative Space, with a Cafe, Bar, Restaurant, bakery and pottery classes. A sumptuous and delicate breakfast from the Rusters Kitchen, Butler service and a private car with driver is included throughout the stay, to ensure your memorable Balinese dream holiday in UbudThe spaceRusters Estate with large private swimming pool and sun loungers, consists of 4 Bedrooms each with its own private bedroom. A TV Room with private office space is available. Large and complete kitchen, dining area, 2 x different living area with Pool table is also provided. This Villa has its own GYM and SaunaGuest accessThe whole Estate is completely private

title: The Ocean View at Balian Beach
description: The Ocean View is a spacious 2-bedroom villa overlooking Balian Beach. The villa offers everything needed to disconnect from everyday life ‚Äì organic a la carte breakfast, daily maid service, and in-villa massages. Dinners are available upon request. The Ocean View villa is the perfect location to just relax and unwind.The spaceThis newly built villa was designed by the hosts to incorperate Balinese elements into the modern layout.  You enter the villa via a privite entrance gate, crossing the Koi pond on floating steps into the spacious living/dining area with breath-taking views of the Indian Ocean. Nightly rate includes daily maid service, bottled drinking water, and a fully catered breakfast. The breakfast menu consists of fresh farm duck eggs, homemade bread, granola, and yogurt. All are served with fresh juice or smoothies and tropical fruit platter. Dinners can be arranged upon request for 300,000 IR per person. Alternatively, you can find a variety of western and Indonesian restaurants a short 5-minute walk down the beach. During the wet season (Dec-Mar) this can require a brief swim, so alternatively we have scooters, available for rent, or a car and driver can be arranged, for the short trip to the restaurants.Private in-villa massages and spa treatments can also be arranged during your stay for 200,000 to 300,000 IR.Balian Beach is approximately a 2-3 hour drive from Bali's international Airport. We highly recommend you let us arrange your airport pick-up/drop-off as we have reliable English-speaking drivers who know the location of the villa. The cost is 700,000 IR (approximately US$50).We are happy to help you plan day trips to other local attractions and activities in Bali. These include snorkeling on the beautiful reef surrounding West Bali's marine park at Menjangan Island, sunset dinner at Bali's famous Tanah Lot water temple, mountain drives through UNESCO listed rice terraces and volcanic lakes or day trips to Ubud and Kuta for the shopaholics.Guest accessThe Ocean Breeze guests enjoy full and exclusive use of the entire villa.

Caf√© del Mar Bali: Situated about 7 minutes on foot, this upscale beach club provides a chic setting for dining and enjoying sunset views.Caravan Caf√©: An 8-minute walk brings you to this popular caf√©, offering a variety of healthy and hearty meals in a cozy environment.Starbucks: Located approximately 7 minutes on foot, this global coffee chain is perfect for a quick caffeine fix.Canggu Square: A 6-minute drive will take you to this shopping area, where you can find a variety of retail stores and services.Seminyak Beach: Just a 6-minute drive away, this beach is known for its lively atmosphere, upscale dining, and shopping options.Eat Street: Located about 6 minutes by car, this street is lined with a variety of restaurants and eateries offering diverse cuisines.Petitenget Temple: A 6-minute drive will bring you to this historic Hindu temple, offering a glimpse into Bali's rich cultural heritage.Desa Potato Head: Situated approximately 7 minutes by car, this beachfront venue is known for its vibrant atmosphere and eclectic design. expediaSeminyak Square: Just a 7-minute drive away, this shopping center offers a variety of boutiques, restaurants, and cafes. expediaNgurah Rai International Airport (DPS): The airport is about a 42-minute drive from the villa, making it convenient for travelers arriving or departing Bali.Whether you're looking to relax on the beach, explore local eateries, or shop for unique finds, Black Villas Canggu Beach by OXO's central location provides easy access to all that Canggu has to offer.Guest accessOur guests will have full access to the entire villa, including all of the bedrooms, bathrooms, living room, cinema room, a full kitchen, and swimming pool. We hope you‚Äôll create wonderful memories here, just as we have. Book your stay today and experience the magic of our Bali Berawa villa.Guest accessGuest will be able to access the entire villa with full privacy *Architectural Masterpiece*Experience refined island living in this stunning modern tropical villa. Designed with elegance and comfort in mind, the villa features luxurious interiors with high-end furnishings and stylish d√©cor throughout. Whether you're here for romance, family time, or a chic getaway, this villa offers an unforgettable blend of modern luxury and tropical charm.*Master Bedroom ( ROOM 1 )* Unwind in the comfort of a stylish master bedroom featuring a plush king-sized bed, a sleek Smart TV for on-demand entertainment, and an elegant en-suite bathroom with a relaxing bathtub. Equipped with a high-quality grill, it‚Äôs ideal for casual gatherings.Other things to noteNEARBYBerawa Beach: 15 minutes walking distanceRestaurants: 5 minutes walking distanceBeach clubs: 15 minutes walking distanceKids' playground: 5 minutes walking distanceGrocery store: 5 minutes walking distanceNightclub: 10 minutes walking distanceSTAFF AND SERVICE *Housekeeping Service* Our housekeeping team is available daily from 9:00 AM to 10:00 PM to assist you with cleaning and any needs you may have during your stay at the villa.If you prefer extra privacy during certain times, kindly let us know your preference in advance‚Äîwe‚Äôll be happy to accommodate it.Concierge ServiceOur team is here to assist you with arranging any plans or activities during your stay. Whether you're looking for local experiences, tours, or special requests, we‚Äôre happy to help make your stay unforgettable.*Wellness Activities*Yoga, meditation, and breathwork sessions are available upon request for an additional fee. We look forward to hosting you at Umani Villa.Included in every stay:- Free welcome drink- Villa staff with daily cleaning- Bath towels for each guests- Hi Speed Wi-Fi internet connection- Safety boxes- Concierge ServicesAvailable upon request through our exclusive Concierge services:- Airport transfer- Bike rental- Breakfast upon request- Massages at the villa- Nanny services- Pool Fence- Laundry- Restaurant bookings- Activities such as watersports, surf classes, cooking classes, water parks.- Daily tours to visit temples, landscapes, villages.- And much more!Don‚Äôt hesitate to ask us if you want to do some activities or visits while enjoying your stay at our villa!

title: 3BR Luxurious Prime Villa @Seminyak
description: It offers a good selection of spacious three-bedrooms villa on 500 M2 private compound of private villa. Each villa has a large private swimming pool. The villas are surrounded by lush tropical garden. Choose your spacious 3 bedroom villa with beds, a garden and an outdoor gazebo to lay-back and enjoy chilling breeze. Guests will enjoy Bali in its most tranquil way, under coloured umbrella and day beds beside the pool for relaxing sun bathing.

title: Villa Sansil-Seseh Beachfront Paradise
description: Villa Sansil is located ON the beach overlooking Pantai Seseh - close to the popular Canggu area. The fully staffed villa has 3 large 40sqm bedrooms with half-open 25sqm bathrooms. Extra beds are available on request. Get spoiled with your private chef who can cook both Asian and Western cuisine and have our lovely staff bring you fresh juices while you relax in the pool.  Restaurants are only minutes away. Surf in front of the house or walk towards Echo Beach to meet your competition.The spaceDESIGNED TO VIEW THE OCEAN FROM THE BEDYou will find Villa Sansil in Pantai Seseh between Canggu and Tanah Lot, Pantai Seseh is a small traditional fishing village with an ancient sea temple. This three-bedroom villa with a large traditional wooden veranda and terrazzo floors is surrounded by the ocean, trees, rice fields, and a river. It is only 15 minutes by car to the famous temple of Tanah Lot.If you are a surfer, there is a good break in front of the house or to the left in Pererenan and Echo Beach. The famous Canggu breaks (Batu Bolong and Berawa) are not too far away. While on your pool bed, sitting on the veranda, or in the Balinese Gazebo near the beach, the deep harmony of the ocean keeps entertaining you. At night the ocean is full of glimpses of hundreds of fishermen‚Äôs lights. Listen to crickets and frogs at sunset, and feel the sea breeze day and night that comes to touch and cool you.Everything is at ease. When you are tired of all relaxation and ready for the hottest restaurants, parties, or the best shopping, Seminyak is not far away and the famous Batu Bolong, Canggu, is only  10 minutes away..Guest accessVilla Sansil is also a favorite location for honeymoons and holidays for families/friends/surfers.The 2 bedrooms ground floor of each 40 sqm are complete with mosquito nets, overhead fan and AC. They are overlooking the ocean, a large tropical garden, a swimming pool, and Lotuspond.The ensuite bathrooms have an open-air garden,2 showers and a bathtub, an overhead fan, a hairdryer, a scale, and a safety box.Each bedroom is equipped with satellite TV and Amazon Firestick incl. Netflix and DVD player. The 3rd bedroom is a few steps up,40 sqm, also with overhead fan, mosquito net, and aircon. The ensuite half-open-air bathroom has a shower, overhead fan, hairdryer, scale, and safety box.Living & Dining Area:The traditional wooden floor veranda with sofas and lazy chairs overlooks the 2000 sqm garden, swimming pool, and ocean. Perfect to read a book or enjoy a sunset drink in good company with the cool breeze and view of the Indian Ocean. The kitchen is fully equipped with all cooking utilities, a stove, fridge, glass & table wares, cutleries, an expresso machine, juicers, blender, etc.In front of the kitchen is the dining area, with a terrazzo floor, and a long size dining table that seats up to 12 people. There is a nice lounge corner for after-dinner drinks.Up a couple of steps from there, you have an open big living on the second floor, with very comfy sofas overlooking the garden, pool, and ocean.Staff: Manager, cleaning staff, gardener/pool attendant, cook, and 2 security guards. All staff are very well trained and will make your stay in Villa Sansil unforgettable. Made, the Balinese cook will serve the guests food and drinks whatever they like in local and international cuisine.Dogs:If you are a dog lover you may like to walk our dogs on the beach. If not, they are not allowed in the rooms but are your best guards. Villa Sansil will absolutely offer you the unspoiled relaxing atmosphere you expect from Bali.Other things to noteIncluded in your rate are: airport transfers & cold towels/welcome drinks, flowers, a huge bowl of tropical  fruits, a free flow of mineral water, and the first 1 or 2 meals & drinks, depending on arrival time.,Then you just give some household money to the staff, they go shopping in the local market and come back with the receipts. The cook then will prepare everything the way you like. All basic ingredients like herbs, oils, vinegars, etc. are already in the house: just like at home, or maybe even more.So 1 pack of milk and 1 pack of coffee buys a parade of lovely cappuccinos, and the first packs are on us... We have all sorts of board games, a small library, a drybox for your laptop/camera, and of course lots of DVDs. If you want, you can go fishing early in the morning with the fishermen and the staff will grill your catch on the barbeque.If you want to be active and explore the surroundings we have 7 mountain bikes for you to use...You can also join Nyoman at local markets and shops to buy food and Mad√© our Cook can show you and teach you how to make a delicious Balinese meal...

title: Luxury 7 BR Heart of Seminyak with Gym,Spa,Cinema
description: Situated just 10 minutes walking from Seminyak‚Äôs beach, shops, restaurants and nightlife, this fully villa is like no other vacation home in Seminyak.You will likely be amazed by the calm and peaceful serenity of this 7 luxurious bedrooms villa. The perfect place to party, business seminar, yoga retreat or for family reunions.The spaceDouble living room communicating with one another, outside barbecue area with bar, pool lounge, sky lounge, meditation area with yoga pavilion overlooking a beautiful buddha and the lush greenery of the garden, Fully equipped gymnasium, private sound proof cinema room with a 155 inch screen and several hundred films.  17m and 12m pools with 20 sunbeds , a superb decoration and attentive staff who will prepare various cocktails before serving at the table the delicious meal that you will have prepared the chef.Guest accessIn the foreground the pool of 12metres, then the mirror pool of 17 meters ending with a gazebo.The pool deck is furnished with 20 comfortable sun loungers shaded by umbrellas.Villa kitchen staff are at your service to prepare daily breakfast. For lunch and dinner, our chief prepares delicious meals according to your choices.The villa has ten elegant ensuite air-conditioning (and a ceiling fan)  bedrooms with a desk and queen beds facing a TV and DVD, bar fridge, bathrooms has  rain shower, twin sinks and 6 bathrooms has also stone tub . Some bedrooms can also be configured as a twin-bedded room on request.Perched atop the villa, 80 m¬≤ High open-air, rooftop Sky Lounge terrace and garden offers a relaxed atmosphere with sweeping views of the most beautiful part of Seminyak area. Indulge in one of the best happy hours , with  fresh fruit Mojitos, and  a comfortable ocean breeze. it‚Äôs the perfect venue for every occasion including weddings, private parties, or others events.The villa has a dedicated yoga and meditation space on the sky terrace‚Ä¶You can also use the gazebo to have massage in a quiet atmosphere.CINEMA ROOMVirtually unique in Bali villa rentals, the villa has  a world class cinema room, with projector/ 155 inch screen, and 6-channel surround sound.After a day in the sun, out sightseeing or just lounging on the beach or by the pool, it‚Äôs great to settle down on a comfy sofa and watch a film in company‚Ä¶. providing great entertainment for both adults and childrenWatch the satellite TV , or one of the DVDs you picked up down by the beach today for about 1$ , or choose in the great list of movies already registered.As a result, the cinema is suited to private cinema evenings as well as product presentations, talks and image films, or discover the first images of an organized wedding in the villa.The bartending staff will provide you and your guests with freshly popped popcorn and beverages while you enjoy the film.The Cinema Room is a fantastic feature at the villa that is hugely popular with all our guests.PRIVATE GYM ROOMPrivate gym  watching the garden fitted with some of the best equipment such as treadmill, elliptical Trainer, spin bike, multi station home gym.On request, ask our manager for a personal coach, and create with him, only for you, a personal training during all your stay with us. He will make you live a deep rebirth program. Inside the villa, you will find a real private spa equipped with a massage room with 2 beds, a simple massage room with a bathtub to perform the treatments, 3 pedicure stations and 2 manicure stations.The villa‚Äòs personalized spa service allow guests to enjoy an extensive menu of pampering treatments and therapies:Balinese massageTherapeutic massageAcupressure massageHot stone massageFoot massage ‚Äì Reflexology  Body scrubBody mask/wrapTraditional facialHealing serviceManicure & pedicureOther things to noteTHE SERVICESVilla managerIn-house staff and butlerNight securityWelcome service (welcome drink, pick up at the airport)Daily cleaning and villa maintenanceConcierge serviceBreakfast includedPersonal chief on demandMassages on demand2 private Swimming Pools and garden maintenanceGazeboParkingGaz barbecueContact us for event detail and fee.We are required by local regulations to charge occupancy tax. Villa rate is subject to 15,5% government taxes and services charge, not included in the price of the reservation and have to be paid directly upon check-in. See more here: airbnb/help/article/318/how-do-taxes-work-for-guests

title: Exclusive 5* Beachfront Villa In Central Lovina
description: Spend a wonderful holiday on the shores of one of Bali‚Äôs beautiful beaches at Lovina, North Bali. Glass doors open to a wide infinity pool that seems to merge with the ocean at this modern pool house built in the center of the Lovina area. We proudly announce this beautiful oceanfront vacation rental will make a picturesque backdrop for a tropical big group getaway.The spaceThe pool villa is only a 5-minute walk to the center of Lovina with its iconic Dolphin Statue. Everything is close by and reachable. It is easy to explore the area without a scooter or car. Within walking distance, you will find many restaurants, bars, shops, etc. Don‚Äôt forget to try the newest jogging track just right on the beach of the pool house. Get up early enough to eat a small breakfast and digest it properly before jogging.Set amid lush gardens and tranquil water features, the luxury five-bedroom pool villa comes with an infinity pool of 20 meters and a heated Jacuzzi overlooking the Bali Sea offering total serene relaxation. The ocean-inspired creates the perfect contrast to the beige-black and white interior of the Sea View Pool Villa. The wooden openings door to glass windows allow you to see and feel the sea breeze from the bedroom area of the pool villa with a touch of extra height. Expanding the area with 6 bedrooms, Sea View Pool Villa must be a luxury staycation for your group. All the bedrooms in this luxury property come with a king-sized bed, en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, television, and a wardrobe. The balcony and the terrace are some of the best spots for relaxation. All of the feature is a reflection of modern, luxe, and aesthetic. The fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances is the perfect corner for you who love cooking.  Craving lunch but can‚Äôt escape the sun? Let‚Äôs ask the staff to prepare your meal or order from the neighbor's restaurant. Turn on the Sonos sound system, and enjoy a leisurely lunch on the alfresco dining set with sea views. Discover a vibrant and unique beautiful garden in the center living area of this villa. This is the highlight of this property. A basket of yummy pastries, ripened fruits, and fresh juice is perfect for starting the day ‚Äî is there any better way to start the day than with breakfast with the view? The refreshing, turquoise-tiled infinity pool‚Äîseemingly melting into the glittering North Bali Sea‚Äîinvites you in for a dip to escape the balmy midday heat, coddle on the sunbathing chair or cozily settled Jacuzzi, with a glass of wine. You have so many things to enjoy during the staycation.Don‚Äôt miss exploring the surrounding area and doing the boat trip for dolphins, learning about the Balinese cultural experience, and taking a cooking class. Guest relations service is included in your stay to make your vacation worry and stress-free.Guest accessGuests at the villa will have exclusive access to the entire property and all its amenities, ensuring complete privacy throughout their stay. With private pools, spacious living areas, and the freedom to enjoy all the luxurious features of the villa, this is the perfect setting for a peaceful and intimate retreat. Whether relaxing by the pool, dining outdoors, or enjoying the modern entertainment facilities, guests can fully immerse themselves in the serene beachfront atmosphere.Other things to note- For bookings of 7 nights or more, we offer a welcome package, which includes a complimentary lunch or dinner (depending on your arrival time) on your first day, along with breakfast the following morning.- Please note that the beach in front of the villa is a public beach, so you may see some people walking around or enjoying the area.- The base price is for 12 guests.

title: Rumah Ardjuno: Hillside Retreat
description: Your hillside retreat with ocean & mountain view.Rumah Ardjuno is a thoughtfully designed 3-bedroom villa that combines quiet luxury with sustainability. Nestled on the hills of Desa Ungasan, it offers sweeping views of Bali‚Äôs natural landscape and a sense of seclusion rarely found on the island.With its open courtyard, ocean and mountain view and spacious living areas, the villa invites you to slow down, reconnect, and appreciate the beauty of Bali's nature in a home unlike any other.The spaceThis 3-ensuite bedroom with 3-bathroom (Japanese Toilet) and 2 powder rooms (also Japanese Toilet) sanctuary offers the perfect setting for a family staycation, combining the warmth of home with the elegance of modern luxury. With accommodations for up to 10 guests, it's designed for comfort, connection, and conscious living.‚ú® What Makes Rumah Ardjuno Special‚Ä¢	üèÜ ArchDaily Award Finalist ‚Äì recognized internationally for eco-material innovation and architectural harmony.‚Ä¢	üåø Eco-Luxury Living ‚Äì built with sustainability in mind, including energy efficiency and minimal environmental impact.‚Ä¢	üíª Fast Wi-Fi ‚Äì perfect for digital nomads or working vacations.üõèÔ∏è Sleeping Arrangements‚Ä¢	Bedroom 1: King size bed (200x200 cm) + Ensuite + 55‚Äù Smart TV + Wardrobe + Hair dryer + Iron & board‚Ä¢	Bedroom 2: 2 Queen beds (160x200 cm) + Ensuite + 55‚Äù Smart TV + Wardrobe‚Ä¢	Bedroom 3: 2 Queen beds (160x200 cm) + Ensuite + 55‚Äù Smart TV + WardrobeüõÅ Plus, 2 additional half bathrooms for guests' convenience.üõãÔ∏è Living Space & Comfort‚Ä¢	Large open-plan living room with 85‚Äù Smart TV‚Ä¢	Dining table for 10‚Ä¢	In line with our eco-luxury values, the villa also features an advanced energy-saving AC system, where certain room air conditioners can only be activated when the dining room AC is turned OFF  ‚Äî optimizing power usage and reducing environmental impact.Dining room AC can only turn ON if rooms Suite 3 & Gym AC's are OFF. Dining room AC is equipped with a timer.üë®‚Äçüç≥ Fully Equipped Kitchen‚Ä¢	Microwave, 3-burner gas stove, rice cooker‚Ä¢	Refrigerator & freezer‚Ä¢	Water dispenser‚Ä¢	Plates, spoons, forks, bread /steak knife, glassware sets for 10 people‚Ä¢	Hexclad set pan & pots, wok, pots Note: condiments not provided for hygiene reasons (e.g., oil, salt, pepper).üèä Private Villa Facilities‚Ä¢	üå¥ Private swimming pool‚Ä¢	üÖøÔ∏è Private parking space‚Ä¢	üèãÔ∏è Private fitness center‚Ä¢	üåá Private balcony rooftop for sunset views‚Ä¢              Private elevator to 2nd & 3rd floorüîê Guest Access & Security‚Ä¢	Entire villa access is private‚Ä¢	Mandatory ID or passport submission before check-in‚Ä¢	Communication via Airbnb app‚Ä¢	Free private parkingEvent & Media Usage PolicyPlease note that any events held at the property ‚Äî including but not limited to parties, gatherings, video or photo shoots (commercial or non-commercial) ‚Äî must receive prior written approval from the owner.Additional fees may apply depending on the nature, size, and duration of the event, and will be subject to the owner's discretion and approval.Failure to comply with these rules will be considered a serious breach of house policy, and may result in immediate termination of the stay without any refund.We kindly ask all guests to respect this policy to ensure a safe, respectful, and enjoyable environment for everyone.Guest accessYou have 24-hour access to the garden, pool, gym, and living space.Other things to notePlease be informed that there is an ongoing construction project located diagonally across from our villa. title: Tropical Paradise: 6BR Villa, Slide Pool & Arcade
description: Welcome to Villa Tropical Paradise Ubud, a spacious multi-storey villa nestled in lush surroundings, offering a cool and tranquil atmosphere ideal for families and large groups. With greenery all around and inviting indoor-outdoor spaces, Villa Tropical Paradise is the perfect setting for creating meaningful moments together.The spaceOn the ground floor, Villa Tropical Paradise features a spacious living room framed by glass walls, seamlessly connected to a fully equipped kitchen, large dining table, and a comfortable sofa. The space is kept breezy and cool with air conditioning and ceiling fans, making it an ideal gathering place at any time of day.This level also includes three well-appointed bedrooms, each with a queen-size bed, Smart TV, air conditioning, and a private en-suite bathroom, ensuring comfort and privacy for every guest at Villa Tropical Paradise.At the heart of Villa Tropical Paradise lies a vibrant outdoor space, featuring a sparkling L-shaped infinity pool complete with a slide. This inviting centerpiece is perfect for both fun-filled moments and laid-back poolside enjoyment, offering a refreshing escape surrounded by lush greenery.You‚Äôll find an elegant outdoor dining area sheltered by a pergola, perfect for enjoying meals all together. The sunken lounge surrounding a cozy brazier sets the scene for intimate evenings, while a jet pool offers even more ways to unwind. Nearby, a hammock and yoga space add a relaxing touch to this serene setting, making it an ideal spot for peaceful mornings or quiet reflection. The upper level opens with a fun and inviting gaming room that overlooks the cathedral lounge, perfect for playing arcade games, board games or watching a movie.From there, step into the sleeping quarters, which include three additional bedrooms with Smart TVs, AC, and private en-suite bathrooms. One of these rooms includes twin beds, ideal for families or friends, while the master suite is a true sanctuary, featuring a balcony overlooking the jungle palms, perfect for starting or ending the day immersed in nature. What makes Villa Tropical Paradise truly special is its thoughtful design as a real family home centered around the pool, where each space flows naturally into the next. Covered pathways allow guests to move easily between areas of the villa, making it enjoyable regardless of the weather. This design offers both communal areas and private spaces, allowing for connection or solitude, depending on each guest‚Äôs mood. The villa is equipped with the Starlink network, which provides a reliable high-speed internet connection throughout the Conveniently located just a short drive from Ubud Center, Villa Tropical Paradise gives you easy access to local caf√©s, art markets, and cultural landmarks while still providing a peaceful retreat to return to. The Ubud Fitness Center is just 100 metres from the villa.Whether you‚Äôre planning a group getaway or a memorable family holiday, Villa Tropical Paradise delivers a welcoming escape in a serene Ubud setting. Book your stay today and experience the charm and comfort of this tropical home.(Please note that your Netflix and YouTube accounts will be used to log in. Ensure you log out before checking out to protect your account from unauthorized use.)STAFF AND SERVICES INCLUDED- Dedicated Villa Manager- Villa Host (Ubud) or Staff (Seminyak/Bukit)- Daily Housekeeping- Garden and Pool StaffEXTRA COSTS (advance notice may be required):- Villa pre-stocking: Groceries and beverages (subject to an additional service fee).- Breakfast by Villa Host (Ubud ONLY): IDR 120.000 per person per meal as a cover charge (minimum 4 guests).- Floating breakfast: IDR 150.000 per tray (for up to 4 guests).- In-villa Chef: Arranged through our trusted partner (see FAQs for details).- Airport transfers: Convenient pick-up and drop-off services.- Driving service: Reliable and professional drivers available on request.- Activities and excursions: Customized experiences to explore Bali.- In-villa massage services: Relax and rejuvenate in your villa's comfort.- Baby-sitting service: Experienced caretakers for your little ones.- Security guards: Additional safety and peace of mind.- Flowers arrangements: Custom designs to enhance your stay.Other things to noteIf Nearby Construction Occurs: We value your peaceful stay. In the rare event of construction in our area, our team is ready to assist with any comfort concerns. While neighborhood activities are beyond our control, your relaxation remains our priority. Please don't hesitate to contact us if you need anything to enhance your experience.Natural Ventilation: Experience the refreshing breeze of Bali with our open-air living spaces, designed to maximize natural airflow, providing an eco-friendly alternative to air conditioning or fans.Vendor Services: To ensure the villa's equipment and your safety, our dedicated team manages all vendor services within the villa, including spa, personal training, decorations, private chefs, yoga, photography, and villa equipment. Using external vendors is strictly prohibited and will result in a fine of IDR 2.000.000.Waste Management: Contribute to Bali's sustainable efforts by participating in our waste separation program. We provide three bins for organic, inorganic, and residual waste in your villa.Sustainable Amenities: We provide Sensatia Botanicals, a locally founded skincare brand, as bathroom amenities (hand soap, body soap, shampoo, and conditioner). Made in Bali with 100% natural, cruelty-free ingredients, this partnership reflects our support for sustainability and local initiatives, including plastic recycling and beach cleanups.Natural Charm: Our villas embrace Bali's tropical beauty, where the sounds of nature‚Äîgeckos and insects‚Äîcreate a serene ambiance. The open design may occasionally welcome wildlife, despite regular pest control. Geckos, symbols of good luck in Balinese culture, and other creatures are vital to the ecosystem.  Cultural Respect: In Ubud and Bukit, monkeys may be present‚Äîplease refrain from feeding or interacting with them. Surrounding landscapes, like jungles, rice fields, and local farms (e.g., duck, chicken or pig), are not part of the villa property and may be accessed by residents, with changes beyond our control. We appreciate your respect for Bali‚Äôs natural and cultural heritage.FAQsQ: What time is the check-in policy?A: Our dedicated staff ensures a smooth check-in process. Check-in starts at 14:00 for 1-3 bedroom villas and at 15:00 for 4-6 bedroom villas. Luggage drop-off is welcome after 11:00 as we prepare your villa. Please note, a late check-in fee of IDR 200.000 applies for arrivals after 20:00 to cover staff overtime, as our staff does not stand by the villa all the time.Q: What time is the check-out policy?A: Our check-out time is at 11:00 by default. Late check-out is subject to availability and involves extra charge. Please note that for any late check-out between 11:00 ‚Äì 18:00, an additional charge of 50% of the Daily Villa Rate will apply. Any check-out after 18:00, will be charged at a full day's Daily Villa Rate. If you need to store your luggage after check-out time, you are welcome to do so.Q: Is breakfast included in the booking? How do we order the chef's service?A: Breakfast is not included in the room rate. However, you can easily arrange breakfast by contacting our reservation or concierge team. We offer a variety of menu options prepared by our dedicated private chef, right in your villa. The cost is IDR 160.000 per person, with a minimum order for 5 guests. You can indulge in a floating breakfast for an additional fee of IDR 150.000 per tray.For lunch and dinner, we offer enhanced services, including set menus, live BBQ cooking, ethnic cuisines, and even fine dining prepared by a Michelin-star chef, all cooked in the villa. Prices for lunch and dinner start at IDR 450.000 per person. Please note that terms and conditions apply for booking.Additionally, our villa features a fully equipped kitchen, allowing you the flexibility to prepare your own meals if you prefer. Whether you choose to dine in or savor a chef‚Äôs touch, our team is here to ensure a seamless and enjoyable experience.Q: Do we have a housekeeping service every day?A: Absolutely! Daily housekeeping is provided from 9:00 to 17:00. Linens are changed every third day for sustainability. To ensure privacy, please coordinate with your Villa Host or Staff for a convenient cleaning time. Your comfort is our priority.Q: Can we have extra clean towels?A: Certainly! We are happy to provide extra towels, subject to availability. Please feel free to reach out to your Villa Host or Staff, and we‚Äôll do our best to accommodate your request promptly.Q: What is the maximum occupancy for this 6-bedroom villa? Can I have extra beds?A: This villa comfortably accommodates up to 12 guests. there are no extra beds for this Villa.

title: The Aarya - by Unicorn Villas Bali
description: Nestled in the serene area of Canggu, our 5-bedroom Balinese-style villa blends traditional elegance with modern comfort.Perfect for a tranquil retreat or exploring Bali, it offers spacious ensuite bedrooms, open-plan living areas and a fully equipped kitchen.Enjoy the private pool, lush tropical garden, and outdoor pavilion for relaxation. Reach out with any questions or requests. We're here to help you plan the perfect Canggu adventure!Additional Services (Optional):Elevate your stay with thoughtful amenities.‚Ä¢ Transportation Services: From airport pick-up to daily drivers, we can arrange transportation for your convenience.‚Ä¢ In-House Massage: Relax with professional in-house massage services.Your perfect retreat for family vacations, getaways with friends, or a serene escape in Canggu.Guest accessEntire space is included in this rental‚Äîplease make yourself at home and enjoy your stay!Other things to noteThere is currently a building project next to the villa that will cause noise from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m., Monday to Saturday.The times can always vary (it's not in our control). For example, they may work on Sunday and then take the next day off, or they may work until 8 p.m. every day.

title: Jungleight Bali - The Space
description: Jungleight Bali - The Space is a unique two bedrooms bamboo house with a wonderful view of Ubud valley, a genuine tropical landscape.  This getaway spot is a great place to bring into reality the dream adventure of the true wanderer. We invite you to feel the magnificent vibes of the entire house to escape the life that is full of drama into a journey with ultimate joy.The spaceBedroom: The Space is a unique designed two bedrooms bamboo house equipped with air conditioning, each room has its own wardrobe and an en suite bathroom with an outdoor bathtub that provides a view of the surrounding greenery. Entertainment: The living room is equipped with a projector for entertainment, allowing you to enjoy Netflix and other content. There's also a Nespresso coffee machine and a refrigerated minibar for your convenience.Front Desk: The resort offers 24-hour front desk service. The staff at the front desk can assist guests with various services, such as scooter rentals and arranging trips to explore the surrounding area.In-Room Dining: The resort's restaurant provides in-room dining options, which means you can order breakfast, all-day dining, and drinks from the comfort of your villa. The staff will deliver your orders directly to your villa. There is also a small restaurant on-site exclusively for guests. This provides guests with more dining choices and convenience during your stay. You can either opt for in-room dining and enjoy your meals with privacy in the villa, or you can visit the on-site restaurant to dine in a communal setting if you prefer. Cuisine: The restaurant offers a diverse menu featuring both Balinese and International cuisine. You can enjoy a variety of dishes without leaving the comfort of your villa.Bar: The resort's bar serves a range of beverages, including soft drinks and alcoholic drinks, throughout the day. You can savour these refreshing drinks by the pool or in your villa.Eco-Friendly Setting: Jungleight Bali is situated in the middle of a tropical forest, embracing Bali's beautiful natural environment. The resort was designed to provide guests with a restful and healing experience in the midst of nature.Jungleight Bali's Inhabitants: The resort acknowledges the presence of various insects, ants, mosquitos, spiders, geckos, and other creatures that naturally inhabit the ecological environment. The resort maintains high cleaning and pest control standards to minimise their presence however before booking, acknowledges that some of these creatures may enter the room due to the open nature of bamboo material.Consideration for Bamboo Living: Bamboo resorts offer a unique living environment, and guests are encouraged to carefully consider this aspect before booking with Jungleight Bali. It's important for guests to be comfortable with the idea of being in close proximity to nature.Maximum Occupancy: The Space can accommodate a maximum of 4 adults and 2 children (12 years old or younger). The villa is equipped with a king size bed in each bedroom, and any request for an additional bed will incur an extra charge.Included Breakfast: The complimentary breakfast is designed for 4 adults and 2 children, with options selected from the kids' menu. Any other requests for additional guests or special dietary requirements may result in additional charges.Other things to noteHouse Rules:- Check-in at 3 pm- Check out before 12 pm- Noise will not be tolerated.- No smoking inside- Please lock up valuables in the safety deposit box.- Any form of misbehavior or noise is not tolerated.- Events, gatherings, parties or pets are not allowed.

title: Origami House, a paradise with concierge in Ubud!
description: Origami House, reborn in 2023, has been refreshed with a stunning renovation in 2025 that honors its original spirit of puristic luxury. This intimate haven is a sanctuary of tranquility, a place where time seems to stand still.The villa is one of 10 unique magnificent houses in the private gated Penjiwaan Community in a quiet and beautiful area of Mas just 15 minutes drive from Ubud. The house is in front of the jungle and amidst scenic rice fields.The spaceIt all began with a handful of owners, international celebrities, families, artists and conscious entrepreneurs whom having fallen in love with this place. The house is primarily used as a retreat center for the owners and their friends to get new inspirations and ideas.We consider our home a little art piece. It was designed by Alexis Dornier, finished in April 2016 and featured in some of the biggest architectural media exposure. It was voted by Elle Decoration, UK, "to the 11 most beautiful luxury homes of the world". We decided to call it Origami House because of its pretty unique timber roof structure.400 sqm total area of house with pool and terrace, 280 sqm garden area and 210 sqm clean living space offer enough space for rest and relaxation.The luxury private villa hosts 4 magnificent bedrooms overlooking the jungle, especially beautiful in the morning sun, AC and with its private outdoor area. Feel the quiet atmosphere in the jungle and listen to the trees, leaves and birds! It's fantastic!Relax in your own traditional Balinese green stone infinity pool in the lush garden. Have a sunbath on the nice sun deck.Be well and happy and enjoy your yoga practice on the large yoga terrace and feel the atmosphere with harmony and respect for Balinese nature...Enjoy cooking in the fantastic, unique, fully equipped kitchen with fresh water dispenser. The kitchen block was designed by Jonas Ruf, creator of unique furniture pieces and objects.And have fun with family and friends with the ping pong table.Enjoy your stay and the spirit of Origami!For more info, please visit @origamihouseubudGuest accessDon't hesitate to ask our management, Gusde and his team, for any questions or services you need: airport-shuttle, private driver, sightseeing trips, hiking tours, kids activities, breakfast, lunch, dinner, renting a scooter, yoga, massage or anything else. Also we can help you organize a babysitter and pool fence rental.They are very polite and helpful and will organize that for you.Other things to noteACAir conditions ONLY available at each of the 4 bedrooms, while other space and living room has high ceiling and fans that applied there for ensure the circulation.Go-Jek AppIt is basically an app that helps you find scooter drivers that basically do whatever you need them to do. Super inexpensive. You can tell them to go to a certain restaurant for you, order whatever you like. They pick it up for you, pay the money for you and you pay them their fee and whatever they spent for you, once they arrive at the house to deliver. It's super convenient. Ask our House Manager if you need help using it.
