title: Stunning Lavish 6 Bedrooms Private Villa In Canggu
description: The private villa located in one of Bali‚Äôs stylish and beautiful area Canggu.Luxury designer villa that seamlessly blends modern contemporary architecture with the laid-back tropical charm of Bali's coastline. This villa boasts six beautiful bedrooms, lounge rooms, kitchen, and bathrooms, all surrounded by a lush garden with sprawling foliage and an outdoor swimming pool.The spaceThe villa is serviced by a professional staffs. They will take good care of you during your stay and will offer personal assistance and daily housekeeping. Breakfast is included and served daily.

title: Exceptional villa with chef next to Canggu
description: Immerse yourself in the elegance and luxury of Villa Rock'coco, a Balinese oasis paradise located in Umalas, just a few steps from the ocean. With five-star service, sumptuous rooms and an elegant ambience, every moment is an invitation to absolute relaxation. NO CHEF IN AUGUST 2025 SO UN TARIF VERY ATTRACTIVEThe spaceDiscover Villa Rock'coco, a true haven of peace in the heart of Umalas district in Bali.Located just 800 meters from the ocean and equidistant from the village of Seminyak and Canggu, this residence offers a harmonious fusion of Balinese, ethnic and contemporary styles for a unique vacation.Five-star hotel service and a dedicated team are on hand from 7am to 10pm to ensure ultimate comfort and an unforgettable stay.Enjoy a moment of relaxation by the pool and let yourself be seduced by the four spacious bedrooms, with private bathrooms and dressing rooms.The vast living room, open to the pool and garden, houses an American-designed kitchen and dining area to enjoy meals with family and friends.There's also a TV room, gym (full equipped), pool table and massage tables to enhance your stay.Services include a chef, housekeeping and 24-hour security.Additional services are also available on request, such as motorbike rental, in- villa massages, private driver service and much more.Explore the ultimate of Bali while enjoying the comfort and luxury of Villa Rock'coco.Extra services (on request only, preferential rates already negotiated):- Scooter rental from 100,00 Rp/day- 1 home massage therapist from 150,000 Rp/hour- 1 car with driver (6 seats plus driver) from 500,00 Rp/day (8h)Guest accessAccess to the house is very convenient and its location is ideal. title: HUGE 8BR, 21max, 3Pools, Sauna, Gym, BBQ, Rooftop!
description: Welcome to Villa Yeh Gangga ‚Äì a truly unique retreat where modern architecture meets ultimate relaxation. This multi-level masterpiece is thoughtfully designed to encompass every aspect of enjoyment.Highlights You'll Love:- Three Private Swimming Pools - Wellness Features: A serene Yoga Pavilion, Ice Bath, Sauna, Rooftop with BBQ- Unbeatable Location: Just steps away from Pererenan‚Äôs vibrant cafes, boutique shops, and stunning beach.Yeh Gangga promises a once-in-a-lifetime experience.The spaceEscape to Villa Yeh Gangga, a breathtaking sanctuary where modern luxury meets authentic charm. Nestled just 5 minutes from the tranquil shores of Pererenan Beach, this expansive retreat comprises two interconnected villas, designed to accommodate up to 21 guests in absolute comfort and style.Step into a world of refined elegance with 8 exquisite bedrooms, each thoughtfully designed with its own ensuite bathroom, ensuring ultimate privacy and convenience. Three of these bathrooms feature luxurious bathtubs, perfect for unwinding after a day of exploration.The villa provides versatile sleeping arrangements to cater to every guest's needs. The master bedrooms feature a king bed, while the other seven bedrooms each include convertible beds that can be configured as a king or two singles. Additionally, one room boasts a cozy bunk bed, and another can be arranged as three single beds, a super king, or a king with a single. Every bedroom is thoughtfully equipped with a dedicated workspace, creating a perfect retreat for digital nomads or those balancing work and leisure. The villa also features an office room that can be converted into an extra sleeping space, ideal for a nanny or traveling helper.Dive into paradise with three spectacular pools, each designed to immerse you in Bali‚Äôs tropical beauty. The main pool, a magnificent 25 x 5-meter centerpiece, is surrounded by plush bean bags for sun-soaked lounging. Two smaller, intimate pools (8 x 4 meters and 4 x 8 meters) offer a private spot for a refreshing dip or a quiet moment of relaxation. Whether you prefer morning laps or evening tranquility, the choice is yours.Each villa is a haven of relaxation and entertainment, featuring stylish living rooms equipped with TVs for cozy movie nights. Fully equipped kitchens and spacious dining areas provide the perfect setting for creating and sharing meals with your group. To make your evenings even more magical, the villa offers BBQ facilities, ideal for hosting alfresco feasts under the stars.Indulge in the ultimate wellness retreat with top-tier facilities designed to rejuvenate your body and mind. Guests can find balance and tranquility in the serene yoga pavilion, complete with exercise equipment. For pure relaxation, unwind with the villa‚Äôs ice bath, Jacuzzi, and sauna‚Äîoffering the perfect combination for recovery and luxurious pampering.Villa Yeh Gangga is more than just a villa‚Äîit‚Äôs an experience. Whether you‚Äôre seeking a dreamy retreat, a place to reconnect with loved ones, or a venue for unforgettable celebrations, this villa exceeds all expectations.Guest accessComplete access and total privacy.Other things to noteIncluded in every stay:- Free welcome drink- Daily housekeeping- Bath towels for each guests- High Speed Wifi internet connection- Safety boxes- Concierge ServicesAvailable upon request through our exclusive Concierge services:- Airport transfer- Car rental (with/without driver)- Bike rental- Private cook- Massages at the villa- Nanny services- Pool Fence- Laundry- Restaurant bookings- Activities such as watersports, surf classes, cooking classes, water parks‚Ä¶- Daily tours to visit temples, landscapes, villages‚Ä¶- And much more!Don‚Äôt hesitate to ask us if you want to do some activities or visits while enjoying your stay at our villas!

title:
Entire Villa

description: Discover Mayfair Place ‚Äì an exclusive 4-bedroom sanctuary in Canggu with endless protected rice-paddy views. 5 minutes to Canggu‚Äôs hotspots and 10 to the beach, this villa offers rooftop private ice bath, infinity pool, cinema, gym, Zen garden and 7-day service. Just five minutes from Canggu‚Äôs premier caf√©s and boutiques, and ten minutes from the beach ‚Äî yet a world apart in serenity and design.‚∏ªUnparalleled Amenities & Experiences‚Ä¢ Rooftop Retreat ‚Äì Immerse in a rooftop ice bath as the sun sets over endless paddies, or gather for sunset cocktails beneath the open sky.‚Ä¢ Private Cinema ‚Äì A 10-seat home theatre with a 150‚Ä≥ 4K projector, Yamaha surround sound and a vintage popcorn machine ‚Äî perfect for immersive evenings or private screenings.‚Ä¢ Infinity Pool & Zen Garden ‚Äì Swim beside a Japanese Zen garden perfumed with jasmine and shaded by bonsai ‚Äî a space to pause, play or simply breathe.‚Ä¢ Wellness & Fitness ‚Äì Your private gym with Peloton Guide, premium free weights and optional bespoke training keeps your stay balanced and energised.‚Ä¢ Artisanal Interiors ‚Äì Marble finishes, bespoke furnishings and a sculptural four-storey spiral staircase reflect quiet craftsmanship and London-inspired elegance.‚Ä¢ Service & Ease ‚Äì Dedicated housekeeping seven days a week, discreet 24-hour on-call security, gated electronic entry, smart fingerprint locks and six Samsung Smart TVs ensure effortless comfort.‚Ä¢ For All Ages ‚Äì Families enjoy a 700 m¬≤ playground and games room; couples find private nooks for rest; groups gather across multiple lounges and terraces.‚Ä¢ Gourmet Kitchens & Connectivity ‚Äì Two fully equipped kitchens and 350 Mbps Wi-Fi throughout combine indulgence with practicality.‚∏ªPerfectly PlacedJust five minutes from Canggu‚Äôs most sought-after dining and nightlife destinations, and ten minutes from Bali‚Äôs renowned beaches ‚Äî yet cocooned in peaceful greenery and protected rice-paddy horizons that will never be built out ‚Äî Mayfair Place balances vitality and stillness in equal measure.‚∏ªGuest ExperienceWe honour the villa‚Äôs calm spirit. title: Villa Kelusa 4 bedroom
description: This 4 bedroom villa can also be converted into 5 bedroom villa and can accommodate up to 10 people. Located in the beautiful village of Kelusa, Payangan just 15 minutes north of Ubud. This villa have 2 infinity pool and it is surrounded by amazing view of rice paddy fields, streams, rivers, jungles and mountains at the distance. It is indeed a relaxing place to stay.The spaceVilla Kelusa is a bewitching, four-building compound on an isolated 3.1 hectares in the true, vibrant, beating heart of Bali.At jungle‚Äôs edge, atop a vast amphitheatre of rice paddies cascading down into the deep gorge of the holy Pakuseba River, and with a panoramic view of a distant ridge of nine ancient volcanoes, the lovely and ultra-private Villa Kelusa is nestled in the Balinese foothills beneath the very small, traditional village of Kelusa.While practically untouched by the modern world, Kelusa is also a surprisingly few minutes drive down the hill to Ubud, a very large, bustling village which, with its world-renowned restaurants, dance performances, art galleries and nearby 5-star hotels, is considered to be the cultural center of Bali.Villa Kelusa blends together two properties, Pondok Sapi (the Shed of the Cow) and Pondok Surya (Sunset House), which can be rented separately or together. All bedrooms, as well as living and dining areas, have breathtaking views.To the north, Pondok Sapi is named after the ubiquitous thatched cow sheds which dot the jungles and also shelter the farmers in their rice terraces, and was designed as the private residence of a retired American writer and television journalist. Three separate buildings make up Pondok Sapi: a glass studio with two spacious in-suite master bedrooms and a library; a large open-air living pavilion with gourmet kitchen and a media room which can be converted into a third luxury bedroom; and a private entertainment cabana with infinity pool and lounge area.Pondok Surya, or Sunset House, was also designed with open, panoramic views of the rice paddies, jungle and mountains. It has a large, second story in-suite master bedroom with a wrap-around terrace, guest bedroom and smaller kitchen. There is also another infinity pool which runs through the house, separating the living and entertainment areas.In short:If you‚Äôre seeking the real Bali, the enchanted Bali, the Bali so loved by musicologist Colin McPhee (author of ‚ÄúA House in Bali‚Äù), Charlie Chaplin, and the artists Antonio Blanco and Walter Spies‚Ä¶Villa Kelusa is beckoning you.Guest accessWhen you rent this property, you will have the access to the whole area of the property that you rent. No one would be around, it will be the total privacy of yours.

The villa is complete with modern furniture and art works and beautiful manicured garden throughout the premises. Beautiful rice field panoramic views can be enjoyed from the dining room and 2nd (second) floor terrace space and garden deck. All the relaxing spaces in Villa are all thoughtfully fitted with cozy outdoor furniture. The 12-metres tropical swimming pool with pool bar overlooks a vertical garden bursting with tropical foliage ‚Äì while a wide sun deck has built-in daybeds and deck chairs. To match its modern, upmarket ambiance each bathroom is designed in contemporary style with a wonderful bathtub and high-tech toilet adapted from Japan technology. The villa is also completed with full furnished modern kitchen set, dining room, living room also  full equipped entertainment room with home gym and International size of billiard pool table which will be fun for a family stay, kids and friends gathering villa. Private 12 x 4m swimming poolJacuzziHi Speed Wi-Fi with broadband connectionLarge bathtub + Full bath amenities, bathrobe, hairdryer & straw woven slippers.Fully equipped designer kitchen including stove, microwave, refrigerator, hot¬†cold water dispenserEntertainment Room with Home Gym International Billiard Pool TableStylish Living Room overlooking to the swimming poolRooftop with perfect lawn grass Flat screen TV with International satellite channelsIn-room safe deposit boxMosquito racquet, coils and lotion are providedAir conditioned living and bedrooms, each with en-suite bathroomPool deck with sofa cushion accompany by rice field view A short walk from the villa will take you to the buzzing district of Canggu, Canggu‚Äôs popular beaches, restaurants, beach clubs, boutiques, cafes and beach bars. title: duma cabin: A Mountain Oasis (3 Bedroom)
description: duma cabin is a 3 bedroom cabin located in the picturesque mountains of Munduk, Bali. Situated on the Munduk Cabins property, it offers a dedicated manager, cleaning staff, and optional private chef. The cabin's view extends over the valley to the sea with sunsets that are simply unmatched, and is perfect for a friends and family getaway. Guests have access to our infinity pool, hot tub and floating fire pit during stays. NOTE: fire pit and pool are shared with other cabins on the property.The spaceTHE SETUP:The layout of duma cabin is comprised of 3 areas: the top level is a loft space with a fully equipped kitchen, living area, bedroom/bathroom, and private terrace. Below there are 2 separate guest suites, each with a bedroom/bathroom, minibar and a shared terrace between them. Each space has its own entrance from the outside. duma cabin is located at the edge of our property for maximum privacy and is just steps away from our infinity pool and floating fire pit.BED ARRANGEMENTS: The loft is a king sized bed, while the lower 2 guest suites can be set up as either king beds or 2 separate single beds in each room. Please let us know before checking in what bed setup you'd prefer.AMENITIES:duma cabin aims to provide the highest quality amenities to enhance your stay with us, while remaining committed to sustainability and minimal eco impact. These include complimentary coffee and tea, high speed wifi, Smart TVs in the bedroom with streaming apps, a bluetooth-equipped Alexa speaker, Sensatia bath products, daily housekeeping, and a fully equipped kitchen with quality cooking equipment.COMMON SPACES:On the Munduk Cabins property, guests have access to our infinity pool and floating fire pit that are shared with guests of the other 6 cabins.Guest accessPARKING:There is a small parking area on the premises suitable for cars and scooters.CHECKING IN:Prior to your arrival, you will be put in contact with our on-site property manager who will assist you with a smooth and easy check in process. You will be provided with a unique door code that will act as your access key.FOOD and BEVERAGE:Our on-site restaurant, Ulekan, is now open! Ulekan offers both room service and in-restaurant dining for breakfast, lunch and dinner. We also offer the option of a private chef for breakfast and dinner, serving meals outside on our terrace or inside at the dining room table - highly recommended! Additionally, we will happily provide you with a list of our favorite restaurants in the area that are open for breakfast, lunch and dinner, delivery or takeaway. We also provide a curated selection of wines, beers and beverages that are readily available in the cabin fridge for purchase.

title: Hatchi 4 BR Private Pool Villa #C22

Free private parking is available on site. The property offers car and scooter hire. The nearest airport is Ngurah Rai International Airport, 4.3 mi from the Residential Home while Nusa Dua just 5 mi.Strategically located in Jimbaran area, the Residence is only some minutes away from surround interesting points such as 6 minutes walking distance to the Beach. Explore more about culture in Garuda Wisnu Kencana Cultural Park or watch the famous Kecak Dance in Uluwatu during sunset time. Party goers and lifestyle seekers will extremely happy to visit popular beach club and lounge nearby, such as Karma Kandara Beach, Rock Bar, El Kabron and Savaya Day Club.Other things to noteNo Party allowed till late night.No Drugs allowed.No Pets allowed.No Smoking.Don't flush any tissue or woman's pad into toilet.There will be deposit upon check-in time, we shall return the deposit on check-out time.We will charge for any damages caused.Please bring valid Identity Card or Passport upon check-in time.Please take online transportation or Taxi to address of property.

title: Prestigious 4BR Architect Villa in Umalas Center
description: Welcome to Villa ELKARA - Experience the best of Bali in this brand-new luxury architect villa nestled in Umalas, just 5 min from Canggu, 5 min from Seminyak vibrant nightlife, and 10 min from Batu Belig & Berawa Beach. Surrounded by Bali‚Äôs most popular caf√©s, restaurants, and yoga studios, this modern design villa offers the perfect balance of comfort, style, and privacy, ideal for families, groups, or long stays. Your ultimate Bali retreat starts here.The spaceWHAT TO EXPECT AT VILLA ELKARA‚Ä¢ PRIME CENTRAL LOCATIONNestled in the heart of Umalas, Villa ELKARA enjoys one of Bali‚Äôs most exclusive and strategic locations, only 5 minutes from Canggu, 5 minutes from Seminyak‚Äôs vibrant scene, and 10 minutes from Batu Belig & Berawa Beach. You‚Äôll be surrounded by Bali‚Äôs most popular restaurants, caf√©s, and beach clubs, making it the perfect base for those seeking both relaxation and access to the island‚Äôs best lifestyle spots.‚Ä¢ WELLNESS & FITNESS HAVENJust a short ride from Nirvana Strength, SOMA Fight Club, Liga Tennis Center, and Bali MMA, Villa ELKARA is ideal for guests who value health, balance, and wellness during their stay.‚Ä¢ DESIGNED FOR FAMILY & FRIENDSWith 4 spacious ensuite bedrooms, open-concept living spaces, and refined interior design, Villa ELKARA blends comfort, modern architecture, and connection,  perfect for families, digital nomads, or groups of friends.‚Ä¢ EASY BEACH ACCESSEnjoy quick access to Berawa, Batu Belig, and Echo Beach, where Bali‚Äôs sunsets, surf, and seaside restaurants await just a few minutes away.‚Ä¢ PRIVATE CHEF & MASSAGE ON REQUESTEnhance your stay with a private chef for personalized dining experiences or indulge in a relaxing in-villa massage, both available upon request for an extra touch of luxury.‚Ä¢ LUXURY FEATURES4 air-conditioned ensuite bedroomsDesigner private pool with sun loungersFully equipped modern kitchen with Nespresso, oven, and moreSpacious living area with TV and elegant decor Beautiful terrace for morning coffee or sunset cocktailsPrivate parking and daily housekeeping included‚Ä¢ EXCELLENT STAFF & SERVICEOur professional team ensures a seamless, hotel-quality experience from your personalized welcome to daily assistance throughout your stay.‚Ä¢ WHY CHOOSE VILLA ELKARAVilla ELKARA offers a unique architectural design, premium location, and serene atmosphere, creating the ultimate Bali experience luxurious, central, and peaceful all at once. Whether you‚Äôre here for a short stay or a long-term escape, Villa ELKARA is your perfect home in Bali.Guest accessYou will have exclusive access to the entire Villa ELKARA, ensuring complete privacy, comfort, and peace of mind throughout your stay. Thoughtfully designed for relaxation and elegance, the villa is entirely yours, a true private sanctuary in the heart of Umalas.Lounge by the private pool surrounded by tropical greenery, or enjoy a meal prepared in the fully equipped modern kitchen featuring all amenities for effortless dining. The spacious living area invites you to unwind, watch a movie, or share special moments with friends and family.The villa‚Äôs open architecture allows natural light to flow throughout, while its minimalist yet luxurious design creates an atmosphere of calm sophistication. Every space at Villa ELKARA has been curated for comfort, connection, and serenity, making it the perfect luxury villa in Bali for both short getaways and long-term stays.Other things to noteDear Valued Guests,We would like to inform you that Bali will observe Nyepi (Silent) Day) on 19 March 2026. This sacred Balinese Hindu celebration of silence begins at 6 AM and ends at 6 AM the following day. During this period, the entire island pauses, no outdoor activity, lights, traffic, or flights. As movement is restricted, check-ins and check-outs will not be possible during Nyepi.To ensure a seamless experience, our villa manager will coordinate your arrival and departure times. Upon check-in, you‚Äôll be introduced to the villa‚Äôs features and the Umalas‚ÄìCanggu area, including top dining, beach, and wellness spots.At arrival, guests receive a set of keys and access to our digital guide (QR code) with curated recommendations for breakfast caf√©s, restaurants, and local attractions.Note on Environment:Villa ELKARA is surrounded by lush tropical gardens, enhancing its serene atmosphere. While you may encounter local wildlife (as is common in Bali), our team performs regular deep cleaning and mosquito treatments to ensure your comfort.If you have any questions or need assistance planning around Nyepi, please contact us in advance. We look forward to welcoming you and making your stay peaceful, authentic, and truly unforgettable.

title: Luxe Escape 6BD Architectural Masterpiece - Canggu
description: Escape to the ultimate Balinese paradise in this architectural masterpiece, nestled in the heart of Bali's hottest neighborhood. With lush landscape gardens and striking water features, this villa is the epitome of tropical modern luxury. Seamlessly blending indoor and outdoor living, this villa boasts a range of resort-style amenities, including a home cinema and game room. With 6BD and 7.5 Bathrooms, the villa is adorned with the finest imported finishings, including Italian marble, French oak wood flooring, and custom-designed Italian furniture, all chosen to make you feel indulgent. With great flow and ample space, the villa is perfect for entertaining, featuring a cinema, outdoor sunken firepit, billard room and rooftop deck. Each room exudes warmth and comfort, with a mix of teak wood that creates a homey atmosphere. Get ready to immerse yourself in the ultimate Balinese experience in this showpiece villa.Guest accessEntire house is accessibleOther things to noteIncluded:- Armed Security Guard- Villa Manager- Housekeeping- Chef (Order from Menu extra$)  *Driver on request (extra $)*Butler on request (extra $)*Babysitting on request (extra $)*Lambo or Rolls Royce on request (extra $$)

title: Oceanfront 12B Villa for unforgettable gatherings!
description: Shalimar Estate comprises of 3 separate independent beachfront villas: Villa Cantik, Villa Makanda, and Villa Kalima, offering 2, 4, and 6 bedrooms respectively.The estate is staffed with Villa Managers/Butlers, Chefs, Housekeepers, Gardeners, Pool Attendants, Maintenance Personnel, and Security Officers all committed to making your stay unforgettable.Shalimar Estate is perfect for large events like weddings, parties, or just to enjoy with large groups of family or friends.The spaceShalimar Estate comprises of 3 separate independent beachfront villas: Villa Cantik, Villa Makanda, and Villa Kalima, offering 2, 4, and 6 bedrooms respectively.The estate is staffed with Villa Managers/Butlers, Chefs, Housekeepers, Gardeners, Pool Attendants, Maintenance Personnel, and Security Officers all committed to making your stay unforgettable.Shalimar Estate is perfect for large events like weddings, parties, or just to enjoy with large groups of family or friends.The spaceThe property is compound of 3 villas of 2, 4, and 6 bedrooms, making a total of 12 bedroom, capable of accmmodating up to 24 guests.2 Aditional guests can be accommodated in 2 extra beds by surcharge of 50 USD per night per bed + 15,5% Service and Tax4 Additional children (of 12 years old or below) can be accommodated in 4 daybeds. We can provide with lineen and pilow for 25 USD per night per daybed + 15,5% Service and Tax.2 infants can be accommodated in 2 baby cots free of charge.Guest accessWhen the entire estate is booked, guests have full privacy and will have exclusive access to all the property except for the reserved areas for the staff and the technical installation rooms of the property.Other things to noteOnce in the property, if the guests wish to order any meal, the Chefs will calculate the cost of the groceries depending on the guests¬¥ order and after receiving a Deposit and doing the shopping, the Butlers will hand the bills and the change from the supermarket with no extra charges except for a small fee of 100.000 IDR (around 6 USD) that should be handed directly to each chef, every day their services are needed, so they cover the transportation expenses to buy the groceries.Every meal should be ordered at least 4 hours ahead, so the chefs have time to do their estimation for the costs, buy the groceries, and prepare all the dishes.Normally, the butlers and the housekeepers will take care of breakfast, and the Chefs take care of lunch and dinner.In case the geusts plan to have both lunch and dinner at the villas, it is better to order the day before, or early in the morning, to the butlers, so the Chefs only have to go once to buy the groceries.Normally, there is a suggested maximum order per meal of 5 dishes plus dessert, but as some dishes are easy and other dishes are more complicated and take longer times to cook, it is better to talk directly with the Chefs once the guests are in the villas, so they can let them know if the maximum number of dishes can be exceeded or if there are dishes requiring a longer time to cook.For breakfast there is no menu, but guests can order between American and Continental breakfast, whatever they like. Our butlers will be able to provide them with more details upon arrival to the property.Other things to noteWe‚Äôre happy to arrange airport transfers for your convenience (additional fee applies). Please let us know in advance if you‚Äôd like this service.15.5% government tax applies on checkin

title: Tropical Dream: 6BR Villa w/High Speed Internet
description: Welcome to Villa Tropical Dream Ubud, a stunning six-bedroom retreat nestled in the lush landscapes of Ubud. This villa offers panoramic views of dense jungle and ricefields, with vibrant tropical surroundings that perfectly embody the charm of Bali. Designed to bring together relaxation and modern comfort, Tropical Dream is a sanctuary for guests seeking a tranquil escape in a breathtaking setting.The spaceAs you enter Villa Tropical Dream, you‚Äôre welcomed by a spectacular outdoor space that blends relaxation and entertainment, with views of lush jungle. This area features two stunning pools and one jacuzzi on different levels, providing unique options for every mood. While the jacuzzi is perfect for ultimate relaxation, a thrill slide invites children and adults to splash around in the water. The sunken lounge surrounding a cozy brazier sets the scene for intimate evenings, while a yoga space and an outdoor shower offer even more ways to unwind. Just below the villa, a natural waterfall and river await exploration; these serene sites are easily accessible on foot. During the rainy season, however, we advise caution as the path may become slippery.The villa‚Äôs spacious living room and kitchen area are designed with high ceilings and open spaces, blending indoor and outdoor living seamlessly. The fully equipped kitchen provides everything you need for preparing meals, while the spacious, comfortable living area offers a relaxing spot to unwind and enjoy quality time together. Cards, puzzles and games are available if you wish to play with family and friends while enjoying the air-conditioned living area.Ascending to the upper level, you‚Äôll find an elegant outdoor dining area sheltered by a pergola, perfect for enjoying meals even on rainy days. Nearby, a hammock and swing add a playful and relaxing touch to this serene setting, making it an ideal spot for casual gatherings or quiet reflection.Each room at Villa Tropical Dream is thoughtfully designed and features air conditioning, a queen-size bed and an en suite bathroom. One bedroom has twin beds, ideal for families or friends. The master bedroom is a true sanctuary, with double views of the ricefields and jungle, perfect for starting or ending the day immersed in the beauty of nature.Upstairs, discover a well-equipped CrossFit gym with air conditioning for fitness enthusiasts, along with a dedicated spa room featuring two massage tables and AC, ensuring a serene space for rejuvenation.One unique feature of Tropical Dream is its seamless connectivity between spaces. Covered pathways allow guests to move easily between areas of the villa, making it enjoyable regardless of the weather. This design offers both communal areas and private spaces, allowing for connection or solitude, depending on each guest‚Äôs mood.The villa is equipped with the Starlink network, which provides a reliable high-speed internet connection throughout the villa.Just below the villa, a natural waterfall and river await exploration; these serene sites are easily accessible on foot. Enjoy the ideal blend of Bali‚Äôs natural beauty, privacy, and modern luxury at Villa Tropical Dream. Book your stay for an unforgettable escape.(Please note that your Netflix and YouTube accounts will be used to log in. Ensure you log out before checking out to protect your account from unauthorized use.)STAFF AND SERVICES INCLUDED- Dedicated Villa Manager- Villa Host (Ubud) or Staff (Seminyak/Bukit)- Daily Housekeeping- Garden and Pool StaffEXTRA COSTS (advance notice may be required):- Villa pre-stocking: Groceries and beverages (subject to an additional service fee).- Breakfast by Villa Host (Ubud ONLY): IDR 120.000 per person per meal as a cover charge (minimum 4 guests).- Floating breakfast: IDR 150.000 per tray (for up to 4 guests).- In-villa Chef: Arranged through our trusted partner (see FAQs for details).- Airport transfers: Convenient pick-up and drop-off services.- Driving service: Reliable and professional drivers available on request.- Activities and excursions: Customized experiences to explore Bali.- In-villa massage services: Relax and rejuvenate in your villa's comfort.- Baby-sitting service: Experienced caretakers for your little ones.- Security guards: Additional safety and peace of mind.- Flowers arrangements: Custom designs to enhance your stay.Guest accessRoad Access: Many villas have narrow road access, often suitable for motorcycles only. We can assist with transportation arrangements if needed.Other things to noteIf Nearby Construction Occurs: We value your peaceful stay. In the rare event of construction in our area, our team is ready to assist with any comfort concerns. While neighborhood activities are beyond our control, your relaxation remains our priority. Please don't hesitate to contact us if you need anything to enhance your experience.Natural Ventilation: Experience the refreshing breeze of Bali with our open-air living spaces, designed to maximize natural airflow, providing an eco-friendly alternative to air conditioning or fans.Vendor Services: To ensure the villa's equipment and your safety, our dedicated team manages all vendor services within the villa, including spa, personal training, decorations, private chefs, yoga, photography, and villa equipment. Using external vendors is strictly prohibited and will result in a fine of IDR 2.000.000.Waste Management: Contribute to Bali's sustainable efforts by participating in our waste separation program. We provide three bins for organic, inorganic, and residual waste in your villa.Sustainable Amenities: We provide Sensatia Botanicals, a locally founded skincare brand, as bathroom amenities (hand soap, body soap, shampoo, and conditioner). Made in Bali with 100% natural, cruelty-free ingredients, this partnership reflects our support for sustainability and local initiatives, including plastic recycling and beach cleanups.Natural Charm: Our villas embrace Bali's tropical beauty, where the sounds of nature‚Äîgeckos and insects‚Äîcreate a serene ambiance. The open design may occasionally welcome wildlife, despite regular pest control. Geckos, symbols of good luck in Balinese culture, and other creatures are vital to the ecosystem.  Cultural Respect: In Ubud and Bukit, monkeys may be present‚Äîplease refrain from feeding or interacting with them. Surrounding landscapes, like jungles, rice fields, and local farms (e.g., duck, chicken or pig), are not part of the villa property and may be accessed by residents, with changes beyond our control. We appreciate your respect for Bali‚Äôs natural and cultural heritage.FAQsQ: What time is the check-in policy?A: Our dedicated staff ensures a smooth check-in process. Check-in starts at 14:00 for 1-3 bedroom villas and at 15:00 for 4-6 bedroom villas. Luggage drop-off is welcome after 11:00 as we prepare your villa. Please note, a late check-in fee of IDR 200.000 applies for arrivals after 20:00 to cover staff overtime, as our staff does not stand by the villa all the time.Q: What time is the check-out policy?A: Our check-out time is at 11:00 by default. Late check-out is subject to availability and involves extra charge. Please note that for any late check-out between 11:00 ‚Äì 18:00, an additional charge of 50% of the Daily Villa Rate will apply. Any check-out after 18:00, will be charged at a full day's Daily Villa Rate. If you need to store your luggage after check-out time, you are welcome to do so.Q: Is breakfast included in the booking? How do we order the chef's service?A: Breakfast is not included in the room rate. However, you can easily arrange breakfast by contacting our reservation or concierge team. We offer a variety of menu options prepared by our dedicated private chef, right in your villa. The cost is IDR 160.000 per person, with a minimum order for 5 guests. You can indulge in a floating breakfast for an additional fee of IDR 150.000 per tray.For lunch and dinner, we offer enhanced services, including set menus, live BBQ cooking, ethnic cuisines, and even fine dining prepared by a Michelin-star chef, all cooked in the villa. Prices for lunch and dinner start at IDR 450.000 per person. Please note that terms and conditions apply for booking.Additionally, our villa features a fully equipped kitchen, allowing you the flexibility to prepare your own meals if you prefer. Whether you choose to dine in or savor a chef‚Äôs touch, our team is here to ensure a seamless and enjoyable experience.Q: Do we have a housekeeping service every day?A: Absolutely! Daily housekeeping is provided from 9:00 to 17:00. Linens are changed every third day for sustainability. To ensure privacy, please coordinate with your Villa Host or Staff for a convenient cleaning time. Your comfort is our priority.Q: Can we have extra clean towels?A: Certainly! We are happy to provide extra towels, subject to availability. Please feel free to reach out to your Villa Host or Staff, and we‚Äôll do our best to accommodate your request promptly.Q: What is the maximum occupancy for this 6-bedroom villa? Please contact us for more detailsRATE INCLUSIONS:- Welcome drink- Complimentary WiFi- Daily continental breakfast- Services by Villa manager, butlers, attendants, service staff, maintenance, gardener, front desk, security.FLOORS:The Manis Estate is made up of two villas ‚Äî Villa Anaya Manis and Villa Manis Cantik.- Villa Anaya Manis has two floors. title: ‚òÜStunning & Luxury 10 bedrooms Private Villa‚òÜ
description: Luxury complex made of two gorgeous villas, 4 bedroom + 6 bedroom. The estate is located right in the heart of the famed Oberoi district in Seminyak. This location is unbeatable as it is just a five minute walk from the beach with the renowned Ku De Ta beach club. The prestigious Jalan Kayu Aya ‚ÄúEat street‚Äù, packed with chic boutiques, healthy caf√©s and acclaimed restaurants such as Ultimo, Chandi and Mama San, is also just a short stroll away from the villa.The spaceVilla OneThis property is a uniquely designed tropical Balinese villa characterised by elegant interiors and all the modern amenities guests can wish for.The lush tropical garden is one of the highlights of this beautiful property and with its peaceful atmosphere and calming waterfalls, will create the perfect ambience to relax in utter tranquillity. At the center of the outdoor space sparkles the salt-water swimming pool, tiled with beautiful natural stones, and featuring poolside sun loungers and inflatable lounging chairs, the perfect place to enjoy drinks together after a long day spent exposing the beauties of Bali, perhaps while floating on the refreshing pool.The indoor living spaces of the villa are as luxurious as the outdoors. A beautiful dining area with gorgeous teak dining table and a fully equipped open-plan kitchen with breakfast bar complete the sophisticated living areas of the property.The villa offers four gorgeous and comfortable bedrooms. The luxurious master suite is located on the upper floor of the bedroom pavilion and enjoys access to a large private balcony. This beautiful and elegantly furnished room is extremely large and features timber floors, luxury king-size bed, flat-screen TV, spacious dressing room and huge en-suite bathroom with rain-shower and Jacuzzi bathtub. The other three bedrooms feature king-size beds, spacious wardrobes with safe box and private bathrooms with a rain shower.The first two guest bedrooms are located on the ground floor and open up to the terrace, with direct access to the pool area. While the third guest bedroom is found on the first floor of the living pavilion and has access to a private balcony overlooking the garden. This room can also double as a media lounge, since it boasts a massive smart TV and a comfortable sofa.Villa TwoThis is a spacious and gorgeous 6-bedrooms villa characterized by an ethnic design, wide spaces and wonderful decorations, the villa blends perfectly modernity and tradition.The garden of the villa is a tropical jewel, wide and colorful, and hosts a gorgeous swimming pool with water feature and shallow area for kids. The outdoor space, which separates the villa‚Äôs two pavilions, also offers several sun loungers, terraces and shaded patios, the perfect places to relax and enjoy alfresco dinners.The living area is gorgeous as well, a vast open-plan space defined by towering wooden pillars, teak ceilings and floors and beautiful furnishings. Most of the furniture has been custom designed exclusively for the villa! This huge space comprises a lounge corner with oversized sofas, coffee table and bar, an entertainment corner fitted with a 46‚Äù flat screen TV and home theater system, a billiard table and a beautiful teakwood dining table suitable to host up to 12 people. The villa also boasts two kitchens: one for the staff who will prepare guest meals upon request and one beautiful modern kitchen for guest use.The property‚Äôs six air-conditioned bedrooms are gorgeous and comfortable. The master bedroom is located in the Alang-Alang pavilion, just across the garden and facing the main building, and occupies the entire first floor. This wonderful room features a king sized bed, a lounge/media corner equipped with 40‚Äù flat screen TV and home theater, a large dressing room, a huge beautiful terrace and a luxurious en-suite tropical bathroom with bathtub and rain shower. On the ground floor of the same pavilion we have two guest bedrooms with direct access to the garden through a lovely shaded patio, both boasting king sized bed, chaise lounge, desk, wardrobes and en-suite bathrooms. Other two guest bedrooms occupy the upper level of the main living pavilion and feature king size beds (one of which can be easily converted into twins), a large terrace and beautiful en-suite bathrooms with rain shower (one with bathtub). The last bedroom is a gorgeous space located in a small separate pavilion and can be used as a second media area, being equipped with a 52‚Äù LCD TV. The room features a king size bed (which can be easily converted into twins) and en-suite bathroom with shower.SERVICES AND FACILITIESTen (10) air-conditioned bedroomsTen (10) en-suite bathrooms with walk-in rain showers (two with also a bathtub, and one featuring a Jacuzzi tub)Bathrooms amenitiesFresh linens and towelsDeposit boxesThree (3) fully equipped kitchensOpen-plan living area equipped with sofas, 46‚Äù LCD TV, DVD player and home entertainment system Open-plan  living area with large sofa and pool table Air-conditioned living room featuring and L-shaped sofa and a 55‚Äù flat screen TV with quality sound systemDining tablesBarTwo (2) billiard tablesDVDs and booksTwo (2) private swimming pool with shallow areaSun loungersOutdoor dining furnituresManicured lawnBBQ grillsHigh chair and baby cot on requestUnlimited free Wi-Fi InternetInternational channelsDaily breakfast includedWelcome drink and fruit basket upon arrivalDaily butler & maid servicePrivate chefStaff composed by villa manager, housekeepers, butlers, private chef, drivers, gardener, pool attendant and maintenance team24-hours security serviceAirport transfer (conditions apply)

title: Villa Happytime Ubud Center (6-8 bd), private pool
description: Peaceful and pleasant private villa, fully air-conditioned, 300 square meters, with fully private infinity pool, accommodating up to 20 guests. Quiet and surrounded by nature, surrounded by rice/jungle landscape, and within walking distance to Ubud city center. Ideally designed for family or friends gatherings, birthday parties, yoga seminars, corporate seminars.You can also celebrate your weddings!The spaceThe property has 6 to 8 air-conditioned bedrooms and can be configured with large double beds 200 x 200 or single beds according to your wishes and the number of people.A connected villa with 4 additional bedrooms is available at an extra cost, depending on your wishes and the number of people.Each bedroom has its own bathroom as well as a private outdoor bathtub. You can eat on site to enjoy the view of the rice field, or have it delivered directly to the villa.The Villa can accommodate up to 20 guests, but beyond 16 guests, an extra 12 USD per day per guest will be requested.And for large groups, on request, it is possible to book to add to your reservation:- 4 bedroom villa with pool, 4 bathrooms and 4 outdoor bathtubs, connected to Villa Happytime.- 3 bedroom villa with swimming pool, with 3 bathrooms, one with bathtub.The Villa also has its own private parking which is easily accessible and allows you to park directly in front of the property.Villa Happytime allows easy access to the main roads, the city center, and Ubud Monkey Forest only 10-15 minutes walk.Breakfast is included and served between 7 a.m. and 11 a.m.Staff at your disposal:For your questions and to help you on a daily basisDaily maid serviceGarden/Pool StaffHelp you with your excursionsTo manage your laundryPAID EXTRA SERVICESAirport transfer (35 USD)Laundry service (1 USD/kg)Scooter rental possible, (6 USD per day)Massage service in the villa (20 USD/hr)Activities and excursions (on request)Guest accessGuests can use the following items:Entire villaPrivate car parkFully private infinity pool, with a very wide view of the lush jungle and a large slide.Bali is a wet and tropical natural environment with lots of greenery. Geckos and insects are endemic to the island. While mild pest control measures are regularly implemented on the property, some encounters may occur. Please note that they are all totally harmless and important to a balanced ecosystem..Other things to noteBreakfast is included and served between 7 a.m. and 11 a.m.A team dedicated to the complete cleaning of the house will be available every day.It is possible to have a cook available on request and at extra cost.FAQ- Q: What time is the check-in policy?- A: We have dedicated staff to help you with the check-in process. Our standard arrival time is at 3pm. However, you are welcome to drop off your luggage before check-in.- Q: What time is the checkout policy?- A: Our check-out time is at 12:00 pm by default. title: 10 BR Luxury Villa near Beach
description: A luxurious private villa in the vibrant heart of Berawa‚ÄìCanggu, featuring 10 ensuite bedrooms spread across 2 villas with interconnecting access. All rooms overlook the swimming pool and lush garden. 4 ground-floor bedrooms have verandas with direct pool access, while 6 upper-floor bedrooms offer stunning pool views. Fully equipped kitchen & dining area also enjoy poolside vistas. Located within walking distance of shops, cafes, and restaurants, and just 10 minutes from the iconic Beach Club.The spaceThis villa is a charming, peaceful hideaway with a unique double storey L-shaped design. The bedrooms are beautifully decorated with handpicked art, spacious, filled with natural light, and each comes with a balcony. You‚Äôll find comfy beds, plush pillows, and complete bathroom amenities for a truly relaxing stay.In total, there are 10 bedrooms spread across two interconnected villas. Upstairs, you‚Äôll find two master bedrooms with double beds, walk-in closets, and bathtubs, plus two more double bedrooms and one twin bedroom with two single beds. Downstairs, there are another two twin bedrooms and two double bedrooms. All rooms have ensuite bathrooms, and the villa can host up to 20 guests. Extra beds can be arranged upon request for an additional fee, including breakfast.The spacious interconnected living and dining areas are perfect for gathering, relaxing, or entertaining. To the far right, there‚Äôs a fully equipped kitchen with an island and all the essentials you might need. Outside, a tropical garden wraps around two sparkling swimming pools at the center, with sunbeds and shaded spots for lounging, pool towels ready, and two cozy gazebos at the far end‚Äîperfect for meditation, yoga, or simply unwinding.Guest accessThe whole villa is yours to enjoy ‚Äî every space and every amenity listed is just for you. Our friendly in-villa staff will be there to look after you and make sure everything runs smoothly during your stay.

title: Luxury 10-Bedroom Estate in the Heart of Seminyak
description: The 6-bedroom Kinara and 4-bedroom Kinaree both feature L shaped, signature swimming pools, huge living rooms, indoor and outdoor lounging and dining, pool tables, vast individual bedroom suites, world-class interior design with a distinct Balinese theme, and every conceivable luxury for the sophisticated holidaymaker.The spaceJust 300m from Seminyak Beach and Ku De Ta, this 10-bedroom estate combines two stunning villas featuring signature L-shaped pools, expansive living rooms, and elegant indoor-outdoor lounges. Each suite offers Balinese-inspired luxury and modern comfort. With private chefs, butlers, and lush tropical gardens, it‚Äôs the perfect retreat for families or groups seeking space, privacy, and five-star service in the heart of Seminyak.Set across 1,800sqm of beautifully landscaped gardens, this exclusive property offers the best of Bali living ‚Äî a serene oasis just steps from Seminyak‚Äôs vibrant dining, shopping, and beach clubs. The estate combines two private residences ‚Äî one six-bedroom villa and one four-bedroom villa ‚Äî which can be rented separately or together for larger groups of up to twenty guests.The six-bedroom Kinara and four-bedroom Kinaree both feature L-shaped signature swimming pools, huge living rooms, indoor and outdoor lounging and dining areas, pool tables, and vast individual bedroom suites. Each villa showcases world-class interior design within a Balinese setting, blending traditional craftsmanship with modern comfort. Every detail has been designed to create an atmosphere of understated elegance, offering every conceivable luxury for the sophisticated holidaymaker.The estate has unrivalled facilities supported by a full-time team of fifteen staff, including private butlers for each villa, skilled chefs, housekeepers, gardeners, and trained security. Additional on-demand services include chauffeurs, spa therapists, and a dedicated concierge, ensuring every moment of your stay is seamless and indulgent ‚Äî unless, of course, you hang out the red ‚Äúdo not disturb‚Äù flag to enjoy total privacy.Inside, guests can relax in the open-plan living areas that flow naturally to the poolside decks, ideal for entertaining or unwinding with friends and family. There are multiple dining areas, both indoor and outdoor, as well as a bar, media room, and furnished terraces perfect for evening drinks.The ten bedrooms are individually designed, each with king or twin beds, ensuite bathrooms, and luxurious amenities. Air conditioning, quality linens, and garden or pool views come as standard. Families will appreciate the villa‚Äôs thoughtful touches, including a baby cot, high chair, and spacious grounds for children to play safely.Entertainment options include large-screen TVs, home entertainment systems, and a billiard table. Wi-Fi is available throughout the property, and guests have access to a telephone for local calls, safety deposit boxes, and a backup generator for peace of mind.Dining is a highlight of the experience. The in-house chefs can prepare Western, Asian, vegetarian, or children‚Äôs meals, with freshly cooked breakfasts served daily. Private barbecues or themed dinners can also be arranged.Whether relaxing by the pool, exploring nearby Seminyak, or enjoying a private dinner under the stars, this estate captures the essence of Bali‚Äôs relaxed luxury ‚Äî offering space, comfort, and impeccable service in an unbeatable location.Other things to notePLEASE NOTE: 15.5% TAX IS COLLECTED SEPARATELY UPON CHECK-INWe‚Äôre happy to arrange airport transfers for your convenience (additional fee applies). Please let us know in advance if you‚Äôd like this service.

title: 20 Bedrooms Grande Villas Seminyak
description: Located in the heart of Seminyak, these luxurious villas offer a blend of contemporary design and spacious comfort and walking distance to the beach. The only villas in Seminyak with 20 bedrooms in one compound, they provide top amenities and convenience, all within walking distance to the beach, boutiques, and restaurants. Featuring an open-air lobby, illuminated pathways, and large doors of carved wood, the villas can interconnect to create 10, 12, 14, 16, or 18-bedroom accommodations.The spaceNestled in the heart of Seminyak, our luxurious 20-bedroom villa compound offers the perfect blend of modern elegance and spacious comfort. Designed to accommodate large groups, this exclusive retreat is ideal for family gatherings, celebrations, retreats, and group getaways.As the only villa in Seminyak with 20 bedrooms in one compound, we provide an unparalleled stay experience. The villas feature interconnecting options, allowing flexibility to expand into 12, 14, 16, or even 18-bedroom accommodations, making it the ultimate private sanctuary for any occasion.Rooms & SpacesBedrooms: Each bedroom is thoughtfully designed with plush bedding, air conditioning, and en-suite bathrooms, ensuring a restful and private retreat.Living Areas: The expansive open-air lobby and communal lounges create a welcoming space for relaxation and socializing.Dining & Kitchen: A spacious dining area and fully equipped kitchen allow for seamless in-villa dining, whether self-catered or with a private chef.Outdoor Spaces: Enjoy the tranquility of illuminated pathways, lush tropical gardens, and private swimming pools, perfect for unwinding after a day exploring Bali.Unique Features: Large hand-carved wooden doors and contemporary Balinese-inspired d√©cor add a touch of elegance and cultural charm.Prime LocationSituated just moments away from Seminyak Beach, vibrant boutiques, and world-class restaurants, our villa offers both serenity and convenience, allowing you to experience the best of Bali effortlessly.Whether you seek a luxurious escape or a dynamic group stay, our versatile and spacious villa compound ensures a memorable and comfortable experience for every guest.Guest accessGuests will have exclusive access to the entire villa during their stay, ensuring privacy and a personalized experience. Depending on the number of bedrooms booked (10, 12, 14, 16, 18, or 20), guests will have access to:All Bedrooms & En-Suite Bathrooms ‚Äì Spacious, fully air-conditioned rooms with private en-suite bathrooms.Private Swimming Pool(s) ‚Äì A serene pool area, perfect for relaxation and social gatherings.Living & Lounge Areas ‚Äì Open-air and enclosed living spaces for socializing, unwinding, or enjoying entertainment.Dining Area & Fully Equipped Kitchen ‚Äì Ideal for private dining experiences, whether self-catered or with a private chef (additional charge).Lush Tropical Gardens & Illuminated Pathways ‚Äì Tranquil outdoor areas to immerse in Bali‚Äôs beauty.Private Entrance & Parking Area ‚Äì Secure and convenient access for guests.Throughout their stay, guests can enjoy the entire villa without any shared spaces, ensuring a luxurious and intimate retreat.Other things to noteFlexible Bedroom Configurations: Our villa can be arranged as 10, 12, 14, 16, 18, or 20-bedroom accommodations, making it ideal for various group sizes and events. Please confirm your preferred setup before arrival.Daily Housekeeping & Butler Services: Our dedicated team ensures a seamless stay, offering daily housekeeping and butler service to cater to your needs throughout your stay.Inclusive Breakfast & Private Chef Services: Daily breakfast is included in your stay. For lunch and dinner, a private chef service is available at an additional charge and must be booked in advance.Pool Safety: Please note that the pools do not have lifeguards. Guests are responsible for their own safety, especially with children.Respect for the Neighborhood: To ensure a peaceful environment for all, any kind of music played on Bluetooth speakers must be turned off by 11:00 PM.We look forward to welcoming you and ensuring a truly memorable stay!

title: Pulagan House | Serenity 1BDR Nature Villa
description: A charming villa surrounded by lush rice fields, offering a peaceful and quiet retreat with breathtaking views. Designed for comfort, it features 1 cozy bedroom, 1 modern bathroom, and a dining area where you can relax and enjoy the serene atmosphere.The space--- Please read carefully before booking our villa. Kindly do not proceed with a reservation if the following details are not suitable for you --------------------------------------------------------------Pulagan House is a charming villa located in the village of Tampaksiring, about 30 minutes from Ubud. Nestled in the middle of lush rice fields, it offers stunning views of green paddies, refreshing trees, and the majestic mountains beyond.üåø Things to Know Before Booking:üê¶ Surrounded by nature (rice fields, forest & cliffs) ‚Äî you may encounter local tropical wildlife such as insects, geckos, and tokay lizards. They are harmless and mostly stay outdoors. We also provide monthly pest control for extra comfort.üõµ Villa access is by motorbike only ‚Äî cars cannot enter the rice fields. A motorbike will be your main transportation to reach markets, restaurants, and shops. Our villa is located about 800 meters from the drop-off point. You can reach it in just 5 minutes by motorbike, or enjoy a scenic 15-minute walk through the rice fields.ü§ù Our staff will assist you upon arrival, either by motorbike or by guiding you on a scenic walk through the rice fields.--------------------------------------------------------------Nestled in the heart of Tampaksiring‚Äôs lush rice fields, this villa offers a serene escape surrounded by nature‚Äôs beauty. Wake up to the gentle sway of green rice paddies, the fresh scent of morning dew, and breathtaking views of the sunrise over the mountains.Designed with a modern touch yet harmoniously blended with natural elements, the villa creates a perfect balance of comfort and authenticity. Large windows and open spaces allow the outdoors to flow inside, ensuring that every moment feels connected with nature.üåø Expansive Garden & Outdoor SpaceThe villa‚Äôs spacious garden and lawn provide an inviting space for relaxation and activities. Whether you want to start your day with yoga, enjoy an outdoor workout, meditate in silence, or simply bask under the shade of tropical trees, the natural surroundings make every activity more refreshing and inspiring.üåÑ Peaceful Escape from City LifeHere, you‚Äôll leave behind the noise of traffic and the stress of urban living. Instead, immerse yourself in the soothing sounds of birdsong, rustling leaves, and the calm rhythm of village life. It‚Äôs a place where time slows down, allowing you to fully recharge.‚ú® Perfect for Every GuestWhether you‚Äôre seeking a romantic getaway, a quiet retreat to focus on wellness, or a unique family escape, this villa offers the perfect setting. Enjoy unforgettable mornings with panoramic views, lazy afternoons in the garden, and magical evenings under starlit skies.Your stay here will not only bring you closer to nature but also give you the comfort and privacy you deserve.Guest accessGuests will have full private access to the entire villa, including the bedroom, bathroom, dining area, and terrace overlooking the rice fields.We are pleased to offer complimentary breakfast and dinner (extra charge) during your stay, freshly prepared to make your experience even more enjoyable.Please note:- The villa is accessible only by motorbike or on foot (no car access to the rice fields).- Our staff will assist you with check-in and help transport your luggage by motorbike if needed.- Guests can freely enjoy the outdoor spaces around the villa, but we kindly ask you to respect the surrounding nature and local community.- Please note that from the drop-off point to our villa, the path has limited lighting as it goes through rice fields. The available light mostly comes from a few local houses along the way. For your comfort and safety, we recommend bringing a flashlight or using your smartphone‚Äôs torch. If you are arriving by motorbike, the headlight will also provide good illumination.Other things to note- Our villa is located in the middle of the rice fields, surrounded by nature. This means you may occasionally encounter tropical wildlife such as insects, geckos, or tokay lizards. They usually stay outside, and rarely enter if doors are kept closed. We also perform regular monthly pest control.- the easiest way to find our villa is by type " Pulagan House " on your gmaps. that map is our drop point. our staff will help you after you arrive. our villa located around 800m from this drop point in the middle of ricefield- Please be aware that the villa is not accessible by car. The only access is by motorbike or walking through the rice fields. If you are not comfortable riding a motorbike, please consider this before booking.- Please note that from the drop-off point to our villa, the path has limited lighting as it goes through rice fields. The available light mostly comes from a few local houses along the way. For your comfort and safety, we recommend bringing a flashlight or using your smartphone‚Äôs flashlight. If you are arriving by motorbike, the headlight will also provide good illumination.- Our staff will assist with check-in and can help carry your luggage by motorbike.- The natural setting is peaceful and quiet, perfect for relaxation, but not suitable for those expecting city-style access.- We can assist for private driver to pick up/drop off in the airport and for the tour

title: Private Luxury Villa ‚Äì Ningtaru Taro, Ubud
description: At Ningtaru Villa, immerse yourself in the authentic charm of Bali, surrounded by lush tropical greenery and expansive rice fields. The villa‚Äôs design thoughtfully blends traditional Balinese architecture with modern comforts, creating a serene and harmonious environment where the sights and sounds of nature enhance your stay.The spaceThe villa features two bedrooms under one roof, each with a comfy king-sized bed. You‚Äôll love the fully equipped open kitchen and spacious living room ‚Äî perfect for chilling out or spending time with family and friends. The open-air design lets you enjoy Bali‚Äôs warm climate, while shaded spots keep you cool. A beautiful pool is visible from every room, adding to the tranquil and inviting atmosphere.Don‚Äôt miss the rooftop, where you can soak in stunning views of the rice fields and, if the sky is clear, catch a glimpse of Mount Agung along with breathtaking sunrises and sunsets.Guest accessEnjoy full access to all villa facilities, ensuring a completely private and relaxing retreat.Other things to noteSet amidst nature and working rice fields, the landscape changes beautifully with the seasons‚Äîsurrounding paddies may be lush green, golden with ripening grain, or freshly harvested.Our team is always happy to assist with arranging tours, transportation, and other services during your stay, for an additional fee.

title: Svasti Soka - Bamboo Stay in Bali's Highlands
description: Discover Svasti Soka, a unique bamboo villa surrounded by the breathtaking rice terraces of Jatiluwih, a UNESCO World Heritage site. This eco-friendly retreat blends modern comfort with traditional design, offering a peaceful escape in the heart of Bali‚Äôs highlands. Wake up to fresh mountain air, stunning sunrise views, and the sound of nature‚Äîperfect for couples, adventurers, and anyone seeking serenity.The spaceNestled in the heart of Jatiluwih‚Äôs serene landscape, this bamboo villa offers the perfect harmony between natural architecture and the authentic beauty of Bali‚Äôs countryside. Surrounded by mesmerizing terraced rice fields, the atmosphere is peaceful‚Äîaccompanied only by the gentle sound of flowing water and the evening song of crickets.Built entirely from selected bamboo, the villa is eco-friendly, blending seamlessly with nature while offering a simple yet luxurious living experience. From the terrace, guests can witness the sunrise slowly lifting the morning mist, or the golden sunset reflecting across the rice paddies.However, this natural beauty comes with its own balance. Due to its open setting, guests may experience the dynamic tropical weather‚Äîoccasional heavy rain, cool damp nights, or small field insects wandering into open spaces. If you are not someone who likes something new with an open nature concept where there is a possibility of meeting living creatures around active rice fields, we warn you NOT TO STAY HERE.Still, these small inconveniences are outweighed by the profound experience it offers: true peace, fresh air, and a direct connection to nature that has become increasingly rare. This villa is more than a place to stay‚Äîit is a journey to rediscover tranquility and the simplicity of life.Other things to noteFAQ1. Is this bamboo villa accessible by car?Yes, but it requires above-average driving skills due to limited access. If you're arriving by motorcycle, it's safe.We provide dedicated car parking before our driveway. Please park your vehicle at the Nyoman Tengok restaurant, located just before the entrance to our villa.2. Are there snakes or other animals around the bamboo villa?Yes, of course. The open-air concept, especially amidst active rice paddies, offers the opportunity to interact directly with the various ecosystems within. The food chain from top to bottom can be found all around. From eagles and owls to mice and various insects, they are all part of the natural rice paddy ecosystem.But don't worry, we ensure these animals don't enter the villa every day. However, we can't guarantee 100% safety from them at all times. We provide protection from them. If you need us, we're always available.3. Are there any activities you can do during your stay?Yes, of course. There are plenty of things to do during your stay. You can freely stroll through the surrounding rice paddies and observe the local farmers tending the fields. Yeh Ho Waterfall is a 15-minute walk away; you're guaranteed to love its crystal-clear waters. If you'd like to learn more, please contact the host.4. Are there any other amenities at Villa Svasti Soka?Yes, some of our amenities include: flower decorations, floating breakfast (still in progress), and free FPV drone for stays longer than one night.5. If I plan to stay with more than two people, is that possible?Yes, but we only have an extra bed for one person. There's an additional fee of IDR 150,000.6. Is there transportation available if we have trouble finding a driver?Yes, we do. Please let the host know to arrange it.7. Does Villa Svasti Soka provide breakfast?We do provide breakfast, but it's not included in the price.8. What makes this villa unique?It‚Äôs an eco-friendly bamboo villa built entirely from natural materials. You‚Äôll experience open-air living, panoramic views of the rice fields, and a true connection with nature.9. Is the villa air-conditioned?No air conditioning is needed. The bamboo design keeps the interior cool, and the mountain breeze provides natural ventilation.

title: Gorgeous Phinisi Boat Fully Refurbished
description: Designed and crafted in iron wood, this unique Phinisi sails all the marvelous spots Indonesian seas have to offer.Fully renovated in 2016, she offers 2 master cabins with en-suite as well as 4 double cabins comprising 1 x small double and 1 x single each.She also comes with 2 very large upper decks offering space and comfort.Come and indulge in a private cruise where all our crew will be here to pamper you and make you discover the amazing views of the biggest archipelago on earth.The spaceThis newly refurbished Phinisi combine, style as well as functionality to enhance the best experience possible on water.To be noted the inclusion of a brand new 30KVA generator to ensure very refreshing air-conditioning in cabins and enclosed living spaces.Also offering a fully functioning transom swim / dive platform, to go with the Baur 250 air compressor as well as all necessary diving / snorkeling equipment to explore under water secrets of the Indian Ocean.Large outdoor upper deck to enjoy breakfast or dinners or simply an amazing sunset with a cocktail in your hand.Also includes a fully enclosed and AC living room with all entertainment necessary.Sail these amazing remote spots and secret bays and experience Indonesia like it should really be discovered, from the sea...Guest accessAirport / Villa transfers included.Transfer from Serangan to Gili Gede included.Simply let us know your dates and let us take care of all logistics for you.

title: Luxury villa - 180 Ocean view+ 20m pool
description: please check our brand new beach front villa: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/1484419954615053526?guests=1&adults=1&s=67&unique_share_id=da7e2d8c-4da3-46b8-b4e9-6c288e885888180 degree ocean view with 20x5 m2 private pool.  It locates where green vineyards and rice fields meet the ocean.  We call them L'espoir as it carries our dream and expectation.  You will have a dream vacation here and Villa L‚Äôespoir can meet all your expectation and beyond‚Ä¶    Enjoy your stay.The spaceThis spacious and luxury villa is located in North Bali.   There is quite some useful information at the end of this description, it may answer most of your questions.   It is opened for booking from July 9th. 2018.  and we do annual maintenance in order to make sure the good condition of the villa. With its modern design, luxury finishing, and remarkably decoration are all done by the owner.   This place is not the typical villa built for commercial purpose, it is truly the place which carry all the passion and expectation of the owner, every piece of the architecture and decoration are selectively picked and arranged.     It's perfect for family, friends and honeymoon holidays.  And you will surely enjoy the elegance, serenity and peace of the place. The little pathway towards the villa is already catching the eyes.  At the moment you enter the villa, you will begin to feel the peaceful atmosphere and immediately relaxed.   The spacious terrace and 3 meter long solid teak wood table overlooking the breath taking vineyard and rice field, the calm blue ocean and the mind-blowing mountains, combined with a gentle sea breeze gives you a peaceful and relaxed atmosphere.   In the morning  you can enjoy the beautiful sunrise while lying on the hanging sofa and in the late afternoon you can see the sunset while having a warm bath on the roof top. The whole house is facing directly to the green field and the ocean, all the three rooms are facing to the ocean and with en suite bathroom.     The villa is equipped with a modern open design kitchen where our staff will use to cook you all kind of delicious food whatever you request.    And there is also a big outdoor BBQ, where you can enjoy the fresh seafood BBQ.    The Villa has 3 bedroom with king size bed and 1 TV room with a sofa bed.    It can host 7-8 guest.    And each bed room there is en-suite luxury bathroom and with essential amenities.   There is also a guest toilet beside living room.And we are sure that you will enjoy the 20 meter long infinitive pool which is the perfect place for you to get refresh and relax the whole day.    You will be able to enjoy the beautiful scenery of the Umeanyar village or enjoy the tranquit water under the moon light.   To have the full enjoyment of the beautiful surroundings, we have built the roof top with a big stone bath tub, where you can be nicely pampered by the water while you enjoy the stunning sunrise and sunset. Although the villa is located in the quiet north Bali, it is equipped with very stable high speed Wifi covering the whole property and the International satellite TV channels with Yamaha Soundbar and a movie station.    And we also provide the BOSE Minilink which you can use to enjoy the nice music wherever you like within the villa.    North Bali is famous for dolphin watcOur villa manah in the early morning, and from our villa only 10 minutes walking through the charming green vineyard and rice field, you can easily walk to the beach and catch the local fisherman's boat for the dolphin watch,   no expensive travel guide booking needed.Here below is the general information of the facilities and service which most of the guest may want to know: 1.  It's a villa with full service.    We have our own manager Budi who will assist you in any aspect, greet our guest, and take care of the request or handle emergency during the stay of our guest;   Budi will connect with you a few days before your check in date in order to arrange details;2.  We have two full time housekeepers working in our villa, 8 hours per day, usually the housekeeper come in the morning for 5 hours and around dinner time for 3 hours.    But we can be flexible to some extend upon guest's preference;   3. There is also gardener and security work full time in our villa.   Security will work from 18:00 - 6:00 everyday,   it means  even you arrive at mid night, we will have people to help you check in; 4.  Attention:     To some guest who feel bothered with service people around,  please let us know when you check in,  and we can arrange with you for the suitable working time and area;   5.  Our housekeepers could cook for you upon your request.    The cooking service is included in the room charge already,   you only need to inform our housekeeper in advance and pay for the groceries that you request;       We encourage the guest to buy the groceries by themselves,  of course the staff can also buy the groceries for you upon your request and present the receipt on the same day;   it's appreciated if our guest pay some tips for the shopping service to our staffs.  However, to mark up or over charge for the groceries is not allowed,  in case you have any question on the receipt our staffs presented, please contact our villa manager Budi or to me immediately; 6. We can arrange airport pick up service:   one way from airport to the villa is  800,000 IDR for 4 pax and below paid directly to the taxi driver;    a half day or one day trip can be also arranged; 7.  It will take about 3-4 hours from the airport to our villa, and from Ubud it will be about 2-2.5 hours, the exact time will depend on the traffic;   Fortunately, there is beautiful lakes and rice paddies on the road; 8. To go around, another alternative is to rent scooter, it's 80,000 Rp (approx. 5US$) a day, and the scooter can be delivered and pick up at our villa;   you need to request it to Villa manager one day in advance; 9.  there are a handful restaurants in Umeanyar village and can be reached on foot.   And we have also a couple of restaurants provide delivery service.    And you can also enjoy the pick up and drop service from selective restaurants from Lovina which is about 25 mins drive eastwards; 10. there is good supermarket and local food market in Seririt which is about 3.5km away from Umeanyar.     And there is also international supermarket in Lovina, Pepito, it provides big variety of western style food, like cheese, sausage, bacon/ham, yogurt, beef stake, fresh seafood and so on.     If you are interested in local food,  it's recommended to visit the local food market in Seririt in the early morning.    11.   Dolphin watch is famous in north Bali,  you can walk from our villa to the beach for  10 minutes and get the local fisherman's boat in the early morning, or you can book the dolphin trip through our villa manager Budi;     12.  If you like to have half day or day trip, some good waterfall,  famous water temple Ulun Danu are all within 1 hr drive;    You will find some detailed introduction in the service manual in our villa; 13. if you care for snorkling or scuba diving, north Bali is a good place as it's close to one of the best diving spot in Bali, Menjangan island or Pemuteran.     you may inform Budi one day in advance too; 14. we have also provide outdoor BBQ,  satellite TV, movie station, sound bar and BOSE minilink, you are free to enjoy without additional service charge; 15. we can call massage service to the villa with very reasonable price, one hour oil massage is 180K Rp(11-12 US$);   please request to Budi at least half day in advance; 16. We can arrange on site Yoga session on request too;17.  Attention:  as we listed, there are 3 bed rooms with king size bed, and one TV room with sofa bed;   the sofa bed is comfortable enough for 1-2 people, however, there is no en-suit bath room, there is only toilet(no shower) close to the TV room;   18. Our villa is located in the nature, so insects and geckos is something inevitable.   There is not too much mosquito in north Bali, however, we have still prepared the mosquito repellent and scent just in case.  and to close the room door before sunset and not to turn on too much lights on the terrace are very helpful to minimize the insects. If there is any questions, please drop us a message, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.   Enjoy your stay!Guest accessThe entire space and grounds are accessible to the guests, except the storage rooms.Other things to note1. please read the driving instruction carefully as this place is located in country side, and there is no very specific road name and house no. as we normally are used to in the city.    therefore we provide very detailed discription on how to find us, please read through prior to your journey; 2. please remember to inform us your arrival time that our staff can be ready for your coming, especially if there is any flight delay or your arrival time will be out of normal office hour.

Towels left hanging on racks will be considered clean if not on the floor.- Q : What is the maximum occupancy for this villa?- A : This villa is for 4 people, but the maximum capacity is for 5 people which means that the 6th and 7th person are counted as extra guests. description: The Dragon House is one of Bali‚Äôs most photographed luxury villas, noted for its highly acclaimed artistry, architecture, and interior design.Dragon House hosts 4 magnificently appointed bedroom suites,¬†3¬†of which have indoor/outdoor oversized stone tubs. 2 Grand lounges, 1 open to nature & overlooking the river & the other is enclosed, air-conditioned and more intimate, perfect for reading, meditating, or cozying up with your love ones.The spaceA fully equipped kitchen and alfresco dining area.The spa includes a 10 person steam room, 2 person infrared sauna & flower bath bathing tub, cold plunge, and mini gym with light dumbbells & TRX exercise system, a mini trampoline, and 2 massage beds.On the main level is a spectacular saltwater infinity pool with window portals on the bottom looking down into the spa.The villa has 3 full time housekeepers, 1 gardener, and 2 villa managers & upon your request will be happy to provide you with complete privacy, but please understand to sustain pristine quality of the villa, the staff must be permitted adequate time to upkeep the¬†villa¬†daily.Guest accessBy booking, the guests will be able to use the entire space.Other things to note*Balinese are incredibly welcoming and appreciate much any effort made by visitors to respect some of the customs they deeply value.
