title: Stylish 3BR Villa Perfect for Groups and Families
description: Welcome to Villa Hikari, an elegant residence where Mediterranean charm meets the serene essence of wabi-sabi. Highlights you‚Äôll love: _ Refined design: arched lines, raw textures, and natural tones that create a warm, minimalist atmosphere _Light-filled living spaces, perfect for relaxing or entertaining _Prime location: nestled in the sought-after neighborhood of Umalas, just minutes from Bali‚Äôs best caf√©s, restaurants, and beach clubs Tucked away in the exclusive district of UmalasThe spaceTucked away in the exclusive district of Umalas, Villa Hikari offers the perfect blend of seclusion and accessibility. Ideally situated between the lively streets of Seminyak and the bohemian charm of Canggu, you‚Äôre just minutes from Bali‚Äôs most iconic caf√©s, restaurants, beach clubs, and boutiques, while enjoying the peace and privacy of a serene, residential setting.More than just a place to stay, Villa Hikari is a curated design experience. Inspired by the minimalist elegance of Mediterranean architecture and the quiet poetry of wabi-sabi, the villa features flowing arches, open volumes, whitewashed walls, and an earthy palette that invites relaxation and calm.Step inside and be embraced by natural textures and timeless materials, weathered teak wood, hand-molded terracotta, jute, rattan, and soft linens. Every corner of the villa exudes a sense of balance, where modern lines meet organic warmth.Whether you‚Äôre sipping coffee in the garden, soaking in the peaceful atmosphere under sun-drenched arches, or unwinding in the refined indoor spaces, Villa Hikari is designed to help you slow down, reconnect, and enjoy Bali at your own rhythm.‚ú® YOUR STAY INCLUDES_ Complimentary welcome drinks_ Daily housekeeping_ Fresh towels and bathroom amenities_ High-speed Wi-Fi_ In-room safes_ Dedicated concierge supportüßò‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Available on Request via Our Exclusive Concierge Services:_ Airport transfers_ Car & scooter rental (with or without driver)_ Private chef for in-villa dining_ In-villa massage and spa treatments_ Babysitting services_ Pool fence installation for families_ Laundry services_ Restaurant reservations_ Surf lessons, cooking classes, water sports & day trips_ Cultural tours to temples, rice terraces, and hidden villages‚Ä¶and much moreLet us curate your perfect Bali escape, just let us know what you‚Äôd love to experience during your stay at Villa Hikari.Guest accessYou will have exclusive access to the entire Villa Hikari during your stay, ensuring complete privacy and a truly serene experience. At Villa Hikari, privacy and peace of mind are at the heart of the design, the entire space is dedicated to you alone, allowing you to fully relax and disconnect.Whether you‚Äôre lounging by the private pool, surrounded by lush tropical landscaping, or preparing meals in the fully equipped kitchen, Villa Hikari offers both comfort and functionality. The open-plan living area, with its blend of Mediterranean lines and wabi-sabi elements, is ideal for unwinding, enjoying a quiet evening, or spending quality time with family and friends.A thoughtfully designed rooftop terrace invites you to take in sunrise or sunset in complete tranquility the perfect setting to reflect or simply enjoy the beauty of Bali.At Villa Hikari, every detail has been considered to offer you a harmonious, relaxing experience, with the space and privacy you need to truly feel at home.

title: Romantic Suite with Bathtub - Sunset & Ocean View
description: A secluded and romantic boutique villa on the cliff of Impossible Beach, with a breathtaking view of the Indian Ocean from your private balcony. This is the ideal place for your honeymoon getaway, where you can relax and enjoy the beauty of nature with your loved one in a unique and cozy treehouse room. Our honeymoon suite is furnished with a spacious balcony with a dining table and a sofa, and a luxurious bathtub where you can soak in the stunning sunset view over the ocean.The spaceOnce you book your stay in the Korowai, you will have direct access to Impossible beach, a beautiful rocky beach with great waves suitable for surfing adventures.The room comes with its king-sized mattress, providing a plush retreat with panoramic ocean views. Wake up to the soothing sound of waves and breathtaking scenes of the sea. The balcony, an extension of this coastal sanctuary, features a dining table and a cozy sofa‚Äîperfect for enjoying meals with a view or simply unwinding in the sea breeze.Picture this: a single-bedroom sanctuary interwoven with warm earthy tones, vibrant wooden textures and subtle touches of traditional Balinese artistry. Imagine retreating into a spacious king-sized bed after a day of tropical adventures, waking up to panoramic ocean views, as if the ocean itself was a painting hung on your personal canvas. As the sun sets, the balcony becomes a magical space, offering front-row seats to the ever-changing colors of the sky and the rhythmic dance of the waves. The Korowai is more than a resort; it's an invitation to savor the beauty of the coastline in boutique style.Overall, Korowai is a home where the perfect elements come together: salty ocean breeze, dreamy jungle shadow, and a sense of unwinding and recharging, making Korowai an ideal stay for your honeymoon getaway.Guest accessThe room will be solely reserved for you. There are other units and you might meet these guests when having breakfast, lunch or afternoon finger foods at our onsite restaurant.Please be advised that our property is only reachable by stairs and may not be suitable for those with mobility issues. Guests should be reasonably fit and able to climb stairs to reach their room.We recommend that guests avoid bringing heavy or bulky luggage, as this may pose a challenge when climbing the stairs. For guests who require additional assistance with their luggage, we have porters available upon request for a nominal fee. Please contact our front desk staff for more information.Other things to noteThe property is located 250 meter of the main road. There is only limited parking space on the street, so it is advised to come by taxi. The path has steps, no handrail and can be experienced as dangerous. There are no lights, so it is not recommended to use it when it is dark. It is best to bring a small backpack and to not bring suitcasesThe Korowai is located in a natural environment and animals such as lizards, monkeys, crabs etc. will be seen. Please lock up valuables in the safe and close the doors of the rooms when not around.Please adhere to the booking rules. The villa cannot be occupied by more guests than booked. Host approval is required for professional photography and additional terms may apply.

description: Situated just 10 minutes walking from Seminyak‚Äôs beach, shops, restaurants and nightlife, this fully villa is like no other vacation home in Seminyak.You will likely be amazed by the calm and peaceful serenity of the place which can accommodate up to 26 people in its 10 luxurious bedrooms. For lunch and dinner, our chief prepares delicious meals according to your choices.The villa has ten elegant ensuite air-conditioning (and a ceiling fan)  bedrooms with a desk and queen beds facing a TV and DVD, bar fridge, bathrooms has  rain shower, twin sinks and 6 bathrooms has also stone tub . Some bedrooms can also be configured as a twin-bedded room on request.Perched atop the villa, 80 m¬≤ High open-air, rooftop Sky Lounge terrace and garden offers a relaxed atmosphere with sweeping views of the most beautiful part of Seminyak area. Indulge in one of the best happy hours , with  fresh fruit Mojitos, and  a comfortable ocean breeze. it‚Äôs the perfect venue for every occasion including weddings, private parties, or others events.The villa has a dedicated yoga and meditation space on the sky terrace‚Ä¶You can also use the gazebo to have massage in a quiet atmosphere.CINEMA ROOMVirtually unique in Bali villa rentals, the villa has  a world class cinema room, with projector/ 155 inch screen, and 6-channel surround sound.After a day in the sun, out sightseeing or just lounging on the beach or by the pool, it‚Äôs great to settle down on a comfy sofa and watch a film in company‚Ä¶. providing great entertainment for both adults and childrenWatch the satellite TV , or one of the DVDs you picked up down by the beach today for about 1$ , or choose in the great list of movies already registered.As a result, the cinema is suited to private cinema evenings as well as product presentations, talks and image films, or discover the first images of an organized wedding in the villa.The bartending staff will provide you and your guests with freshly popped popcorn and beverages while you enjoy the film.The Cinema Room is a fantastic feature at the villa that is hugely popular with all our guests.PRIVATE GYM ROOMPrivate gym  watching the garden fitted with some of the best equipment such as treadmill, elliptical Trainer, spin bike, multi station home gym.On request, ask our manager for a personal coach, and create with him, only for you, a personal training during all your stay with us. He will make you live a deep rebirth program. Inside the villa, you will find a real private spa equipped with a massage room with 2 beds, a simple massage room with a bathtub to perform the treatments, 3 pedicure stations and 2 manicure stations.The villa‚Äòs personalized spa service allow guests to enjoy an extensive menu of pampering treatments and therapies:Balinese massageTherapeutic massageAcupressure massageHot stone massageFoot massage ‚Äì Reflexology  Body scrubBody mask/wrapTraditional facialHealing serviceManicure & pedicureOther things to noteTHE SERVICESVilla managerIn-house staff and butlerNight securityWelcome service (welcome drink, pick up at the airport)Daily cleaning and villa maintenanceConcierge serviceBreakfast includedPersonal chief on demandMassages on demand2 private Swimming Pools and garden maintenanceGazeboParkingGaz barbecueContact us for event detail and fee.We are required by local regulations to charge occupancy tax. Villa rate is subject to 15,5% government taxes and services charge, not included in the price of the reservation and have to be paid directly upon check-in. title: Luxury beachfront Villa Lux Tibubiu, Pasut beach
description: Villa Lux is overlooking the famous black sand beach of Pasut, indulge in this modern Balinese luxury villa surrounded by a calm and serene environment along stunning sea views. After a swim in the 20m pool, stepping from the garden onto the shimmering black sand, you can indulge in a walk on the beach or sip a cocktail watching the beautiful sunsets from the west facing tropical garden.Our staff will be there to make you feel welcome in their traditional Balinese kindness.The spaceAt Villa LuX we offer 4 ensuite bedrooms for you to relax in complete privacy, enjoy the king size bed or pamper yourself in the terrazzo bathtub.The 2 open living rooms offer a great social space to enjoy with friends or family, immersed with amazing views of the tropical garden, pool and ocean.Guest accessThe entire villa is available for guests to enjoy!Other things to noteAll beds are king size, however should you be sharing a room with a friend, the beds can be split into singles on request.

title: Brand New 4BR Luxury Villa in the Heart of Uluwatu
description: Brand New 4BR Luxury in the Heart of Uluwatu:‚Ä¢ Spacious air-conditioned bedrooms with floor-to-ceiling windows & garden views‚Ä¢ En-suite bathrooms with bathtubs, amenities & hairdryers‚Ä¢ Fully equipped kitchen & dining area‚Ä¢ Expansive pool, tropical garden & large patio with lounge & firepit‚Ä¢ 300 Mbps Wi-Fi‚Ä¢ Daily cleaning with fresh towels & linens‚Ä¢ Baby cot & high chair on request‚Ä¢ Concierge service for airport transfers, spa bookings & local tours‚Ä¢ PS5, Netflix on requestThe spaceWith its sleek contemporary design, open-plan living spaces, and tranquil garden setting, Legko Villa is a perfect blend of modern luxury and Bali‚Äôs natural beauty. Whether it‚Äôs a sunset swim, a candlelit dinner under the stars, or a lazy morning soak in your private bathtub, every detail is designed for relaxation.üìç Prime Uluwatu LocationMinutes away from:‚Ä¢ Padang Padang Beach ‚Äî crystal-clear waters & world-famous surf break‚Ä¢ Bingin Beach ‚Äî hidden cliffside gem perfect for sunsets‚Ä¢ Dreamland Beach ‚Äî golden sands & turquoise waves‚Ä¢ Uluwatu Temple ‚Äî dramatic clifftop views & traditional Kecak dance performances‚Ä¢ Single Fin & other iconic beach clubs for cocktails with ocean views‚Ä¢ Chic caf√©s, seafood restaurants & wellness studios within easy reachüåÖ Make the Most of Your Uluwatu EscapeStart your day with breakfast by the pool, then explore Bali‚Äôs most beautiful beaches and clifftop views. Spend your afternoon at a spa, catch a fiery sunset, and end the night lounging by the firepit or enjoying a private massage in the villa.Your Bali journey begins here ‚Äî at Legko Villa, Uluwatu, where contemporary comfort meets dramatic coastal beauty.Guest accessOnce you book, the entire place is yours to enjoy. You'll have access to our beautiful living room, a simple yet stylish space. The private kitchen seamlessly integrates with the living room for a comfortable and social atmosphere. Each room boasts a private freshwater view and air conditioning, ensuring a comfortable and memorable¬†stay¬†with¬†us.Other things to noteConserve Energy & Protect the EnvironmentWe‚Äôre dedicated to eco-friendly practices and would love your help in reducing our environmental impact. When leaving the villa for extended periods, please switch off lights and electronics to conserve energy. These simple actions make a big difference in preserving our planet for future generations. Thank you for helping us create a greener, more sustainable environment!

title: 12BR Tropical Miami Style Estate- Berawa, Canggu!
description: Amenara Estate is two connecting luxury villas. This villa has been designed in a tropical Miami style with by sleek white finishes and warm natural wood accents. A distinctive feature is a Japanese zen-inspired roof garden visible from the upstairs bedrooms. This is a serene retreat amidst the bustling heart of Berawa, just moments away from cafes, eateries and supermarkets and a leisurely stroll to the beach.The spaceAs you enter the villa, you are greeted by a 12-seat natural wood dining table with a show kitchen and breakfast island to the side. You are drawn to the inviting outside living space edged by the pool, deck, lawns and surrounding gardens. Two bedrooms are poolside, with another more spacious room at the pool‚Äôs end. The wet kitchen is at the back of the house, where our staff will create culinary masterpieces. Within the main house, one ground floor wing houses an entertainment room with a 65‚Äù TV while the other is a studio space fitted for work.Stairs ascend to another much larger entertainment room with a wall-mounted 68‚Äù TV envisaged to house children of all ages during events. Hereto are the master bedroom, a twin and the children‚Äôs bunk room. All the bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms fitted with rain showers and a bath.The 18m pool has a children‚Äôs play area next to the living space, allowing parents to sit & sip in comfort while still being able to oversee all the action. If you are interested in holding an event here, this connecting Amenara Estate, can offers the flexibility to accommodate receptions and ceremonies in Amenara Kiri, while dinner can be arranged in neighboring Amenara Kanan.Guest accessLarge secure gates (with smaller entrance doors suitable for individuals or scooters) open into the car park. The villa is only available to guests renting the property, with no others visiting unless invited explicitly by you or the management team, ensuring absolute security and privacy during your stay. The villa is fully staffed with an attentive villa manager overseeing every detail, skilled private chefs, butlers, housekeeping, gardeners, pool attendants and estate security.Other things to noteComplete access and total privacy

title: 5BR Beachfront Pool Villa Melissa in Pererenan
description: Villa Melissa, Mengwi, Bali | By The Luxe Nomad - Two infinity-edge beachfront swimming pools.- In-house chef well-trained in Western, Chinese, Asian, Vegetarian cuisine.- Enjoy strolling, surfing and swimming at nearby beach.- All-weather tennis court.- Ideally suited as a venue for events, weddings, or parties.The spaceNestled within the magnificent Pantai Lima Estate, Villa Melissa stands as an epitome of luxurious beachfront living. Its serene seaside setting is complemented by the graceful architecture that seamlessly blends traditional Balinese style with contemporary luxury.This villa is a masterful fusion of elegance and modern design, showcasing a sophisticated Bali-style structure enveloped in luxurious modernity. Boasting five meticulously designed bedrooms exuding both comfort and refinement, Villa Melissa serves as an exclusive sanctuary for indulgence and rejuvenation.At the heart of this coastal sanctuary lies its private pool, a shimmering oasis beckoning guests to immerse themselves in tranquillity while gazing upon the sapphire expanse of the ocean. Adjacent to the pool, the Bal√© relaxation pavilion offers a serene haven to unwind, providing a gentle respite from the vibrant Balinese sun. Adorned with open-air pavilions crowned by traditional 'alang-alang' grass-thatched roofs, Villa Melissa achieves an exquisite balance between authenticity and extravagance.Whether you're basking in the sun-drenched splendour by the pool, serenaded by the calming rhythm of the waves, or savouring the seamless blend of modern comforts and Balinese allure, Villa Melissa at the Pantai Lima Estate promises an unparalleled seaside escape that transports you to an idyllic tropical paradise.Guest accessGuests will have access to the entire villa and can enjoy Pantai Lima's shared facilitiesOther things to note PROMOTIONS  *Multi Villa Discount: Book Villa Mary and Villa Melissa together, and get an additional 5% off the total booking. This offer is applicable to full occupancy only, and may be combined with the standard discounts. *Last minute: Up to 10% off stays- Valid only for bookings made less than 30 days prior to the check-in date.- Seasons minimum night stay required *Early bird: Up to 10-15% off stays in low, shoulder, and high season- Valid only for bookings made 120 days or more prior to the check-in date.- Seasons minimum night stay required *Long Stay:  Up to 10% off stays for low, shoulder and high season- Valid only for bookings with a minimum stay of 7 nights- Some promotions are not reflected. Please contact us for more details *Stay 4 Pay 3: Book 4 nights, pay for 3! - Extend your blissful Bali getaway in this stunning villa.- Book by 30 June | Stay: April ‚Äì June 2025 Rate Inclusions: - Welcome drink- Daily breakfast- Complimentary WiFi- Daily housekeeping- Services by Villa manager, chef, butlers, gardener and security.- Car hire (one 5-seater car for 8 consecutive hours a day excluding petrol- Shared tennis court Floors: Villa Melissa spreads across two levels with five bedrooms. If more rooms are needed, guests can book 5 rooms in Villa Ambra and 5 rooms in Villa Mary.- Ground Floor: Main entrance, semi-open indoor living area with surround sound system, fully equipped kitchen, enclosed and airconditioned dining area, three bedrooms, swimming pool and garden.- Second Floor: Two ensuite bedrooms. Capacity & Extra Bedding: - This property is designed to comfortably sleep 10 persons.- Extra bed is available at USD 45 per person per night. Only two (2) additional beds can be arranged for this property. Living areas: - Indoor open-plan living area with surround sound system. - Outdoor lounge area poolside with lots of seating area. - Bale lounge and outdoor dining area with beach and ocean views. - Beachfront bale can be a haven for private massage. Entertainment: - Smart TV with access to Netflix and sound system in each of the 5 bedrooms and at the living room. Kitchen & Dining: - The kitchen is equipped with refrigerator, freezer, oven, microwave, Nespresso coffee machine, coffeemaker, blender, toaster, mini bar, wine fridge, rice cooker, stove, water dispenser and BBQ.- The villa has an air-conditioned indoor dining area with rectangle dining table that can seat 12 persons and an outdoor dining area for 8 guests.- Private Chef is experienced in Western, Chinese, Asian, Vegetarian and children's dishes. Special requests can be accommodated (including special diets). All meals (breakfast, lunch, dinner, floating breakfast) can be arranged in advance. Wellness: - Shared facilities at Pantai Lima Estate include a tennis court with night-lighting (4 tennis rackets are available to be shared among the 5 villas and each villa has its own tennis balls tube). - Massage, spa services and yoga sessions available upon request (extra charge). Parking: Sufficient parking space available for two cars. For Families: - Complimentary one baby cot and baby high chair available (additional units can be rented out with extra charge). - Additional baby cot is charged at USD $10 per unit per day and additional high chair is charged at USD $5 per unit per day.- Babysitting service available on request at extra charge.- Children under 4 years old can stay for free when sharing existing bedding with parents. Pool area: - Measuring 20m x 6m x 2m depth- Kid's pool measures 10m x 3m x 1.4m- No shallow end on the main pool- The pool is set to normal temperature- There are ten lounge chairs and four pool umbrellas- Pool towels are provided. Services at extra charge: - Private Chef service is available (excluding grocery cost + 15% handling fee).- One-way or return airport transfer service is available at upon request (extra charge).- Spa treatments, massages services and additional yoga sessions are available upon request (extra charge).- Tours and activities such as art and cultural excursions, cooking class are available upon request (extra charge). Announcement:  Nyepi Religious Day Please be informed that Bali island celebrates Nyepi (Silent) Day each year on the dates below. Nyepi Day is a day of absolute silence throughout the island and it is observed from 6:00 AM until 6:00 AM the next morning. No outdoor activities are allowed and there will be no check-in and check-out from properties on 19 Mar 2026, 08 Mar 2027 and 26 Mar 2028.

title: Steps from Bingin Beach, Contemporary Luxury Villa
description: 300m walk from Bingin Beach steps, our unique fully serviced villa was designed by its owners with high standards for travel to maximize your vacation enjoyment. A fantastic communal space awaits, featuring a full-sized pool table, ping pong table, 2 board games areas, a huge dining table, a sofa with plenty of seating, and the largest swimming pool in Bingin with volleyball.  A private chef awaits to serve you a delicious meal. Additionally we offer optional extra beds for an extra fee.The spacePlease note that our location pin on Airbnb is accurate, meaning that you are less than 300 meters walk to the beach stairs, but right in the centre of Bingin.  This privately owned villa is a safe, flat, short walk to several restaurants and three fantastic gyms (Bali Fit Corner, Bali Training Centre and Bambu Fitness).  Yoga venues are within a short walk too.  You will be a 100-meter walk to a French bakery (Fren'cha), 250m walk to The Cashew Tree restaurant and a 5-minute walk to the Lucky Fish beach-side fish BBQ restaurant on Bingin beach.   Several other great restaurants are less than ten minutes walk.  Chela, the beautiful new Bambu restaurant, Casa Asia and Gooseberry restaurants are all accessible on foot.  A laundry is only 50 meters from us and three spas are all less than a 5-minute walk.   No other villa in Bingin can offer you this kind of space or location.  We do have 6seater golf car at your service with prior booking, also drivers at your service from or to airport.All bedrooms are identical and are opened by an electronic key-card.  Each one has an en-suite shower/WC and A/C.  4 of the bedrooms are on the ground floor and 5 are on the upper floor; each room sleeps a maximum of two guests. Each room has 65 Inch smart TV with access to any online streamings, each room also has mini fridge and coffee machine (Nespresso line). Dyson Hair Dryer.Six of the available bedrooms have a California-king-sized bed (2m x 2m) and 3 rooms have twin beds.  These twin-bedded rooms can also become comfortable king beds, also 2m x 2m, with the addition of a mattress topper.  Mattresses are all of natural latex with microfiber pillows.  The sheets are 300t/c cotton.  Room and pool towels are all included (please see note below about towel use).  We have a fully equipped, professional-grade kitchen with a large oven and separate griddle + grill/BBQ.  Two fridges provide plenty of cooling for your beers and food.   We can also provide details of catering services for your group: Please ask us for details/sample menus/costs.Electronic blinds have been fitted throughout the communal area to shade you from too much sun or to protect you from the rain (more likely from December through February).Our communal area also features a Sonos surround-sound system for careful and considerate guest use.  Complete coverage for wifi with latest MESH systems provide internet with Average 50-200Mbs.  Please note that the main (fiberoptic) internet is only available in the communal area and does not extend to the rooms, although portable wifi is also available should anyone need privacy for calls, work, etc: The very large swimming pool has a shallow area ideal for kids to jump around, or for adults to lie in for cool down. We also have pool volleyball.  Note: The pool and fish pond are not fenced, so supervision of children at all times is necessary.Our villa manager will be checking you in and helping you with anything you need to arrange: Staff will be feeding the fish and turtles each day.Before requesting or booking this villa, please note the following points:1. You are booking an Airbnb, not a hotel.  This villa has an owner who also likes to enjoy their property.  Our policy is the same as Airbnb general rule: You must leave our place exactly as you find it.  Everything in the villa that you use, including towels, sheets, plates, glasses etc. and the building as a whole, must be treated as if it were your own.  Our towels will be given to you in a white, clean state and we expect them to be left the same.  Damage will be claimed for through Airbnb host protection if you do not do so, so please make sure that all members of your group are aware of this before check in.  Do not use our towels or our pillow cases to remove makeup or sunscreen.  Ruined sheets cost $100USD each per sheet and towels, $40USD each.   2. There will be few staff members sleeping onsite including security 24/7 (at the rear of the staff kitchen area), so it won't suit you if you want complete privacy.   This staff member is responsible for cleaning the garden on a twice daily basis.  Staff will also be in the communal area to clean and feed the fish and turtles twice each day.3. Only the number of guests listed in the original booking will be allowed on the premises - you may not invite other guests into the villa at any time without the owners' expressed permission or or agreed with owner prior to check in for guest changing schedule.4. This villa is totally unsuited to parties - the neighbourhood is quiet and loud music and/or parties will not be tolerated.5.  The villa does not have a backup generator so in the somewhat rare event that power is lost in the area, we will also be without power too until PLN have it fixed.6. CHECK OUT TIME IS STRICTLY 11AM; all guests will be asked to vacate the premises at 11am sharp so we have time to prepare for incoming guests.  If you cannot comply with that check out time and wish to stay longer, you must book an extra night.    Our place is large and we need the time to prepare for incoming guests.Please also read 'other details to note' before booking.Guest accessWe have provided parking for two cars and approximately 12 motorbikes.  You will be able to walk to Bingin Beach stairs in just a few minutes (it's less than 300 meters).Other things to noteThere are elements of the building (such as the staircase with no handrail and an unfenced pool) that are NOT child-friendly.  However children are welcome at your own risk for safety.  Supervision of children at all times is essential.  Our fish and turtle pond is not for little (or big) hands to interfere with the creatures within and there is a large Oscar fish who WILL bite dangling digits and he has a mouth full of teeth!  There is no backup generator so in the event of an area power cut we will also be without power for the duration.We do NOT allow sub-letting of our place; if you are intending to book our villa with a view to selling rooms (i.e. hosting a retreat), you must ask permission first by sending a message.

title: Luxury 2 Bedroom Cliff Ocean Edge Villa Uluwatu
description: The Luxe Bali is an ultra high end 4 floor family and couples friendly 2 bedroom luxury villa right above Padang Padang Beach Uluwatu in an exclusive 3 villa gated estateEnjoy private cliff edge views of the surf break and beach below with a private  pathway to the ocean's edge4 floor lift, gym, spa, sauna, steam room, home theatre, butler, master chef, housekeeping, 3 pools, lush gardens and fine art are but a few of it's unique qualitiesThe spaceTo ensure you will have the best holiday possible regardless of where you book, please read our advice here.The Luxe Bali is not in anyway your average 'luxury villa', a term perhaps a little to generously used online.  If you are here then you are spending a reasonable amount of money for a vacation,  please be as informed as possible of what you are getting here and more to the point what you will be and not be getting elsewhere for that money. If you have already experienced the quaint rustic or the all visual flash but not real quality , or located on the cliffs with an extremely long and steep walk  to reach the ocean way below villa experiences and would now like to experience a beyond first class residence in comfortable  location, facility and service that you would absolutely love to live in for the rest of your life then this is the villa for you. A true blend of the finest elements the west and east can put together. Most lean too much either way, The Luxe Bali has found that perfect harmonious middle point between fine finish natural materials and absolute high-end comfort.  Understated ZEN.  Unlike most villas on the island The Luxe Bali is unique in that it was built with an totally unlimited budget by a very high net worth individual as a second home, one the owner wanted to be as beautiful, comfortable, and facilitated as possible. Not spending as much time in Bali these days the owner has put the villa up for selected rental when they are not there. A nine-year build by the finest craftsmen from all over the world, this is the time it took to get everything to the meticulous quality standards the owner desired. The Architect of the world famous KuDeTa Restaurant in Seminyak was selected to design the villa.    There are some villas around with more bedrooms for larger groups  but more luxurious ?  we have yet to see any that have taken it to the level of our residence.  Most villas loudly promoted in the ‚Äòluxury' category would be lucky to qualify as low end  airline business class equivalents, whereas The Luxe Bali is without any doubt up there with the finest airlines first class offerings and at a fraction of what those flights cost.  The 1200 m2 (13,000 ft2) of living space boasts Four Master Suites with their own lounge area and en suite bathroom containing separate shower and bath space, with each having private terrace or direct access opening to the cliff edge pool. The fourth floor Penthouse Suite features a stunning 88 m2  (950 ft2) of open marble terrace, one of the premier spots in Bali from where you can see the cliffs running down the coast, the surf right out front of you, and the distant shores of Kuta, Seminyak and Canggu across the vast ocean bay and also to enjoy the spectacular light show every sunset brings.  Beside this in the evening there no black void looking into the dark ocean abyss when the sun goes down as the twinkling lights of the Kuta - Seminyak shoreline can be seen across the bay. The King-size Beds strategically placed to catch the views have the most comfortable absolute top end mattresses available; high thread count cotton sheets and a variety of hardness non-allergic microfiber pillows.    The third floor feature two grand bedroom suites with stunning ensuite bathrooms with separate showers and baths and outside terraces, these are the OceanView Suite and the Rainforest Suite.The second floor is the living dining upper ground level. It contains several lounge areas, family tv area, a grand dining area , a celebrity kitchen using absolute top shelf appliances with a master chef and butler included. This floor at one end leads to a beautiful rainforest grove complete with two large banyan trees, a multitude of ferns, palms, waterfalls and koi ponds, the other end of the second floor is an unrestricted view of the ocean with cliffs running down to Balangan Beach. Stand at the edge of the lawn and watch the surfers paddling by. The Cliff Edge Pool Suite is located on the lower ground floor and contains either two single beds or a king size double bed (as requested), and spacious private lounge space that opens out directly onto the large cliff edge pool, pergola and gardens. The fourth bedroom has a bathroom with a luxurious high flow shower (no bath) and when desired this suite can be locked from the rest of the villa  to be a self contained apartment with it's own private entrance. This space is perfect for  high end clients that travel with an assistant and desire them to be close by but not too close. The  lower ground level also holds the fun zone , with a gym, a dry redwood cedar sauna, a steam room, massage spa, and dedicated home theatre.  The Meals. The very talented Chef prepares meals of the highest standard of quality and flavour. Many guests come with the intention of eating out at the high end restaurants Bali is so well know for, but after experiencing the quality of the in-house chef prepared meals served by your own butler and waiter, they often forgo the visits to other restaurants. Guests are charged a 20% surcharge for groceries and produce and the chef prepares meals from that.  The cost saving for meals alone becomes quite significant. Please Read the guest reviews about the meals. The same with Drinks, the villa does not sell drinks, but rather authentic origin bottles of wines and spirits are purchased at a 20% surcharge and the butler with a significant saving for you mixes cocktails. The property was purchased well before most any other property on the southern peninsular at a time when they had the choice and means to buy anywhere and sat on for a decade while planning the grounds.  Being already well informed on building locations and sun orientation they noticed two significant features almost no other site on the coastline provided.  Firstly the property actually faces north across the ocean with Mt Agung and the other volcanoes of Bali in the distant background. What this aspect means is a significantly cooler space where you get ocean views all day long without the intense and often uncomfortable heat of the sun beaming into and heating up your villa, and secondly this site is one of less than a handful with terraced grounds all the way down to just above the waters edge.  Once again, this is not a villa built on a normal business budget as a as an upmarket hotel might; they often are the obvious ones all bundled together like cookie cutter suburbs.  This is a unique high net worth owners villa in a very private gated estate of only three properties all built and owned by three high net worth individuals. No look after 70 villa  management companies, no built by a developer or commercial operation  and the significantly lower quality build, fixtures and infrastructure one will undoubtedly get from such a set up, rather a truly unique villa of the highest order in a unique setting.  Please read our guest comments, you will see by glowing reviews how much previous guests have appreciated what they experienced and how much they enjoyed their stay.  You really owe it to yourself. The Prices are for a rental of the 2 Bedroom option for up to 4 Adults   ( or 2 adults 2 children ).  A  4 bedroom with up to 8 Adults and 3 children ,  a 3 Bedroom option for up to 6 Adults and 2 children, and a 1 Bedroom option for  up to 2 Adults are available Any numbers outside of these please message me so we can work something out.  To find these offerings above please go to my Hanny the host page and select the villa with the number of bedrooms you need or message me and I will provide you with the right option.Warm Regards HannyGuest accessYou are overlooking with direct ocean frontage the Surf of Padang Padang Beach. Watch surfers on the waves right below you. The Indian Ocean is at the end of your private terraced garden path, and at low tide you can step straight onto the sand of Padang Padang Beach. Bordering us is 24 hectares of virgin forest running all the way to Uluwatu. We face north so you will not be getting oppressive solar heat from the baking afternoon sun inside your living area, but we still have plenty of all day sun tanning locations including the large cliff edge infinity pool and sunset views from the expansive top floor terrace.You are set a long way down from the road, and are set below and behind  2 solid stone walls so you will rarely hear any traffic noise whatsoever. 10mm thick cyclone class sliding doors and windows block out all noise.Other things to note*** Important to read this before booking ***The Prices are for a rental of Two  ( 2 )  bedrooms.  Up to 4 Adults and 2 childrenFor 3, 4, and 1 Bedroom Offerings see here below. ---3 Bedroom information and booking link here for up to 6 Adults and 4 children4 Bedroom information and booking link here for up to 8 Adults and 4 children1 Bedroom information and booking link here for up to Up to 2 AdultsChildren are under 12 years old, Anyone 12 years and over are considered an Adult in bookings. To find these offerings please go to my Hanny the host page and select the villa with the number of bedrooms you need. Children staying alone in a bedroom are considered Adults and charged accordingly in number of rooms used. No more than 4 adults in total can stay in the house for a 2 bedroom Booking.  No more that 6 people in total can stay in the house (Adults and Children combined).Laundry :  There is a laundry service at very reasonable prices :  Items collected in the morning will be ready the next morning.  Please ask Wayan the House Manager for the Laundry Price List. Outside Guests : Outside guests are only permitted onsite up to midnight, they must leave by midnight.  The maximum number of outside guests you can invite to visit you in the villa can be no more than the number of guests renting/staying at the villa .  Example if 4 persons  are renting-staying at the villa   you can invite a maximum of 4 persons to visit.   Late Departures  : Checkout is 12 Midday.  If The Luxe Bali  is booked for a new guests arrival the day of a departure and times of old guest departure and new guest arrival arrival overlap we can store departing guests baggage while guests visit a restaurant, have a short tour locally,  or stay in the cliff edge pergola.  Late Departures  : Checkout is 12 Midday.  If The Luxe Bali  is booked for a new guests arrival the day of a departure and times of old guest departure and new guest arrival arrival overlap we can store departing guests baggage while guests visit a restaurant, have a short tour locally,  or stay in the cliff edge pergola.  Late Check out surcharge: If there are no new guests arriving on the day of departure the guest may stay in the villa and use bedroom / bathroom for an extra charge of US$120 an hour for each full hour past 12 midday of day booked to depart as we still have staff wage times and power bills to pay. Late Checkouts past  6pm will be charged a half days rental.Late Checkouts Past 10pm will be charged an extra full nights stay. Fireworks  Candles and Burning Lanterns are strictly forbidden .  Smoking inside the house is strictly forbidden and a significant cleaning charge of US$400 a room will be applied should there be tobacco smoke smell inside any room. You can smoke on outside terraces with the outside doors shut. Please ask for an ashtray.We choose waxed timber floors for your tactile pleasure. Shoes and outside use sandals are forbidden inside the house as we have waxed timber floors. We supply house sandals for inside the villa.  High heels inside the house forbidden. Feet, body, and swimwear must be relatively dry before entering the house so no water drips will get on the waxed wooden floors. Wet towels and wet swimwear must be hung above marble floors or in the bathtub if they need a wash, Do Not placed wet items on or over wooden floors. Do not use body oils anywhere near the waxed timber floors , please apply  in the bathroom on the marble floor or outside terraces. Butler Service. The Butler is in the villa at your service for most of the day. He is available for emergencies and important requests 24hrs a day. He stays above the upper garage and can be in the villa to assist you in minutes. Please call number 48 to reach him .Ala Carte Breakfast is provided complimentary.If you require a pre 8am Breakfast please arrange with the Butler to organize this with the Chef.  It can be arranged. A Very Qualified Chef is at your service free of charge from 8am until 10pm if you have ordered evening meals the day before as they need to shop in the morning for that day‚Äôs meal requests. If you have not ordered evening meals the Chef leaves at 5pm. Lunches and Dinners: The Chef can buy ingredients and prepare for you. All purchases are subject to 20% handling fee by the Chef.  Invoices will be provided and you can be assured it will be much cheaper and most often more delicious than eating at a restaurant.  Espresso - Cappuccino etc.  Coffees and Tea's are freely available all day. Drinking water free of charge. We are not a restaurant and have a single chef so please limit the variety of meals per lunch or dinner  to a reasonable amount.   Dinners are not available for serving after 10PM. The chef needs to be at the market early every morning to buy fresh produce.Massage:8am to 4pm Massage Service available in the in house Spa at reasonable rates by highly qualified massage staff. Out of these hours massage can be arranged at a surcharge.Car and Drivers are available to be booked at a special rate of USD 50 a day for 8 hours use (excluding petrol)   Airport Pickup and Drop-off is available at a cost of US$50 per 4 person car. more than 4 guest would require 2 cars. You will need need to contact Hanny to arrange this before your arrival with full flight details.

title: Villa Bayu, Uluwatu, full staff luxury estate
description: This is the IDEAL villa to gather your friends and family for the holiday of a lifetime, with full staff (including cook and driver) in a superb location near some of the best beaches, bars and restaurants in Bali .With the luxury of extensive grounds, you can enjoy our two stunning pools, three living areas, two outdoor dining areas, bar, library, gardens and six generously proportioned bedrooms, with onsite massage and yoga on tap.  Paradise!The spaceThe villa has been designed to combine traditional Balinese architecture, with the high grass-roofed ceilings, coconut pillars and pool bales that typify this timeless and beautiful tradition, with the more modern touches that you would expect from a villa of this calibre.Granite topped kitchen surfaces, stainless steel bathroom fittings and recessed lighting blend seemlessly with local palimanan stone, intricately carved wooden doors and Balinese temples.Your villa experience is of course made particularly special by the presence of our wonderful staff. Careful to make sure that you have all you need, while respecting that you may prefer privacy, they will prepare your meals, clean and tidy your bedrooms and deal with any laundry needs and shopping requests.The villa manager will also help you to make bookings for trips, for spa treatments, yoga and fitness lessons, restaurant reservations and help you to make the most of your time in beautiful Bali.Guest accessGuests have the complete and private use of the entire villa.Other things to noteSleeps up to 15 people (including 3 children)Spectacular ocean viewFull staff including cook, two housekeepers, gardener, security and villa manager to help you to plan your meals, arrange day trips and make the most of your stayCar and English speaking driver for 8 hours per dayTwo private infinity edged swimming pools with sun lounges and pool bale ‚Äì one cool eight metre plunge pool and one long eighteen metre lap pool with baby poolLush tropical gardens, including huge lawn for children to run around on (mind the automatic sprinklers giving you a drenching if you are up early in the morning!)Generous open-plan living and dining areaHuge deck and dining area for sundowners with a spectacular viewTwo fully equipped kitchens, one is also used as a bar in the eveningsStunning, airconditioned media room and libraryBaby pool, travel cot, high chair, pool toys, board games, DVDs and babysitting are available for childrenAir-conditioning in all indoor rooms and fans in all outdoor roomsThree king-size beds, three twin bedrooms and a bunkbed room that sleeps three children.  All twin rooms can be made up as doubles.Four rooms have en-suite indoor, outdoor bathrooms and two have en-suite indoor bathrooms2 TVs with 50 satellite channels, one with Apple TV and NetflixDVD/CD player with a wide selection of DVDsHuge selection of books from our library and boardgamesTelephoneSafety deposit boxHairdryer in each bedroomUnlimited Wi-FiUnlimited bottled drinking waterPlease be aware that in Bali there are occasional power cuts and issues out of our control. We will always do our best to overcome these as soon as possible, but ask for your understanding. It is a good idea to buy a SIM card at the airport, so that you can be in contact with our manager at any point during your stay.

title: Rumah Hujan Estate - 6 bedrooms
description: THE RUMAH HUJAN ESTATE Understated Elegance Surrounded by Nature. Nestled in the tranquil jungles of Ubud, Bali, Rumah Hujan Estate is a space designed to let you slow down and truly arrive. Here, you won‚Äôt find the rush or pressure of modern life. Instead, you‚Äôll discover an intentional retreat where connection, design, and the joy of being fully present take center stage.The spaceThe Rumah Hujan Estate consists of two villas and a badminton pavilion surrounded by abundant nature providing privacy between each house while maintaining a harmonious unity. The villas are set in jungle gardens with two heated, mild saltwater pools as well as extensive terraces with views across the gardens and the jungle valley by river Wos, facing the sacred Campuhan ridge. Every corner of this 2,400-square-meter estate has been thoughtfully crafted to offer comfort and calm, from the volcanic stones and reclaimed timbers to the seamless integration of nature into its design. Cared for by a dedicated team of 12 staff‚Äîincluding butlers, housekeepers, and a villa manager‚ÄîRumah Hujan Estate is more than a destination: it‚Äôs a place to belong.RUMAH HUJAN (The House of Rain)Where the jungle meets the sky.A refined 3-bedroom villa, perched on the edge of the Wos River, immersed in nature facing the sacred Campuhan Ridge. This house is a tribute to tranquility, where soft linen curtains move with the breeze, and reclaimed wood whispers stories of the past. This house features a spacious open-plan living area, a hand-carved dining table, and a heated infinity pool, perfect for gazing into the misty valley at dawn. OVERVIEW RUMAH HUJANOn a property of 2,400 sqm, the house itself and in addition to extensive outdoor patios and a 12 x 4 meter heated infinity pool, the house itself has a floor surface of approximately 300 sqm.The living-room and dining-room share a lofty open space of 60 sqm and the 3 bedrooms:Living and Dining Area: The heart of the villa features an open-plan space furnished with oversized linen sofas and a hammock for relaxation. A dining table seating ten offers a perfect setting for communal meals.Bedrooms (all with air-conditioning):Melati (Bedroom One): Measuring 23 square meters, this room boasts a queen-size bed (180 cm x 200 cm) draped with a linen mosquito net. Guests can enjoy sunrise views over the pool, garden, and jungle. The en-suite bathroom includes an outdoor rain shower, immersing guests in the natural surroundings.Rimba (Bedroom Two): At 25 square meters, Rimba features a king-size bed (200 cm x 200 cm) under a canopy roof. The room‚Äôs interiors reflect its natural environment with hardwood floors and woven wardrobes. An outdoor shower enhances the connection to nature.Raja (Bedroom Three): The most private of the bedrooms, Raja spans 22 square meters and is surrounded on three sides by glass, offering an immersive nature experience. It includes a king-size bed (200 cm x 200 cm), a walk-in wardrobe, and an en-suite bathroom with both an indoor bathtub and an outdoor shower.Outdoor Amenities: A large timber deck accompanies a 12x4 meter heated, mild saltwater infinity pool that overlooks the valley below, providing a tranquil space to unwind.RUMAH SENJA (The House of Twilight)A hidden retreat among the trees.Some homes are meant to be discovered. Rumah Senja is one of them. A reclaimed Javanese Joglo, framed by floor-to-ceiling windows, it rises among the treetops‚Äîa home designed to embrace the changing light of the day. Accessed via a wooden bridge you find the private lofted studio (Sebun Kedis or Bird‚Äôs Nest), complete with a secluded terrace overlooking the jungle. This home is an invitation to linger‚Äîon the terrace with a book, in the pool beneath the rustling palms, or in the central atrium, where the ceilings stretch nearly 30 feet high.OVERVIEW RUMAH SENJASpanning 375 square meters, across two floors, featuring a separate loft, three expansive terraces, a private pool, and panoramic jungle views. Living and Dining Area: A central atrium rises 9 meters to a traditional woven ceiling, adorned with oversized Balinese lamps. Floor-to-ceiling windows frame panoramic views, and a dining table seating ten ensures memorable dining experiences.Bedrooms (all with air-conditioning):Bedroom One: Covering 35 square meters, this room includes a king-size bed (200 cm x 200 cm), a semi-outdoor shower, and a terrace with sunrise views over the pool, garden, and jungle.Bedroom Two: At 40 square meters, this bedroom features a king-size bed, semi-outdoor shower, and terrace, also offering sunrise views.Sebun Kedis (Bedroom Three): A secluded 75-square-meter suite with a queen-size bed (180 cm x 200 cm), kitchenette, dining and living area, indoor bath and shower, and a private terrace with garden and jungle vistas.Outdoor Amenities: The villa boasts a 13x4 meter heated, mild saltwater pool nestled among bamboo, coconut trees, and ferns, providing a serene environment for relaxation.Guest accessThe estate shares common access, parking, security and the bamboo pavilion.Please enjoy the bamboo pavillion - A space for Play.The bamboo pavilion is available for unstructured movement and recreation‚Äîwhether that means a friendly game of football with your children, a basketball shoot-around, or a solo strength-training session using the weights and bench provided.Other things to noteLOCATIONTucked away in a gorgeous natural setting off the main road, Rumah Hujan Estate is located about 2.5km from Ubud centre and close enough to walk to some of Ubud‚Äôs finest dining spots and shops.DESIGNAll villa architecture and interiors as well as landscaping have been created by Studio Jenquel. The studio draws on the principles of slow design, utilising adaptive and sustainable approaches. The badminton pavilion was created by Studio Jenquel together with Ibuku, renowned for their groundbreaking designs using bamboo.SERVICEThoughtful Service, Designed for DiscretionAt Rumah Hujan Estate, hospitality is seamless, intuitive, and unobtrusive. Every detail is considered, yet nothing is imposed.HOUSEKEEPING & AMENITIESEveryday comfortDaily housekeeping ensures that your surroundings remain fresh and inviting, with water jugs replenished and beds turned down in the evening.Laundry services are available through a trusted local provider. While we facilitate the process, we cannot take responsibility for the final result. Clothes are returned neatly pressed in woven wicker baskets, in keeping with the estate‚Äôs understated elegance.Sensatia Botanicals body care products, crafted in Bali from all-natural ingredients, are placed in each bathroom, enhancing the experience of outdoor showers and deep, restorative baths.PRIVATE COOKHome-cooked, reimaginedThe kitchen at Rumah Hujan Estate is not a restaurant‚Äîit is an extension of home. Meals are not simply prepared; they are crafted with care, using seasonal ingredients from local markets and organic gardens. Dining here is communal and intentional, meant to be shared and savored without hurry.‚Ä¢ Lunch/Dinner Service ‚Äì 500,000 IDR per meal (+ groceries).‚Ä¢ Both Lunch & Dinner ‚Äì 800,000 IDR/day.To ensure the freshest ingredients, we ask that you share your preferred dining time and menu selection at least one day in advance. Menus are available at the villas to select from. BREAKFASTBreakfast is a quiet, unhurried ritual‚Äîa simple yet elegant start to the day. Freshly squeezed juices, tropical fruits, Balinese granola, and homemade pastries are served on handcrafted ceramics, inviting you to ease into the morning.Served between 7.30am ‚Äì 10am. For early risers, we offer a fruit plate and juice, placed in your fridge the evening before. Just let us know in advance.WELLNESS Restore, Reset, ReconnectThe massage treatments here are not fleeting trends. They are centuries-old practices, passed down through generations‚Äîtechniques refined, understood, and honed by those who have studied the body in ways that defy explanation. They do not simply relax you. They realign you. They remember you.Healing beyond the bodySome treatments go deeper‚Äîbeyond muscle, beyond tension‚Äîinto something less tangible, yet just as essential. These are not simply therapies, but practices steeped in centuries of wisdom, designed to restore balance where modern life often disrupts it.YOGA & FITNESSMovement, Strength, and RestorationAt Rumah Hujan Estate, movement is not just about fitness‚Äîit is about presence, rhythm, and flow. Whether engaging in a fast-paced game of badminton, a strength and conditioning session, or a quiet morning of yoga, the estate‚Äôs bamboo pavilion and open-air spaces provide a setting for both physical renewal and mental clarity.Badminton, and Kids Badminton FunPrivate sessions with instructor take place in our custom-built bamboo pavilion, a space designed for play and movement.Personal Training and Swimming For those looking for a personalized strength and conditioning experience, Coach Omar brings world-class expertise. A former Indonesian national swimmer and Olympic coach, Omar specializes in mobility training, postural correction, and high-performance fitness techniques.YogaA yoga session at Rumah Hujan Estate is not just exercise‚Äîit is a practice of realignment. Whether you are seeking greater flexibility, a deeper meditative state, or a dynamic flow to build strength, each class is personalized to your needs.EXPLORING BALIA Land of Rituals, Stories, and BeautyBali is an island of quiet rituals and dramatic landscapes, where nature and spirituality are woven into daily life. From sacred bird migrations to ancient trance dances, from fast-moving rivers to centuries-old art forms, each experience offers a glimpse into a culture shaped by time, devotion, and the natural world. Our Villa manager is happy to help you discover and book your adventures and experiences. A Culinary Journey Through UbudUbud is a place where food is not just nourishment but an experience‚Äîwhere chefs work with local farmers, flavors are deeply rooted in tradition, and dining is a leisurely affair meant to be savored, not rushed. Whether it‚Äôs a wood-fired Italian meal, a plant-based feast, or a modern take on Indonesian classics, we are happy to recommend  the restaurants that define Ubud‚Äôs culinary landscape.EFFORTLESS LIVING, TOTAL PRIVACYMore than a luxury hotel, Rumah Hujan Estate is a bespoke retreat offering the kind of privacy and care rarely found in traditional accommodations. Whether you‚Äôre seeking solitude, celebration, or creative inspiration, this is a space where you can simply be.We are inviting you to reset. Rumah Hujan Estate is a retreat, a rhythm, a way of living. There are no distractions here‚Äîjust space to breathe, to think, to reconnect with what matters. Because real luxury isn‚Äôt about how much you have‚Äîit‚Äôs about how fully you experience it.

title: AMAZING HIGH LUXURY 12 BDR PROPERTY, 3 HUGE POOLS
description: THE HUGEST 12 BDR MODERN PROPERTY WITH 3 PRIVATE HUGE POOLS3 New Architect adjoining (Both communicating) villas on a 3 000 sqm land, Seminyak center, in a quiet and safe area, very close from Obero√Ø and Beach.12 bedrooms with 12 ensuite bathrooms, 12 king-size bedsHuge dinning table with 24 chairs FULLY STAFFED : Maids, Manager/Concierge, Cooks, SecurityMeals with our menus w/ extra chargeRental rate up to 24 guests and 12 king-size beds, additionnal guests/extra single beds w/ extra costThe spaceThis new 3 full similar private villa property, accomodating up to 36 guests,  provides 3 private pools with relax areas, 12 bedrooms with 12 ensuite bathrooms, is built on a 3 000 sqm land, with independent entrance, and communicating doors in the kitchens.Each very new Architect high luxury villa was thought and built to be different from the other ones, to give to everyone more space, and more services.Here, gigantism, beauty, originality, chic design are to the honour of this amazing and zen villa, with regard to the 3 000 sqm extensive plot, the exotic garden, the very tall Buddha statues, the huge 17m pool with its relax areas, without forgetting the inside of this unbelievable 3 x 420 sqm villas and its surprising amenities (especially its beds with round shape). Our special Catering offer will invite you to enjoy our several breakfasts, and for your lunch and dinner, our delicious menus at home (with extra charge, on request one day minimum in advance).The largest dinning table can accomodate up to 26 guests.Our 2 main adjoining huge living rooms will let you eat all together thanks to a very large dinning table with 26 chairs.ALL IS OFFERED TO YOU, just enjoy this new Paradise ‚Ä¶Difference and surprising lovers, Huge space lovers, well-being, serenity and very zen atmosphere searchers, speedy WIFI, best Bluetooth HIFI amenities lovers will adore this contemporary villa, with its original and design decoration, its outstanding size, so rare in the center of Seminyak.Managed by our so dynamic and welcoming team, the so smiling house staff is very effective, and was trained in the best catering schools of the island. Our Upper upscale service proposed as a 5 star hotel does, is state of the art.So High Luxury and Zen Architect Villa with 3 Huge 17 m Pools and its relax areas, with an amazing space.Very recently designed and built, the priority was given to the space, whether it is outside or inside.High Luxury and so spacious Architect Villa, with a wonderful zen atmosphere, each villa was built on a 1 000 sqm land, quite amazing in Seminyak, and provides 420 sqm of living space in 2 buildings, to favor your intimacy.The tropical garden is sublimated by so many palm trees and two very tall Buddha statues, a huge infinity-edge pool of 17 m, its beach with its sunbeds in the water, its relax area in half-moon in the center. In the evening, the outside of buildings and the garden are illuminated with a soft purple light, giving to the place a very peaceful atmosphere, it is magic ‚Ä¶This lovely raised garden provides a terrace with double and single sunbeds, with a very design style, and many sunbrellas. In the center of the terrace, in front of the swimming pool, a pool lounge gazebo with its fan, invites you to have some good times in the shade, and take advantage of its big beds for relaxing and massages. Located in a quiet district in Seminyak, the Balinese Riviera, the villa is just a few minutes from restaurants, trendy bars and chic boutiques to the lively Oberoi, but also close to the most beautiful beach of the island and trendy bars like KU DE TA overlooking the sea and its waves for the delight of surfers. Ideal for big groups, couples, family or friends, professionnal retreats, each villa has 4 huge bedrooms/junior Suites, can accommodate 2 to 12 people, and will delight each lover of design and exoticism. Each villa is a beautiful architect-designed house built in 2016 with contemporary and sleek, but where the tropical atmosphere has a big place. Large volume characterizes its interior space, with a living area of 420 sqm.  Its 4 bedrooms are arranged in two different buildings to protect the intimacy of everyone. Two are at the ground floor of a building with direct access to the swimming pool, and two others in the first floor of the main building.  The exterior is enhanced by a 17 m long mirror swimming pool, with a beach with sunbeds in the water, its half-moon shape relax area, as well an outdoor lounge. The garden has many palm trees, exotic flowers, 2 huge Buddha statues, many original decoration statues, providing a lovely view and a sense of serenity to this wonderful place. Having crossed two magnificent doors of the entrance, you discover the tropical garden with the huge swimming pool and its half moon shape relax area, the massage gazebo in the middle.On your right, you can see the main building including at the ground floor, a magnificient 135 sqm open living space with its two living roms, one very impressive sized flat-screen TV, with a free access to hundred movies and TV series in several languages, a dining room with 12 chairs, a very original kitchen with its immense bar and 5 stools, in the middle of the room, so nicely decorated with niches on the wall and their little statues, one scullery and one toilets.Upstairs, 2 wonderful huge bedrooms (communicating if needed), with 2 ensuite bathrooms. Every room was designed as a junior suite. You will be surprised and charmed by the very original  King-Size bed in the middle of the room, with its rounded shape. In the evening, the purple light illuminating the bed and the ceiling will delight you. Each bedroom has its own en-suite raised  bathroom, with double vanity unit, Italian-style shower, toilets.Bathed by light thanks to the huge plate glass windows, the first floor has a patio with a purple Buddha as well, giving the impression of a floating terrace above the garden.On the other side of the pool, on your left, you can see the second building with its two other bedrooms/junior suites on the ground floor. As the bedrooms in the main building, 2 big sized bedrooms, with their own huge ensuite indoor-outdoor bathroom. Every room was designed as a junior suite. Same amenities with the very original  King-Size bed in the middle of the room and its rounded shape. In the evening, the purple light illuminates the bed and the ceiling as well. An additionnal single bed can be provided for big groups with extra charge. A lounge corner with a sofa and a coffee table, a desk, behind the king-size bed a dressing room with a safety-box, a 9 drawer dresser complete the room. Each bedroom has its own en-suite raised indoor-outdoor bathroom, with double vanity unit, bathtub, Italian-style shower, toilets.The villa Staff: Maids, Cooks, pool maintenance, gardener, security guard by night  outside the villa, Manager.Drivers on request with extra charge.Daily Housekeeping and Disinfection, Continental or Indonesian Breakfasts cooked on request (with extra charge), Concierge service with the villa Manager to address your airport pick-up and drop-off, transfers in Bali, rental motorbike, rental car with driver, Day tours, massages at home, Lunch and dinner at home, food delivery, restaurants reservation, flowers, baby-sitting (with extra charge, payment by cash in rupiah on the spot).In the villa, you will find a map of Seminyak and Bali with the main points of interest.Guest accessPrivate villas, private pools and jacuzzis.Other things to note6 bedrooms are on the ground floor, 6 bedrooms are upstairs.The rental rate is available up to 12 king-size beds and 24 pax.15 extra single beds can be arranged with an extra charge, thanks for specifying your bedding configuration, we will send you the quote.Thanks for paying by cash the local tax when you are in the villa : 30 000 IDR per person

title: The Luxurious Cozy Villa 10B in Seminyak
description: *SUBJECT TO 15% GOVERNMENT AND SERVICE TAX, COLLECTED SEPARATELY UPON CHECK IN.Indulge in the epitome of luxury with this exceptional property, crafted by combining two prestigious villas, each offering 5 bedrooms, resulting in a grand total of 10 impeccably designed bedrooms. Nestled within an exclusive private complex, parking is effortlessly accommodated.The spaceSituated just a leisurely 10-minute stroll from Seminyak's pristine beaches, vibrant shops, eclectic restaurants, and bustling nightlife, this fully staffed villa stands as an unparalleled gem in Seminyak.Prepare to be enchanted by the tranquil and serene ambiance of this extraordinary estate, capable of accommodating up to 26 guests across its 10 luxurious bedrooms. Whether you're seeking an ideal venue for celebrations, business seminars, rejuvenating yoga retreats, or cherished family reunions, this villa promises an unforgettable experience.Step into the expansive double living rooms that seamlessly flow into each other, offering ample space for relaxation and entertainment. Outside, an inviting barbecue area complete with a bar awaits, alongside a pool lounge and a sky lounge for breathtaking views. Find inner peace at the meditation area with a yoga pavilion, overlooking a serene Buddha statue and the lush greenery of the garden.For those inclined towards fitness, a fully equipped gymnasium awaits your workout regimen. Movie enthusiasts will delight in the private, soundproof cinema room featuring a massive 155-inch screen and an extensive library of several hundred films.Cool off in the impressive 17-meter and 12-meter pools surrounded by 20 sunbeds, perfect for soaking up the tropical sun. The villa's superb decoration enhances every corner, complemented by attentive staff ready to cater to your every need. Savor exquisite cocktails prepared by the staff before enjoying a sumptuous meal prepared by the talented chef (breakfast included, other meals our expert chef can help cook but groceries are at the expense of the guest)This villa epitomizes luxury living in Seminyak, offering a blend of elegance, comfort, and unparalleled hospitality that ensures an exceptional stay for every guest.Guest accessIn Seminyak, your day unfolds with endless possibilities:**Morning:** Start your day with a leisurely stroll along Seminyak Beach, where the soft sands and gentle waves invite you to relax and rejuvenate. Afterward, indulge in a delightful breakfast at one of the charming beachfront cafes, savoring fresh tropical fruits and local specialties.**Afternoon:** As the sun climbs higher, explore Seminyak's vibrant shopping scene. Wander through stylish boutiques and art galleries lining the streets, where you can discover unique fashion pieces, handmade crafts, and contemporary artwork. Treat yourself to a spa session for ultimate relaxation, enjoying traditional Balinese massages and wellness treatments.**Evening:** As twilight descends, Seminyak comes alive with a myriad of dining options. Choose from chic restaurants offering international cuisines, cozy cafes serving gourmet coffee, or beachfront bars where you can sip cocktails while watching the sunset. After dinner, immerse yourself in Seminyak's nightlife with live music venues and trendy clubs.These activities are just a suggestion; guests are encouraged to explore Seminyak at their own pace and discover their own favorite spots and experiences.Other things to noteKindly indicate in your inquiry whether you'll need airport transfers. The transfer fee is IDR 350K for a one-way trip in a car accommodating up to 4 people and luggage. For transfers between 9pm and 7am, a surcharge of IDR 75K applies. Please note that the fee is payable directly to the driver. Payments can be made in any currency to the equivalent of US Dollars or AUD Dollars or IDR rupiah.Please be aware that in tropical destinations, bugs, ants, geckos and all type of insects that normally inhabit the garden areas and can crawl to the villas.Note that no parties are allowed without previous consent. The property cannot be used for commercial uses without our approval. Smoking is strictly in the outdoor areas. All occupants who stay overnight, must be registered with us.

title: Dwa Chandra Villas & Retreats on River Gorge
description: Dwa Chandra is the highest-end gathering space in the Ubud area. Our two interconnected villas and yoga shala, by architect Alexis Dornier, operate as a retreat venue above a private river gorge with cave formations.We have a team of nine who care for the property and our guests. Our chef can prepare excellent food and cocktails. We offer transportation, onsite spa services, and are happy to recommend experiences. On Airbnb for a short time. See 155+ (exclusively) 5-star ratings on Maps.The spaceYou will have exclusive use of our full venue comprising two luxury villas, glass-walled yoga shala, and private river gorge with cave formations. We are located in an authentic Balinese community and surrounded by rivers, rice field, jungle. Carvings from 1000 years ago are just a 3 minute walk down the driveway.Common spaces include large living rooms, dining rooms, our beautiful yoga shala, spa area with massage beds, two large infinity pools, two fire pits, family TV room, rooftop star-gazing bed.Lodging includes nine unique luxury bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms. We also offer a small family room that is frequently converted into a 10th bedroom. In total we offer 14 individual beds (6 of which can be combined into 3 kings) plus 3 couch conversions, for a total of 17 possible bedding arrangements. Breakfast service for 22 guests is included.Guest accessThe Dwa Chandra team is led by our two hostesses who manage our onsite chef, two butlers, two housekeepers, and maintenance team. The villas are staffed 7am until 11pm every day, with spa services and food available all day long and security overnight.Our chef (formerly at Locavore) will provide a buffet or family-style breakfast suited to your group every morning, included in the price. After breakfast, you can order anything from our priced international menu -- from traditional Indonesian food to empanadas to cocktails -- every day until 11pm. You are also welcome to use the kitchen, stock groceries, or ask our hostesses to order food delivery from outside.  We offer fresh yoga gear, musical instruments, and a collection of books and board games as included amenities. Our team is happy to make fire pits, flower mandalas, serve extra dinners and make connections for tours and outside experiences. Our housekeeping team cleans daily, and brings bright smiles.Other things to noteWe offer a selection of experiences and recommendations to outside places that will fill your stay with local flavor. A complimentary experience design call is included to support you in making your gathering extraordinary!Some of what's available on our Experience Menu:- Onsite massage and spa treatments with our talented therapists- Traditional water blessing and ceremonial wear rental with Balinese priest down at the river gorge on the property- Friendly drivers for airport pick ups, full day tours, and group transport- Chef services such as designing bespoke menus and serving group dinners- Experience enhancements such as bespoke guest welcome baskets, floral arrangements, candle-lit dinners, and other flair that we're happy to design with you to delight your guests. - Tours of the local neighborhood and the homes of our Balinese neighbors

title: Jungle Cottage - Valley Views & Nourishing Food
description: Welcome to The Jungle Nook, our little piece of paradise just 30 mins north of the bustling town of Ubud. Immerse yourself in nature, unwind, and recharge.  Imagine stepping onto your private deck, greeted by breathtaking views of vibrant rice fields and towering coconut trees. Savour a hearty plant-based breakfast, then make your way down the valley to a hidden waterfall or take a hot soak in our tub overlooking the jungle. Homemade lunch & dinner are also available!The space! We are blessed with a natural jungle environment including colourful creatures and vibrant jungle sounds - please read the "Other details to note" section carefully before booking to make sure it's the right fit for you  ‚ù§ !The Jungle Nook is a secluded cottage nestled against a slope overlooking a lush river valley, allowing you to fully disconnect and enjoy the breathtaking views. You will have a private kitchen, equiped with fridge and freezer which we have stocked with our favourite vegan snacks and drinks. In the bathroom you find a gorgeous handmade copper bath tub - perfect for a self care moment, also big enough for 2 ‚ù§The deck is made from beautiful recycled ironwood and will surely entice you for some yoga, meditation, journalling, writing music or whatever else calls you. We have a wonderful in-house vegan chef who can prepare anything from a scrumptious chile sin carne or sushi platter to a wholesome salad bowl so you won't even have to leave your Nook if you don't want to :)Your rate includes‚ù§ Yummy homemade vegan breakfast‚ù§ Guided rice paddy, waterfall & village walk - a highlight for our guests so far!‚ù§ Tropical fruit basket‚ù§ Welcome drink‚ù§ Complimentary tea & arabica coffee in your roomThroughout your stay, we will be ready to assist you to help make your time with us unforgettable. Here are some early recommendations:- Indulge in a rejuvenating Balinese massage in the privacy of your villa- Delight in Made's delicious vegan lunches & dinners - Explore our edible garden in the making- Retreat for some yoga, art or meditation on your private deck- Visit the ancient ruins of Gunung Kawi- Take part in a purification ceremony in Bali's largest spring water temple, Tirta Empul - Explore traditional Balinese village life - perhaps even attend a local ceremony or learn how to make Balinese offerings - Watch the sunrise from Mount Batur - 30mins away- Make your way to the bustling town of Ubud and Bali's cultural heartland - 30mins awayTo end the day, sink into a steaming hot bath while watching the birds fly home and the valley fall back into the safe embrace of the night.We can't wait to welcome you to our special place!Guest accessThe entire Jungle Nook is yours alone, with private kitchen, bathroom and spacious deck.Other things to noteINSECTS and other CREATURESAt the Jungle Nook, we live alongside the vibrant creatures that have called this place home long before we arrived. You'll spot beautiful butterflies fluttering through the air, but you'll also come across a whole host of other creatures‚Äîsome familiar, some a bit more unusual‚Äîall with their own unique colors and shapes and sounds. We believe in living in harmony with the rest of nature and want to offer our guests an authentic experience of this rich, untamed ecosystem.Staying with us comes with its own soundtrack. Guests should be aware that, particularly when the weather is warm, we get bursts of very LOUD 'screeching' from our native cicadas. They are small (about the size of a thumb), but their volume is impressive. It‚Äôs a unique sound of the wilderness that guests should be prepared for.Geckos of various sizes make their homes with us, and though harmless, they do add their distinctive calls at night. In return, they‚Äôre incredibly helpful, keeping our space clear of pests - in Balinese culture they're considered bringers of good energy!Our garden is home to playful squirrels, colourful birds, and curious lizards. At sunset, you might see bats flying around, and the jungle fills with a chorus of sounds, from croaking frogs to chirping crickets. As night falls, you might be lucky enough to see fireflies glowing over the rice paddies.The jungle is a place where nature shows up in every possible form.While we deeply appreciate the beauty and balance of this wild environment, we understand that the intensity of nature here may be overwhelming for some. *** Please take a moment to consider whether this unique, immersive experience aligns with what you're seeking during your stay.  ***FULLY PLANT-BASED PROPERTYThe Jungle Nook is 100% plant-based, from the delicious meals cooked by our chef Made to the fragrant soaps and scented candles. Most of our guests are non-vegan and love the experience :)You are welcome to cook your own meals as well and we can help with shopping. We kindly ask not to bring any animal products to the cottage.PARKINGIf you come with your own car, please note we have only one (!) parking spot available at the villa. Please inform us upon booking so we can reserve it for you.
