title: Hidden Architectural Masterpiece in East Bali
description: Where the river meets the sea, Villa Agung is a hidden masterpiece on Bali‚Äôs tranquil east coast. Set within Campuhan, our five-acre oceanfront estate celebrated in Architectural Digest, it embodies timeless Indonesian craftsmanship and the harmony of architecture, nature, and the Balinese spirit.The spaceVilla Agung is the grand residence of Campuhan, a 2,500-square-foot pavilion built entirely by hand from reclaimed teak and ironwood. Its soaring 30-foot alang-alang roof, woven bamboo walls, and wide sliding doors create a seamless connection between home and horizon. From every angle the villa opens to extraordinary views: Mount Agung rising in striking majesty behind, the Lombok Strait stretching out in front, a white limestone private swimming pool set among manicured gardens, and the shifting light of sea and sky visible throughout the day. The open-plan design balances a restful sleeping area perfectly framed by Mount Agung, with a spacious living pavilion facing the ocean. A king bed suite dressed in fine linens invites deep rest, while the adjacent lounge offers space for reading, reflection, or conversation. His-and-hers volcanic-stone bathrooms and a two-person soaking tub complete this elegant retreat. Crafted using traditional mortise-and-tenon joinery, without a single nail, by Minangkabau artisans, the villa embodies both ancient artistry and contemporary grace. Here, the beauty of natural materials, the rhythm of the waves, and the spirit of Bali compose a quiet symphony of serenity.Guest accessGuests of Villa Agung enjoy full access to the heartbeat of the property, the Campuhan Lounge. This 2,500-sq-ft open-air living and dining pavilion overlooks the sea, mountains, and river. Built entirely without nails or screws, it serves as the estate‚Äôs gathering place, where guests read, dine, or simply watch the light shift across the water. You‚Äôll also have access to the main infinity pool, seaside spa pavilion, and vast manicured lawns that stretch to the ocean‚Äôs edge. A member of our team will be at the property to personally greet you upon arrival, assist with check-in, and make you feel at home from the very first moment. Our team of fifteen full-time staff provide discreet and intuitive service, ensuring every need is met with warmth and care. A custom-made breakfast for two is included each morning. Our chefs are available 7 a.m. to 9 p.m., offering √† la carte lunch and dinner menus prepared from local organic produce and the day‚Äôs fresh ocean catch, a genuine farm- and boat-to-table experience. Every villa is completely private and self-contained, allowing you to enjoy both seclusion and the shared beauty of the estate‚Äôs surroundings.Other things to note- Maximum occupancy: 2 guests per villa- To maintain the privacy, calm, and security of all guests, only registered guests may enter the estate. Parties or gatherings are not permitted.- Daily breakfast from our generous menu is included for two guests.- Daily housekeeping and evening turndown service are provided.- Airport transfers, private drivers, and day excursions can be arranged on request.- Wi-Fi is available throughout the property, though many guests find the true connection here comes from the surrounding nature.The rhythm of the sea, the sound of the river, and the presence of Mount Agung create a sense of quiet restoration. To truly understand Campuhan, one must experience it ‚Äî where the river meets the sea.

title: The Terraces | 2BR Private Pool, Butler, Breakfast
description: A ridge-top sanctuary in a private eight-villa estate, where Balinese village charm meets modern luxury. This 180 m¬≤ retreat features 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, enclosed living, large rooftop and an infinity pool with sweeping jungle valley views. Enjoy exclusive butler service, tropical surrounds, and the privacy of a controlled-access estate‚Äîcrafted for couples, families, or friends seeking tranquility and indulgence in Ubud.The spaceCreated for guests who value serenity, privacy, and a genuine connection to Bali‚Äôs culture. Each 2 bedroom villa offers:Location: Ubud BaliRooms: 2 Bedroom, 2 BathSize: 180sqm (living, bedrooms, rooftop, balcony)Capacity: 4‚Ä¢Free morning breakfast on private rooftop, or private infinity pool‚Ä¢Exclusive butler service, with concierge and daily cleaning‚Ä¢Floor to ceiling windows, with breathtaking jungle views.‚Ä¢Spacious enclosed living area with smart TV.‚Ä¢Two spacious bedrooms, each with luxury ensuites + a two person bathtub‚Ä¢Skylights above bathrooms and stairs for natural light & stargazing‚Ä¢Private infinity edge pool, with valley views and smart lighting. Sunbeds for lounging. ‚Ä¢Large 100m2/ 1076sf rooftop, for yoga routines, morning coffee or sunset views‚Ä¢Contemporary kitchen with induction cooktop, floor to ceiling cabinetry and dining essentials.‚Ä¢Air conditioners in all areas + international power pointsNestled on a quiet ridge outside Ubud Centre, our retreat offers deep jungle valley views of coconut groves and cascading rice terraces. Hear temple bells, watch local farmers at work, and experience the warmth of a community deeply connected to Balinese tradition.Unlike busy central Ubud, here you‚Äôll find peace, safety, and privacy ‚Äî yet you‚Äôre never far from the conveniences that make your stay effortless. The estate is less than 3 miles from Ubud‚Äôs vibrant dining scene, yoga studios, artisan shops, and cultural landmarks. Guests can enhance their stay with in-house spa treatments, concierge services, and local food delivery, available upon request for an additional charge.Guest accessGuests can park in our private, secure car park and be welcomed by our reception team with a complimentary refreshment. Your luggage will be taken care of as staff escort you to your villa for a seamless check-in ‚Äî so you can begin your stay relaxed and refreshed.Other things to noteWhen booking, you‚Äôll be allocated one of our three 2BD, 2Bath, luxury villas. While the floor plan and amenities are identical, there may be variations in bathroom finishes or interior details.Our property sits above a lush jungle valley, fully immersed in Bali‚Äôs natural surroundings and village life. While we carry out weekly professional pest control, occasional encounters with insects may occur. Guests may hear sounds from the local community ‚Äî such as temple chimes, ceremonies, or roosters. While there are none within our private estate, these are part of Balinese life and are beyond our control.Our team is available from 7:00am ‚Äì 10:00pm. For arrivals outside these hours, a late check-in fee of IDR 150,000 applies, to support staff overtime.

title: The Writers' Treehouse ‚Äì a unique, creative home
description: The Writers' Treehouse is a cool, airy home 250m from the beach; it's surrounded by trees and a tropical garden, and has views across forested hills. Treehouse is an inspiring place in which to read, write, create, cook or relax (there are two swinging chairs), and from where to take long walks on an unspoiled beach. An eco-hotel is a 5-min walk away; you may use their pool if you have a meal or massage there. Medewi surf point is a 7-minute drive away.The spaceThe Writers' Treehouse was built around an old mango tree; upstairs the glass doors open onto its branches and downstairs the house is open to the tropical environment. It is a very comfortable home ‚Äì but this style of accommodation is not for everybody. If you are more comfortable in city spaces and are looking for a cocooned apartment or a hip neighbourhood like Canggu, then Treehouse is not for you... but if you're an independent traveller who enjoys being in nature and seeks to connect with the soul of a place, you're likely to consider Treehouse heaven. * Please note that Treehouse is NOT a pet-friendly (dogs are welcome at Hidden Well, our charming cottage near Treehouse ‚Äì please click my profile to view it). Also, we cannot accept bookings from people travelling with children under the age of 8, due to safety concerns relating to the design of the house (open staircase and full-length window-doors upstairs).BEDROOMUpstairs the large room is divided by a custom-designed cupboard (all furniture was made by local artisans). In one half is the queen-size bed, which has views across tree-tops to forest-covered hills. The other half is a studio space with packed book shelves, a hanging chair, a daybed and a desk.BATHROOMThe outdoor bathroom (surrounded by a high stone wall) is shaded by palm trees lush with bromeliads, ferns and orchids. Shampoo, conditioner, shower gel and hand wash are provided and yes, there is hot water :)KITCHENThe kitchen is well equipped with: Fridge with freezer; gas stove; small electric oven; wok; pots; frying pan; filter coffee machine; blender; drinking water.  Baking equipment includes: muffin and loaf tin, digital scale, measuring cups and spoons. WIFIThere is a 50MBPS fibre Internet connection. The speed does vary slightly, but it is more than sufficient to hold Zoom meetings, transfer high-res photos and watch Netflix.SURFING & YOGAThere is a quiver of surfboards that you are welcome to use ‚Äì they range from 5'8" to 9'0". Please bring your own leash. In the cupboard upstairs you'll find a yoga mat, two blocks and two straps.Guest accessYou will have full, exclusive use of The Writers' Treehouse.Other things to noteThe Writers' Treehouse is an enchanting base for travellers who're wanting to connect with nature and authentic Balinese village life. Our intention is for guests to feel  at home and to experience the true magic of the area ‚Äì so we provide a comprehensive "address book" and recommendations of places to go, things to do that will deepen your experience of West Bali. EXPERIENCE LOCAL LIFEOn all bookings 3 nights or longer we offer a complimentary pink-buffalo and rice paddy experience ‚Äì a wonderful opportunity to learn more about traditional Balinese life.NEIGHBOURHOOD VIBESOn Wednesday nights (until around 9pm or 10pm), on a neighbouring property, the village's gamelan musicians practise angklung, a beautiful traditional music that features wind instruments; on some Thursday nights they practise joget, which is indigenous to West Bali and rarely heard or played outside of this area. You will hear this music from Treehouse, and you are so welcome watch this music being performed.Karaoke has become popular in the village, and you will also hear the prayer calls from the village mosque, as well as roosters, dogs and birds. While these sounds might disturb light sleepers, they are an integral part of an authentic Bali experience. If you're looking for a quiet, restorative retreat then you might consider staying Hidden Well, our cottage a few minutes' drive from Treehouse. Please click on my profile to view it. We do our best to ensure that every guest‚Äôs stay is flawless, but from time to time things crop up that are beyond our control (eg loud music played at neighbourhood weddings / flying ants emerging after rain / the electricity or water supply is temporarily interrupted). Your comfort is our priority and we work closely with our community to ensure that anything that needs our attention is addressed as soon as possible.NO DOGS, PLEASEThe Writers' Treehouse is NOT a pet-friendly property. If you're looking for somewhere that is, please click on my profile to connect with our other cottage, Hidden Well, where dogs are welcome.

title: New! 1BR Private pool
description: Djani SebatuThe spaceNestled in the serene village of Sebatu, just north of Ubud, Djani Sebatu is a peaceful retreat where modern comfort meets Balinese soul. Surrounded by lush rice terraces, sacred temples, and tropical jungle, this boutique hideaway offers a private escape into nature, culture, and quiet luxury.Designed to reflect harmony and simplicity, the spaces blend traditional architecture with contemporary touches. Wake up to the sound of birdsong, enjoy your coffee with views of misty valleys, and unwind by the pool with a breathtaking valley view.Whether you‚Äôre here for a romantic getaway, a creative reset, or simply to recharge, Djani Sebatu invites you to slow down and reconnect‚Äîwith yourself and the beauty of Bali.What we offer:Private villas with garden or valley viewsComfortable king-size beds and ensuite bathroomsFresh, locally sourced breakfast dailyInfinity pool surrounded by natureSmart TV with Netflix accountFast Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and warm local hospitalityIn-villa massage and spa services (upon request)Scooter rental (upon request)Airport transfers and local transportation arrangementsDaily housekeeping for a hassle-free stayPersonalized recommendations for local attractions and experiencesGuest access- Private room with private bathroom attached to it- Private poolOther things to noteNote : to access this room there is some stairs

title: Villa Upendo | 1BR hideaway near the beach | Seseh
description: 1-bedroom private luxury villa within walking distance to restaurants & Seseh Beach.What to expect: 1-bedroom with ensuite bathroom / open-air concept living area with fully equipped kitchen / private pool / located in Seseh area, 550m away from the beach / high speed optic fiber wifi / daily cleaning 6 day per week / concierge services, support & assistance 24/7 and more.The spaceVilla Upendo is a sumptuous & brand new private luxury villa, perfect for couples or solo travellers discovering Bali.It offers a beautiful open-air concept living area with a fully equipped kitchen (ideal to cook, or have someone cook for you, any kind of meals), open onto the garden and the private swimming pool of the property.The bedroom is spacious, and equipped with a kind sized bed, smart tv, closet with safety box, and its own ensuite bathroom.Our kind staff will ensure your stay is worry less, and provides daily cleaning 6 day per week, pool & garden maintenance 2-3 times per week. We are also able to provide Concierge service, support and assistance 24/7 for you to enjoy throughout your stay!Finally, our villa is located 550m away from the Beach of Seseh, or 15min drive away from the busy streets of Batu Bolong and Berawa.Guest accessYou will have exclusive and private access to the entire villa and its facilities. Our team provides daily cleaning six days a week, while pool and garden maintenance is done 2‚Äì3 times a week. If you prefer not to be disturbed on certain days, just let me or my onsite staff know in advance, and we‚Äôll be happy to adjust the schedule to ensure your full privacy.Other things to noteINCLUDES FOR EVERY STAY:‚Ä¢ Free welcome drink‚Ä¢ Daily cleaning 6 day per week / Pool & garden maintenance‚Ä¢ Bath & Pool towels for each guest‚Ä¢ High speed Fiber-Optic WIFI connection (up to 200mbps)‚Ä¢ Safety box(es)‚Ä¢ Emergency assistance 24/7‚Ä¢ Concierge Services (see below)AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST:‚Ä¢ Airport transfer‚Ä¢ Breakfast upon request‚Ä¢ Private cook services (lunch and/or dinner)‚Ä¢ Motorbike rentals (Scoopy, Nmax)‚Ä¢ Car rentals (with/without driver)‚Ä¢ Massages at the villa (& various other Spa services)‚Ä¢ Day tours to discover Baliand much more!FAQ ‚Äì FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS:‚Ä¢ HOW CAN I ORGANIZE SOME SERVICES DURING MY STAY?You can either pre-book services with me online before arrival, or arrange any kind of services, activities, or tours with our Concierge onsite, available 24/7 via WA. ‚Ä¢ CAN YOU PRE-FILL THE FRIDGE FOR ME BEFORE I ARRIVE?Yes! We can make some groceries for you upon request. Just let me know in advance and we will send you the payment request to pay for the groceries via Airbnb along with the invoice for them (note that we charge a 10% service fee on the bill).‚Ä¢ DO YOU PROVIDE LAUNDRY SERVICES?We can assist you into bringing your clothes to a nearby laundry. Avoid giving fragile clothes, and remember to check all items when brought back to you to make sure nothing is missing or damaged.‚Ä¢ SHOULD I EXPECT TO ENCOUNTER MOSQUITOES, INSECTS OR OTHER ANIMALS?Bali being a tropical Island, mosquitoes & insects are everywhere. While we do organize fogging twice per month to limit as much as possible their number, we do advise guest to bring their own mosquito repellent, or use the ones provided at the villa if any. it is also common to spot other exotic animals (lizards, bats, ants etc), especially in gardens & open spaces. All of which are harmless, and part of local everyday life.

title: Maha Hati at Mahajiva
description: Mahajiva is a serene bamboo accommodation designed for those who appreciate the beauty of simplicity. The building is fashioned in the traditional ‚ÄúBalinese Jineng‚Äù style. This unassuming haven offers a genuine escape from the complexities of modern life, providing a space where peace of mind is not just a luxury but a fundamental experience.The spaceMahajiva is a two-story natural bamboo villa designed to connect you with the surrounding nature while offering comfort and simplicity.On the first floor, you‚Äôll find an open-air living area, dining space, kitchen, and bathroom, all designed to flow seamlessly with the outdoors‚Äîallowing you to fully enjoy the sights and sounds of nature.The second floor features a cozy bedroom equipped with air conditioning, providing a comfortable and restful space after a day of exploring or relaxing.Guest accessThe entire 250 sqm villa, including your own private pool, is yours to enjoy. Relax and unwind in this charming space, surrounded by nature and designed for your comfort and privacy.Other things to noteMahajiva is nestled in a natural setting, surrounded by lush greenery. As it is located close to nature, you may encounter various insects and animals, including the occasional snake. However, we regularly maintain the area to help manage their presence. Across the river is a local village and at times you may hear some sounds from the community, though they are usually soft and not disturbing. Your privacy and the beautiful views remain well protected by tall trees and bamboo, ensuring a peaceful and secluded atmosphere

title: Wooden Hideaway# Private Pool & Serene Valley View
description: welcome to Ananda Suite , Escape to a serene wooden house nestled in nature, offering the perfect blend of comfort and tranquility. Ananda suite located in North ubud, Bonjaka villa, SebatuThis cozy 1-bedroom retreat features a private pool where you can unwind while taking in the breathtaking views of the surrounding jungle valley. title: Faraway On Mount Batukaru
description: Welcome to Faraway Mount Batukaru Cottageüôè Located at the best point of Bali Island, namely on the slopes of Mount Batukaru, making our cottage very suitable for those of you who want to experience the true sensation of Balinese nature. Quiet, silent, and far from the crowds. This is where your life adventure begins. Please ask questions so we can understand you betterüôèThe spaceOur cottage is made of natural materials. all from Nature, Manual, and traditional. Complete with, Private Kitchen, Private Pool, and Private Area. Living on a plantation, with views of Nature and Mountains, will give you the pleasure of life. For those of you who like YOGA, relaxing, Vacation, we think our cottage is the solution. In addition, we also provide activities :: Cooking Balinese Food, Making Canang for Balinese Hindu ceremonies, Getting to Know Balinese Culture, and Tours Visiting All the Beautiful Places in Bali, there are also other activities according to guest wishes. Access to public facilities is also very easy from here, Only 10 minutes, without traffic jams. to Ubud - to Canggu - Denpasar - Beach , Only 1 hour. No Traffic Jams. We also provide motorbikes and private cars to meet guest needs. Feel the Sensation of Living in this pristine Balinese Nature. And most importantly, living in Nature is different from in the city or elsewhere .. because usually you will Find, Biodiversity. because it is Normal, But not dangerous. because we always maintain the safety and cleanliness of the Guest Cottage. Guests can also pick fruits and vegetables in our garden, for free as much as they like, when it's in season. Our expanse of rice fields, and morning jogging track, while watching the sunrise from behind the mountain, will hypnotize you. Jatiluih rice terraces, Natural Hot Springs, Batukaru Temple, Ulun Danu Beratan Temple, as well as several waterfalls and lakes, all of which are beautiful and the best places, close to our village. Our cottage will provide an extraordinary holiday stay experience for you. So don't hesitate, please make a reservation. Because our beautiful nature and cottage are waiting for your arrivalüôèüôèGuest accessAll access is very good. There are :: Bank ATMs, places to eat, complete markets and others. Just a 15 minute drive.Other things to noteEven though our cottage is in Nature,, No need to worry, we ensure guests are SAFE and COMFORTABLE with our facilities and servicesüôè

title: OB10002 - 10 Bedroom Villa Complex in Seminyak
description: Offering a 10 Bedrooms option consist of a Complex of 3 Villas; Two 4 Bedroom Villa and One 1 Bedroom Villa"Before sending a booking request, please contact us to inquire about any promotional rates that may be available. The pricing for the villa is dynamic and subject to change, with some dates potentially having discounted rates. Please note that the calendar for the villa may not always be up-to-date, so we recommend checking with us for last-minute availability."The spaceFrom the centre of Seminyak, a residential road bordered by palm trees leads out towards the residential district from the famous Oberoi Hotel. In this privileged setting one passes a guardhouse and then enter into a wooded driveway leading to these gorgeous Bali villas for rent. The central feature of these Bali villas for rent is an open-air lobby, and on the right side of the lobby a wide pathway, elegantly lit at night, takes the guest to the villas. These Bali Villas are located within 200 m from well known restaurants and fashion boutiques of Bali, only 400 m from the sea and about 300 m from the well known KuDeTa.For supporting the warm climate of Bali, every room of the villas owns electric fans and air-conditioning. As you wish, you can also refresh up in the large private swimming pools during a long sunny day and lay in the comfortable sunbeds. The villas are composed of spacious open-air bathrooms, large kitchen with a bar, and a wide living room where you can enjoy your family summer holidays. And especially, all rooms have Wifi connexion to offer you all the comfort you deserve.Fans & air-conditioningLarge open-air bathroom with bath & showerTV with a DVD libraryPrivate swimming poolsPrivate Bar & kitchenOpen living room with lounges, dining table & individual tables for breakfastOther things to noteOur villas come with the services of a Guest Relations Manager who will be happy to assist with tours, transportation, massages, activities, reservations and any other information you may need to make your vacation a memorable and hassle-free experience. From the moment you arrive, our team is dedicated to ensuring that you have an unforgettable stay with us.We offer airport transfer services to make your arrival and departure as convenient as possible. Our team can arrange transportation for you to and from the airport at a reasonable cost. Please let us know if you require this service and we will be happy to assist youWe are happy to arrange fast-track immigration service for our guests. This service allows you to bypass queues and have a more efficient and convenient arrival or departure at the airport. Please let us know if you are interested in this service and we will do our best to accommodate your request.

title: Brand New 2BR Villa w/Pool, 5 Mins to Canggu Beach
description: Welcome to our Kadasa Villa - unit 1With its unbeatable location 7 minutes scooter ride to Batu Bolong Beach, The Lawn, Mexicola, and much more. Our villa offers easy access to some of Canggu's most popular attractions, ensuring that your stay is filled with endless opportunities for adventure and exploration.Book your stay with us today and experience the ultimate Bali getaway in the heart of Canggu.The spaceWelcome to our exquisite 2 -bedroom Kadasa Villa, ideally situated in the vibrant neighborhood of Canggu, just a stone's throw away from the iconic Batu Bolong Beach. Nestled amidst lush tropical greenery, this charming retreat offers a perfect blend of tranquility and convenience for an unforgettable Bali getaway.As you enter our villa, you'll be greeted by a serene ambiance and modern comforts that promise a rejuvenating stay. You'll find your own oasis‚Äîa swimming pool surrounded by lush foliage. Take a refreshing dip in the pool to cool off from the tropical heat, or simply lounge on the sunbeds with a good book and soak up the tranquil ambiance.The cozy living area features comfortable seating where you can unwind and relax after a day of exploring the nearby attractions. Large windows allow natural light to flood the space, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere.The villa boasts a fully equipped kitchen, complete with modern appliances, sleek countertops, and all the necessary utensils for preparing delicious meals. title: Stylish 8BR Wellness Pool Villa, Nag Shampa Estate
description: Nag Shampa Private Estate, Taro, Ubud, Bali | By The Luxe Nomad - Exclusive estate curated by Sam and Isabella Branson - Fully staffed with eight bedrooms for up to 16 guests- Five swimming pools for the ultimate villa vacation- Wellness Haven: Yoga shala, massage studio, meditation spots - Set on a one-hectare site surrounded by a tropical jungle - Organic orchard, vegetable patch, and lush gardensThe spaceNestled in the peaceful Taro village, Nag Shampa Private Estate by Sam and Isabella Branson is an estate that‚Äôs truly at one with nature. Its name, which means ‚Äúincense of love‚Äù in Sanskrit, is designed as the ultimate wellness retreat. Combining modern design with traditional Javanese architecture, this property embodies elegant authenticity. The Ubud villa can host up to 16 guests in eight ensuite bedrooms; perfect for big groups of families and friends travelling together. With over one hectare to explore, the estate is a living, breathing feast for the senses. Make full use of its yoga shala, where you can exercise, meditate or just savour some quiet time. Enjoy healthy, homestyle meals prepared daily by three in-house cooks, using fresh produce from the estate‚Äôs organic orchards and vegetable gardens. Swim and soak in its five inviting pools, or unwind at the massage studio and various relaxation zones throughout the estate. Walk through lush greenery that lead to three impressive Joglo-style buildings that respectively house the Istana Suite (the master bedroom), an 18-seater dining area, and a lofty living area that leads to the main pool and yoga shala. Next to the shala, two symmetrical pairs of Joglo-style structures contain four additional bedrooms, followed by a series of three Kubu pool villas that each have a hammock on the balcony.Weddings and other celebrations can be held at this beautiful venue; contact the team for more information. Where you‚Äôll be: Taro Village in Ubud, BaliGuest accessEnjoy full access to all of Nag Shampa Private Estate‚Äôs spacious rooms and amenities across the one-hectare site. This includes eight ensuite bedrooms, five swimming pools, yoga shala, massage room, gardens and other indoor-outdoor spaces found throughout the estate.Other things to note PROMOTIONS  Stay 5 Nights: Premium Upgrade Offer Enjoy extra perks when you book a minimum stay of 5-nights or longer with us. This promotion is applicable to stays from months of 1-30 April, 1-31 July and 1-31 October 2025.- Complimentary Airport Transfer (One-Way)        - Complimentary Daily Car Services (8 hours a day, excluding petrol).                - Complimentary 1-hour massage session for every guest (One-Time use) *Last minute: Up to 10% off stays- Valid only for bookings made less than 30 days prior to the check-in date.- Seasons minimum night stay required *Early bird: Up to 10-15% off stays in low, shoulder, and high season- Valid only for bookings made 120 days or more prior to the check-in date.- Seasons minimum night stay required *Long Stay:  Up to 10% off stays for low, shoulder and high season- Valid only for bookings with a minimum stay of 7 nights- Some promotions are not reflected. Please contact us for more details Rate Inclusions: - Welcome drink- Daily breakfast- Complimentary WiFi- Daily housekeeping- Services by Villa manager, private cooks, butlers, maintenance/engineering, and security.- Car hire (8 consecutive hours a day, excluding petrol) Floors: Nag Shampa Estate is a villa complex consisting 8 Pavilions:- Ground Floor: Main entrance, fully-equipped kitchen, main dining area, an open-air living room, garden, yoga bale and swimming pools Capacity & Extra Bedding: - This property is designed to comfortably sleep 10-16 persons.- Extra bed is available at USD $45 per person per night. Only 4 additional beds are available. Living areas: - The dining and kitchen areas are conveniently located next to each other, offering an open and inviting space. - The living area, on the other hand, provides a separate, air-conditioned room for relaxation on the ground floor. Entertainment: - High-speed WiFi throughout and indoor living area equipped with 43-inch Smart TV with Netflix, local and international channels, JBL Bluetooth speakers, books and board games. Kitchen & Dining: - The kitchen is equipped with oven, refrigerator, espresso coffee machine, microwave, freezer, blender, juicer, toaster, stove, mini bar, rice cooker, wine fridge, water dispenser, as well as essential cooking tools, cutlery, and drinking glasses.- The villa has main indoor dining area features a rectangular table that seats 16 guests.- All meals (breakfast, lunch, dinner, floating breakfast upon request) can be arranged in advance. We also provide a chef shopping service and a pre-arrival shopping service with the rates: grocery bill + 15% handling fee. Wellness: - Yoga mats are available on request and the spacious garden provides a serene setting for practicing yoga. - Yoga lessons can also be arranged at extra charge. In-villa treatments are available on request at extra charge. Parking: Sufficient parking space available for two cars and six motorbikes. For Families: - Baby cot is charged at USD $10 per unit per day.- High chair is charged at USD $5 per unit per day.- Babysitting service available upon request at extra charge.- Children under 4 years old can stay for free when sharing existing bedding with parents. Pool area: - There are a total of 5 pools - The two main pools - measure 41m x 1.4m x 28m - and 10m x 1.4m x 10m, - and 3 plunge pools measure the same 6m x 1.4m x 3m; - All pools are chlorinated pools, - and only Pool 2 has a shallow end for kids; - All five pools are set to ambient temperature; - There are a total of thirteen lounge chairs, fifteen sun umbrellas, and fourteen sunbeds; - Towels are provided at each villa pool. Services at extra charge: - Beverage & Grocery Shopping Service (at grocery cost + 15% handling fee).- Spa treatments, massages services and additional yoga sessions are available upon request (extra charge).- Tours and activities such as art and cultural excursions, cooking class are available upon request (extra charge). Announcement:  Nyepi Religious Day Please be informed that Bali island celebrates Nyepi (Silent) Day each year on the dates below. Nyepi Day is a day of absolute silence throughout the island and it is observed from 6:00 AM until 6:00 AM the next morning. No outdoor activities are allowed and there will be no check-in and check-out from properties on 19 Mar 2026, 08 Mar 2027 and 26 Mar 2028.

title: Creative Professionals Retreat - Zen Bungalow #2
description: Stay in one of our two exclusive bungalows atop a lush wonderfully secluded valley by the sea. Enjoy your complimentary full breakfast with a breathtaking view each morning.Sleep soundly in a naturally cool bungalow with luxurious open air bathroom and porch with nature view.Savour the perfect Bali weather while you dine (or cook) in an open rustic space with a breezy upstairs lounge, overlooking the gorgeous vista pool. Marvel at stunning vista views from valley to volcano to ocean.The spaceYour unique and stylish A-frame bungalow is purpose designed and constructed with white roof/wall to reflect solar radiation, high ceilings, and a tunnel like air flow to ensure you are comfortable and connected with the glorious Bali climate year round. You simply cross the lush lawn to enjoy your complimentary breakfast in the open air dining room complete with spectacular view. The breezy upstairs lounge, has views from volcano Batukaru to the ocean, is a delightful place to relax and read, nap in the hammock, or perhaps get some work done. The pool with a view is a pleasure to be in and around at any time...Guest accessYou have exclusive access to your own private bungalow including ensuite bathroom with garden and sky view. The open air kitchen/dining space, upstairs lounge, swimming pool, and garden are all available for your use any time of day and exclusively shared with only the occupant of the second bungalow.Other things to noteOur guests often prefer to have meals delivered from nearby restaurants.Also, there is Canteen cafe/warung for meals by the beach in front of our location, just a few minutes walk. Other restaurants (see details in our guidebook) are further down the beach. You can cross the small river by foot. After heavy rain it might not be possible to cross at the beach, in which case most guests to use a rental scooter to drive around rather than walk via the highway.Beer and wine are available here in the village, but liquor can be picked up from the airport or one of the markets in town.

title: Akashi Residence | 6BR Luxe Villa Pool Slide
description: Akashi Residence, Pererenan, Bali | By The Luxe Nomad ‚Ä¢ Style cred: the villa venue for BOSS House Bali‚Ä¢ Featured by Australian Traveller, Lifestyle Asia and Tatler Asia‚Ä¢ Stylish interiors designed by renowned architect Alexis Dornier‚Ä¢ Easy access from Canggu‚Äôs hotspots‚Ä¢ Make a splash with the iconic silver spiral slide‚Ä¢ A wellness haven with a private gym, ice bath and yoga deckThe spaceRaising the bar on the Bali villa experience, Akashi Residence is an architectural masterpiece that brilliantly strikes the balance between style and function. Located in quiet Pererenan, enjoy an authentic slice of Bali without the big crowds‚Äîit‚Äôs also conveniently close to lively Canggu and the surf beaches of the island‚Äôs west coast. So sit back, relax and say yes to the ultimate villa vacation.Also formerly known as the BOSS House Bali, this stunning property was handpicked to embody the BOSS lifestyle. Book your stay and see the hype behind this beautiful villa, which has been featured by luxury lifestyle and travel titles including Australian Traveller, Lifestyle Asia and Tatler Asia.Designed by renowned architect Alexis Dornier, this spectacular six-bedroom villa is perfect for groups of friends and extended families with kids of all ages. The unique tropical design represents open-air living at its finest, while enjoying air-conditioned comfort whenever you need it. The central atrium is the social hub of the villa. A silver sculptural water slide is its centrepiece, splashing into the swimming pool below. An abundance of living and entertainment spaces are spread over three levels.Each air-conditioned ensuite bedroom is furnished with either a king bed or two queen beds; two bedrooms are fitted with Smart TVs. Other facilities provide fun and relaxation for all ages, including a TV room, pool table, gym, yoga deck, ice bath, a roofed poolside lounge and two dining rooms with adjoining kitchens.Guest accessEnjoy full access to the three-storey villa‚Äôs rooms and amenities: this includes the six ensuite bedrooms, a private pool with a sculptural slide, as well as all indoor and outdoor areas within the 2,000 sqm property.Other things to note BUILDING DETAILS: Akashi Residence, built in 2024, spans a total of 2,000 sqm across three floors:‚Ä¢ Lower Ground: Secondary kitchen, secondary dining area, pool table, ice bath, garden‚Ä¢ Ground Floor: Main entrance, main kitchen, main dining area, two bedrooms, guest bathroom, air conditioned living room, swimming pool‚Ä¢ Second Floor: Four bedrooms including master bedroom, terrace, gym, slide to swimming pool POOL AREA: ‚Ä¢ A silver sculptural water slide is its centrepiece, splashing into the swimming pool below measuring 17m x 4m x 1.3m ‚Ä¢ The swimming pool has no shallow end ‚Ä¢ The pool is set to normal temperature‚Ä¢ There are six lounge chairs and three pool umbrellas‚Ä¢ Pool towels are provided COMMON AREAS: ‚Ä¢ The dining and kitchen areas are conveniently located next to each other, offering an open and inviting space. ‚Ä¢ The living area, on the other hand, provides a separate, air-conditioned room for relaxation on the ground floor. ‚Ä¢ There‚Äôs also a balcony, rattan chairs and ceiling fans, as well as a roofed al-fresco sitting area by the pool. KITCHEN & DINING: ‚Ä¢ The kitchen is equipped with oven, refrigerator, Nespresso coffee machine, juicer, blender, toaster, rice cooker, electric kettle, electric stove, water dispenser as well as essential cooking tools, cutlery and wine glasses.‚Ä¢ The villa has two indoor dining areas and each can seat up to 12 guests. There is also additional seating at the kitchen counter that can seat 4 guests.‚Ä¢ The in-house cook is experienced in cooking Western, Indonesian and Asian cuisine, as well as vegetarian and children‚Äôs dishes. ‚Ä¢ Special requests can be accommodated, including strict diets. ‚Ä¢ All meals (breakfast, lunch, dinner, floating breakfast) can be arranged in advance. ‚Ä¢ Chef shopping service and a pre-arrival shopping service charged at grocery bill + 15% handling fee. WELLNESS: ‚Ä¢ The villa has an open gym, ice bath and private yoga deck, with additional yoga lessons provided upon request (extra charge). ENTERTAINMENT: ‚Ä¢ High-speed WiFi throughout and a dedicated media room equipped with an 85-inch Smart TV with Netflix.‚Ä¢ There‚Äôs also a pool table on the first floor. CAPACITY & EXTRA BEDDING: ‚Ä¢ Extra beds are not available at this property.‚Ä¢ This property is designed to comfortably sleep 12 people. Additional guests are not allowed. title: BATU KAYU Eco Surf Lodges - Villa Markisa
description: Enjoy your stay in one of our cozy beach front bungalows right in front of the main surf break in Medewi. Our newly built bungalow is only a few steps away from the main surf break in Medewi and right next to the fishing village/market. The colorful fishing boats are parked right on our beach front and there is always a buzz with fishermen going out to sea for their daily catch.  We also have BBQ and breakfast sets available at an additional cost, these are not included.The spaceThis quirky bungalow looks like something out of a children‚Äôs book. Built almost entirely out of bamboo, it hosts a huge round window facing the ocean that allows you to look out onto the surf right from your bed. A comfortable net serves as a balcony, allowing for the most incredible chill-out space overlooking the surf, beach and lush gardens. Sunsets from this net are beyond words.The bathroom is small but it‚Äôs transparent ceiling makes it feel bright and spacious. It also has its own window with direct line of sight onto another of Medewi‚Äôs beach breaks. The bungalow has a private fully equipped kitchen an outdoor shower and lots of dining space.Our luscious garden is open for all our guests and it has a fire pit that doubles as a BBQ area.Guest accessOur bungalows are situated right at the beach front, allowing our guests to have easy access to to Medewi‚Äôs main surf break and to experience the local atmosphere.The locals are very friendly and welcoming. The colorful fishing boats are parked right on our beach front and there is always a buzz with fishermen going out to sea for their daily catch.Guests have full access to our gardens, including outdoor dinning table and bbq area.Outdoor showers and surfboard racks are available for all our guests.Other things to noteThe neighborhood in Medewi is mostly Muslim and that requires that our guests become aware of the calls for prayer that happens 5 times per day, including the first at around 5am (great timing for that morning surf). The tropical gardens around the property host a increasing variety of fruits and tropical plants grown organically. This means that there is also many birds, bees and other cute insects around. Most of them stay way out of our bungalows but occasionally our guest might find a small bug or two venturing inside the room.Please note that we are often doing some construction work happening during the daytime on the property. The construction work is only happening in between 9am and 5pm and it‚Äôs done mostly with hand tools to keep the noise levels as low as possible, but at times will be a little noisy. The four craftsmen working for us have been doing so since we started our project. They are currently building our fifth bungalow. These local men are our neighbors and we consider them a part of our Medewi ‚Äúfamily‚Äù. They are all very nice, friendly and respectful. Watching them hand craft our bamboo bungalows can be quite a positive experience and we hope it won‚Äôt stop you from booking your stay at Batu Kayu.

title: Rain House - 3 bedroom pool villa
description: RUMAH HUJAN (The House of Rain)Where the jungle meets the sky.A refined 3-bedroom villa, perched on the edge of the Wos River, immersed in nature facing the sacred Campuhan Ridge. This house is a tribute to tranquility, where soft linen curtains move with the breeze, and reclaimed wood whispers stories of the past. This house features a spacious open-plan living area, a hand-carved dining table, and a heated infinity pool, perfect for gazing into the misty valley at dawn.The spaceOVERVIEW RUMAH HUJANOn a property of 2,400 sqm, the house itself and in addition to extensive outdoor patios and a 12 x 4 meter heated infinity pool, the house itself has a floor surface of approximately 300 sqm.The living-room and dining-room share a lofty open space of 60 sqm and the 3 bedrooms:Living and Dining Area: The heart of the villa features an open-plan space furnished with oversized linen sofas and a hammock for relaxation. A dining table seating ten offers a perfect setting for communal meals.Bedrooms (all with air-conditioning):Melati (Bedroom One): Measuring 23 square meters, this room boasts a queen-size bed (180 cm x 200 cm) draped with a linen mosquito net. Guests can enjoy sunrise views over the pool, garden, and jungle. The en-suite bathroom includes an outdoor rain shower, immersing guests in the natural surroundings.Rimba (Bedroom Two): At 25 square meters, Rimba features a king-size bed (200 cm x 200 cm) under a canopy roof. The room‚Äôs interiors reflect its natural environment with hardwood floors and woven wardrobes. An outdoor shower enhances the connection to nature.Raja (Bedroom Three): The most private of the bedrooms, Raja spans 22 square meters and is surrounded on three sides by glass, offering an immersive nature experience. It includes a king-size bed (200 cm x 200 cm), a walk-in wardrobe, and an en-suite bathroom with both an indoor bathtub and an outdoor shower.Outdoor Amenities: A large timber deck accompanies a 12x4 meter heated, mild saltwater infinity pool that overlooks the valley below, providing a tranquil space to unwind.Guest accessThe estate shares common access, parking, security, and gardens where fresh coconuts, papayas, passion fruit grow. The estate also shares a 200sq.m. floor surface bamboo pavilion, designed and built by Ibuku (creators of the Green School) and Studio Jencquel.Please enjoy the bamboo pavillion - play some football or basketball with your kids or use the weights and bench that are available. We are happy to help you with any preparations or bring some cold coconut water as refreshment.Other things to noteLOCATIONTucked away in a gorgeous natural setting off the main road, Rumah Hujan is located about 2.5km from Ubud centre and close enough to walk to some of Ubud‚Äôs finest dining spots and shops.DESIGNAll villa architecture and interiors as well as landscaping have been created by Studio Jenquel. The studio draws on the principles of slow design, utilizing adaptive and sustainable approaches. The badminton pavilion was created by Studio Jenquel together with Ibuku, renowned for their groundbreaking designs using bamboo.SERVICEThoughtful Service, Designed for DiscretionAt Rumah Hujan, hospitality is seamless, intuitive, and unobtrusive. Every detail is considered, yet nothing is imposed.HOUSEKEEPING & AMENITIESEveryday comfortDaily housekeeping ensures that your surroundings remain fresh and inviting, with water jugs replenished and beds turned down in the evening.Laundry services are available through a trusted local provider. While we facilitate the process, we cannot take responsibility for the final result. Clothes are returned neatly pressed in woven wicker baskets, in keeping with the estate‚Äôs understated elegance.Sensatia Botanicals body care products, crafted in Bali from all-natural ingredients, are placed in each bathroom, enhancing the experience of outdoor showers and deep, restorative baths.PRIVATE COOKHome-cooked, reimaginedThe kitchen at Rumah Hujan is not a restaurant‚Äîit is an extension of home. Meals are not simply prepared; they are crafted with care, using seasonal ingredients from local markets and organic gardens. Dining here is communal and intentional, meant to be shared and savored without hurry.‚Ä¢ Lunch/Dinner Service ‚Äì 500,000 IDR per meal (+ groceries).‚Ä¢ Both Lunch & Dinner ‚Äì 800,000 IDR/day.To ensure the freshest ingredients, we ask that you share your preferred dining time and menu selection at least one day in advance. Menus are available at the villas to select from. BREAKFASTBreakfast is a quiet, unhurried ritual‚Äîa simple yet elegant start to the day. Freshly squeezed juices, tropical fruits, Balinese granola, and homemade pastries are served on handcrafted ceramics, inviting you to ease into the morning.Served between 7.30am ‚Äì 10am. For early risers, we offer a fruit plate and juice, placed in your fridge the evening before. Just let us know in advance.WELLNESS Restore, Reset, ReconnectThe massage treatments here are not fleeting trends. They are centuries-old practices, passed down through generations‚Äîtechniques refined, understood, and honed by those who have studied the body in ways that defy explanation. They do not simply relax you. They realign you. They remember you.Healing beyond the bodySome treatments go deeper‚Äîbeyond muscle, beyond tension‚Äîinto something less tangible, yet just as essential. These are not simply therapies, but practices steeped in centuries of wisdom, designed to restore balance where modern life often disrupts it.YOGA & FITNESSMovement, Strength, and RestorationAt Rumah Hujan, movement is not just about fitness‚Äîit is about presence, rhythm, and flow. Whether engaging in a fast-paced game of badminton, a strength and conditioning session, or a quiet morning of yoga, the estate‚Äôs bamboo pavilion and open-air spaces provide a setting for both physical renewal and mental clarity.Badminton, and Kids Badminton FunPrivate sessions with instructor take place in our custom-built bamboo pavilion, a space designed for play and movement.Personal Training and Swimming For those looking for a personalized strength and conditioning experience, Coach Omar brings world-class expertise. A former Indonesian national swimmer and Olympic coach, Omar specializes in mobility training, postural correction, and high-performance fitness techniques.YogaA yoga session at Rumah Hujan is not just exercise‚Äîit is a practice of realignment. Whether you are seeking greater flexibility, a deeper meditative state, or a dynamic flow to build strength, each class is personalized to your needs.EXPLORING BALIA Land of Rituals, Stories, and BeautyBali is an island of quiet rituals and dramatic landscapes, where nature and spirituality are woven into daily life. From sacred bird migrations to ancient trance dances, from fast-moving rivers to centuries-old art forms, each experience offers a glimpse into a culture shaped by time, devotion, and the natural world. Our Villa manager is happy to help you discover and book your adventures and experiences. A Culinary Journey Through UbudUbud is a place where food is not just nourishment but an experience‚Äîwhere chefs work with local farmers, flavors are deeply rooted in tradition, and dining is a leisurely affair meant to be savored, not rushed. Whether it‚Äôs a wood-fired Italian meal, a plant-based feast, or a modern take on Indonesian classics, we are happy to recommend  the restaurants that define Ubud‚Äôs culinary landscape.EFFORTLESS LIVING, TOTAL PRIVACYMore than a luxury hotel, Rumah Hujan Estate is a bespoke retreat offering the kind of privacy and care rarely found in traditional accommodations. Whether you‚Äôre seeking solitude, celebration, or creative inspiration, this is a space where you can simply be.We are inviting you to reset. Rumah Hujan is a retreat, a rhythm, a way of living. There are no distractions here‚Äîjust space to breathe, to think, to reconnect with what matters. Because real luxury isn‚Äôt about how much you have‚Äîit‚Äôs about how fully you experience it.

title: Magical Treehouse Escape | Private Pool, Breakfast
description: Elevated treehouse on a rare ridge above the valley, our retreat features just three private treehouses within an exclusive eight-villa estate. Secure, private, and supported by an on-site team, it combines the calm of Balinese village life with the ease of modern comfort.The spaceCreated for people who value serenity, privacy, and a genuine connection to Bali‚Äôs culture & landscape. Each treehouse offers:-Glass floors revealing the jungle garden below-Two spacious bedrooms, each with luxury ensuite + bathtub-Skylights for natural light & stargazing-Large enclosed living area with smart TV-Treehouse bridge, suspended over the jungle-Floor-to-ceiling windows with breathtaking panoramic valley views-Private glass swimming pool overlooking the jungle-Private balcony for morning coffee & sunset viewsContemporary kitchen with cooktop & dining essentials-Dedicated office spaceUnlike busy central Ubud, our ridge offers true peace, safety, and privacy, yet remains less than 3 miles from world-class dining, yoga studios, artisan shops, and cultural landmarks.Guests can immerse themselves in the rhythm of Balinese village life ‚Äî hearing temple bells echo across the valley, watching farmers tend the rice fields, and feeling the warmth of a community deeply rooted in tradition.Guest accessFrom the moment you arrive, whether you park in our private car park or are dropped off at the entrance, our reception team will be waiting with a complimentary refreshment. Your luggage will be taken care of as staff escort you to your villa for a seamless check-in ‚Äî so you can begin your stay relaxed and refreshed. Each booking has access to a private villa and amenities.Other things to notePlease note, guests will be required to fill out a check-in form for their stay. This is a requirement of all our guests that stay with us, access to our home will only be provided after the completion of our form.When booking, you‚Äôll be allocated one of our three private treehouses. While the floor plan is identical, there may be variations in bathroom finishes or interior details. Our property sits above a lush jungle valley, fully immersed in Bali‚Äôs natural surroundings and village life. While we carry out weekly professional pest control, occasional encounters with insects may occur. Guests may hear sounds from the local community ‚Äî such as temple chimes, ceremonies, or roosters. While there are none within our private estate, these are part of Balinese life and are beyond our control.Our team is available from 7:00am ‚Äì 10:00pm. For arrivals outside these hours, a late check-in fee of IDR 150,000 applies, to support staff overtime.

description: Experience the ultimate Bali getaway at this stunning 4-bedroom villa plus a staff room, located within walking distance to Pererenan Beach. Designed with modern elegance and comfort, the villa spans across three floors with private elevator access, offering both convenience and luxury.The spaceWelcome to Villa Ninni, a stunning 4-bedroom villa with an additional staff room, gracefully built on a 500 sqm plot surrounded by tranquil rice fields in the premium Pererenan Beach area, just a short walk from the ocean.With each bedroom is uniquely designed with its own color theme and philosophy:1. The sound proof aluminum door frame is reducing the noise of the wave for some who is prefer to sleep in more quite ambiance The master suite is set up with a double (king size) bed and a bath tub with ocean view. Bedroom number three are can be configured to a family suites with a single king size bed dan four kids bunk bed. You can do as little or as much as you wish, all the time being looked after by our villa manager Mr Topik and the other team  The Shambala Villa is one of the newest villas in Lembongan, offers all you would expect from a luxury villa, Book now and let‚Äôs make your dream holidays come true!Guest accessThe whole villaOther things to noteInclusionHouse keeper 7am to 3pm Daily breakfast Security guard 9pm to 6am the next day Pick up and drop off from Lembongan boat pier.

title: Villa Manis ‚Äì Luxury 8BR Near Pererenan Beach
description: Welcome to Villa Manis Canggu ‚Äî a spacious 8-bedroom luxury villa perfect for families, big groups, and wellness retreats. Located in the heart of Canggu near beach clubs, caf√©s, and top dining hotspots. Enjoy a private pool, jacuzzi, sauna, gym, and billiard table. Each bedroom features an ensuite for comfort and privacy. Ideal for special celebrations or a relaxing Bali escape. Your private tropical oasis awaits!The spaceNestled in Pererenan, Bali, Villa Manis Canggu is an expansive 8-bedroom luxury villa nestled in the peaceful Pererenan area ‚Äî just 5 minutes from the beach and 10 minutes from Canggu‚Äôs lively hotspots. Set on a stunning 3,500 sqm estate surrounded by tropical gardens and rice field views, this villa is designed for large groups seeking privacy, comfort, and premium service.Each bedroom is thoughtfully designed with plush king or twin beds, air-conditioning, high-speed Wi-Fi, a Smart TV, and an ensuite bathroom ‚Äî ensuring the perfect blend of relaxation and convenience. The master suite offers extra space and a serene rice field panorama, ideal for slow mornings and peaceful nights.At the heart of the villa, a spacious open-plan pavilion features a stylish lounge, dining area, and curated Balinese d√©cor, creating the perfect setting for family gatherings and celebrations.A true highlight of Villa Manis Canggu is its abundance of wellness and recreation facilities. Unwind in the sauna, private jacuzzi, or enjoy a soothing treatment at the in-house spa. Keep up your routine in the fully equipped gym, or settle into a fun evening in the media room with Netflix and a billiard table.Step outside to experience one of the villa‚Äôs most impressive features ‚Äî a massive 17m x 6m private swimming pool accompanied by a 6m x 6m x 1m kid‚Äôs pool for family fun. The expansive garden offers plenty of space for events, yoga sessions, and unforgettable celebrations under Bali‚Äôs tropical sky.With dedicated staff committed to ensuring your stay is seamless, Villa Manis Canggu offers everything you need for a memorable getaway, whether you‚Äôre planning a reunion with friends, a wedding party stay, a wellness retreat, or a luxury family holiday.Your private paradise awaits ‚Äî where luxury meets authenticity in Bali‚Äôs most sought-after destination.(Please note that your Netflix and YouTube accounts will be used to log in. Ensure you log out before checking out to protect your account from unauthorized use.)STAFF AND SERVICES INCLUDED- Dedicated Villa Manager- Daily Housekeeping- Garden and Pool StaffEXTRA COSTS (advance notice may be required):- Villa pre-stocking: Groceries and beverages (subject to an additional service fee).- Breakfast by Chef start from IDR 300.000 per person (minimum 2 guests).- Airport transfers: Convenient pick-up and drop-off services.- Driving service: Reliable and professional drivers available on request.- Activities and excursions: Customized experiences to explore Bali.- In-villa massage services: Relax and rejuvenate in your villa's comfort.- Baby-sitting service: Experienced caretakers for your little ones.Guest accessThis listing is for the entire unit, so you will have the Villa for yourself and enjoy all access to the property!Other things to note‚Ä¢ Security deposit is required, minimum IDR 5 Million Rupiah. A deposit will be requested by the villa manager upon arrival and will be refunded at the end of the rental period , after deducting :‚Ä¢ All additional expenses incured on the guest‚Äôs behalf ( e.g. additional charge for goods, services and staff which have not been directly paid by the guest, transport, spa, etc)‚Ä¢ The cost of replacement or repair for loss or damage to the property or its surrounds or contents caused during the rental period.‚Ä¢ Payments by traveller's Cheques, other currencies or personal cheques, will not be accepted.‚Ä¢ For any events (must be confirmed the latest 1 week prior) please refer to event Rules & Regulations from the Owner & Management

title: Sawah View Pool Villa in Tampaksiring - Bambootel
description: Please message us for further details as we have a different layout in each villa.Introducing the signature villa from Bambootel Sawah View, Sawah View Pool Villa, where luxury meets nature in a peaceful atmosphere. Accommodating up to two guests, each villa comes with a comfortable king size bed in an air-conditioned room and a queen size bed in a partially open room, ensuring a comfortable night's sleep.The spaceBeds and Bedding:1 King and 1 Queen size bedMaximum occupancy: 2Pillowtop mattress, Featherbed, and DuvetVilla Features:Air conditionedPrivate swimming poolTwo outdoor lounging balesHammock/Pool sofaFurniture and Furnishing:Chairs and TableSafe, in roomElectric outletPhone & Internet:Multi line telephoneWi-Fi, complimentaryBathroom:Indoor bathroom with seperate rainshower and toiletSignature Bambootel toiletriesBathrobesslippersHair dryerFood & Beverage:Coffee/Tea MakerRefrigrated private mini barRoom service 7 AM - 11 PMEntertainment:LCD TVHouse of MarleyHospitality Service: Butler serviceTurndown serviceOther things to noteEnjoy the following special benefits including:-  Daily breakfast for 2 people.- Welcome drink on arrival at the resort (choice of sparkling wine or non-alcoholic refreshment).- Complimentary use of the in-villa espresso machine, tea, and coffee-making facilities.- Complimentary in-villa house-bottled water replenished unlimited times throughout the stay.- Complimentary daily wellness activities: Yoga, Breath Work, Sound Healing.- Complimentary Balinese cultural activations.- Complimentary daily morning walks.- Daily usage of fitness facilities.   - Hairdryer & smart TV in the villa.- Iron and iron boards available on request.- Complimentary daily a glass of sunset cocktail.            - High speed Wi-Fi internet access.

title: Veni Vidi Vici w/ Sport Facilities&SpectacularView
description: Villa Veni Vidi Vici prides itself as being one of the most state of the art and complete villas in the entire island, with modern & full appliances, a home gym, basketball and badminton court,  tennis court, hanging gazebo, water slides, petanque court, trampoline, billiard table, private spa room, outdoor cinema & home cinema. With a modern fully furnished kitchen, a fully mechanical and motorized stove + exhaust system sits across the large temperature controlled cooler for drinks and liquorThe spaceThis fully equipped 6 bedroom villa is located in the most peaceful and serene corner of Ubud, in Pejeng Kawan. With only a 10 minute drive to the heart of Ubud and its host of unforgettable art centres, museums and restaurants. With spectacular rice field views accompanying your every venture outside the spacious living room, you are then greeted by the grand Mt. Agung which can be viewed from almost every room in the villa. The swimming pool loops around the entirety of the villa, where a large water slide drops down from the second floorOther facilities include a fully equipped home gym, a basketball + badminton court, a tennis court and a huge hanging gazebo that stands right next to the tennis court. All of these facilities are located in the back portions of the villa. In other area, next to the trampoline overlooking the serene and signature rice fields of Ubud, a gift for fans of P√©tanque with your very own P√©tanque court will surely make your day.The home theatre housed within the villa has an occupancy of 12, with fully reclining chairs and Villa Veni Vidi Vici branded super soft blankets to enhance your movie watching experience! A small water pool along with small slides and rides are available for children next to the basketball + badminton court in the southern portions of the villa.Road access towards the villa is great, with an adequate parking space which can be found near the entrance of the villaEvery room is equipped with a large HDTV which has Netflix and Smart TV capabilities, if there are any issues please do not hesitate to contact the villa butler. Each bathroom is also equipped with a modern sensor equipped toilet, which can automatically open and close according to your presence.The gym is equipped fully, with a treadmill, benchpress machine, stationary cycle, and (others) please be careful during use of equipment within the gymThere are water slides which are connected to the water pump system, which means the use of the water slide at night will not be permitted as it might create scratches or aberrations if no water is flowing through the water slide. Villa Veni Vidi Vici is the best spot to enjoy your perfect holiday destination as it will pamper you with the most beautiful view of ricefields and volcano.Guests can use the following things:- fully equipped kitchen- home gym- home cinema- outdoor cinema- basketball & badminton court- tennis court with fully equipped tennis equipment- billiard table- hanging gazebo- children waterpark- sliding on the pool- fully equipped petanque court- trampoline and swing- private spa room(Please note that your Netflix and YouTube accounts will be used to log in. Ensure you log out before checking out to protect your account from unauthorized use.)STAFF AND SERVICES INCLUDED- Dedicated Villa Manager- Villa Host (Ubud) or Staff (Seminyak/Bukit)- Daily Housekeeping- Garden and Pool StaffEXTRA COSTS (advance notice may be required):- Villa pre-stocking: Groceries and beverages (subject to an additional service fee).- Breakfast by Villa Host (Ubud ONLY): IDR 120.000 per person per meal as a cover charge (minimum 4 guests).- Floating breakfast: IDR 150.000 per tray (for up to 4 guests).- In-villa Chef: Arranged through our trusted partner (see FAQs for details).- Airport transfers: Convenient pick-up and drop-off services.- Driving service: Reliable and professional drivers available on request.- Activities and excursions: Customized experiences to explore Bali.- In-villa massage services: Relax and rejuvenate in your villa's comfort.- Baby-sitting service: Experienced caretakers for your little ones.- Security guards: Additional safety and peace of mind.- Flowers arrangements: Custom designs to enhance your stay.Guest accessRoad Access: Many villas have narrow road access, often suitable for motorcycles only. We can assist with transportation arrangements if needed.Other things to noteIf Nearby Construction Occurs: We value your peaceful stay. In the rare event of construction in our area, our team is ready to assist with any comfort concerns. While neighborhood activities are beyond our control, your relaxation remains our priority. Please don't hesitate to contact us if you need anything to enhance your experience.Natural Ventilation: Experience the refreshing breeze of Bali with our open-air living spaces, designed to maximize natural airflow, providing an eco-friendly alternative to air conditioning or fans.Vendor Services: To ensure the villa's equipment and your safety, our dedicated team manages all vendor services within the villa, including spa, personal training, decorations, private chefs, yoga, photography, and villa equipment. Using external vendors is strictly prohibited and will result in a fine of IDR 2.000.000.Waste Management: Contribute to Bali's sustainable efforts by participating in our waste separation program. We provide three bins for organic, inorganic, and residual waste in your villa.Sustainable Amenities: We provide Sensatia Botanicals, a locally founded skincare brand, as bathroom amenities (hand soap, body soap, shampoo, and conditioner). Made in Bali with 100% natural, cruelty-free ingredients, this partnership reflects our support for sustainability and local initiatives, including plastic recycling and beach cleanups.Natural Charm: Our villas embrace Bali's tropical beauty, where the sounds of nature‚Äîgeckos and insects‚Äîcreate a serene ambiance. The open design may occasionally welcome wildlife, despite regular pest control. Geckos, symbols of good luck in Balinese culture, and other creatures are vital to the ecosystem.  Cultural Respect: In Ubud and Bukit, monkeys may be present‚Äîplease refrain from feeding or interacting with them. Surrounding landscapes, like jungles, rice fields, and local farms (e.g., duck, chicken or pig), are not part of the villa property and may be accessed by residents, with changes beyond our control. We appreciate your respect for Bali‚Äôs natural and cultural heritage.FAQsQ: What time is the check-in policy?A: Our dedicated staff ensures a smooth check-in process. Check-in starts at 14:00 for 1-3 bedroom villas and at 15:00 for 4-6 bedroom villas. Luggage drop-off is welcome after 11:00 as we prepare your villa. Please note, a late check-in fee of IDR 200.000 applies for arrivals after 20:00 to cover staff overtime, as our staff does not stand by the villa all the time.Q: What time is the check-out policy?A: Our check-out time is at 11:00 by default. Late check-out is subject to availability and involves extra charge. Please note that for any late check-out between 11:00 ‚Äì 18:00, an additional charge of 50% of the Daily Villa Rate will apply. Any check-out after 18:00, will be charged at a full day's Daily Villa Rate. If you need to store your luggage after check-out time, you are welcome to do so.Q: Is breakfast included in the booking? How do we order the chef's service?A: Breakfast is not included in the room rate. However, you can easily arrange breakfast by contacting our reservation or concierge team. We offer a variety of menu options prepared by our dedicated private chef, right in your villa. The cost is IDR 160.000 per person, with a minimum order for 5 guests. You can indulge in a floating breakfast for an additional fee of IDR 150.000 per tray.For lunch and dinner, we offer enhanced services, including set menus, live BBQ cooking, ethnic cuisines, and even fine dining prepared by a Michelin-star chef, all cooked in the villa. Prices for lunch and dinner start at IDR 450.000 per person. Please note that terms and conditions apply for booking.Additionally, our villa features a fully equipped kitchen, allowing you the flexibility to prepare your own meals if you prefer. Whether you choose to dine in or savor a chef‚Äôs touch, our team is here to ensure a seamless and enjoyable experience.Q: Do we have a housekeeping service every day?A: Absolutely! Daily housekeeping is provided from 9:00 to 17:00. Linens are changed every third day for sustainability. To ensure privacy, please coordinate with your Villa Host or Staff for a convenient cleaning time. Your comfort is our priority.Q: Can we have extra clean towels?A: Certainly! We are happy to provide extra towels, subject to availability. Please feel free to reach out to your Villa Host or Staff, and we‚Äôll do our best to accommodate your request promptly.Q: What is the maximum occupancy for this 6-bedroom villa? Can I have extra beds?A: This villa comfortably accommodates up to 12 guests. However, it can host a maximum of 14 guests, with the 13th and 14th guests considered as extra. An additional fee of IDR 1.150.000/night/person applies. Should you require extra beds, please feel free to let us know, and we‚Äôll be happy to assist in making arrangements for your group‚Äôs comfort.

title: Santa Monica&Kala 12BR Connecting Villa,River View
description: You are most welcome to indulge your senses with a truly large group of friends or family with these two connecting villas located side by side to each other!The spaceThe first villa, also named Villa Santa Monica, you will be amazed at how inviting every corner of the villa truly is, with a semi-circle lounge pool as an introduction to the pure enjoyment the following parts of the villa will bring you, this 3 storey, 6 bedroom villa contains a fully functioning waterslide that begins at the top of the villa and gracefully makes its way down to the swimming pool down belowEach moment in this villa you are immersed in nature, amazing memories, truly a capable and fully equipped villa that stands out compared to possibly any other villa in the whole of Bali. We welcome you with open arms to Villa Santa Monica. Next to it via the connecting door you are welcomed into Villa Kala, which is also a fully equipped, 6 bedroom villa that easily is capable for even the largest groups! With a similar three floor cascading layout as the villa next door, the breathtaking jungle views surround your every moment here! With a total of 12 bedrooms in total, the opportunities are absolutely endless! You can have either complete privacy or have a joined experience with your best friends or family whilst also indulging in truly unbelievable comfort in both villas!
