title: Villa Rosita 7BR Oceanfront- Chef, Gym, Pool Table
description: Experience serenity at Villa Rosita, a private oceanfront villa perfect for family vacations and peaceful escapes. The gardens, with a koi pond and bale, offer a relaxing setting. Cool off in the infinity pool or unwind in the jacuzzi. Inside, find a spacious living room with entertainment systems and a dining area. Relax in ocean-view or garden-view suites, or stay active in the private gym. Every detail adds warmth, enhanced by unique artwork and bespoke furniture.The spaceVilla Rosita is a stunning private oceanfront retreat perfect for families, groups, and special gatherings. Set in lush tropical gardens, it offers 7 spacious bedrooms, a 15m infinity pool, private gym, games room with pool table, outdoor jacuzzi, and full staff including a private chef. Enjoy breathtaking ocean views, peaceful surroundings, and warm Balinese hospitality.The Space	‚Ä¢	7 bedrooms (king, twin, and bunk options)	‚Ä¢	All bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms (except the bunk room, which shares)	‚Ä¢	Large open-plan living and dining areas	‚Ä¢	15m private infinity pool overlooking the ocean	‚Ä¢	Outdoor jacuzzi	‚Ä¢	Games room with pool table	‚Ä¢	Private gym	‚Ä¢	Lush gardens with koi pond and traditional bale	‚Ä¢	Expansive patio with uninterrupted sea viewsBedrooms:	‚Ä¢	Bedroom 1 (Downstairs Ocean View Double): King-size bed, large ensuite with bath, sea views, and entertainment system.	‚Ä¢	Bedroom 2 (Upstairs Main Ocean View Double): Largest room with balcony, lounge area, ensuite with jacuzzi bath, and panoramic ocean views.	‚Ä¢	Bedroom 3 (Upstairs Ocean View Double): Balcony with sea views, king-size bed, ensuite bathroom.	‚Ä¢	Bedroom 4 (Upstairs Volcano & Garden View): King or twin setup, ensuite, views of Mount Agung and rice fields.	‚Ä¢	Bedroom 5 (Upstairs Volcano & Garden View): King-size bed, balcony, shares bathroom with Bedroom 6.	‚Ä¢	Bedroom 6 (Upstairs Bunk Room): Two adult-size bunk beds, shares bathroom with Bedroom 5, ideal for families.	‚Ä¢	Bedroom 7 (Upstairs Twin/Double): Flexible twin/double setup, ensuite, cozy and private.Guest accessStandard rental rate is based on 5 bedrooms/maximum 10 guests. With full access to all facilities of the villa, however to use the 6 or 7th bedroom or have more than 10 guests charges apply.Other things to noteVilla Rosita has played host to many a celebration and wedding, the Oceanfront location and spectacular views make it a popular choice.If you wish to hold an event at the villa please contact us directly, as there may be additional event fees, depending on the number of people for the event and the duration and preparation required for the event.Due to the villa‚Äôs prime oceanfront location, the sound of the sea can be heard inside, particularly on windier nights. During periods of strong surf, the impact of the waves may also be felt around the infinity pool and outdoor areas.The location is perfect for those seeking peace and relaxation, away from commercial areas. There are no bars or restaurants within walking distance, ensuring a tranquil setting. It also serves as an excellent base for day trips and exploring Bali‚Äôs scenic East Coast.Our dedicated Chef is included in the price of the villa, however the cost of the food is against charge. We operate a groceries system meaning that you will pay the receipts for the cost of the ingredients for any meals or food plus a 20% villa charge.Drinking water, Local tea and filter coffee are included as standard in the rental rate.

title: Hideout Element
description: Step into Hideout Element - our newest addition, sanctuary of elemental inspiration, where raw, immersive eco-design meets high-concept art. Nestled high above a lush green valley with soul-stirring vistas of sacred Gunung Agung volcano, jungles and shimmering rice paddies. Each natural texture, curve, and corner is curated to resonate with the earth‚Äôs core elements, pulling you into a sensory dialogue with the landscape.The spaceStep into Hideout Element - our newest addition, sanctuary of elemental inspiration, where raw, immersive eco-design meets high-concept art. Nestled high above a lush green valley with soul-stirring vistas of sacred Gunung Agung volcano, jungles and shimmering rice paddies. Each natural texture, curve, and corner is curated to resonate with the earth‚Äôs core elements, pulling you into a sensory dialogue with the landscape.Created as a eco-luxe escape for two, Hideout Element combines cozy and cutting edge modern eco design with pure art-house appeal. Sink into layered nooks in the open living area, or stretch out on the woven hanging net that sways in the jungle canopy. Outside, the infinity-edge jacuzzi mirrors the surrounding beauty and shapes of the ‚Äúsawah‚Äù rice fields. An atmospheric bonfire invites stargazing nights, drinks or meditations under Bali‚Äôs clearest star-filled skies which are often filled with fireflies. Every aspect is thoughtfully designed to bring a different experience, such as immersive rain-shower within a stone cave-like bathroom. Hideout Element is also equipped with a bamboo kitchen that incorporates local textures that resonate with Hideout‚Äôs commitment to sustainable, artful design.Retreat upstairs to a 360¬∞ panorama bedroom like no other, where the custom-made rotating round bed allows you to chase sunrise, sunset, or starlit skies through an private skylight - your own portal to the universe. With floor-to-ceiling windows, AC, Netflix, and a minimalist aesthetic, the bedroom is a secluded dreamscape. Accessed via a private 65 step raised wooden jungle pathway, Hideout Element is as much a journey as it is a destination, blending art, nature, and design in a new level of hideout experience.Prepare for a truly unique experience in one of Bali‚Äôs most stunning natural settings.- AC- Smart TV (Netflix)- Round bed- Infinity jacuzzi- Bonfire- Fridge, freezer- Nespresso machine- Limited menu delivery from Bistro- In-house massage- Hanging net- Books/games- Safebox- Fast wifi

title: NEW! Luxe designer Villa! Canggu / N1
description: ARCHESTET VILLAS is a collection of absolutely new exquisitely designed smart villas nestled in the heart of Canggu. Experience the convenience of being just minutes away from the trendiest restaurants, nightlife, luxurious SPAs, fitness centres, boutique shopping,  premier beach clubs, and the iconic Batu Belig and Berawa beaches.The spaceAs part of our exclusive villa collection, this villa provides premium services such as daily housekeeping and a personal villa manager, ensuring an effortless and luxurious stay.The interiors feature minimalist elegance, characterized by clean lines and panoramic soundproof windows that flood spaces with beautiful natural light while maintaining serene tranquility. Expansive mirrors throughout amplify the sense of space, creating captivating reflections and enhancing brightness.Step outside to discover a lush garden, relaxing chill-out area, and a sparkling private pool. Advanced smart home technology enables effortless control of lighting, music, curtains, and ambiance, perfect for creating the ideal mood for dining, movie nights, or relaxation.Enjoy exceptional sound quality from the sophisticated audio system, and cozy evenings by the electric fireplace with ambient lighting. Additionally, we prioritize luxury through superior air and water quality, thanks to our state-of-the-art filtration systems.Dear Guests,please note that at the entrance to the villa complex there is a construction site. Currently, the construction activity is minimal, not noisy, and generally does not cause any disturbance. The villa's windows are soundproofed, ensuring a peaceful and quiet environment indoors. Construction work is limited to the hours of 9 am to 5 pm.Unmatched luxury & smart home features:- Secured area- Villa: 250 sqm, land: 220 sqm- Free private parking: garage for a car and two motorbikes- Fingerprint entrance (smart lock)- 3 Spacious bedrooms ‚Äì each with a king-size bed for ultimate relaxation- 3 Elegant bathrooms ‚Äì equipped with premium smart toilets, showers and toiletries- 1 Guest restroom, equipped with a Samsung washing machine with dryer function ‚Äì modern convenience for effortless laundry- Fully equipped kitchen (oven, microwave, dishwasher, cooler, blender) ‚Äì designed for culinary enthusiasts. Cook and dine in style with premium appliances.- Grand living space ‚Äì featuring 3.7m-high ceilings for an airy, open feel- Samsung 4K 75-Inch TV ‚Äì for an immersive entertainment experience- Bose stereo system ‚Äì high-quality sound for music and movies- Customizable lighting ‚Äì 5 modes to set the perfect ambiance (voice or panel control)- Electric fireplace - for cosy evenings- Master bedroom dressing room ‚Äì includes a huge mirror for added convenience- Separate make-up room with professional lighting- Dyson hair dryer & vacuum cleaner ‚Äì premium appliances for everyday ease- Tefal Pro Style 1800-Watt garment steamer - for perfectly smooth clothes - Master bedroom terrace - equipped with comfortable chair- Home office area - to work in silence and privacy- Each room is equipped with a laptop-size safety box. Please use it to store your valuables and money!- Smart home system ‚Äì control lighting, curtains, and appliances via voice or control panel- Expansive soundproof glass windows - Electric curtains ‚Äì effortlessly adjustable with voice or control panel- Advanced water filtration system ‚Äì ensures clean, fresh water throughout- Air filtration system- Private patio with a comfortable sofa, electric barbecue and chill zone in a lush garden ‚Äì to relax in your own serene sanctuary- Private pool 9x3mCapacity & Extra bedding:- The maximum capacity is 6 adults- No extra bedsKids care:For toddlers we provide the following supplies free of charge:- 1 Baby cot with 2 sets of bedsheets- 1 Baby highchair- 1 Baby night safety guard: this device is for co-sleeping and prevents babies from falling- 1 Baby play mat with baby toys: it keeps kids warm while playing on the floor- 1 Baby step and toilet seat Children up to 8 y.o., sharing existing bedding, stay for free. The villa can accommodate up to 3 children (sharing existing bedding)  or using available baby cot for free a the basic price.Included amenities & services:- Cleaning services available upon request - six days a week, except Sundays- Bedlinen / Towel changing 2 times a week. title: Oceanview 4br Villa,Infinity Pool in East Bali
description: Villa Gumamela | 5-Star Luxury Retreat with Spectacular Ocean Views in CandidasaWelcome to Villa Gumamela, the largest luxury villa in Candidasa and a true 5-star retreat offering a safe, tranquil, and luxurious escape in eastern Bali. Spanning 800 sqm on a 1300 sqm plot, this stunning 4-bedroom villa boasts a breathtaking 30-meter infinity pool ‚Äî the longest among private villas in the region ‚Äî with uninterrupted panoramic views of the Indian Ocean.The VillaThe spaceVilla Gumamela | 5-Star Luxury Retreat with Spectacular Ocean Views in CandidasaWelcome to Villa Gumamela, the largest luxury villa in Candidasa and a true 5-star retreat offering a safe, tranquil, and luxurious escape in eastern Bali. Spanning 800 sqm on a 1300 sqm plot, this stunning 4-bedroom villa boasts a breathtaking 30-meter infinity pool ‚Äî the longest among private villas in the region ‚Äî with uninterrupted panoramic views of the Indian Ocean.The Villa‚Ä¢ Location: Candidasa, perched on a hillside with panoramic ocean, sunrise, and sunset views‚Ä¢ Bedrooms: 4 spacious bedrooms, each with ocean views‚Ä¢ Capacity: Up to 11 guests‚Ä¢ Design: Elegant architecture with marble flooring, luxurious furnishings by a renowned French designer, and solid construction by a certified Australian builderEach room at Villa Gumamela offers a stunning view of the ocean. The open-air dining and living spaces face the infinity pool and ocean, delivering unforgettable sunsets daily. Guests can enjoy the expertise of a private chef, who prepares authentic Balinese home-cooked meals and the region‚Äôs best Bbq with freshly caught seafood ‚Äî all available upon request.Features & Amenities ‚Ä¢ 30-meter private infinity swimming pool with panoramic ocean views ‚Ä¢ Open-air living and dining areas ‚Ä¢ Fully equipped modern kitchen ‚Ä¢ Air-conditioned bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms ‚Ä¢ Wi-Fi internet access ‚Ä¢ Private chef services (upon request) ‚Ä¢ Daily housekeeping and villa management ‚Ä¢ Vip airport fast-track service and airport transfers (upon request)Villa Gumamela offers an unparalleled luxury experience in a serene setting, surrounded by authentic Balinese village life and just minutes from beautiful beaches and local attractions.Optional Services (upon Request) ‚Ä¢ Private chef for Balinese and Bbq specialties ‚Ä¢ Vip fast-track arrival and airport escort ‚Ä¢ Car or motorbike rentals ‚Ä¢ Tours, activities, and local excursionsLocation Highlights ‚Ä¢ 10 min drive to Candidasa town center ‚Ä¢ 20 min drive to Pasir Putih Beach (White Sand Beach) for diving, canoeing, and water activities ‚Ä¢ Easy access to hiking trails, sightseeing, and cultural excursionsImportant Notes Maximum capacity: 11 guests No parties, loud music, or disruptive activities allowed No date changes allowed Pets are not allowed Please note that staff and management may access the villa at any time for daily maintenance and service purposesAbout BaliBali‚Äôs tropical environment is home to a variety of small animals, including lizards, geckos, ants, and mosquitoes. While the villa team conducts mosquito control measures, we cannot guarantee a mosquito-free environment. Mosquito spray and electric repellents are provided for your comfort.Other things to noteIncluded services- Swimming pool- Final Cleaning- Parking- Towels: Change each 3 days- Air conditioning- Internet Access

title: 9BR The Bija Villa Canggu
description: The Bija Villa  Luxury 9 Bedroom in Central CangguWelcome to The Bija Villa, an opulent nine-bedroom sanctuary situated in the heart of Canggu, Bali. Perfect for large families or groups of friends, this villa offers an unparalleled blend of luxury, comfort, and convenience, making it the ideal retreat for your tropical getaway.Book your stay at The Bija Villa and create unforgettable memories in one of Bali's most desirable locations. We look forward to welcoming you!*INCLUDE BREAKFAST*The space*Villa Details:*- Bedrooms: 9 lavish, air-conditioned bedrooms, each with en-suite bathrooms and 6 king-sized beds and 6 single-sized beds, designed for ultimate comfort and privacy.- Bathrooms: 9 en-suite bathrooms featuring rain showers and soaking tubs, plus an additional guest bathroom.- Private Pool: A stunning private pool surrounded by lush tropical gardens, complete with sun loungers and a spacious deck for relaxation.- Living Areas: Multiple open-concept living spaces with high ceilings, comfortable seating, and stylish furnishings, seamlessly connecting to the outdoor area.- Dining Area: An elegant dining space with seating for 18, perfect for group meals and special gatherings.- Kitchen: A fully-equipped modern kitchen with top-of-the-line appliances, ideal for preparing delicious meals.- Entertainment Room: A dedicated entertainment room featuring a pool table, large flat-screen TV, and cozy seating for movie nights and fun gatherings.*Amenities:*- High-speed Wi-Fi- 50" Flat-screen Smart TV in every room- 65" Flat-screen Smart TV in the entertainment room- Fully-equipped modern kitchen- Daily housekeeping- Private parking- 24/7 security*Location:*Located in the heart of Canggu, The Bija Villa is just a short drive away from some of Bali's most popular beach clubs. Enjoy the lively atmosphere and stunning beachside experiences at Atlas Beach Club, Finns Beach Club, La Brisa, and Kitsune Caf√©. The villa is also close to an array of trendy cafes, boutiques, and serene beaches.*Why You'll Love It:*- Proximity to Beach Clubs: Easily access Atlas, Finns, La Brisa, and Kitsune Caf√©, and immerse yourself in Bali's vibrant social scene and nightlife.- Luxurious Comfort: Experience top-notch comfort in beautifully designed bedrooms with modern amenities and stunning views.- Tropical Paradise: Relax in your private slice of paradise with a gorgeous pool, lush gardens, and an entertainment room, offering a serene and tranquil retreat.Guest access*Full Guest Access at The Bija Luxury Villa*At The Bija Luxury Villa, we ensure that our guests have complete access to all the amenities and features of our luxurious property. Here's what you can enjoy during your stay:1. Private Pool: Take a refreshing dip in our stunning private pool, surrounded by lush tropical gardens and complete with sun loungers and a spacious deck for relaxation.2. Living and Dining Areas: Enjoy the open-concept living and dining spaces, elegantly furnished and designed for comfort. The living area seamlessly transitions to the outdoor space, perfect for indoor-outdoor living.3. Entertainment Room: Make the most of our dedicated entertainment room, featuring a pool table, large flat-screen TV, and cozy seating for movie nights and fun gatherings.4. Fully-Equipped Kitchen: Feel at home with our modern kitchen, fully equipped with top-of-the-line appliances, cookware, and utensils. Whether you want to prepare a gourmet meal or a quick snack, everything you need is at your fingertips.5. Bedrooms and Bathrooms: Relax in one of our nine luxurious, air-conditioned bedrooms, each with en-suite bathrooms featuring rain showers and soaking tubs. Each room is designed for ultimate comfort and privacy.6. Outdoor Spaces: Enjoy the beautifully landscaped gardens and multiple outdoor seating areas, perfect for dining al fresco, lounging, or simply soaking in the tropical ambiance.7. High-Speed Wi-Fi: Stay connected with high-speed Wi-Fi available throughout the villa, ensuring you can work or stream seamlessly.8. Daily Housekeeping: Benefit from daily housekeeping services to keep your living space immaculate, allowing you to focus on relaxation and enjoyment.9. Private Parking: Secure private parking is available for your convenience, providing easy access to and from the villa.10. 24/7 Concierge Service: Our dedicated concierge team is available around the clock to assist with any needs, from arranging local tours and activities to dining recommendations and reservations.Experience the ultimate in luxury and comfort with full access to The Bija Luxury Villa. Whether you're here to relax, explore, or celebrate, our villa offers everything you need for a perfect stay. We look forward to hosting you and making your stay unforgettable!

title: Taurus 5BR Private Luxury Villa Canggu 5min Beach
description: Welcome to Villa Taurus Canggu, a 5-bedroom sanctuary nestled in the serene oasis of Berawa/Canggu. This architectural masterpiece exudes unparalleled elegance, sophistication, and opulence, redefining the meaning of luxury island living. Villa Taurus stands out as an exquisite gem among the island's most prestigious properties.The spaceAs you step through the grand entrance, you are greeted by an awe-inspiring double-storey haven adorned with stunning white designs, perfectly complemented by chic pastel furniture. The villa's immaculate craftsmanship and attention to detail are evident in every corner, capturing the essence of a true haven for the discerning traveller.Villa Taurus boasts three distinct living areas, each designed to provide an ambience of lavish comfort and style. These spacious lounges offer a harmonious blend of modernity and warmth, inviting you to indulge in a truly cosmopolitan experience. The expansive, floor-to-ceiling windows fill the rooms with an abundance of natural light, creating a bright, airy atmosphere that beckons you to unwind and rejuvenate.The state-of-the-art amenities at Villa Taurus cater to your every need, ensuring a seamless fusion of form and function. The cutting-edge technology, sumptuous furnishings, and high-end appliances are all meticulously curated to provide a lifestyle of unparalleled luxury and convenience.Awaken to your choice of four curated breakfast menus:- American Breakfast: The American way of serving food with a delightful mix of fresh fruits, eggs cooked to your liking, crispy bacon or sausage, and a choice of white or brown bread served with butter and jams.- Continental Breakfast: Experience a taste of Europe with a refreshing mix of fresh fruits, plain yogurt, pancakes or cereals, and a selection of white or brown bread with butter and jams.- Indonesian Breakfast: Immerse yourself in the rich flavors of Indonesia with a spread of fresh fruits, traditional Indonesian fried rice and noodles, an omelet or sunny-side-up egg, and crispy crackers.- Vegetarian Breakfast: Embrace a healthy and wholesome start with a variety of fresh fruits, plain yogurt, saut√©ed vegetables with mushrooms, and a choice of white or brown bread.- Juice and Beverage : Awaken your senses with a refreshing blend of watermelon and orange juice, along with a steaming cup of coffee or tea, and fresh milk.Dine elegantly indoors or al fresco on the terrace. Customise your meal with the Chef's personalised touch. Start your Villa Taurus day on a delicious and delightful note.The villa's idyllic location in Tibubeneng offers you seclusion and tranquility, while also providing easy access to the island's attractions. The breathtaking views, lush tropical landscape, and gentle sea breeze create an enchanting backdrop for your stay at Villa Taurus.Indulge in the ultimate luxury escape at Villa Taurus, where every detail has been meticulously crafted to offer an experience of unparalleled beauty, grandeur, and sophistication. Surrender to the allure of this magnificent property and create unforgettable memories that will last a lifetime.(Please note that your Netflix and YouTube accounts will be used to log in. Ensure you log out before checking out to protect your account from unauthorized use.)STAFF AND SERVICES INCLUDED- Dedicated Villa Manager- Villa Host (Ubud) or Staff (Seminyak/Bukit)- Daily Housekeeping- Garden and Pool StaffEXTRA COSTS (advance notice may be required):- Villa pre-stocking: Groceries and beverages (subject to an additional service fee).- Floating breakfast: IDR 150.000 per tray (for up to 4 guests).- In-villa Chef: Arranged through our trusted partner (see FAQs for details).- Airport transfers: Convenient pick-up and drop-off services.- Driving service: Reliable and professional drivers available on request.- Activities and excursions: Customized experiences to explore Bali.- In-villa massage services: Relax and rejuvenate in your villa's comfort.- Baby-sitting service: Experienced caretakers for your little ones.- Security guards: Additional safety and peace of mind.- Flowers arrangements: Custom designs to enhance your stay.Other things to noteNatural Ventilation: Experience the refreshing breeze of Bali with our open-air living spaces, designed to maximize natural airflow, providing an eco-friendly alternative to air conditioning or fans.Vendor Services: To ensure the villa's equipment and your safety, our dedicated team manages all vendor services within the villa, including spa, personal training, decorations, private chefs, yoga, photography, and villa equipment. Using external vendors is strictly prohibited and will result in a fine of IDR 2.000.000.Waste Management: Contribute to Bali's sustainable efforts by participating in our waste separation program. We provide three bins for organic, inorganic, and residual waste in your villa.Sustainable Amenities: We provide Sensatia Botanicals, a locally founded skincare brand, as bathroom amenities (hand soap, body soap, shampoo, and conditioner). Made in Bali with 100% natural, cruelty-free ingredients, this partnership reflects our support for sustainability and local initiatives, including plastic recycling and beach cleanups.Natural Charm: Our villas embrace Bali's tropical beauty, where the sounds of nature‚Äîgeckos and insects‚Äîcreate a serene ambiance. The open design may occasionally welcome wildlife, despite regular pest control. Geckos, symbols of good luck in Balinese culture, and other creatures are vital to the ecosystem.  FAQsQ: What time is the check-in policy?A: Our dedicated staff ensures a smooth check-in process. Check-in starts at 14:00 for 1-3 bedroom villas and at 15:00 for 4-6 bedroom villas. Luggage drop-off is welcome after 11:00 as we prepare your villa. Please note, a late check-in fee of IDR 200.000 applies for arrivals after 20:00 to cover staff overtime, as our staff does not stand by the villa all the time.Q: What time is the check-out policy?A: Our check-out time is at 11:00 by default. Late check-out is subject to availability and involves extra charge. Please note that for any late check-out between 11:00 ‚Äì 18:00, an additional charge of 50% of the Daily Villa Rate will apply. Any check-out after 18:00, will be charged at a full day's Daily Villa Rate. If you need to store your luggage after check-out time, you are welcome to do so.Q: Is breakfast included in the booking? How do we order the chef's service?A: Breakfast is included in the room rate. We also offer a variety of menu options prepared by our dedicated private chef, right in your villa. The cost is IDR 160.000 per person, with a minimum order for 5 guests. You can indulge in a floating breakfast for an additional fee of IDR 150.000 per tray.For lunch and dinner, we offer enhanced services, including set menus, live BBQ cooking, ethnic cuisines, and even fine dining prepared by a Michelin-star chef, all cooked in the villa. Prices for lunch and dinner start at IDR 450.000 per person. Please note that terms and conditions apply for booking.Additionally, our villa features a fully equipped kitchen, allowing you the flexibility to prepare your own meals if you prefer. Whether you choose to dine in or savor a chef‚Äôs touch, our team is here to ensure a seamless and enjoyable experience.Q: Do we have a housekeeping service every day?A: Absolutely! Daily housekeeping is provided from 9:00 to 17:00. Linens are changed every third day for sustainability. To ensure privacy, please coordinate with your Villa Host or Staff for a convenient cleaning time. Your comfort is our priority.Q: Can we have extra clean towels?A: Certainly! We are happy to provide extra towels, subject to availability. Please feel free to reach out to your Villa Host or Staff, and we‚Äôll do our best to accommodate your request promptly.Q: What is the maximum occupancy for this 5-bedroom villa? Can I have extra beds?A: This villa comfortably accommodates up to 10 guests. However, it can host a maximum of 12 guests, with the 11th and 12th guests considered as extra. An additional fee of IDR 365.000/night/person applies. Should you require extra beds, please feel free to let us know, and we‚Äôll be happy to assist in making arrangements for your group‚Äôs comfort.

title: Dream Home in Ubud: House of Lights
description: 3BR luxury pool villa, a true sanctuary for the seasoned traveller, praised in interior design magazines worldwide, in arguably the most desired street of Ubud. Exceptional daily housekeeping is included! It's a welcoming home built by Bali's star architect. Magnificent views on the famous Sayan Ridge & the sunset - watch it from the pool or the terrace while you're listening to the river and the birds in complete privacy and luxurious comfort, in harmony with nature. Bali at its best.The spaceThis house is a rare gem in Bali - off the beaten villa track... A place where one can really feel at home, as this luxurious villa is a real home of a real family, not the usual holiday rental. In 2021 and 2022 the stunning property was fully renovated in this postcard perfect art village of Ubud, using the finest materials, inspired by our family's extended travels across the world, to create our ultimate tropical dream villa, in perfect harmony with nature. In 2023 and 2024 the property was featured in renowned interior magazines from Europe to Asia like ELLE Decoration, The Residence and Tatler Homes.The 80sqm living room, the dining area along with the bar, plus the kitchen are really the heart of the villa where you will spend a lot of quality time with your loved ones, overlooking the garden, the infinity pool and the unforgettable view. Or you can retreat to one of the two oversized Master Bedrooms for total privacy and undisturbed sunset views from their terraces - and their bath tubs :-)Our son's bedroom and one of the Master Bedrooms are connected by a lovely glass room (which can also serve as an office space) to make it convenient for families with small kids who don't want their children to walk through the garden in the night. This family friendly layout is quite rare in Bali.  The children room is a highlight in itself, it has a beautiful antique Balinese daybed (Double Bed size: 220cm x 135 cm), and the room also comes with its own ensuite bathroom with two sinks plus a pleasant tropical rainshower.The two Master Bedrooms are totally independent in two different units on the two sides of the pool, with their own huge private terraces facing the dramatic Sayan Ridge, with their own bath tubs (also with fantastic views), tropical rainshowers and walk-in closets / dressing rooms (also airconditioned). The 100% natural amenities of Balinese luxury brand Sensatia are provided in all three bathrooms (shower gel, shampoo, conditioner, handwash and bath salt). High-quality Egyptian cotton bed linens and luxury curtains will take care of your sweet dreams. Our guests are having some of the best sleeps of their lives here at House of Lights, Ubud.If you want you can make the living room totally enclosed by the beautiful french windows and doors, not losing the wonderful view but creating an even more intimate and homey ambiance for the evening. (It is also airconditioned.)On our large Samsung smart TV ("The Frame") you can log in to your favourite streaming platform (Disney+, Netflix, etc. - our internet speed is up to 175 Mbps). Or you can just leave the TV on as a painting hanging on the wall, by choosing from dozens of digital masterpieces which will appear in "The Frame" - it is so much fun while your younger children might get an introduction to art history while staying here :-)The kitchen is fully functional with a huge fridge, freezer, stove, oven, water dispenser, Nespresso coffee machine, milk frother, electric hand mixer, rice cooker, toaster and a Philips Pro Blender for your daily fresh vitamine intake. The kitchen can be completely closed off and air-conditioned if that is your preference, though we enjoy it open even more, serving drinks across the brass bar counter while cooking a nice meal - often with the help of our dear staff at the villa. As a guest you could also count on them as our home comes with daily housekeeping included in the rate. If you are happy with your hosts' outstanding service, a nice tip is highly appreciated and goes a long way here in Bali. Thank you!Guest accessThe villa has its own private infinity pool overlooking the magnificent Sayan Ridge. The entire property is all yours.Other things to noteOur home is most convenient for 2 couples and their kids in the Kids Room (Bedroom 3) or 5 adults plus small kids on extra beds.Our fully staffed villa is taken care of by our lovely house keeper, a gardener, a pool attendant and our driver. We kindly ask you to leave a nice tip for them if you are happy with their service. Our driver can drive you around Ubud and take you for excursions in a Toyota 7-seater for an additional daily rate.You can also rent our mountainbike for 20 usd per day to discover beautiful little villages and magnificent rice fields you would never reach by car and which are too far on foot. We love it...Breakfast and some local dishes on site can be arranged for an additional fee, like one of our lovely staff's famous traditional Soto Ayam (it is an amazing rich chicken soup). Massage, pedicure and manicure can also be arranged by our highly professional therapist whose service is absolutely outstanding, based on her availability.Smoking is strictly prohibited inside, it is only permitted outside: in the garden and on the terraces.Oliver, our 18-month-old toy poodle is an optional sweet little package here. Most of our guests are in love with this well-trained and adorable dog. Our dear staff take care of him 100% - you can just enjoy his personality if you wish. Please feel free to let us know if you don't  so we can arrange him staying elsewhere, no problem at all, he has fans all around the island :-)

title: NEW 4 Br Villa Ocean Blue by the cliff
description: Stay at Ocean Blue, a sleek 4-bedroom villa in Sandy Bay, where breathtaking ocean views greet you each morning.This newly built villa boasts a spacious living area, an entertainment room with a 98" Smart TV, garden, a private pool & a stunning cliffside backdrop. Located in a tranquil part of the island, Ocean Blue offers generously sized bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and flexible twin/king bed configurations. Accommodating up to 8 guests, it's an ideal retreat for families or groups.The spaceOcean Blue is a spacious 4-bedroom villa in Sandy Bay with modern, open-plan living. The cliff villa features a private pool, large garden, and stunning ocean views, perfect for families or groups.The master bedroom offers pool, garden, and ocean views, with a king bed and an en-suite bathroom with a bathtub. The 2nd and 3rd bedrooms have king beds (convertible to twins), desks, semi-outdoor bathrooms, and 55" smart TVs. The 4th bedroom is the largest, with a king bed (also convertible), a closed bathroom, space for an extra bed, and 55" smart TV.The villa‚Äôs open spaces connect seamlessly with the outdoors. Relax in the entertainment lounge with 98‚Äù Smart TV, relax by the pool, or enjoy meals in the large living and dining areas. Ocean Blue sleeps up to 8 offering the perfect tropical escape for everyone.Breakfast included.Disclaimer:We would like to inform you that there is construction taking place on a neighbouring property. We are in regular communication with the contractors and are doing everything we can to minimise any potential noise or disruption during your stay.Please contact us if you have any questions.Guest accessGuests have exclusive use of the entire villa.Other things to noteWe‚Äôre happy to assist with boat transfers‚Äîjust reach out to our team. As check-in is from 2 PM, we recommend booking a boat from 12 PM onwards.This villa is also available as a 2 or 3-bedroom option. Contact us for details.Kindly note that there is an ongoing construction project next door, with work taking place during the day. To compensate for any inconvenience, we‚Äôve adjusted our rates, and the discounted pricing is already reflected in our current offers.

title: Villa Rice Home : 6 BR Pool w/ GYM and Jungle View
description: Feel like never before in this super stylish villa! Just outside of famous Ubud yet surrounded by nature and offering all you need for your holiday. 6 bedrooms, fully equipped kitchen, spacious living area, an amazing infinity pool, gym, massage room and the most beautiful nature view - what else could you ask for!? This modern villa is built on 2 storeys, designed with a modern interior and traditional details.The spaceAll 6 bedrooms offer en-suite bathrooms, TV, A/C and safety box. The rooms are designed for your comfort and privacy, as a little sanctuary whenever you need some time to relax. All bedrooms have floor-to-ceiling glass windows to ensure light and a beautiful view of the surrounding nature. The enclosed common area consists of a fully equipped kitchen with counter, a large dining table for the whole family and a spacious couch area to relax and spend time together. Large glass windows and the possibility to open one front, gives you the view and breeze you wish for and makes it the perfect hang-out spot. Another beautiful lounge can be found outside: a sunken seat area in the pool is amazing to come together for sunset drinks, relax in between trips or pool sessions and just be happy. The spacious pool offers a view on palm and banana trees, pure nature for your serenity. The private gym room is the ideal place to get some workouts in before you jump in the refreshing pool or have a massage in the private villa massage room. The luxury you deserve during your Bali holiday! From both the gym and massage room, you have a relaxing view on nature. Our staff is coming daily to clean the villa. On request and with extra charge, they can also prepare breakfast for you and organise a private chef for lunch and dinner in the villa. Our villa host will assist you with any needs and requests. We are happy to help you with car/scooter rentals, taxi rides, day trips, massages, laundry, restaurant reservations and more. Please contact our villa host for any requests so we can make your stay here unforgettable and amazing!(Please note that your Netflix and YouTube accounts will be used to log in. Ensure you log out before checking out to protect your account from unauthorized use.)STAFF AND SERVICES INCLUDED- Dedicated Villa Manager- Villa Host (Ubud) or Staff (Seminyak/Bukit)- Daily Housekeeping- Garden and Pool StaffEXTRA COSTS (advance notice may be required):- Villa pre-stocking: Groceries and beverages (subject to an additional service fee).- Breakfast by Villa Host (Ubud ONLY): IDR 120.000 per person per meal as a cover charge (minimum 4 guests).- Floating breakfast: IDR 150.000 per tray (for up to 4 guests).- In-villa Chef: Arranged through our trusted partner (see FAQs for details).- Airport transfers: Convenient pick-up and drop-off services.- Driving service: Reliable and professional drivers available on request.- Activities and excursions: Customized experiences to explore Bali.- In-villa massage services: Relax and rejuvenate in your villa's comfort.- Baby-sitting service: Experienced caretakers for your little ones.- Security guards: Additional safety and peace of mind.- Flowers arrangements: Custom designs to enhance your stay.Guest accessRoad Access: Many villas have narrow road access, often suitable for motorcycles only. We can assist with transportation arrangements if needed.Other things to noteIf Nearby Construction Occurs: We value your peaceful stay. In the rare event of construction in our area, our team is ready to assist with any comfort concerns. While neighborhood activities are beyond our control, your relaxation remains our priority. Please don't hesitate to contact us if you need anything to enhance your experience.Because the property is located in a relatively remote area, flow of electricity is not as reliable as in cities. Therefore, power cuts from the main provider may be expected from time to time. Kindly note that these are completely out of the host's scope. No generator is available on site.Natural Ventilation: Experience the refreshing breeze of Bali with our open-air living spaces, designed to maximize natural airflow, providing an eco-friendly alternative to air conditioning or fans.Vendor Services: To ensure the villa's equipment and your safety, our dedicated team manages all vendor services within the villa, including spa, personal training, decorations, private chefs, yoga, photography, and villa equipment. Using external vendors is strictly prohibited and will result in a fine of IDR 2.000.000.Waste Management: Contribute to Bali's sustainable efforts by participating in our waste separation program. We provide three bins for organic, inorganic, and residual waste in your villa.Sustainable Amenities: We provide Sensatia Botanicals, a locally founded skincare brand, as bathroom amenities (hand soap, body soap, shampoo, and conditioner). Made in Bali with 100% natural, cruelty-free ingredients, this partnership reflects our support for sustainability and local initiatives, including plastic recycling and beach cleanups.Natural Charm: Our villas embrace Bali's tropical beauty, where the sounds of nature‚Äîgeckos and insects‚Äîcreate a serene ambiance. The open design may occasionally welcome wildlife, despite regular pest control. Geckos, symbols of good luck in Balinese culture, and other creatures are vital to the ecosystem.  Cultural Respect: In Ubud and Bukit, monkeys may be present‚Äîplease refrain from feeding or interacting with them. Surrounding landscapes, like jungles, rice fields, and local farms (e.g., duck, chicken or pig), are not part of the villa property and may be accessed by residents, with changes beyond our control. We appreciate your respect for Bali‚Äôs natural and cultural heritage.FAQsQ: What time is the check-in policy?A: Our dedicated staff ensures a smooth check-in process. Check-in starts at 14:00 for 1-3 bedroom villas and at 15:00 for 4-6 bedroom villas. Luggage drop-off is welcome after 11:00 as we prepare your villa. Please note, a late check-in fee of IDR 200.000 applies for arrivals after 20:00 to cover staff overtime, as our staff does not stand by the villa all the time.Q: What time is the check-out policy?A: Our check-out time is at 11:00 by default. Late check-out is subject to availability and involves extra charge. Please note that for any late check-out between 11:00 ‚Äì 18:00, an additional charge of 50% of the Daily Villa Rate will apply. Any check-out after 18:00, will be charged at a full day's Daily Villa Rate. If you need to store your luggage after check-out time, you are welcome to do so.Q: Is breakfast included in the booking? How do we order the chef's service?A: Breakfast is not included in the room rate. However, you can easily arrange breakfast by contacting our reservation or concierge team. We offer a variety of menu options prepared by our dedicated private chef, right in your villa. The cost is IDR 160.000 per person, with a minimum order for 5 guests. You can indulge in a floating breakfast for an additional fee of IDR 150.000 per tray.For lunch and dinner, we offer enhanced services, including set menus, live BBQ cooking, ethnic cuisines, and even fine dining prepared by a Michelin-star chef, all cooked in the villa. Prices for lunch and dinner start at IDR 450.000 per person. Please note that terms and conditions apply for booking.Additionally, our villa features a fully equipped kitchen, allowing you the flexibility to prepare your own meals if you prefer. Whether you choose to dine in or savor a chef‚Äôs touch, our team is here to ensure a seamless and enjoyable experience.Q: Do we have a housekeeping service every day?A: Absolutely! Daily housekeeping is provided from 9:00 to 17:00. Linens are changed every third day for sustainability. To ensure privacy, please coordinate with your Villa Host or Staff for a convenient cleaning time. Your comfort is our priority.Q: Can we have extra clean towels?A: Certainly! We are happy to provide extra towels, subject to availability. Please feel free to reach out to your Villa Host or Staff, and we‚Äôll do our best to accommodate your request promptly.Q: What is the maximum occupancy for this 6-bedroom villa? Can I have extra beds?A: This villa comfortably accommodates up to 12 guests. However, it can host a maximum of 14 guests, with the 13th and 14th guests considered as extra. An additional fee of IDR 365.000/night/person, applies. Should you require extra beds, please feel free to let us know, and we‚Äôll be happy to assist in making arrangements for your group‚Äôs comfort.

title: Ultimate Luxury Retreat @ 3,000m2 Private Villa
description: Our villa is sitting on over 3.000m2 land provides a memorable holiday retreat, perfect spot for larger groups. a fully-staffed private mansion with 7 spacious bedrooms. The golden-lit spaces overlook a 25-meter pool and a manicured tropical garden.The villa is located in Canggu known for its amazing waves and most famous beach clubs in Bali. this town is a well-located and favorite tourist spot that provides convenient access to all the hip restaurants and cafes and beach clubs.The spaceThe villa features beautifully-manicured huge gardens with dense foliage and towering trees, offering a peaceful escape and access to nature. The gardens are home to a gorgeous 25-meter swimming pool and a pool deck with sun chairs and parasols. The landscape is stunning, with outdoor lighting, a wooden bridge, and lush greenery.The villa's beautiful living area has a high-ceilinged and grand main pavilion is the living area with its large and long cosy sofas.Beside the living area we have a media room and the other half of this main pavilion is the dining area with a beautifully crafted wooden dining table, has a fully-equipped kitchen.On the ground floor of the villa‚Äôs grand, two-level bedroom pavilion is a semi-open, spacious and airy common area with sitting set ups and a billiards table.The villa has spacious 7 air-conditioned bedrooms. 4 guest rooms are in the two-level, bedroom pavilion. All 4 bedrooms have double beds. The ground level bedrooms have direct access to the beatiful swimming pool. 2 master bedrooms, in individual pavilions, have double size beds. These bedrooms open out to the stunning terraced garden. All bedrooms have dedicated bathrooms with rain showers. Some of these bedrooms, though, also have beautiful free-standing bathtubs.The professional and attentive staff at The Villa are dedicated to ensuring a seamless and comfortable stay for all guests. From personal guest assistance to regular housekeeping and maintenance, they take care of everything so you don't have to.And don't forget to start your day with a delicious daily breakfast prepared by the villa's staff.

title: Brand New! Exquisite Luxury 5 BR Villa @Umalas
description: Discover the charm of Bali at Shanaya Villa, a stunning brand new 5-bedroom villa located in the heart of Umalas. Perfectly designed for large groups or families, offers an inviting and tranquil retreat where comfort meets elegance.Shanaya Villa comes fully furnished and equipped, ensuring that all your needs are met for an unforgettable stay. "Due to nearby construction, we are temporarily offering a discounted rate on our villa."The space#NOTE# Bali is currently very popular among investors, which is why there is a lot of construction happening in promising areas, especially in Umalas. There may be no construction when you book, but suddenly construction might start during your stay. Please understand that we have no control over this.#UPDATE# : Please be advised that there is construction going on in the neighborhood. Usually, the construction working hours are from 8 AM to 5 PM.Welcome to your brand new villa, an exquisite 5-bedroom haven designed for ultimate relaxation and enjoyment. With a spacious layout and aesthetic elegance at every corner, this villa is perfect for capturing beautiful memories and photographs.The expansive living and dining area on the first floor provides an inviting space for all your guests to gather, making it ideal for entertaining and socializing. Here, you‚Äôll create lasting connections in a warm and luxurious environment.Step outside to discover a large swimming pool surrounded by numerous loungers, allowing everyone to relax together and soak up the sun. It‚Äôs the perfect setting for both lively gatherings and peaceful afternoons.For those special evenings, head up to the stunning rooftop bar equipped with a projector, creating a cozy atmosphere to unwind and enjoy movie nights under the stars. Fully furnished with complete amenities, your villa ensures a comfortable stay with everything needed for a memorable getaway. Experience the perfect blend of luxury, style, and connectivity, making this villa your ideal destination for relaxation and fun!BEDROOMS  - 1 Master Bedroom: King-size bed (180 x 200 cm) with smart TV, air conditioning, and a spacious bathroom featuring a shower and bathtub.- 2 Bedrooms: Each with a king-size bed (180 x 200 cm) smart TV, and air conditioning.- 1 Bedroom: Featuring a king-size bed (180 x 200 cm) with air conditioning.- 1 Bedroom: Equipped with 2 single beds (90 x 200 cm) with air conditioning.- All bedrooms are provided with bed linens, 4 pillows in each room, and safety box.BATHROOMS  - All bathrooms come with amenities including body soap, shampoo, conditioner, body lotion, and hand soap by Sensatia.- Toothbrush and toothpaste provided.- Hair dryer included.- Laundry bag available.LIVING ROOM  - Features a large sofa and a 65-inch smart TV.- Portable Bluetooth Speaker (Marshall)- Equipped with air conditioning.KITCHEN & DINING  - Fully equipped kitchen with microwave, stove, exhaust, refrigerator, toaster, kettle, blender, rice cooker, pots and pans, bowls and plates, cutlery, mugs, and wine glasses.- Daily coffee, tea, sugar, and creamer provided.BAR & ROOFTOP  - Includes a wine cooler, BBQ grill, and projector for entertainment.WORKING SPACE  - A designated area for work is also available.OTHER - Washing Machine- Iron & BoardGuest accessGuests enjoy full access to all areas of the villa, ensuring a comfortable and private experience. A dedicated villa manager is on hand to assist you throughout your stay, and our maintenance team is committed to keeping the property in pristine condition.Situated in a prime location at the heart of Umalas, our villa offers the perfect blend of tranquility and convenience. Nestled between Seminyak and Canggu, you'll have the opportunity to explore a wide array of restaurants, sports activities, beaches, bars, and beach clubs, all just a short distance away.Online taxi such as Grab / Gojek are available and ordering food or online shopping are definitely not a problem. We are located on the main road, providing easy access for cars. Our property features a car park that can accommodate 1 car and up to 3 motorcycles. Additionally, we offer free use of 1 Scooter during your stay.Other things to noteVilla Rules and Information:> No events, parties, or gatherings are allowed at the villa.> No loud noise is permitted at the villa; this is a strict rule.> Please store all valuables in the safe provided.> Our villa is located on the island of Bali, which is a tropical island. Therefore, there are insects, ants, and mosquitoes. Always keep the doors closed when inside to prevent them from entering.> The parking area can accommodate 1 car and a maximum of 4 motorcycles.Check-In/Check-Out Policy:Early check-in or late check-out may be possible depending on the villa's availability. Guests are welcome to store their luggage before check-in or after check-out until 5:00 PM.Important Requirement:All guests must submit a copy of their Passport or ID upon check-in as per Bali‚Äôs regulations.Villa Location Information:Shanaya Villa is conveniently located near a variety of restaurants, cafes, gyms, padel courts, supermarkets, laundry services, and is close to the Seminyak and Canggu areas. The villa is situated in between both of these popular areas, making it an ideal spot for exploration.Nearby Restaurants / Cafes:-Dua Umalas: 3 minutes by motorbike-Pison: 4 minutes by motorbike-Nook Restaurant: 4 minutes by motorbike-Monsieur Spoon Petitenget: 5 minutes by motorbike-Souphoria: 4 minutes by motorbike-07 AM Baker‚Äôs Club: 5 minutes by motorbike-32do Bali: 8 minutes by motorbike-The Forge Bali: 7 minutes by motorbikeNearby Beach Clubs:-Caf√© del Mar Beach Club: 8 minutes by motorbike-FINNS Beach Club: 10 minutes by motorbike-Desa Potato Head: 12 minutes by motorbike-Alila Seminyak: 12 minutes by motorbikeNearby Clubs:-Da Maria: 6 minutes by motorbike-ShiShi Nightclub & Izakaya Lounge: 9 minutes by motorbike-La Favela: 9 minutes by motorbike-Atlas Super Club: 9 minutes by motorbike-Motel Mexicola: 12 minutes by motorbikeNearby Gyms:-Amare Padel Club Umalas: 1 minute by motorbike-De Gym: 3 minutes by motorbike-71 Gym: 3 minutes by motorbike-SAIA Pilates: 6 minutes by motorbikeNearby Mini Markets / Supermarkets:-Pepito Express Umalas: 1 minute by motorbike-Circle K: 1 minute by motorbike

title: Beetle - Bamboo Villa in Eco Six Bali Resort
description: Experience Bali by staying in our Beetle, a 2 bedroom bamboo villa located within the Eco Six Bali resort, just a 20-minute scooter ride from the vibrant centre of Ubud.Enjoy this spacious two floors villa with its Santorini style infinity pool, and its relaxing net bed facing the Mount Agung!Breakfast included!Follow us on @ecosixbali for news and special promotions!The spaceThe Beetle is a two bedroom bamboo villa built on two floors. Its ground floor houses the two master bedrooms. The bedrooms are fitted with a king size bed, an open wardrobe, air conditioning and an outdoor bathtub, from where our guests can enjoy the beautiful views. The bedrooms are comprehensive of a modernly equipped bathroom.The bedrooms have direct access to the a beautiful Santorini style infinity pool equipped with sun beds.The living room is located on the upper floor and it includes sofas and a dining table, as well as a net overlooking the jungle and the famous volcano Mount Agung.Amenities in the living room include a projector with Netflix, Nespresso coffee machine and refrigerated minibar.Our front desk situated in the lobby provides a 24-hour service. Staff at the front desk can assist our guests with various services, such as renting bikes, arranging trips etc. The resort houses a restaurant that provides only in-room dining options. Breakfast, all-day dining and drinks can easily be ordered from the villa and will be brought to you by our staff. Both Balinese and International cuisine are offered. The bar serves a variety of soft drinks as well as tropical beverages throughout the day.PLEASE READ BEFORE BOOKING:We are deeply attracted by Bali's unique and beautiful natural environment. That is why we built Eco Six Bali in the middle of the rice field and the tropical forest--the characteristic landscape of Bali. We hope our guests can rest in nature and heal from its tranquillity and beauty.Long before the arrival of Eco Six Bali, this ecological environment already had its own inhabitants: insects, ants, mosquitos, spiders, geckos etc. We thrive with the highest cleaning and pest control standards and do our best to keep them out of hotel doors. However, some creatures will inevitably pay us a visit with an open door.Bamboo resorts are a special kind of living environment. We invite you to carefully consider this before booking with Eco Six Bali.PLEASE READ BELOW:Our villa can host a maximum of 4 adults and 2 kids (12yo or less).As the villa is only fitted with two double bed, we inform our guests that a request for an additional bed or bed linens will require extra charge.The included breakfast is intended for a maximum of 4 adults and 2 kids (selected from the kids menu). Any other request will require additional charge.ABOUT USSurrounded by Bali‚Äôs tropical landscapes, Eco Six Bali is a bamboo resort that combines modern as well as traditional architectural characteristics. Situated just a 20-minute scooter ride from the vibrant centre of Ubud, Eco Six Bali offers the opportunity to escape the city stress.The six bamboo villas that compose the hotel have specific features. Each villa is fitted with tropical blooms as well as uniquely designed pools from where our guests have a direct view of rice fields, tropical forests as well as of the famous mount Agung.Other things to noteHouse Rules:- Check-in at 3 pm- Check out before 12 pm- Noise will not be tolerated.- No smoking inside- Please lock up valuables in the safety deposit box.- Any form of misbehavior or noise is not tolerated.- Events, gatherings, parties or pets are not allowed.

title: The Ylang Ylang, 4BR, Ketewel w/ chef
description: An outstanding, six-bedroom, secluded, beach villa with pool and home-theatre, the Ylang Ylang oozes luxury, glamour and sophistication near Sanur on Bali`s south-east coast.This villa offers a reduced 4-bedroom option for smaller groups.The spaceBounded by coconut trees, endless rice fields and deserted Indian Ocean beach, Villa Ylang Ylang is the star of the show, an outstanding six-bedroom destination villa. Hidden within a culturally-drenched village along Bali's south-east coast, this contemporary-Asian residence oozes luxury and glamour, with interiors revealing exquisite tastes and sophisticated facilities for discerning guests, including a 16-metre pool and home-theatre. The secluded beachfront setting overlooking the Badung Strait, together with the villa`s suitability for yoga, spa and indulgent relaxation, further contribute to a retreat of absolute calm and well-being, adhering to The Ylang Ylang's lifestyle concept of 'passionate serenity'.The 6-bedroom The Ylang Ylang offers a reduced 4-bedroom option for smaller families or groups.  This means that the other rooms will be locked during your stay.Guest accessThis villa comes with every conceivable luxury -  WiFi internet connection   One car and driver at a special rate of US$ 45++/day for 8 hours (excludes petrol; extra hours chargeable)  Welcome drink and fresh fruit basket upon arrival  Turn down setup service  Personal service by the villa staff including full time manager, housekeeper, chef, 24-hour security  Exclusive use of 4 bedrooms and the listed facilities.FULL VILLA CAPACITY12 guests (6 bedrooms: 2 master suites with king beds; 2 queen-bedded suites; 2 twin-bedded suites convertible to Kings) plus 2 baby cots. Extra beds are available on request at additional cost.The 4 bedroom option sleeps 8 guests.  2 rooms will be locked and will not be used.LIVING AREASTwo-storey main pavilion with living?dining area; fully equipped kitchen; movie studio theatre; upper gallery with spa and massage deck plus meditation deck; 2 garden bal?s.POOLMain pool: 16m x 5m. 1m-1.5m depth. 2 plunge pools: 3m x 3m.ENTERTAINMENT Satellite TVs and DVD players in master suites and theatre room; extensive DVD library; CD players in bedrooms and theatre room; iPod dock in bedrooms; board games; book library.ADDITIONAL FACILITIESSecure parking for six cars; hairdryers and mini-safes in bedrooms; wine cooler; 3 coffee machines; customized bathroom toiletries; barbecue.PROPERTY AREA2,100sqm (land area); 1,100sqm (villa).Other things to noteBy booking this property, all guests agree that they have read the house rules And complete listing content. Our complete booking terms And conditions are available for viewing under the Elite Havens website.

title: 5BR luxurious Umah Biyang villa w/ocean view
description: Umah Biyang,which means "Mother's Home" was established with the purpose of welcoming guests from afar, invited to return home‚Äîto the warmth of a comfortable atmosphere. Offering a breathtaking 5bedrooms luxury private villa which is strategically positioned between Ungasan and Uluwatu area. Tucked away behind Nourish cafe and Butterman,just a moment from trendy cafes, boutique shops, and the vibrant beach scene.  Ideally located, it‚Äôs just 10 minutes from Uluwatu lively nightlife and beachGuest accessTo help you reach us with ease, please note that access to our villa is through a charming local road, nestled behind Nourish Caf√© and Butterman Bakery in Uluwatu. While the route offers an authentic glimpse into the local neighborhood, it is accessible by car and scooter, and our staff will be happy to assist with directions or transfers if needed.We recommend using Google Maps location pin for a smooth arrival. Just search for ‚ÄúUmah Biyang Villa‚Äù or contact us in advance, and we‚Äôll be glad to guide you.Other things to noteAs part of our commitment to transparency and guest satisfaction, we‚Äôd like to let you know that there is a nearby development project currently underway beside Umah Biyang.While the serene beauty of our villa and the surrounding rice fields remains untouched, there may be light activity during certain hours of the day.To show our appreciation for your understanding, we‚Äôre pleased to offer you a special discounted rate during this period ‚Äî a perfect opportunity to enjoy the full Umah Biyang experience at even greater value.Our team is here daily to ensure your comfort, and we‚Äôll do everything possible to maintain the peaceful and relaxing atmosphere Umah Biyang is known for.Thank you for your trust, and we look forward to welcoming you soon.

title: 4br Private Villa from Morabito - Beach Access
description: Casa Madi | Artful Luxury & Tranquility in CangguWelcome to Casa Madi, part of the prestigious Morabito Art Villa ‚Äî a masterpiece of design and luxury in the heart of Canggu. Just a short walk from the serene Berawa Beach, this stunning 4-bedroom villa offers an unparalleled blend of sophistication, comfort, and privacy, making it the perfect retreat for discerning travelers.Complimentary membership to the sophisticated NuHuman gym next door is included for all our guests.The spaceCasa Madi | Artful Luxury & Tranquility in CangguWelcome to Casa Madi, part of the prestigious Morabito Art Villa ‚Äî a masterpiece of design and luxury in the heart of Canggu. Just a short walk from the serene Berawa Beach, this stunning 4-bedroom villa offers an unparalleled blend of sophistication, comfort, and privacy, making it the perfect retreat for discerning travelers.Complimentary membership to the sophisticated NuHuman gym next door is included for all our guests.The Villa‚Ä¢ Location: Canggu, near Berawa Beach and the vibrant local scene‚Ä¢ Bedrooms: 4 spacious bedrooms + 1 Loft Suite with opulent ensuite bathrooms‚Ä¢ Capacity: Up to 10 guests‚Ä¢ Design: Contemporary architecture with artistic touches, blending luxury, modernity, and tranquilityInside, Casa Madi offers expansive spaces, from the stylish living areas to the fully equipped kitchen and luxurious bedrooms. Guests can enjoy the rooftop deck with its breathtaking pool, a private spa with a rejuvenating sauna, and a game room with ping-pong and Dj turntables ‚Äî perfect for unforgettable evenings.Features & Amenities ‚Ä¢ Rooftop swimming pool with panoramic views ‚Ä¢ Private spa with sauna ‚Ä¢ Game room with ping-pong table and Dj turntables ‚Ä¢ Wine cooler and six televisions ‚Ä¢ Central air conditioning ‚Ä¢ Fully equipped kitchen ‚Ä¢ Exclusive access to Morabito Art Villa grounds and beach ‚Ä¢ Free entry to NuHuman, the island‚Äôs premier fitness club. ‚Ä¢ Wi-Fi internet access ‚Ä¢ Housekeeping, reservations manager, and security teamOptional Services (upon Request) ‚Ä¢ Private chef for breakfast, lunch, and dinner ‚Ä¢ Car and driver for day trips and explorations ‚Ä¢ Childcare and babysitting services ‚Ä¢ In-villa massage and wellness treatments ‚Ä¢ Customized tours and experiencesLocation Highlights Walking distance to Berawa Beach, trendy caf√©s, beach clubs, restaurants, and Canggu‚Äôs vibrant nightlife.Important Notes Maximum capacity: 10 guests No date changes allowed Private event upon request (subject to extra fee) Please note that staff and management may access the villa at any time for daily maintenance and service purposes Please note there may be occasional noise from nearby construction, as the area continues to develop.About BaliBali‚Äôs lush tropical setting brings diverse wildlife, from endangered species to common creatures like lizards, geckos, ants, and mosquitoes. While we diligently control mosquitoes with monthly fogging and daily villa cleaning, we cannot guarantee a mosquito-free environment. For your convenience, mosquito spray and electric repellents are provided in the villa.Other things to noteIncluded services- Swimming pool- Bed linen: Change each 3 days- Final Cleaning- Air conditioning

title: Uma Santai Villa Pererenan by Nakula
description: Villa Uma Santai boasts a total of 7 bedrooms and 7 bathrooms, offering ample space for you and your loved ones to unwind and rejuvenate. Each room is thoughtfully designed to provide the utmost comfort and tranquility for an unforgettable stayIf you plan to hold an event during your stay, please inform us in advance. Additional event fee equal to one night stay and Banjar/Local Community fee will apply.

title: 4BR Pool Villa at Seminyak Beach
description: Villa Nalina is a beautiful 4-bedroom villa with Balinese touches and a huge pool, nestled in a calm cul de sac, walking distance to the Seminyak beach, Ku De Ta and Eat Street. Outdoors, the 4-bedroom villa is hugged by tropical gardens crowned by a 20-metre swimming pool. Besides the beautiful decor and spacious layout, Villa Nalina offers a fabulous location in central Seminyak.Other things to notePlease note that breakfast is included in price, however, airport transfers are available at an extra cost.

title: -HOT DEAL in Lovina-Luxury Mansion 7br BEACH FRONT
description: Villa Shanti - beach front - renovated in Dec.22, located in Lovina-Dencarik on 32 ares landWith 7 ensuite, good for 16 guests, the place offers all the advantages of a modern villa while keeping its Balinese originsUltra modern kitchen and barHuge pool with jacuzzi, bale, gazebo, massage, gym, soccer field, fish pounds, billiard, games, music, TV's...Fully staffed with 7 employees + 2 security at nightGarage: 2 cars+motosViews on mountains, volcano, rice fields, oceanDirect beach access!The spaceIn a landscaped park by the sea, sitting on a huge 3200 sqm land, large 7 bedrooms villa completely renovated (Dec. 2022).The main building offers 5 ensuite:two of which have a 180 x 200 cm bed and a 100 x 200 cm single bedtwo offer a 160 x 200 cm bedupstairs, the master bedroom has a 200 x 200 cm bed.   Note that the three largest bedrooms have a television set. The ground floor is an open plan but covered area hosting an ultra-modern kitchen with ovens and dishwasher, dining area, bar area; the dining room can seat 14 people and there are two lounge areas, with sofas overlooking the pool.  The pool has 3 separate areas: 5 x 6m children's pool, 12 x 6m adult pool and big jacuzzi area.  Opposite is the Bale where you can relax or have a coffee with a sofa area and a large central table.The main building offers several views: the sea in front, the mountains at the back, and the rice fields on both sides. The first floor is set up as a relaxation area, with games rooms, pool table, huge TV, sound system, bar and reading area.  A separate gym room overlooks the rice fields, with runner, toning exercises, rowing machine and yoga area.The second building is at the rear, on two floors. The ground floor offers a 160 x 200 cm, a full bathroom with bathtub, and an outdoor shower room in an enclosed garden.  The first floor offers 2 single beds 100 x 200 cm, a full bathroom with bath and shower.Gazebo facing the beach and massage room will complete your magic stay.The back yard has been landscaped for football, volleyball, badminton, ping pong, flying disc etc...Villa fully staffed with 9 employees: 2 for security at night, 3 gardeners and 4 housekeepers.For massage, tours, cook, babysitting etc... please do not hesitate to ask my lovely staff.-IMPORTANT-If this villa is already booked, no worry! We have a brand new villa waiting for you, about 100m. away., absolute beachfront !!!You can check the link here: airbnb.com/h/insulindeGuest accessOur guests have full access to the villa, except the laundry and storage rooms.Other things to noteWe have a cook named Jero, she can prepare your breakfast at groceries cost + 0 IDR fees/day üòÄFor lunch, it costs 200K IDR cooking fees/day + groceries.For dinner it costs 300K IDR cooking fees + groceries at your charge.Many games are also available: balls, raquettes, pool table, 2 goal cages for soccer, chess, board games, cards... but also a sound system, TV's, books, bbq...For yoga, we can arrange an in house class. Also for boxing. Please let us know if you are interested in.Please note that we do not accept extra beds or mattresses, but only cribs or cots.

title: Veluvana Bali - Scorpio House
description: Veluvana is a unique bamboo house with magical Mount Agung and the lush Sidemen Valley. Each house is inspired by various animals‚Äô structure as part of the creatures in the world and takes advantage of the open space concept which provides a deep connection with nature that aim to give positive energy to recover your soul. From the concept to material selection, we are trying to contribute to the sustainability principleThe spaceScorpio House welcomes you with mysterious beauty through a giant and iconic design where you will be surprised by the hidden ground pool beneath the main bedroom as you walk down the staircase. Take a moment to walk or hang along the iconic and sharp pool edge, then indulge in a floating breakfast in the morning while taking in the view in restful contemplation with the sounds of nature.The main room is accessed by climbing up the automatic stairs from the first floor. When you open the deck, it directly heads to your private main room. You will be greeted by a moving-laid-back bed equipped with a mosquito net that allows you to merge into the surrounding landscapes with a click!We invite you to feel this blissful vibe of the house. Let nature entertains you with no boundaries at Veluvana Bali. Other things to noteBEFORE YOU BOOK, PLEASE READ A FEW DETAILS FOR YOUR CONSIDERATION:1. The Construction & Your Own SafetyThe construction and furniture are mostly made of locally-sourced bamboo that covered with reclaimed teak wood roofs. The building is designed and built by local bamboo artisans with serious consideration to the strength of the entire part of the construction and furniture. Don't put everyone in a danger by bringing any flammable material or liquid that is ignited or flame immediately when in contact with fire. The lower-level floor is a half meter from the ground with a higher edge on the north porch; please take care of your step while playing on this site. The upper level is 2.5 meters from the ground with hidden stairs that automatically opened once you click the remote button. All the stairs are considered easy to climb but keep in mind to watch your head and step as the Scorpio House does not have any railing to hold. Accidents due to negligence entirely become your personal responsibility.2. Water, Electricity, and Wi-FiThe water you use in this house is supplied by the regional water company that distributes fresh water sourced from Mount Agung aquifer. Although the water is fresh, it is not ready to drink water, so please drink only water that is served in the bottle and ask the doormen to refill if it runs out. The electricity installed in the house is connected with the main east Bali grid system to assure you have reliable lighting in the night and optimum power supply to your device. Because we understand you may physically off-grid, but your digital presence can have no break. So, Wi-Fi is free as always.3. The LocationThe small town of Sidemen is less crowded compare to Ubud and any other tourist destination in Bali. This area is slowly growing as the indigenous culture and society remain preserved by its humility. You can explore the village in a short-range by foot, a scooter is also available to rent if you want to go a little bit further to the town center or the neighbor village.4. Public FacilityThe small town of Sidemen has a village hall, traditional market, small grocery, school, and hospital with an emergency care unit. Ride a scooter around 5 ‚Äì 10 minutes from the bamboo house to reach one of these facilities. Bigger public facilities are available in the nearest town of Semarapura that requires a 20-minute drive or Denpasar that is around 60 minutes from Sidemen.5. The ClimateThe climate is divided into two seasons, dry or wet. The dry season comes around May ‚Äì September while the wet season is from October ‚Äì April each year. However, climate change has made the weather a bit unpredictable. Sometimes there is a rainy day within the dry season, and not all day is rainy during the wet season. When you stay during the wet season please consider facing heavy rain with a wind that may blow water into the lower ground porch, and the upper balcony. 6. The BugsThe bamboo house is located within a rice terrace with rich biodiversity. Our commitment to reducing the carbon footprint has led us to design the house with minimum impact on the surrounding living organism. Stay in this bamboo house means that you are willing to share your living space with other creatures. Ants, fly, mosquito, and other insects are commonly found outside of the building especially during fruit season. As long as you keep the space clean and not leave any left food open, they will not come to disturb you. If you notice mosquito entering the bedroom area, we highly recommend you to use the mosquito net on the bed during your sleep. If you have a specific insect allergy or afraid of these insects, we suggest this bamboo house is not good for you. Or you may go at your own risk.7. Room ServicesYou have a doormen stand-by at 7.00 am ‚Äì 9.00 pm at the upper ground, you can ask him almost anything you need to make your stay enjoyable. He will help you with breakfast, food for lunch and dinner, find a masseur, room cleaning, laundry, transportation, area information, and tourist activities. You can also contact us online through Airbnb platform in case the onsite services do not meet your needs.8. Breakfast, Lunch, and DinnerBreakfast for two is included in your booking. You can ask the doormen to serve the breakfast in the living room area, on the couch or you feel too heavy to wake up from your bed, the breakfast will be served at your convenience. For an extra special morning treat, book our floating breakfast with additional charge. We have a small kitchen in the upper ground so that you can order food for your lunch as well as dinner. 9. Air ConditioningWe do not install air conditioning in the house as it is against our spirit to maintain natural air remain fresh and healthy. Matter-fact we think we do not need that urban stuff around Sidemen Village, especially when you let the soft natural wind flows into your space.10. Protection from a Set of Curtains and Roll-up BlindsWe are adding a set of curtains placed in the entrance corner and roll-up blinds at the lower ground. Those all protect you from heavy water droplets and outside elements that may discomfort you, especially during the rainy season, night or unexpectedly harsh wind, as we are fully adopting an open-space design. Rest assured it zipped again to keep the curtains from blowing all over the place when it's not used anymore.11. The Neighbourhood and Surrounding ActivitiesAs the bamboo house is located in the main tourist district of Sidemen, several accommodations, restaurants and human activities are situated and happened near your space. You will see some buildings on the west or east side of the house. Right at the back of the house is also accommodation with several rooms. The neighbour is warm and friendly, especially the owner of the surrounding properties. Sometimes during daylight, you may find the farmers working in their rice fields. You can enjoy it as a truly rural view, as the farmer is also a part of our team. But if you need additional privacy, don't worry! We can ask them to not go to the rice fields for your whole privacy.12. Open-air Showering Concept All experiences have to be set as sustainable as possible, including showering! We bring you closer to nature with an open-design bathroom and shower. Let's take a shower under the sky in the morning and evening while enjoying the breeze flowing. It gets dramatic when the rain suddenly comes, all you have to do is just dance a bit with the raindrop to cleanse your body one more time. The bathroom/shower has set in a very private way, so that, if there is someone watching it would be a curious bird!13. Moving BedSurprisingly, you can take your comfort and stay experience to the next level with a moving bed that can be controlled with a remote control in which every click brings you closer to magical views. On the other note, please watch your position and the distance between the bed and the edge of the floor.14. Irresponsible BehaviorIrresponsible behavior and threatening and abusive conduct towards the host, doormen, neighbors of the house, and the villager will not be tolerated. The host will refuse to allow check-in to the house if there is any case and or information that assume the guest (s) have related to any irresponsible behavior, threatening, and abusive conduct toward the mentioned person above. The host also has a full authority to end guest stay in the house if there is any case and or information that assume the guest (s) have related to any irresponsible behavior, threatening, and abusive conduct toward the mentioned person above. No refund will be given regarding the cancelation/canceled stay due to irresponsible behavior, threatening, and abusive conduct toward the mentioned person above.The host will not have a further responsibility to the guest once the booking is canceled and or the stay is ended.

title: Mandala Oasis: Gym, Pool, Cinema, Ice Bath, Sauna
description: Villa Mandala Oasis, Canggu, Bali | By The Luxe Nomad- Fantastic location; walking distance to Canggu hotspots - Beautiful architecture by Design Assembly- Sleek infinity pool with a swim-up bar- Wellness haven with a gym, ice bath and sauna- Rooftop Cinema: Large lawn with an outdoor projector- High-ceiling sunken lounge and stylish dining roomThe spaceEnjoy good vibes, a great location and the best island aesthetic possible at Mandala Oasis. This five-bedroom property is conveniently located in Canggu, an enclave that draws adventurers worldwide to its renowned surf spots and sun-kissed caf√©s and beach clubs.
