Its extensive amenities include a stunning infinity pool with a swim-up bar, as well as a rooftop cinema, indoor gym, pilates room as well as an ice bath and a Finnish-style sauna. Other recreational facilities available include a pool table and table tennis equipment.Sculptural windows look out to a verdant garden and offer tantalising glimpses at the sophisticated spaces within. Gather around a high-ceiling sunken lounge, enjoy meals in the picture-perfect indoor and outdoor dining areas, sunbathe on the striped daybeds or take a dip in the pool with rice field views. Other ultra-photogenic areas include a stairway with a gravity-defying Frangipani tree, walls adorned with murals by Bali-based artists, and an intriguing Brutalist-style entryway that leads to the guest rooms. The pitch-perfect lighting design by Studio Nimmersatt ensures the perfect ambience throughout.Guest accessGuests enjoy full access to all of the 1,500 sqm property, from the infinity pool, outdoor cinema and open-plan living room to the five spacious bedrooms.Other things to note PROMOTIONS  *Last minute: Up to 10% off stays- Valid only for bookings made less than 30 days prior to the check-in date.- Seasons minimum night stay required *Early bird: Up to 10-15% off stays in low, shoulder, and high season- Valid only for bookings made 120 days or more prior to the check-in date.- Seasons minimum night stay required *Long Stay:  Up to 10% off stays for low, shoulder and high season- Valid only for bookings with a minimum stay of 7 nights- Some promotions are not reflected. Please contact us for more details Rate Inclusions: - Welcome drink- Daily continental breakfast- Complimentary WiFi- Services by Villa manager, housekeepers, maintenance/gardener, and security staff. Floors: Mandala Oasis occupies two  Floors: - Ground Floor: Main entrance, air-conditioned living room, indoor dining area, outdoor dining and living areas, kitchen, gym facilities, and swimming pool.- 2nd Floor: Five bedrooms, including the master bedroom. Capacity & Extra Bedding: - This property is designed to comfortably sleep 10 persons.- Extra bed is available at USD $45 per person per night. Only one (1) additional bed can be arranged for this property. Living areas: - The main communal space is an air-conditioned living area conveniently located next to the dining area with an open kitchen. - There is also an open seating area on the second floor and BBQ facilities. Entertainment: - High-speed WiFi throughout and projector screen with Netflix streaming and SONOS bluetooth speakers. Kitchen & Dining: - The kitchen is equipped with oven, refrigerator, Nespresso coffee machine, juicer, blender, toaster, rice cooker, microwave oven, freezer, stove, wine fridge, water dispenser, bar equipment and essential cooking tools, cutlery, and glasses.- The villa has a main indoor dining area that features a rectangular table that seats 10 guests, the same as the outdoor dining area and 3 additional seats at the kitchen counter.- Private Chef service is available upon request at extra charge; All meals (breakfast, lunch, dinner, floating breakfast upon request) can be arranged in advance. We also provide a chef shopping service and a pre-arrival shopping service with the rates: grocery bill + 15% handling fee. Wellness: - Yoga mats are available on request and the spacious garden provides a serene setting for practicing yoga. - Yoga lessons can also be arranged at extra charge. - In-villa treatments are available on request at extra charge. Parking: Sufficient parking space available for 2 cars and multiple motorbikes. For Families: - Baby cot is available upon request at extra charge.- High chair is available upon request at extra charge.- Babysitting service available upon request at extra charge.- Children under 4 years old can stay for free when sharing existing bedding with parents. Pool area: - Measuring 26m x 2.5m x 1.4m Chlorinated Pool; - Shallow end for kids; - The pool is set to normal temperature; - There are two sunbeds; - Pool towels are provided. Services at extra charge: - Private chef service is on request (extra charge).- Additional airport transfer service is available upon request (extra charge).- Spa treatments, massages services and additional yoga sessions are available upon request (extra charge).- Tours and activities such as art and cultural excursions, cooking class are available upon request (extra charge). Announcement:  Nyepi Religious Day Please be informed that Bali island celebrates Nyepi (Silent) Day each year on the dates below. Nyepi Day is a day of absolute silence throughout the island and it is observed from 6:00 AM until 6:00 AM the next morning. No outdoor activities are allowed and there will be no check-in and check-out from properties on 19 Mar 2026, 08 Mar 2027 and 26 Mar 2028.

title: 10 BR Family Villas w/ Private Pool & Gym in Ubud
description: Welcome to an extraordinary dual-villa experience in the heart of Pejeng, where Villa Asmara and Villa Kia Ora unite to create the ultimate 10-bedroom retreat. This magnificent sanctuary blends contemporary elegance with Ubud's timeless allure, offering expansive comfort for large families, celebrations, or group escapes seeking authentic Balinese immersion.The spaceTen beautifully appointed bedrooms await across Villa Asmara and Villa Kia Ora, each featuring queen-size beds with twin conversion flexibility and private en-suite bathrooms. Smart TVs and individual air conditioning ensure modern comfort in every room. The crown jewel remains Villa Asmara's master suite, where a semi-outdoor bathtub beneath a charming pergola invites star-gazing soaks that epitomize Balinese romance.Both Villa Asmara and Villa Kia Ora showcase open-plan living areas designed for effortless gathering. Villa Asmara's sunken living room creates intimate conversation nooks, while its striking round dining table welcomes eight for memorable feasts. Villa Kia Ora complements this with additional spacious lounging areas, ensuring everyone finds their perfect spot. Fully equipped kitchens in both villas feature modern appliances, stylish islands, and everything needed for culinary adventures.Two stunning swimming pools serve as the centerpieces of Villa Asmara and Villa Kia Ora, surrounded by daybeds beneath elegant umbrellas and multiple covered seating areas. The combined outdoor spaces create an expansive tropical playground perfect for pool activities, sunset gatherings, or quiet morning meditations. Villa Kia Ora's dedicated yoga shala and private gym cater to wellness enthusiasts seeking rejuvenation.Nestled near Pejeng's ancient temple sites, Villa Asmara and Villa Kia Ora provide convenient access to the Tirta Empul Temple, Gunung Kawi, and Ubud's vibrant cultural scene. From this privileged position, explore artisan villages, discover hidden temples, and immerse yourself in the authentic rhythms of Balinese life while returning each evening to your private sanctuary.Book your stay now and let Villa Asmara and Villa Kia Ora become your gateway to Ubud's enchanting experiences‚Äîwhere space, style, and the soul of Bali converge in perfect harmony.(Please note that your Netflix and YouTube accounts will be used to log in. Ensure you log out before checking out to protect your account from unauthorized use.)STAFF AND SERVICES INCLUDED- Dedicated Villa Manager- Villa Host (Ubud) or Staff (Seminyak/Bukit)- Daily Housekeeping- Garden and Pool StaffEXTRA COSTS (advance notice may be required):- Villa pre-stocking: Groceries and beverages (subject to an additional service fee).- Breakfast by Villa Host (Ubud ONLY): IDR 120.000 per person per meal as a cover charge.- Floating breakfast: IDR 150.000 per tray (for up to 4 guests).- In-villa Chef: Arranged through our trusted partner (see FAQs for details).- Airport transfers: Convenient pick-up and drop-off services.- Driving service: Reliable and professional drivers available on request.- Activities and excursions: Customized experiences to explore Bali.- In-villa massage services: Relax and rejuvenate in your villa's comfort.- Baby-sitting service: Experienced caretakers for your little ones.- Security guards: Additional safety and peace of mind.- Flowers arrangements: Custom designs to enhance your stay.Guest accessRoad Access: Many villas have narrow road access, often suitable for motorcycles only. We can assist with transportation arrangements if needed.Other things to noteIf Nearby Construction Occurs: We value your peaceful stay. In the rare event of construction in our area, our team is ready to assist with any comfort concerns. While neighborhood activities are beyond our control, your relaxation remains our priority. Please don't hesitate to contact us if you need anything to enhance your experience.Natural Ventilation: Experience the refreshing breeze of Bali with our open-air living spaces, designed to maximize natural airflow, providing an eco-friendly alternative to air conditioning or fans.Vendor Services: To ensure the villa's equipment and your safety, our dedicated team manages all vendor services within the villa, including spa, personal training, decorations, private chefs, yoga, photography, and villa equipment. Using external vendors is strictly prohibited and will result in a fine of IDR 2.000.000.Waste Management: Contribute to Bali's sustainable efforts by participating in our waste separation program. We provide three bins for organic, inorganic, and residual waste in your villa.Sustainable Amenities: We provide Sensatia Botanicals, a locally founded skincare brand, as bathroom amenities (hand soap, body soap, shampoo, and conditioner). Made in Bali with 100% natural, cruelty-free ingredients, this partnership reflects our support for sustainability and local initiatives, including plastic recycling and beach cleanups.Natural Charm: Our villas embrace Bali's tropical beauty, where the sounds of nature‚Äîgeckos and insects‚Äîcreate a serene ambiance. The open design may occasionally welcome wildlife, despite regular pest control. Geckos, symbols of good luck in Balinese culture, and other creatures are vital to the ecosystem.  Cultural Respect: In Ubud and Bukit, monkeys may be present‚Äîplease refrain from feeding or interacting with them. Surrounding landscapes, like jungles, rice fields, and local farms (e.g., duck, chicken or pig), are not part of the villa property and may be accessed by residents, with changes beyond our control. We appreciate your respect for Bali‚Äôs natural and cultural heritage.FAQsQ: What time is the check-in policy?A: Our dedicated staff ensures a smooth check-in process. Check-in starts at 14:00 for 1-3 bedroom villas and at 15:00 for 4-6 bedroom villas. Luggage drop-off is welcome after 11:00 as we prepare your villa. Please note, a late check-in fee of IDR 200.000 applies for arrivals after 20:00 to cover staff overtime, as our staff does not stand by the villa all the time.Q: What time is the check-out policy?A: Our check-out time is at 11:00 by default. Late check-out is subject to availability and involves extra charge. Please note that for any late check-out between 11:00 ‚Äì 18:00, an additional charge of 50% of the Daily Villa Rate will apply. Any check-out after 18:00, will be charged at a full day's Daily Villa Rate. If you need to store your luggage after check-out time, you are welcome to do so.Q: Is breakfast included in the booking? How do we order the chef's service?A: Breakfast is not included in the room rate. However, you can easily arrange breakfast by contacting our reservation or concierge team. We offer a variety of menu options prepared by our dedicated private chef, right in your villa. The cost is IDR 160.000 per person, with a minimum order for 5 guests. For smaller guest groups, Breakfast by Chef is available at an additional surcharge of IDR 100.000 per person. You can indulge in a floating breakfast for an additional fee of IDR 150.000 per tray.For lunch and dinner, we offer enhanced services, including set menus, live BBQ cooking, ethnic cuisines, and even fine dining prepared by a Michelin-star chef, all cooked in the villa. Prices for lunch and dinner start at IDR 450.000 per person. Please note that terms and conditions apply for booking.Additionally, our villa features a fully equipped kitchen, allowing you the flexibility to prepare your own meals if you prefer. Whether you choose to dine in or savor a chef‚Äôs touch, our team is here to ensure a seamless and enjoyable experience.Q: Do we have a housekeeping service every day?A: Absolutely! Daily housekeeping is provided from 9:00 to 17:00. Linens are changed every third day for sustainability. To ensure privacy, please coordinate with your Villa Host or Staff for a convenient cleaning time. Your comfort is our priority.Q: Can we have extra clean towels?A: Certainly! We are happy to provide extra towels, subject to availability. title: 6BR Beachfront Villa ideal for Families/Events
description: Discover Villa Candani, a stunning 6-bedroom beachfront villa in Ketewel, Bali, perfect for families, groups, and weddings. title: The Longhouse Jimbaran - Bali

Whether you‚Äôre looking for a private chef, a relaxing massage, or a special breakfast by the pool, these services are designed to ensure that your stay is as luxurious and tailored to your preferences as possible..About Bali‚Äôs Nature and AnimalsOne of the beautiful things about staying in Bali is being surrounded by tropical nature. You may occasionally see small local animals such as geckos, frogs, butterflies, and harmless insects around the villa. These creatures are part of Bali‚Äôs natural environment and help keep the ecosystem in balance.Please don‚Äôt be alarmed ‚Äî they are not dangerous and are a normal part of island life. The project is about 50% complete, with working hours from 8 AM to 4 PM.As a courtesy, we are offering a 25% discount for any potential inconvenience (listed as a long-stay discount on Airbnb).VILLA OVERVIEWExclusively designed by a German architect, this villa spans over 1,000 square meters (10,000 sq ft) of living space on a 15,000 sq ft property. It features two infinity pools overlooking the Indian Ocean:The upper pool (15 meters long) is designed like a ship elevated above ground.A smaller pool is located on the first level.Enjoy uninterrupted ocean views, the soothing sound of waves breaking against the cliffs, and a constant sea breeze from every corner of this villa.Your personal butler and security guards are available 24 hours a day.Included in your stay: daily housekeeping, laundry, complimentary drinking water, a welcome drink, cool towel, and a basket of tropical fruits upon arrival.These warm, personalized services reflect the gracious hospitality that defines the true Bali experience.For extended services ‚Äî including daily breakfast or floating breakfast, in-house spa treatments, private driver, and international chef ‚Äî please email us for details.The owner also has VIP access to Savaya Uluwatu, one of South Bali‚Äôs trendiest venues.**Please Note**Two rates are offered, Additionally, 85 photos have been uploaded ‚Äî please scroll to the final photos for beach images below the villa.Direct access to the beach is no longer available, but a public path next to the villa can still be used for beach access.THE VILLA LAYOUTUpper LevelThe upper level accommodates the living and entertainment areas, air-conditioned kitchen, dining room, open BBQ area, and master suite.A 3 x 15-meter lap pool on stilts faces the Indian Ocean, with water overflowing into the lower-level pool and pond ‚Äî creating the gentle, ever-present sound of flowing water.Two daybeds can be converted into six lounge chairs. Follow the wooden path to the oceanfront bale, where you can enjoy your morning coffee or afternoon tea with a sea breeze and stunning views.A candlelit dinner at the cliff‚Äôs edge can also be arranged upon request.Lower LevelThe lower level features a small sandy area with a daybed facing the ocean and the lower pool ‚Äî an ideal space for a spa or yoga retreat.The smaller pool (9 x 5 meters) and adjacent pond provide a safe, shallow area perfect for children.This level also includes one entertainment room and two bedrooms.BedroomsAll bedrooms are fully air-conditioned.The main master suite (upper floor) features a California king-size bed, floor-to-ceiling glass windows overlooking the pool and cliff, an en-suite bathroom with bathtub, double sinks, and wardrobe.The second bedroom (lower level) includes twin single beds facing the garden and pool, with a bathroom featuring double sinks and a shower.Common AreasLiving room with comfortable sofasBBQ / outdoor lounging areaOceanfront bale and daybed areaFully equipped modern kitchen and dining areaFACILITIES & FEATURES:‚Ä¢	6 staff members available around the clock, including your personal butler, international chef (extra cost), two housekeepers, gardener, and security guards‚Ä¢	Note: Chef and driver are included in the Extended Service package.‚Ä¢	Cliff-front views from both master bedrooms‚Ä¢	Two swimming pools (15-meter elevated lap pool + 9 x 4-meter lower pool)‚Ä¢	LCD TV with multi-channel entertainment room‚Ä¢	Safety box in all bedrooms‚Ä¢	Outdoor BBQ area with full equipment and refrigerator‚Ä¢	Wi-Fi throughout the villa‚Ä¢	Complimentary welcome drink, cool towel, coffee/tea, and drinking water‚Ä¢	Complimentary laundry (dry cleaning at extra cost)‚Ä¢	24-hour security‚Ä¢	Candlelit dinner at the cliff edge (available upon request)‚Ä¢	Floating breakfast (served Ritz-Carlton or Four Seasons style) (available upon request)‚Ä¢	Staff work 8 consecutive hours; title: LaBianca Villa, NEW4 BR Seaview in Lembongan
description: LaBianca Villa, a Mediterranean-tropical haven overlooking the ocean and Bali‚Äôs golden sunsets.‚Ä¢ Infinity terrazzo pool with ocean & sunset views‚Ä¢ Elegant design: solid teak, quality fabrics & unique arty decor‚Ä¢ Daily breakfast included‚Ä¢ Daily in-villa service‚Ä¢ Integrated sound system‚Ä¢ Family-friendly: baby equipment‚Ä¢ Starlink Wi-FiBeaches and surf spots (Playground & Lago) just steps awayExtras:‚Ä¢ Ocean-view massages‚Ä¢ Private chef, BBQ‚Ä¢ Private boat‚Ä¢ -10% with Jetski Adventure!The spaceLaBianca Villa ‚Äì a Mediterranean-tropical haven in Nusa LembonganLocated in the heart of Tamarind Bay, LaBianca Villa is a spacious 4-bedroom retreat where Mediterranean elegance meets tropical charm. Facing the ocean, it features an infinity terrazzo pool with a beach-like feel, wide sun loungers, and sweeping views over the sea, lush green hills, and unforgettable sunsets. Just a 3-minute walk from a white sand beach, it combines comfort, style, and island soul ‚Äî the perfect setting for couples, families, or groups of friends.BEDROOMSThe Master Suite enjoys double exposure overlooking the pool, hillside, and ocean. It comes with a private terrace, a king-size bed, an outdoor bathtub/plunge pool, and a large ensuite bathroom with walk-in closet.The 2nd and 3rd bedrooms face the pool and ocean, each with a king-size bed, spacious wardrobe, and ensuite bathroom.The 4th bedroom, garden-side, has a queen-size bed and ensuite bathroom. It can also be set up as a TV room (55" smart TV) or a kids‚Äô playroom. More private, it is ideal and safe for younger guests.LIVING SPACESThe villa celebrates Mediterranean-tropical living through generous open areas:- A bright and flexible living room, fully open to the outside or air-conditioned,- A solid teak kitchen with premium appliances (American fridge, wine cellar, quality equipment),- A large dining/bar table for up to 8 guests,- A shaded pergola for meals,- An elevated teak terrace, perfect for sunsets or enjoying a massage with an ocean view.RELAXATION & ENTERTAINMENT- Infinity terrazzo pool with beach-like design, perfect to relax facing the ocean,- Foosball table for fun and convivial moments,- Integrated indoor/outdoor sound system for music anytime,SERVICES INCLUDED - Daily breakfast included,- Daily housekeeping included, with a dedicated Villa Manager available anytime.On request: private chef, BBQ, in-villa massages, and activity arrangements (snorkeling, island tours),EXTRASJetski Adventure by LaBianca: guests enjoy an exclusive 10% discount,LaBianca Restaurant, right on Jungutbatu Beach, serving Mediterranean flavors with a Balinese soul ‚Äì an unmissable spot just steps from the villa.A TOUCH OF ART & CRAFTSMANSHIPEvery detail has been carefully considered: teak wood flooring, windows, and kitchen, high-quality fabrics, and refined furniture create a warm and elegant atmosphere.The villa is also decorated with unique pieces of craftsmanship and contemporary art: woven baskets from Sumatra crafted by a women‚Äôs association, pop art paintings from a local artist, and original photography by a renowned photographer. These touches give LaBianca Villa its unique, chic, and inspiring soul.Guest accessAccess to Lembongan is simple and convenient through Sanur Port, where fast boats depart daily to Nusa Lembongan and Penida. On Lembongan, your preferred arrival points will be Jungutbatu Beach or Mushroom Bay, with no fewer than 20 round trips per day.Upon arrival, the LaBianca team will welcome you at the harbor of your choice and escort you to the villa, located just one kilometer away. With very few private cars on Lembongan, traffic jams are non-existent. Getting around is easy with 125cc scooters, mountain bikes, e-bikes, e-buggies, or local taxi trucks, all readily available for rent or on request.Other things to note- The villa is equipped with Starlink high-speed WiFi, ensuring a stable and reliable connection throughout your stay.- The water is treated with a reverse osmosis (RO) filtration system, providing excellent quality for daily use.- An integrated audio system allows you to enjoy music both indoors and outdoors, creating a unique atmosphere throughout the villa.- A projector is available for unforgettable outdoor movie nights under the stars.- Check-in from 2:00 PM and check-out until 11:00 AM. You are welcome to leave your luggage before check-in or after check-out, either at the villa or at our LaBianca restaurant located on Jungutbatu beach.- We can help arrange your boat transfers from Bali to Nusa Lembongan for a smooth and stress-free arrival (at your own cost)- Getting around the island is easy by scooter, bicycle, or buggy ‚Äî rentals can be organized upon request.- Electricity and water are valuable resources on the island, so we kindly ask our guests to use them mindfully.- Breakfast is included each morning, and we can also organize private chef dinners, barbecues, or even beach picnics.

title: Luxury 6BR Villa with Premium Kids Playground.
description: The Myki, is a spacious, luxury villa which has recently been renovated to a meticulously high standard. The villa contains six, air-conditioned bedrooms, with en-suites.‚Ä®‚Ä® Large indoor living with air-conditioning, kitchen with a full-time chef, plus four full-time staff.Outside, living space, includes day beds and a pool with its own bar and huge playground for the kids.‚Ä®‚Ä® Located just 800m from Finns Beach Club and Berawa beach, it is also close to many popular cafes and restaurants.The spaceThe Myki Berawa was crafted with luxurious family and friends‚Äô experiences in mind. title: Luxury Retreat in Berawa, Canggu
description: Nestled in the most desirable town of Canggu, our villa is surrounded by picturesque Balinese scenery and is situated close to renowned beach clubs, excellent surfing waves, music live scenes, yoga centers, spas and a variety of dining options.The spaceThis listing refers to the booking of 10 bedrooms in 2 connected villas with 2 swimming pools.Featuring five beautifully designed and fully air-conditioned bedrooms with queen-sized beds, our villa ensures a comfortable night's rest for all guests.  The top floor features a dreamy master bedroom with a flat screen TV, a generously-sized wardrobe and an en-suite bathroom with resort-style facilities, including a deep soaking tub. Two additional bedrooms on this floor are connected by a terrace, while the remaining two rooms on the ground floor come with their own veranda to enjoy some fresh air.Step outside and you'll be greeted by Bali's lush natural beauty, with an abundance of flowers and plants in the garden and a T-shaped swimming pool on an elevated platform for a refreshing dip after a day of sightseeing. The pool area also features a gazebo where the whole family can enjoy a meal while taking in the stunning views of the water. The top floor terrace is furnished with a soothing green area and two water fixtures, providing a peaceful retreat for guests.Inside, the villa is just as opulent with two living rooms boasting floor-to-ceiling windows that open directly into an elegant dining room with a large wooden table that can seat the whole family. Our self-sufficient villa also provides guests with access to an expansive, fully-equipped kitchen with modern appliances.

title: family-friendly 8 bedroom pool villa in Canggu
description: The Villa is located in the village of Pererenan in the north Canggu area. The Villa is a vast eight-bedroom home built on 3,600sqm of land offering rice-field and sea views, just a ten-minute stroll from the beach in popular Canggu. It‚Äôs well designed with multiple relaxation areas ‚Äì both air-conditioned and open-air, indoor and alfresco dining, a spa, gym, media room, 17-metre main pool and 6-metre kids pool.The spaceThe main pavilion at the villa combines a very spacious lounge, dining room and entrance hall adorned with original artworks and antiques. Sliding glass doors on two sides of this bright room lead out to the garden and overlook the neighbouring rice fields. In the dining space is a long table with seating for 12 and a bar area, while at the centre of the room, under an impressive double-height ceiling depicting scenes from Balinese mythology, is an arrangement of comfortable sofas, chairs and coffee tables. A media room with cosy couches and a 60-inch TV adjoins the far end of this elegant living space. On a terrace alongside the pool, is a dining table for 12 sheltered by a retractable awning to keep the tropical sun at bay. Outside the spa under a high wooden ceiling is a sitting area with soft sofas and chairs arranged next to a koi pond. It looks out over the garden and pool and is positioned to catch the sea breezes. At the far end of the property is a cool, white-themed, open-sided pool lounge, furnished with leather sofas, coffee tables and a drinks bar, as well as a large bale.

title: Amazing 7 Bedroom Heart Of Seminyak-Oberoi
description: The Villa sits on 1800sqm of landscaped gardens just 300m from Seminyak‚Äôs best beach, featuring 7 bedroom Villa. The Villa, right in the heart of prestigious Oberoi district, is only 300 meters from Ku De Ta and can comfortably accommodate up to 16 guests.The spaceThe villa consist of a 6 bedroom and 4 bedroom connected villa, both feature L shaped, signature swimming pools, huge living rooms, indoor and outdoor lounging and dining, pool tables, vast individual bedroom suites, world-class interior design with a distinct Balinese theme, and every conceivable luxury for the sophisticated holidaymaker. We will lock three of the bedroom during your stay, and two only if you book for 16 guest.The villa has unrivalled facilities with 15 full-time staff, including a private butler for each villa, chefs, housekeeping, gardener and trained security, plus on-demand chauffeurs, spa therapists and concierge, all of whom are dedicated to ensuring guests are pampered during every moment of their stay, except of course when they hang out the red ‚Äòdo not disturb‚Äô flag to ensure total privacy.Guest accessIndoor livingThe vast open-sided and open-plan living areas that spread across the garden levels of the two pavilions form the social hubs of the villa. These are spectacular spaces for relaxing and entertaining, defined by soaring teakwood columns and skillfully divided into separate activity areas, with the swimming pools edging almost into the rooms. On one side, conversation is sure to flow with the configuration of oversized sofas arranged around huge coffee tables, set before bars with stools, drinks fridges and glass jars full of snacks. With an equally social focus, full-size billiard tables are centrally located. Opposite, comfortable sofas and armchairs are grouped around 52, 46 and 40 inch flat-screen satellite TVs and home entertainment systems.The dining areas are equally generous. The 6 bedroom side of the estate offers an enormous slab of teakwood fashioned into a statement dining table seating 20 people, with room to spare. A smaller, but equally attractive table is provided on the 4 bedroom side. Behind an island buffet of black granite, are guest kitchens, which are well equipped with American-style fridges, hobs, ovens, microwaves and an extensive collection of plates and utensils housed in handsome wooden cupboards. Doors from these areas lead to the 'back of house' section, with separate staff kitchen allowing for extra guest privacy whilst the resident chefs are preparing meals.Outdoor livingThe villa offers a wide range of outdoor living areas in keeping with the same highly social space planning that define its interiors. The 12m and 14m swimming pools, with water-feature on the boundary walls and wide shallow steps leading towards the living areas, are the perfect spots to cool off, while ironwood decks with stylish sun loungers shaded by beautiful parasols provide ideal settings for alfresco siestas or refreshing sundowners.The many terraces and decks at both levels of all three pavilions provide opportunities for private relaxation while enjoying views of the beautifully landscaped gardens, with an old Cambodia frangipani, a sacred Pohon Pile tree and Sawit date palms that have been specially imported from Java.Other things to noteGuests who wish to enjoy home cooking in the privacy of the Villa will appreciate the resident full time chef who will happily prepare a wide range of Balinese, Asian and international dishes.Food and beverage chargesAll provisions can be purchased by our housekeepers and charged to guests at cost price. Shopping receipts will be provided either daily or at the end of the stay ‚Äì at your option.  It is requested that our staff be given a ‚Äòfloat‚Äô to cover the grocery shopping.Wine, beer, spirits and soft drinks are also available upon request and an account will be presented for settlement at the end of your stay.StaffGuests of the villa are looked after, with great attention to detail, by a dedicated team of professionals drawn from the local community, under the direction of our villa manager. Our staff are trained to anticipate their guests‚Äô every whim with typical Balinese charm and a ready smile. They are very much part of the villa experience.Villa manager	Our villa manager is responsible for the overall operation of the villa, including staffing and guest satisfaction. Fluent in English, she warmly familiarizes guests with the villa on arrival and is only a phone call away should you have any special requests.Chef	The resident full time chef is skilled at cooking a wide array of international and Indonesian cuisine.Housekeepers	A team of seven housekeepers takes care of cleaning and tidying the villa in shifts from 7am to 11pm. They also prepare breakfast and can shop for groceries if required.Gardener/pool attendant	A gardener discreetly tends to the pools and gardens every day.Spa therapists	Fully trained spa therapists will visit the villa upon request to provide massages and other spa treatments on guest account.Security	Night-time security is provided by trained staff.SpaFeel like a body scrub or massage? Just ask our staff to bring the spa to you! We can recommend deluxe treatments carried out in the privacy of the villa ‚Äì be it by the pool, on the terrace or in the cool of the bedroom ‚Äì by fully trained therapists from a reputable local spa (extra charges will apply). Here‚Äôs a sample of what‚Äôs on the menu:Balinese massageRelease built up tension with a traditional Balinese massage. Using a combination of gentle stretches, acupressure and aromatherapy oils to stimulate the flow of blood, oxygen and energy around your body, you will feel totally relaxed in no time.Foot reflexologyFoot reflexology is a natural healing art based on the principle that there are reflexes in the feet which correspond to every part of the body. Through application of pressure on these reflexes tension is relieved and circulation improved leaving you feeling balanced.Body scrubA full body scrub will exfoliate and hydrate your skin leaving it soft and smooth. A rejuvenating scrub combines an abrasive material such as salt, coffee, rice bran or pecan hulls with essential oils to remove any impurities and make your skin glow.Manicure/pedicureOur hands and feet work hard for us every day but rarely get the attention they deserve. Treat them to a manicure or pedicure, which usually comes with the added bonus of a quick hand or foot massage.FamiliesThe family-friendly advantages of a villa holiday are many and varied, including access to your own private facilities and the freedom to use them whenever you want. Knowing that the kids can run around happily, independently and safely, without you having to worry about other guests, is real plus ‚Äì and ensures that parents are certain to have a more relaxed holiday.The villa is ideal for families. Younger children can be easily supervised in the pools, as they are visible from all areas of the open-plan living room, and will enjoy watching TV in the living areas or the second floor media room. Older kids will gravitate to the billiard tables, appreciate the size and privacy of the bedrooms, and revel in the chance to wander out safely to the beach, shops and nightlife of Seminyak.Our friendly staff will make children feel as welcome as adults, and having these willing helpers on hand gives guests plenty of flexibility and freedom to do their own exploring beyond the villa grounds (full-time babysitting incurs a small extra cost). Although well equipped kitchens allow you to prepare meals for fussy eaters or babies with ease, staff will happily do this for you ‚Äì just talk through your requirements and meal schedules with the villa manager or chef and they will take care of the rest.Nor do you have to worry about packing all that cumbersome extra equipment. When you stay at the villa, we can provide you with all the essentials. We have a cot and high chair, and anything we don‚Äôt have in-house, we can generally hire for a small fee. Just talk through your requirements with us when you make your reservation and we‚Äôll make sure it‚Äôs all ready and waiting for your arrival.We are required by local regulations to charge occupancy tax. Villa rate is subject to 15,5% government taxes and services charge, not included in the price of the reservation and have to be paid directly upon check-in. See more here: airbnb/help/article/318/how-do-taxes-work-for-guests

title: Prestigious Luxury 8 BR Villa in Central Seminyak
description: Situated just 10 minutes walking from Seminyak‚Äôs beach, shops, restaurants and nightlife, the fully staffed at this Villa is like no other vacation home in Seminyak.This is a listing for 8 bedroom option, for up to 16 guests.The villa is actually a 10-bedroom accommodation, to sleep up to 20 guests.Please contact us if you need the full 10-bedroom option.The spaceYou will likely be amazed by the calm and peaceful serenity of the place.The perfect place for business seminars, yoga retreats, or family reunionsDouble living room communicating with one another, outside barbecue area with bar, pool lounge, sky lounge, meditation area with yoga pavilion overlooking a beautiful buddha and the lush greenery of the garden, Fully equipped gymnasium, private soundproof cinema room with a 155-inch screen and several hundred films,  17m and 12m pools with 20 sunbeds, a superb decoration and attentive staff who will prepare various cocktails before serving at the table the delicious meal that you will have prepared the chef.In the foreground the pool of 12 meters, then the mirror pool of 17 meters ending with a gazebo.The pool deck is furnished with 20 comfortable sun loungers shaded by umbrellas.THE SERVICES- Villa manager- In-house staff and butler- Night security- Welcome service- Daily cleaning and villa maintenance- Swimming pool and garden maintenance- Concierge serviceOther things to note*Please state in your inquiry if you'd require airport transfers.* Please treat the villa and furniture as if you would need your own. The Villa is to be left in a condition equal to when the guests arrive. The guests will be held responsible for any loss or damage to the property caused by themselves, or their guests. Any breakages will be charged on a replacement value.*Help us remain green by conserving/saving energy. Please turn off the air conditioner, lights, and all other electrical appliances when you leave the villa.* If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me. will be glad to help you.

title: Connecting luxe villas, 8BR in central Seminyak!
description: beautiful villa complex featuring adjoining villas that can be rented in a variety of configurations. This listing refers to the booking of two identical 4-bedroom villas, 8 bedrooms in total.The spaceOutdoor living areasThe villa is situated on a sprawling 570 m¬≤ of tropical paradise, surrounded by lush exotic gardens and well-manicured lawns. Guests are invited to immerse themselves in the lush beauty of their surroundings while enjoying the perfect mix of relaxation and luxury. The highlight of the outdoor living areas is the stunning T-shaped swimming pool, a perfect place to cool off and soak up the sun. For those seeking ultimate relaxation, there is a beautiful extralarge day bed, where guests can lounge in total comfort and soak in the beauty of the surroundings.Indoor living areasNestled within the lush tropical gardens of the property, the indoor living area presents a stunning open-air pavilion that seamlessly blends indoor and outdoor living. This spacious and tastefully designed living area boasts a grand high roof that enhances the already luxurious atmosphere.Furnished with designer sofas and a beautifully crafted wooden dining table, this living space is perfect for lounging and entertaining. The well-equipped kitchen will allow you to whip up delicious meals with ease. The attention to detail in the interior design adds a touch of sophistication to your stay, creating a truly unforgettable experience.BedroomsThe four bedrooms of the villa are a perfect blend of comfort and luxury. One is conveniently located adjacent to the living pavilion, while the other three are found in the two-story building. The ground floor houses two bedrooms, each equipped with a cozy double bed, TV with DVD player, spacious dressing room, and an opulent tropical bathroom with either a bathtub or shower. The grand master suite is located on the upper level and features an indulgent outdoor bathtub, as well as access to a beautifully furnished terrace. Each of the bedrooms is a haven of comfort and style.StaffAt the villa, guests are treated to top-notch luxury services, thanks to the attentive and gracious butlers and attendants. Wake up to a delicious daily breakfast, prepared in the privacy of your own kitchen, and enjoy butler service from 7 AM to 11 PM. The daily housekeeping, front office, and security teams ensure a seamless and stress-free stay. And, for families traveling with little ones, baby cots, trolleys, and car seats are available upon request.With the help of the friendly staff, arrange for an array of extra services, including in-villa dining, rejuvenating spa treatments, exciting day trips, and convenient transportation.Location The estate is situated in the heart of Seminyak, just a stone's throw away from the bustling Jalan Kayu Api, also known as Eat Street. This prime location is a foodie's paradise, with an abundance of world-renowned restaurants and dining destinations at your fingertips.Only a 10-minute walk away from the iconic Seminyak Beach, this area is a haven for those seeking sun, sea and relaxation. Surrounded by world-class spas and boutique shops, guests will never be short of things to do. With popular hotspots such as Ku De Ta beach club and dining destinations like Chandi and Sisterfields in the vicinity, this area is the epitome of tropical luxury.

title: Karma Kandara 3 Bedroom Garden View Pool Villa
description: Karma Kandara blends traditional Balinese architecture with luxury amenities to create a series of private villas, each formed from pavilions arranged around their own tropical courtyard and private pool. The two-, three-, and four-bedroom villas feature natural stone, teakwood decks, and indigenous grass or ironwood tile roofs.The spaceThese three bedroom pool villas, have a spacious open plan living room, dining table for six and a fully equipped kitchen ‚Äì allowing the space to function as a luxurious holiday home. All of these villas also include, a spacious terrace with infinity pool, sun loungers and dining area. title: Traditional Joglo Retreat 10BR Villa Jimbaran
description: The entrance to this exquisite retreat welcomes you with a sense of grandeur, reminiscent of a luxurious. title: Aruna Escape - Unique Jungle Villa Near Center
description: ARUNA ESCAPE is the newest Villa at Casa Pohon Ubud. It is a luxurious wooden Villa nested by the heart of nature, this dreamy house is a perfect retreat! Slow down and let yourself be surrounded by the best of Ubud Jungle, just 10 minutes ride from the lively Ubud center.Have a look at our other unique Houses listed on Airbnb! And follow us for more visuals at @casapohonThe spaceARUNA ESCAPE seats right by the tree canopy, above the river,  this surroundings brings a cool vibe all year round. Designed as a perfect escape for couples searching for privacy and peace, we proudly present our honeymoon suite, It is located within the Casa Pohon Ubud complex, a small eco-friendly resort of only four unique retreats all with their own soul and character. Our friendly local staff of seven will be at your service 24h ensuring you have the best experience possible in and outside your house.To ensure the best of experience, Aruna comes with a spacious one bedroom with its own lounge area, patio overlooking the forest, garden, jungle bathtub with unbeatable view, and a hanging sofa. It also has a en-suite bathroom with hot water shower with a view of the forest. On request, a single bed can be placed in the room to accommodate one additional child or adult. The poolside patio is an extraordinary spot to relax and soaks in the nature and watch the sky through the canopy of trees.We‚Äôve taken care of all the facilities you need: king size bed with 100% cotton linens, AC, hot water as well as other listed below.Included with Your Stay:Daily Breakfasts ‚Äì Start your day with a delicious, heatrtful complimentary breakfast.Coffee & Tea ‚Äì A selection of various coffees and teas available throughout the day.Daily Housekeeping ‚Äì Enjoy a clean, fresh room every day.Evening Turn-Down Service ‚Äì Relax with a beautifully prepared room each evening.Fast WiFi ‚Äì Stay connected with high-speed internet throughout the property.Additional Services Available On-Site:Massages & Spa Services ‚Äì Pamper yourself with rejuvenating treatments at the spa.Private Yoga Sessions ‚Äì Find your zen with personalized yoga classes.Driver, Tours & Activities Around Ubud ‚Äì Explore the beauty of Ubud with private drivers and guided tours.Minibars ‚Äì Stocked with refreshments and snacks for your convenience including champagne, wine, and local spirits.Scooter Rentals ‚Äì Explore the area on your own with an easy scooter rental.You'll find several dining options as Ubud center is only 10 minutes away by car. If you wish to have your meals delivered instead, just ask our staff and we‚Äôll take care of everything.Guest accessThe road leading to the villa is small, which can be inconvenient for some drivers. As a result, guests are often dropped off on the road away from the property and have to walk with their luggage. To avoid this inconvenience, we highly recommend booking our driver for private transport service. Simply let us know where you're traveling from, and we'll send you an estimate. This way, you can arrive at our property with ease and without any complications. However, if this happens, please convince your driver that it is a residential area where all sized cars go in and out daily.Other things to noteLong before our arrival, these scenic rice fields, rivers and rainforests already had tiny insects. We thrive with the highest cleaning and pest control standards and do our best to keep them out of hotel doors. However, some creatures will inevitably pay us a visit. Natural insect repellents are available in the villa should you need one.

title: Lovely Private Room 7m to t'Beach ‚Ä¢ VDGH1

description: Located in the heart of Seminyak, these luxurious villas blend contemporary design and spacious comfort, all within walking distance of the beach. Depending on the number of bedrooms booked (10, 12, 14, 16, 18, or 20), guests will have access to:All Bedrooms & En-Suite Bathrooms ‚Äì Spacious, fully air-conditioned rooms with private en-suite bathrooms.Private Swimming Pool(s) ‚Äì A serene pool area, perfect for relaxation and social gatherings.Living & Lounge Areas ‚Äì Open-air and enclosed living spaces for socializing, unwinding, or enjoying entertainment.Dining Area & Fully Equipped Kitchen ‚Äì Ideal for private dining experiences, whether self-catered or with a private chef (additional charge).Lush Tropical Gardens & Illuminated Pathways ‚Äì Tranquil outdoor areas to immerse in Bali‚Äôs beauty.Private Entrance & Parking Area ‚Äì Secure and convenient access for guests.Throughout their stay, guests can enjoy the entire villa without any shared spaces, ensuring a luxurious and intimate retreat.Other things to noteFlexible Bedroom Configurations: Our villa can be arranged as 10, 12, 14, 16, 18, or 20-bedroom accommodations, making it ideal for various group sizes and events. Please confirm your preferred setup before arrival.Daily Housekeeping & Butler Services: Our dedicated team ensures a seamless stay, offering daily housekeeping and butler service to cater to your needs throughout your stay.Inclusive Breakfast & Private Chef Services: Daily breakfast is included in your stay. For lunch and dinner, a private chef service is available at an additional charge and must be booked in advance.Pool Safety: Please note that the pools do not have lifeguards. Guests are responsible for their own safety, especially with children.Respect for the Neighborhood: To ensure a peaceful environment for all, any kind of music played on Bluetooth speakers must be turned off by 11:00 PM.We look forward to welcoming you and ensuring a truly memorable stay!

title: New Majestic Sea Front 6BR Villa
description: Villa Luna is a 2700 sq.m estate Located in the exclusive Sandy Bay area on Lembongan Island, a 30mn boat ride from Sanur, Bali.Perched atop a cliff, it offers spectacular sunsets&views of the Bali Sea &Majestic Volcanoes. Dolphins&Turtles can be spotted at times‚úî4mnwalk SandyBay BeachClub‚úî12mnwalk/900m Devil‚ÄôsTears for spectacular waves show‚úî12mnwalk/900m DreamBeach for a swim‚úî6 BR with AC & en-suite BathRm(max 18 guests)‚úîTV room&WiFi‚úîProfessional kitchen‚úîBreakfast incl.‚úîStaff&managerThe spaceVilla Luna is is located in Jalan Sandy Bay, Lembongan, Bali.Maximum capacity: 18 guests (anyone of 2y old or more is counted as a guest).The system can charge you for 16 guests maximum. If you are a group of 17 or 18 guests, we will adjust your nightly fee accordingly after your booking (30usd/night/each extra guest beyond the initial 16). Make sure you read the ‚ÄúBedding Organisation‚Äù below.Perched atop a low cliff, Villa Luna is a breathtaking and majestic seafront estate of 2700 sq.m welcoming guests in search of an immersion into beauty and minimalism. It offers spectacular views of the Bali Sea with the majestic Bali volcanoes and coastline as a unique backdrop. While the sight of the waves crashing against the rocks never cease to impress, dolphins & turtles can be spotted at times ... a true gift from Nature for the lucky ones.Villa Luna boasts eco friendly structures including solar panels that generate most of its electricity and a water desalination system providing fresh and potable water throughout the property.Your arrivalUpon your arrival at Mushroom Bay, our dedicated team will be delighted to provide complimentary transportation to Villa Luna Lembongan, ensuring a seamless and convenient start to your stay. We provide one free complimentary pick up per stay from Mushroom Bay or from your Hotel in Lembongan.The SpiritUnlock the Javanese gate and step into the serene garden, where two magnificent frangipani trees stand alongside flamboyant bougainvillea. Follow the path of smooth stepping stones that lead you to the threshold of the main villa. As you push open the heavy door, a sense of exclusivity, spaciousness, and harmony will seize you. Villa Luna has been meticulously designed with a focus on architecture, layout, premium materials, furnishings, and decoration, all aimed at creating a tranquil, welcoming, and soothing environment. It embodies the tropical architectural metaphor of "less is more."Highlights*The magnificent infinity pool, an impressive 18 meters by 8 meters with a depth of 150 centimeters, reflects the sky and seamlessly merges with the ocean. Adorned with green stones from Java, it invites both swimmers and sunbathers, featuring a shallow area along its perimeter.* the expansive 21-meters pergola facing the sea and the spectacular sunsets, an idyllic setting for relaxation and outdoor dining in the shade* the high ceiling of the living area adorned with intricately woven rattan and showcasing the exceptional craftsmanship of Indonesia.*The oversized sliding glass doors frame the living area, allowing you to embrace the fresh ocean breeze when opened, or create a cozy sanctuary while still enjoying the panoramic views when closed.* the 2 bungalows facing the sea with their generous volumes, their remarkably weaved high ceiling and their bathtub* the 4 bright and spacious bedrooms located in the main villa with their natural touches and colors, fostering privacy and calm. Each of their bathroom features a bougainvilliers tree bathed in natural sunlight and grows on a bed of white stones.*The contemporary guest kitchen, crafted from teak wood and black granite, provides a stylish and functional space for your culinary needs.*The professional kitchen showcases stainless steel fixtures and a wide array of equipment and utensils, including an oven and a wine fridge.* the comfortable and spacious TV room equipped with a SMART TV. It offers a variety of applications including popular streaming services like Netflix and Amazon Prime Video, music streaming platforms like Spotify and Apple Music, and gaming options through GameFly and GameTree TV. To ensure seamless access to these streaming services and gaming options, guests are advised to bring their own login credentials and passwords. This will allow them to log in to their personal accounts and make the most of the available entertainment options on the SMART TV.Included Services* One complimentary pick up at Mushroom Bay or from your hotel in Lembongan* Breakfast (Indonesian or English). Served between 8am and 10am* Villa manager : your experienced and knowledgeable manager is responsible for the overall operation of the villa. The villa manager will oversee and coordinate the staff and property and assist you during your stay.* Housekeeping: staff will attend the villa daily to take care of all domestic duties . Service occurs once a day * Night guard* Gardener* Pool technician* Fresh potable water* 2 baby chairsBedding Organisation:There are 6 independent bedrooms with AC and en suite bathrooms, all NON-SMOKING: 4 of them are located in the main villa (Joglo) while 2 others are located in independent bungalows* 14 guests can be accomodated in bedsBedrooms 1 and 2 (in the main villa/Joglo) : 1 bed of 200 x 200cm and 1 bed of 90 x 200cmBedrooms 3 and 4 (in the main villa/Joglo): 1 bed of 200 x 200cmBungalows 1 and 2: 1 bed of 200 x 200cm* 2 extra floor Mattresses available ( 90 x 200cm /36 x 79" )* 2 single sofa beds in the TV room. Guests occupying the TV room will have to share a bathroom with other guests*2 baby cots available at 10usd/night eachAmenities for rent:* 2 baby cots available at 10usd/night each* Pool fence: 40usd/dayHouse Rules:We remind you that, according to AirBnB Community Standards, guests should respect the host property* The maximum capacity of this villa is 18 people. Anyone of 2y old or more is counted as a guest* Any extra guest beyond guest number 12 is charged 30usd/day.* Check in time 2pm until 6.30pm* Check out time: until 10am, at the latest !!* Pets are not allowed* No smoking in the bedrooms and bathrooms* As we respect our environment with Lembongan's fresh water supply reaching very low level especially during the dry season linens and towels will be changed every 3 days, unless asked otherwise, Charges apply. Txs for your cooperation.* Treat our villa as if it was your home. Please keep our villa clean and safe. Don't let stale food in the open air and don't let food/beverages spilled/drying up on tables/kitchen counter as it attracts ants, insects, cats, rodents and it stains the furniture. Keep the garbage bin area located in the kitchen clean. We provide our guests with a clean environment and we expect our guests to leave our place clean too. Our staff cleans the villa every day but this should not be an invitation to leave the space untidy.* Do not open beer bottles using the black marble table top nor any table top. There are bottle openers at your disposal in the kitchen cabinet* Break it/Pay it policy* Guests cannot play loud music that could disturb the neighbors* Parties / events must be authorized (charges might apply)* Walking on the cliff is strictly forbiddenVery important reminder:* According to AirBnB Community Standards, guests should not disturb common spaces, treat neighbors as ‚Äúfront desk staff,‚Äù create a pervasive nuisance for those around them, or persistently fail to respond to neighbor or community concerns. As hosts and members of our local community, we are responsible for our guests‚Äô behaviour towards our neighbourhood.* Fireworks are strictly forbiddenIn case of violation of these House Rules, our manager or the security night guard will hand you a written warning notice. In case of repeated violation, we will contact AirBnB to lodge a formal complaint, which as per Airbnb rules and policy, will most likely lead to the cancellation of the booking and immediate departure without refundGuest accessGuest will have access to the entire villaOther things to noteA few recommendations that we encourage you to observe during your stay to make it as comfortable as possible:* Close your doors and windows at all times to avoid mosquitoes from getting inside your bedroom or bathroom.* Close your doors and windows at all times to keep your bedroom at a comfortable temperature, should you be using the AC. Our AC are cleaned regularly. However, letting warm air getting inside your bedroom makes their functioning less effective.* Bali being a tropical island, it is not unusual to spot exotic animals from time to time (bats, lizards, bugs‚Ä¶). All of them are completely harmless and part of local everyday life.* The main villa living/common area is semi-open with no AC. However ceiling fans are available and the sliding glass door can be opened, allowing the natural breeze to flow/circulate throughout the space.* Please note that on the island, whilst usually short, occasional blackouts do happen. If this unlikely event happens, the Villa is equipped with lithium-battery backup providing continuity of services for all essential services (note that AC will not operate during blackout nor tap water. However, potable water is available from the water dispenser).===FAQs- Q: What is the Check-in time policy?-A: Check-in time is at 14:00 at the earliest. Arriving earlier? You can drop your luggage first and start exploring the area while waiting for the villa to be ready. If you need an early check in we will try to accommodate you but we can‚Äôt promise, it is subject to the villa availability. - Q: What is the Check-out time policy?- A: Check-out time is until 10:00am at the latest. Our staff will clean the villa after your departure for the next group checking in at 2pm. Late Check-out  is subject to availability and approval and involves extra charge. For any late Check-out between 10am-3pm, the extra charge is 50% of the villa nightly rate. Any Check-out after 3pm will be charged at a full nightly rate. If you need to store your luggage after Check-out time, let us know- Q : Do we have daily housekeeping service ?- A : Yes, there will be a housekeeping service daily. Service occurs once a day.Kindly note that your villa manager is reachable through What's app. He will be pleased to assist with your requests, but he does not reside on site. Your night guard, who resides on site, will take care of your requests at night. - Q : Can we have extra clean towels?For eco-friendly reasons bathroom and swimming pool towels are changed every three days. On day number 3, please leave them on the floor for our staff to pick-it up. Towels left hanging on racks will be considered clean if not on the floor.

title: Infinity Pool Villa + Free Floating Breakfast
description: This Villas are part of complex villa instead of independent unit, however the villa itself is fully private with it's own private pool. The driver will be waiting for you at the arrival hall by holding a signage of your name.- Q: Is there breakfast available?- A: YES- Q: Do you provide any floating breakfast service?- A: YES- Q : What time the check-in policy?- A : Please be informed that our check-in time is at 14:00 by default. Our check-out time is at 12:00 noon. Late check-out is subject to availability and might involve extra charge as well. We might not be able to promise any late check-out service at this point. However, you may leave the room and pack your luggage by noon time while our onsite team start cleaning the villa.- Q : Do we provide scooter?- A : We can also ask our onsite team to help you with motorbike rental. It usually costs at around IDR 70K (around USD 5) per day without petrol, including 2 helmets.- Q : Can I see the property before I make a booking?- A : Airbnb policy stated that we can not do site visit before the booking confirmed for safety reason.- Q: Can you speak in Bahasa?- A: Yes, we can speak in Bahasa and also in English :)- Q : Can you accept payment by cash?- A : We can't accept payment by cash, all of the payment only directly by Airbnb- Q: Can I smoking in the room?- A: No, you can't. All rooms are no smoking, but you can smoking at the lawn near pool- Q : Do we have a housekeeping service every day?- A : yes, there will be a housekeeping service every day.- Q : Can we have extra clean towels?- A : You can get an Extra towel as long as we have it available.- Q : How much maximum capacity for this villa?- A : this villa is for 2 peoples, but the maximum capacity is for 3 people which is that means 3rd person is counted as extra bed.- Q : Is the pool private?- A : Sure, this villa has a private pool

title: Veluvana Bali - Cobra House
description: Cobra House one of our most cherished habitable sculptures and an ode to tasteful design in harmony with the environment.Other things to noteBEFORE YOU BOOK, PLEASE READ A FEW DETAILS FOR YOUR CONSIDERATION:1. The ConstructionThe construction and furniture are mostly made of locally-sourced bamboo that covered with rice straw roofs. The building is designed and built by local bamboo artisans with serious consideration to the strength of the entire part of the construction and furniture. The lower level floor is a half meter from the ground with a higher edge on the north porch; please take care of your step while playing on this site. The upper level is 2.5 meters from the ground with stairs that are considered easy to climb; watch your head and hold the railing for your safety.2. Water, Electricity, and Wi-FiThe water you use in this house is supplied by the regional water company that distributes fresh water sourced from Mount Agung aquifer. Although the water is fresh, it is not ready to drink water, so please drink only water that is served in the bottle and ask the doormen to refill if it runs out. The electricity installed in the house is connected with the main east Bali grid system to assure you have reliable lighting in the night and optimum power supply to your device. Because we understand you may physically off-grid, but your digital presence can have no break. So, Wi-Fi is free as always.3. The LocationThe small town of Sidemen is less crowded compare to Ubud and any other tourist destination in Bali. This area is slowly growing as the indigenous culture and society remain preserved by its humility. You can explore the village in a short-range by foot, a scooter is also available to rent if you want to go a little bit further to the town center or the neighbor village.4. Public FacilityThe small town of Sidemen has a village hall, traditional market, small grocery, school, and hospital with an emergency care unit. Ride a scooter around 5 ‚Äì 10 minutes from the bamboo house to reach one of these facilities. Bigger public facilities are available in the nearest town of Semarapura that requires a 20-minute drive or Denpasar that is around 60 minutes from Sidemen.5. The ClimateThe climate is divided into two seasons, dry or wet. The dry season comes around May ‚Äì September while the wet season is from October ‚Äì April each year. However, climate change has made the weather a bit unpredictable. Sometimes there is a rainy day within the dry season, and not all day is rainy during the wet season. When you stay during the wet season please consider facing heavy rain with a wind that may blow water into the lower ground porch, the upper balcony, and the hanging net. However, we have installed curtains and roll-up blinds at the lower ground so you can protect yourself from rainwater or bugs in the night.6. The BugsThe bamboo house is located within a rice terrace with rich biodiversity. Our commitment to reducing the carbon footprint has led us to design the house with minimum impact on the surrounding living organism. Stay in this bamboo house means that you are willing to share your living space with other creatures. Ants, fly, mosquito, and other insects are commonly found outside of the building especially during fruit season. As long as you keep the space clean and not leave any left food open, they will not come to disturb you. If you notice mosquito entering the bedroom area, we highly recommend you to use the mosquito net on the bed during your sleep. If you have a specific insect allergy or afraid of these insects, we suggest this bamboo house is not good for you. Or you may go at your own risk.7. Room ServicesYou have a doormen stand-by at 7.00 am ‚Äì 9.00 pm at the upper ground, you can ask him almost anything you need to make your stay enjoyable. He will help you with breakfast, food for lunch and dinner, find a masseur, room cleaning, laundry, transportation, area information, and tourist activities. You can also contact us online through Airbnb platform in case the onsite services do not meet your needs.8. Breakfast, Lunch, and DinnerBreakfast for two is included in your booking. You can ask the doormen to serve the breakfast in the living room area, on the couch or you feel too heavy to wake up from your bed, the breakfast will be served at your convenience. For an extra special morning treat, book our floating breakfast with additional charge. We plan to have a small restaurant in the upper ground so that you can order food for your lunch as well as dinner with additional charge.9. Air ConditioningWe do not install air conditioning in the house as it is against our spirit to maintain natural air remain fresh and healthy. Matter-fact we think we do not need that urban stuff around Sidemen Village, especially when you let the soft natural wind flows into your space.10. Use of Hanging NetThe hanging net is made of strong string with iron steel pillars to sustain the weight of the user. Using the hanging net means you understand the risk that you may fell off to the side of the net if you are not careful. Only use the hanging net if you are confident that you have a good balance and always have your partner watching you in case you need help to get back to the room. Do not use the hanging net after hitting even a shoot of alcohol. Do not jump down from the hanging net and do not hang on it as it is your pull up bar.11. The NeighborhoodAs the bamboo house is located in the main tourist district of Sidemen, several accommodations and restaurants are situated near your space. You will see some buildings on the west side of the house. Right at the back of the house is also accommodation with several rooms. The neighbor is warm and friendly, especially the owner of the surrounding properties. However, to make sure you have great privacy during your stay, we have created a high bamboo fence at the back of the house and plant dense vegetation on each border with the neighbor property.12. Irresponsible BehaviorIrresponsible behavior and threatening and abusive conduct towards the host, doormen, neighbors of the house, and the villager will not be tolerated. The host will refuse to allow check-in to the house if there is any case and or information that assume the guest (s) have related to any irresponsible behavior, threatening, and abusive conduct toward the mentioned person above. The host also has a full authority to end guest stay in the house if there is any case and or information that assume the guest (s) have related to any irresponsible behavior, threatening, and abusive conduct toward the mentioned person above. No refund will be given regarding the cancelation/canceled stay due to irresponsible behavior, threatening, and abusive conduct toward the mentioned person above.The host will not have a further responsibility to the guest once the booking is canceled and or the stay is ended.

title: Boutique 8 Bedrooms Luxury Villa1 in Eat St;
