Step into our stylish air-conditioned villas.Our attentive staff ensures a flawless stay, including daily housekeeping and a delectable breakfast.[This listing is a unique opportunity to book 5 two-bedroom villas and 1 four-bedroom villa within our exclusive complex. Offering a total of 14 bedrooms]

title: Oniria Bali‚Ä¢Romantic Tropical Villa w Private Pool
description: Hidden between rice fields and tropical jungle, Oniria is a romantic luxury villa designed for couples, with a private heated infinity pool, a sky bathtub overlooking the valley, and a private home cinema that turns every night into a movie scene. Every detail blends nature, design and intimacy, creating one of Bali‚Äôs most unique stays for honeymooners and dreamers seeking beauty, calm and connection üåøThe spaceONIRIA ‚Äî The Original Dream Villa in BaliHidden between rice fields and jungle, Oniria is our first creation, a romantic bamboo villa handcrafted for couples and honeymooners seeking peace, privacy, and inspiration.Wake up to the sunrise over the rice terraces, relax in your private infinity pool, and experience the most magical side of Bali‚Äôs tropical nature üåø‚ú®‚∏ªüå∏ The Journey BeginsStep through the round wooden door and follow the winding wooden path that curves through the jungle.You‚Äôll hear birds singing, see butterflies dancing, and feel the air change as the villa slowly appears, a bamboo creation floating above the green, glowing under the Bali sky.It‚Äôs like stepping into another world, where time slows down, and dreams become real.‚∏ªüå± The Heart of OniriaThe open living room faces the sunrise, so each morning is filled with soft golden light.Behind the sofa, a pond and indoor waterfall create a peaceful rhythm; in front, the heated infinity pool merges into endless rice terraces.A handwoven hammock hangs above the floor, one of Oniria‚Äôs most loved corners, perfect for reading, meditating, or simply floating above the fields.Enjoy a private dinner in the gazebo by the valley, surrounded by candles and fairy lights, while our chef prepares each dish fresh just next door and our team serves you with warmth and care.‚∏ªüåô Above the JungleA floating bamboo staircase leads to your sanctuary, a canopy bed wrapped in a white mosquito net, facing directly toward the sunrise.From your bed, you can watch the first light turn the fields pink and gold.In front of the room, a large hanging net floats above the valley, perfect for coffee, reading, or those iconic photos that everyone remembers.Two small bamboo bridges connect the room, one leads to a bathroom made of rattan and river stone, and the other to the open-air bathtub above the valley, surrounded by fairy lights and infinite views.‚∏ªüí´ Magic in Every CornerAt night, Oniria transforms.Soft fairy lights reflect on the water, the jungle hums quietly, and the whole villa feels alive.You‚Äôll find a floating bed that lowers from the ceiling, a bamboo shower with a round window made for unforgettable photos, a private cinema in the living room, and a small air-conditioned igloo in the garden for a cool retreat.Every element has been designed to make your stay effortless, romantic, and unforgettable.Our Oniria team is always nearby, attentive, discreet, and ready to make anything possible.‚∏ªüåø The Spirit of OniriaOniria isn‚Äôt a resort, it‚Äôs an open tropical villa where you connect deeply with nature.You‚Äôll hear birds at dawn, frogs at night, and the wind through the rice fields.Sometimes, small jungle visitors like geckos, frogs, or tiny snakes might appear ‚Äî they‚Äôre harmless and part of the natural magic of Bali.The villa is located in a remote and peaceful area, surrounded only by local farmers and rice terraces.There are no restaurants or tourist shops nearby, only tranquility, intimacy, and the rhythm of nature.That‚Äôs exactly what makes Oniria special, a place to disconnect from the world and reconnect with yourself.‚∏ª‚ú® Come live the dream where it all began, welcome to Oniria, welcome where dreams have no end.Guest accessYou will enjoy the entire villa privately ‚Äî your own tropical home in the heart of Bali.Our guests have exclusive access to everything:the heated infinity pool with rice field views, the upper deck bathtub overlooking the valley, the romantic dining pavilion, the open living area with indoor waterfall, and even a cozy air-conditioned bamboo igloo for reading or relaxing.Every corner of Oniria is yours to explore, designed to make you feel free, connected to nature, and completely at home.Our chef prepares every meal in our nearby kitchen, and our team serves everything directly in your villa ‚Äî beautifully presented and with total privacy.You can dine under the fairy lights by the pool, in the pavilion, or wherever feels right in the moment.We respect your rhythm: our staff visits quietly each morning for breakfast and cleaning, leaving you the rest of the day to dream in peace.It‚Äôs your space, your time, your story, a private paradise made just for you :)Other things to noteOniria is located in a remote and peaceful area, chosen intentionally to let you disconnect from the noise of the world and reconnect with what truly matters.You won‚Äôt find shops or restaurants nearby, only nature, rice fields, and birdsong.Because our villa is open to the tropical air, you‚Äôll hear frogs singing at night, see fireflies dancing around the garden, and maybe meet small visitors like geckos or lizards.They‚Äôre part of Bali‚Äôs natural harmony, and we take great care to keep everything safe and comfortable.If you‚Äôre looking for a luxury stay surrounded by nature, filled with authenticity, privacy, and heart, Oniria is the place where you‚Äôll find it.It‚Äôs not a hotel, it‚Äôs a living dream, cared for by people who genuinely love making others happy.Come with an open heart, and you‚Äôll leave with something unforgettable. üåô

title: Brand New 3 bdr villa near Seminyak beach
description: Villa Champaca SeminyakIdeally located in the famous area of Seminyak is a brand new specious 3 bedroom villa with an entertainment room,  12 meters pool and large tropical garden. You will appreciate the proximity of the villa to the best attractions of Seminyak. The beach, restaurants, shops and night life can be reached in 5 to 15 minutes on foot.  Villa Champaca will be your perfect gateway in Bali.The space> 3 BR Villa + 3 en - suite bathrooms and an entertainment room> Air-conditioned living room > 600 sqm land> Located in the most prestigious area of Seminyak.> 12x4 meters private swimming pool> Gazebo along with sundecks> Walking distance to the Beach> Large tropical garden > Wi-Fi Up - to 100 Mbps > Cable TV> Fully Equipped kitchen > Water filter system > Parking for a big car and bikes > Extremely safe area and quiet neighbourhoodSERVICE INCLUDED:> Welcome drinks, local fresh fruits & fresh ground coffee capsules are available on your arrival> Housekeeper 6X / week> Pool cleaner and gardener 2X /week > Unlimited mineral water.> bath and pool towel will be changed every 3 days as well as bed sheets.> 3rd party laundry service at an extra charge > Airport transfer arranged upon request.> Parking for a large car and bikes> Assistance with motorbike rentals>We can help you organize a car rental, half/full-day tours with our driverGuest accessYou get private access to the entire villa. Except the staff room where all the cleaning equipment is stored.Other things to noteOn March 19, 2026, Bali will celebrate Nyepi Day, the Balinese New Year (Saka Year 1948). On this day, all outdoor activities are prohibited, including transportation and public services. Residents and tourists are expected to stay indoors and respect the tradition.Additional guest will be charged USD 60 extra per person per night  ( 2 guests max ) extra bed is providedFor  5 nights booking or more ,  pick- up from the airport  is included. Breakfast is available with additional charge USD $10 per person per day, for a minimum 4 persons required.There will be member of staff at the villa to welcome you during check-in and explain all that you need to know about the property Please note that as the villa has large garden there may be reptiles, insects and other small animals in and around the villa. Bali is a tropical island and these creatures may appear.Please note that due to the tropical island weather and infrastructure, there may very rarely occur unexpected issues with electricity, water supply ( hot & cold ) or Wi-Fi connection.Villa Champaca Seminyak is an ideal choice for those looking to enjoy the best of Seminyak in a spacious and luxurious setting.

title: Amazing 8 Bedroom Heart of Seminyak-Oberoi
description: The Villa sits on 1800sqm of landscaped gardens just 300m from Seminyak‚Äôs best beach, featuring 8 bedroom Villa. The Villa, right in the heart of prestigious Oberoi district, is only 300 meters from Ku De Ta and can comfortably accommodate up to 16 guests.The spaceThe villa consist of a 6 bedroom and 4 bedroom connected villa, both feature L shaped, signature swimming pools, huge living rooms, indoor and outdoor lounging and dining, pool tables, vast individual bedroom suites, world-class interior design with a distinct Balinese theme, and every conceivable luxury for the sophisticated holidaymaker. We will lock two of the bedroom during your stay.The villa has unrivalled facilities with 15 full-time staff, including a private butler for each villa, chefs, housekeeping, gardener and trained security, plus on-demand chauffeurs, spa therapists and concierge, all of whom are dedicated to ensuring guests are pampered during every moment of their stay, except of course when they hang out the red ‚Äòdo not disturb‚Äô flag to ensure total privacy.Guest accessIndoor livingThe vast open-sided and open-plan living areas that spread across the garden levels of the two pavilions form the social hubs of the villa. These are spectacular spaces for relaxing and entertaining, defined by soaring teakwood columns and skillfully divided into separate activity areas, with the swimming pools edging almost into the rooms. On one side, conversation is sure to flow with the configuration of oversized sofas arranged around huge coffee tables, set before bars with stools, drinks fridges and glass jars full of snacks. With an equally social focus, full-size billiard tables are centrally located. Opposite, comfortable sofas and armchairs are grouped around 52, 46 and 40 inch flat-screen satellite TVs and home entertainment systems.The dining areas are equally generous. The 6 bedroom side of the estate offers an enormous slab of teakwood fashioned into a statement dining table seating 20 people, with room to spare. A smaller, but equally attractive table is provided on the 4 bedroom side. Behind an island buffet of black granite, are guest kitchens, which are well equipped with American-style fridges, hobs, ovens, microwaves and an extensive collection of plates and utensils housed in handsome wooden cupboards. Doors from these areas lead to the 'back of house' section, with separate staff kitchen allowing for extra guest privacy whilst the resident chefs are preparing meals.Outdoor livingThe villa offers a wide range of outdoor living areas in keeping with the same highly social space planning that define its interiors. The 12m and 14m swimming pools, with water-feature on the boundary walls and wide shallow steps leading towards the living areas, are the perfect spots to cool off, while ironwood decks with stylish sun loungers shaded by beautiful parasols provide ideal settings for alfresco siestas or refreshing sundowners.The many terraces and decks at both levels of all three pavilions provide opportunities for private relaxation while enjoying views of the beautifully landscaped gardens, with an old Cambodia frangipani, a sacred Pohon Pile tree and Sawit date palms that have been specially imported from Java.Other things to noteGuests who wish to enjoy home cooking in the privacy of the Villa will appreciate the resident full time chef who will happily prepare a wide range of Balinese, Asian and international dishes.Food and beverage chargesAll provisions can be purchased by our housekeepers and charged to guests at cost price. Shopping receipts will be provided either daily or at the end of the stay ‚Äì at your option.  It is requested that our staff be given a ‚Äòfloat‚Äô to cover the grocery shopping.Wine, beer, spirits and soft drinks are also available upon request and an account will be presented for settlement at the end of your stay.StaffGuests of the villa are looked after, with great attention to detail, by a dedicated team of professionals drawn from the local community, under the direction of our villa manager. Our staff are trained to anticipate their guests‚Äô every whim with typical Balinese charm and a ready smile. They are very much part of the villa experience.Villa manager	Our villa manager is responsible for the overall operation of the villa, including staffing and guest satisfaction. Fluent in English, she warmly familiarizes guests with the villa on arrival and is only a phone call away should you have any special requests.Chef	The resident full time chef is skilled at cooking a wide array of international and Indonesian cuisine.Housekeepers	A team of seven housekeepers takes care of cleaning and tidying the villa in shifts from 7am to 11pm. They also prepare breakfast and can shop for groceries if required.Gardener/pool attendant	A gardener discreetly tends to the pools and gardens every day.Spa therapists	Fully trained spa therapists will visit the villa upon request to provide massages and other spa treatments on guest account.Security	Night-time security is provided by trained staff.SpaFeel like a body scrub or massage? Just ask our staff to bring the spa to you! We can recommend deluxe treatments carried out in the privacy of the villa ‚Äì be it by the pool, on the terrace or in the cool of the bedroom ‚Äì by fully trained therapists from a reputable local spa (extra charges will apply). Here‚Äôs a sample of what‚Äôs on the menu:Balinese massageRelease built up tension with a traditional Balinese massage. Using a combination of gentle stretches, acupressure and aromatherapy oils to stimulate the flow of blood, oxygen and energy around your body, you will feel totally relaxed in no time.Foot reflexologyFoot reflexology is a natural healing art based on the principle that there are reflexes in the feet which correspond to every part of the body. Through application of pressure on these reflexes tension is relieved and circulation improved leaving you feeling balanced.Body scrubA full body scrub will exfoliate and hydrate your skin leaving it soft and smooth. A rejuvenating scrub combines an abrasive material such as salt, coffee, rice bran or pecan hulls with essential oils to remove any impurities and make your skin glow.Manicure/pedicureOur hands and feet work hard for us every day but rarely get the attention they deserve. Treat them to a manicure or pedicure, which usually comes with the added bonus of a quick hand or foot massage.FamiliesThe family-friendly advantages of a villa holiday are many and varied, including access to your own private facilities and the freedom to use them whenever you want. Knowing that the kids can run around happily, independently and safely, without you having to worry about other guests, is real plus ‚Äì and ensures that parents are certain to have a more relaxed holiday.The villa is ideal for families. Younger children can be easily supervised in the pools, as they are visible from all areas of the open-plan living room, and will enjoy watching TV in the living areas or the second floor media room. Older kids will gravitate to the billiard tables, appreciate the size and privacy of the bedrooms, and revel in the chance to wander out safely to the beach, shops and nightlife of Seminyak.Our friendly staff will make children feel as welcome as adults, and having these willing helpers on hand gives guests plenty of flexibility and freedom to do their own exploring beyond the villa grounds (full-time babysitting incurs a small extra cost). Although well equipped kitchens allow you to prepare meals for fussy eaters or babies with ease, staff will happily do this for you ‚Äì just talk through your requirements and meal schedules with the villa manager or chef and they will take care of the rest.Nor do you have to worry about packing all that cumbersome extra equipment. When you stay at the villa, we can provide you with all the essentials. We have a cot and high chair, and anything we don‚Äôt have in-house, we can generally hire for a small fee. Just talk through your requirements with us when you make your reservation and we‚Äôll make sure it‚Äôs all ready and waiting for your arrival.We are required by local regulations to charge occupancy tax. Villa rate is subject to 15,5% government taxes and services charge, not included in the price of the reservation and have to be paid directly upon check-in. See more here: airbnb/help/article/318/how-do-taxes-work-for-guests

title: Cliffside Bamboo Treehouse - Private Heated Pool
description: Experience Bali from a birds-eye view in The Avana Treehouse Bamboo Villa. This once-in-a-lifetime bamboo villa experience sits 15 meters high amongst the clove trees on a cliff‚Äôs edge. Enjoying the view from any of the 3-story areas will leave you relaxed and with the sensation you are floating in the air.Below The Floating Treehouse are expansive, lush rice fields along the Ayung River that meet the mountains. You can spot Mount Agung Volcano to the left and the Indian Ocean to the right.The space(NOTE: want to stay with a group? Check out our 3 bedroom Bamboo Villa by clicking on our logo and navigating to our profile)A private sky bridge takes you directly to your revolving door which is an experience by itself.As you walk in, you will be welcomed by the live Clove Tree that the villa is built around. Followed by a view of the rolling mountain hills which invites you to lounge on the upper deck. Take in the views how you wish, from the comfortable couch to the left, the lounging net to the right, or the table on the deck. This level is the main living and dining floor of The Floating Treehouse Villa. Below the lounging net, you will find your private infinity pool. Following the spiral staircase down one level, you will find the restroom and the pool lounge space. Following the curved staircase to the third level, you will find the enclosed bedroom. The enclosed round bedroom encourages you to have a restful sleep, waking up rejuvenated to a beautiful view each morning. In the bedroom, you have a view of the infinity pool through a large, reinforced glass wall. You will also find an air conditioning unit, a custom wardrobe space, and a small desk for your convenience. In the center of the room is a large round bed, highlighting the natural flow of the bamboo villa's design. In your bedroom To the left, a glass wall that leads to your balcony highlights the lush view of the valley below. A large, private soaking tub on the balcony overlooking the valley invites you to soak up possibly the best views of Bali as you release your worries. The Floating Treehouse is best suited for 2 guests. Wi-Fi:We encourage you to reconnect with nature during your stay. However, we can all appreciate watching an episode or two of the office before bed. Free Wi-Fi is available in the villa for your convenience.Our Services:Breakfast for two is complimentary during your stay at Avana Treehouse. The Avana Bamboo Villas boast an entire team to ensure you have the best experience. Drivers, butlers, night security, and tour guides are all available for you to live your dream Bali getaway. Our chef also offers a lunch and dinner menu, allowing you to relax all day, worry-free.We also offer special honeymoon and romantic arrangements, adventure and zen experiences as well as vacation planning for our guests. Additionally, we offer many in-house experiences such as guided yoga sessions, private in-villa massage, private photoshoots, and much more. We can communicate those services to you in more detail upon booking.Guest accessYou are the only guests at The Avana Treehouse during your stay. The entire villa is accessible, as is our Avana Villas support team. Please make yourself at home. We are here and happy to help make your stay more enjoyable.Avana also has a common firepit area that is shared between three villas. We will have bonfires and BBQs in that area and traditional cooking experiences using bamboo for cooking the food in, the traditional way.Other things to noteBugs and insects:The Avana Treehouse is surrounded by nature, with an open design. From time to time, nature's residents (insects, bugs, frogs, lizards, etc.) may visit you at the villa. We keep everything clean, however, avoiding nature's residents during your stay cannot be avoided. Not leaving any leftover food and turning all the lights off at night will help deter them. If you are sensitive to this normal part of the experience here, we recommend you find more suitable lodging during your time in Bali.The Area:Avana Villas are nestled in Pesaban village, near Sideman. We are just over an hour from the airport and 50 minutes from Ubud. While the villas are surrounded by nature, there are a ton of activities and sites that you can visit within 10-60 minutes away from Avana. For a complete list of activities close to Avana, reference our list at the bottom of the description.Our area is known for its unspoiled beauty. Designed to provide an escapefrom everyday bustling Bali, Avana Villas bring you back to the true magic of Bali. Safe and secluded, you are tucked away from noise, crowds, and traffic. The closest town is about a 10-minute drive, where you can find ATMs, pharmacies, local restaurants, and more.Bali Experiences One Hour or Less from The Avana Treehouse:‚óè A Private Massage at The Avana Treehouse‚óè Bathtub Flower Arrangements‚óè Private Photoshoot Session‚óè Private Yoga Lesson at The Avana Treehouse‚óè Sideman Rice Terrace Tour‚óè The Water Temple (Tirta Ganga)‚óè Gates of Heaven (Pura Penataran Agung Lempuyang Temple)‚óè Primitive Traditional Bamboo Cooking Over a Bonfire with our Chef‚óè A Coffee Farm Tour and Tasting‚óè Jewelry Making with a Silver SmithBali Adventure Experiences Near The Avana Treehouse:‚óè ATV Jungle Ride Experience‚óè Mt Batur Volcano Sunrise Hike‚óè Mt Batur Volcano Sunrise 4*4 Jeep Tour‚óè White Water Rafting in the Ayung River‚óè Waterfall Chasing Tour‚óè Scuba DivingIf you are curious to try any of those experiences please let us know!

title: Veluvana Mountain - Turtle House
description: Veluvana Mountain is a bamboo house in Sidemen featuring a no wall, no door concept that invites guests to live openly and harmoniously with nature. Each structure is crafted from natural materials like bamboo and designed in the shape of animals, symbolizing a deep connection with the natural world. It offers a serene, immersive experience for those seeking beauty, freedom, and tranquility in the heart of Bali.

title: 2BR Ocean Front Villa in Seseh, Near Canggu
description: Bali Amori Vista, Seseh, Bali- Drift off and wake to the rhythm of the ocean- Majestic sunsets and waves right at your doorstep - a lush 2,850 sqm private sanctuary to unwind in nature- Perfect for ocean lovers and sunset seekers- Crescent pool surrounded by tropical gardens and open sky- Al fresco living with hammock, ocean breeze & outfoor dining- A 15 min beach walk or quick drive to Pererenan & Canggu‚Äôs vibrant restaurants and nightlifeThe spaceBali Amori Vista - an ocean front sanctuary - situated on a small cliffside with dramatic 180 degree sunset and sunrise views. This two-bedroom villa offers front-row seats to majestic waves rolling onto a striking black-sand beach, with your own private crescent-shaped infinity pool as the centerpiece. You truly won't find another property like it.Within 15 minutes you can reach Pereranans vibrant dining scene and Canggu‚Äôs surf breaks. Here in the serenity of a traditional Balinese village you will find amazing cozy cafes, yoga, pilates studios and world class spas all at your doorstep. Designed to celebrate the elements, the villa‚Äôs open-air living concept invites tropical breezes and golden light across its expansive 2,850 sqm grounds. Drift to sleep with the sound of the sea or let the sunrise call you into a new day.The master suite in the main villa is an open floor plan and features a king-size bed, lounge area, workspace, and patio that opens directly to the pool, alongside spacious living, dining, and kitchen areas. 30meters away, the guest villa - crafted in the style of a traditional Indonesian bungalow - and offers a queen bed, private ensuite bathroom, dedicated workspace, and porch overlooking the gardens and ocean. Handcrafted wood, bohemian accents, and vibrant touches bring warmth and soul to every corner. Bali Amori Vista is a peaceful retreat located by a vibrant public beach. Depending on the day, you may see local ceremonies or hear music, and you‚Äôll always hear the waves. As with all of Bali, expect a little wildness - from geckos to bugs - it‚Äôs part of island life.Life here flows with a blend of tranquility and local culture, making the villa a unique place to experience the real spirit of Bali.Guest accessLocated on a quiet dead end street with only one other house on the block, the ocean is your neighbour. Enjoy direct access to Seseh Beach on either side of the house; guests have access to the entire property from the two ensuite bedrooms to the pool and garden, with the exception of the back-of-house storage areas.Other things to note *Long Stay:  Please send us a message for long stay bookings, we will happily accommodate you at a discounted rate for bookings over 14 days Rate Inclusions: - Welcome drink- Complimentary WiFi- Cleaning and butler services by staff + gardener/pool maintenance. Floors: Bali Amori Vista has one level with two structures ‚Äì the Main Villa and the Guest Pavillion:- Main Villa: Master Bedroom with en-suite bathroom, sofa with coffee table, office desk space, and patio with outdoor dining and living area.- Guest Pavillion: Bedroom with en-suite bathroom, small desk, draws + outdoor living area. Capacity & Extra Bedding: - This property is designed to comfortably sleep 4 persons.- Extra bed is available at USD $45 per person per night in the Main Villa. Note: only one (1) additional bed can be arranged for this property. Living areas: - The main communal space is an outdoor living and dining area where you feel the breeze from the ocean. Entertainment: - High-speed WiFi throughout and bluetooth speakers at the outdoor living area and in the Master bedroom + Projector.  Kitchen & Dining: - The kitchen is equipped with refrigerator, French press coffee maker, blender, toaster, rice cooker, gas stove, kitchenware, dinnerware, water dispenser, pantry basics (oil, salt, pepper), pots & pans, coffee, tea pot, tea cups and wine glasses.- The villa has an outdoor dining area can seat up to 8 guests.- Private Chef service is available upon request at extra charge; All meals (breakfast, lunch, dinner, floating breakfast) can be arranged in advance at an extra charge. We also provide a chef shopping service and a pre-arrival shopping service with the rates: grocery bill + 15% handling fee. Wellness: - Spa treatments, massage services and yoga sessions are available upon request (extra charge). Parking: Parking available for 5 scooters or 1 car.  For Families: - Complimentary one baby cot and baby high chair available on request.- Additional baby cot is charged at USD 10 per unit per day and additional high chair is charged at USD 5 per unit per day.- Babysitting service available on request at extra cost.- Children under 4 years old can stay for free when sharing existing bedding with parents.  Pool area: - The pool measures 17m x 5m x 1.5m; - The pool has a shallow and deep end. - The pool is ambient temperature; - There are two lounge chairs + 2 floating pool pillows- Pool towels are provided. Services at extra charge: - Private Chef Service on request at extra cost (excluding grocery cost + 15% handling fee).- Beverage & Grocery Shopping Service (at grocery cost + 15% handling fee).- One-way or return airport transfer service is available upon request (extra cost).- Car and driver rental service on request from approximately USD 60 nett (excluding petrol) for 8 hours a day. Announcement:  Nyepi Religious Day Please be informed that Bali island celebrates Nyepi (Silent) Day each year on the dates below. Nyepi Day is a day of absolute silence throughout the island and it is observed from 6:00 am until 6:00 am the next morning. No outdoor activities are allowed and there will be no check-in and check-out from properties on the 19th of March 2026.

title: *NEW* Bali's Masterpiece : Volcano & Amazing view
description: ‚ú® Take advantage of an exceptional price for the launch of this new villa! Escape to a one-of-a-kind luxury bamboo villa in the heart of Sidemen. With breathtaking views of Mount Agung, lush rice fields, and a peaceful river, this 2-bedroom retreat blends nature and comfort. Open-air design, handcrafted details, and modern amenities create the perfect space for families or groups seeking tranquility and authenticity in Bali.The spaceüåø Unique DesignBuilt entirely with bamboo and natural materials, the villa is a true work of art. Its open-air concept lets you enjoy uninterrupted views of the majestic Mount Agung, flowing river, and endless rice terraces.üõå Comfort & SpaceThe villa features two spacious bedrooms, each with an en-suite bathroom and private views. The airy living area invites relaxation, while the natural materials create harmony with the surrounding landscape.üå¥ Immersive NatureFrom sunrise over Mount Agung to evenings by the river, every moment is a reminder of Bali‚Äôs beauty. Please note: as the villa is open to nature, friendly visits from geckos or insects may occur.üìç LocationNestled in peaceful Sidemen, just minutes from local culture, temples, and hidden gems, the villa offers the perfect base for exploring East Bali.‚ú® For those seeking authenticity, tranquility, and an unforgettable connection to Bali‚Äôs natural spirit

title: Veluvana Mountain - Squid House
description: Squid House at Veluvana Bali is a unique bamboo villa shaped like a giant squid.Built with natural and sustainable materials, it follows a no-wall, no-door concept for a true nature-immersive experience.Guests can enjoy stunning views of Mount Agung and lush rice terraces right from the bed.The villa features a fun bamboo slide and a private plunge pool for a playful and relaxing stay.Perfect for adventurous travelers, Squid House offers a magical blend of art, comfort, and eco-living.

title: Beachfront Views Balian LuxVilla
description: Recharge your soul from your elevated sanctuary with captivating views of Balian beach. Nestled in a serene surfer's paradise our impeccably designed 2bed 2bath retreat offers tranquility & luxury. Picture-perfect views of the ocean & coconut-clad mountains set the scene for unforgettable moments. With a dedicated manager & staff enjoy seamless relaxation with daily breakfast pristine cleanliness & optional in-house massages. Your perfect Bali escape awaits. We can offer floating breakfast.The spaceIndulge in the essence of paradise at our stunning beachfront oasis in Balian. Perched atop a gentle elevation, soak in the awe-inspiring panoramas of the ocean from every corner of your sanctuary. This impeccably designed 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom retreat offers an unparalleled blend of luxury and tranquility far away from the busy areas of Bali. The villa has new Sony flatscreen TVs and a surround sound music system. Surrounded by the serene ambiance of a quiet surfer's village with a few restaurants and cafes, framed by coconut-draped mountains, it's a picture-perfect haven for couples, friends, and small families seeking to create lifelong memories. Inside, find a harmonious fusion of modern comfort and bespoke designed charm, complete with a well-appointed kitchen, a cozy desk for remote work looking out to the ocean, and a serene massage table for indulgent in-house treatments. With our dedicated manager and staff at your service six days a week, relish in the convenience of daily breakfasts and pristine cleanliness, leaving you free to unwind, recharge, help you book a tour and savor every moment of your idyllic escape.Guest accessThe whole villa and pool is privateOther things to noteBalian is a serene area away from the hustle and bustle of the city. It is a place to relax and unwind. There are some restaurants nearby and they also do delivery to the villa. Please note this is not the city area of Bali, our village is famous for surfing and is still a quiet area of Bali, relax and enjoy the tranquility and sound of the ocean.

title: New 3-Bedroom Villa, Rooftop pool & Sunset Views
description: Newly built 3-bedroom villa offers a modern and comfortable stay in the heart of Canggu. The property features an enclosed living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and a private swimming pool and Rooftop pool. Each bedroom includes an ensuite bathroom, air conditioning, and quality bedding.The villa is located in a quiet area with easy access to Batu Bolong Beach, restaurants, cafes, and shops. Ideal for guests looking for a clean, new, and functional space close to Canggu‚Äôs main attractions.The spaceStep into modern luxury just walking distance to Batu Bolong Beach. This 3-story villa features a main pool on the ground floor, a private rooftop pool with nearly 360¬∞ views over Canggu and breathtaking sunsets and Sunrises.üåÖ Private Pool on the roof with panoramic viewsüöø Water Filter High speed üì∂ WiFi ideal for remote work or streamingüì∫ Smart TVüõµ Private parkingüßº Cleaning available every dayWhether you're here to relax, work, or experience Bali in style, this exclusive townhouse offers a subtle mix of comfort, design, and exceptional location.üö∂By Walk : (1‚Äì10 min)- Mason Restaurant ‚Äì 4 min- Manhattan Cocktail Bar 4 min- Cafes & restaurants ‚Äì 3‚Äì7 min- Local markets & shops ‚Äì 3‚Äì7 minüõµ By Scooter : (3‚Äì10 min)- Batu Bolong Beach ‚Äì 3 min- Old Mans - 3 min- La Brisa - 4 min- Finns Beach Club ‚Äì 8 min- Atlas Beach Fest ‚Äì 7 min- Avenue Fitness ‚Äì 5 min- Samadi Bali (yoga & Sunday market) ‚Äì 8 minOther things to notePlease observe quiet hours after 10 PM. Only registered guests are allowed to stay at the villa. We ask that you keep doors closed to maintain the air conditioning and reduce insects coming inside. Due to the layout and rooftop pool, the villa is not recommended for children under 8 years old. As Bali is a tropical island, occasional insects are normal even in clean, well-maintained villas. Commercial or professional photoshoots are not allowed.

title: Infinity Pool Villa - Stunning Rice Terrace Vew
description: CHSE CERTIFICATED.The location is right in front of authentic stunning rice terrace views characteristic of Ubud. The infinity pool overlooking the huge rice terrace views. The villa designed with luxury and royal combination of royal Balinese  Palace and some modern touch. The villa size is 160 m2, the villas has open living room overlooking the valley and rice terrace. The white heron bird usually fulfill the rice terrace in the afternoon.The spaceThe villa itself dedicated for people who love and appreciate the nature, surrounded by the green rice field view gives you the sense of being recharged & relaxed.Other things to noteFAQ :-Q: What‚Äôs included in the monthly stay?- A: For monthly stay, we have some services and facilities adjustment.Here are the details.- Twice a week basic cleaning (sweep & mop)- Twice a week bedsheet and towel renewal- Daily breakfast- Mineral waters are provided once in the check-in- Include electricity.- Q: Is there any extra beds?- A: This is a 1 bedroom villa that can accommodate 2 people by default. We can provide 1 more extra single bed for an additional price IDR 550.000 per night.- Q : Do we provide pick up service?- A : We are 60-90 minutes from the airport. We can assist you to provide an airport pick up service with the cost at IDR 600K (around USD 50) per car with driver including gasoline, with maximum capacity of 3  people + luggage. The driver will be waiting for you at the arrival hall by holding a signage of your name.- Q: Is there breakfast available?- A: YES- Q: Do you provide any floating breakfast service?- A: YES- Q : What time the check-in policy?- A : Please be informed that our check-in time is at 14:00 by default. However, you are most welcome to arrive at any earlier time, drop your luggage first and start enjoying your day exploring the area while waiting for your villa to be ready. Our check-out time is at 12:00 noon. Late check-out is subject to availability and might involve extra charge as well. We might not be able to promise any late check-out service at this point. However, you may leave the room and pack your luggage by noon time while our onsite team start cleaning the villa.- Q : Do we provide scooter?- A : We can also ask our onsite team to help you with motorbike rental. It usually costs at around IDR 70K (around USD 5) per day without petrol, including 2 helmets.- Q : Can I see the property before I make a booking?- A : Airbnb policy stated that we can not do site visit before the booking confirmed for safety reason.- Q: Can you speak in Bahasa?- A: Yes, we can speak in Bahasa and also in English :)- Q : Can you accept payment by cash?- A : We can't accept payment by cash, all of the payment only directly by Airbnb- Q: Can I smoking in the room?- A: No, you can't. All rooms are no smoking, but you can smoking at the lawn near pool- Q : Do we have a housekeeping service every day?- A : yes, there will be a housekeeping service every day.- Q : Can we have extra clean towels?- A : You can get an Extra towel as long as we have it available.- Q : How much maximum capacity for this villa?- A : this villa is for 2 peoples, but the maximum capacity is for 3 people which is that means 3rd person is counted as extra bed.- Q : Is the pool private?- A : Sure, this villa has a private pool

title: Amazing 10 Bedroom Heart of Seminyak-Oberoi
description: The Villa sits on 1800sqm of landscaped gardens just 300m from Seminyak‚Äôs best beach, featuring  10 bedroom Villa. The Villa, right in the heart of prestigious Oberoi district, is only 300 meters from Ku De Ta and can comfortably accommodate up to 20 guests.The spaceThe villa consist of a 6 bedroom and 4 bedroom connected villa, both feature L shaped, signature swimming pools, huge living rooms, indoor and outdoor lounging and dining, pool tables, vast individual bedroom suites, world-class interior design with a distinct Balinese theme, and every conceivable luxury for the sophisticated holidaymaker.The villa has unrivalled facilities with 15 full-time staff, including a private butler for each villa, chefs, housekeeping, gardener and trained security, plus on-demand chauffeurs, spa therapists and concierge, all of whom are dedicated to ensuring guests are pampered during every moment of their stay, except of course when they hang out the red ‚Äòdo not disturb‚Äô flag to ensure total privacy.Guest accessIndoor livingThe vast open-sided and open-plan living areas that spread across the garden levels of the two pavilions form the social hubs of the villa. These are spectacular spaces for relaxing and entertaining, defined by soaring teakwood columns and skillfully divided into separate activity areas, with the swimming pools edging almost into the rooms. On one side, conversation is sure to flow with the configuration of oversized sofas arranged around huge coffee tables, set before bars with stools, drinks fridges and glass jars full of snacks. With an equally social focus, full-size billiard tables are centrally located. Opposite, comfortable sofas and armchairs are grouped around 52, 46 and 40 inch flat-screen satellite TVs and home entertainment systems.The dining areas are equally generous. The 6 bedroom side of the estate offers an enormous slab of teakwood fashioned into a statement dining table seating 20 people, with room to spare. A smaller, but equally attractive table is provided on the 4 bedroom side. Behind an island buffet of black granite, are guest kitchens, which are well equipped with American-style fridges, hobs, ovens, microwaves and an extensive collection of plates and utensils housed in handsome wooden cupboards. Doors from these areas lead to the 'back of house' section, with separate staff kitchen allowing for extra guest privacy whilst the resident chefs are preparing meals.Outdoor livingThe villa offers a wide range of outdoor living areas in keeping with the same highly social space planning that define its interiors. The 12m and 14m swimming pools, with water-feature on the boundary walls and wide shallow steps leading towards the living areas, are the perfect spots to cool off, while ironwood decks with stylish sun loungers shaded by beautiful parasols provide ideal settings for alfresco siestas or refreshing sundowners.The many terraces and decks at both levels of all three pavilions provide opportunities for private relaxation while enjoying views of the beautifully landscaped gardens, with an old Cambodia frangipani, a sacred Pohon Pile tree and Sawit date palms that have been specially imported from Java.Other things to noteGuests who wish to enjoy home cooking in the privacy of the Villa will appreciate the resident full time chef who will happily prepare a wide range of Balinese, Asian and international dishes.Food and beverage chargesAll provisions can be purchased by our housekeepers and charged to guests at cost price. Shopping receipts will be provided either daily or at the end of the stay ‚Äì at your option.  It is requested that our staff be given a ‚Äòfloat‚Äô to cover the grocery shopping.Wine, beer, spirits and soft drinks are also available upon request and an account will be presented for settlement at the end of your stay.StaffGuests of the villa are looked after, with great attention to detail, by a dedicated team of professionals drawn from the local community, under the direction of our villa manager. Our staff are trained to anticipate their guests‚Äô every whim with typical Balinese charm and a ready smile. They are very much part of the villa experience.Villa manager	Our villa manager is responsible for the overall operation of the villa, including staffing and guest satisfaction. Fluent in English, she warmly familiarizes guests with the villa on arrival and is only a phone call away should you have any special requests.Chef	The resident full time chef is skilled at cooking a wide array of international and Indonesian cuisine.Housekeepers	A team of seven housekeepers takes care of cleaning and tidying the villa in shifts from 7am to 11pm. They also prepare breakfast and can shop for groceries if required.Gardener/pool attendant	A gardener discreetly tends to the pools and gardens every day.Spa therapists	Fully trained spa therapists will visit the villa upon request to provide massages and other spa treatments on guest account.Security	Night-time security is provided by trained staff.SpaFeel like a body scrub or massage? Just ask our staff to bring the spa to you! We can recommend deluxe treatments carried out in the privacy of the villa ‚Äì be it by the pool, on the terrace or in the cool of the bedroom ‚Äì by fully trained therapists from a reputable local spa (extra charges will apply). Here‚Äôs a sample of what‚Äôs on the menu:Balinese massageRelease built up tension with a traditional Balinese massage. Using a combination of gentle stretches, acupressure and aromatherapy oils to stimulate the flow of blood, oxygen and energy around your body, you will feel totally relaxed in no time.Foot reflexologyFoot reflexology is a natural healing art based on the principle that there are reflexes in the feet which correspond to every part of the body. Through application of pressure on these reflexes tension is relieved and circulation improved leaving you feeling balanced.Body scrubA full body scrub will exfoliate and hydrate your skin leaving it soft and smooth. A rejuvenating scrub combines an abrasive material such as salt, coffee, rice bran or pecan hulls with essential oils to remove any impurities and make your skin glow.Manicure/pedicureOur hands and feet work hard for us every day but rarely get the attention they deserve. Treat them to a manicure or pedicure, which usually comes with the added bonus of a quick hand or foot massage.FamiliesThe family-friendly advantages of a villa holiday are many and varied, including access to your own private facilities and the freedom to use them whenever you want. Knowing that the kids can run around happily, independently and safely, without you having to worry about other guests, is real plus ‚Äì and ensures that parents are certain to have a more relaxed holiday.The villa is ideal for families. Younger children can be easily supervised in the pools, as they are visible from all areas of the open-plan living room, and will enjoy watching TV in the living areas or the second floor media room. Older kids will gravitate to the billiard tables, appreciate the size and privacy of the bedrooms, and revel in the chance to wander out safely to the beach, shops and nightlife of Seminyak.Our friendly staff will make children feel as welcome as adults, and having these willing helpers on hand gives guests plenty of flexibility and freedom to do their own exploring beyond the villa grounds (full-time babysitting incurs a small extra cost). Although well equipped kitchens allow you to prepare meals for fussy eaters or babies with ease, staff will happily do this for you ‚Äì just talk through your requirements and meal schedules with the villa manager or chef and they will take care of the rest.Nor do you have to worry about packing all that cumbersome extra equipment. When you stay at the villa, we can provide you with all the essentials. We have a cot and high chair, and anything we don‚Äôt have in-house, we can generally hire for a small fee. Just talk through your requirements with us when you make your reservation and we‚Äôll make sure it‚Äôs all ready and waiting for your arrival.We are required by local regulations to charge occupancy tax. Villa rate is subject to 15,5% government taxes and services charge, not included in the price of the reservation and have to be paid directly upon check-in. See more here: airbnb/help/article/318/how-do-taxes-work-for-guests

title: NEW! Green Earth Bali | Cocoa Villa
description: Experience ultimate relaxation in the heart of Bali at exclusive luxury bamboo villa in Sidemen.Wake up to a breathtaking view of Mount Agung right from your bed, and unwind in your private Jacuzzi hot pool surrounded by lush nature.Enjoy a complimentary breakfast each morning, and savor delicious meals at our restaurant prepared with fresh, organic produce from our own farm.A dedicated butler is always on hand to make your stay seamless and truly indulgent.The spaceDiscover the remarkable world of unique bamboo architecture and luxurious amenities!You're going to absolutely love the harmony of eco-chic design in our unique bamboo concept villa! This architectural gem is a perfect blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern comfort.After a day of exploration, you'll be ready to unwind. Imagine yourself soaking in your very own private hot-water pool, set against this stunning natural backdrop. There's nothing better!The villa features expansive, lush garden and a spacious veranda‚Äîyour personal sanctuary for unwinding. You're going to absolutely love sleeping in closed and air-conditioned bedroom on this exceptionally comfortable bed, which is enveloped in a soft mosquito net. Prepare for the most peaceful slumber of your life! And for the ultimate relaxation by day, nothing beats swaying gently in a cozy net lounge with a picture-perfect view. No matter where you are, you'll be treated to spectacular panoramas that will take your breath away. Imagine gazing upon the entire valley and the majestic volcano before you, a vista so awe-inspiring that it will leave you speechless. Every moment here is pure magic. Whether you're waking up or lazily lounging, every moment becomes an unforgettable experience.Guest accessOur villa's location in Sidemen is simply perfect, with easy access to everything you could possibly need. Get ready for the adventure of a lifetime! At your doorstep, you'll find an incredible opportunity to immerse yourself in the rich culture of the region. Embark on an unforgettable journey along the renowned Sidemen trekking trails, feel the exhilaration of white-water rafting on the nearby rivers, and become part of the vibrant community on our organic farm ‚Äî a true slice of paradise. After a day filled with fun activities, you'll be delighted to know that you don't have to travel far to enjoy a delicious meal. Just return to our on-site restaurant, where we serve mouthwatering dishes crafted from the freshest, homegrown produce. For moments of mindfulness, you'll be delighted to know that there are several serene yoga studios and spiritual retreats located close by. These retreats allow you to find the perfect balance between seclusion and inspired exploration.

title: Jungleight Bali - The Cave
description: Jungleight Bali - The Cave is a unique one bedroom villa with a wonderful view of Ubud valley, a genuine tropical landscape. This getaway spot is a great place to bring into reality the dream adventure of the true wanderer. We invite you to feel the magnificent vibes of the entire house to escape the life that is full of drama into a journey with ultimate joy.The spaceBedroom: The Cave has a spacious bedroom equipped with air conditioning. It also includes a wardrobe and an en suite bathroom with an indoor bathtub that provides a view of the pool and surrounding greenery. The feature of a slide to enter the villa, is a unique and innovative addition to the villa's design. Entertainment: The living room is equipped with a projector for entertainment, allowing you to enjoy Netflix and other content. There's also a Nespresso coffee machine and a refrigerated minibar for your convenience.Front Desk: The resort offers 24-hour front desk service. The staff at the front desk can assist guests with various services, such as scooter rentals and arranging trips to explore the surrounding area.In-Room Dining: The resort's restaurant provides in-room dining options, which means you can order breakfast, all-day dining, and drinks from the comfort of your villa. The staff will deliver your orders directly to your villa. There is also a small restaurant on-site exclusively for guests. This provides guests with more dining choices and convenience during your stay. You can either opt for in-room dining and enjoy your meals with privacy in the villa, or you can visit the on-site restaurant to dine in a communal setting if you prefer. Cuisine: The restaurant offers a diverse menu featuring both Balinese and International cuisine. You can enjoy a variety of dishes without leaving the comfort of your villa.Bar: The resort's bar serves a range of beverages, including soft drinks and alcoholic drinks, throughout the day. You can savour these refreshing drinks by the pool or in your villa.Eco-Friendly Setting: Jungleight Bali is situated in the middle of a tropical forest, embracing Bali's beautiful natural environment. The resort was designed to provide guests with a restful and healing experience in the midst of nature.Jungleight Bali's Inhabitants: The resort acknowledges the presence of various insects, ants, mosquitos, spiders, geckos, and other creatures that naturally inhabit the ecological environment. The resort maintains high cleaning and pest control standards to minimise their presence however before booking, acknowledges that some of these creatures may enter the room due to the open nature of bamboo material.Consideration for Bamboo Living: Bamboo resorts offer a unique living environment, and guests are encouraged to carefully consider this aspect before booking with Jungleight Bali. It's important for guests to be comfortable with the idea of being in close proximity to nature.Maximum Occupancy: The Cave can accommodate a maximum of 2 adults and 1 child (12 years old or younger). The villa is equipped with a king size bed, and any request for an additional bed will incur an extra charge.Included Breakfast: The complimentary breakfast is designed for 2 adults and 1 child, with options selected from the kids' menu. Any other requests for additional guests or special dietary requirements may result in additional charges.Other things to noteHouse Rules:- Check-in at 3 pm- Check out before 12 pm- Noise will not be tolerated.- No smoking inside- Please lock up valuables in the safety deposit box.- Any form of misbehavior or noise is not tolerated.- Events, gatherings, parties or pets are not allowed.

title: Adnaisak House
description:
Located in the heart of Berawa, the best part of Canggu, Adnaisak House is perfectly situated for a memorable Bali escape. Known for its blend of modern conveniences with lush, tropical surroundings, this villa brings together the ultimate blend of privacy, comfort, and proximity to some of Bali‚Äôs best spots.The spaceWhether you‚Äôre wandering around local eateries, enjoying the beaches, or exploring nearby boutiques, everything is within walking distance, which makes it easy to enjoy the best of Bali without the hassle of traffic.

As you step into Adnaisak House, the cool, welcoming interiors make you feel instantly at home. Spacious and airy, the villa‚Äôs design intertwines indoor and outdoor spaces seamlessly. The ground floor is home to seven elegantly styled bedrooms, each with its own unique charm. The two master suites offer plush super king-size beds, private balconies, and indulgent features such as river stone bathtubs and even ceiling-mounted Bluetooth speakers to set the mood. Each room is thoughtfully designed with personal touches, from brass bathtubs and garden access to minibars and terraces, creating a perfect sanctuary for each guest. For families, there‚Äôs even a kids‚Äô room equipped with toys and books, which can be transformed to accommodate adult guests if needed. 

The first floor of the villa is all about shared enjoyment, with a dining room that can seat up to twenty guests around an extendable table. The kitchen, fully equipped and inviting, caters perfectly for family meals or intimate gatherings. For a night of entertainment, the media room offers an immersive experience with its massive 85‚Äù TV, surround sound system, and karaoke machine. The living room, fitted with seating for over twenty people, allows everyone to relax together in comfort, surrounded by ceiling-mounted speakers that provide the ideal soundtrack for your holiday.

Step outside, and you are greeted by a stunning outdoor space designed for relaxation and fun. The sixteen-metre swimming pool, with its child-safe design and adjacent paddling pool, is a centrepiece, perfect for both adults and little ones. The swim-up bar and spacious sun deck invite you to lounge in style, perhaps with a refreshing drink in hand as you soak up the sun. For evenings, the barbecue area and covered terrace are ideal spots to gather and enjoy a meal under the stars. And don‚Äôt miss the sunset terrace‚Äîa perfect ending to each day in this tranquil, private retreat that feels like your own personal resort.

Adnaisak House offers a truly unparalleled experience in Bali, featuring an exclusive on-site commercial kitchen with a team of four expert chefs and four dedicated butlers. This unique service allows guests to indulge in a premium dining experience, with a menu of exquisite, five-star quality food and beverages available on demand, just like in a luxury hotel. Whether you're craving a gourmet meal or a casual snack, the team is ready to cater to your every culinary desire, ensuring your stay is both effortless and extraordinary. This bespoke service sets Adnaisak House apart from other luxury villas, offering the ultimate in comfort, convenience, and indulgence.

Features:

Ground Floor
- Master Bedroom 1: Super king-size bed, balcony, electric blinds, ceiling mounted Bluetooth speakers, river stone bathtub, dressing room, kitchenette, mini bar and safe.
- Master Bedroom 2: Super king-size bed, Single bed and daybed (can be set up as a bed), balcony, twin showers, safe, kitchenette and mini bar 
- Bedroom 3: King-size bed, terrace, desk and brass bathtub

- Bedroom 5: King-size bed and two single beds on the mezzanine, terrace, outdoor bathtub, and a minibar
- Bedroom 6: Twin beds (can be a king-size), with terrace and TV
- Kids Bedroom 7: Bunk bed and one single bed. Toys, kids‚Äô books and the cot can be removed for adult guests

First Floor
- Dining room, dining table can seat 14. The table can be extended to accommodate up to 20
- Fully equipped kitchen, with a 6-burner gas oven, and a full range of appliances
- Media room: 85‚Äù 4K TV, a 10 speaker Dolby Atmos surround sound system and a karaoke machine. Streaming services include Netflix & Apple TV
- Living room: With seating for 22 and ceiling mounted Bluetooth speakers. There is air conditioning in all living areas
- Powder room

Exterior Grounds

- Child safe swimming pool (16m)

Additional Facilities

- Air-conditioning 
- Bluetooth speakers

- 10 speaker Dolby Atmos surround sound system

Location:

Adnaisak House is located in the vibrant heart of Berawa, one of the most sought-after areas in Canggu, Bali. This prime location offers guests the perfect balance of relaxation and excitement, making it an ideal holiday destination. Within just a seven-minute stroll, guests can explore a diverse array of over twenty popular bars, cafes, and restaurants, including local favourites like Indigo, Kong, and Milk & Madu. For those looking to stay active, the nearby Finns Recreation Club provides top-notch amenities such as a fully equipped gym, an Olympic-sized pool, tennis courts, and even a water slide park.

Berawa‚Äôs neighbourhood also boasts boutique shopping, a range of spas, and a world-class equestrian centre, ideal for all levels of riding enthusiasts. A short twenty-minute walk or quick drive takes guests to iconic spots like Finns Beach Club and Batu Belig Beach. For day trips, Seminyak‚Äôs fine dining and Echo Beach‚Äôs surf scene are within fifteen minutes by car, while Ubud and Sanur are less than an hour away. Bali‚Äôs international airport is conveniently thirty to forty-five minutes from the villa.

title: Villa Ramadewa ‚Äì Beachside  with Authentic Charm
description: Experience the perfect blend of luxury and Bali‚Äôs rich tradition in this stunning 4-bedroom villa in the heart of Seminyak.Just a short walk from Seminyak Beach, trendy cafes, and vibrant restaurants, our villa offers a serene retreat with authentic Balinese architecture, modern comforts, and lush tropical gardens.Inside, you'll find:Spacious, beautifully decorated bedrooms with traditional touches and plush beddingAn closed living area with high ceilings and traditional wood accentsThe spaceVilla Layout & Features:Two Separate Buildings  Main Building: Features the fully equipped kitchen, spacious living area, and dining space, all designed with traditional Balinese touches.  Guest Bedrooms: A two-story building houses four elegant en-suite bedrooms, each with its own bathroom, providing privacy and comfort for all guests.Central Outdoor Area:  Swimming Pool & Garden: A large, inviting pool is complemented by a lush, expansive garden‚Äîperfect for relaxing, playing, or enjoying the sunshine.  Outdoor Dining & Lounge Area: An outside dining table and comfortable lounge sofa create the ideal setting for alfresco meals and relaxing conversations amidst nature.Guest accessOur guests can enjoy the access to the entire propertyOther things to notePlease Note:Villa Ramadewa is located in a lively commercial area, and there may be some noise from the neighborhood until around 1 am. To ensure your comfort, we provide high-quality earplugs for our guests.

title: AUREA‚Ä¢where dreams have no end‚Ä¢
description: Aurea, our second little dreamy world, a hidden nook in the jungles of Bali, surrounded by rice fields‚Äîa haven to dream, to fly, and to reconnect with yourself through nature. Here, time stands still, moving at the pace of flowers, of the dawn, of life, without rush. Let the fairies and fireflies guide you into a dreamlike world, where you can write your own fairytaleThe spaceAurea: A Dream Theater in the Heart of NatureAurea is our new creation, a dream sanctuary opening in January 2025. Following our unique design that blends architecture and nature, we‚Äôve created a haven where nature doesn‚Äôt just surround you, it becomes part of you.Upon arrival, you‚Äôll find a grand door marking the threshold to a world of fantasy. A wooden path, surrounded by an exuberant garden, leads to another door woven with rattan and straw, as if crafted by fairies. Step through, and you‚Äôll enter a magical tunnel adorned with vines, plants, and hanging fairy lights. Inside, the open, flowing space allows energy to move freely, harmonized by indoor gardens scattered throughout.The first thing you‚Äôll notice is a stone bathtub beneath a canopy of fairy lights, the perfect spot to enjoy a breathtaking sunset while warm bubbles soothe your body. From here, the heated infinity pool stretches out to the rice fields and jungle, forming an endless green sea. The bathroom is a unique experience, with a shower surrounded by plants and panoramic views of the valley.The terrace, surrounded by gardens and overlooking the rice fields, will make you feel like you could fly over them. Relax on the sunbed or sink into the bean bags while soaking up the sun or enjoying the magical sunsets.Inside, the handcrafted rattan and bamboo sofa with its soft cushions will invite you to sink in and forget all traces of fatigue. We‚Äôve installed a projector with Netflix, perfect for jungle movie nights.The garden dining area, under a hut lit by magical lamps, turns every meal into a unique experience, combining the feeling of dining in the jungle with the comfort of fine dining. Our chef prepares everything fresh on-site, and breakfast is included.Throughout the garden, you‚Äôll find magical corners like a hammock with valley views or a small chill-out hut where you can read, sip coffee, or simply admire the horizon. Nearby, a waterfall adds a soothing melody to the ambiance.For quieter moments, a work desk with views of the infinity pool and jungle invites you to dream, write, or create. A small kitchenette lets you prepare tea or coffee to enjoy at sunrise.Finally, the round queen-size bed, surrounded by a mosquito net and hanging flowers, is where dreams are born, ensuring every night is a new adventure.Aurea is not just a place to stay‚Äîit‚Äôs a sanctuary for the soul, where every corner tells a story.* A Special Message for Our Guests *At Oniria, you'll experience an immersive journey in the heart of nature, surrounded by an open design that connects you with it. You will feel the cool embrace of the breeze, the warm kiss of the sun, the murmur of the rain, and the dance of the wind. There are no restaurants or tourist activities nearby; only the serenity of nature in its purest form. Local wildlife, from birds at dawn to small lizards, and frogs singing at night, is part of this magic. You might even come across a curious mouse or a snake.The surroundings, with local farmers tending the rice fields, offer beauty and authenticity, though privacy isn‚Äôt always guaranteed. Nevertheless, we‚Äôve taken care of every detail to ensure your comfort, providing the highest-quality service.If you seek a unique experience, deeply connected to nature, Oniria awaits to share this dreamlike sanctuary with you.Guest accessYou‚Äôll enjoy the entire villa privately, your own tropical home in the heart of Bali.Our guests have exclusive access to everything:the heated infinity pool with rice field views, the upper deck bathtub overlooking the valley, the romantic dining pavilion, the open living area with indoor waterfall, and even a cozy air-conditioned bamboo igloo for reading or relaxing.Every corner of Oniria is yours to explore, designed to make you feel free, connected to nature, and completely at home.Our chef prepares every meal in our nearby kitchen, and our team serves everything directly in your villa, beautifully presented and with total privacy.You can dine under the fairy lights by the pool, in the pavilion, or wherever feels right in the moment.We respect your rhythm: our staff visits quietly each morning for breakfast and cleaning, leaving you the rest of the day to dream in peace.It‚Äôs your space, your time, your story, a private paradise made just for you :)Other things to noteAurea is located in a remote and peaceful area, chosen intentionally to let you disconnect from the noise of the world and reconnect with what truly matters.You won‚Äôt find shops or restaurants nearby, only nature, rice fields, and birdsong.Because our villa is open to the tropical air, you‚Äôll hear frogs singing at night, see fireflies dancing around the garden, and maybe meet small visitors like geckos or lizards.They‚Äôre part of Bali‚Äôs natural harmony, and we take great care to keep everything safe and comfortable.If you‚Äôre looking for a luxury stay surrounded by nature, filled with authenticity, privacy, and heart, Oniria is the place where you‚Äôll find it.It‚Äôs not a hotel, it‚Äôs a living dream, cared for by people who genuinely love making others happy.Come with an open heart, and you‚Äôll leave with something unforgettable üåô

title: Tranquil Haven - White Stone Villa
description: Offering elegance, comfort, and splendor, this tropical holiday home is situated on 1270 square meters of land.  It is a true  sanctuary of blissful harmony, a retreat of timeless charm embraced by nature. The ranch style architecture, breathtaking views, private access, and magical driveway all contribute to making this place a hidden gem. Whether you're seeking a romantic escape, a family retreat, or simply a place to relax and unwind, this holiday home is sure to leave a lasting impression.The spaceImmerse yourself in this vibrant jungle oasis within the Keliki village with a view of the rice fields, located in the quiet outskirts of the city,  just within 8km from Ubud's city center. Nestled inside the village, this holiday home offers a secluded getaway. The location feels hidden away, creating a unique sense of privacy and exclusivity. The surrounding village adds a touch of authenticity, providing a glimpse into the local culture and way of life.The journey to this holiday home is truly magical. As you drive down the tree-lined driveway, surrounded by towering palm trees, it feels like entering a secret nest of adventure. The winding road takes you through a canopy of leaves, creating a mysterious and enchanting atmosphere.Featuring a seamless indoor-outdoor flow and multiple decks for al fresco dining and lounging, this magnificent 4-bedroom ensuite home is perfect for entertaining. In addition to the magnificent grounds, there is an outdoor seating area to entertain friends, water features, lush gardens, and trees that will make you did not want to leave this slice of paradise. One of the highlights of this holiday home is its breathtaking view. With a stunning overlook onto the jungle and rice fields, you can enjoy the natural beauty that surrounds you. The sight of the lush greenery and the gentle sway of the rice plants is truly mesmerizing.The architectural design of this holiday home reflects a ranch style, combining logs and stones to create a rustic and charming ambiance. The blend of natural materials and warm colors were used to highlight architectural features.The outdoor seating area provides a perfect setting for gatherings and social interactions. Equipped with comfortable seating arrangements, this area offers a tranquil atmosphere to relax and unwind. Whether it's enjoying a cup of coffee in the morning or simply catching up with friends, the outdoor seating area is a delightful place to spend valuable time. Lush gardens and trees further enhance the beauty of this home. The vibrant greenery provides a natural backdrop, creating a serene and inviting atmosphere. Whether it's a stroll through the manicured lawns or sitting under the shade of towering trees, the gardens offer a peaceful escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life.This home offers a truly unforgettable experience. The combination of relaxation, adventure, and tranquility makes it the ideal destination for a getaway. The ranch style architecture, breathtaking views, private access, and magical driveway all contribute to make this place a hidden gem. Whether you're seeking a romantic escape, a family retreat, or simply a place to relax and unwind, this place is sure to leave a lasting impression.Other things to noteIt should be noted that White Stone Villa is in a tropical setting, so bugs, insects, frogs, snakes, and other crawlers are all part of our ecosystem. We are proud to be able to coexist with nature and wish to make this experience available to our guests as well. Geckoes vary in size, and they are entirely harmless, but they sometimes make distinctive sounds at night. Our garden is also home to a lot of squirrels, birds, and lizards. We understand that the nature of our place may be a bit overwhelming to some people, so please consider if this concept is right for you.There are mosquito nets over our beds and bug spray is provided.

title: Laputa Villa#3  "The Bamboo Castle in the Sky"
description: Leave the ordinary behind and discover Laputa, your luxury bamboo sanctuary in the sky. This isn't just a place to stay; it's a front-row seat to a daily spectacle of breathtaking sunrises and endless views that stretch from the ocean to the majestic Mt. Agung. Prepare to be mesmerized by a serenity so profound, you‚Äôll never want to leave.The spaceLaputa #3: Your Castle in the SkyLaputa #3 is a 77 sqm (829 sq ft) bamboo home designed for up to four guests. It features two bedrooms and spectacular 360-degree views of the ocean, mountains, and rice terraces. The owner spent eight months using a drone to meticulously search for Bali's most scenic spot, ultimately discovering this remote, unnamed ridge in Sidemen. The location was so secluded that an access road had to be built just to reach it.Location & VibeTucked away in Sidemen, a tranquil village on the slopes of Mount Agung, Laputa offers a taste of the "real Bali." This isn't a bustling tourist hub; instead, it attracts repeat visitors from Europe who appreciate its authentic culture and serene landscapes. While you'll feel a world away, you're only a 90-minute drive from Bali Airport and an hour from Ubud. The villa also serves as a perfect base for exploring iconic sites like Lempuyang Temple, Besakih, and Tirta Gangga.The Bamboo House: A Unique ExperienceThis isn't just a house; it's a work of art. Crafted from sustainable bamboo, the villa's open design beautifully blurs the line between indoors and nature. All living spaces, bedrooms, and the bathroom are oriented to showcase the breathtaking panorama. At 72 sqm (approx. 775 sq ft), the space feels both intimate and airy, with abundant natural air circulation. You'll never need an air conditioner‚Äîthe mountain air keeps things comfortably cool, and we provide fans for rare warm days.Important Things to KnowMonkeys: Since September 2023, monkeys have occasionally visited. We coexist with nature and will never harm them, but please follow these simple rules: never feed them, store valuables and food immediately, and close the bamboo curtains at night.Insects & Bugs: This is an open-air home in the heart of nature, so encounters with insects, bugs, and frogs are common. While our beds have mosquito nets, if you are sensitive to insects, this may not be the right fit for you.Internet: We provide pocket WiFi, but due to our remote location, the connection can be slow or occasionally unavailable.Transportation & Services: We are in a secluded spot with no shops or restaurants within walking distance. However, our team can help you arrange for a driver, scooter rentals, or taxis at a reasonable price. Western breakfast is included, and the owner has an Italian/Mexican restaurant just a 15-minute drive away.Hanging Net: The outdoor hanging net has a maximum weight limit of 150kg and is for single-person use only. Please use it at your own risk.Why You'll Love It HereWe've tried to be as honest as possible so you know exactly what to expect. Laputa is for those who want to disconnect and immerse themselves in Bali's natural beauty. Your local host, Wira, lives nearby and can help with everything from arranging private yoga and massages to inviting you to a local village ceremony.In a nutshell:Pros: Unforgettable views, incredible peace and quiet, and a unique opportunity to experience authentic Balinese culture.Cons: A remote location requiring a car for travel, and encounters with insects are part of the experience.If you're seeking a peaceful escape surrounded by nature, we are confident you will love your stay.

title: Rumah nesta
description: Gorgeous 3 bedroom villa  perched on the cliffs of southern bali , over looking the most beautiful coastline bali has to offer.Wake up in the morning too an un obstructed view of the beautiful ocean .The perfect family get away home! The villa is designed for a family of 6 that loves the beach and enjoys the surf .Walking distance too popular restaurants and bars in the area 5-10min away.And uluwatu surf spot.The spacefully furnished 3 bedroom holiday home open air living area .1 master bedroom . King size bed. Fully air conditioned With on suite bath room and bath tub And out door shower . All private.2 Guest bed rooms perfect for the young ones shared bath room in door tv room fully air conditioned .(Will be eligible for use after 3 guest.)1 large open air living area and kitchen .And 2 cliff side decks open air over looking the ocean below.20 meter lap pool with 1 small shallow area for the young ones.WiFi all over the property . However WiFi in this area can be spotty and not good .Guest who need WiFi 24hrs should get a data plan in Indonesia for there mobile phones as back upGuest accessFree parking for up to 4 carsgeneral House keeping staff 9am-5pmStaff can help cook simple breakfast dishes and lunch dishes as long as funds are provided to buy the groceries.If you would like to order lunch please let the staff at breakfast time know ! Please give funds to the staff to buy your lunch or breakfast groceries 10% tip on top of groceries cost will be charged as a gratuity towards the staffGas stove ( might need a match or a lighter start it)Fridge .Stove top kettle Toaster  Cutlery Glasses cups plates .Pots and pans .If Guest need to rent a motor bike or need a car driver please ask one of the staff.We do have airport pick up it cost 400,000 IDR around $27 USD.Per car each car fits 4 guests.Car in driver at property if needed will be extra $$Other things to noteHazards exist we are absolutely cliff side .Monkeys and other tropical animals will visit the home on occasion! We are not liable for any injuries that might occur during your stay !or are we liable for your belongings please keep them safe .We do not supply a sound system please bring your own.

title: *NEW* Bali's Masterpiece : Volcano & Amazing view
description: ‚ú®Take advantage of an exceptional price for the launch of this new villa! Escape to a one-of-a-kind luxury bamboo villa in the heart of Sidemen. With breathtaking views of Mount Agung, lush rice fields, and a peaceful river, this 3-bedroom retreat blends nature and comfort. Open-air design, handcrafted details, and modern amenities create the perfect space for families or groups seeking tranquility and authenticity in Bali.The spaceüåø Unique DesignBuilt entirely with bamboo and natural materials, the villa is a true work of art. Its open-air concept lets you enjoy uninterrupted views of the majestic Mount Agung, flowing river, and endless rice terraces.üõå Comfort & SpaceThe villa features three spacious bedrooms, each with an en-suite bathroom and private views.
