title: Magical 1br Villa - Jungle Valley in Ubud
description: This jungle valley view villa is an amazing place for a couple looking for privacy and an authentic, relaxing, breathtaking atmosphere. This immaculately designed one-bedroom villa features a private pool, offering stunning views of the jungle and River, all for a tropical experience just 7-15 minutes by scooter to Ubud Center. Via picturesque roads, North&East coast beaches and mountains can be reached in 30-60 minutes, meanwhile enjoy pure nature, authentic villages, top cultural attractions.The spaceThe space at Villa Ubud Valley is a beautiful one-bedroom villa, offering stunning views of the Petanu River valley. Located 2.5 kilometers from the center of Ubud, in a clean, and green area, this villa is truly unique due to its exceptional location. The spacious bedroom is equipped with a king-size bed for a restful night's sleep. Then, enjoy the breathtaking views of the valley and river while lounging in the luxurious pool. Villa Ubud Valley provides WiFi internet, air conditioning, Netflix, and cleaning service for your convenience.House Rules:‚¶ø Please respect the local culture, all local Bali and villa assets, and prevent disturbing the peaceful Ubud holiday and living environment with noise or actions that unreasonably affect or disturb others. (Parties and loud music are not allowed)‚¶ø Children, outside visitors and pets are not allowed at the villa. Only maximum 2 adults with registered ID can stay during the booking. As required by Indonesian Law, you need to share with us a copy of your ID/passport via AirBNB or WA or email before you arrive, or latest by staff picturing your ID, before you receive the key. ‚¶ø Not allowed to use towels and bed linen for removal of sunblock, oils and make up, that by nearly default destroys the towels and bed linen for future use. NeighborhoodUbud Canyon is located 2.5 kilometers from the center of Ubud, known as the art capital and cultural heart of the Island of the Gods. Here, you will discover ancient temples, majestic royal palaces, the monkey forest, and stunning vistas of lush green hills for an authentic Balinese experience.Guest accessAround or at the villa there is parking space for motorcycles. Cars can be parked on the side of the road where parking would be allowed and when parking spots are available, or with a few car rental - taxi agencies at 100-meter distance. Parking space availability needs to be confirmed first by the Host earliest 1 week before arrival. In general, it is not recommendable to visit Ubud by car since the government has end 2023 forbidden to park cars along the roadside in Ubud in order to reduce traffic jams; by motor bike you can reach Monkey forest in Ubud Centre in 7 to 15 minutes, but in high season or certain peak hours by car Ubud Centre may take 30-60 minutes from any other location in or near Ubud. Motorbikes and car rental transport are the most convenient way of transport. But mind it: Online transport is in general less reliable and less convenient, this contrary to excellent online F&B services.Other things to note‚¶ø Bali is a tropical island with all of its amazing biodiversity. You may find plenty of various small animals in Bali (during the stay), ranging from the endangered creatures until common house animals you‚Äôve seen every day like harmless Lizard and Gecko or small insects such as ants and mosquitoes. We do our best to do regular pest control in our villa and clean the villa in detail every day. However, we cannot control and guarantee that there will be no insects at all after regularly arranging the treatments. Therefore, we provide mosquito-small insect spray and electric repellent in the villa to make your stay convenient. ‚¶ø In Bali Humans and Dogs live side by side; you may see dogs on the streets and not being kept in a cage as part of the island‚Äôs way of life. ‚¶ø The lush jungle surrounding the villa is home to playful monkeys that occasionally pass by the river canyon gardens. Their visits vary, sometimes weekly, sometimes every couple of months, depending on food availability in the area. As they naturally roam in search of food, we kindly remind you to keep any snacks or meals secured, as unattended food may attract these curious visitors. To ensure a smooth and enjoyable stay, please be mindful that they might take an interest in any open snacks if left out. We appreciate your understanding and hope you enjoy the unique experience of being close¬†to¬†nature!¬†üòäIncluded services:Free Balinese coffee, tea, water. For floating breakfast we serve you with a floating tray, then like all our guests enjoyed to fill up the tray with your personal choice out of the hundreds of online available culinary F&B options.Optional services:- Bed linen: Change each 3 daysPrice: Included in the booking.- Towels: Change each 3 daysPrice: Included in the booking.

title: Japanese/Ubud-Style Villa Near Pererenan & Canggu
description: An expansive Japanese style oasis with the tranquility of the jungle just minutes from the best surf spots and restaurants of Pererenan, Seseh and Canggu. This serene retreat features a spacious teak villa with a cantilevered lap pool, rock gardens, a bamboo forest, large trees and filtered water throughout the house. A blend of traditional architecture and modern comfort, it feels like being in Ubud but just minutes from the coast.The spaceA turn-of-the-century traditional teak building brought over from Java and constructed overhanging the Pererenan river, this property feels remote and peaceful yet it is just minutes from Canggu and the coast. The interior has modern appliances, glass windows and doors, air conditioning and filtered water systems. The design is similar to Japanese-style wooden buildings with clean lines, beautiful wood craft and organic, traditional architecture.The large main living and dining room are 33x38 feet (10x 11.5 meters) looking out across the gardens and pool. The office serves as a second bedroom with rollerblinds to let you sleep in. There is a replica of a 1950s green French sofa designed for an additional person to sleep on.The large bedroom has a large super king size bed (200x200cm or 6.5 sq.ft.), antique copper bed lamps, a custom made headboard and large panel windows looking out into the jungle and down onto the river. There are large cabinets for your clothing and personal items.The master bath has two sinks and a glassed in shower overlooking the river. There is a separate guest bathroom just off the living room.The large lap pool is cantilevered over the river and filtered using a copper iodine system (very low chemical imprint).The house water is fully filtered and drinkable throughout the house. There is a flash heater providing endless hot water supply.The gardens include 80 foot mango trees, timber bamboo and Japanese style rock gardens with water flowing through them.There is an unfinished storage area below the house with a large grass lawn and seating area overlooking the looking.Guest accessYou have private access to the entire property.Ahania Villa is at the back of a Hindu village in Tumbak Bayu on the Pererenan river. There is 70 meters (230 feet) of paved bike and foot path from the street to the house. The house is not accessible by car so be prepared to walk about three minutes down the path and down 25 wide steps to the house. Our staff can meet you and help you with your bags and/or you can use a small cart we have in the bike port to transport bags.Other things to noteAccess to the house requires walking for several minutes down a paved foot path or a 1 minute ride on your motorbike (which we can arrange and have ready for you). We are at the back of a quiet Hindu village on the river. So you are part of a local community which means no loud parties or high volume music after dark.This is the jungle so there are a lot of birds, roosters and insects (ants, cicadas, geckos, local dogs - all cute). If you are looking for an authentic experience this is your place. If you want a concrete modern building fumigated to remove insects, please look somewhere else.The jungle produces a lot of noise in the morning (cicadas and roosters as well as geckos - think 3 foot long geckos). If you require complete quiet in the morning, try one of the hotels downtown.The property is not suitable for children because of the large drop-offs from the pool and bedroom.

title: Design Gem: 3-Suite @ Beyond Bloom (Ground Floor)
description: Welcome to Beyond Bloom, where luxury meets thoughtful design. These 3 elegant suites are crafted for travelers who appreciate refined aesthetics, and premium comfort.- Exclusive use of the ground-floor suites, pool and living space.- Room service available for effortless dining.- Only a 30-min ride from the international airport in normal traffic.- Enjoy your tranquil escape in this hidden gem, yet with world-class restaurants and beach clubs just minutes awayThe spaceSophisticated Interiors: Every element is carefully curated‚Äîexpect high-end finishes, bespoke furnishings, and a serene ambiance.Luxury Pool & Pool Bar: Relax in style with a 12-meter pool and pool bar for refreshing drinks under the sun.Convenient Indulgences: Room service is available for effortless dining in your suite.Guest accessExclusive access to the ground-floor suites, 12-meter pool, and elegant living space (upstairs areas not accessible)Other things to noteTo ensure all guests enjoy our peaceful ambiance:‚úñ No parties/loud music (strictly enforced without prior approval)‚úñ No indoor smoking (outdoor smoking with provided ashtrays only)ü§´ Quiet hours 10pm-9amüë• No unregistered visitorsWe appreciate your cooperation in maintaining Beyond Bloom's serene atmosphere.

title: The Clove House in Munduk -  Island in the Sky
description: The Clove House in Munduk is a real gem for all those looking to enjoy the tranquility and amazing beauty of mother nature in a unique and comfortable mountain hut. It is ideal for private yoga or meditation retreats, as well as for writers, painters or couples looking for a romantic getaway in an unbelievable dramatic setting. Walk to Munduks 3 beautiful waterfalls directly from the house and enjoy staying in a world-class minimalist designed home.The spaceLike an island in the sky, the clove house serves the special purpose of bringing people back to nature and their own core self. In a hectic world, filled with material and mental distractions, I see the clove house as a haven for seekers, nature-lovers and practitioners of any spiritual discipline, but also simply as a place to come, relax and get away from it all!The design of the house follows an optimal flow concept, trying to make best use of light, wind, view and the actual site. Even though simple in its layout, lots of conscious selection of materials make it a cute warm ‚Äúnest‚Äù in the middle of nature. Recycled materials, such as rough-surfaced iron wood, have been used for the flooring and recycled teak wood for the sliding doors. Furniture is held minimal, yet comfortable enough to spend a few days in the house. I am personally a big believer in less is more, but still want my place to be comfortable.  Please enjoy!VILLA OVERVIEW - Walk to Munduks amazing waterfalls DIRECTLY from the villa- Private minimalist house in the middle of Bali Jungle with ocean view- Outdoor bathtub with jungle views - King-size Bedroom with 180 degree views- Japanese-inspired bathroom with waterfall-style shower- Large open deck with relaxing chairs and dining area and yoga space- Private garden with sun loungers- Private gym with spin bikes, dumbbell rack and power tower- Free parking space upstairs and access to restaurant- Direct Access to Munduk‚Äôs trekking path and waterfalls (closest one about 15 minutes)- Safety box - Fully equipped kitchen- Wi-Fi The house follows the idea of joining elegantly 3 major design influences: modern minimalism, Japanese traditional design, and Balinese Feng Shui. Choosing darker colours and wooden elements give the villa a warmer cozy atmosphere in the colder terrain. There is a big king-size bed with mosquito netting for a comfortable sleep or for those that like to laze around during the day. Via a Japanese style sliding door one can opt to have a view of the jungle while standing under the rainfall shower or step out and take a hot relaxing bath under the sky in the colder evenings.A small but complete kitchen is hidden behind the other door, for those who prefer to cook on their own, or simply to put up the kettle for a hot cup of tea or coffee (provided!). To the front, the veranda opens onto the endless majestic view of Bali‚Äôs jungle and ocean.Under the house you will find your own personal gym with spin bikes, a dumbbell rack and a power tower.SERVICESYou can expect clean, simple and friendly service. We are limited in our power to manage the services,  as we outsource/collaborate with Arya Utama Bungalows. Simply be aware, that Munduk is in a rural part of Bali, further away from modern life and people are more simple minded.  Expect basic English-skills ( you may ask Mr. Surya or Mr. Adi for assistance if you have any communication issues).Arya Utama provides a range of simple Balinese food at great prices (I personally recommend the Vegetable curry, Nasi Goreng and Vegetable Soup), that they can bring down to the house at an extra charge of 20%. Last order 6.45pm. Please pre-order your breakfast at the desired time one day before in person or via phone provided in the villa. You may also order breakfast in the morning, but expect some waiting time. Please help yourself with tea and coffee that is already available in the villa.INCLUDED SERVICES: - Choice of different breakfast sets (omlette with toast, jaffle, fried rice, vegetable soup, banana pancake) all served with fresh fruit plate/or fruit juice - Free Coffee, Tea and drinking water in the villa- Free Welcome drink - Housekeeping/Towel change - please order it whenever you need it (otherwise nobody will come to clean in order to guarantee an undisturbed stay)- free Wi-Fi OPTIONAL SERVICES (extra charges apply - it is highly recommended to pre-order services one day before, as it is more difficult to organize in the mountain area): - Airport pick up/drop - other destination pick up/drop- Trekking service - Tour service - Motorbike rental - In-room service at the villa (food prepared by Arya Utama Restaurant, simple Indonesian food, 20% surcharge for delivering downstairs to villa). Last order 6.45pm. - Body Massage & Reflexology in the villaTIPS - One of Bali‚Äôs largest markets, providing freshest produce directly from the farms, is situated about 15-20 minute drive, at lake Tamblingan. A good place to stock up on food items should you plan to cook yourself! For longer stays, the staff at Arya Utama might be able to stock you up with simple groceries at the nearby local market (potatoes, carrots, leek, tofu, tempeh, cabbage etc) for a service fee of 100,000 IDR.- Please use the kitchen in a proper way and leave it behind in a clean state. If you find any difficulties (missing objects) please let us know so we can replace or buy them for the next guest and improve our service. Please let the staff at Arya Utama know if the gas is empty/finished and DO NOT change the Gasbottle/regulator by yourself. Please let the staff at Arya Utama know any of the following has run out:Salt/Pepper/Sugar/Coffee/Tea/Cooking Oil/dishwashing liquid ‚Äì we provide these items in the kitchen free of charge during your stay. There is a French press and Moka machine available for coffee preparation, as well as a tea pot for preparing tea.- Please throw all sanitary napkins, toilet paper, tampons into the garbage bin provided ‚Äì do not flush down the toilet.Guest accessYou have private access to all the facilities of the house.You will share the parking/restaurant area.From the house you can walk down to Munduk's amazing waterfalls - ENjoy!Other things to noteTHINGS TO CONSIDER BEFORE BOOKING:-Please bring enough cash money as the nearest ATM is 20 minute drive-no children under 18 years allowed, as there are very low railings (50cm) and some areas without railing. This is held intentional, so as to give the undisturbed feelings, as well as making the house adult ‚Äì only. -Refrain from drinking high amounts of alcohol because of the risk of loosing balance and falling over the railing 4 meter.-The hot water is set to VERY HOT (about 70 degrees Celsius), so as to guarantee that the bathtub can be filled up in proper way. Please be  aware of this at all times and take care not to use the hottest setting on your body.-The road down to the house is rather steep and about 5 minute walk to the upper restaurant area ‚Äì that‚Äôs the price we must pay for undisturbed jungle immersion  ‚ò∫ We recommend using the food deliver service from the upper restaurant and it costs only 20% extra on top of the cheap local prices.-The road down to the waterfall is natural and might be slippery and steep at times. Please walk slowly.-During rainy season some parts of the paths, as well as the bridge and decking might be slippery. Please walk with caution.-The food provided at the accommodation is simple but good quality Indonesian food. Should you desire more refined cuisine, we recommend to head to Ngiring Ngewedang or to bring items so you can prepare your own meals in the kitchen. You may also try to have your breakfast at the waterfall Golden Valley Eco caf√© below, about 40 minute walk from the house, turning right at the first T-fork.-To guarantee complete privacy, cleaning of the villa will only be carried out when you order it. -Some garden lighting has been set up to illuminate the path down to the house. For ecological purposes we have set the timer to switch the lights on from sunset til 10.30pm. -Even though some natural bamboo has been planted to guarantee some fencing and privacy, the house can be seen from the side by the occasional hiker. A bamboo mat can be pulled down to guarantee more privacy.- The Clove House lies at a higher altitude of 1000m - expect a much milder climate than in the south of Bali. Highly recommended to bring a jumper, sweater, socks and long pants for the fresher evenings.The story behind the Clove HouseInspired by movies such as TOTORO and other Sudio Gilbhi movies, year-long meditation practice and a love for nature, the clove house was born with the intention to bring people back to nature, back to themselves, back to peaceful silent contentment. Having come to Arya Utama over the past 5 years for short-period meditation retreats, somehow I developed an intimate relationship with its surroundings and the owners. The walks one can take to the waterfalls in the area, the endless stunning sunsets over the ocean (in dry season), the sounds of the jungle, the passing clouds, the thundering rain, the dry sunshine, the variety of wildlife, and the smell of clove and coffee in the air (dry season) have made me fall in love with this place and have made it my personal sanctuary to regain energy, vision and focus. May you get the same benefits while staying at this beautiful place on earth!

title: Eden - Escape to Nature
description: Welcome to Eden by Saraya Bali ‚Äî a bamboo villa nestled in the heart of Sidemen‚Äôs nature. Surrounded by rice fields, a flowing river, and Mount Agung, this open-air retreat offers stunning views and peaceful vibes. Enjoy a bamboo bathtub with a view, private pool, and elegant eco-design. Perfect for relaxing, reconnecting, and embracing the beauty of Bali. The villa is an open concept. Let Eden be your sanctuary where elegance meets the wild beauty of Bali.

title: Luxurious Villa with Infinity Pool & Lush Scenery
description: Escape to a private two-bedroom villa in Ubud, set on a lush jungle ravine just 15 mins from Ubud center and 10 mins from the famous Tegallalang Rice Terraces. Enjoy a private infinity pool, dedicated yoga lawn, open-plan living, and stunning valley views. Perfect for couples, friends, or families seeking a luxurious yet secluded retreat with optional chef service, in-villa massages, and curated tours.The spaceWelcome to Villa Nomati, your private sanctuary nestled deep in the lush jungles of Ubud. Perched on the edge of a serene ravine, this newly built two-bedroom villa blends modern luxury with timeless Balinese design, surrounded by breathtaking tropical greenery and the soothing sounds of nature.Here, luxury meets tranquility ‚Äî where mornings begin with the melody of birds, afternoons unfold beside your private infinity pool, and evenings bring the gentle hum of the jungle under a star-studded sky.üåø The VillaDesigned with an open-plan layout and floor-to-ceiling windows, the villa invites natural light and fresh air to flow freely through every space. Each bedroom features a king-size bed, air conditioning, and a private ensuite bathroom, ensuring total comfort and relaxation.Enjoy a dedicated outdoor yoga and meditation lawn, set amidst the greenery ‚Äî the perfect spot for sunrise stretches or quiet reflection surrounded by nature‚Äôs energy.The spacious living area opens directly to panoramic valley views ‚Äî ideal for reading, writing, or simply soaking in the peaceful atmosphere.A fully equipped kitchen offers everything you need to feel at home, including quality appliances and an espresso machine to enjoy fresh coffee while overlooking the jungle ‚Äî or to become a Master Chef for a night if you feel inspired.üå¥ Amenities & Experiences- Private infinity pool with jungle views- Outdoor yoga and meditation lawn- Two ensuite bedrooms with king-size beds & A/C- Open-plan living and dining area- Fully equipped kitchen + espresso coffee machine- Optional prepared breakfast, lunch, or dinner (upon request)- Traditional Balinese massage in the comfort of your villa- Free private parking for car or scooter- High-speed Wi-Fi throughout the villaüïâÔ∏è The ExperienceVilla Nomati isn‚Äôt just accommodation ‚Äî it‚Äôs a holistic experience of peace, connection, and renewal. Whether you‚Äôre seeking a romantic retreat, a creative escape, or a mindful getaway, the surrounding jungle provides the perfect environment for deep rest and inspiration.Your privacy is completely respected, while our attentive local host can assist with anything you need ‚Äî from floating breakfasts and private traditional Balinese massages to island tours, day trips, and airport transfers.üìç LocationLocated in Keliki Village, a peaceful area just 10 minutes by scooter or car from central Ubud and the famous Tegallalang Rice Terraces, the villa offers the ideal balance between seclusion and easy access to Bali‚Äôs cultural heart.Nearby attractions include:- Tegallalang Rice Terraces (10 min)- Ubud Palace & Traditional Market (15 min)- Monkey Forest Sanctuary (20 min)üå∫ NotesChef services and in-villa massages require advance booking to ensure the best experience. Half- or full-day tours to Bali‚Äôs most scenic and cultural destinations can also be arranged upon request.üí∞ Special Offer ‚Äì Discount!We‚Äôre happy to let you know that a second villa ‚Äî part of our boutique jungle retreat ‚Äî is almost complete. Construction is now in its final stage, with minimal and occasional daytime activity, ensuring your peace and relaxation remain our top priority.As a token of appreciation for your understanding during this brief finishing phase, we‚Äôre offering an exclusive limited-time discount. It‚Äôs a wonderful opportunity to experience the serenity, elegance, and comfort of Villa Nomati at a truly special value.Enjoy your stay surrounded by lush tropical greenery, soothing natural sounds, and the gentle spirit of Ubud ‚Äî while being among the first to experience this evolving haven of tranquility.Guest accessThe entire villa is yours to enjoy in full privacy. Despite its hidden setting, the villa is easily accessible via an asphalt road and offers shaded parking for your comfort.Other things to noteOur villa is located in Keliki, a peaceful village in the Tegallalang area, surrounded by lush rice fields and authentic Balinese charm. Just 10 minutes away, you‚Äôll find the world-famous Tegallalang Rice Terraces, a UNESCO World Heritage site best experienced at sunrise or sunset when the light creates a magical glow across the cascading fields. Don‚Äôt miss the iconic jungle swings for a once-in-a-lifetime photo.Within 15 minutes, you can reach Ubud‚Äôs cultural heart ‚Äî the Sacred Monkey Forest, Ubud Palace, and the bustling Traditional Market where you can shop for handicrafts, art, and local delicacies. Ubud is also home to the Blanco Renaissance Museum, Campuhan Ridge Walk, countless yoga studios, and some of Bali‚Äôs best restaurants and caf√©s.Whether you‚Äôre exploring the terraces, enjoying a traditional Balinese dance performance at the palace, or walking along the scenic ridge paths, there‚Äôs always something inspiring to discover nearby ‚Äî all while knowing you can return to the serenity of your private jungle villa at the end of the day.

title: Ubud‚Äôs Dreamiest Villa: Jungle Tub + Rooftop Pool
description: Welcome to Milliways, where style and luxury meet in the most breathtaking way! This listing will give you access to the most beautiful bedroom at this private villa, with a gorgeous hanging bathtub with a view of the jungle and the river ridge.Stay close to downtown Ubud, and enjoy our unique villa, perched on the edge of a lush tropical gorge, with a glass-bottomed pool, a treetop yoga deck, and a hidden bar.For 3 Bedrooms and 2 Bedrooms booking, see other listings on the Host profile.The spaceMilliways Bali is the sister property of Haigha House (Best Villa to Book in Bali 2022 - The Cond√® Nast Traveller). Located just around the corner from Nyuh Kuning, one of Ubud's most famous villages, the 3-bedrooms villa is fully fitted with housekeeping services, and offers personalized services such as Home Spa, private yoga and personal trainer sessions, in-villa Dining, private driver/tour and many more.. THE BEDROOM~~Alula~~The beautiful Alula features a comfortable double bed, a writing desk, a large wardrobe, and the most gorgeous hanging bathtub -- with a breathtaking view of the jungle and the gorge. The one bedroom fit up to 3 people. One extra bed can be provided for additional one people, at an extra charge. Meanwhile, a baby cot (pack n play) is also available complimentary for use. This listing is for a stay in ALULA ROOM. To stay in the other two bedrooms or to upgrade to 3 Bedrooms check my other listings). The entire villa is private to you when you book (no other guests), the different listings allow you to choose how many bedrooms are included.THE COMMON SPACES~~Lounge Area~~You will love Milliways Bali's lounge area, which features an oversized, multi-facing couch, allowing you to admire the beautiful nature from the floor-to-ceiling windows (the ceiling is over 15 feet high!), to watch your favorite shows from our 60" smart TV, curl up with books taken from our tall, beautiful bookshelf, or to daydream while looking up to our beautiful pool.That is right, directly above Milliways Bali's lounge area is our glass-bottomed swimming pool, giving calming light refractions to the space below. ~~Private Speakeasy~~One of our guests' favorite features at Milliways Bali is the cozy private speakeasy, hidden from plain view. This unique space, with its beautiful tufted leather bench and a small balcony, is the perfect spot to enjoy your favorite drinks with your favorite people. Drink options are available on a pre-order basis. Please inquire if you'd like the bar to be pre-stocked upon your stay. ~~Swimming Pool~~Our private infinity swimming pool is treetop high, with a full view of the jungle gorge. There's a shallow end that's convenient for young travelers and a fully glass-bottomed section, making it a stunning feature seen from inside or outside the villa. On the pool deck, we also have a large sun lounger and two beanbags to sunbath or lounge by the pool. ~~Yoga and Meditation Deck~~Perched just above the pool deck, our yoga and meditation deck offers an open, tranquil space surrounded by trees ‚Äî ideal for mindful practice or intimate group gatherings. It‚Äôs also a beautiful spot to relax and share afternoon drinks with your loved ones.AROUND MILLIWAYS BALIWe are located close to the center of Ubud: around 8-minute walk to Sacred Monkey Forest Sanctuary or 4 minutes by car/bike. Within walking distance, you can find:- Plenty of Restaurants, including vegan and vegetarian restaurants- Cafes and Bistro- Yoga Studio- Pilates studio- Coworking space- Daycare and Children's Playground (with nanny service)BOOKING INCLUSIONSOur Standard Rate includes complimentary breakfast, daily housekeeping, and butler/concierge service.Our Promo or Non-Refundable Rate also includes daily housekeeping and butler/concierge service, but breakfast is not included. You can still enjoy breakfast by purchasing it separately. If you‚Äôre unsure whether your booking includes breakfast, please check with our host.Please note that our Airbnb rate is fixed, and Promo/Non-Refundable Rates are available only for last-minute bookings (1 day before arrival), the last 3 available dates of the month, or during special promotions.Some amenities are available complimentary by request:Baby Cot (pack n play), High Chair, Children's Play Tent, Children's Cutleries, Rice Cooker.Other services are all available by request and can be pre-booked exclusively for your stay at extra cost. Some of the extra services that are available for your stay at Milliways Bali:- Home Spa/Massage- Balinese in villa lunch/dining- Floating Breakfast- Flower Bath arrangement- Grocery and Laundry service- Mini Bar - Scooter rental- Private Driver- Babysitter/Nanny- Personal Trainer- Photography service- Private wellness sessions: Yoga, Reiki, Muay Thai- Playground/Baby Gears rental or Pool fence rental if traveling with your little onesDon‚Äôt hesitate to contact us if you‚Äôd like to arrange or book any of the services listed above for your stay at Milliways Bali. We‚Äôll be more than happy to assist in making your vacation with us truly unforgettable :)Guest accessThe entire main villa is private to you. There is a service area/staff house at the back of the courtyard where our staff works and stays during the day, separated from the main villa, ensuring your privacy.Other things to note- Closer to your check-in date, our villa host/butler/concierge will contact you via WA at the numbers listed in your reservation to arrange for your check-in details. Please make sure that your number is correct and reachable. - Milliways Bali is located behind a small Banjar (village). It is accessible by car and has on-site parking for one car and some motorbikes. However, the access road is quite narrow and can only hold one car (normal-sized, 6-seater van) at a time. Large-sized vans or mini buses such as Alphard, Elf, Hiace, or the like will not be able to pass the road.- Please note that while all the bedrooms in the villa are equipped with air conditioning units, the main areas, such as the living room, dining room, and kitchen, are designed with an open-plan, expansive layout and high ceilings. Due to the architectural design, these areas are not air-conditioned; instead, we have plenty of fans strategically placed in different spots. We also provide extra fans upon request to ensure a pleasant and enjoyable stay. - No commercial filming is allowed at the premise without prior written agreement from the property owner. Commercial filming means the film, electronic, magnetic, digital, or other recording of a moving image by a person, business, or other entity for a market audience with the intent of generating income. Examples include, but are not limited to, feature film, revenue generating content creation, fashion photography, stock photography, and documentaries. Commercial filming may include the advertisement of a product or service, or the use of actors, models, sets, or props.Any commercial filming at the property requires a signed written agreement and waiver, subject to Milliways Bali‚Äôs commercial shooting rate.

title: Bali Aira (Ubud)
description: House designed by "TOBIASESTUDIO", located in a small village in the jungle. Sanding is an authentic Balinese village surrounded by rice and jungle fields. It offers a unique opportunity for a deep cultural immersion, away from the crowds and traffic of downtown Ubud. Perfect for those looking for peace, nature and an authentic experience in Bali. Immerse yourself in a natural setting while enjoying the comfort of bespoke furniture and a designed interior with great attention to detail.The spaceThis 211 m¬≤ house offers:- 3 spacious bedrooms, each with private bathroom and terrace with panoramic jungle and rice fields view.- Designated infinity pool with ozone filtration system and jungle views- Spacious garden with organic fruit trees, vegetables, and aromatic plants.- Fully equipped modern kitchen and an elegant open concept living roomAll amenities:	‚Ä¢ 	King Size Bed	‚Ä¢	Mosquito net	‚Ä¢	AC and fan	‚Ä¢	Minibar and safe	‚Ä¢	Water dispenser	‚Ä¢	Bed linens and towels	‚Ä¢	Hairdryer and kettle	‚Ä¢ 	Bali Asli Soaps & Shampoo	‚Ä¢	Daily housekeeping- We have couch bed ideal for a small child. Baby cot available upon prior request.Guest accessSpaces for relaxation, work and wellness. Areas for yoga and meditation, perfect for relaxing or retreating. Spacious spaces with high quality tables, comfortable chairs, abundant natural light and Wi-Fi, ideal for working in a quiet environment.Breakfast is included in the price of the stay and you can choose from three delicious options each morning.Great for families, couples, friends, digital nomads, or anyone looking for privacy, elegance, and comfort.Services available upon request:	‚Ä¢	Bicycle rentals, motorbikes and cars	‚Ä¢ 	Driver Service.	‚Ä¢ 	Balinese Massages.	‚Ä¢ 	Food delivery on demand        ‚Ä¢      Cooking classes        ‚Ä¢      Yoga Lessons        ‚Ä¢ Floating breakfast        ‚Ä¢      Private chef        ‚Ä¢      Balinese dessert cooking classes        ‚Ä¢ Canang Sari (Balinese Offerings) LessonsOther things to noteBe aware that being in the middle of nature involves living with local wildlife. It is possible to see insects, geckos or other small animals, and at night the jungle comes to life with sounds of birds, monkeys, frogs and more. Especially in the early morning, roosters can sing and make sounds, something very common in rural environments very rooted in their culture. This is part of the authentic experience of staying in a natural paradise. We do our best to make the house comfortable, but we recommend keeping doors and windows closed at night and using repellent if needed.

title: Priviere Luxury Villa - Canggu
description: Established in late 2023, our villa is located within a walking distance to sought-after cafes, restaurants, and beach clubs in CangguThree modern Balinese style bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms.Open living space with fully equipped luxury kitchen appliances which is facing to a sunken seating and pool.Rooftop seating with fireplace, perfect for gathering.Priviere offers top of the line WiFi speed (up to 250 mbps) and flat screen TVOur dedicated team to cater to your every need.The spacePriviere is a perfect place for those who seeking comfort, cleanliness, aesthetics, and just feel like home!Guest accessEntire spaceOther things to noteWe aim to make your stay as comfortable as possible, and you will have beautiful memories during your stay here. For us to do so, we would truly appreciate it if you can read the following information.Please feel free to let us know if you need anything or if you have any concerns. We are here to assist you in any way that we can.General OverviewWe ask that you treat our villa as if it were your own property. Please be aware of the condition of items in the villa, and if you notice anything broken when you arrive, contact us right away to let us know.1. Locking Up‚Ä¢ Remember to lock up when you leave and at night. Although our villa is in a safe neighborhood, we take your security seriously.2. Smoking and Fire Prevention and Safety‚Ä¢ The villa is a non-smoking environment, whether tobacco or cannabis. Do not smoke in the villa or we will be required to send $500 invoice for extra cleaning.‚Ä¢ Please do not leave any electrical appliances switched on when they are not in use, or when you are leaving for the day. This includes the stove, air conditioner, etc. We appreciate your help!3. Pets‚Ä¢ Pets are not allowed in our property. We may charge you $500 for extra cleaning.4. Shoes‚Ä¢ We kindly ask that you remove outdoor shoes at the foyer area. We will provide you brand new sleepers to be used around the villa. We really appreciate it!5. Laundry & Cleaning Supplies‚Ä¢ Please contact your host.6. WiFi‚Ä¢ Please ask your host.7. AC‚Ä¢ Bedrooms are provided with AC, no heater.‚Ä¢ Please kindly turn off the AC when you are away.8. Kitchen‚Ä¢ Please throw away the left over foods. Our cleaning team will help you wash  the dirty dishes and utensils.9. Extra Guests‚Ä¢ We do not mind if you invite friends or family over to visit, however please keep the number of guests to a manageable level and observe quiet hours.10. Parties or Events‚Ä¢ We do not allow guests to throw parties or events‚Ä¢ Please do not engage any illegal activity, inappropriate or anti-social behavior.11. Broken Items‚Ä¢ If for any reason you break an item during your stay, please let us know. We understand that accidents happen, but in order for us to fix or replace something for a future guest to enjoy, we will need to know that it is broken. We appreciate your honesty. All damages or missing items will need to be paid by you before departure.12. Cleanings‚Ä¢ Our dedicated cleaning team will come and clean the villa every other day. Everyday cleaning is available upon request without additional fees.

title: Luxury Canggu Villa - 5 Bedroom Jacuzzi, Gym, Golf
description: Private villa with a 12m pool, waterslide, rooftop jacuzzi with ocean views, massage room, golf simulator, putt putt golf, gym, home theatre, BBQ, and more ‚Äî Villa Luja has it all. This luxurious 5-bedroom villa is set over three levels in a secure gated complex near Bali‚Äôs top beaches and caf√©s. With 24/7 security and elegant design throughout, it‚Äôs the perfect escape for families or friends seeking refined relaxation.The spaceThe villa is designed to provide the ultimate retreat for you and your loved ones with its spacious living areas, private pool, and views of the surrounding landscape with ocean views to the west and mountains to the north.Ground Floor - The ground floor of Villa Luja is perfect for relaxation and entertainment. The combined sunken lounge and dining area is equipped with a full kitchen, complete with all the amenities you need to prepare a delicious meal, or have our private chef cook and serve you a sumptuous feast on the 14 seat dining table. The floor-to-ceiling sliding windows offer stunning views of the pool and gardens. You can choose to have an open or enclosed living space depending on your mood. The whole villa is air-conditioned to ensure your comfort. You will also be able to watch your favourite shows and enjoy movie nights on our big screen and 4K projector and indulge in the surround sound of our Sonos system.There is a separate TV room and adjoining ground floor bedroom (bedroom 5) that is accessed off the lounge and dining area to create an oasis for kids to enjoy their own space, or adults to relax and unwind.First Floor -The first floor of Villa Luja is home to four spacious bedrooms featuring king size beds in 3 rooms, bunk beds (2 rooms). Bedroom 1 and 4 include a smart TV, and all 4 bedrooms on the first floor include an en-suite bathroom. Bedroom 5 on the ground floor has access to a bathroom and outdoor shower. Bedroom 2 includes a separate games room with TV, PS4, dart board, board games and other activities.Second Floor - The second floor of Villa Luja is dedicated to wellness and relaxation. The air-conditioned massage room and gym are equipped with top-of-the-line fitness equipment ensuring a rejuvenating workout experience. You also have access to a golf simulator (Skytrak system) and sets of adults and childrens golf clubs.Rooftop - The rooftop of Villa Luja is designed to provide the ultimate relaxation experience. The expansive rooftop offers stunning views of the ocean to the west and mountains to the north. There is a 3-hole outdoor putting green and a jacuzzi. With outdoor seating it's the perfect place to unwind after a relaxing day whilst watching the sunset in the distance.As you return to the ground floor the heart of the villa is the amazing pool with the waterslide and swing set that uncovers the private oasis of Villa Luja. With its comfortable sun loungers, parasols, seating area, and shaded nooks, its perfect for relaxing. A covered outdoor space offers a serene spot for morning yoga sessions. There is also a BBQ, football goals and various games for outdoor fun.Staff and Services - Villa Luja is fully staffed with a dedicated villa manager, housekeeping, gardener, and pool caretaker. Our staff are available to take care of your every need, from preparing meals to arranging activities and excursions. We also offer a range of extra services, including in-villa chef, airport transfer, and laundry service. EXTRA COSTS - Villa pre-stocking of groceries and beveragesPrivate ChefAirport transfersActivities and excursionsDriverIn-villa massage serviceLaundry serviceBaby-sitting serviceFloating breakfastFlower arrangementScooter HirePrivate TrainerYoga TeacherExtra bed for an extra guest at an additional fee.Many more extras, whatever you require we can assist with.FAQsWhat is the check-in time?Our dedicated staff will ensure a seamless check-in process. Standard check-in is at 2:00 PM. Guests are welcome to drop off luggage earlier while we prepare the villa for your stay.What is the check-out policy?Check-out is at 10:00 AM. Late check-out is subject to availability and incurs additional fees: 50% of the daily villa rate for check-outs between 10:00 AM and 6:00 PM, or the full daily rate for check-outs after 6:00 PM. Luggage storage is available post-check-out upon request.Can I arrange for a private chef to dine in the villa?Yes, we can arrange a private chef for in-villa dining. The cost is the total grocery expense plus a service fee of IDR 400,000 for breakfast or IDR 800,000 for dinner per meal (not per guest). Menus are provided upon booking, and your villa host can procure fresh market ingredients with a day‚Äôs notice. Alternatively, our fully equipped kitchen is available for your use.Is a floating breakfast available?Yes, floating breakfasts can be arranged. Additional guests incur a fee of USD 50 per person per night. Up to two extra beds can be provided for groups exceeding 11 guests.Bedrooms - Bedroom 1:   * King bed (2000x2000)      * Ensuite with shower & hairdryer   * Smart LED TV 43"   * Desk   * Walk in wardrobe    * Fan & Air conditioningBedroom 2:   * Bunk beds (2 x 1000x2000)   * Ensuite with shower & bathtub   * LED TV 50"   * Playstation 4 with 2 controllers   * Desk   * Wardrobe    * Fan & Air conditioningBedroom 3:   * 1 king bed (2000x2000) & bunk beds (2 x 860x2000)   * Ensuite with shower   * Walk in wardrobe    * Fan & Air conditioningBedroom 4:   * King bed    * Ensuite with shower   * Smart LED TV 43"   * Work desk   * Walk in wardrobe   * Fan & Air conditioningBedroom 5:   * Single bed   * Work desk   * Fan & Air conditioningRooftop Massage Room:   * Bathroom with outdoor shower   * Massage bed   * Air conditioningRooftop Gym:   * Treadmill   * Exercise Stationary Bike   * Weight Bench with bar   * Squat Rack   * Free Weights   * Kettle Bells   * Gym Balls x 2   * Battle Rope   * Skipping Ropes   * Boxing Pads & Gloves   * Yoga MatsRooftop Extras:   * Golf Simulator (Skytrak)   * Outdoor Putting Green   * Jacuzzi   * Sunbeds & LoungeGuest accessSecurity check at community gate entrance.Other things to noteDear guests,We would like to assure that all safety and well-being of our guests are of the utmost importance to us. Providing a clean and safe environment is our top priority. We require ID from all guests prior to check in as we have a security checkpoint at the entrance to the villa complex. Our friendly security will then ensure only you, or friends have access to the villa.If you have young children we can arrange for a temporary pool fence and internal stair gates to be installed. title: Jungleight Bali - The Oval
description: Jungleight Bali - The Oval is a unique two bedrooms bamboo house with a wonderful view of Ubud valley, a genuine tropical landscape.  This getaway spot is a great place to bring into reality the dream adventure of the true wanderer. We invite you to feel the magnificent vibes of the entire house to escape the life that is full of drama into a journey with ultimate joy.The spaceBedroom: The Oval is a unique designed two bedrooms bamboo house equipped with air conditioning, each room has its own wardrobe and an en suite bathroom with an indoor bathtub that provides a view of the surrounding greenery. Entertainment: The living room is equipped with a projector for entertainment, allowing you to enjoy Netflix and other content. There's also a Nespresso coffee machine and a refrigerated minibar for your convenience.Front Desk: The resort offers 24-hour front desk service. The staff at the front desk can assist guests with various services, such as scooter rentals and arranging trips to explore the surrounding area.In-Room Dining: The resort's restaurant provides in-room dining options, which means you can order breakfast, all-day dining, and drinks from the comfort of your villa. The staff will deliver your orders directly to your villa. There is also a small restaurant on-site exclusively for guests. This provides guests with more dining choices and convenience during your stay. You can either opt for in-room dining and enjoy your meals with privacy in the villa, or you can visit the on-site restaurant to dine in a communal setting if you prefer. Cuisine: The restaurant offers a diverse menu featuring both Balinese and International cuisine. You can enjoy a variety of dishes without leaving the comfort of your villa.Bar: The resort's bar serves a range of beverages, including soft drinks and alcoholic drinks, throughout the day. You can savour these refreshing drinks by the pool or in your villa.Eco-Friendly Setting: Jungleight Bali is situated in the middle of a tropical forest, embracing Bali's beautiful natural environment. The resort was designed to provide guests with a restful and healing experience in the midst of nature.Jungleight Bali's Inhabitants: The resort acknowledges the presence of various insects, ants, mosquitos, spiders, geckos, and other creatures that naturally inhabit the ecological environment. The resort maintains high cleaning and pest control standards to minimise their presence however before booking, acknowledges that some of these creatures may enter the room due to the open nature of bamboo material.Consideration for Bamboo Living: Bamboo resorts offer a unique living environment, and guests are encouraged to carefully consider this aspect before booking with Jungleight Bali. It's important for guests to be comfortable with the idea of being in close proximity to nature.Maximum Occupancy: The Oval can accommodate a maximum of 4 adults and 2 children (12 years old or younger). The villa is equipped with a king size bed in each bedroom, and any request for an additional bed will incur an extra charge.Included Breakfast: The complimentary breakfast is designed for 4 adults and 2 children, with options selected from the kids' menu. Any other requests for additional guests or special dietary requirements may result in additional charges.Other things to noteHouse Rules:- Check-in at 3 pm- Check out before 12 pm- Noise will not be tolerated.- No smoking inside- Please lock up valuables in the safety deposit box.- Any form of misbehavior or noise is not tolerated.- Events, gatherings, parties or pets are not allowed.

If you choose not to reserve, we will be glad to store your bags in villa till the time you need go to the airport. For the late check-out is subject to availability and may involve extra charge.

title: Nice Modern Luxury 3BR Jacuzzy Family Villa Canggu
description: Please book and enjoy extra benefit during stay with us.Nestled in the tranquil area of Canggu, Bali, Oasi House Canggu Villa offers a perfect blend of luxury, privacy, and modern comforts. Ideal for family gatherings or reconnecting with friends, enjoy tranquility and exceptional service. This lavish property balances relaxation and excitement, close to the hustle and bustle of Canggu yet peaceful. With 3 well-appointed bedrooms, it's perfect for group accommodations. title: Tropical 2BR Villa with Private Pool in Canggu
description: NEW! Modern, Tropical 2-Bedroom Villa Near BeachJl. Subak Sari, Berawa‚úî Bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, storage, workspace, SmartTV, and A/C‚úî Private swimming pool with lush garden, sun loungers, and open shower‚úî Canggu's MOST popular area ‚úî Easy 5-10 minute walk to beach, Finn's Clubs, Atlas, shopping, and dining‚úî Spacious fully equipped kitchen‚úî Comfortable open living and dining area‚úî Free Fibre-Optic Wifi‚úî Daily cleaning‚úî Free Flow Drinking Water‚úî Parking area‚úîNo smoking villaThe spaceThis villa is even better than it looks in the pictures!Built in 2022, this modern luxury property provides guests with the comfort and peace of mind of private living.With over 600 sq. feet of living space and another 600 sq. feet of pool and garden, it is the perfect space for both relaxing and entertaining.Ideal for families or couples, the space features a gracious and inviting living and dining area, a well-appointed kitchen for mixing cocktails, cooking (or simply opening delivery packs from one of several local restaurants), a beautiful pool and lounge deck (with an outdoor shower to wash off the sand from an afternoon at the beach), plush beds to relax in after a day in the sun, and spa-quality bathrooms and amenities to relax and refresh yourself.Villa Tandon features modern construction built with care using some of Bali‚Äôs most precious materials like natural stone and teak wood; it has been decorated with attention to detail and comfort in mind.The carefully thought-out tropical garden boasts multiple colored bougainvilleas and frangipani trees, palms, bananas, gardenia, herbs, and orchids (to name a few), and surrounds the natural stone turquoise pool with a benchto soak in and enjoy an afternoon mocktail or cocktail. Whether soaking in the sun by the pool, lounging in the living room on the √ºber-comfortable sofa and chair, or switching on the A/C and settling in for the night as you sink into luxurious KingKoil beds, our goal is that you feel relaxed and at home.About our spot in Berawa...Just under 800m from the beach, Villa Tandon is located in the beating heart of Berawa Beach, Canggu. Take a short walk to the beach for swimming, surfing, sunsets, and volleyball. Indulge in a tropical adventure as you explore the beauty and diversity of Bali‚Äôs southern coastline.If you love good food and dining, this is the place to be! An easy walk to many wonderful local caf√©s, bars, and restaurants‚Ä¶ and of course many, many fun, beautiful, and eclectic shops and boutiques.If you like to dance the night (or weekends) away, welcome to the center of it all! Mari Beach Club, Caf√© Del Mar, and Vue are all close; and just a short 10 minute walk away are two of the island's HOTTEST spots to see and be seen ‚Äî Finn‚Äôs Beach Club and Atlas Beach Fest! Just minutes up from Batu Belig, our spot in Berawa makes heading further into Canggu, Umalas, or Kerobokan as easy as zipping down to Petitenget or Seminyak.Come and enjoy the peace and serenity of our villa. We hope that you, as we do, find it very hard to leave this magical, dreamy space.Guest accessVilla Tandon is a completely private space for you and your loved ones. You will have the entire villa, including the pool and kitchen, to yourselves.But if you need any assistance, feel free to give us a buzz! We offer full managerial services, including housekeeping. So you‚Äôll have complete privacy - but you won‚Äôt be left to fend for yourself!Other things to note‚úî Full managerial services for all in-villa needs:‚àô Airport pickup‚àô In-Villa welcome team‚àô Spa services‚àô Outdoor activity bookings, i.e. ATV Quad, Surfing, Horseback, Hiking, etc.‚àô Excursion bookings, i.e. Tanah Lot Temple, Goa Lawah, Bias Tugel Beach, etc. ‚úî 2x per week pool and garden maintenance‚úî 3x per week housekeeping services‚úî Close to ATMs, supermarkets, wine/spirit shops, coffee shops, restaurants, bars, clubs, gyms, spas, clothing stores, home stores, and so, so, SO MUCH MORE!Construction Disclaimer:Please be aware that construction could take place next to ANY villa anywhere in Bali. Since the construction is initiated by other villa owners and is beyond our control, we are unable to offer refunds for any disturbances. We appreciate your understanding and are committed to ensuring your stay is as enjoyable as possible.

title: Breeze House
description: Enjoy true tranquility in a charming 2 bedroom bamboo villa, located in the Selat area, Karangasem. Surrounded by expanses of green rice fields and decorated with authentic bamboo designs, this is the perfect escape from the hustle and bustle of the city.This villa is perfect for 4 guests looking for peace, beauty, and a truly different stay experience.

title: Enam -  Bamboo Villa in Eco Six Bali Resort
description: Experience Bali by staying in our Enam, a 2 bedroom bamboo villa located within the Eco Six Bali resort, just a 20-minute scooter ride from the vibrant centre of Ubud.Enjoy this spacious three floors villa with its Santorini style infinity pool, and its relaxing net bed facing the Mount Agung!Breakfast included!Follow us on @ecosixbali for news and special promotions!The spaceThe Enam is a two bedroom bamboo villa built on three floors. The ground and top floors house the two master bedrooms. The bedrooms are fitted with a king size bed, an open wardrobe, air conditioning and an outdoor bathtub, from where our guests can enjoy the beautiful views. The bedrooms are comprehensive of a modernly equipped bathroom.The ground bedroom has direct access to the a beautiful Santorini style infinity pool, whereas the upper floor is equipped with a net.The living room is located in the middle floor and it includes sofas and a dining table overlooking the jungle and the famous volcano Mount Agung.Amenities in the living room include a projector with Netflix, Nespresso coffee machine and refrigerated minibar.Our front desk situated in the lobby provides a 24-hour service. Staff at the front desk can assist our guests with various services, such as renting bikes, arranging trips etc. The resort houses a restaurant that provides only in-room dining options. Breakfast, all-day dining and drinks can easily be ordered from the villa and will be brought to you by our staff. Both Balinese and International cuisine are offered. The bar serves a variety of soft drinks as well as tropical beverages throughout the day.PLEASE READ BEFORE BOOKING:We are deeply attracted by Bali's unique and beautiful natural environment. That is why we built Eco Six Bali in the middle of the rice field and the tropical forest--the characteristic landscape of Bali. We hope our guests can rest in nature and heal from its tranquillity and beauty.Long before the arrival of Eco Six Bali, this ecological environment already had its own inhabitants: insects, ants, mosquitos, spiders, geckos etc. We thrive with the highest cleaning and pest control standards and do our best to keep them out of hotel doors. However, some creatures will inevitably pay us a visit with an open door.Bamboo resorts are a special kind of living environment. We invite you to carefully consider this before booking with Eco Six Bali.PLEASE READ BELOW:Our villa can host a maximum of 4 adults and 2 kids (12yo or less).As the villa is only fitted with two double bed, we inform our guests that a request for an additional bed or bed linens will require extra charge.The included breakfast is intended for a maximum of 4 adults and 2 kids (selected from the kids menu). Any other request will require additional charge.ABOUT USSurrounded by Bali‚Äôs tropical landscapes, Eco Six Bali is a bamboo resort that combines modern as well as traditional architectural characteristics. Situated just a 20-minute scooter ride from the vibrant centre of Ubud, Eco Six Bali offers the opportunity to escape the city stress.The six bamboo villas that compose the hotel have specific features. Each villa is fitted with tropical blooms as well as uniquely designed pools from where our guests have a direct view of rice fields, tropical forests as well as of the famous mount Agung.Other things to noteHouse Rules:- Check-in at 3 pm- Check out before 12 pm- Noise will not be tolerated.- No smoking inside- Please lock up valuables in the safety deposit box.- Any form of misbehavior or noise is not tolerated.- Events, gatherings, parties or pets are not allowed.

title: Sanctuary Sunset Ocean View, 5minutes to Melasti
description: Welcome to Gania Sanctuary,Gania Sanctuary is a sanctuary made for inspiration, with stunning ocean views in the tranquil Ungasan village.This is a luxury villa with every essential facility: our dedicated concierge can arrange , driver, massage, motorbike rental, reservations, private yoga classes, laundry, babysitting, and more.Wake up to the sound of birds and admire the sunrise, just 5 minutes to Melasti Beach.The spaceThe SpaceGarnia Sanctuary is located in Ungasan Village, a Tranquil village living near Bali‚Äôs best beaches.Each of the four bedrooms has air conditioning, a king-size bed, and its own en-suite bathroom. The  Living area also offers a private kitchen, Dining area, Sofa .Our dedicated concierge can arrange nearly everything: , driver, massage, motorbike rental, restaurant reservations, tours, private yoga, laundry, babysitting, and more.Guest accessThe main living area connects to the pool terrace and is cooled with fans, maintaining an open-air design. Remember, you‚Äôre in Bali where nature thrives ‚Äî you may encounter friendly insects during your stay. If you need assistance, our staff will be happy to help.Other things to noteOther Things to Note‚Ä¢	Bali is very welcoming and deeply values its traditions. Daily offerings are a way for Balinese Hindus to give back to the gods. These small offerings often contain incense, flowers, and gifts. Please try not to step on them, as they are sacred.‚Ä¢	The main living area connects to the pool terrace and is cooled with fans, maintaining an open-air design. Remember, you‚Äôre in Bali where nature thrives ‚Äî you may encounter friendly insects during your stay. If you need assistance, our staff will be happy to help.

title: Grand Cliff Ungasan
description: Ibiza-inspired resort villa overlooking the seaThe spaceEnjoy the style of an Ibiza-inspired villa in a spectacular setting on Bali at the Grand Cliff Ungasan. As its name suggests, this gorgeous oceanfront vacation rental is perched at the edge of the Bukit Peninsula, offering spellbinding views of the Indian Ocean. It‚Äôs also part of an exclusive community with luxury amenities, and has a full staff on hand to pamper guests.Your holiday at the Residence includes the services of a villa manager, chef, butler and housekeeper.Guests are also welcome to the shared beach club and kids‚Äô club on-site resort. If you‚Äôd prefer to relax or entertain in private, the villa has its own outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, hot tub, plenty of loungers, barbecue and al-fresco dining for twelve, plus a home theater, pool table and Wi-Fi indoors.An open-plan layout and wall-to-wall glass give the villa‚Äôs central great room a sleek, contemporary feel‚Äîand bring the ocean views into the living and dining areas. Clean-lined sofas and dining chairs are set off by oversized sculpture, lanterns and carved accents in a blend of European chic and Balinese inspiration. The look extends to the European-style, fully equipped kitchen.The five bedrooms at Grand Cliff Ungasan can accommodate up to 10 adutls plus 2 kids. There are two honeymoon-suite-worthy primary bedrooms with king beds, balconies and ocean views,¬†two¬†bedrooms with a queen bed and ocean views, and one bedroom with twin beds.A stay at the Residence puts you in the heart of Badung, known for both its natural scenery and its lively nightlife. Take the cable car to the Karma Beach Club for a day on a stretch of white sand, or explore beyond the resort and drive to the popular beaches of Padang Padang or Jimbaran. Spend the morning at the nearby golf course, then head to Uluwatu Temple for incredible sunset views.Copyright ¬© Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.BEDROOM & BATHROOM‚Ä¢ Bedroom 1 - Primary:¬†King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower & bathtub, Dual Vanity, Walk-in closet, Television, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Safe, Balcony, Ocean view‚Ä¢ Bedroom 2- Primary:¬†King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower & bathtub, Dual Vanity, Walk-in closet, Television, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Safe, Balcony, Ocean view‚Ä¢ Bedroom 3:¬†Queen¬†size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower, Television, Air conditioning, Safe, Balcony, Ocean view, Adjoins one of the Primary Bedrooms¬†‚Ä¢ Bedroom 4:¬†Queen size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower,¬†Air conditioning, Safe, Access to outdoor hot tub area, Ocean view, adjacent to cinema room‚Ä¢ Bedroom 5: 2 Twin¬†size beds, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower & bathtub, Dual Vanity, Television, Air conditioning,¬†Safe, Access to outdoor areaFEATURES & AMENITIES‚Ä¢ Home theater‚Ä¢ More under ‚ÄúWhat this place offers‚Äù belowACCESS TO RESORT AMENITIES‚Ä¢ The Three Monkeys Kids Club‚Ä¢ Fully-equipped gymnasium‚Ä¢ DiMare Gourmet restaurant (additional cost)‚Ä¢ On-site spa (Additional cost)STAFF & SERVICESExtra cost (advance notice may be required):‚Ä¢ Groceries and beverages - subject to an additional 20%+tax service fee‚Ä¢ Babysitting services‚Ä¢ Activities and excursions‚Ä¢ Driving service‚Ä¢ More under ‚ÄúAdd-on services‚Äù below

title: Villa Lembah Giri Forest 3BR: Pool escape in Ubud
description: Villa Lembah Giri Forest offers a tranquil escape surrounded by lush greenery and breathtaking nature views.This 3-bedroom villa is perfectly located nearby Mas and perfect for small families. The villa contains perfectly full amenities and allows the sight of a serene Buddha statue to create an atmosphere of calm and relaxation.The spaceEach bedroom of Villa Lembah Giri Forest comes with a queen-size bed, a Smart TV, air conditioning, and an en-suite bathroom, with one bathroom having it's own outdoor bathtub.A Fully equipped kitchen and semi-open living room, where comfortable sofas invite you to unwind while enjoying the fresh air with unforgettable views directly in front of your very own living room.The private pool at Villa Lembah Giri Forest is the highlight of the outdoor area, surrounded by sunbeds, daybeds, and umbrellas for ultimate relaxation. Whether you‚Äôre lounging by the pool or enjoying the sunken seating area, the villa‚Äôs outdoor spaces are designed to help you connect with nature.Villa Lembah Giri Forest also features a dedicated workspace, making it ideal for those who need to stay connected. The neighboring villas ensure privacy while still offering a sense of community.Escape to Villa Lembah Giri Forest, where the harmony of nature and thoughtful design create an unforgettable experience. Book your stay today and discover the perfect retreat in Ubud.Other things to noteOur villa is designed to immerse you in the beauty of nature while embracing sustainable living. This extraordinary abode eschews traditional air conditioning in the living room, instead inviting the warm tropical breeze to serenade its inhabitants.(Please note that your Netflix and YouTube accounts will be used to log in. Ensure you log out before checking out to protect your account from unauthorized use.)STAFF AND SERVICES INCLUDED- Dedicated Villa Manager- Villa Host (Ubud) or Staff (Seminyak/Bukit)- Daily Housekeeping- Garden and Pool StaffEXTRA COSTS (advance notice may be required):- Villa pre-stocking: Groceries and beverages (subject to an additional service fee).- Breakfast by Villa Host (Ubud ONLY): IDR 120.000 per person per meal as a cover charge (minimum 4 guests).- Floating breakfast: IDR 150.000 per tray (for up to 4 guests).- In-villa Chef: Arranged through our trusted partner (see FAQs for details).- Airport transfers: Convenient pick-up and drop-off services.- Driving service: Reliable and professional drivers available on request.- Activities and excursions: Customized experiences to explore Bali.- In-villa massage services: Relax and rejuvenate in your villa's comfort.- Baby-sitting service: Experienced caretakers for your little ones.- Security guards: Additional safety and peace of mind.- Flowers arrangements: Custom designs to enhance your stay.Guest accessRoad Access: Many villas have narrow road access, often suitable for motorcycles only. We can assist with transportation arrangements if needed.Other things to noteNatural Ventilation: Experience the refreshing breeze of Bali with our open-air living spaces, designed to maximize natural airflow, providing an eco-friendly alternative to air conditioning or fans.Vendor Services: To ensure the villa's equipment and your safety, our dedicated team manages all vendor services within the villa, including spa, personal training, decorations, private chefs, yoga, photography, and villa equipment. Using external vendors is strictly prohibited and will result in a fine of IDR 2.000.000.Waste Management: Contribute to Bali's sustainable efforts by participating in our waste separation program. We provide three bins for organic, inorganic, and residual waste in your villa.Sustainable Amenities: We provide Sensatia Botanicals, a locally founded skincare brand, as bathroom amenities (hand soap, body soap, shampoo, and conditioner). Made in Bali with 100% natural, cruelty-free ingredients, this partnership reflects our support for sustainability and local initiatives, including plastic recycling and beach cleanups.Natural Charm: Our villas embrace Bali's tropical beauty, where the sounds of nature‚Äîgeckos and insects‚Äîcreate a serene ambiance. The open design may occasionally welcome wildlife, despite regular pest control. Geckos, symbols of good luck in Balinese culture, and other creatures are vital to the ecosystem.  Cultural Respect: In Ubud and Bukit, monkeys may be present‚Äîplease refrain from feeding or interacting with them. Surrounding landscapes, like jungles, rice fields, and local farms (e.g., duck, chicken or pig), are not part of the villa property and may be accessed by residents, with changes beyond our control. We appreciate your respect for Bali‚Äôs natural and cultural heritage.FAQsQ: What time is the check-in policy?A: Our dedicated staff ensures a smooth check-in process. Check-in starts at 14:00 for 1-3 bedroom villas and at 15:00 for 4-6 bedroom villas. Luggage drop-off is welcome after 11:00 as we prepare your villa. Please note, a late check-in fee of IDR 200.000 applies for arrivals after 20:00 to cover staff overtime, as our staff does not stand by the villa all the time.Q: What time is the check-out policy?A: Our check-out time is at 11:00 by default. Late check-out is subject to availability and involves extra charge. Please note that for any late check-out between 11:00 ‚Äì 18:00, an additional charge of 50% of the Daily Villa Rate will apply. Any check-out after 18:00, will be charged at a full day's Daily Villa Rate. If you need to store your luggage after check-out time, you are welcome to do so.Q: Is breakfast included in the booking? How do we order the chef's service?A: Breakfast is not included in the room rate. However, you can easily arrange breakfast by contacting our reservation or concierge team. We offer a variety of menu options prepared by our dedicated private chef, right in your villa. The cost is IDR 160.000 per person, with a minimum order for 5 guests. You can indulge in a floating breakfast for an additional fee of IDR 150.000 per tray.For lunch and dinner, we offer enhanced services, including set menus, live BBQ cooking, ethnic cuisines, and even fine dining prepared by a Michelin-star chef, all cooked in the villa. Prices for lunch and dinner start at IDR 450.000 per person. Please note that terms and conditions apply for booking.Additionally, our villa features a fully equipped kitchen, allowing you the flexibility to prepare your own meals if you prefer. Whether you choose to dine in or savor a chef‚Äôs touch, our team is here to ensure a seamless and enjoyable experience.Q: Do we have a housekeeping service every day?A: Absolutely! Daily housekeeping is provided from 9:00 to 17:00. Linens are changed every third day for sustainability. To ensure privacy, please coordinate with your Villa Host or Staff for a convenient cleaning time. Your comfort is our priority.Q: Can we have extra clean towels?A: Certainly! We are happy to provide extra towels, subject to availability. Please feel free to reach out to your Villa Host or Staff, and we‚Äôll do our best to accommodate your request promptly.Q: What is the maximum occupancy for this 3-bedroom villa? Can I have extra beds?A: This villa comfortably accommodates up to 6 guests. However, it can host a maximum of 8 guests, with the 7th and 8th guests considered as extra. An additional fee of IDR 365.000/night/person, applies. Should you require extra beds, please feel free to let us know, and we‚Äôll be happy to assist in making arrangements for your group‚Äôs comfort.

This means that for breakfast, lunch or dinner you will have to split per villa*POOL AREAS:‚Ä¢ Three 8M * 3M private pool and grass area (1 per villa)‚Ä¢ The pool areas also include sun loungers and shaded chilling spaces with comfy sofas and coffee tables‚Ä¢ BBQs by the pools are also available for guests to use‚Ä¢ Guest toilets (1 per villa)BEDROOM SUITES:‚Ä¢ There are 12 bedrooms in total (4 per villa) with en-suite luxury bathrooms. 10 bedrooms are double, while 2 come with twin beds.‚Ä¢ In total there are 6 bedrooms with super king size beds, 4 bedrooms with queen size beds and 2 twin bedrooms (2 single beds). ‚Ä¢ The first villa has one super king size (200*200cm) bedroom, two queen size (160*200cm) bedrooms and one twin bedroom. The second villa has three super king size (200*200cm) bedrooms and one twin bedroom. The third villa has one super king size (200*200cm) bedroom, two queen size (160*200cm) bedrooms and one king size (180*200cm) bedroom. ‚Ä¢ The master bedroom suite in one of the villas has smart flat screen TV with Netflix (in addition to the smart TV at the open living space). ‚Ä¢ Some king size bedrooms have canopy beds with mosquito nets.‚Ä¢ All bedroom suites include AC, ceiling fan, built in wardrobes and office space, while some have private lounge spaces and balconies‚Ä¢ All 12 bathrooms (4 per villa) have shower and hot water and some also come with 2 sinks each and bathtubs.‚Ä¢ We have taken care of each and every detail to guarantee a great night‚Äôs sleep. Each bedroom features 100% goose down feather pillows, Egyptian cotton linens and mattresses with comfortable pillow tops‚Ä¢ In each villa, there is one king size bedroom overlooking the pool, while the other three bedrooms are located on the 2nd floor of the villasEXTRA SERVICES THAT COME AT EXTRA COST:‚Ä¢ Airport pick up/drop off‚Ä¢ Day trips‚Ä¢ Activities: ATV, rafting, watersports, surf lessons‚Ä¢ Breakfast - we have a partnership with a caf√© next door from where breakfast can be ordered‚Ä¢ Bbq, lunch, dinner‚Ä¢ Family friendly services (pool fence, baby sitting services)‚Ä¢ In-home massages‚Ä¢ Dry cleaning & laundry service‚Ä¢ Motorbike rental‚Ä¢ Grocery itemsGuest access3 PRIVATE 4BD VILLAS TOTAL 12BEDROOMS

title: Private Luxury 5BR Villa Morada in Canggu
description: Greetings from Nakula. We are the official management of Villa Morada by Nakula. As a well-established company in the hospitality industry, we bring years of experience in managing and curating some of the finest villas in Bali. Our goal is to ensure every guest enjoys an exceptional and memorable stay across all our Nakula properties.The spaceNestled amidst the serene and picturesque landscapes of Canggu, Villa Morada represents the epitome of modern luxury and refined sophistication. With its flawless design and convenient proximity to an array of shopping and dining options, this exquisite villa promises an unparalleled getaway for discerning guests. Immerse yourself in the seamless fusion of contemporary elegance and natural allure, where every element is meticulously curated to create a haven of tranquility and opulence, ensuring an unforgettable retreat.Experience complete luxury at Villa Morada with exceptional facilities for your comfort. Enjoy movie nights in the dedicated cinema room with a large corner sofa or use the versatile gym room as a private workspace. The spacious kitchen, with two marble-top islands and modern appliances including a microwave and oven, is perfect for cooking and baking. The adjacent dining area seats ten guests, offering an elegant setting for meals. Unwind in the expansive living room with high ceilings, bohemian-modern decor, and a cozy reading corner under the staircase. The outdoor area features two separate pools with sofa sunbeds and comfortable seating, perfect for relaxation. Additionally, the outdoor pool bar with sofas and a bar area invites you to savor cocktails in your private oasis. Villa Morada seamlessly blends contemporary elegance with natural allure, creating a luxurious and unforgettable retreat.First Bedroom (First Floor)Overlooking the garden and pool, the first bedroom offers twin beds, built-in closet space, and a spacious ensuite bathroom with a bathtub and shower. Large windows ensure natural sunlight while maintaining privacy.Second Bedroom (First Floor)Similarly styled, the second bedroom provides twin beds, built-in closet space, and an ensuite bathroom with luxurious amenities, ideal for relaxation amidst the villa's tranquil surroundings.Third Bedroom (Master Bedroom - Second Floor)The master bedroom on the second floor boasts direct access to a private pool and a generous living space with two built-in sofa beds. Its ensuite bathroom features black marble floors, a bathtub, and a shower, offering a luxurious retreat within Villa Morada.Fourth Bedroom (Second Floor)Featuring a spacious layout with a work desk and built-in closet space, Bedroom 4 overlooks the villa grounds through large windows. Its ensuite bathroom, adorned with white marble floors, includes a bathtub and shower for added comfort.Fifth Bedroom (Second Floor)Enjoying a large balcony with sofas and sunbeds, Bedroom 5 offers built-in closet space and a work desk. The ensuite bathroom features gray marble floors, providing a serene space to unwind amidst Villa Morada's scenic surroundings.Guest accessYour stay at our villa will be made seamless and enjoyable with the support of a dedicated Villa Manager, who will be your main point of contact throughout your stay.Your stay includes the following benefits:- Welcome canap√©s and refreshments upon arrival- Daily breakfast- Daily housekeeping- Complimentary Wi-Fi (Internet access)Other things to noteCheck-In : Our dedicated staff ensures a smooth and personalized check-in experience. Check-in is available from 14:00 to 21:00. Late check-in is subject to availability and must be arranged in advance. Kindly note that our staff does not remain on standby at the villa at all times.
