title: PROMO! Canggu Beachfront Luxury Villa,4BR, w/ Chef
description: Experience the epitome of luxury living at this Canggu beachfront luxury villa, nestled within the picturesque seaside village of Pererenan. Set upon 1.2 hectares of pristine beachside gardens. 4-bedroom Villa Arika is prime real estate and the perfect private villa retreat.The spaceEmbracing a traditional architectural style, Villa Arika boasts a harmonious blend of polished wood and marble throughout this sprawling estate.  The main house features a modern kitchen, dining room, open living, tv and media room with two bedroom suites; the master with its ensuite bathroom taking up the whole first floor, and on the ground floor, the second bedroom suite next to the media room. Separately, also with views out to sea, are two other sleeping pavilions. With its expansive lawns and meticulously landscaped gardens, Villa Arika provides an idyllic setting for weddings and events, especially when facing Bali‚Äôs stunning sunsets.As you step into this exquisite Canggu beachfront luxury villa, you are greeted by lush entrance gardens adorned with Balinese statuettes lining the pathway. Upon entering the living room, the views across the lawns, gardens and out to sea, are magnificent.  Living, Dining & KitchenAdjacent to the living room, you‚Äôll find an enclosed window-surrounded dining room, offering picturesque views of the gardens and pool. Steps lead from here to the kitchen situated in the rear. The expansive covered living area features an array of plush sofas and chairs, complemented by a lush antique wooden daybed occupying one corner, while a table and chairs grace another, ensuring ample seating for all guests to gather and remain entertained in style.BedroomsThe master suite is located on the first floor with a balcony stretching the length of the building for both bedroom and the master bathroom. Down below is the second bedroom with its ensuite bathroom, while two more individual sleeping pavilions are nearby.Each of the four bedrooms have four-poster beds, writing desk and chair, ample cupboards for storing clothes and luggage with a balcony or terrace with outdoor seating, ensuite bathrooms with double washbasins, bath and shower, to compete the luxury accommodations picture. Media roomA large smart TV sits facing expansive sofas in the media room, which rests to one side of the living room, near the ground floor main house bedroom.Pool and gardensLawns ang mature gardens surround the property, with the main focus being the private pool with traditional bale covered daybed, and sun loungers facing out to sea. StaffThe villa has an amazing villa manager to oversea all the operations of the villa, assisted by butlers, housekeeping, private chef, gardeners, pool attendants and security. Treat our villa manager as a concierge too, as he has fantastic experience look after guests needs, arranging tours, car and drivers, translations, nothing is too much to ask.Guest accessVilla Arika has free Wi-Fi throughout the property, staff waiting on guests every demand. Welcome drinks, cold towels, fruit basket with seasonal produce await guests at check-in. Guests have exclusive access to the whole property and listed facilities.Capacity: 4 bedrooms mean 8 guests + two extra beds for kids (an additional price).Facilities include BBQ, safes, pool, and private car parking.Property area: 1.2 hectares.Other things to noteThe villa is managed by Pax Animi which is the villa management division of Lifestyle Retreats. Staff are on hand to assist you with every conceivable aspect for an enjoyable holiday.

In case you misplace something in the villa, please let us know so we can look out for the item during the changeover and cleaning service.- Not Suitable for Pets. - Smoking is Not Allowed in Bedrooms (only outdoor areas). - Please turn off the A/C units when you leave for the day.- No Loud Music or Parties Allowed.For the safety of our in-house guests, security cameras are available in the parking area of the building villa.If you need to arrange an airport drop off please notify us at least 1 day before departure.Be cool and enjoy your stay.

title: Seminyak 6BR Heritage Villa with Private Pool

title: Villa Tomma
description: This luxurious villa in Ubud offers an unparalleled escape into the heart of Bali‚Äôs natural beauty. Surrounded by lush jungle and overlooking a serene river, this exclusive retreat combines the highest standards of comfort with complete privacy. Just a short 15-minute drive from Ubud‚Äôs vibrant center, you‚Äôll find yourself secluded in nature while still being close to the area‚Äôs cultural and culinary highlights.The spaceThe villa boasts four spacious bedrooms, each designed with exquisite attention to detail and accompanied by en-suite bathrooms, offering ample space and comfort for families or groups. With a total of six bathrooms, including guest facilities, there‚Äôs plenty of convenience for everyone.For culinary delights, you‚Äôll have two kitchens at your disposal: a closed kitchen for formal dining and an open kitchen, perfect for casual meals while enjoying the warm breeze. The highlight of the villa is the breathtaking infinity pool, seamlessly blending with the jungle view, where you can unwind or enjoy a refreshing swim surrounded by nature.For ultimate relaxation and wellness, the villa includes a sauna and a dedicated fitness corner. Staff quarters, a security room, and a laundry area ensure all your needs are taken care of with the utmost discretion. This villa promises not just a stay but an unforgettable experience where luxury meets the tranquility of Bali‚Äôs jungles.

title: 8Bd Villa: 180¬∞ View 16m Pool Yoga Gym TV Room Spa
description: 15% Off for November - December bookings!You will love:‚Ä¢ The 180-degree view‚Ä¢ The 16m pool‚Ä¢ The huge land size of 6.070m2‚Ä¢ The villa‚Äôs facilities: home cinema room, spa, gym, and outdoor yoga space‚Ä¢ The master bedroom with its plunge pool & bathtub overlooking Jimbaran beach‚Ä¢ The friendly 24/7 staff & the multiple activities‚Ä¢ The fact that each bedroom is themed after a different place in Indonesia*Weddings can also be held at the villa at extra cost*The spacePROMOS:15% off for November - December bookings!20% off for monthly bookings!This is an 8-bedroom villa with an amazing 180-degree view of Jimbaran bay. The villa is spread over 6.070m2 of land, which gives access to lavish gardens. There also various water elements throughout the villa including ponds and waterfalls. The villa itself is built on 1.230 m2 of land and features an elevator.Price includes:‚Ä¢	Accommodation for 16 people is included in the price. We can place an extra 4 beds in 4 rooms at extra cost. Price per night per extra bed is 40 USD and price per night per child bed is 30 USD. ‚Ä¢	Welcome drinks, snacks and fruits on arrival‚Ä¢	Free breakfast‚Ä¢	Nightly "cultural bedtime stories and pillow box"‚Ä¢	3 cars for pick up and drop off from/to airport‚Ä¢	Daily cleaning‚Ä¢	13 people staff available from 7am to 11pm ‚Ä¢	24 hours security‚Ä¢	Water dispenser‚Ä¢	Wifi‚Ä¢	Free pop up play for kids‚Ä¢	Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are NOT included in the price but can be arranged at extra cost, as we have an in-house chef. The grocery system includes a 20% service charge.Indonesian elements throughout the villa:Apart form its large size and the many facilities it offers ‚Äì yoga space, SPA, home cinema room ‚Äì what makes this villa stand out is the distinct Indonesian decoration. The owner has personally selected art pieces, sculptures and other ornaments from different places of Indonesia during his travels. Take a careful look at each room and each space of the villa, and you will get to know the distinct and colorful culture of Indonesia.Eco-friendly practices:The Long House follows eco-friendly practices, including solar panels, glass pitchers in each room, waste recycling, and the reduction of plastic bags. For detailed info please refer to the photo section (eco-friendly practices).Location:The villa is located in Jimbaran and gets the best of both worlds: namely, Jimbaran and Nusa Dua. 10 minutes from the villa, you will find Melasti and Pandawa white sand beaches. Jimbaran Beach, with its famous beach restaurants, is also in close proximity, and so is GWK Cultural Park, featuring the second tallest statue in the world. For more information about the location, refer to the neighborhood section of this listing. The fancy details that cannot be left out:Outdoor yoga shala:Just as you walk outside through the grass area, you will find an outdoor yoga shala perched atop the Jimbaran Hill, perfect for a sunrise or sunset yoga class. The space fits comfortably 10-12 people and has a jaw dropping view. We also provide 2 yoga mats per room, so in total, 12 yoga mats.Home cinema room:The home cinema room has an ultra-large corner sofa and a flat-screen smart TV. It is the perfect space to watch your favourite movie and relax in the airconditioned space when outside it too hot especially during noon time.Spa:Alternatively, you can also book a massage at the Spa. There is a range of treatments here from Acupressure to Four Hand Massage to Hair Treatment and Mani Pedi.The Spa features 2 massage beds, an outdoor bathtub, a guest toilet and the ‚Äòextension spa‚Äô as we call it that has private lounge space and yet another massage bed for reflexology.Gym:For the athletic ones, do not forget to visit the gym, which has a treadmill, bicycle, and freestanding weights.Chess table & library:And in case you run out of activities, there is always a chess table and a library to keep you occupied.Pool area:Once you take the elevator and reach the upper floor, you cannot help but gaze at this jaw-dropping view. This is where you will find the 16*5 m infinity pool.Dining areas, bar, living rooms and kitchen:One thing is sure: you will not run out of space to chill and mingle at the villa. In total, there are three different areas where one can sit and stare at the view while enjoying a glass of cold Chardonnay and some tasty Indonesian or Western food.Next to the pool, there is a bar‚Äîperfect for one too many cocktails‚Äîand two living room areas. Yes, both have the 180-degree view of Jimbaran we have been talking about. The bar is fully equipped with a mini fridge, sink, glasses, and three stools.In an enclosed airconditioned space, you can enjoy a tasty meal at the 12pax dining area with glass doors overlooking the pool. Next door you will find the fully equipped kitchen (with coffee machine, oven, 2 fridges, toaster, rice cooker, stove, water dispenser even washing machine ‚Äì not that common in Bali ‚Äì and the list goes on). The villa offers a chef at extra cost, as well as cooking classes. Feel free to experiment with Indonesian cuisine either on your own or with the help of the professionals. At the other end of the villa lies yet another lounge space with two corner sofas and a 6pax dining table. There is also a guest toilet.The huge garden and grass area:The villa is surrounded by a huge garden and grass area perfect for relaxing and enjoying the sunset. There is also a shaded sitting space.The bedrooms:There are 8 bedrooms in total: three with king-size beds, two with queen-size beds, and three with twin beds each. The master bedroom is a masterpiece of its own and consists of two rooms. Hurry up to pick this gem once you arrive at the villa. It has a private office space and lounge area, but that‚Äôs not all. As you walk to your private bedroom, you will face yet another office space and a comfy sofa overlooking the Jimbaran area. Did we mention there is a plunge pool and a bathtub with the best view in house? Each bedroom is named and themed after an area of Indonesia: Bali, Sumba, West Java, East Java, Lombok, and Sumatra and so on. For more information about Indonesia's wonderful culture, you can look at the guest book at the office desk of each room, which has information on the different ornaments and materials and how they are linked to each part of Indonesia.Needless to say that every bedroom has office space, private lounge area, safety deposit box, hair dryer, AC, en-suite bathroom and private balcony. Most bedrooms also feature day beds and walk in closets ‚Äì while all bedrooms have closet space. Most en-suite bathrooms have 2 sinks and freestanding bathtubs (in addition to the shower).Interesting details:The en-suite bathroom of the Sumba bedroom has Onyx decorated mirrors and Onyx sinks.Guest accessPrivate 8bed villaOther things to noteActivities:The staff is here to arrange a wide variety of activities ranging from Balinese cooking classes, to Canang offering workshops to Yoga and Meditation classes. Some other interesting activities include the Water Purification Ceremony not at the touristic Tirta Empul temple but at the very home of the Balian (elderly) just down the village.

title: Best 2 bdr Villa in Luxury Villa Complex Seminyak
description: The two bedroom deluxe villa situates in simply the best area of Seminyak, but perfectly hidden in a serene and quiet villa neighbourhood, featuring:1. private posh pool bar with a swinging love seat2. sunken seating area in a tropical setting 3. lavish garden by pool 4. a terrace at second floor- enough space chill and soak up the Bali sunshine!Enjoy your romantic private times close to a fine selection of world-class cafes, restaurants and beach clubs.The spaceThe space* pool bar with swing* full kitchen (indoor) * lounge area over seeing the pool* 4 sun loungers* High speed internetBedroom 1 (ground floor):*Semi outdoor shower surrounded by lavish garden *king size bed, AC, wardrobeBedroom upstairs (first floor)* Indoor shower with indoor bathtub* king size bed, AC, wardrobe* ceiling fan* Terrace lounge area attached.

title: Soulful Surf Villa in Uluwatu
description: Set in the quiet hills of Uluwatu, this villa is a peaceful spot made for surfers, design lovers, and anyone who wants to slow down. Built with reclaimed teak and raw stone, it opens to the breeze and the sound of cowbells in the distance. There are three private bedrooms, a kitchen made for sharing, a pool that slips into the living space, and rooftop sunsets. It‚Äôs soulful, grounded in nature, and unlike anything else in Uluwatu.The spaceThis villa was designed to feel like a lived-in surf retreat‚Äîsomewhere to return to, not just stay.There are three private bedroom retreats, each with its own distinct character. Set apart from one another, all bedrooms are air-conditioned and open onto private outdoor terraces, offering quiet space to lounge, rest, or read in the shade. Each room has an ensuite bathroom‚Äîtwo open-air, one fully enclosed‚Äîall with their own sense of calm and connection to the outdoors.Whether you're traveling with friends, family, or a partner, you‚Äôll always have space to retreat and reset, never feeling crowded or on top of each other.At the heart of the villa is a striking open-plan living area, built into the shell of the old villa and beneath the soaring alang-alang roof of a 120-year-old Javanese Limasan. Here, the pool extends under the roofline, meeting a large, comfortable lounge where you can stay close to the water all day. A floating platform rests beside the couch, perfect for sunbathing, reading, or dipping your feet. There's a projector for movie nights, a fully equipped kitchen with a large island, and a generous dining table made for shared meals and long conversations.Music is part of the rhythm here‚Äîguitars (acoustic and electric) are available for guests to play, and a record player with a growing vinyl collection sets the mood for slow mornings or late afternoons. Whether you're sharing a quiet moment with a favorite album or strumming something of your own, there‚Äôs space to let sound become part of your stay.A rooftop deck offers a quiet spot to catch the breeze, with cozy seating and views of Uluwatu‚Äôs hills and the distant ocean‚Äîideal for sunset drinks or stargazing after dinner. And in the garden below, a stone firepit is tucked into the landscape, ready for cool evenings and fireside chats under the stars. And if you‚Äôre the curious type, you might find a hidden loft tucked into the rafters‚Äîa playful little room that adds a touch of surprise to the stay.Guest accessYou‚Äôll have full access to the entire villa, including all three private bedroom suites, the hidden loft, the open-plan living and dining areas, the rooftop deck, and the expansive garden with its tucked-away firepit.The property is entirely private‚Äîno shared spaces. Wander freely, lounge in the shade of the teak trees, or enjoy quiet corners throughout the home and garden. This is your space to settle in and slow down.Other things to noteThe villa is fully up and running, but still evolving‚Äîsome art, planting, and small touches are still being added. Early guests are part of this quiet unfolding, and we appreciate your presence during this final phase.The garden is large and still being developed, including work on a rainwater system to make the property more sustainable. It‚Äôs not disruptive, and we‚Äôve done our best to maintain full privacy.Staff are on-site each morning to quietly tidy up, and can help with things like preparing the roof deck for sunset or lighting the firepit.We use regular pest control, but this is a home open to nature‚Äîgeckos, frogs, and bugs may stop by.For everyone‚Äôs safety, smoking is not permitted inside the villa. Guests may smoke in the garden area or near the firepit, where ashtrays can be provided on request.Please take care, as the alang-alang thatched roof‚Äîwhile beautiful‚Äîis naturally flammable. We appreciate your understanding.Please note the pool is open to the living space, and the loft‚Äîthough fun‚Äîis accessed by ladder and has windows that must be locked if children are inside.

title: Lune Wed Venue +free stay 7 BR Villa w/cliff ocean
description: Indulge in the luxury of our 7 Bedrooms, where thoughtful design seamlessly integrates with ocean view. The area endorses an open concept, characterized by an abundance of glass windows that invite the vibrant tropical landscape indoors.Bella Lune Wedding detail: ‚Ä¢ Maximum capacity of participant are 70 pax‚Ä¢ Additional venue fee for any event‚Ä¢ Additional Banjar Fee (security)‚Ä¢ We permits you to bring outside catering‚Ä¢ Also we can arrange any wedding decorationThe spaceTERM and CONDITIONS of WEDDING :WEDDING VENUE‚óè All event bookings will be required to submit an Event Plan at least 7 days before the event date. LOCAL PERMIT FEE (BANJAR FEE)‚óè The Banjar fee (local permit fee) is an additional fee required by the local community or ‚ÄúBanjar" who will provide additional security and parking assistance on the day of the function. CURFEW‚óè Curfew 10 PM for any Music and Entertainment, while the gathering without any music can be up to 12.00 PM.DAMAGE/BREAKAGE:‚óè All events will be subject to a damage deposit or security deposit payable by the Client or Organizer and returned to the client or organizer by the latest 7 days after the event (pending approval from the villa manager). The unit has 9 beds.Other things to note- No Party allowed till late night.- No Drugs allowed.- No Pets allowed.- No Smoking.- Don't flush any tissue or woman's pad into toilet.- There will be deposit upon check-in time, we shall return the deposit on check-out time.- We will charge for any damages caused.- Please bring valid Identity Card or Passport upon check-in time.- We can arrange any transportation or any tour request

title: Villa Thirty - 7 Bedroom Villa in Seminyak
description: Located on a private residential street, Tiga Puluh invites you to take a break from daily routine in its safe and exotic cocoon. Walk on the villa‚Äôs Indonesian pound and enter the open-plan living room to enjoy a lively breakfast around the large dining room table, a dip in the refreshing pool, and a wonderful massage in the gladak, taste exotic fresh juices at the bar, enjoy the peacefulness, gather around on the spacious couches experience a dinner at home cooked by our personal Chef.

title: Cabin in Kintamani Volcano View - Sundara Cabin
description: BATUR CABINS is a four cabin boutique hotel in Kintamani with breathtaking views of the surrounding lava fields, majestic volcanoes, and the tranquil crater lake.Whether you're seeking to enhance your Bali itinerary with a unique experience, celebrate a special occasion, immerse yourself in the island's natural beauty, or simply escape the hustle and bustle for a few days, Batur Cabins is the perfect destination for you.The spaceSUNDARA CABINOur most spacious and secluded cabin experience. Step into an indoor living room adorned with a charming reading nook, offering the ideal retreat for quiet moments of relaxation. Enjoy breathtaking panoramic views directly from the comfort of your bed, immersing yourself in the beauty of the surrounding landscape. Step outside onto the panorama deck and into the outdoor bathtub, where you can unwind amidst the splendor of nature or enjoy your private garden, where you can read in the shade under your pergola during the day or relax with a glass of wine by your own fireplace while watching the sunset.Discover your own private little garden, providing extra space to retreat and disconnect.Combining coziness with a touch of modernity, this cabin offers the perfect blend of comfort and style, making it an ideal choice for an extended stay in our Volcanic Hideaway.Each one of our cozy and modern cabins is thoughtfully designed to offer a unique experience amidst the stunning landscape of Kintamani, boasting luxurious amenities and breathtaking views of the volcanoes.The aesthetics are inspired by the natural surroundings, including locally sourced wood, earthy tones, and black exteriors resembling the black lava fields of Mount Batur. Our cabins provide a comfortable and inviting hideaway that harmoniously blends with its mesmerizing surroundings. Pool:Please note that the swimming pool is part of the common area and accessible for all our guests regardless which cabin they booked.Location:Welcome to the other side of Bali.Nestled in Kintamani, a mountainous volcanic region in northern Bali, our location features dense forests and a cooler climate, particularly refreshing at night and quite contrary to what is expected from a tropical island and is the perfect destination to complete your Bali trip. Batur Cabins sits at an elevation of 1,500 meters, offering unparalleled views of the surrounding lava fields, majestic volcanoes, and the tranquil crater lake. Kindly be advised to pack warmer clothing for your stay with us, as Kintamani experiences a cooler climate compared to the rest of tropical Bali. While warm and sunny during the day, temperatures quickly drop after sunset. Although we provide cozy blankets and a fireplace, we recommend bringing warmer clothing for ultimate comfort during the cooler evenings. The temperatures are varying from 26¬∞C during the day to 16-17¬∞C at night time.Access:Although Batur Cabins is only a few minutes from the main road with several coffee shops, restaurants and convenience stores, it is situated on the hillside just below the village. Its tranquil setting amidst nature also means that access may not be immediately obvious.You can reach the Batur Cabins property via a small street near the temple, requiring a short but steep 150-meter walk downhill. Our team will meet you at our designated meeting point just minutes away from your cabin and escort you to the property. We will take care of your luggage, leaving you free to enjoy the authentic village experience and the spectacular views on the way. We recommend to wear proper shoes for your comfort. Drone:Kindly note that drone usage is NOT permitted throughout our property. Batur Cabins is designed as a peaceful retreat, allowing guests to disconnect and fully immerse in nature. Therefore our guests privacy and comfort is our utmost priority.NO CHILDRENChildren under 12 are not permitted to stay at Batur Cabins. Our cabins are meticulously designed to offer guests an unforgettable experience. Located on the slope of a mountain, the cabins are elevated on columns to provide the best possible views. As a result, most of our cabins and facilities are several meters above the ground, making them unsuitable for young children.Children aged 12 and above are welcome to stay with us when accompanied by an adult. In specific cases please fell free to contact us.Guest accessAccess to Batur Cabins:We‚Äôre proud of the tranquil hideaway we‚Äôve created at Batur Cabins ‚Äî tucked into a peaceful hillside, surrounded by nature, and offering unobstructed views of Mount Batur and the stunning volcanic scenery of Kintamani. Though just a short walk from the main road with caf√©s, restaurants, and shops, it feels like a world away ‚Äî the perfect place to disconnect, recharge, and fully relax.Access to the cabins involves a short but steep 150-meter walk downhill via a small street near the village temple. This walk is part of what makes the setting so special ‚Äî and we believe it‚Äôs absolutely worth it.To make your arrival smooth and comfortable:‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Our team will meet you at our designated meeting point, just minutes from your cabin‚Ä®‚Ä¢ We‚Äôll escort you to the property and handle your luggage‚Ä®‚Ä¢ You can soak in the view and settle into the calm atmosphere of this beautiful and authentic part of Bali from the very beginningWe recommend wearing comfortable shoes and arriving during daylight hours, if possible, for a smooth arrival experience.Late Arrival Information: Our service hours are until 9:00 PM, and we kindly ask for your understanding that our team is only available to personally meet guests and assist with luggage during these hours.We recommend arriving during daylight hours whenever possible to ensure the best arrival experience.If you're unable to arrive before 9:00 PM, don‚Äôt worry ‚Äî we‚Äôll still make sure you have what you need:‚Ä®‚Ä¢ You‚Äôll receive the exact location coordinates‚Ä®‚Ä¢ We‚Äôll send you a self-check-in guide with all the details for your stay‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Our team will personally check in with you the following morningAs a small business, we truly appreciate your understanding and flexibility.If you have any questions or concerns about your arrival time, feel free to reach out. We would be happy to arrange a local driver for you who knows the exact location of our property, ensuring a smooth and hassle-free arrival outside our service hours.Other things to noteAlthough Batur Cabins is only a few minutes from the center of Batur, it is situated on the hillside just below the village. Its tranquil setting amidst nature also means that access may not be immediately obvious.You can reach the Batur Cabins property via a small street near the temple, requiring a short 150-meter walk downhill. To ensure your safety and prevent any confusion, our team will meet you at our designated meeting point just minutes away from your cabin and escort you to the property.We will take care of your luggage, leaving you free to enjoy the authentic village experience and the spectacular views on the way.

title: Bamboo Villa - Corazon Bali - Banana Tree House
description: Escape to nature in this luxurious bamboo villa, perched on a cliffside in the heart of Sidemen, Bali. Wake up to sweeping views of lush rice terraces, Mount Agung, and a breathtaking mountain range ‚Äî all just a short walk from local cafes and amenities.Unwind in your private infinity pool, or gaze at the stars through the villa‚Äôs skylight roof. Filled with light and crafted from natural materials, this romantic retreat is perfect for couples seeking peace, beauty, and unforgettable sunrises.The spaceStep into a beautifully designed open-plan villa where nature and comfort blend in perfect harmony. Crafted from bamboo and smooth stone, this sustainable sanctuary reflects the curves of the landscape ‚Äî with flowing architecture that invites the outdoors in.At the heart of the space, a large round door opens to your private balcony, where a hammock awaits. Gaze out over emerald rice fields, Mount Agung‚Äôs towering peak, and the lush Sidemen valley as birdsong fills the air.The bedroom combines privacy with an immersive natural experience. Its semi-open design features floor-to-ceiling glass walls that are fixed in place but not fully sealed to the bamboo ceiling, allowing fresh air to circulate freely. A skylight above remains unsealed with the roof, flooding the room with soft daylight and enhancing passive ventilation. At the center, a custom round bed draped in a romantic mosquito net invites restful sleep, while international power outlets, a fan, and wardrobe space provide added comfort and practicality.Unwind in your ensuite bathroom, featuring both an indoor and open-air rain shower, a deep stone soaking tub, and thoughtful touches like eco-friendly toiletries and soft towels.In the living area, sink into the plush sofa and enjoy uninterrupted views of the valley. A station with coffee capsules and tea bags is provided for your morning ritual, along with a mini fridge stocked with cool essentials.Step outside to your private infinity pool, perched above the valley ‚Äî perfect for a sunrise float or an evening dip under the stars.Guest accessWhether you're here to reconnect with nature, celebrate love, or simply slow down, we‚Äôve created this space for you to feel peace, beauty, and inspiration in every detail.Other things to note1.     Nature‚Äôs Residents ‚Äì A True Jungle ExperienceNestled deep in nature, our open-air bamboo villa offers an immersive experience in Sidemen‚Äôs vibrant ecosystem. You may encounter friendly insects, frogs, lizards, or other jungle creatures during your stay ‚Äî these are part of the charm of living so close to nature. While we maintain the villa with great care, occasional visits from these residents are natural due to the open design. To help keep things comfortable, we provide natural incense sticks and recommend turning off unnecessary lights at night, which can reduce insect activity. Should you need any assistance, our team is always happy to help.2.     WeatherBali has a tropical climate, and sudden rain showers can happen at any time‚Äîespecially in Sidemen. We provide umbrellas for your convenience. Please take extra care when walking on wooden stairs or decking, as surfaces can become slippery when wet. We appreciate your understanding and wish you a comfortable stay, rain or shine.3.	Water, Electricity & Wi-FiThe villa‚Äôs water supply comes from the local water company and is sourced from the Mount Agung aquifer. While the water is fresh and safe for showering and cleaning, we kindly ask that you drink only the filtered or bottled water provided. Refills are available upon request ‚Äî just let our team know. Electricity and Wi-Fi are generally stable, but as we‚Äôre located in a natural area, occasional fluctuations may occur. We appreciate your understanding and will do our best to resolve any issues quickly. 3.	Hanging Net UsageOur bamboo villa features a beautiful hanging net ‚Äî a serene spot to relax, read, or take in the breathtaking views of the valley. While it‚Äôs designed to be safe and inviting, we kindly ask guests to use it with care and at their own risk. The net can support up to one person. Please avoid standing, jumping, or placing excessive weight on it. When crossing, maintain three points of contact for balance and refrain from sitting on the edges. For your safety, jumping into the pool from the net is strictly prohibited. If you have any questions or need assistance, our team is always happy to help.4.	Local Laws and noise policyOur retreat is nestled in the peaceful village of Tebola, where the sounds of nature and the rhythm of local life set the tone. To honor this serenity and respect our neighbours, we kindly ask guests to observe quiet hours after 10 PM. Please also be mindful of local customs and community expectations during your stay. We truly appreciate your cooperation in helping us preserve the tranquil spirit of this beautiful place.5.	Security and SafetyYour comfort and peace of mind are our priority. The bedroom locks from both inside and outside for added security. Sidemen is a safe and deeply welcoming community. Your local host, Kadek, is a respected member of the village, and here, everyone is either family or a friend ‚Äî creating an atmosphere of trust and genuine hospitality. While the surroundings are tranquil, we still encourage guests to take usual precautions, as they would anywhere.6. Transport ServicesYou‚Äôre welcome to use online platforms like Grab/Gojek to reach the villa. However, due to Sidemen‚Äôs remote location and local driver protections, ordering transport from the village can be more challenging. For a smoother experience, we‚Äôre happy to arrange a trusted private driver for you‚Äîavailable for both arrival and departure. We take no commission; 100% of the payment goes to the driver. Rates typically range between IDR 300K and 600K, depending on your pickup or drop-off location.7. Dining Options Available NearbyThere are plenty of great dining options within a 5‚Äì25 minute walk from the villa, offering both Indonesian and international cuisine. Whether you‚Äôre in the mood for a local warung or a scenic restaurant overlooking the valley, you‚Äôll find something to suit every taste. After booking, you‚Äôll also gain access to our personal recommendations, handpicked to enhance your stay.8. Street Dogs SafetySidemen, like many areas in Bali, has free-roaming street dogs. While most are harmless, we advise guests not to approach, pet, or feed them, as some may be unpredictable or territorial. For your safety, please keep a respectful distance and avoid interaction.9. Additional Flower and Breakfast services- Floating Breakfast: IDR 100K- Flower Bath: IDR 150K- Flower Bouquet: IDR 300K- Room Flower Decorations: IDR 500K- Pool Flower Decorations: IDR 2,000KAll services are to be paid in cash upon arrival. If you‚Äôd like to book any of these, just let us know in advance so we can prepare everything beautifully for your arrival.

title: Serviced House in the Jungle for Trail & Recharge
description: For those who welcome the day with curiosity.For trail seekers chasing rainforest paths and waterfalls hidden in the mist.For off-track explorers who trust their legs more than a guidebook.HIDE is Bali‚Äôs first trail house.A basecamp where the wild begins at your doorstep and recovery waits when you return.You come for the trails, the views, the quiet.You return to soul-filling meals, earned comfort, and a pool that forgives everything.Book your stay now and come explore the unknown.The spaceExploration is YoursAt HIDE, trails are part of the plan. We‚Äôve mapped jungle routes and hidden paths with those who walk the land. From quick loops to full-day treks, our team leads guided trail experiences starting right at the house gate.Time to RecoverBetween ventures into the wild, HIDE is built to restore. Stretch in the garden. Take slow laps in the pool. Get a massage that actually resets you. Or opt for yoga on the deck. Everything is made to help you go again tomorrow.Trail FuelFuel matters. Our cook prepares hearty, soul-filling meals daily using local ingredients. Some nights call for a BBQ with sunset views. Whatever your pace, the kitchen keeps up.The House KeeperAlways clean. Always ready. After the mud and the miles, return to fresh linens, tidy spaces, and everything in place. Comfort isn‚Äôt the opposite of adventure, it‚Äôs what powers the next one.The FixerNeed transport, laundry, or anything else handled? We‚Äôll take care of it. Leave it to us. You've got better things to chase.Other things to noteWe‚Äôre currently adding two cabins below the house in the jungle so we can welcome larger groups in the future. The work is light, carried out by a small team and does not interfere with your stay at the villa level. Activity is limited to daytime hours, and we do our best to minimize any impact. To reflect this, our current rates are offered at a discounted price.

title: Brand new 14bed villa complex with four pools
description: This extensive Mediterranean style villa complex with 4 villas is perfect for a fun, relaxing holiday for group of family&friends YOU WILL LOVE‚Ä¢	The four large pools! THE LIVING/DINING/KITCHEN SPACES‚Ä¢	Take your pick: across the four villas there are numerous places to socialize, from light-filled open place living areas, to cosy nooks, to relaxing terraces. ‚Ä¢	All villas feature a generous open plan living/dining/kitchen space with AC. In the larger villas, this space opens onto the pool area. ‚Ä¢	In the 5bed villa and the two 4bed villas, there is a large living area with comfortable sofas gathered around a coffee table and TV. In the 1bed villa, there is a sofa and coffee table in the open plan space, while the TV is located in the bedroom.‚Ä¢	All villas have a dining table, with space for 28 pax in total ‚Äì 10 pax in the 5bed villa, 8 pax in the two 4bed villas, and 2pax in the 1bed villa. There is a water station in all villas.‚Ä¢	All villas also have fully equipped kitchens, allowing you to cook up a storm ‚Äì or let your private chef take the reins.‚Ä¢	In the larger villas, there are also spots to socialize upstairs. In the 4bed villas, the stairs lead to an indoor social space with chairs and coffee tables, and an office area with a desk and chair. In the 5bed villa, there is extensive seating on the terrace areas, with swing chairs, bean bags, and chairs with coffee tables. There are also two massage chairs here. BEDROOMS‚Ä¢	All in all, these villas offer a total of 14 bedrooms across 4 villas. Whichever you pick, you get a king-sized bed and AC, and a private bathroom.‚Ä¢	In the 5bed villa, there are three bedrooms downstairs, and two upstairs. The three downstairs bedrooms all open out onto the pool area. All have closet space, a security box, and a private bathroom with bath tub, shower, toilet and sink area.‚Ä¢	The fourth bedroom is upstairs, and opens onto a wing of the terrace with a swing seat. It too has closet space, security box, and a private bathroom with bath tub, shower, toilet and sink area.‚Ä¢	The fifth bedroom also opens on to the terrace. It has a sink and shelving space, and a private bathroom with a bath tub, shower and toilet. ‚Ä¢	The two 4bed villas both have master bedroom upstairs ‚Äì try to get to this one before the others! In addition to the standard features of closet, security box, private bathroom with shower, toilet, sink and bathtub, it also has a comfortable seating area that looks out over the pool. In addition, there‚Äôs access to the terrace, with more seating and a coffee table. ‚Ä¢	Both villas also have a second upstairs bedroom, also with views over the pool and terrace access. These have private bathrooms with shower, sink, toilet and bath tub, and also have a closet with security box.‚Ä¢	The four downstairs bedrooms all open out directly onto the pool area. They too have closet space, a security box, and a private bathroom with bath tub, shower, toilet and sink area. ‚Ä¢	For those who prefer a little more privacy, the final bedroom is tucked away in the cosy 1bed villa. This has a king-sized bed, AC, a large TV and a private bathroom with tub, shower, sink and toilet. Closet space is located in the open plan living area. title: Nag Shampa Private Estate: 5 Pools, Yoga Pavilion
description: Nag Shampa Private Estate, Taro, Ubud, Bali | By The Luxe Nomad - Exclusive estate curated by Sam and Isabella Branson - Fully staffed with eight bedrooms for up to 16 guests- Five swimming pools for the ultimate villa vacation- Wellness Haven: Yoga shala, massage studio, meditation spots - Set on a one-hectare site surrounded by a tropical jungle - Organic orchard, vegetable patch, and lush gardensThe spaceNestled in the peaceful Taro village, Nag Shampa Private Estate by Sam and Isabella Branson is an estate that‚Äôs truly at one with nature. Its name, which means ‚Äúincense of love‚Äù in Sanskrit, is designed as the ultimate wellness retreat. Combining modern design with traditional Javanese architecture, this property embodies elegant authenticity. The Ubud villa can host up to 16 guests in eight ensuite bedrooms; perfect for big groups of families and friends travelling together. With over one hectare to explore, the estate is a living, breathing feast for the senses. Make full use of its yoga shala, where you can exercise, meditate or just savour some quiet time. Enjoy healthy, homestyle meals prepared daily by three in-house cooks, using fresh produce from the estate‚Äôs organic orchards and vegetable gardens. Swim and soak in its five inviting pools, or unwind at the massage studio and various relaxation zones throughout the estate. Walk through lush greenery that lead to three impressive Joglo-style buildings that respectively house the Istana Suite (the master bedroom), an 18-seater dining area, and a lofty living area that leads to the main pool and yoga shala. Next to the shala, two symmetrical pairs of Joglo-style structures contain four additional bedrooms, followed by a series of three Kubu pool villas that each have a hammock on the balcony.Weddings and other celebrations can be held at this beautiful venue; contact the team for more information. Where you‚Äôll be: Taro Village in Ubud, BaliGuest accessEnjoy full access to all of Nag Shampa Private Estate‚Äôs spacious rooms and amenities across the one-hectare site. This includes eight ensuite bedrooms, five swimming pools, yoga shala, massage room, gardens and other indoor-outdoor spaces found throughout the estate.Other things to note PROMOTIONS  *Last minute: Up to 10% off stays- Valid only for bookings made less than 30 days prior to the check-in date.- Seasons minimum night stay required *Early bird: Up to 10-15% off stays in low, shoulder, and high season- Valid only for bookings made 120 days or more prior to the check-in date.- Seasons minimum night stay required *Long Stay:  Up to 10% off stays for low, shoulder and high season- Valid only for bookings with a minimum stay of 7 nights- Some promotions are not reflected. Please contact us for more details Rate Inclusions: - Welcome drink- Daily breakfast- Complimentary WiFi- Daily housekeeping- Services by Villa manager, private cooks, butlers, maintenance/engineering, and security.- Car hire (8 consecutive hours a day, excluding petrol) Floors: Nag Shampa Estate is a villa complex consisting 8 Pavilions:- Ground Floor: Main entrance, fully-equipped kitchen, main dining area, an open-air living room, garden, yoga bale and swimming pools Capacity & Extra Bedding: - This property is designed to comfortably sleep 10-16 persons.- Extra bed is available at USD $45 per person per night. Only 4 additional beds are available. Living areas: - The dining and kitchen areas are conveniently located next to each other, offering an open and inviting space. - The living area, on the other hand, provides a separate, air-conditioned room for relaxation on the ground floor. Entertainment: - High-speed WiFi throughout and indoor living area equipped with 43-inch Smart TV with Netflix, local and international channels, JBL Bluetooth speakers, books and board games. Kitchen & Dining: - The kitchen is equipped with oven, refrigerator, espresso coffee machine, microwave, freezer, blender, juicer, toaster, stove, mini bar, rice cooker, wine fridge, water dispenser, as well as essential cooking tools, cutlery, and drinking glasses.- The villa has main indoor dining area features a rectangular table that seats 16 guests.- All meals (breakfast, lunch, dinner, floating breakfast upon request) can be arranged in advance. We also provide a chef shopping service and a pre-arrival shopping service with the rates: grocery bill + 15% handling fee. Wellness: - Yoga mats are available on request and the spacious garden provides a serene setting for practicing yoga. - Yoga lessons can also be arranged at extra charge. In-villa treatments are available on request at extra charge. Parking: Sufficient parking space available for two cars and six motorbikes. For Families: - Baby cot is charged at USD $10 per unit per day.- High chair is charged at USD $5 per unit per day.- Babysitting service available upon request at extra charge.- Children under 4 years old can stay for free when sharing existing bedding with parents. Pool area: - There are a total of 5 pools - The two main pools - measure 41m x 1.4m x 28m - and 10m x 1.4m x 10m, - and 3 plunge pools measure the same 6m x 1.4m x 3m; - All pools are chlorinated pools, - and only Pool 2 has a shallow end for kids; - All five pools are set to ambient temperature; - There are a total of thirteen lounge chairs, fifteen sun umbrellas, and fourteen sunbeds; - Towels are provided at each villa pool. Services at extra charge: - Beverage & Grocery Shopping Service (at grocery cost + 15% handling fee).- Spa treatments, massages services and additional yoga sessions are available upon request (extra charge).- Tours and activities such as art and cultural excursions, cooking class are available upon request (extra charge). Announcement:  Nyepi Religious Day Please be informed that Bali island celebrates Nyepi (Silent) Day each year on the dates below. Nyepi Day is a day of absolute silence throughout the island and it is observed from 6:00 AM until 6:00 AM the next morning. No outdoor activities are allowed and there will be no check-in and check-out from properties on 19 Mar 2026, 08 Mar 2027 and 26 Mar 2028.
