title: Sayan Ridge Luxe Hideaway-1BR villa
description: There's nothing more peaceful than finding yourself in a tranquil hideaway surrounded by lush landscapes & modern amenities. At Tempat Santai Bali, you'll experience just that. Our villa features spacious living areas, a fully-equipped kitchen, & a private pool that overlooks the captivating Ayung Ridge. Each corner of this serene retreat is designed to offer you the ultimate relaxation & rejuvenation. Come & immerse yourself in the peaceful ambiance & luxurious comforts of this idyllic getaway.Other things to noteMEALS:Start your day off right with quality breakfast! We've got you covered with a variety of ingredients to fuel your morning. From a vibrant tropical fruit salad to fluffy scrambled eggs and toast, the possibilities are endless.  No matter what you choose, you can't go wrong.  Go ahead, indulge a little. You deserve itPOLICY:For safety reasons, our property cannot accept children under 16 years old. Our location on the ridge includes areas without railings, an infinity pool that is not gated, and various staircases inside and outside the property, posing a risk of falling. Therefore, our property is strictly for adults only.INSECTS and BUGSWe are in a tropical setting; therefore bugs, insects, frogs, snakes and other crawlers are part of our ecosystem. We coexist with nature and wish to provide this experience to our guests. We have plenty of butterflies but there is no way we can have only them and not other insects around. Our property is fully enclosed, and our dedicated staff maintain a high level of cleanliness. However, being situated in Ubud's lush tropical setting means occasional visitors from nature may appear. To minimize encounters, we kindly remind you to keep doors closed. While we can't guarantee their absence, we take every precaution to ensure your comfort. If you spot any unwanted guests, please inform our butler, and we'll take prompt action.You might encounter geckos. They are completely harmless but they sometimes make their distinctive sound at night. The good thing is that geckoes are very efficient in keeping the rooms clear of insects, so in fact we do appreciate these useful animals. In our vast garden we also have plenty of squirrels, birds and lizards. At sunset you will see several kinds of bats and you will hear symphony of sounds from the jungle. When it gets dark the fireflies might come around. The intensity of the nature in our location can be a bit overwhelming for some people, so please consider if this concept is for you.

title: 2BR Retreat in Ubud 15min from Monkey¬†Forest
description: Nestled in the serene village of Singakerta, Villa Singakerta Valley offers a peaceful haven surrounded by the soothing sounds of nature. This thoughtfully designed two-bedroom retreat perfectly blends modern comforts with the timeless charm of Ubud‚Äôs lush landscapes.The spaceEach bedroom in Villa Singakerta Valley is thoughtfully designed to ensure your utmost comfort. Both rooms feature a queen-size bed, air conditioning, a smart TV, and an ensuite bathroom. The first bedroom includes an inviting outdoor bathtub‚Äîperfect for unwinding under Bali‚Äôs starlit skies. The second bedroom offers a queen-size bed that can be converted into twin beds upon request.Villa Singakerta Valley semi-open living and dining area invites you to relax in style. Spacious sofas, cooling ceiling fans, and a fully equipped kitchen create a welcoming space for shared meals, conversations, and moments of pure tranquility. Step outside, Villa Singakerta Valley reveals a sanctuary of calm. Lounge on the sunbeds after a refreshing dip in the azure pool, surrounded by verdant greenery. A cozy sunken lounge provides the perfect spot to connect with loved ones or simply bask in the gentle tropical breeze.For added convenience, Villa Singakerta Valley also includes a guest bathroom, ensuring a seamless and comfortable experience throughout your stay.While staying at Villa Singakerta Valley, you‚Äôll find yourself just a short drive from some of Ubud‚Äôs most iconic attractions. Explore the spiritual ambiance of the Sacred Monkey Forest, immerse yourself in Bali‚Äôs artistic heritage at the Ubud Art Market.Escape to Villa Singakerta Valley and discover the art of relaxation in the heart of Ubud.(Please note that your Netflix and YouTube accounts will be used to log in. Ensure you log out before checking out to protect your account from unauthorized use.)STAFF AND SERVICES INCLUDED- Dedicated Villa Manager- Villa Host (Ubud) or Staff (Seminyak/Bukit)- Daily Housekeeping- Garden and Pool StaffEXTRA COSTS (advance notice may be required):- Villa pre-stocking: Groceries and beverages (subject to an additional service fee).- Breakfast by Villa Host (Ubud ONLY): IDR 120.000 per person per meal as a cover charge (minimum 4 guests).- Floating breakfast: IDR 150.000 per tray (for up to 4 guests).- In-villa Chef: Arranged through our trusted partner (see FAQs for details).- Airport transfers: Convenient pick-up and drop-off services.- Driving service: Reliable and professional drivers available on request.- Activities and excursions: Customized experiences to explore Bali.- In-villa massage services: Relax and rejuvenate in your villa's comfort.- Baby-sitting service: Experienced caretakers for your little ones.- Security guards: Additional safety and peace of mind.- Flowers arrangements: Custom designs to enhance your stay.Guest accessRoad Access: Many villas have narrow road access, often suitable for motorcycles only. We can assist with transportation arrangements if needed.Other things to noteIf Nearby Construction Occurs: We value your peaceful stay. In the rare event of construction in our area, our team is ready to assist with any comfort concerns. While neighborhood activities are beyond our control, your relaxation remains our priority. Please don't hesitate to contact us if you need anything to enhance your experience.Natural Ventilation: Experience the refreshing breeze of Bali with our open-air living spaces, designed to maximize natural airflow, providing an eco-friendly alternative to air conditioning or fans.Vendor Services: To ensure the villa's equipment and your safety, our dedicated team manages all vendor services within the villa, including spa, personal training, decorations, private chefs, yoga, photography, and villa equipment. Using external vendors is strictly prohibited and will result in a fine of IDR 2.000.000.Waste Management: Contribute to Bali's sustainable efforts by participating in our waste separation program. We provide three bins for organic, inorganic, and residual waste in your villa.Sustainable Amenities: We provide Sensatia Botanicals, a locally founded skincare brand, as bathroom amenities (hand soap, body soap, shampoo, and conditioner). Made in Bali with 100% natural, cruelty-free ingredients, this partnership reflects our support for sustainability and local initiatives, including plastic recycling and beach cleanups.Natural Charm: Our villas embrace Bali's tropical beauty, where the sounds of nature‚Äîgeckos and insects‚Äîcreate a serene ambiance. The open design may occasionally welcome wildlife, despite regular pest control. Geckos, symbols of good luck in Balinese culture, and other creatures are vital to the ecosystem.  Cultural Respect: In Ubud and Bukit, monkeys may be present‚Äîplease refrain from feeding or interacting with them. Surrounding landscapes, like jungles, rice fields, and local farms (e.g., duck, chicken or pig), are not part of the villa property and may be accessed by residents, with changes beyond our control. We appreciate your respect for Bali‚Äôs natural and cultural heritage.FAQsQ: What time is the check-in policy?A: Our dedicated staff ensures a smooth check-in process. Check-in starts at 14:00 for 1-3 bedroom villas and at 15:00 for 4-6 bedroom villas. Luggage drop-off is welcome after 11:00 as we prepare your villa. Please note, a late check-in fee of IDR 200.000 applies for arrivals after 20:00 to cover staff overtime, as our staff does not stand by the villa all the time.Q: What time is the check-out policy?A: Our check-out time is at 11:00 by default. Late check-out is subject to availability and involves extra charge. Please note that for any late check-out between 11:00 ‚Äì 18:00, an additional charge of 50% of the Daily Villa Rate will apply. Any check-out after 18:00, will be charged at a full day's Daily Villa Rate. If you need to store your luggage after check-out time, you are welcome to do so.Q: Is breakfast included in the booking? How do we order the chef's service?A: Breakfast is not included in the room rate. However, you can easily arrange breakfast by contacting our reservation or concierge team. We offer a variety of menu options prepared by our dedicated private chef, right in your villa. The cost is IDR 160.000 per person, with a minimum order for 5 guests. You can indulge in a floating breakfast for an additional fee of IDR 150.000 per tray.For lunch and dinner, we offer enhanced services, including set menus, live BBQ cooking, ethnic cuisines, and even fine dining prepared by a Michelin-star chef, all cooked in the villa. Prices for lunch and dinner start at IDR 450.000 per person. Please note that terms and conditions apply for booking.Additionally, our villa features a fully equipped kitchen, allowing you the flexibility to prepare your own meals if you prefer. Whether you choose to dine in or savor a chef‚Äôs touch, our team is here to ensure a seamless and enjoyable experience.Q: Do we have a housekeeping service every day?A: Absolutely! Daily housekeeping is provided from 9:00 to 17:00. Linens are changed every third day for sustainability. To ensure privacy, please coordinate with your Villa Host or Staff for a convenient cleaning time. Your comfort is our priority.Q: Can we have extra clean towels?A: Certainly! We are happy to provide extra towels, subject to availability. Please feel free to reach out to your Villa Host or Staff, and we‚Äôll do our best to accommodate your request promptly.Q: What is the maximum occupancy for this 2-bedroom villa? Can I have extra beds?A: The maximum capacity of this villa is for 4  people. there are no extra beds for this Villa.

title: Grand Cliff Nusa Dua
description: Contemporary Balinese beach house by Timbis CliffThe spaceThis spectacular villa is perched above a pristine beach at the southernmost tip of Bali‚Äôs Buket Peninsula, with truly breathtaking views of the Indian Ocean. Situated within the private Asmara Estate, the villa is within walking distance of Timbis Cliffs and about five kilometers from Nusa Dua town. Resort-style features include a superb infinity pool, in-residence spa facilities, a game room, and a fabulous private staff including a talented chef. The three-story villa includes five bedroom suites‚Äîfour with king beds, one with two twins‚Äîmaking it an ideal choice for destination wedding guests, large groups of friends, or unforgettable family reunions.The contemporary architectural masterwork balances top-of-the-line comforts with traditional Balinese influences, harmonizing beautifully with the timeless seaside setting. Multiple outdoor living areas form an ideal venue for festive occasions or serene relaxation in utter privacy. Relish a refreshing dip in the swimming pool and bask on comfortable sunbeds. Sip cocktails in the shaded pavilion and gather for alfresco meals in pergola, cooled by afternoon shadows or illuminated by beautiful lanterns.The terrace flows gracefully into the villa‚Äôs luminous interiors, where a superb guest kitchen serves a lovely open-plan living area with lounge and dining table overlooking the terrace and sea. The entertainment room with balcony is well appointed for nighttime fun, while the exquisite den inspires serene concentration. The lower floor includes the spa and fitness center, featuring a wide array of treatments and equipment to choose from.All five bedrooms enjoy ocean views and ensuite bathrooms. Each of the king suites opens to a private balcony, while the twin bedroom borders the terrace. The superb master suite features a jetted tub in its bathroom, and there are soaking tubs in the bathrooms attached to two of the guest suites.The beach beneath you is ideal for swimming and snorkeling, with a coral reef creating a safe sanctuary of gentle waters. Walk about half-kilometer to the paragliding at Timbis Cliff, or enjoy a chauffeured ride to Nusa Dua town or Bali National Golf Club. Families will enjoy Pirates Bay and Jimbaran Beach (famed for its seafood), while Uluwatu Temple offers a profound experience of Bali's spiritual heritage.Copyright ¬© Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.BEDROOM & BATHROOM‚Ä¢ Bedroom 1 - Primary: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, Dual vanity, Rain Shower,¬†Jetted tub, Television, Air conditioning, Safe, Private balcony, Ocean view‚Ä¢ Bedroom 2: 2 Twin size beds, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, Rain Shower, Dual Vanity, Television, Air conditioning, Safe, Terrace access, Ocean view‚Ä¢ Bedroom 3: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower & bathtub, Rain Shower, Dual vanity, Television, Air conditioning, Safe, Private balcony, Ocean view‚Ä¢ Bedroom 4: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower & bathtub, Rain Shower, Dual vanity, Television, Air conditioning, Safe, Desk, Private balcony, Ocean view‚Ä¢ Bedroom 5:¬†King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, Rain Shower, Dual vanity, Television, Air conditioning, Safe, Private balcony, Ocean view¬†FEATURES & AMENITIES‚Ä¢ Wine fridge   ‚Ä¢ More under ‚ÄúWhat this place offers‚Äù belowExtra cost (advance notice may be required):‚Ä¢ Groceries and beverages - subject to an additional 20%+tax service fee‚Ä¢ Activities and excursions‚Ä¢ More under ‚ÄúAdd-on services‚Äù below

title: Cabin in Kintamani Volcano View - Surya Cabin
description: BATUR CABINS is a four cabin boutique hotel in Kintamani with breathtaking views of the surrounding lava fields, majestic volcanoes, and the tranquil crater lake.Whether you're seeking to enhance your Bali itinerary with a unique experience, celebrate a special occasion, immerse yourself in the island's natural beauty, or simply escape the hustle and bustle for a few days, Batur Cabins is the perfect destination for you.The spaceSURYA CABINExperience a spectacular 180 degree panorama right from your bed.This cabin comes with a double sink and panoramic shower, sunken bathtub, private panoramic terrace, downstairs living room with fire place for extra space and privacy, as well as a bed that can be rolled outside to enjoy the sunrise or to gaze at the stars from the comfort of your own bed.Each one of our cozy and modern cabins is thoughtfully designed to offer a unique experience amidst the stunning landscape of Kintamani, boasting luxurious amenities and breathtaking views of the volcanoes.The aesthetics are inspired by the natural surroundings, including locally sourced wood, earthy tones, and black exteriors resembling the black lava fields of Mount Batur. Our cabins provide a comfortable and inviting hideaway that harmoniously blends with its mesmerizing surroundings. Pool:Please note that the swimming pool is part of the common area and accessible for all our guests regardless which cabin they booked.Location:Welcome to the other side of Bali.Nestled in Kintamani, a mountainous volcanic region in northern Bali, our location features dense forests and a cooler climate, particularly refreshing at night and quite contrary to what is expected from a tropical island and is the perfect destination to complete your Bali trip. Batur Cabins sits at an elevation of 1,500 meters, offering unparalleled views of the surrounding lava fields, majestic volcanoes, and the tranquil crater lake. Kindly be advised to pack warmer clothing for your stay with us, as Kintamani experiences a cooler climate compared to the rest of tropical Bali. While warm and sunny during the day, temperatures quickly drop after sunset. Although we provide cozy blankets and a fireplace, we recommend bringing warmer clothing for ultimate comfort during the cooler evenings. The temperatures are varying from 26¬∞C during the day to 16-17¬∞C at night time.Access:Although Batur Cabins is only a few minutes from the main road with several coffee shops, restaurants and convenience stores, it is situated on the hillside just below the village. Its tranquil setting amidst nature also means that access may not be immediately obvious.You can reach the Batur Cabins property via a small street near the temple, requiring a short but steep 150-meter walk downhill. Our team will meet you at our designated meeting point just minutes away from your cabin and escort you to the property. We will take care of your luggage, leaving you free to enjoy the authentic village experience and the spectacular views on the way. We recommend to wear proper shoes for your comfort. Drone:Kindly note that drone usage is NOT permitted throughout our property. Batur Cabins is designed as a peaceful retreat, allowing guests to disconnect and fully immerse in nature. Therefore our guests privacy and comfort is our utmost priority.NO CHILDRENChildren under 12 are not permitted to stay at Batur Cabins. Our cabins are meticulously designed to offer guests an unforgettable experience. Located on the slope of a mountain, the cabins are elevated on columns to provide the best possible views. As a result, most of our cabins and facilities are several meters above the ground, making them unsuitable for young children.Children aged 12 and above are welcome to stay with us when accompanied by an adult. In specific cases please fell free to contact us.Guest accessAccess to Batur Cabins:We‚Äôre proud of the tranquil hideaway we‚Äôve created at Batur Cabins ‚Äî tucked into a peaceful hillside, surrounded by nature, and offering unobstructed views of Mount Batur and the stunning volcanic scenery of Kintamani. Though just a short walk from the main road with caf√©s, restaurants, and shops, it feels like a world away ‚Äî the perfect place to disconnect, recharge, and fully relax.Access to the cabins involves a short but steep 150-meter walk downhill via a small street near the village temple. This walk is part of what makes the setting so special ‚Äî and we believe it‚Äôs absolutely worth it.To make your arrival smooth and comfortable:‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Our team will meet you at our designated meeting point, just minutes from your cabin‚Ä®‚Ä¢ We‚Äôll escort you to the property and handle your luggage‚Ä®‚Ä¢ You can soak in the view and settle into the calm atmosphere of this beautiful and authentic part of Bali from the very beginningWe recommend wearing comfortable shoes and arriving during daylight hours, if possible, for a smooth arrival experience.Late Arrival Information: Our service hours are until 9:00 PM, and we kindly ask for your understanding that our team is only available to personally meet guests and assist with luggage during these hours.We recommend arriving during daylight hours whenever possible to ensure the best arrival experience.If you're unable to arrive before 9:00 PM, don‚Äôt worry ‚Äî we‚Äôll still make sure you have what you need:‚Ä®‚Ä¢ You‚Äôll receive the exact location coordinates‚Ä®‚Ä¢ We‚Äôll send you a self-check-in guide with all the details for your stay‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Our team will personally check in with you the following morningAs a small business, we truly appreciate your understanding and flexibility.If you have any questions or concerns about your arrival time, feel free to reach out. We would be happy to arrange a local driver for you who knows the exact location of our property, ensuring a smooth and hassle-free arrival outside our service hours.Other things to noteAlthough Batur Cabins is only a few minutes from the center of Batur, it is situated on the hillside just below the village. Its tranquil setting amidst nature also means that access may not be immediately obvious. You can reach the Batur Cabins property via a small street near the temple, requiring a short 150-meter walk downhill. To ensure your safety and prevent any confusion, our team will meet you at our designated meeting point just minutes away from your cabin and escort you to the property. We will take care of your luggage, leaving you free to enjoy the authentic village experience and the spectacular views on the way.

title: THE most luxury villa in Lovina! Stunning Outlook!
description: Nestled amidst breathtaking natural beauty, this villa stands as a pinnacle of luxury and serenity. This villa, which can accommodate up to 10 guests, exudes luxury and splendor in every aspect. With its panoramic SPA room providing breathtaking ocean and city views, an infinity pool that blends seamlessly with the horizon, the jacuzzi to relax and a well-equipped panorama gym to train your body and mind, this villa offers an unrivaled experience for those seeking the epitome of opulence.The spaceStep inside through two grand entrance doors and be welcomed by breathtaking panoramic views. This luxury retreat combines modern design with timeless Balinese charm, offering the perfect balance of comfort, privacy, and indulgence.The property accommodates up to 10 guests across 5 spacious bedrooms, each with en-suite bathroom, balcony, and elegant furnishings. Three rooms can be set up as twin or king beds, while two offer king-size beds.Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen with American fridge, oven, microwave, and coffee machine‚Äîideal for family dining or gourmet meals prepared by our staff or private chef (on request).Outside, relax on the covered terrace, dine alfresco at the 10-seat table, or listen to your favorite music on the Sonos system. The infinity pool seems to blend into the ocean, while the jacuzzi offers the perfect spot for relaxation. A BBQ station adds to the outdoor experience.Wellness and leisure continue with a panoramic spa room and a fully equipped gym, both with sweeping views.Our dedicated team ensures a carefree stay, with daily housekeeping, garden care, security, and optional chef or chauffeur services.Located in North Bali, you‚Äôll be close to stunning waterfalls, rice terraces, twin lakes, local markets, and Lovina‚Äôs famous dolphin tours. For those who prefer to stay in, complete privacy and exclusive use of all facilities are guaranteed.This retreat is ideal for families, groups, or couples seeking a luxurious and private escape in Bali.Other things to noteExperience pure indulgence in our villa, where every detail is designed for your comfort and peace of mind. Enjoy these complimentary inclusions:-All taxes included (no hidden fees)-Daily personalized service and helpdesk support-High-speed fiber Wi-Fi (50Mb)-Gourmet breakfast: American, Continental, or Indonesian-Welcome package with drinks and fresh fruit-Utilities included (fair use)-Luxury amenities: towels, linens, slippers, toiletries, dental & shaving kits-Hairdryers, makeup mirrors & safe deposit box-Free laundry service-Baby facilities: portable cot & high chair-Universal adapters (if available)At this villa, we believe that true luxury lies in attention to detail and the creation of cherished experiences.On-request at additional cost we can organize for you:- Real chef to prepare lunch/dinner- Honeymoon/Party/Event flower decorations- Airport transfers in luxury airco cars with driver- Dolphin boat tour- Private car with driver for day trips or cab services- Motorcycle (scooter)- (In-house) Massage, pedicure, manicure- Day trips such as snorkeling, diving, visits to Bali's hotspots- Babysitter / nannyPlease note that the base price is for 2 people. If you are staying with more than 2 people, please enter the correct number of guests. The price will be automatically calculated with an additional guest fee.A Jacuzzi with air jets, unheated, is located by the pool.

title: Canggu Sea-Breeze 5BR Villa ‚Äî Chef & Beachfront
description: Arnalaya Beach House is a stunning 5-bedroom beachfront villa in chic Canggu, Bali, set on a 4,430sqm tropical estate with 1,300sqm of elegant living space. Unique features include a private tennis court, exclusive spa, gym, and a 20m pool. Guests enjoy full staff service, private chef, daily breakfast, WiFi, car with driver, spacious indoor and outdoor lounges, and spectacular ocean views, making it perfect for up to 18 guests seeking luxury and tranquility near Bali‚Äôs sunset coast.The spaceArnalaya Beach House by Elite Havens is a divine residence of contemporary design and fabulous living set in a tropical utopia. Recline in the architectural beauty and balance of this beachfront retreat on Bali's chic sunset coast in chic Canggu. Let the large team of caring staff indulge your every whim, play on the private tennis court, exert at the gym, lounge by the pool, and be polished and pampered in the villa's exclusive spa. This outstanding five-bedroom villa with space for up to 18 guests leaves nothing to chance with a private chef to prepare feasts in the show-stopping bale that overlooks the ocean and terraces of immaculate lawn.Guest accessThis villa comes with every conceivable luxury -Daily breakfastWiFi Internet accessCar and driver at a special rate of US$ 45++/day for 8 hours (excluding petrol)Welcome drink and fruit basketTurndown servicePersonal service by the villa staff including a fulltime manager, housekeeper, chef/cook, security and attendantsExclusive use of the whole villa and listed facilitiesCAPACITY5 adults (5 ensuite bedrooms: all have queen-size beds convertible to Hollywood twin bed; one with an extra pull-down single bed; gym convertible to twin room with two further portable beds). Three extra beds available (additional charge).LIVING AREASAir-conditioned lounge and formal dining for 14; entertainment room; pool lounge and dining bale also with table for 14.POOL20m x 8m. 0.5m-1.2m depthENTERTAINMENT60-inch TV screen in entertainment room; Satellite TVs in bedrooms; DVD player; surround-sound system; CD player; iPod dock.ADDITIONAL FACILITIESOffice for guest use; barbecue; diesel powered back-up generator; safety deposit box.PROPERTY AREA1,300sqm (villa). 4,430sqm (land).Other things to noteBy booking this property, all guests agree that they have read the house rules and complete listing content. Our complete booking terms and conditions are available for viewing under the Elite Havens website.

title: Glasshouse With Infinity Pool And Ocean Views
description: The Glassvillas is Bali‚Äôs first-ever glasshouse, nestled in the foothills surrounding Lovina. Our Glasshouse is designed for those seeking a unique stay with some of the most breathtaking views of the North Bali coastline.The spaceThe GlasshouseOur Glasshouse is designed for those who seek a truly unique, one-of-a-kind experience. Nestled in the serene foothills surrounding Lovina Beach, our Glasshouse has an incredible infinity pool with breathtaking views of North Bali's coastline. The Glasshouse offers an unparalleled opportunity to sleep under the stars, surrounded by panoramic glass that provides an immersive connection to the lush, tropical landscape. As night falls, the distant city lights of Singaraja twinkle like stars on the horizon, while the real celestial stars glitter above. Whether you're basking in our infinity pool or relaxing inside, our aim is to offer you a super unique experience, for your trip to North Bali!Guest accessOur caretaker will greet you on arrival, show you around and be there to help you with anything during your stay.Other things to note- LocationSituated in the foothills overlooking Lovina, The Glassvillas offers a serene escape just 15 minutes by car or scooter from shops, restaurants, and convenience stores. While our secluded location ensures peace, relaxation, and stunning views, it does mean transport options can be a bit limited. Gojek taxis or bikes are occasionally available but can be intermittent, so having your own car or scooter is generally the easiest way to get around. We‚Äôre happy to assist with bike hire or arranging a private taxi for you.For food, Grab delivery is usually reliable, especially if you order from Coffeenosky, a fantastic caf√© in Lovina known for its great coffee and delicious caf√© meals. It‚Äôs a convenient and tasty option for dining during your stay!- BreakfastOur villa comes stocked with cereal and milk for a light start to your day, but a cooked breakfast is not included. For something extra special, we offer a beautifully presented breakfast served in a heart-shaped basket. This stunning breakfast for two can be enjoyed floating in your pool or served poolside‚Äîyour choice! The cost for this memorable experience is 500K IDR. It‚Äôs a lovely way to begin your day in paradise.- Nearby Restaurants and ShopsThe Glassvillas is located 15 minutes by car or scooter from Lovina, where you‚Äôll find shops, restaurants, bars, and Pepito, the largest supermarket in North Bali. While our secluded location offers unmatched tranquility and breathtaking views, it‚Äôs best to plan ahead and bring along any food or supplies you‚Äôd like during your stay. This way, you can fully relax and enjoy the peaceful surroundings without the need for frequent trips into town.- Adult-Only PolicyAs much as we love children, our villa is not equipped to accommodate them. We are an adult-only accommodation, and guests must be 17 years or older.- EnvironmentThe Glassvillas is set on a picturesque, working mango farm, offering incredible views and a peaceful retreat. Being immersed in nature also means insects are part of the experience, particularly after rain, during the wet season, or at night. If you open the Glasshouse wide during these times, there‚Äôs a high chance bugs will make their way inside. To avoid this, we recommend keeping the doors closed when not in use. However, we understand the allure of opening up the space to fully enjoy the scenery! For those moments, we‚Äôve provided insect LED lights, which, while not perfect, can help manage any unexpected visitors. It‚Äôs all part of embracing the beauty of nature!

title: Escape to Paradise in Oceanfront Villa Kandy II
description: *üèù [Luxury Oceanfront VillaÔΩúNewly Built 2025ÔΩúBali‚Äôs Hidden Gem]*  ‚Äî‚ÄîYour Private Sanctuary in Northwest Bali, Where the Sea Meets Serenity‚Äî‚ÄîA paradise for snorkeling„ÄÅscuba diving and fishing enthusiasts.** Your private rooftop Jacuzzi: the ultimate luxury for breathtaking sunrise, sunset, and bay views.The space‚ú® *Breathtaking Design & Uninterrupted Ocean Magic*  Every corner of this villa is a masterpiece, blending Balinese artistry with modern elegance. Floor-to-ceiling windows frame ever-changing seascapes‚Äîgolden dawns, emerald afternoons, and cotton-candy sunsets that melt into the horizon. Designed for soul-deep relaxation, this is where time dissolves into salt-kissed bliss.  ü§ø *Your Private Marine Wonderland*  Step from your infinity pool onto sand, into crystal waters teeming with life. Snorkel above vibrant coral gardens where clownfish dart and lobsters peek from crevices (catch one if you dare!). Just 30 meters below lies Bali‚Äôs best-kept secret: an ancient underwater temple, its moss-covered stones glowing mystically in the sunlight. Current-free waters make it perfect for beginners and pros alike.  üåÑ *Double the Beauty: Mountain Mystique & Coastal Charm*  Hike through emerald rainforests behind the villa to panoramic ocean lookouts. As dusk falls, sip cocktails on your terrace while the sky paints itself in tangerine hues. Wander to the nearby village for $12 massages and fresh seafood feasts‚Äîyour chef will transform market finds into gourmet magic (ingredients at cost only!).  üõé *White-Glove Service, Balinese-Style*  ‚Ä¢ Your 24/7 Dream Team: Bilingual butlers craft personalized menus from local ingredients (no cooking fees!), arrange island-hopping tours, or summon spa therapists to your villa  ‚Ä¢ Safety First: Dedicated security guards patrol 6 PM‚Äì6 AM  ‚Ä¢ Cultural Immersion: Airport transfers could include a scenic detour to iconic Ulun Danu Beratan Temple  üìå *Good to Know:*  1. **Neighbors Construction Notice:**  Construction period:October 11,2025-July 31,2026. ‚ù§Ô∏èRefund for unused nights if construction noise affects your stay and decide to check out early (excludes stayed nights & Airbnb fees).‚ù§Ô∏èComplimentary breakfast selected from villa food menu.2. Smart Airport Transfer: Land at DPS afternoon? Recharge at a Ubud villa first‚Äî we can arrange a stress-free 4-hour scenic drive (at guest‚Äôs cost) next morning with hidden stopovers3. The last 5 minutes to the villa has a natural dirt road (that's how we keep the area peaceful and untouched! Please ride carefully- Slow down.). A tiny trade-off for total privacy and that "hidden gem" vibe. üåøGuest accessEntire villa, except for staff work room and electromechanical roomOther things to noteHere below is the general information of the facilities and service which most of the guest may want to know:1. It's a villa with full service. We have hired a dedicated team to service our guests , we will assign villa manager to greet our guest, and take care of the request or handle emergency during the stay of our guest; after booking confirmed, our villa manager will connect guests before their arrival.2. We have one full time housekeeper working in our villa, 8 hours per day, usually the housekeeper comes in the morning for 5 hours and around dinner time for 3 hours. But we can be flexible to some extend upon guest's preference.3. There is also gardener and security work full time in our villa. Security will work from 18:00 - 6:00 every day, it means even you arrive at mid night, we will have people to help you check in.4. Attention: To some guest who feel bothered with service people around, please let us know when you check in, and we can then arrange with you for the suitable working time and area.5. Our housekeeper could cook and do laundry for you upon your request. The cooking/laundry service is included in the room charge already, you need to inform our housekeeper in advance and pay for the food ingredients that you request(cash in advance); We encourage the guest to buy the groceries by themselves, of course the staff can also buy the groceries for you upon your request and present the receipt on the same day(please understand that some recipes may hand written from local vendors); it's appreciated if our guest pay some tips for the shopping service to our staffs. However, to mark up or over charge for the groceries is not allowed, in case you have any question on the receipt our staffs presented, please contact our villa manager Budi or to me immediately.6. We can arrange airport/other villa pick up service: one way from DPS airport to the villa is about 1 million IDR for less than 3 pax; 500K IDR from Gilimanuk harbor; a half day or one day trip can be also arranged, our villa manager will be glad to arrange the transportation for you.7. It will take about 47 minutes driving from Gilimanuk harbor; around 4 hours driving from DPS airport to our villa, and from Ubud it will be about 2 hours driving , the exact time will depend on the traffic; Fortunately, there is beautiful lakes and rice paddies on the road.8. To go around, another good alternative is to rent scooter, it's about 6 Euro a day, and the scooter can be delivered and pick up at our villa; you need to request it to Villa manager one day in advance. The nearest shop is about 10 minutes and 20 minutes to the village main road by walk.9. Warung Kadek Merry is a local traditional restaurant and about 5 minutes ride from our villa. Food is delicious and cheap. They can deliver food to our villa. Of course, there are some other restaurants with distinctive styles in the village. You are welcome to discover hidden private menus everywhere. You can also ask our housekeeper, and she will be happy to introduce it to you.10. When the tide is low, turn right from the pool and walk along the beach for about 10 minutes to reach a Robot bar where you can enjoy the sunset and ocean views. If you walk for about 20 minutes, you'll find a resort with a beach where you can dine, have drinks, and admire the beautiful seaside scenery. Near the villa, there is a romantic beach where you can rent outrigger boats. There are also some simple hiking trails suitable for trekking, leading to viewpoints where you can overlook the sea. It's the perfect spot to enjoy the sunset and the ocean scenery at dusk.  Sunset Horseback Tours Along the Shore is a good experience and memorable.(Nearby, you‚Äôll find friendly locals who offer **horse rentals** for beach ridesÔºâ11. As we are situated in a natural environment, it is inevitable to encounter small insects. We recommend that you close the windows and doors of your bedroom in the late afternoon, especially when the lights are on, to ensure they do not disturb your sleep at night.12. The small faucet next to the gas stove provides filtered water, and the filter cartridge is replaced regularly. Please feel free to drink it with confidence.13. If you like to have half day or day trip, temples , west Bali national park , famous temple of water god ..etc; You will find some detailed introduction in the service manual in our villa.14. If you enjoy snorkeling or fishing, you can reach the seaside directly from the pool. It is recommended that you wear rubber shoes or thicker socks as the coral in the sea might injure your feet. If you plan to go snorkeling, please remember to bring your personal snorkeling gear and rubber shoes, although these can also be purchased in the nearby village.15. If you are interested in scuba diving or island hopping and snorkeling , west Bali is a good place as it's close to one of the best diving spots in Bali, Menjangan island. you may find the good diving club recommendation in our service manual; or our villa manger to arrange for you and you need to inform him one day in advance.16. We also provide outdoor BBQ(Barreled gas available), internet TV(Netflix),sound bar and BOSE minilink and free WiFi, you are free to enjoy without additional service charge.17. We can call massage service to the villa with very reasonable price, please request to Budi at least half day in advance.18. There are 3 rooms with king size bed and bathroom. Two rooms with bathtub. There is only toilet (no shower) in the living room. A oversized Jacuzzi at the rooftop. Three bedrooms, living room and indoor dining area all with an independent air conditioner. One of upstair bedroom equipped with an internet TV.19. Our villa also offers some unique services, such as filling the poolÔºà 2.5 million IDR)„ÄÅ a bathtub(300K IDR) and Jacuzzi (500K IDR)with flower petals, or providing babysitting services for infants and young children(200K IDR per day for up to 7 hrs ). If you require any of these services, please inform the villa manager in advance so they can make the necessary arrangements for you.20. The base price is for 2 people. The extra  charge for an extra person is 30 USD/person/night as the house cleaning fee. Please put the correct number of guests then the price will be calculated automatically.If there are any questions, please drop us a message, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.Enjoy your stayüòä

title: Pandawa Cliff Estate - Villa Markisa, 5BR
description: This five-bedroom luxury villa on the Pandawa Cliff Estate has three pools, multiple living areas and a spectacular master suite, plus sports centre and spa.The spaceVilla Markisa is one of four luxury villas on the Pandawa Cliff Estate, set high above the ocean on Bali's scenic Bukit peninsula - a wedding and event venue span style="font-style: italic;">par excellence/span>.  The villa has been intelligently designed to give friends and family groups a fantastic level of privacy and flexibility. Its accommodation is arranged as a superlative cliff-edge master suite - the estate's Bridal Suite, a pair of two-level two-bedroom interconnecting apartments, a communal living pavilion, three pools and a breezy cliff-edge bal√©.  Guests enjoy the estate's sports centre with gym, spa, tennis and squash courts, plus polished service from a huge staff team.Guest accessThis villa comes with every conceivable luxury ‚Äì Daily breakfast, Wifi Internet access, Complimentary car with driver for 8 hours/day (excluding petrol), Welcome drink and fruit basket, Turn down service, Personal service by the villa staff including a full time villa manager, housekeeper, security and attendants, Exclusive use of the whole villa and listed facilities, .CAPACITY10 adults (1 king and 4 split-king beds) plus 2 extra beds on request (additional charge applies).LIVING AREAS2 air-conditioned interconnecting living rooms; 2 air-conditioned interconnecting dining rooms with tables for 4; air-conditioned living/dining room in master suite; living pavilion with dining for 8; cliff-edge pavilion; lawn-edge deck with seating; 3 poolside decks with sun loungers and tables for 4.POOL3 pools: 2 pools with 9m x 4m and a 6m x 5m x 1m.ENTERTAINMENTSatellite TVs - 50-inch in master, 43-inch in apartments; iPod dock.ADDITIONAL FACILITIESBarbecue; diesel powered back-up generator; safety deposit boxes.PROPERTY AREA3,000 sqm.Other things to noteBy booking this property, all guests agree that they have read the house rules and complete listing content. Our complete booking terms and conditions are available for viewing under the Elite Havens website.

title: Luxury 4BR estate: chef, staff, views & pool
description: Enjoy luxury pampering and completely unwind at Wangi Felixe Estate. An exclusive private paradise tucked between the green rice fields overlooking the Mount Agung volcano volcano. Our dedicated staff is always ready to accommodate your request. The chef prepares the  most delicious dishes exactly tailored to your taste. Maximum privacy is guaranteed, because Estate Wangi Felixe you do not have to share with other guests and the tropical garden of 7000m2 is fully walled.The spaceThe estateThe Wangi Felixe estate has been recently renovated. Through the combination of Balinese architecture with modern design and the use of wood and marble, a luxurious and  serene atmosphere has been created. Each departure has a view of the tropical garden, which provides benevolent tranquility and offers privacy where needed. Wantilan is the largest building. The spacious lounge on the first floor stays wonderfully cool due to a tropical breeze. Here you will enjoy spectacular mountain and sea vistas. The first floor of the Wantilan villa is the master bedroom. A large suite with a luxurious king-size bed and tastefully decorated sitting room overlooking the lotus pond.The bedroomsIn the  guesthouse villa there are three beautifully decorated bedrooms. Comfortable luxury  king-size beds- double or twin of your choice- ensure a good night's sleep. The Egyptian satin bedding gives an extra touch of luxury. All sleeping areas have an en suite bathroom, and private porch  and private garden with outdoor shower. In all privacy, taking a shower in the middle of the lush nature is an unique relaxing experience.Restaurant with chef The restaurant is an open covered space. Here you can start the day with a delicious breakfast and enjoy an enchanting view over the garden and rice fields. The chef is trained in 5-star hotels and prepares  the most delicious Balinese and international dishes.  Together with our cook, you can put together a menu completely adapted to your tastes and wishes every day. Of course, dietary requirements and special preferences are taken into account.Garden with private poolThe tropical garden is an oasis of tranquility where you can enjoy hiking. You can walk from the garden in just a few minutes to the famous TirtaGangga water palace. Between the lush greenery is the private swimming pool. Take a refreshing dip, then enjoy the warm sun rays on a daybed. It is also lovely relaxing in the shaded Bale. Special: from the Estate you can admire the sunset with a view of the volcano Mount Agung.Guest accessYou rent the entire Wangi Felixe estate as a whole for your own traveling party and do not need to share it with other guests.Other things to noteIncluded in price:- Transport from and to the airport- Welcome dinner or welcome lunch- Intercontinental breakfast- Coffee & tea- Chilled spring water- Private Chef- Private staff- Linen, towels, bath towels- Super fast WIFI available throughout the estateUpon request and with additional costs, we can organize for you:- Private yoga and meditation by the well-known yoga teacher Bapak Merta on the estate- In-room Balinese massage: relaxing massage in the tranquility of your private room- A diving or snorkeling trip to the Liberty US wreck with guide- Virgin Beach - the beautiful quiet white sand beach of East Bali  - A visit to the Gates of Heaven - the famous Lempuyang Temple- Snorkeling tours  and diving tours with guide in Amed- Climbing the Gembling waterfall - The TirtaGangga Water Palace, a few minutes' walk of the estate- A hike through the jungle or the rice field fieldsAsk the hostFrom a day at the beach, a snorkeling excursion to a temple visit, our host Gustut takes care of it to the last detail.

title: Beachfront boutique villa 1, including fine cuisine
description: Escape to a world of relaxation and serenity at our stunning boutique villa. With only 3 suites on a 6000m2 property you'll enjoy a truly intimate and luxury experience. Indulge in the comforts of our charming villa, with half-board and great services. Recharge your batteries with yoga sessions, massages and a variety of treatments. Take a dip in the pool or jacuzzi. Drink a cocktail at our rooftop bar as you take in breathtaking views. Get treated with delicious, mainly organic, fine cuisine.The spaceExperience luxury and serenity at the stunning Jing-Satu room in our villa The Jing | Luxury Stay. This room has a spacious 115m2 area, including a private terrace with breathtaking views of the Bali Sea.Sink into the comfort of a King-size bed with high-quality mattress and plush goose-down pillows for a restful night's sleep. The half-open bathroom features a bathtub and shower set amidst a serene pond, creating a tranquil spa-like atmosphere.Your stay includes delicious meals, with breakfast, afternoon tea, and a 3-course set dinner prepared by our skilled Balinese chef using mostly the freshest organic ingredients from our own or local gardens. The menu blends the best of Balinese and a bit of Mediterranean cuisines, offering a taste of the exotic.The villa is decorated with crystal stones, including your room, that will give special energy to your stay. Take a dip in the, with no chemicals, 17m-long pool , soak in the jacuzzi, or lounge on the sunbeds. The living room and gazebo provide comfortable sofas for relaxing, while the mango plantation and herb garden offer a peaceful escape.Stay connected with high-speed 200mbps Wi-Fi available throughout the room, pool, and terrace areas. You can also work from the comfort of your room with a wired connection. On request we can help you with bringing a working desk to your room.Pamper yourself with our in-house spa and clinic, offering a range of massages, 100% natural facials from By-Cosmetics, private yoga sessions, and Jing-acupuncture.Book one of our specially curated packages for the ultimate indulgence.Book your stay now for a truly unforgettable experience at the Jing-Satu room in our private villa The Jing | Luxury Stay.To make your stay more comfortable, the room providesdaily fresh fruit in your room.2 bathrobes for the pool2 bathrobes for the evening2 pair of bath slippersorganic bathroom amenitieshairdryerminibarnespresso machineelectric water heater for your cup of tea200 mbps wifiSorry, smoking is only allowed on your terras.Guest accessBeside having your private room and terras,  feel free to explore the rest of our  property, including the infinity-pool area, lush gardens, relaxing gazebo at the beach, spacious living room, and terrace.Other things to noteIf you require additional rooms, please let us know, and we will do our best to accommodate your needs. However, we regret to inform you that renting the entire villa is not possible.We strive to maintain the peaceful and serene atmosphere of our villa, and therefore, we only accept adult guests (18 years or older). This helps to ensure that all guests have a relaxing and enjoyable experience.Unfortunately, our villa may not be suitable for guests with disabilities who have difficulty walking.For the comfort of all guests, we have a sweet Bali dog on the property, but no other pets are allowed.The Jing Luxury Stay is located in a beach and tropical/jungle area, surrounded by breathtaking natural beauty. The area is home to a variety of birds and butterflies, but also small animals like tjik tjaks, salamanders, gecko's and ants. Of course we take preventive measures to minimize any disruptions to your stay.For your comfort and the comfort of other guests, we kindly request that smoking is limited to your private terrace only.Book your stay now for an unforgettable experience at the Jing Luxury Stay.

title: Stunning 10BR Family Estate in Central Berawa !
description: Amenara Estate is two connecting luxury villas. This villa has been designed in a tropical Miami style with by sleek white finishes and warm natural wood accents. A distinctive feature is a Japanese zen-inspired roof garden visible from the upstairs bedrooms. This is a serene retreat amidst the bustling heart of Berawa, just moments away from cafes, eateries and supermarkets and a leisurely stroll to the beach.The spaceAs you enter the villa, you are greeted by a 12-seat natural wood dining table with a show kitchen and breakfast island to the side. You are drawn to the inviting outside living space edged by the pool, deck, lawns and surrounding gardens. Two bedrooms are poolside, with another more spacious room at the pool‚Äôs end. The wet kitchen is at the back of the house, where our staff will create culinary masterpieces. Within the main house, one ground floor wing houses an entertainment room with a 65‚Äù TV while the other is a studio space fitted for work.Stairs ascend to another much larger entertainment room with a wall-mounted 68‚Äù TV envisaged to house children of all ages during events. Hereto are the master bedroom, a twin and the children‚Äôs bunk room. All the bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms fitted with rain showers and a bath.The 18m pool has a children‚Äôs play area next to the living space, allowing parents to sit & sip in comfort while still being able to oversee all the action. If you are interested in holding an event here, this connecting Amenara Estate, can offers the flexibility to accommodate receptions and ceremonies in Amenara Kiri, while dinner can be arranged in neighbouring Amenara Kanan.Guest accessLarge secure gates (with smaller entrance doors suitable for individuals or scooters) open into the carpark. The villa is only available to guests renting the property, with no others visiting unless invited explicitly by you or the management team, ensuring absolute security and privacy during your stay. The villa is fully staffed with an attentive villa manager overseeing every detail, skilled private chefs, butlers, housekeeping, gardeners, pool attendants and estate security.Other things to noteComplete access and total privacy

title: Beachfront Villa in secluded East Bali

title: Unwind in luxury, where LOVE meets paradise!
description: Nestled amidst stunning natural beauty, this villa is the epitome of luxury and tranquility. This newly built, one-bedroom holiday house accommodates up to two guests, offering unparalleled elegance and comfort in every detail. Featuring a private pool that merges effortlessly with the horizon, an indoor jacuzzi for ultimate relaxation, and a sauna to rejuvenate your senses, this villa provides a truly exclusive experience.The spaceWhether you choose to unwind in complete serenity or refresh your body and mind, this villa guarantees an extraordinary and unforgettable stay.As you enter the villa, you're immediately captivated by breathtaking panoramic views that evoke a sense of paradise. Inside, the villa radiates an atmosphere of elegance and opulence, with its modern design, high-end finishes, and carefully chosen d√©cor. Every element has been thoughtfully designed to offer the utmost in luxury and comfort.The villa can host up to 2 guests, making it the perfect spot for a romantic getaway or an unforgettable honeymoon. The villa boasts one spacious bedroom, tastefully furnished and equipped with modern conveniences. In addition to its luxurious amenities, the villa offers a generously sized bathroom, a soothing sauna, and a serene indoor jacuzzi. Each space is designed to envelop you in relaxation, allowing you to unwind and rejuvenate in complete tranquility.The villa also includes a fully equipped, high-end kitchen designed for culinary enthusiasts. Outfitted with premium appliances such as an American-style fridge, oven, microwave, and coffee machine, it‚Äôs perfect for those who love to cook. Whether you're a seasoned chef or simply enjoy making your own meals, this kitchen is a dream come true, offering both creativity and convenience for an exceptional dining experience.Exterior:Step out onto the vast, covered terrace and be captivated by the stunning panoramic views that surround you. This outdoor sanctuary features a cozy dining table, perfect for a sunrise breakfast or a romantic candlelit dinner, while immersing yourself in the beauty of the natural landscape. A true highlight awaits with the infinity pool (3x5 mtr), stretching towards the horizon and blending seamlessly with the clear skies and endless ocean. Swim into its pristine waters or relax poolside, basking in the warmth of the tropical sun and the gentle breeze from the sea. Whether you‚Äôre seeking a refreshing swim or a peaceful moment of reflection, the infinity pool offers an extraordinary experience.Honeymoon:This villa is the perfect haven for honeymooners, offering an idyllic escape for love to flourish. Let us create unforgettable moments for you, from intimate candlelit dinners under the stars to specially curated honeymoon packages that indulge your every desire. Drift into relaxation with soothing massages, or immerse yourself in the beauty of a flower-filled pool, designed to celebrate your love. Here, romance is not just an experience but a way of life, where every detail is crafted to make your stay truly magical.Staff:The villa staff are committed to providing a personalized and unforgettable experience through our attentive and professional team. From the moment you arrive at this luxury retreat, you‚Äôll be cared for by staff who strive to exceed your expectations and cater to your every need. Should you wish, our team can also prepare lunch and dinner for you at the cost of groceries.For a more refined dining experience, you can request the services of our skilled chef (for an additional fee), who will craft exquisite meals tailored to your preferences, allowing you to indulge in gourmet cuisine without leaving the comfort of your private villa.Ensuring everything is spotless and well-maintained throughout your stay is our meticulous housekeeper, allowing you to relax and enjoy your time in an immaculate and serene setting.Your security is of utmost importance, and our discreet and vigilant security team works around the clock to guarantee a safe and peaceful environment, so you can fully immerse yourself in the tranquility of the villa.For those who wish to explore the local area, our on-call chauffeur (who is also a good guide) is at your disposal, offering convenient and reliable transportation for sightseeing or any excursions you may desire.Our mission is to create an environment where luxury, relaxation, and indulgence blend seamlessly. With our exceptional staff, your villa experience will be elevated to new levels of comfort and hospitality. We are here to ensure your stay is extraordinary in every way, welcoming you to a world of personalized service where your satisfaction is our highest priority. Prepare to be enchanted as we turn your dream vacation into reality.Explore:Discover the captivating wonders of North Bali, where nature's beauty unfolds in a mesmerizing tapestry of sights and experiences. Embrace the essence of paradise as you embark on a journey of exploration and serenity. Here's what awaits you in this enchanting corner of Bali:- Sunrise at Lovina Beach: Witness the magical spectacle of the sunrise at Lovina Beach, as the sky transforms into a canvas of vibrant colors. It's a sight that will fill your soul with awe and inspiration.- Scenic Waterfalls: Immerse yourself in the lush greenery of North Bali's jungles and discover hidden gems like Gitgit and Sekumpul waterfalls. Be spellbound by the cascading water and rejuvenate your spirit amidst nature's embrace.- Serene Rice Terraces: Step into a postcard-worthy scene as you encounter the captivating rice terraces of Munduk and Jatiluwih. Let the serenity of these terraced landscapes take you on a journey of introspection.-¬†Breathtaking Lakes: Explore the stunning twin lakes, Tamblingan and Buyan, cradled amidst mist-covered mountains. Engage in tranquil canoe rides or hike to the best vantage points for awe-inspiring views.- Local Markets: Immerse yourself in the vibrant local culture by strolling through traditional markets in Singaraja and Seririt. Engage with friendly locals and discover unique handicrafts and souvenirs.- Historical Sites: Uncover the rich heritage of North Bali at historical landmarks like Beji Temple and the Banjar Hot Springs. Experience the spiritual essence and architectural marvels of these cultural treasures.- Bali's Exotic Flora: Wander through the Bali Botanic Garden, a tropical paradise bursting with exotic flora and fauna. Marvel at rare species and lose yourself in the ethereal beauty of this botanical wonderland.In North Bali, an extraordinary adventure awaits at every turn. Embark on a journey that will leave you with cherished memories and a heart brimming with the magic of Bali's unspoiled charm. Prepare to be captivated, as North Bali invites you to create your own story amidst its breathtaking landscapes and warm hospitality. Come and experience the true essence of Bali's beauty in its purest form.Lovina is known for its dolphins. These large schools of special mammals can be admired every morning before sunrise. From Lovina numerous fishermen depart with tourists on board in search of the dolphins. The boat can be surrounded by dozens of jumping and playing dolphins. It is usually sufficient to make an appointment with a fisherman 1 day in advance. The trip takes over two hours. You can even arrange to be picked up by the boat in front of the villa and be delivered back home.The villa is completely private and guests have access to all this privacy and luxury that the villa has to offer.Experience the epitome of indulgence with our exquisite villa, where every aspect of your stay is carefully curated to ensure absolute comfort and convenience. Delight in the following complimentary offerings:- 10% Government Tax: Rest easy, as our pricing includes all applicable government taxes, leaving you with no surprises.-Tourist Tax: Your peace of mind is our priority, and we've taken care of the local tourist tax so you can fully enjoy your stay.- Personalized Service: Our attentive staff and helpdesk are at your service every day, ensuring your needs are met with utmost care and efficiency.- Lightning-Fast Wi-Fi: Stay connected with high-speed fiber internet (30Mb) that allows you to effortlessly share your cherished moments with the world.- Gourmet Breakfast: Start your days with a delectable treat! Relish a daily breakfast featuring a sumptuous selection of American, Continental, or Indonesian delights.- Thoughtful Welcome Package: Feel instantly at home with a thoughtful package, complete with refreshing drinks and an assortment of succulent fruits.- All-Inclusive Utilities: Relax without a worry, as we cover gas, water, and electricity expenses (fair use) during your stay.- Plush Amenities: Luxuriate in the comforts of our villa with provided bath towels, pool towels, bed linen, slippers, soap, shampoo, shower-gel, dental kit, shaving kit, cotton buts, comb, sanitary bag and shower-cap.- Convenient Facilities: Embrace the convenience of hair dryers, makeup mirrors, and a safe deposit box for your valuables.- Free laundry: Have your laundry washed by the staff, convenient and easy!- Baby-Friendly: We ensure that even our littlest guests are taken care of with the provision of a portable cot and high chair for babies.- Universal Adapters: For your ease, we offer universal adapters (if available), allowing you to charge your devices hassle-free.At this villa, we believe that true luxury lies in attention to detail and the creation of cherished experiences.On-request at additional cost we can organize for you:- Real chef to prepare lunch/dinner - Airport transfers in luxury airco cars with driver- Dolphin boat tour- Private car with driver for day trips or cab services- Motorcycle (scooter)- (In-house) Massage, pedicure, manicure- Day trips such as snorkeling, diving, visits to Bali's hotspots- Babysitter / nannyThe staff can also provide event decorations, think birthdays, weddings or honeymoons.As an example birthday decorations, this cost IDR 2 Million include :-1x Romantic floral decor with text 'HAPPY ANNIVERSARY/ HAPPY BIRTHDAY' on the bed -1x Romantic flower decor on the pool-1x Hand Flower Bouquet-1x Birthday Cake-1x bottle of local wine- and some Colorful Ballons in the bedroomIt is also possible to rent this villa with the modern design villa next door. Both villas are easily connected by a hall way in front of the villa(s). The number of bedrooms increases by 5, so in both villas we can accommodate up to 12 guests (and 1 baby) in total! Please contact us if you are interested!

title: Designed 3BR Ricefields View Villa, Pool & Rooftop
description: This modern three-bedroom villa is tucked in a quiet corner of Canggu, Bali. Designed with clean lines, natural light, and thoughtful simplicity, it‚Äôs ideal for small families, couples, or a group of friends seeking a peaceful stay close to both Canggu and Pererenan. The layout includes one separate bedroom and two upstairs in the main building.The spaceThe detached bedroom offers extra privacy and features a clear glass desk by the window‚Äîa calm, functional space to work with views of surrounding greenery. The two upstairs bedrooms are bright and modern, each fitted with a comfortable bed, soft linens, and large windows to let in the breeze and sunlight.The open-plan living area brings everything together, with a compact kitchen, dining table, and sofa in one seamless space. Floor-to-ceiling windows connect the indoors to the outside, and a built-in projector adds a cozy touch for movie nights.Outdoors, a private pool is surrounded by timber decking, lounge chairs, and tropical plants. It‚Äôs a relaxed and easygoing space to swim, read, or enjoy a meal under the sun. Minimal yet warm, this villa is a stylish, private base just minutes from Bali‚Äôs best cafes, beaches, and boutiques.Our manager will assist you with any questions or requests that may come up during your stay. He can also assist with the following: scooter/car rental, transportation, massage, and local knowledge and tours. Please do not hesitate to contact him during your stay.Guest accessThe entire villa is yours during your stay, no space is sharing with others. The car parking is not available at the villa. The parking space is fit to scooter onlyOther things to notePlease note as we don't own the rice fields in front of the villa, you may experience some farmers passing in front. As they are working on their land, this is just natural and we can't do anything against it. Take it as an opportunity to see more of the locals life!VILLA WITH RICE FIELD VIEWAs nature is integral to the villa, you may hear noises which come from insects and animals who inhabit the rice field and surroundings (frogs, chickens etc.). This is the charm of living close to nature in Bali.Kindly note that rice fields surrounding the property are the main food resources for locals living in the area. This means they may be harvested at different times of the year. Host is not responsible for any surrounding landscape modification/intervention out of their scope.Bali is a humid and tropical natural environment with lots of greenery. Geckos & insects are endemic to the Island. Even though gentle pest controls are regularly operated at the property, some encounters may occur. Please note that all of them are completely harmless and important for a balanced ecosystem.Because the property is located in a relatively remote area, flow of electricity is not as reliable as in cities. Therefore, power cuts from the main provider may be expected from time to time. Kindly note that these are completely out of the host's scope. No generator is available on site.We are taking extra steps to ensure the safety of our guest during your stay, the villa is thoroughly cleaned following the AirBnb cleaning procedure.===FAQs- Q: What time is the Check-in policy?-A: Please be informed that check-in time is at 14:00 by default. Arriving earlier? No problem, we will manage for you to drop your luggage first and start exploring the area while waiting for the villa to be ready. If you need an early check in we will try to accommodate you but we can‚Äôt promise, it is subject to the villa availability. - Q: What time is the Check-out policy?- A: Our check-out time is at 11:00am by default. Late check-out is subject to availability and may involve extra charge. Please note that for any late check-out between 11:00 ‚Äì 15:00; an additional charge of 50% of the Daily Villa Rate will apply. Any check-out after 15:00, will be charged at a full day's Daily Villa Rate. If you need to store your luggage after check-out time, please get in touch with us. Should the villa be empty, we'll be happy to store them.- Q : Do we have a housekeeping service every day?- A : Housekeeping is scheduled 3 times per week. The pool is serviced twice a week, and the garden is maintained 1‚Äì2 times per week. For the sake of respecting every guest's privacy, please kindly arrange with your villa host D-1 should you wish your villa to be cleaned and at what time.- Q : Can we have extra clean towels?- A : For eco-friendly reasons towels are changed every three days. Please leave them on the floor for our staff to pick-it up. Towels left hanging on racks will be considered clean if not on the floor.- Q : What is the maximum occupancy for this villa?- A : This villa is for 6 people.

title: ICONIC 5BD FOUR SEASONS INSPIRED VILLA IN CANGGU
description: Designed and built by the same team behind the stunning Four Seasons Hotel in Jimbaran, this private retreat offers unparalleled standards of quality and refinement in space, architecture and landscape design with spectacular views over cascading rice-terraces and a small jungle-clad river valley in a peaceful, traditional Balinese village within the sought-after Canggu area.Rates are subject to 6% staff service charge and 10% Indonesian hotel tax, chargeable prior to check in.The spaceThis iconic villa accommodates 10 adults in 5 ensuite bedrooms ( All with extra-king size beds ). The villa presents an 18x4m infinity-edge swimming pool, balconies, terraces, and a choice of indoor and outdoor living areas, affording space and plenty of privacy wrapped in contemporary classic architecture completed with elegant interiors, modern comforts and Asian antiques. Quick facts: Location: CangguBedrooms: 5Guests: 10Villa: 950 sqm / 10225 sqft Land: 2,750 sqm /  29,170 sqftPool: 18x4 m / 60x13 ftMaster bedroom (extra-king size bed): 95 sqm / 1,022 sqftBungalow: 90 sqm /  1,010 sqftRooms 2, 3 and 4: 60 -70 sqm / 646 sqft - 754 sqftLibrary/TV room: 40 sqm / 431 sqftThe villa has a full team of professional staff including a manager, a security guard and housekeeping. Our staff is here to keep the villa beautiful and pristine, to make sure there are fresh towels, beautiful gardens, and in general to make sure that everything works well. They will look after you and the villa. Joko our manager will be happy to assist you organising the following services (not included in the night rate):+ Airport pick-up and drop-off+ Driver and day trips+ Restaurant reservations+ Massages+ Laundry and dry-cleaning+ etc.The four detached buildings that constitute the villa are perfectly laid out; their rooms offering ample space and privacy.  The main residence is the largest of the four and directly faces the pool, gardens and rice fields.  On the ground floor, the expansive dining room is dominated by a recycled antique teak table seating 12, and serviced by an adjoining kitchen.  Like everywhere in the villa, glass and teak sliding doors allow natural light to flow in, while maximising the idyllic views.  Thrown open, cooling breezes can enter, while air conditioning and ceiling fans provide more controlled temperatures.Guest accessGuests can access the entire 2,700 sqm | 29,170 sqft villa compound.Other things to noteWe are the direct owners of the villa so you are getting one of the nicest villas in Bali at the best possible price on the market. No intermediary commission apart from the fee Airbnb charges. This rate doesn't include chefs, drivers or butlers. The villa is for a maximum of 10 people at all times and is not available for functions or any kind of events.

title: Umatreehouse. ecotreehouse_ bamboo house bali
description:
Enjoy the beautiful atmosphere in the middle of jungle in a traditional village called Tampaksiring which is the one of the most picturesque places in Bali. we chose to build a lovely high quality bamboo property which will give our guests the opportunity to experience a holiday with wonderful surroundings of nature and at the same time luxury and coziness.The spaceEco Tree House is a unique bamboo house was design by the owner and working with the local bamboo artisan to create and produce this unique bamboo house. There are 2 bedrooms available upstairs and downstairs, can accommodate 2 couples or family. Upstairs bedroom provided half bathroom, wardrobe and hanging hammock overlooking to the pool. Upstairs bedroom is not provided with air conditioner due its open room, but we provide curtains for privacy. Downstairs, there are the second bedroom equipped with air conditioner and wardrobe, bathroom with shower, kitchen, open air bathtub and private pool. The property is very close to nature, there are many possibilities that occur here such as insect and any small animals in the outside area. Treat all animals with respect and love because this is their home. Please note that we will not accept complaints and manipulation regarding attempts to get refund based on natural occasions. If you want them away from the property area, our staff is happy to help.Guest accessThe guests can access our Joglo lounge near the reception area where the guest may order lunch, dinner, snack, drinks or just chilling and enjoy free Wi-Fi.  The guests can choose to eat at the Joglo lounge or deliver the order to the villa.Other things to noteDO NOT jump from the hammock to the pool/ground.
The management is NOT responsible for money, jewelry or other valuable placed outside, please put it on the safety box. 
The guests should always pay attention to the stove at the kitchen being turned off after use it.
The guests is not allowed to smoke inside the property due the building materials are made from bamboo and wood.
Motorbike rental is subject to availability, kindly ask first for rent and price.
Pet is not allowed to stay.
