title: OB10001 - 10 Bedroom Villa Complex in Seminyak
description: Offering a 10 Bedrooms option consist of a Complex of 3 Villas; Two 4 Bedroom Villa and One 1 Bedroom Villa"Before sending a booking request, please contact us to inquire about any promotional rates that may be available. The pricing for the villa is dynamic and subject to change, with some dates potentially having discounted rates. Please note that the calendar for the villa may not always be up-to-date, so we recommend checking with us for last-minute availability."The spaceFrom the centre of Seminyak, a residential road bordered by palm trees leads out towards the residential district from the famous Oberoi Hotel. In this privileged setting one passes a guardhouse and then enter into a wooded driveway leading to these gorgeous Bali villas for rent. The central feature of these Bali villas for rent is an open-air lobby, and on the right side of the lobby a wide pathway, elegantly lit at night, takes the guest to the villas. These Bali Villas are located within 200 m from well known restaurants and fashion boutiques of Bali, only 400 m from the sea and about 300 m from the well known KuDeTa.For supporting the warm climate of Bali, every room of the villas owns electric fans and air-conditioning. As you wish, you can also refresh up in the large private swimming pools during a long sunny day and lay in the comfortable sunbeds. The villas are composed of spacious open-air bathrooms, large kitchen with a bar, and a wide living room where you can enjoy your family summer holidays. And especially, all rooms have Wifi connexion to offer you all the comfort you deserve.Fans & air-conditioningLarge open-air bathroom with bath & showerTV with a DVD libraryPrivate swimming poolsPrivate Bar & kitchenOpen living room with lounges, dining table & individual tables for breakfastOther things to noteOur villas come with the services of a Guest Relations Manager who will be happy to assist with tours, transportation, massages, activities, reservations and any other information you may need to make your vacation a memorable and hassle-free experience. From the moment you arrive, our team is dedicated to ensuring that you have an unforgettable stay with us.We offer airport transfer services to make your arrival and departure as convenient as possible. Our team can arrange transportation for you to and from the airport at a reasonable cost. Please let us know if you require this service and we will be happy to assist youWe are happy to arrange fast-track immigration service for our guests. This service allows you to bypass queues and have a more efficient and convenient arrival or departure at the airport. Please let us know if you are interested in this service and we will do our best to accommodate your request.

title: Exclusive & Stylish Ocean View Villa with Private Chef
description: Villa The Ylang Ylang will deliver a truly inspirational experience for guests. At this beautiful home peace and harmony are embodied in a unique beach-front sanctuary. The villa‚Äôs mantra is ‚ÄòPassionate Serenity‚Äô ‚Äî and we truly believe you will find it here.Located near the quiet coastal village of Saba, this iconic beach-front property sits serenely on the lip of the quiet Peanut River, overlooking the black sands of Saba beach. Revitalizing treatments for mind, body and soul through yoga and spa treatments are a highlight of a stay at The Ylang Ylang.Approached through Saba village, with its idyllic scenery of verdant rice fields and coconut groves, this beachfront property resting on landscaped gardens and facing the Indian Ocean‚Äôs crashing surf is a spectacular sight. Built in 2002 and lovingly designed and furnished by its owner, Villa Ylang Ylang hints of Versace and European sophistication: an elegant black and gold theme permeates throughout, while furnishings are fashioned from the finest imported fabrics. Food is served on gold plates, pool towels are by Chanel and several precious glass sculptures by the celebrated Japanese Artist Seiki ornament the villa. Guests have included international celebrities and royalty, discreetly served by the experienced yet charming villa staff.Villa Ylang Ylang, however, is much, much more than a luxury beachside residence. The villa is named after the fragrant Ylang Ylang flower, renowned for bringing harmony, peace, warmth and passion, and its mantra is ‚Äòpassionate serenity‚Äô, which is exactly what you will find here. Radiating a positive and rejuvenating energy, Villa Ylang Ylang‚Äôs wildly beautiful beachside setting is therapeutic in itself, but add the yoga and spa treatments, health-conscious food and calming chill-out zones and you have a magical retreat. Secluded and peaceful, you may not want to leave this destination villa, but should you venture out you are within easy driving distance of many of Bali‚Äôs tourist attractions and natural splendours.The complete villa with two-storey main pavilion with living‚Äìdining area; fully-equipped kitchen; theatre room and upper gallery with spa and massage deck plus meditation deck; 2 bal√©s (gazebos); one 15m saltwater pool and 2 plunge pools, gym and sauna.12 guests (2 master suites with king beds; 2 queen-bedded suites; 2 twin-bedded suites convertible to Kings) plus 1 baby cot. Extra beds are available on request at additional cost.I will always be available for you when needed but the house comes with Full-time manager; senior housekeeper‚Äìbutler; maintenance man‚Äìbutler; chef; kitchen assistant; junior housekeeper; gardener; 2 security guards.Villa Ylang Ylang rests amid coconut groves and rice fields in the quiet village of Saba, within Bali‚Äôs eastern Gianyar Regency. The gardens stretch down to Saba beach, its shimmering black sands a reminder of the island's volcanic geography.Approached through Saba village, with its idyllic scenery of verdant rice fields and coconut groves, this beachfront property resting on landscaped gardens and facing the Indian Ocean‚Äôs crashing surf is a spectacular sight.Car and driver available for 8 hours at a special rate of USD25++/day (excludes petrol)BEDROOMS:Junior roomsAccessed through internal sliding doors from each of the Queen Rooms are adjoining Junior Rooms, each furnished with twin beds ‚Äì one with canopied, mosquito nets ‚Äì making them very suitable for children (these rooms are ideally positioned nearest to the living pavilion, so parental surveillance is easy in the evenings). Ensuites with showers are attached to both Junior Rooms.Interiors in all four rooms follow the style of the master suites and all bathrooms are delightfully sunny, courtesy of a conservatory-style, sloping glass roof decorated with rattan. Outside, intimate patios are edged with white pebbles, black tiles and tropical foliage; ornamented by glass standing candle-holders and furnished with a single, black reclining lounger.King bedroomsFurthest away from the main pavilion and closest to the beach, the two luxurious master suites face each other across the pool. Similar in style, both come furnished with a king-size, contemporary, four-poster bed, vanity area and silk upholstered couch. Their lavish bathrooms feature generous-sized sunken bathtubs, room-size walk-in rain shower, his n‚Äô hers washbasins and, beyond, a small courtyard with modern glass sculptures contrasting with traditional-style Balinese water statue and pool. At the opposite end, a terraced area features comfy cushioned outdoor furniture (with encircling silk drapes for privacy) and a relaxing private plunge pool, looking out over the sea.Both master suites are additionally equipped with a satellite TV and DVD player.Queen roomsNext to the master suites are two Queen Rooms featuring queen-size four-poster beds . Wood and glass sliding doors lead to chic ensuite bathrooms with mini-sunken baths that double as showers (massage and traditional Balinese style).DINING:Accomplished chef, experienced in fine-dining and entertaining, with wide repertoire of international and Asian dishes from healthy to decadent.ENTERTAINMENT:Satellite TVs and DVD players in master suites and theatre room; extensive DVD library, CD players in bedrooms and theatre room, iPod dock in bedrooms, board games, book library, infrared sauna, gym, yoga mats, massage beds, spa and yoga services on request, barbecue facilities.FOR FAMILIES:Baby cot, inflatable pool toys, high-chair, baby sitters on request.COMMUNICATION:WiFi internet complimentary throughout; computer and printer; local calls in Bali complimentary + in-house telephone system (room to room); IDD calls on request (extra cost).SPA:Conceived in perfect symbiosis with its natural surroundings, Villa Ylang Ylang maintains a philosophy of living life with passion and serenity. Offering yoga and spa treatments, fresh, wholesome food, infrared sauna and Balinese healing, this therapeutic spot unsurprisingly helps balance mind, body and soul.The extensive in-house spa menu features local and Indonesian treatments such as Balinese massage, mandi lulur and cream bath, plus facials, pedicures and manicures. Spa treatments administered by outside spa providers can be enjoyed on the rooftop massage deck on two massage beds, within guestrooms and beachfront gazebo, or any other suitable outdoor setting. Staff can arrange appointments in advance.The powerful spiritual vibe and glorious setting are also conducive to yoga and meditation. The owners have years of expertise in this field, gathering a discerning list of renowned yoga instructors and visiting yoga masters for private villa sessions. Yoga mats are provided, as is a delightful choice of peaceful places to practice, such as the river deck or rooftop yoga deck at dawn or sunset. Additionally, traditional Balinese healers can visit the villa for personalised health and cleansing ceremonies.Located within the gym and overlooking the sea, the infrared sauna is a rejuvenating marvel. Health-giving benefits are extraordinary: a twenty-minute infrared session helps eliminate toxins, increase circulation, boost the immune system and promote weight loss and well-being.Even the volcanic black sands on the beach offer therapeutic qualities ‚Äì rich in minerals, locals are known to bury themselves in the sand here to maximize their healing properties!The spaceApproached through Saba village, with its idyllic scenery of verdant rice fields and coconut groves, this beachfront property resting on landscaped gardens and facing the Indian Ocean‚Äôs crashing surf is a spectacular sight. title: The Ethereal Valley 7 Bed Rooms Gianyar Villa
description: Perched atop a breathtaking valley, this stunning 7-bedroom Balinese-style villa is a sanctuary of tranquility. With an infinity pool that seemingly cascades into the misty forest, the setting is ethereal‚Äîserene, mesmerizing, and utterly captivating. The villa blends traditional Balinese charm with modern indulgence. Whether you‚Äôre gathering with family and friends or hosting an unforgettable soiree under the stars, every moment here is touched by magic.

title: Hillside Sunrise Stay - 3BR Hideaway Villas
description: Wake up to stunning sunrises over the sea, right from your bed! Trust us, the view alone is worth the trip.Perched on a hillside in Nusa Penida, Blue Sarin Villas is a 3-bedroom escape with panoramic sea views, a private pool, and walkable beach access.Whether you're catching sunrises or sharing dinner with your loved ones, this villa offers the perfect place to unwind and reconnect. Just minutes from the harbor, restaurants, beach clubs, and some of the island‚Äôs most beautiful beaches.The spaceBlue Sarin Villas blends open tropical living with all the modern comforts you need. The heart of the villa is the light-filled living area, which opens directly onto the terrace and infinity pool, offering sweeping views of the sea below. It's the kind of view you never get tired of!Start your day with coffee and the sound of waves, and enjoy the equipped kitchenette for simple cooking, with an electric stove, fridge, and coffee maker. Whether you‚Äôre preparing fresh fruit bowls or evening snacks, everything you need is within reach.The spacious living area, with an indoor-outdoor flow, is perfect for quiet evenings with friends after a day of exploring the island.One bedroom on the ground floor faces the pool, perfect for unwinding. Upstairs, two beautifully designed bedrooms offer comfort and privacy while still enjoying the sea view. Two of the rooms have ensuite bathrooms and bathtubs for a spa-like experience, and one has a refreshing shower. We know that a bad night‚Äôs sleep can ruin a holiday. That‚Äôs why we carefully select high-quality mattresses, so you can wake up refreshed and truly enjoy your stay.Outdoors, the private pool invites you to cool down under the sun or relax on the sun loungers. In the evening, the sunken seating area with a fire pit offers a cozy space to unwind under the stars, a perfect setting for meaningful conversations or stargazing.We‚Äôd love to host you in Nusa Penida! Come and experience one of the island‚Äôs best-kept secrets.Guest accessPlease note that the villa is located on a hillside with a steep access road. For your comfort and safety, we recommend using a car with a private driver, which we will be happy to arrange for you. If you prefer to come by scooter, kindly take extra care along the way.During your stay, you'll have exclusive access to the entire villa; ensuring your privacy and safety are our top priorities. Whether you're looking to relax by the pool, whip up delicious meals in our fully-equipped kitchen, or unwind in the comfortable living room, every corner of Blue Sarin Villas is yours to enjoy.To make your experience even more delightful, we have a dedicated concierge staff available to assist you with any questions or concerns. Reach out to us through messaging, and we'll be there to ensure your stay is nothing short of exceptional.Other things to noteIncluded in every stay:- Free welcome drink and oshibori- Villa‚Äôs staff with daily cleaning, pool & garden maintenance- Bath and pool towels for each guest- Hi-Speed Wifi internet connection- House linen change every three days- Unlimited Drinking Water- Welcome fruit basketAvailable upon request (extra charge applies):- Pick up & Drop Off- Massages at the villa- Restaurant bookings- Outdoor activities include tours, water sports, snorkeling tours- And much more!Feel free to contact us if you'd like to plan any activities or excursions while you're enjoying your time at our villa.We're excited to host you soon!ANNOUNCEMENT We‚Äôd like to inform you that construction work is currently taking place at Blue Sarin Villas between 8:30 AM and 5:30 PM. Please be aware that there may be periods of loud noise during these hours. While workers will be present on-site during this time, please rest assured that it will not interfere with your privacy.This residence is surrounded by nature, including some cheeky monkey visitors. To keep you and them safe, please do not leave food or personal belongings unattended. Enjoy the natural surroundings, but always be mindful of our playful neighbors!Please be informed that Bali Island celebrates Nyepi (Silent) Day each year on the dates below. Nyepi Day is a day of absolute silence throughout the island, observed from 6 AM until 6 AM the next morning. No outdoor activities are allowed, and there will be no check-in and check-out from properties on 19 March 2026 and 8 March 2027.

It comes fully air-conditioned, with a private swimming pool, open-plan living and dining area, and soothing garden views throughout the space.Amenities‚Ä¢ Private swimming pool with jungle view‚Ä¢ Wi-Fi internet access‚Ä¢ Air conditioning throughout‚Ä¢ Safe deposit box‚Ä¢ Garden and outdoor furniture‚Ä¢ Terrace and balcony‚Ä¢ Fenced garden‚Ä¢ Hair dryer‚Ä¢ Towels and bed linen (changed every 3 days)‚Ä¢ 1 Smart Tv in Master bedroomKitchenThe gas open-plan kitchen is fully equipped with:‚Ä¢ Refrigerator‚Ä¢¬†Microwave‚Ä¢ Freezer‚Ä¢ Dishes and cutlery‚Ä¢ Kitchen utensils‚Ä¢ Coffee machine‚Ä¢ Frying pan‚Ä¢ Toaster‚Ä¢ Kettle‚Ä¢ JuicerPerfect for preparing simple meals or enjoying fresh Bali fruits with morning coffee.Optional Services (on Request)‚Ä¢¬†Private chef (lunch & dinner)‚Ä¢¬†Yoga teacher‚Ä¢ In-villa massagesLocation5 km from Ubud center ‚Äì surrounded by rice fields and forest.Perfect for yoga, wellness retreats, and digital detox.Important Information‚Ä¢ Accessible by car and motorbike‚Ä¢ Pets are not allowed‚Ä¢ Please note that staff and management may access the villa at any time for daily maintenance and service purposesAbout BaliBali is a tropical island rich in nature and spiritual energy. title: Unforgettable Retreat. Beautiful Private Villas.
description: Beautiful waterfront villa complex, which consists a 3 villas, offering a total of 10 bedrooms. Located in the village of Ketewel, on Bali‚Äôs unspoilt East coast, this estate will offer guests the possibility to stay in one of the most scenic accommodation in the area, surrounded by black sand beaches and breathtakingly overlooking the stunning ocean. Fans of surfing will also love this location, as it is only few minutes away from the world famous Keramas.The spaceVilla 1The gorgeous villa‚Äôs garden will offer guests plenty of spaces to relax and spend quality time with family and friends. The outdoor area features two swimming pools with sun loungers. The second swimming pool is instead part of the private Joglo house (Bridal suite).This space also offer a pavilion with alfresco dining tables to organise spectacular meals with ocean view and a tranquil spa area.The main living area of the villa is beautiful and homey at the same time. This large open concept space overlooks the garden with pool and has been beautifully decorated with traditional art works, woodcarvings  and antiques. The room comprises a lounge corner with beautiful sofa, a flat screen TV and a dining table.The villa counts four bedrooms. The master bedroom is located on the upper floor of the main villa and will offer a breathtaking view of the ocean. This suite has been beautifully furnished with a double bed and decorated with traditional artefacts. It also features a gorgeous tropical bathroom with sunken bathtub.The second master bedroom is instead located in its own private pavilion, the Bridal Suite: an antique Javanese joglo house with private beachside setting and plunge pool. This suite is characterised by hardwood floors and richly carved ceilings, and features a double size bed and flat screen TV.The remaining guest bedrooms are identical, each furnished with double size bed, desk, flat screen TV and gorgeously carved wooden doors. Both rooms also features terraces and semi-outdoor tropical bathrooms.Villa 2 and 3 (similar in size and design, these villas are not facing the ocean)The beautiful walled garden of the villa is an amazing place to relax and build unforgettable memories with your loved ones. At the center of this lush space, surrounded by well kept lawns fitted with sun loungers and parasols, is the 12 meters long pool of the property, just ideal to refresh after a long day spent exploring the amazing East coast of the island. The garden also hosts two gazebos, a small one positioned at the far end of the pool (perfect for massages), and a larger bal√© hung with billowing white drapes fitted with built in sofa and table.The living area of the villa is bright and airy space that opens to the garden and makes a great social hub. A beautiful double tub extends from the pool right into this living room, offering the most amazing spot to relax.The living area is characterised by stylish interiors and features artworks, stunning hand-made carvings and beautiful timber doors. The space comprises a lounge corner with comfy sofa and a dining table for six.The villa offers three beautiful and comfortable bedrooms. The master suite occupies the upper floor of the villa and enjoys a balcony with view over the garden. The room, furnished with a double size bed. The large private bathroom features a, shower and basins.The other two bedrooms are instead found on the ground floor, just next to the living area. Both suites feature double size beds, carved doors and gorgeous tropical en suite bathrooms.Guests will enjoy the services of an extremely friendly and professional team of staff.Included in the rate is also a daily breakfast.

title: Hideaway 5BR Oasis by Yeh Leh Beach for Tennis Fan

Private Dining: Arrange personalized menus, themed dinners, or BBQ nights.Additional charges apply for selected services.LOCATION HIGHLIGHTS1. The only restricted area is a discreet staff storage wardrobe used solely for maintenance purposes ‚Äî the rest of the estate is dedicated to your comfort, ensuring a truly secluded escape in paradise.Other things to noteAdditionally, here are the services provided by Pertama Management within the property: 1. CHECK-IN AND CHECK-OUT: Our team will warmly greet you and ensure a seamless check- in experience upon your arrival, ensuring your comfort as you settle in. Additionally, they will be available to assist you with the check-out process at the conclusion of your stay. We also offer a self-check-in and check-out option, which can be especially convenient for arrivals during late hours, ensuring flexibility for your schedule. 2. GUESTS SUPPORT: Your dedicated staff or is here to assist with any inquiries or needs you may have throughout your stay, offering timely support to ensure your satisfaction. title: Agung's view|Bamboo House 1 bedroom 2 beds
description: where you'll find a one-of-a-kind bamboo haven perched to overlook the breathtaking Sidemen Valley. Embrace the authenticity of a tropical haven with Mount Agung's majestic peak as your backdrop. This serene escape is the perfect destination for those seeking to materialize their adventurous dreams. We warmly invite you to immerse in the enchanting ambiance of our entire property, offering a sanctuary to leave behind the bustle of dramatic life and embark on a journey filled with ultimate joy.The spaceWelcome to the enchanting bamboo house, nestled peacefully in the heart of Sidemen, a quaint town boasting breathtaking vistas on the southern slope of majestic Mount Agung. Just a 90-minute drive from Bali Airport and a 45-minute journey from the cultural hub of Ubud, Sidemen is not just a destination, it's an experience waiting to be discovered. Surrounded by some of Bali's most renowned tourist attractions, our bamboo house is the perfect base to immerse yourself in the area's exquisite beauty and rich local traditions.If you're worried about staying in a remote place, or you're scared of nature, casa savana might not be for you. There is not air-condition inside the villa only fan, and it's not 100% bug-free, just so you know.Casa Savana is immersed in an environment of unparalleled natural beauty.The presence of bugs, insects, and frogs is a regular occurrence, adding to the authenticity of the experience; on occasion, you might even catch a glimpse of miceWe have architected the house with an open design philosophy, intended to provide you with an authentic outdoor lifestyle experience that harkens to a time when humans lived in harmony with nature. It's as if you are asleep within the ricefields, yet enjoy the conveniences of modern living.On certain evenings, if you find yourself in the right place at the right time, you might witness the magical display of fireflies, their ethereal glow creating an enchanting dance around your bed, just beyond the reach of the mosquito net. It's a scene straight out of a fairy tale, where the line between reality and fantasy blurs, leaving you with wonderful memories Air-conditionWe have chosen not to install air conditioning in our villa, as we firmly believe in preserving the natural freshness and health of the air. In fact, we feel that the urban commodities such as air conditioning are not necessary in the tranquil Sidemen Village, especially when you consider the benefits of allowing the gentle natural breeze to permeate your living space.Guest accessBreakfast. Lunch.dinnerWe included a scrumptious breakfast and daily housekeeping services for your convenience. Our villa features a well-equipped kitchen where you can prepare meals as you please. Should you prefer, we offer a diverse lunch and dinner menu with a variety of options(extra charge)). Our private chef delights in preparing culinary lunch and dinner in kitchen, and we'll gladly serve your delicious creations right to your doorstep.

description: illusion villa  - the place to be.The spaceWelcome to - illusion Bali - a bright and modern 3-bedroom villa designed for comfort, style, and pure relaxation. Nestled in the heart of Umalas/Canggu, the villa offers the perfect balance of privacy and convenience - just minutes away from Bali‚Äôs best caf√©s, restaurants, sport centres and beaches.What you‚Äôll love:	‚Ä¢	üåø Spacious living areas with floor-to-ceiling glass and natural light	‚Ä¢	üèä Private swimming pool with sunbeds and lush greenery	‚Ä¢	üßñ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Your own spa corner ‚Äî complete with sauna and jacuzzi	‚Ä¢	üç≥ Fully equipped kitchen & dining area for gatherings or private dinners	‚Ä¢	üé• Outdoor projector nights by the pool with cozy seating	‚Ä¢	üõè 3 stylish bedrooms, each with en-suite bathrooms	‚Ä¢	‚ùÑÔ∏è Air-conditioning, fast Wi-Fi, and modern amenities throughoutPerfect for:Couples, families, or friends who want a stylish tropical escape with all the comforts of home ‚Äî plus luxury touches that make every stay unforgettable.Illusion Bali isn‚Äôt just a villa ‚Äî it‚Äôs an experience where design, relaxation, and Bali‚Äôs natural beauty meet.

title: STUNNING 4BD FOUR SEASONS INSPIRED VILLA IN CANGGU
description: Designed and built by the same team behind the exclusive Four Seasons Hotel in Jimbaran, Sabana offers unparalleled standards of quality and refinement in space, architecture and landscape design with spectacular views over cascading rice-terraces and a small jungle-clad river valley in a peaceful, traditional Balinese village within the sought-after Canggu area. Rates are subject to 6% staff service charge and 10% Indonesian hotel tax, chargeable before check in.The spaceThis stunning villa accommodates 8 adults in 4 ensuite bedrooms all with King size beds. The villa presents an 18 x 4m infinity-edge swimming pool, balconies, terraces, and a choice of indoor and outdoor living areas, affording space and plenty of privacy wrapped in contemporary classic architecture completed with elegant interiors, modern comforts and Asian antiques. If we are in residence during your stay, we will give you space and privacy but we are available when needed.Quick facts: Location: CangguBedrooms: 4Guests: maximum 8 Villa: 700 sqm / 7535 sqft Land: 2,710 sqm /  29,170 sqftPool: 18x4 m / 60x13 ftThe Bungalow & Sunset Suites (extra-king size beds) : 60 sqm / 646 sqftZen and Pool Side Suites  (king size beds) : 70 sqm / 754 sqftLibrary/media room: 40 sqm / 431 sqftThe villa has a full team of professional staff including a manager, a security guard and housekeeping. Our staff is here to keep the villa beautiful and pristine, to make sure there are fresh towels, beautiful gardens, and in general to make sure that everything works well. They will look after you and the villa. Our villa manager will be happy to assist you organising the following services (not included in the night rate):+ Airport pick-up and drop-off+ Driver and day trips+ Restaurant reservations+ MassagesThe four detached buildings that constitute the villa are perfectly laid out, their rooms offering ample space and privacy. The main residence is the largest of the four and directly faces the pool, gardens and rice fields.  On the ground floor, the expansive dining room is dominated by a recycled antique teak table seating 12, and serviced by an adjoining kitchen.  Like everywhere in the villa, glass and teak sliding doors allow natural light to flow in, while maximising the idyllic views.  Thrown open, cooling breezes can enter, while air conditioning and ceiling fans provide more controlled temperatures.Guest accessGuests can access the entire 2,700 sqm | 29,170 sqft villa compound.Other things to noteWe are the direct owners of the villa so you are getting one of the nicest villas in Bali at the best possible price on the market. No intermediary commission apart from the fee Airbnb charges. This rate doesn't include chefs, drivers or butlers. The 4 bedroom villa is for a maximum of 8 people at all times and is not available for functions or any kind of events.

title: Designer Lux 7 Bed Villa near Beach & KuDeTa
description: Villa Massilia 1 & Villa 2 adjoin through a large teak gate to create a sprawling seven-bedroom estate with two swimming pools and lush gardens.  Both villas were fully renovated (April 2019) with teak and terrazzo interiors throughout. The open concept living, dining room, and kitchen bar areas encourage entertaining as do the ample pool loungers and floating beanbags. After a full day in the Bali sunshine, guests can retreat to one of seven en-suite bedrooms for a restful night.The spaceNewly redesigned (April 2019).Other things to noteComplimentary daily plant-based breakfast menu included (meat and Indonesia menu also available).

title: Rumah Haruku - Luxurious design in the jungle
description: Rumah Haruku seamlessly blends modern design with natural elements, creating an inviting atmosphere that harmonizes with its surroundings. The open-plan living area features expansive windows, allowing for abundant natural light and unobstructed views of the verdant landscape. Thoughtfully curated interiors showcase local craftsmanship and materials, enhancing the authentic Indonesian ambiance.Featured in:Est Living MagazineDesign Anthology MagazineThe spaceRumah Haruku is a peaceful jungle hideaway, surrounded by rice fields, coconut trees, and tropical greenery. Designed by Bada Studio, the house is built close to nature, away from the noise of daily life.The AreaLocated in Umedawa, Pejeng, a traditional Balinese farm village, The house is surrounded by the rhythms of real Balinese life. Ceremonies, farmers working the fields, kids on scooters, the sound of insects, and the distant sound of traditional gamelan or the local community playing volleyball. It‚Äôs the perfect stay if you want to experience the authentic side of Bali, while still being just 20 minutes from Ubud.Pejeng is one of Bali‚Äôs most sacred villages of Bali, home to ancient temples like Pura Penataran Sasih, which houses the 2,000-year-old ‚ÄúMoon of Pejeng‚Äù bronze drum. The area is rich in spiritual heritage, making it a meaningful place to experience Balinese culture.There area has several walking routes around the house that take you through Balinese villages, rice fields, and rivers where you can take a refreshing dip. Local warungs and the traditional Pejeng market are only a short drive away. During your stay, Pak Wayan will host you and help with anything you need. Our neighbor‚Äôs daughter, Ibu Komang, can prepare breakfast on request for an additional charge. Each morning, Ibu Komang places canang sari, small, handwoven offerings of flowers and incense, in the house‚Äôs shrines, to express gratitude and help maintain harmony between the spiritual and physical worlds of the land of Rumah Haruku/About the architecture:The Architecture is inspired on traditional longhouses from Borneo‚Äôs traditional ‚ÄúRumah Panjang‚Äù,  a long narrow-shaped house stilted in the middle of the Borneo rainforest and known for heir communal living spaces and connection to nature. The materiality for Rumah Haruku was inspired by traditional Indonesian architecture reflected in the use of locally sourced materials together with the Balinese-inspired hipped roof known as "Grantang".The space is completely openable creating an intimate connection between the interior and the surrounding tropical nature. Locally sourced materials, such as Bangkirai wood for the structure and ‚Äúkarpet lontar‚Äù for the ceilings.__ Note:‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Please be aware before booking, that the house has multiple level changes, steap oudrood stairs and open areas, which may not be safe for young children.‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Rumah Haruku is a private residence, not a commercial space. We kindly ask for your understanding and respect by discussing any commercial activities, such as photoshoots, in advance and treating Rumah Haruku as a private place rather than a business location.Featured in:Est Living MagazineDesign Anthology Magazine

title: Nafka Lodge Private Eco Bamboo House, Jungle view.
description: Nafka Lodge (a mix of the names of my sons Natan and Rafka) is a beautiful and sustainable Bamboo House located in the middle of the jungle. This private house has one bedroom, an open bathroom with an outdoor shower, and a balcony with the most amazing view into the green. Nafka is the perfect way to experience the nature of Bali, listen to the sounds of the jungle, and experience the authentic village life surrounding the place.The spaceBe ready to be woken up by the sun, beautiful butterflies, and the peaceful sounds of a huge variety of birds and geckos. This place is ideal for nature lovers and explorers.
